NK055(ri)001:1: // rtsa rgyud gsang ba'i snying po'i 'grel pa nyi ma'i
NK055(ri)001:2: snying po zhes bya ba gu ru pad+ma rgyal po'i
NK055(ri)001:3: gsung rgyun man ngag snyan brgyud chos rje kahthoga pa
NK055(ri)001:4: chen po'i bshad srol le'u dgu pa man gyi smad
NK055(ri)001:5: cha bzhugs so // da ni le'u dgu pa gzhan don ched du gnyer ba ston te/
NK055(ri)001:6: de yang le'u'i mtshams thag sbrel na/
NK055(ri)001:7: bzhi pa lnga pa drug pa bdun pa brgyad pa
NK055(ri)001:8: dang lngas lta ba dang ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil
NK055(ri)001:9: 'khor dang / lhag pa ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor sngags phyag rgya dang bcas pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:10: mthar phyin pa spros pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams kyang bstan nas/
NK055(ri)001:11: rten gyi gang zag de las gzhan rgyud smin pa'i nus pa yod pas/
NK055(ri)001:12: lhag pa gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor dbang bskur ma rag pa'i bar du ston to //
NK055(ri)001:13: le'u dgu pa 'dis rgyud gsum las na lam gyi rgyud/
NK055(ri)001:14: smad 'bras bu'i rgyud zur tsam ston/
NK055(ri)001:15: rgyud kyi dngos po bcu las na dbang yin la/
NK055(ri)001:16: dbang gi gzhi lhag pa gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor dang /
NK055(ri)001:17: de byin gyis brlab pa lhag pa ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor zur tsam ston/
NK055(ri)001:18: dkyil 'khor la mchod pa dgos pas rgyud kyi dngos
NK055(ri)001:19: po bcu'i mchod pa'i rnam grangs rnams kyang ston to
NK055(ri)001:20: // dkyil 'khor bcu gnyis kyi dbang du byas na/
NK055(ri)001:21: lhag pa ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor shas che/
NK055(ri)001:22: de yang gong du lhag pa ting nge 'dzin sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bstan nas/
NK055(ri)001:23: lhag pa gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor la brten te dngos po bcu'i yang dbang dang bsgrub pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:24: phrin las gsum po yang shas phra mo tsam ston pa dkyus su glo glor shes par bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:25: dkyus la 'jug ste gsung ba lo rgyus ni/
NK055(ri)001:27: de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa chen pos zhes pa la sogs te/
NK055(ri)001:28: tshig gi de ma thag pa ni le'u brgyad pa song ba'i rjes thog go //
NK055(ri)001:29: bskyed rim la phyag rgya gcig pa la brtan pa yan chad sems kyi gnas rnyed pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:30: de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'bras bu mngon du byas pa'i kun tu bzang po'o //
NK055(ri)001:33: thun mong dga' ba 'dod khams pa dbang po lnga
NK055(ri)001:34: yul lnga la spyod cing de'i gzung 'dzin gyi bde
NK055(ri)001:35: ba dang / gzugs khams pa rtog dpyod la sogs
NK055(ri)001:36: pa'i ting nge 'dzin bzhi'i stobs kyis sdug bsngal dang
NK055(ri)001:37: bral zhing 'du shes kyi 'dzin pa'i bde ba dang
NK055(ri)001:38: ba dang / / mthong ba'i lam pas don dam pa'i bden pa mngon du gyur te/
NK055(ri)001:39: chos thams cad rnam par dag pa la mthar 'dzin
NK055(ri)001:40: gyi skyon ma dmigs pa'i bde ba la 'dzin pa
NK055(ri)001:41: phra ba dang ma bral ba rnams te/
NK055(ri)001:42: ched 'dzin phra rags dang bcas pa spangs pas dgyes pa zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:44: rgyal ba kun tu bzang po la bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes lhun gyis grub pa'i phyir/
NK055(ri)001:45: gong du bstan pa'i dga' ba gsum dang /
NK055(ri)001:46: 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad ma 'dres la yongs
NK055(ri)001:47: su rdzogs pa'i bsam gyis mi khyab lhun gyis grub
NK055(ri)001:48: pa la 'og ma rnams las ltos na che ba
NK055(ri)001:49: tsam ma yin te/ dbyer med pa'i ngo bo nyid
NK055(ri)001:50: du yang gzung ba med pa ni rang gi ngo
NK055(ri)001:51: bo nyid las mtshan btags pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:52: rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig bkod pa zhes bya ba ni/
NK055(ri)001:53: rang bzhin gnas tshul gyi don rtogs pa lhun gyis
NK055(ri)001:54: grub pa nyid rang bzhin 'bras bu mthar phyin pa
NK055(ri)001:55: lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi sku'i mu dra/
NK055(ri)001:57: thugs kyi mu dra thams cad me long du gzugs brnyan snang yang me long las ma g.yos pa bzhin/
NK055(ri)001:58: rang rig pa rang byung gi ye shes chos gsum
NK055(ri)001:59: gyis mtshon pa'i rdo rje lta bu'i ngo bor lhun
NK055(ri)001:60: gyis grub pa de/ kun tu bzang po las ma
NK055(ri)001:61: gtogs pa'i phal gyi spyod yul du ma gyur pas
NK055(ri)001:62: gyis grub pa de/ na gsang ba'o // dam tshig
NK055(ri)001:63: ni rang bzhin gsang ba'i snying po de mtshon pa'i
NK055(ri)001:64: phyir lhag pa gzugs brnyan sku'i dkyil 'khor gyis rang
NK055(ri)001:65: bzhin gsang ba'i snying por sbyor ba las mi 'da'
NK055(ri)001:66: gyis grub pa de/ na gsang ba'o // ba'o // bkod pa zhes pa/
NK055(ri)001:68: lhag pa gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor bya ba'i rim pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:70: dkyil 'khor rgyas bsdus kyi ngo bo dang /
NK055(ri)001:71: slob dpon 'jug pa slob ma 'jug pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:72: dbang thob nas dngos grub bsgrub pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:73: 'bras bu rnams gdul bya la snang ba'i/
NK055(ri)001:74: snyoms par zhugs nas zhes pa/
NK055(ri)001:75: bkod pa de rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa de gdul bya'i dbang ngo //
NK055(ri)001:76: ched du brjod pa zhes pa/
NK055(ri)001:77: go phye ba'i 'khor kho na'i dbang ngo //
NK055(ri)001:79: lhag pa gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor gzhi shas che ba gong du bstan na/
NK055(ri)001:80: sor bzhi pa dang sor brgyad pa gnyis gsang ba'i
NK055(ri)001:81: bdag po dang rdo rje slob dpon gyi sku la
NK055(ri)001:82: brten pa dang gnyis kyi dbang ngo //
NK055(ri)001:83: khru gang ba dang khru bzhi pa gnyis ni dkyil 'khor bsdus pa'i bri gazhi'o //
NK055(ri)001:84: khru bcu gnyis pa dang bcu drug pa gnyis ni dkyil 'khor 'bring po'i bri gazhi'o //
NK055(ri)001:85: nyi shu pa dang nyi shu rtsa lnga pa gnyis ni dkyil 'khor rgyas pa'i bri gazhi'o //
NK055(ri)001:86: rgyang grags dang dpag tshad gnyis ni spros pa'i rnal 'byor gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor ro //
NK055(ri)001:87: nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa ni mthar lam pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi tshad do //
NK055(ri)001:88: rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor rnams la gnyis gnyis byung ba ni/
NK055(ri)001:89: rdo rje slob dpon bzo mi bzo dang /
NK055(ri)001:90: slob ma 'byor pa che chung gi khyad do //
NK055(ri)001:91: ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor la gnyis byung ba
NK055(ri)001:92: ni rtogs pa mtho dman dang ting nge 'dzin goms
NK055(ri)001:93: ma goms so // dang po dkyil 'khor la slob
NK055(ri)001:94: dpon gyi mtshan nyid de bsnyen par bya ba las
NK055(ri)001:96: shin tu phra ba'i dam tshig mchog /ces pa/
NK055(ri)001:97: 'di bri ba la brten pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhi ka'i sngon du 'gro la/
NK055(ri)001:98: de las kyang lung la brten pa'i dkyil 'khor gces so //
NK055(ri)001:99: rnal 'byor pas de bzhin nyid kun tu snang rgyu'i ting nge 'dzin la goms/
NK055(ri)001:100: de las kyang rgyas pa nas bshad pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' phra mo'i sku'am/
NK055(ri)001:101: gsang snying nas bshad pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba chen po'i sku la goms pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:102: dkyil 'khor rgyas pa la ltos na phra bas so //
NK055(ri)001:103: yang phra mo'i ting nge 'dzin gyis thugs kyi sgrib pa sbyangs pa shin tu phra ba'i zhes pas/
NK055(ri)001:104: bsnyen pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi 'phro 'du yig 'abru'am/
NK055(ri)001:105: rdo rje phra mo'i 'du 'phro la sems 'byongs pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:106: byings rmugs rgod 'gyod kyi rkyen dang bral nas ji
NK055(ri)001:107: tsam gnas kyi bar du gnas pa la skyo dub
NK055(ri)001:108: med pa'o // des dag gis bsnyen pa grangs dang
NK055(ri)001:109: dus dang mtshan ma gsum dam bcas pa bzhin du
NK055(ri)001:111: de lta bu de ni dam tshig mchog /ces pas
NK055(ri)001:112: gzhan don byed pa'i rnal 'byor pas de las mi
NK055(ri)001:113: 'da' bas kyang dam tshig /de lta bu las slob
NK055(ri)001:114: ma smin pa las mi 'da' bas kyang dam tshig
NK055(ri)001:115: mchog ni bdag gzhan gyi don gang brtsam yang 'grub
NK055(ri)001:117: yang na shin tu phra ba ni zur gnyis pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:119: sor bzhi pa dang sor brgyad pa gnyis tshad bstan
NK055(ri)001:120: pa rnams kyi nang na chung bas kyang shin tu
NK055(ri)001:122: skabs su lung la brten pa'i mgo phyogs tsam bshad par bya ste/
NK055(ri)001:123: nye bar sor bzhi ba'i dkyil 'khor ston te bri ba dang /
NK055(ri)001:126: slob dpon gyi 'jug pa rnam pa gnyis dang /
NK055(ri)001:127: dbang bskur ba dngos gzhi dang bzhi'o //
NK055(ri)001:128: bri ba la bri ba'i dgongs pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:130: che chung ji tsam bri ba'i tshad dang /
NK055(ri)001:131: de la go ma ye bya ba dang /
NK055(ri)001:135: sku gsung thugs kyi rtags dgod pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:137: dkyil 'khor gyi tshad chung ngu gnyis la brten te/
NK055(ri)001:138: rdo rje slob dpon gyi sku la brten pa'i dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor ni/
NK055(ri)001:139: dang po bri ba'i gzhi dang tshad bstan pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:140: phyag rgya chen po'i lag mthil du //
NK055(ri)001:142: mnyam bzhag mdzad pa'i phyag steng ma'o //
NK055(ri)001:143: der dkyil 'khor bri ba'i ngo bo/
NK055(ri)001:144: thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa de //
NK055(ri)001:147: thugs kyi sgyu 'phrul dang gsum las/
NK055(ri)001:148: 'dir thugs rdo rje sems dpa'i sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba ste/
NK055(ri)001:149: rdo rje sems dpas gtso bor byed pa'i gtan tshigs so //
NK055(ri)001:150: dkyil 'khor ni rgyas 'bring bsdus gsum las 'dir 'bring po gtso che ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:151: dam pa ni bud+d+ha thams cad thugs kyi gtsor 'dus pas 'dir de gtso bor byed pa'am/
NK055(ri)001:152: yang na gsang dbang gi dkyil 'khor yin pas byang chub sems la dam pa zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:153: bri ba'i gzhi dang tshad ni/
NK055(ri)001:154: sor ni bzhi yi tshad du bya //
NK055(ri)001:156: rgyu tsan+dana nam shug pa lta bu la shing leb
NK055(ri)001:157: legs par sor bzhi par smos pas zhar la sor
NK055(ri)001:159: de'ang gser dngul la bya ba ni slob dpon bud+d+hasa bshad do //
NK055(ri)001:160: de la go ma ye bya ba ni rdzas sum cu snyoms pas byugs te/
NK055(ri)001:161: rgyas bshad zhib mo ni phyi nas 'chad bar 'gyur ro //
NK055(ri)001:162: mthug srab glang ko tsam du byug par bshad/
NK055(ri)001:164: 'di la thig gzhung bzhin gdab tu med de/
NK055(ri)001:165: rig pas thig ni gdab par bya //
NK055(ri)001:166: zhes pa rdo rje slob dpon gyi rig pas phyi nang cha bgos te/
NK055(ri)001:169: rta babs rnams su sa bcad la bzo thig bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:172: rtsibs bzhi mu khyud gru chad bar khyams sgo khyud dang ldan par bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:173: de yang ri mor bya ba dang tshon bkye ba gnyis las/
NK055(ri)001:174: tshon chu tshon du bya ste byin rlabs kyang gzhung bzhin du bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:175: de la phyag rgya dgod pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:176: sen zlum tsam gyi nyi zla la //
NK055(ri)001:178: yungs 'bru tsam gyi yi ge las //
NK055(ri)001:179: phyag rgya til 'bru tsam du bri //
NK055(ri)001:181: 'dir lhag pa gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor la sku gsung thugs tshang bar dgod pa'i gtan tshigs yin la/
NK055(ri)001:182: 'dir dngos su yi ge chung ngu bri ba tsam du bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:183: de nas dus tshod bzang po la sa gzhi ga
NK055(ri)001:184: dar byas pa'i gnas su stan 'bol po la rdo
NK055(ri)001:185: rje slob dpon bzhugs/ phyag gnyis mnyam bzhag mdzad pa'i
NK055(ri)001:186: thog tu dkyil 'khor sor bzhi pa'am mdzub gang ba
NK055(ri)001:187: rje slob dpon bzhugs/ bzhugs/ mdun du man+dala gcig gi
NK055(ri)001:188: thog tu me tog tshom bu zhig gi thog tu
NK055(ri)001:189: bum pa chas su stsal ba gzungs thag dang bcas
NK055(ri)001:190: rje slob dpon bzhugs/ bzhugs/ pa bzhugs/ de nas de
NK055(ri)001:191: la p+au dza bkod pa ni phyi'i mchod pa rnam
NK055(ri)001:192: pa lnga yang bungs che bas bskor/
NK055(ri)001:194: ras kha dog tshos su byas pa mang po dang /
NK055(ri)001:195: kha rgyan dang mgul rgyan la sogs pa rgyan gyi bye brag mang po dang /
NK055(ri)001:196: bza' btung bro ba zhal zas kyi tshogs g.yos kyi bye brag mang po dang /
NK055(ri)001:197: glu tshig sgra'i bye brag rnams kyis kyang bskor/
NK055(ri)001:198: de ltar bcas tshar nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis
NK055(ri)001:199: mdun gyi dkyil 'khor rab gnas bya ste gzhung bzhin
NK055(ri)001:200: du bsgom/ ye shes pa spyan drangs nas bstim/
NK055(ri)001:201: phyi'i p+au dza rnam pa lnga rgyas par 'bul/
NK055(ri)001:202: de'i rting la zhing khams rnam par dag pa'i p+au dza dang kun tu bzang po'i p+au dza rnams 'bul/
NK055(ri)001:203: nang gi p+au dza rnam gsum 'bul/
NK055(ri)001:204: de nas bstod pa yang bya/
NK055(ri)001:205: de tshar ba dang mdun gyi bum pa mi dmigs pa las gzhal yas khang du bsgom/
NK055(ri)001:206: nang du sngags kyis lha bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis bskyed/
NK055(ri)001:207: ye shes pa spyan drang la bstim/
NK055(ri)001:208: mchod pa lnga dang bdud rtsi sman gyi mchod pa 'bul/
NK055(ri)001:209: de nas bsnyen pa bya ba la gtso bo la brgya rtsa brgyad/
NK055(ri)001:210: rigs bzhi la lnga bcu rtsa bzhi re/
NK055(ri)001:211: 'khor rnams la bdun nam nyer gcig re/
NK055(ri)001:213: 'od du zhu ba ye shes kyi chur bsgom/
NK055(ri)001:214: de nas slob dpon ting nge 'dzin gyis bdag 'jug bya/
NK055(ri)001:215: de nas slob ma 'jug pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:216: zhu ba gsol ba tsam bya/
NK055(ri)001:217: dam tshig phog /de nas me tog ni sor bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor la 'bul ba'am/
NK055(ri)001:218: yang na slob dpon gyi thugs kar 'bul/
NK055(ri)001:220: dkyil 'khor gyi don bshad pa tsam bya/
NK055(ri)001:221: de nas bar der tshogs byas la/
NK055(ri)001:222: slob ma'i snod dang sbyar la dbang rnams bskur ba
NK055(ri)001:223: gzhung bsnyag /de ni slob dpon pad+ma'i gdams ngag go
NK055(ri)001:224: // rgyas par gzhung la 'jug ste man nga ga gis nyams su blangs na/
NK055(ri)001:225: slob dpon gyi mtshan nyid dang /
NK055(ri)001:226: bsnyen pa bya ba las mi 'da' bar bstan pa gzhung tshigs bcad gcig gis bstan pa song zin/
NK055(ri)001:227: da lhag pa gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor la bcu
NK055(ri)001:228: gcig gis bstan pa'i dang po sa'i cho ga bstan
NK055(ri)001:229: pa ni/ 'og yang na sa gzhi rab bsnyam la //
NK055(ri)001:232: zhes pa dgar ba'i tshig ste/
NK055(ri)001:233: rang bzhin 'bras bu mthar phyin pa'i dkyil 'khor 'og
NK055(ri)001:234: min na bzhugs pa ltar bsgoms pas 'dir lhag pa
NK055(ri)001:235: gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor mtshon pa bris nas slob
NK055(ri)001:236: ma la ston pas yang na zhes bya/
NK055(ri)001:237: yang na sngar gyi sor bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor sa
NK055(ri)001:238: gzhi la mi rten pas sa'i cho ga mi dgos
NK055(ri)001:239: pas na yang na zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:240: lhag pa gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor sa gzhi la brten dgos/
NK055(ri)001:241: de'i dbang gis sa gzhi snyoms pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:242: sa'i skyon thams cad dag par byas na yon tan
NK055(ri)001:243: phun sum tshogs pa 'byung ba de'i dbang gis sa'i
NK055(ri)001:245: dang po sa btsal te dkyil 'khor bya ba'i gnas bdag la yod na lhag po btsal mi dgos/
NK055(ri)001:246: gzhan la yod na rgyal po'am blon po'am dge 'dun sde bo che'i mnga' ris yin na/
NK055(ri)001:247: dang po tshig gis zhu ba bya/
NK055(ri)001:248: des ma byung na barngana pa sbyin/
NK055(ri)001:249: des ma byung na rin 'jal bar bshad do //
NK055(ri)001:250: de'i sngon du yang phyi brtag pa ste bzang ba'i mtshan nyid/
NK055(ri)001:253: bar snang 'o kha'i chu ltar dwangs pa/
NK055(ri)001:254: phyogs bzhi mtshams bzhi'i brtags pa rnams rgyas par bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:255: de rnams bzang na snang ba mi las bslang ba gong ltar bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:256: de nas mi ma yin pa la bslang ba ni/
NK055(ri)001:257: sa'i lha mo'i sta gon gyi cho ga rgyas par bya/
NK055(ri)001:258: de'i zhar la sa bdag lha klu rnams la gtor ma sbyin/
NK055(ri)001:259: dbang bskur ba'i don du gsol ba gdab/
NK055(ri)001:260: bar chad mi 'ong bar smon lam gdab bo //
NK055(ri)001:262: dkyil 'khor gang du byed pa'i sa'i dbus su rgyar
NK055(ri)001:263: khru gang pa'i gru bzhi pus nub tsam du brko
NK055(ri)001:264: ste/ de'i sa rnams chud mi za bar spungs/
NK055(ri)001:265: de nas chus brtags pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:266: de nas chu gtsang mas bkang la kha mnyam par bya/
NK055(ri)001:267: yi ge brgya pa bzla zhing shar phyogs su gom pa drang pos lnga bcu rtsa bzhir 'gro/
NK055(ri)001:268: tshur la 'ong chu 'gram du phyin tsa chu bri
NK055(ri)001:269: nas phyed la sogs par bying na ye mi nyan
NK055(ri)001:270: pas spo/ cung bri ba'am sor 'og tsam bri bar gyur kyang sngags bzla/
NK055(ri)001:271: ting nge 'dzin gyi goms pas sbyangs nas man+dala bya/
NK055(ri)001:272: de nas sas brtags pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:273: snga ma'i sa rnams blugs te/
NK055(ri)001:274: brdung yag byas nas lhag na dngos grub kyi rtags yin/
NK055(ri)001:276: cung ma gang na'ang sngags dang phyag rgya ting nge 'dzin gyis sbyang /
NK055(ri)001:277: sbyang ba la las dang bya bas sbyang ba/
NK055(ri)001:280: las dang bya bas sbyang ba ni/
NK055(ri)001:281: snga ma brkos pa'i nang du sa'i ro lnga bsal te/
NK055(ri)001:282: sems can gyi ro rus pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:286: 'bru'i ro phub ma gang byung yang bsal lo //
NK055(ri)001:287: gter gzhug pa dang dkyil 'khor gyi bcas thams cad byed pa ni las dang bya bas sbyang ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:289: las thams cad pa'i sngags brgya la sogs pa bazla'o //
NK055(ri)001:290: ting nge 'dzin gyis sbyang ba ni/
NK055(ri)001:291: mtshan ma med pa sh+au nya t+aa'i sngags brjod cing stong pa nyid kyis sbyang ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:293: las dang bya ba gzung ba ni dkyil 'khor gru bzhi lham par bya/
NK055(ri)001:294: phyogs mtshams ma nor ba gal che'o //
NK055(ri)001:295: ting nge 'dzin gyis gzung ba ni/
NK055(ri)001:296: dkyil 'khor gyi thog tu gzhal yas khang dbub par 'dod pa yang yod/
NK055(ri)001:297: lag pa rtse gsum gyi phyag rgyas sa la brdab cing /
NK055(ri)001:298: badz+ra kro d+ha ha na ha na'i sngags brjod pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:299: gzung ba'i rnam grangs mang po gzhan dag nas rgyas par yang bstan to //
NK055(ri)001:300: bsrung ba ni mtshams bcad pa kho na yin pas/
NK055(ri)001:301: rdo rje slob dpon dkyil 'a khor gyi tho ga tu bzhugs mchod pa dang gtor ma rnams kyis bskor/
NK055(ri)001:302: mngon par rtogs pa gzhung bzhin bya/
NK055(ri)001:304: de nas bsrung ba'i rim pa rnams gzhung bzhin du bya ste/
NK055(ri)001:305: g.yas g.yon gyi lta stangs kyis bsrung ba dang /
NK055(ri)001:306: mtshon cha'i gur gyis bsrung ba dang stangs stabs dang /
NK055(ri)001:307: phur pa gdab pa rnams rgyas par bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:308: dkyil 'khor gyi tshad bstan pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:309: dkyil 'khor khru gang tshad du bya //
NK055(ri)001:310: zhes pa logs re la khru re'o //
NK055(ri)001:311: yang na lus gang tshad du bya //
NK055(ri)001:312: zhes pa 'dom gang ste lus re re'i tshad do //
NK055(ri)001:313: de gnyis ni sgyu 'phrul gyi dkyil 'khor bsdu ba/
NK055(ri)001:314: gtso bo yab yum gnyis la lha bcu drug gis bskor bas bco brgyad pa'i dkyil 'khor bri gazhi'o //
NK055(ri)001:315: dkyil 'khor 'bring po bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bri gzhi ni/
NK055(ri)001:316: yang na lus ni bcu gnyis sam //
NK055(ri)001:317: zhes pa ngos re la 'dom gsum gsum yod pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:318: yang na khru ni bcu drug pa //
NK055(ri)001:319: zhes pa ngos re la 'dom bzhi yod pa ste de gnyis ni dkyil 'khor 'bring po'i bri gazhi'o //
NK055(ri)001:320: nyi shu'am nyi shu rtsa lngar bya //
NK055(ri)001:321: zhes pa khru nyi shu ni ngos re la 'dom lnga pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:322: nyi shu rtsa lnga ni ngos re la 'dom drug dang khru gang yod pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:323: de gnyis ni sgyu 'phrul rgyas pa'i bri gzhi ste/
NK055(ri)001:324: tshad gnyis gnyis smos pa ni rdo rje slob dpon
NK055(ri)001:325: bzo mi bzo slob ma 'byor pa che chung gi
NK055(ri)001:326: dbang ngo // gzugs brnyan las gzhan du/
NK055(ri)001:327: 'og yang na rgyang grags dpag tshad dam //
NK055(ri)001:328: zhes pa rnal 'byor pa goms pa che chung dang /
NK055(ri)001:329: ting nge 'dzin 'byongs ma 'byongs kyi tshad kyis gnyis te/
NK055(ri)001:330: rgyang grags lhas gang ba dang /
NK055(ri)001:332: nam mkha'i khams ni mtha' yas par //
NK055(ri)001:333: zhes pa mthar lam pa'i dgongs pa'i tshad do //
NK055(ri)001:335: zhes pa ting nge 'dzin gyis gong du bud+d+ha nyi khri bzhi stong bstan pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:336: de lta bu'i dkyil 'khor las gdul bya mthong snang
NK055(ri)001:337: gi dbang gis dkyil 'khor sna tshogs su yang shar
NK055(ri)001:339: slob dpon mthar nye lam gnas pas //
NK055(ri)001:340: rgyang grags dpag tshad la sogs par //
NK055(ri)001:341: rdo rje'i thig tshad dor tsam gyis //
NK055(ri)001:342: mu dra'i dkyil 'khor gsal ldang ba //
NK055(ri)001:343: dkyil 'khor sna tshogs mchog tu gsungs //
NK055(ri)001:345: 'dir rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor che ba la mchog ces bya ste/
NK055(ri)001:346: de yang mchog tu gyur pa ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor mchog tu bstan pa yin te/
NK055(ri)001:347: slob ma las dag pa drod thob pa yan chod
NK055(ri)001:348: kyi snang ba yin pas de dag gi spyod yul
NK055(ri)001:349: lo // ma bsrung ba'i dngos po go ma ye bya ba ni/
NK055(ri)001:350: gong na 'bru lnga spos lnga rin chen lnga //
NK055(ri)001:351: zhes pa la sogs pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:352: phung po lnga dag cing sku lnga thob par bya ba'i phyir/
NK055(ri)001:354: 'bras dang mon sran gre'u dang gro dang nas dang til dkar po dang lnga'o //
NK055(ri)001:355: dbang po lnga dag cing phrin las lnga thob par bya ba'i phyir/
NK055(ri)001:361: yul lnga dag pa dang yon tan lnga thob par bya ba'i phyir rin po che lnga ni/
NK055(ri)001:365: nor bu rin po che dang lnga'o //
NK055(ri)001:366: rnam shes lnga dag cing ye shes lnga thob par bya ba'i phyir snying po lnga ni/
NK055(ri)001:372: 'dod yon lnga dag cing gsung lnga thob par bya ba'i phyir sman lnga ni/
NK055(ri)001:377: ka ri ar tsi tra ste lnga'o //
NK055(ri)001:378: khams lnga dag cing rigs lnga thob par bya ba'i phyir bdud rtsi lnga ste/
NK055(ri)001:379: de dag cha mnyam par byas nas/
NK055(ri)001:380: lag tshag gis tshon rtsi bzhin du byas nas dkyil
NK055(ri)001:381: 'khor che chung gang yin rnams la lde gus glang
NK055(ri)001:382: ko tsam byugs la der sa bsrung bar bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:383: cha rkyen 'di dag la kri ya yo ga ma
NK055(ri)001:384: h+aa yo ga gzhung tha dad nas 'byung ba yin
NK055(ri)001:385: pas/ don gyi ngo bzung mi 'dra ba mang po yod de/
NK055(ri)001:386: gzhung gcig bzhin nyams su blang /
NK055(ri)001:387: go ma ye 'di kha shas ni sta gon sngon du byed pa 'byung /
NK055(ri)001:388: kha shas ni rdul tshon thig gdab ka na 'byung ste/
NK055(ri)001:389: 'dir sa bzung ba'i ngo bor byas pa yin pas 'di bzhin du bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:390: 'og nas sta gon gyi cho ga ni/
NK055(ri)001:391: rigs kyi dkyil 'khor lnga rnams bsgom //
NK055(ri)001:392: zhes pa sta gon nub mo la phyin nas dkyil
NK055(ri)001:393: 'khor ga dar legs par byas pa la dri bzang
NK055(ri)001:394: gi chu bag tsam gyis byug /de nas sta gon
NK055(ri)001:395: gyi lha dang rdul tshon gyi lha'i gnas rnams gcig
NK055(ri)001:396: tu bab par bya ba'i phyir/
NK055(ri)001:397: sta gon gyi nyin mo thig gdab ste/
NK055(ri)001:398: gong phur bu srad bu tshon phye dang //
NK055(ri)001:399: zhes pas thig skud de ras bal lam bkra shis
NK055(ri)001:400: pa las byung ba'i thig skud kyi rgyu las ye
NK055(ri)001:405: dkyil 'khor gyi ngos gnyis dang mnyam pa de yang byin gyis brlab ste/
NK055(ri)001:406: ye shes kyi thig ni ye shes lngar byin gyis brlabsa pa gzhung bzhin du bya/
NK055(ri)001:407: las thig kyang rdo rje gsum du byin gyis brlab pa gzhung bzhin du bya/
NK055(ri)001:410: rgyal rigs kyi bu mo lo bcu drug ma yum kun tu bzang mor byin gyis brlab pa'am/
NK055(ri)001:411: yang na slob ma kun tu bzang mor byin gyis brlab pa'i g.yog dang bcas pas thig gdab ste/
NK055(ri)001:413: phyogs bcu'i bud+d+ha bskul ba bya/
NK055(ri)001:414: de nas nam mkha' la thig gdab pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:415: spyir ni sa thig ji yod kyi grangs gdab par 'byung ste/
NK055(ri)001:416: thig bzhi btabs pas dkyil 'khor cha brgyad tsam zhig
NK055(ri)001:417: 'byung bas bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi dkyil 'khor grub
NK055(ri)001:418: par bsgom/ thig gdab pas phyogs bcu thams cad dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lor shar bar mos/
NK055(ri)001:420: tshangs thig btabs pa'i sgras phyogs bcu thams cad dkyil 'khor shar zhes 'byung ngo //
NK055(ri)001:421: de nas sa thig gdab pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:422: dkyil 'khor rgyas bsdus gnyis gang yin yang gzhung bzhin du rgyas par bya ste/
NK055(ri)001:423: rgyas pa yin na dbus kyi pho brang chen po dgos/
NK055(ri)001:425: phal cher lag len dkyil 'khor 'bring po yin pas de bzhin du shes par bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:426: de ltar sa thig gdab nas/
NK055(ri)001:427: dzahmh'u bam hoh badz+ra a we sha zhes brjod pas/
NK055(ri)001:428: nam mkha'i ye shes kyi thig sa thig la bstim/
NK055(ri)001:429: de nas ye shes dam tshig dbyer med pa'i thig
NK055(ri)001:430: de sa 'dzin btegs pa'i mu dras nam mkha' la
NK055(ri)001:431: bkyags te/ thig 'goms pa'i nyes pa mi 'ong ba'i phyir ro //
NK055(ri)001:432: de nas phur pa btsug la phyi nang gi 'khor lo rnams bskor ro //
NK055(ri)001:433: rdo rje las rim nas ni/
NK055(ri)001:434: tshon rtsi mdzub gang ba zhig nub mo nas drang b+han+d+hasa bkab/
NK055(ri)001:435: phyir nang b+han+d+ha bkyag nas ltas/
NK055(ri)001:437: de nas sta gon gyi tshom bu bkod de/
NK055(ri)001:438: rdo rje slob dpon gyi ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs/
NK055(ri)001:439: slob mas bya ba lag len bya ste/
NK055(ri)001:440: byang chub mchog tu nyi zla 'char //
NK055(ri)001:441: de nyid bzhugs gnas yin par gsungs //
NK055(ri)001:443: yang na dri bzang gi thig le dbus su gru bzhi zhig bya/
NK055(ri)001:444: de'i thog tu me tog gi tshom bu bkod/
NK055(ri)001:449: h+aum badz+ra d+h+rika /m+aum d+h+aa t+w+ae shwa ri/
NK055(ri)001:450: tish+tha badz+ra sa ma ya s+t+wam zhes brjod pas/
NK055(ri)001:451: tshom bu mi bskyod pa yab yum sku mdog phyag mtshan rgyan dang cha lugs ldan par bsgom mo //
NK055(ri)001:452: de ltar rigs bzhi yab yum brgyad/
NK055(ri)001:454: kun bzang yab yum de rnams khag gnyis su dgod/
NK055(ri)001:455: thub pa drug rnams dri bzang gi thig le dang me tog gi tshom bu dang /
NK055(ri)001:456: rdo rje slob dpon gyis sngags brjod pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:457: lha bsgom pa rnams ma nor bar gtso bo nas rim pa bzhin 'agre'o //
NK055(ri)001:458: de yan chad ni lha sta gon gyi dam tshig pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:460: rgyas par byas na lha re la bum pa re/
NK055(ri)001:462: las thams cad pa dang drug /bum pa chas su
NK055(ri)001:463: bcug pa'i cho ga rnams rgyas par byas nas dkyil
NK055(ri)001:464: 'khor gyi phyogs bzhi dbus dang lngar bzhugs pa'am/
NK055(ri)001:465: yang na logs su man+dala zhig gi phyogs bzhi dbus dang lngar yang btub/
NK055(ri)001:466: yang na phreng du byas nas gral rim ma nor na yang btub skad/
NK055(ri)001:467: de nas mchod pa gtor ma rnams kyis dkyil 'khor gyi tha ma rgyas par bskor/
NK055(ri)001:468: rdo rje slob dpon shar phyogs su bzhugs te bdag nyid rnal 'byor pa'i bya ba tshar nas/
NK055(ri)001:469: mdun gyi lha rnams gsal gdab/
NK055(ri)001:470: ye shes pa spyan drang pa nas bzung ste/
NK055(ri)001:471: las 'grigs bzhin du bstim pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:474: de nas bum pa rab gnas bya ba na/
NK055(ri)001:475: lha re re bzhin du bskyed/
NK055(ri)001:477: p+au dza lnga dang bdud rtsi 'bul/
NK055(ri)001:480: yab kyi thugs ka nas sngags byung /
NK055(ri)001:481: yab kyi zhal nas yum gyi zhal du zhugs/
NK055(ri)001:482: yum gyi thugs ka nas yab kyi thugs kar sga ra ra 'khor tshar ba dang 'od du bzhu/
NK055(ri)001:483: yang lha bskyed pa rim pa bzhin du bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:484: dbus bum du dkyil 'khor rgyas par bzhed pa'ang mchis/
NK055(ri)001:485: shar bum dang po rnam snang /
NK055(ri)001:486: de nas sa snying yab yum/
NK055(ri)001:487: de nas byams pa yab yum/
NK055(ri)001:488: de nas shar gyi sgo ba/
NK055(ri)001:490: de rim pa bzhin du bya ba'ang 'agre'o //
NK055(ri)001:491: thub pa drug la yum med pas bsnyen pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:492: zhal nas lte bar thim ste khong nas brgyud cing zhal du thon pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:493: las bum ni khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i byin rlabs bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:494: 'dir zhib par brjod pas yi ges 'jigs/
NK055(ri)001:495: de nas slob ma sta gon ni zhu ba gsol/
NK055(ri)001:500: de nas bsrung skud gdags pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:503: ku sha gtad pa rnams bya ste/
NK055(ri)001:504: de nas lha la gsol ba gdab pa rnams bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:505: dkyil 'khor mi bsdu bar sar bzhag /rmi lam brtags/
NK055(ri)001:507: thig gi cho ga la gnyis te/
NK055(ri)001:508: go ma ye bya ba dang /
NK055(ri)001:509: thig byin gyis brlab pa dang gnyis yin la/
NK055(ri)001:510: sang nang mo nyi ma 'char kas 'dzin bteg pa'i
NK055(ri)001:511: phyag rgyas sta gon gyi lha rnams bkyags nas nam
NK055(ri)001:512: mkha' la bzhugs/ bum pa rnams gdan 'god sar bzhugs/
NK055(ri)001:513: me tog rnams bsdu la mchod gnas su rung ba yin/
NK055(ri)001:515: phur bu srad bu tshon phye dang //
NK055(ri)001:517: phur bu ni dkyil 'khor gyi dbus na gtsug nas bskor ba'i phur pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:518: srad bu ni thig skud do //
NK055(ri)001:519: tshon phye ni sa tshon rnams so //
NK055(ri)001:520: yid 'ong grogs ni thig g.yog go //
NK055(ri)001:521: thig gdab cho ga phun sum tshogs ni/
NK055(ri)001:522: rgyas 'bring bsdus gsum gyi dkyil 'khor gang yin pa ma nor ba dang /
NK055(ri)001:523: rta babs tshun chad kyi thig rnams ma 'chugs par bya ba dang /
NK055(ri)001:524: thig gi skor phyogs rnams ma nor ba phun sum tshogs pa zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:526: rgyud kyi don la mkhas pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:527: lta ba dang ting nge 'dzin du ldan pas mi nor bar bya ba'i phyir/
NK055(ri)001:528: dam tshig pa'i thig dang ye shes pa'i thig gnyis te/
NK055(ri)001:530: las thig ni thugs ka nas drang bar bsgom la/
NK055(ri)001:531: ye shes kyi thig ni mkha' gsang nas byang chub
NK055(ri)001:532: sems kyi thig ye shes lnga dang ldan par brlab
NK055(ri)001:533: bo // tshon la gnyis kyi tshon byin gyis brlab pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:534: rigs kyi dkyil 'khor lnga rnams bsgom //
NK055(ri)001:536: tshon rab rin po che'i phye ma/
NK055(ri)001:538: tha ma sa tshon sna lnga kha dog gsal ba la/
NK055(ri)001:539: snod b+han+d+ha'am rin po che'i snod ma nyams par blugs te/
NK055(ri)001:540: sngon po la h'u bris pa dbus/
NK055(ri)001:541: dkar po la bris pa shar/
NK055(ri)001:542: ser po la s+w+aa bris pa lho/
NK055(ri)001:543: dmar po la +aa bris pa nub/
NK055(ri)001:544: ljang gu la h+aa bris pa byang/
NK055(ri)001:545: de nas tshon lnga mi dmigs pa las yi ge lnga las dbus mi bskyod pa/
NK055(ri)001:549: h+aa las don grub yum dang phyag mtshan bcas pa longs skur bsgom/
NK055(ri)001:550: mig 'bar ba'i lta ba rdzi ma lheb dang bcas pas 'og min nas spyan drangs la bstim/
NK055(ri)001:551: p+au dza 'bul bstod pa bya ste so so'i snying po tshar bdun bdun tsam brjod/
NK055(ri)001:552: yab yum snyoms 'jug gis 'od du zhu nas 'od phung kha dog 'bar ba lngar bsgom/
NK055(ri)001:553: lag pa g.yon sor mo la yig 'bru bsgom la/
NK055(ri)001:554: tshon rtsi rnams bum pa lta bur yar spungs/
NK055(ri)001:556: de yang dkyil 'khor rgyas pa na ni/
NK055(ri)001:557: tshon sna nyi shu rtsa lnga dgos te/
NK055(ri)001:558: dkar po gcig la yang dkar po dngos/
NK055(ri)001:564: 'bring po'i dbang du lnga nyid do //
NK055(ri)001:565: tshon gyi kha dog gi dgos pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:566: 'og ma mthong rmongs la ston phyir mtshon //
NK055(ri)001:568: gzhi sems nyid ye nas ye shes lnga dang /
NK055(ri)001:569: ye shes nyi shu rtsa lnga yin pa'i don ma
NK055(ri)001:570: mthong zhing ma rig pa gnyis kyis non pa'i rmongs
NK055(ri)001:571: pa rnams la bstan pa'i phyir tshon gyi sgo nas
NK055(ri)001:572: bstan pas kyang mtshon zhes bya la/
NK055(ri)001:573: rang bzhin lhun grub 'og min na bzhugs pa'i mthar
NK055(ri)001:574: phyin pa'i sku dang ye shes ma mthong zhing rmongs
NK055(ri)001:575: pa'i gdul bya rnams la bstan pa'i phyir lhag pa
NK055(ri)001:576: rdul tshon gyi sgo nas mtshon pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:577: de'i phyir dkyil 'khor rgyas pa'i dbang du/
NK055(ri)001:578: kha dog gong du bstan pa ltar nyi shu rtsa lnga'am/
NK055(ri)001:579: 'bring po dang bsdus pa'i dbang du kha dog /lnga yi mtshon gyis bri bar bya //
NK055(ri)001:582: sems can ma lus thams cad la //
NK055(ri)001:583: ye shes lnga yis kun khyab kyang //
NK055(ri)001:584: rang gi rnam rtog sgrib byang nas //
NK055(ri)001:585: ye shes lnga yi don mthong phyir //
NK055(ri)001:586: de ltar rmongs pa thams cad la //
NK055(ri)001:587: ye shes mtshan nyid bstan pa'i phyir //
NK055(ri)001:588: dkar dang dmar dang ser ba dang //
NK055(ri)001:589: nag po la sogs bstan pa yin //
NK055(ri)001:591: 'dul ba'i cho ga bzhin du bri //
NK055(ri)001:592: zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor rgyas 'bring bsdus gsum slob ma gang la dad pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:593: slob dpon gang la mos pa gnyis las/
NK055(ri)001:594: 'dir slob bu'i don yin pas slob bu gang la dad pa bzhin bri ba ste/
NK055(ri)001:595: rgyas pa ni tshon sna nyi shu rtsa lnga/
NK055(ri)001:596: 'bring bsdus gnyis la tshon sna lnga'o //
NK055(ri)001:597: dkyil 'khor tshon gyis bri ba ni/
NK055(ri)001:598: lte ba rtsibs dang ldan pa yi //
NK055(ri)001:599: rtsibs bzhi 'khor lo mu khyud bcas //
NK055(ri)001:601: dkyil 'khor rgyas pa'i dbang du na/
NK055(ri)001:602: gzhi tshad med pa'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gsal ba zer bas/
NK055(ri)001:603: lte ba rtsibs bzhi mu khyud dang ldan pa'i rtsibs mchan zhig gi steng du/
NK055(ri)001:604: rtsibs bzhi 'khor lo mu khyud bcas //
NK055(ri)001:605: zhes pas dkyil 'khor rtsibs bzhi lte ba dang lnga'i
NK055(ri)001:606: steng du rtsibs bzhi dang bcas pa'i 'khor lo mu
NK055(ri)001:607: khyud dang bcas pa lnga ste/
NK055(ri)001:608: dbus su gcig rtsibs bzhi la bzhi'o //
NK055(ri)001:609: de la ni 'khor lo drug pa zhes kyang bya ste/
NK055(ri)001:611: zhabs kyi chen po dang drug go //
NK055(ri)001:613: lte ba rtsibs bzhi dang ldan pa'i 'khor lo mu khyud dang bcas pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:617: sgo bzhi'i sgo khyud rta babs dang bcas pa ni
NK055(ri)001:618: rgyas pa dang 'bring po gnyis kyi thun mong ngo
NK055(ri)001:619: // bsdus pa la ni lha snam med pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:620: sgo bzhi phyin chad ni gsum ka mthun no //
NK055(ri)001:622: 'og sku gsung thugs ldan gzugs kyang dgod //
NK055(ri)001:623: ces pa khru gang ba la sogs pa rgyas 'bring bsdus gsum gyi gzugs brnyan la/
NK055(ri)001:624: lha'i gnas su lha so so'i sku'i gzugs brnyan bris pa'am dgod pa ni sku'i dkyil 'khor ro //
NK055(ri)001:625: snying po h'u m+aum la sogs pa'am/
NK055(ri)001:626: ta tha la sogs pa dgod pa ni gsung gi dkyil 'khor ro //
NK055(ri)001:627: thugs mtshan rnams dgod pa ni thugs kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
NK055(ri)001:628: 'di la yang slob dpon pad+ma'i bzhed kyis/
NK055(ri)001:629: rigs lnga la sku gsung thugs gsum ka dgod/
NK055(ri)001:630: sems dpa' rnams la thugs dang gsung dgod/
NK055(ri)001:631: thub pa dang khro bo la gsung ngam thugs sam re re dgod/
NK055(ri)001:633: yi ge'am gdan nam snying po'am //
NK055(ri)001:634: la sogs pa dkyil 'khor khru gang ba la yi ge ta tha'am/
NK055(ri)001:636: snying po h'u m+aum tsam dgod/
NK055(ri)001:637: rgyas 'bring gnyis la rigs lnga la sku gsung thugs gsum ka ldan par dgod/
NK055(ri)001:639: sems dpa'i phyin chad dgod par 'byung /
NK055(ri)001:640: gnam rgyan sa rgyan rnams bkram pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:641: gong bcos bu'i ras ni sna tshogs dang //
NK055(ri)001:643: ras ni rgyu ste dar yang bsdu'o //
NK055(ri)001:644: bcos bu ni kha dog bcos pa dang dbyibs bcos pa gnyis/
NK055(ri)001:645: kha dog bcos pa ni dkar po dang sngon po
NK055(ri)001:646: la sogs pa sna tshogs pa khra bo dang ri
NK055(ri)001:649: de las bzor byas pa'i bla re dang /
NK055(ri)001:655: dar gyi lda ldi la sogs pa rnams kyis phyogs kun tu bskor bar bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:657: lha rnams kyi sku la 'bul ba'i rgyan snyan cha/
NK055(ri)001:662: do shal rnams kyis dkyil 'khor 'khor bar bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:664: rin po che las byas pa'i phreng ba kha dog lnga so so na gsal ba'i phreng ba/
NK055(ri)001:665: dkyil 'khor d+r+wa ba d+r+wa phyed kyis brgyan to/
NK055(ri)001:667: 'bras chad rgun chang bu ram chang /
NK055(ri)001:668: chab tsha legs pa la sogs pa/
NK055(ri)001:669: snod bzang po'i nang du blugs la dkyil 'khor bskor ro //
NK055(ri)001:671: bza' ba'i tshogs te sha dang mthud dang mar dang
NK055(ri)001:672: khur ba dang si te'u la sogs te g.yos kyi
NK055(ri)001:674: tshod ma'i bye brag rnams kyis bskor ro //
NK055(ri)001:676: gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na //
NK055(ri)001:677: dri dang me tog bdug spos dang //
NK055(ri)001:678: mar me brgya ni dbul bya zhing //
NK055(ri)001:679: rgyal mtshan lha bshos brgya brgya 'bul //
NK055(ri)001:680: zhes pas mar me la sogs pa brgya rtsa brgyad kyis bskor bar bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:682: 'og lus ngag sems dang chos thams cad //
NK055(ri)001:686: thugs kyi gzugs brnyan phyag mtshan dang /
NK055(ri)001:688: ngo bo gzhal yas khang yin la/
NK055(ri)001:689: des mtshon pa'i phyi nang gi chos thams cad sems
NK055(ri)001:690: nyid mnyam pa nyid las ma gtogs pa med pa'i
NK055(ri)001:691: phyir/ snod bcud yul sems gang du'ang mi gnas pa
NK055(ri)001:692: nyid yul dang yul can gyi 'dzin pa mi dmigs
NK055(ri)001:693: pa nyid chu'i gzugs brnyan ltar/
NK055(ri)001:694: snang ba ma 'gag pa tsam rnam pa thams cad du 'gog pa ma yin te/
NK055(ri)001:696: 'khrul pa'i ngo la mig gi thad ka na snang
NK055(ri)001:697: ba ci byung yang ngo bo la gtan ma grub
NK055(ri)001:698: pa bzhin/ phyi nang gi dkyil 'khor thams cad de lta bu'i tshul du bsgom pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:699: rtogs pa mngon du gyur pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:701: rtogs pa de lta bu dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas bsgom pa'i dus su/
NK055(ri)001:702: nam mkha' la ni nam mkha' bsgom //
NK055(ri)001:704: sems kyi chos nyid 'di lta bu'o zhes bya ba'i
NK055(ri)001:705: ngo bor dmigs su med pa btang snyoms chen po'i
NK055(ri)001:706: ngang la bsgom pa'i dus su/
NK055(ri)001:708: blo nam mkha' ltar dmigs bya dmigs byed med par re dogs phra ba'ang med de/
NK055(ri)001:709: cir yang mi dmigs par rang gsal bar 'dug go //
NK055(ri)001:710: de brtan pa'i phyir sh+au nya ta'i sngags kyang brjod do //
NK055(ri)001:711: de ni de bzhin nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi
NK055(ri)001:712: ngo bo yin kyang lhag pa rdul tshon gyi skabs
NK055(ri)001:713: 'dir/ rdul tshon dngos kyi lhag chad rnams dag par bya ba dang /
NK055(ri)001:715: des gzhi byas pa'i chos thams cad stong pa nyid du sbyangs te/
NK055(ri)001:716: gsang sngags kyi stong pa nyid ni mtha' thams cad
NK055(ri)001:717: kyis stong pa'i stong chen rig pa rang gsal gyi
NK055(ri)001:719: gang du yang ma grub pa nyid cir yang 'char ba'i bdag nyid pas/
NK055(ri)001:720: dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo thams cad snang ba'i rgyur nges so //
NK055(ri)001:721: de bas ting nge 'dzin de la nan tan du bya ba dang /
NK055(ri)001:722: sngags kyang bdun tsam brjod par bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:723: rol mo lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyis bskyed pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:724: 'og ting 'dzin rol mo mtha' yas mchog /ces pa/
NK055(ri)001:725: dang por rol mo dpe bshad de/
NK055(ri)001:726: dper na rol mkhan gyis rol mo sna tshogs ci
NK055(ri)001:727: byed kyang gzhi gcig tu nges pa med pa las
NK055(ri)001:728: yan lag gi 'gyur ba'i thabs kyis khrid nas bem
NK055(ri)001:729: rig gi chos sna tshogs kyi gzugs su snang ba
NK055(ri)001:730: la 'di mi btub bya ba med pa bzhin/
NK055(ri)001:731: gong du bshad pa'i stong pa chen po'i ting nge
NK055(ri)001:732: 'dzin sems nyid rang snang gi ye shes chen po
NK055(ri)001:734: snying rje chen po'i ting nge 'dzin ye shes skad
NK055(ri)001:735: cig mar gsal ba'i ngang las rig pas dbang bsgyur
NK055(ri)001:736: nas/ mtha' yas mchog ces pa/
NK055(ri)001:737: rgyu'i ting nge 'dzin nas dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa'i bar rnams cir yang rdzogs te/
NK055(ri)001:738: de yang dbang bsgyur ba'i ngo bo ni/
NK055(ri)001:739: stong pa chen po'i rnal 'byor cir yang snang ba'i
NK055(ri)001:740: rgyu las snying rje chen po'i rkyen gyis rgyu'i yi
NK055(ri)001:741: ge a dang h'u gang yin par snang nas de
NK055(ri)001:742: las bdag nyid las kyi lhar gsal ba'i thugs ka
NK055(ri)001:743: nas dwangs ma'i 'byung ba lnga'i ngo bo las e
NK055(ri)001:744: 'phros mdun du nam mkha' gru gsum pa/
NK055(ri)001:747: lam las gser gyi sa gzhi/
NK055(ri)001:748: sum las rat+na sna bzhi las grub pa'i ri rab/
NK055(ri)001:749: b+h+r+aum 'phros pa las gzhal yas khang rgyan gdan dang bcas pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:750: de yang dkyil 'khor rgyas 'bring bsdus gsum gang yin pa gdan dang bcas pa gzhung dang mthun par bsgom/
NK055(ri)001:751: yi ge'am gdan nam snying po'am //
NK055(ri)001:752: zhes pa'i yi ge ka kha bzhi bcu ste/
NK055(ri)001:753: sngar dkyil 'khor 'bring po la yang de dgod pa yin pas/
NK055(ri)001:757: phyis kyang lha bskyed pa'i sa bon h'u m+aum la sogs pa dgod/
NK055(ri)001:759: gdan tsaka li bkod pa yin pas dkyil 'khor rgyas 'bring gang la'ang 'gro ste sku'i dkyil 'khor ro //
NK055(ri)001:761: thugs kyi dkyil 'khor ste kun las 'gro ba yin pas/
NK055(ri)001:762: gang yin yang ting nge 'dzin gyi gnas skabs su gsung gi yi ger bkod/
NK055(ri)001:764: de las skur gsal bas der sku gsung thugs dang
NK055(ri)001:765: ldan pa'i lha rgyas bsdus 'bring gsum gyi grangs bzhin
NK055(ri)001:766: du gsal nas/ dbang bskur ba dang byin rlabs kyang bya ste/
NK055(ri)001:767: byin rlabs ya mtshan rmad po che //
NK055(ri)001:768: zhes byin rlabs ni rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i
NK055(ri)001:769: ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor spyan drangs nas bstim pa'o
NK055(ri)001:772: sems nyid gang du yang ma grub pa la ting nge 'dzin gyis ji ltar snang ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:773: rmad po che ni slob ma'i dgos pa thams cad rdzogs pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:774: 'grub 'gyur ni des mchog dang thun mong gi dngos
NK055(ri)001:775: grub thams cad ni grub pa'i rgyu yin pas 'grub
NK055(ri)001:776: 'gyur zhes bya'o // 'grub pa'i gtan tshigs ni/
NK055(ri)001:778: zhes pa khams gsum gyi chos thams cad rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor/
NK055(ri)001:779: de rtogs pa mngon du gyur pa rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor/
NK055(ri)001:780: de gnyis dbyer med pa lhag pa ting nge 'dzin
NK055(ri)001:781: gyi dkyil 'khor du byas pa dang gsum dbyer med
NK055(ri)001:782: par bya ba'i ngang la dngos grub rnam gnyis lhun
NK055(ri)001:783: gyis grub pa las mi 'da' bas dam zhes bya
NK055(ri)001:784: ste/ sangs rgyas kun gyi ngo bo nyid yin zhes pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:785: ting nge 'dzin gyis sbyangs shing bskyed pa'i yon tan 'thad pa dang bcas pa bstan pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:787: 'bras bu'am yon tan gzhan du tshol bar ma gyur tam zhe na/
NK055(ri)001:788: de dpes ma gyur par bstan pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:789: sa la sogs la phyag rgyar byas //
NK055(ri)001:791: sogs khongs su rin po che'ang bsdu ste/
NK055(ri)001:792: dper na sas phyag rgya bde bar gshegs pa'i sku byas na/
NK055(ri)001:793: de'i yon tan gyi 'bras bu lam gong nas gong du yon tan thob par 'gyur/
NK055(ri)001:794: ba so'am rgyu de bas bzang ba la byas na bsod nams de bas che/
NK055(ri)001:795: mkhar ba la blugs na 'bras bu de bas kyang mtho/
NK055(ri)001:796: dngul lta bu la byas na de bas kyang rnam grol mtho/
NK055(ri)001:797: rgyu gser las byas na de bas kyang 'bras bu rnam grol mtho ste/
NK055(ri)001:798: de rnams rgyu'i rim pas bsod nams che chung khyad yod kyang /
NK055(ri)001:800: brgyud pa'i rgyu yin pas rim pa zhes smos so //
NK055(ri)001:802: dag pa'i ye shes kyis sbyangs pa //
NK055(ri)001:803: zhes pa 'dir dag pa'i ye shes ni/
NK055(ri)001:804: stong pa chen po'i rnal 'byor mtha' thams cad dang bral ba ni/
NK055(ri)001:805: rol mo lta bu'i rnal 'byor gang du yang ma grub/
NK055(ri)001:806: cir yang snang ba kun tu snang gi ting nge
NK055(ri)001:807: 'dzin gnyis ni rig par mthas ma gos pa'i ye
NK055(ri)001:808: shes dang / rig pa rang snang mtha' dang bral
NK055(ri)001:809: ba'i ye shes gnyis kyis sbyangs nas dkyil 'khor gyi
NK055(ri)001:810: tshogs rnams su snang ba ni/
NK055(ri)001:811: dngos grub thob bam mi thob smos kyang ci dgos te/
NK055(ri)001:812: dkyil 'khor gsum lhun gyis grub pa rang rig par
NK055(ri)001:813: mngon du gsal ba de nyid kho na yin zhes
NK055(ri)001:814: bya'o // rab gnas kyi ngo bo ye shes pa bstim pa la/
NK055(ri)001:815: ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyi mtshan nyid ni/
NK055(ri)001:816: phyogs dus dkyil 'khor bdag nyid che //
NK055(ri)001:817: zhes pa phyogs bcu na bzhugs shing dus bzhir gshegs pa'i/
NK055(ri)001:820: rgyu'i theg pa'i gzugs sku gnyis gtso bo dang 'khor
NK055(ri)001:821: du bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad dbyer med pa'i
NK055(ri)001:823: snying po byang chub kyi sems rgyu rkyen dang bral
NK055(ri)001:824: bas rang byung gi ye shes 'khor 'das thams cad
NK055(ri)001:825: kyi bdag nyid che ba ni chos thams cad la
NK055(ri)001:826: khyab kyang dmigs yul dang bral zhing thams cad nyid
NK055(ri)001:828: de'i ngo bo nyid ni 'khor 'das kyi chos thams
NK055(ri)001:829: cad kyi bdag nyid du gyur kyang de dag gang
NK055(ri)001:830: gis kyang ma reg cing ma grub pa'i ngo bo
NK055(ri)001:831: yul yul can med pas mi dmigs zhes bya la/
NK055(ri)001:832: de nyid dus gsum du 'gyur ba med pas thugs
NK055(ri)001:833: stong pa chen po'i ye shes bzhi'i 'khor dang ldan
NK055(ri)001:836: dkyil 'khor thams cad spyan drang ngo //
NK055(ri)001:837: zhes pas gong gi ye shes lnga re re la yang bzhi bzhi 'phro bas/
NK055(ri)001:838: ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa las de gsal
NK055(ri)001:839: bar mi 'gag pa'i sku bsam gyis mi khyab par
NK055(ri)001:840: shar bas dkyil 'khor bsam gyis mi khyab ste/
NK055(ri)001:841: des na chos kyi dbyings kyi khyab tshad kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad spyan drang la bstim pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:842: dam tshig pa la bstim pa 'bras bu dang bcas pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:843: rang snang dbyer med dkyil 'khor la //
NK055(ri)001:845: yong gis na ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor bsgom
NK055(ri)001:846: pa yang rnal 'byor pa'i rig pa rang snang ba
NK055(ri)001:847: yin/ de yang min pa zhig la yin par nan gyis btags pa min te/
NK055(ri)001:848: tha mal pa'i gzung 'dzin gyi snang ba la phung po khams dang skye mched du snang yang /
NK055(ri)001:849: rgya mtsho chen po la gzugs brnyan gyi tshogs snang
NK055(ri)001:850: ba phar ngos tshur ngos thams cad chur snang ba
NK055(ri)001:851: bzhin/ snod bcud bem rig thams cad rang snang bas
NK055(ri)001:852: rtog pa sems nyid las ma g.yos par sems nyid
NK055(ri)001:853: bzhin/ snang / de rnal 'byor pas lhar bsgom pa'i
NK055(ri)001:854: dus su rtog pa sku dang ye shes su snang
NK055(ri)001:855: ba rnal 'byor pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi ngang la
NK055(ri)001:856: lha'i dkyil 'khor snang stong dbyer med ting nge 'dzin
NK055(ri)001:857: gyi ngo bo la lhun gyis grub/
NK055(ri)001:858: ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor spyan drang pa yang /
NK055(ri)001:859: spyan drang tshad pa yang sems snang /
NK055(ri)001:860: spyan drang ba yang sems snang /
NK055(ri)001:862: bstims pa yang sems snang bas/
NK055(ri)001:863: thams cad sems nyid kyi ngang du gsal ba la yul shes kyi dmigs pa dang bral ba'i dbang gis/
NK055(ri)001:864: gong du spyan drangs shing bstims pa de yang gud na med de/
NK055(ri)001:865: sems snang ba'i phung po khams skye mched rtog pa
NK055(ri)001:866: rnams rig pa rang snang ba'i sku dang ye shes
NK055(ri)001:867: su dbyer med pa'i dkyil 'khor de la/
NK055(ri)001:868: ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor phyag rgya bzhi yis dam tshig pa la bstims nas/
NK055(ri)001:869: ye shes dam tshig rang snang gnyis su med par gyur pa de la/
NK055(ri)001:870: 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid mnyam sbyor ba'i //
NK055(ri)001:871: zhes pa rkyen 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid ni lam pas
NK055(ri)001:872: nyams su blang ba'i ngo bo yin pas lta ba
NK055(ri)001:873: dang ting nge 'dzin dbyer med par nyams su lon
NK055(ri)001:874: par bsgom pa ni mnyam sbyor ba zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:875: de la dkyil 'khor thams cad rdzogs pa'i phyir/
NK055(ri)001:876: phyogs bcu dus bzhi kun nas gshegs pa ni 'bras bu mngon du byas pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad/
NK055(ri)001:877: bsnyen pa ni gong gi 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid nyams
NK055(ri)001:878: su len pa'i rnal 'byor pa de 'bras bu la
NK055(ri)001:879: bsnyen pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam gsum dbyer med pa rab
NK055(ri)001:880: tu rdzogs/ des 'bras bur snang ba la ni nye
NK055(ri)001:881: bar gyur pa'i de las mi 'da' ba dam tshig
NK055(ri)001:882: tu rdzogs/ mchog ste/ ci 'dod pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:883: ye shes pa bstims nas phyi nang gi p+au dza bya ba ni/
NK055(ri)001:884: gong glu tshig bro gar rol mo yi //
NK055(ri)001:886: de yang mchod pa 'bul ba'i rim pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:887: dang po phyi'i mchod pa bya ste/
NK055(ri)001:888: mchod pa rnam lnga tshigs bcad dang sngags dang ldan
NK055(ri)001:889: par bya ba yang zla gsang thig le nas 'byung
NK055(ri)001:893: rgyan gyi bye brag rnams dang /
NK055(ri)001:894: khrus kyi bye brag rnams kyang 'bul ba yang tshigs bcad dang /
NK055(ri)001:896: smon lam dang bcas par slob dpon bud+d+ha gsang ba'i mngon rtogs bzhin bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:897: nang gi dam rdzas rnams 'bul ba dang /
NK055(ri)001:898: bro gar bcu drug glu tshigs su ra to bcu drug gis 'bul ba dang /
NK055(ri)001:899: rol mo'i cha byad rnams 'bul ba dang /
NK055(ri)001:902: rgyas 'debs rmongs byed za ba mo tshe 'phel mo bzhi'i mchod pa 'bul ba dang /
NK055(ri)001:906: r+n+airti bzhi tshigs bcad sngags dang ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pas 'bul ba dang /
NK055(ri)001:911: +aa lo ke bzhi tshigs bcad dang sngags dang ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pas 'bul lo //
NK055(ri)001:912: ji ltar 'dod pa'i las bzhin mchod //
NK055(ri)001:913: ces pa bsgrub bya'i dngos po zhi rgyas dbang drag
NK055(ri)001:914: bzhi gang 'dod kyang de'i bsam pas 'bul ba dang
NK055(ri)001:915: / slob ma smin par 'dod kyang de'i bsam pas 'bul/
NK055(ri)001:916: rang don yang gang 'dod kyang de dang de'i bsam pas 'bul ba ni/
NK055(ri)001:917: chos thams cad rig pa rang snang zhing rig pa la dbang bsgyur ba'i don no //
NK055(ri)001:918: lhag pa ting nge 'dzin gyi mchod pa'i mdor bstan pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:919: 'og mchod pa'i phyag rgya chen po ni //
NK055(ri)001:921: p+au dza ni spyir na gang dang gang gis yul
NK055(ri)001:922: gang yin pa de mnyes par 'gyur pa la ni
NK055(ri)001:923: mchod pa'i mchog ces bya ste/
NK055(ri)001:924: 'dir ni 'dod pa'i yon tan rnam pa lnga theg
NK055(ri)001:925: pa 'og ma gsang sngags phyi pa man chad kyi
NK055(ri)001:927: 'dir lta ba dang ting nge 'dzin gnyis su 'dzom nas rig pa la rig pa thim/
NK055(ri)001:928: rig pa mnyes pa'i dgongs pa dang ldan pas mig
NK055(ri)001:929: gi yul gzugs mthong bya mthong byed gzung 'dzin ngang
NK055(ri)001:930: gis dag ste/ byang chub sems su lhun gyis grub
NK055(ri)001:931: pa mnyes bya mnyes byed med par mnyam pa nyid
NK055(ri)001:933: 'du shes thams cad dang bral bas mnyes pa'i mchog go //
NK055(ri)001:935: de lta bu'i ngang las mi 'da' ba phyag rgya/
NK055(ri)001:936: de'i rgyas thebs pas kyang phyag rgya ste theg pa 'di nyid kyi yin pas chen po'o //
NK055(ri)001:937: sems kyi yid bzhin sprin tshogs kyis //
NK055(ri)001:938: zhes pa sems rig pa rang gsal yid bzhin gyi
NK055(ri)001:939: nor bu dang 'dra bas cir yang mi 'gag par
NK055(ri)001:940: snang ba nyid mchod pa'i tshogs su snang ste/
NK055(ri)001:942: mang ba dang 'khrigs pa dang rgyun mi chad pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:943: mchod pa'i tshogs 'og nas 'byung ba rnams kyang nam mkha' la sprin bzhin du 'khrigs/
NK055(ri)001:944: bar snang la char bzhin du bab/
NK055(ri)001:945: sa gzhi la rtsi shing bzhin du skyes pas thams cad du 'khrigs pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:947: phyogs bcu thams cad sangs rgyas zhing //
NK055(ri)001:949: rang gi thugs ka nas b+h+r+aum spros pas phyogs bcu
NK055(ri)001:950: thams cad du khyab pas 'jig rten thams cad sangs
NK055(ri)001:951: rgyas kyi zhing khams rnam par dag pa bde ba
NK055(ri)001:952: can dang pad+mo can lta bur brlab ste/
NK055(ri)001:954: mnan na nem pa btegs na 'phar ba'i 'bol ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:955: 'jam pa ni zug rngu med pa ste gang reg pa thams cad bde ba 'phel ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:956: de lta bu'i gzhi la rin po che kha dog
NK055(ri)001:957: sna tshogs pa dkar po dang ser po la sogs
NK055(ri)001:958: pa kha dog rnams legs shing mdzes pa ne'u legs
NK055(ri)001:959: pa lta bu'i sa gzhi 'jam po la/
NK055(ri)001:960: mdzes par bris shing zhes pa/
NK055(ri)001:961: gzhi'i kha dog dang thig le kha dog mi gcig pa spe'u legs pas bris pa lta bu ste/
NK055(ri)001:962: bri gzhi dang thig gnyis gcig gis gcig la ya
NK055(ri)001:963: 'byin pas shin tu legs pa la yang spras zhes
NK055(ri)001:964: bya la/ yang na thig mdo rnams su rin po
NK055(ri)001:965: che las byung ba'i me tog kha dog sna tshogs
NK055(ri)001:966: pas bris shing spras pa lta bur snang ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:967: de lta bu'i mtshan nya da dang ldan pa dkyil 'khor la 'bul lo //
NK055(ri)001:968: de ni mchod pa rnams kyi gzhi lta bu'ang yin no //
NK055(ri)001:969: yang thugs ka nas t+r+aam 'phros 'jig rten gyi dkyil
NK055(ri)001:970: 'khor lo ka dang phung po thams cad la phog
NK055(ri)001:971: pas/ kun 'byung rin chen phung po 'bar //
NK055(ri)001:972: zhes pa 'dod yon lnga la sogs pa dgos pa
NK055(ri)001:973: skong ba'i yon tan gyi chos thams cad 'byung ba'i
NK055(ri)001:974: rin po che sna tshogs phung po 'od 'bar ba
NK055(ri)001:976: rang gi thugs ka nas bam spros 'jig rten gyi
NK055(ri)001:977: chu thams cad la phog pas dbyibs legs pa ni
NK055(ri)001:978: zlum po dang gru bzhi dang zla gam ste/
NK055(ri)001:980: de'i rdzing bu che chung gi bye brag go //
NK055(ri)001:981: ngos rin po che kha dog mi gcig pas bskyor/
NK055(ri)001:982: 'og gzhi kha dog mi gcig pa la byas/
NK055(ri)001:983: gser gyi bye ma bdal ba/
NK055(ri)001:984: dri dang ro gnyis gzhan las mchog tu dpags pa/
NK055(ri)001:985: reg na shes rgyud tshim par byed pa la ni/
NK055(ri)001:987: de lta bu dkyil 'khor la 'bul lo //
NK055(ri)001:988: rin chen khang pa sna tshogs dang //
NK055(ri)001:990: rang gi thugs ka nas b+h+r+aum spros 'jig rten khams
NK055(ri)001:991: kyi khang pa rnams la phog /des rin po che
NK055(ri)001:992: sna tshogs las grub pa'i khang pa/
NK055(ri)001:994: che ba dang chung ba sna tshogs pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:995: phyi nas bltas na nang gsal/
NK055(ri)001:996: nang nas bltas na phyi gsal ba/
NK055(ri)001:997: thogs pa med pa rgyan sna tshog sa 'phyang ba
NK055(ri)001:998: ste rin po che'i d+r+wa ba d+r+wa phyed la sogs
NK055(ri)001:1000: rgyan dang dpag bsam ljon pa'i tshal //
NK055(ri)001:1001: zhes pa rang gi thugs ka nas t+r+aam spros pas
NK055(ri)001:1002: 'jig rten gyi khams kyi shing thams cad la phog
NK055(ri)001:1003: pas rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyan dang /
NK055(ri)001:1004: rin po che sna tshogs las grub pa'i dpag bsam gyi shing ste rtsa ba dang /
NK055(ri)001:1007: 'bras bu rnams rin po che kha dog mi gcig pas spel legs par byas pa/
NK055(ri)001:1008: dgos 'dod thams cad bsam pa tsam gyis yod par 'bul lo //
NK055(ri)001:1009: gzhan yang rin po che kha dog sna tshogs las
NK055(ri)001:1010: grub pa ljon pa'i tshal kha dog dang dbyibs legs
NK055(ri)001:1011: pa blta na sdug par byin gyis brlab la 'bul
NK055(ri)001:1012: lo // glu dbyangs tshigs su bcad pa'i sgra //
NK055(ri)001:1013: zhes pa 'jig rten gyi khams na bem rig gi
NK055(ri)001:1014: sgra ci yod pa thams cad la thugs ka nas
NK055(ri)001:1016: skye ba med pa'i tshig dang /
NK055(ri)001:1018: bstod pa'i tshigs brjod pa'i ngag gi glu dang /
NK055(ri)001:1019: gre 'gyur gyi dbyangs su sgra thams cad byin gyis brlab la 'bul lo //
NK055(ri)001:1020: bla re rgyal mtshan na bza' gdugs //
NK055(ri)001:1021: zhes pa thugs ka nas b+h+r+aum spros te 'jig rten
NK055(ri)001:1022: gyi khams thams cad du khyab pas nyi zla dang
NK055(ri)001:1023: skar ma dang sprin dang smig pa la sogs pa
NK055(ri)001:1024: thams cad/ dar dang ras dang rin po che dang stag las grub pa'i bla re sna tshogs dang /
NK055(ri)001:1026: na bza' kha dog mi gcig pa sna tshogs dang /
NK055(ri)001:1030: do shal dpung rgyan se mo do //
NK055(ri)001:1031: zhes thugs ka nas h+r+aih'aphrosa 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyan dang bza' btung thams cad la phog pas/
NK055(ri)001:1032: rin po che'i do shal dang /
NK055(ri)001:1038: zhabs gdub rnams su brlab la 'bul lo //
NK055(ri)001:1039: bza' dang btung ba'i tshogs rnams dang //
NK055(ri)001:1040: zhes pas thugs ka nas 'phros 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du khyab/
NK055(ri)001:1041: de las byung ba'i bza' ba'i bye brag sna tshogs pa rnams dang /
NK055(ri)001:1042: btung ba'i bye brag sna tshogs rnams lha dang mi
NK055(ri)001:1043: las khyad par du 'phags pas mchod de de dag
NK055(ri)001:1044: 'bul lo // rang la mdzes par brgyan pa yi //
NK055(ri)001:1045: lha dang lha mo rdul snyed kyi //
NK055(ri)001:1046: zhes pa thugs ka nas h+aum spros te thams cad
NK055(ri)001:1047: du khyab pa las byung ba'i lha dang lha'i bu
NK055(ri)001:1048: dang bu mo rnams kyis rgyan sna tshogs thogs/
NK055(ri)001:1049: na bza' sna tshogs kyis brgyan nas/
NK055(ri)001:1050: bro gar sna tshogs bsam yas kyis //
NK055(ri)001:1051: zhes pa rkang pas bro brdung /
NK055(ri)001:1053: zhal nas glu len pa bsam yas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang sa gzhi thams cad bkangs nas/
NK055(ri)001:1056: sngar ye shes pa bstim pa'i dus su smon pa
NK055(ri)001:1057: bzhin du phyogs bcu'i bud+d+ha ma lus pa thams cad
NK055(ri)001:1058: 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di nyid yin pas mchod pa
NK055(ri)001:1060: des na sangs rgyas gang mchod kyang dkyil 'khor 'di nyid mnyes/
NK055(ri)001:1061: 'di nyid mchod pas bud+d+ha thams cad mnyes par 'gyur ro //
NK055(ri)001:1062: 'bul tshul gyi gdams pa brjod pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:1063: skal ldan gsal ba'i khyad par gyis //
NK055(ri)001:1064: zhes pa skal ldan ni rten gyi gang zag rdo rje slob dpon no //
NK055(ri)001:1065: gsal ba ni ting nge 'dzin te/
NK055(ri)001:1066: mchod pa 'bul ba la ting nge 'dzin gsal na
NK055(ri)001:1067: gnas su thengs pa'i rgyu mtshan gyis gcig tu gsal
NK055(ri)001:1068: na p+au dza rnams cig car du 'bul/
NK055(ri)001:1069: gcig car du mi gsal na rim gyis phul/
NK055(ri)001:1070: de ni rten gang zag gi ting nge 'dzin mtho dman gyis phye'o //
NK055(ri)001:1071: chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam sbyor zhing //
NK055(ri)001:1073: rdo rje slob dpon lta bsgom gyi dgongs pa bzang na ched du chos kyi dbyings dang sbyar mi dgos/
NK055(ri)001:1074: cig car du 'bul ba'i dus su rig pa mnyam
NK055(ri)001:1075: pa nyid kyi ngang du gsal bas 'bul bya dbul
NK055(ri)001:1076: byed ngo bo la ma grub pas chos kyi dbyings
NK055(ri)001:1077: su sbyor ba lhun gyis grub pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:1078: de mchan rim gyis gsal ba'i rnal 'byor ba ni
NK055(ri)001:1079: mchod pa'i tshogs rnams sems nyid kyi ngang du gsal
NK055(ri)001:1080: bas lta bsgom gyi res mos phra mo tsam yod
NK055(ri)001:1081: pa'o // de mchan gyis ting nge 'dzin yang blo'i
NK055(ri)001:1082: snyam blo phra ba dang bcas pas chos kyi dbyings
NK055(ri)001:1083: dang sbyar ba'ang blos byas mos 'jog go //
NK055(ri)001:1084: mchod pa'i phyag rgya chen por bsgom //
NK055(ri)001:1085: zhes pa phyogs bcu thams cad mchod pa'i ngo bo
NK055(ri)001:1086: nyid las mi 'da' ba de'i rgyas thebs pa'i phyir
NK055(ri)001:1087: phyag rgya ste/ gong du bshad pa ltar rgya che
NK055(ri)001:1088: ba dang chos kyi dbyings dang sbyor ba gnyis kyis
NK055(ri)001:1089: phyag rgya ste/ chen po ste/ 'og ma las dpags pas so //
NK055(ri)001:1090: de ltar bsgom par bya'o zhes gdams pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:1091: gsang mchod 'bul tshul phan yon dang bcas pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:1092: gsal ldan ma'am byin rlabs la //
NK055(ri)001:1094: yum gyi mtshan nyid ni gsal ldan zhes pa/
NK055(ri)001:1095: lta ba rtogs ting nge 'dzin shes pa yod pa ste gsal mi dgos pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:1097: byin rlabs zhes pas dngos su gtso bos yum du bsgom/
NK055(ri)001:1098: gsang yum lnga dang khro bo bzhir brlab/
NK055(ri)001:1100: brlabsa la zhes pa gzhi'i don no //
NK055(ri)001:1101: stong gsum yungs 'brur gzhug tshul du //
NK055(ri)001:1102: zhes pa byang chub sems dpa' mthu bo ches stong gsum yungs 'brur chud par byas par/
NK055(ri)001:1103: stong gsum ma 'grib yungs 'bru ma 'phel bar de nyid gsal ba ltar/
NK055(ri)001:1104: sna rtse yungs 'bru tsam gyi gzhal yas su //
NK055(ri)001:1105: rgyas bsdus kyi lha tshang bar bkod pas gzhal yas ma 'phel/
NK055(ri)001:1106: lha ma bsdus par de nyid du gsal ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:1107: dbyings nas dkyil 'khor spyan drangs mchod //
NK055(ri)001:1108: ces pa rang rig pa mnyam pa'i dbyings nas rang
NK055(ri)001:1109: bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor spyan drangs te
NK055(ri)001:1110: yungs 'bru'i lha rnams la bstims nas/
NK055(ri)001:1111: thabs dang shes rab rol pa'i byang chub sems bde
NK055(ri)001:1112: ba chen po ci ltar myong ba nyid lha thams
NK055(ri)001:1113: cad kyis myong nas mnyes te/
NK055(ri)001:1114: bsgrub pa'i dam tshig ces pa/
NK055(ri)001:1115: gsang ba'i mchod pa ni 'bras bu dngos su snang bas na bsgrub pa/
NK055(ri)001:1116: de las mi 'da' bas na dam tshig mchog ces bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:1117: mchod sbyin gyi nges tshig ni/
NK055(ri)001:1118: bdag nyid chen po mchod pa yis //
NK055(ri)001:1120: bdag nyid chen po ni phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i rgyal ba thams cad bzhi bcu rtsa lngar 'dus la/
NK055(ri)001:1121: de yang rig ma mnyam pa nyid du lhun gyis
NK055(ri)001:1122: grub pa la bdag gzhan mi mnga' ba'i bdag nyid
NK055(ri)001:1123: chen po ni de tsam du'ang 'dzin pa med pa'o
NK055(ri)001:1124: // mchod pa ni rnal 'byor pas mchod pa'i ngo bo myong ba nyid/
NK055(ri)001:1125: yungs 'bru'i dkyil 'khor lha thams cad mnyes pa'i p+au dzas sangs rgyas thams cad dbyer med pas/
NK055(ri)001:1126: gcig mchod na kun mnyes pa'i bdag nyid kyis phyogs
NK055(ri)001:1127: bcu'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo ma lus pa thams
NK055(ri)001:1128: cad mnyes par 'gyur te mchod pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:1129: 'o na sbyin pa ji lta bu zhe na/
NK055(ri)001:1130: srid gsum 'gro ba thams cad la //
NK055(ri)001:1131: dga' ba chen pos khyab par 'gyur //
NK055(ri)001:1132: zhes pa rnal 'byor pa'i rtogs pa mnyes pas/
NK055(ri)001:1133: srid pa gsum gyi 'gro ba rnams la rtogs pas ma khyab pa med/
NK055(ri)001:1134: des na 'gro ba thams cad kyi rtog pa lhan
NK055(ri)001:1135: cig skyes pa'i ye shes kyi dga' ba chen pos
NK055(ri)001:1136: khyab par gyur te sbyin pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:1138: sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba brtan pa yis //
NK055(ri)001:1140: sgyu ma ni snang bzhin ma grub pa la sogs te/
NK055(ri)001:1141: rtog tshogs thams cad snang yang sems nyid du ma skyes pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:1142: 'phrul pa ni med bzhin du snang ba ste sems
NK055(ri)001:1143: nyid skye ba med pa'i ngang la rtog pa bzhi
NK055(ri)001:1145: d+r+wa ba ni dbyer med pa ste snang stong dbyer
NK055(ri)001:1146: med pa mnyam pa nyid phyogs 'dzin dang bral ba
NK055(ri)001:1147: rig pa gdengs su chud nas 'du shes kyi gzung
NK055(ri)001:1148: ba mi mnga' ba ni lta ba brtan pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:1149: de ltar rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas don dam pa'i
NK055(ri)001:1150: shes rab kyi rtags su yum rnams gsal ba ni
NK055(ri)001:1151: sgyu ma'o // thabs sam kun rdzob kyi bdag nyid yab rnams gsal ba ni 'phrul pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:1152: d+r+wa ba ni theg pa 'di nyid kyi lha rnams zhal sbyor du bsgom pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:1153: brtan pa ni dkyil 'khor rgyas 'bring bsdus gsum gyi ting nge 'dzin mngon du gyur pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:1154: de lta bu'i rnal 'byor pas gsang mchod kyi ting nge 'dzin la goms te/
NK055(ri)001:1155: tha mal pa'i rnam rtog gis ma bslad pa'i mchod pa nyams su lon pa'i 'bras bu ni/
NK055(ri)001:1156: phyogs bcu na bzhugs shing dus bzhir rang don dang
NK055(ri)001:1157: gzhan don rnam ganya sa la gshegs pa'i spangs mkhyen
NK055(ri)001:1158: lhun gyis grub pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor ma
NK055(ri)001:1159: lus pa thams cad kyi zhal mthong ba dang gsung
NK055(ri)001:1160: thos pa dang / phyag brkyang ba dang lung ston par 'gyur ro //
NK055(ri)001:1161: der ma zad khams gsum gyi 'gro ba thams cad
NK055(ri)001:1162: kyi dus dang gnas skabs dang sems kyi rnam grangs
NK055(ri)001:1163: thams cad mngon du gyur pa thob bo //
NK055(ri)001:1165: mchod pa'i ngo bo rig pa byang chub kyi sems
NK055(ri)001:1166: 'khor 'das thams cad kyi bdag nyid gsal ba mngon
NK055(ri)001:1167: du gyur nas/ mngon shes dang mkhyen pa thams cad
NK055(ri)001:1168: dngos kyi rgyu yin pas mdzad pa'i phrin las bsam
NK055(ri)001:1169: gyis mi khyab par shar ro //
NK055(ri)001:1170: rab tu gnas pa'i dus su sbyin sreg bya ba ni/
NK055(ri)001:1171: gong dbyibs dang kha dog mtshan ldan par //
NK055(ri)001:1172: zhes pa la sogs pas sbyin sreg byed pa'i thab khung ste/
NK055(ri)001:1173: bshad rgyud sgyu 'phrul rgyas pa las/
NK055(ri)001:1174: phrin las bzhi las hom khung brgyad bstan te/
NK055(ri)001:1175: de yang 'dir rgyas pa'i las kyi dus yin pas rgyas pa'i dbyibs kha dog mtshan ma rnams brjod de/
NK055(ri)001:1176: dbyibs gru bzhi ste ngos re la khru re yod pa/
NK055(ri)001:1177: zabs su khru phyed brkos pa/
NK055(ri)001:1178: kha khyer sor bzhi phyir bkyed/
NK055(ri)001:1179: sor bzhi yar brtsig /kha khyer gyi zheng la sor bzhi/
NK055(ri)001:1181: rgyab tu zheng sor bzhi pa zhig bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:1182: yang na rin po che zur brgyad lta bu ste gru bzhi la/
NK055(ri)001:1183: logs bzhir zur bzhi btod pa ste zabs dang kha khyer rnams sngar dang 'dra'o //
NK055(ri)001:1184: kha dog ni phyi nang thams cad ser po kho na'o //
NK055(ri)001:1185: thabs mtshan ni dbus su rin po che bri/
NK055(ri)001:1186: kha khyer nang ma la rin po'i sgrom/
NK055(ri)001:1187: bar pa kha khyer dngos la rdo rje'i phreng ba/
NK055(ri)001:1188: phyi mtha' la zhags pa'i phreng ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:1189: der shing ser po khru gang brtsig /mchod pa rnam lnga cha gsum/
NK055(ri)001:1190: bsreg rdzas rnams tshogs par byas te/
NK055(ri)001:1191: me spar la me nang du yi ge ram las me lha kha dog ser po bskyed/
NK055(ri)001:1192: ra skyes bcibs pa zhal gcig phyag gnyis/
NK055(ri)001:1193: g.yas na rin po che'i sgrom thogs/
NK055(ri)001:1194: g.yon pas gun+d+he dang phreng ba bsnams pa ral pa nag po'i thor tshugs can bskyed/
NK055(ri)001:1195: thab dngos gzhal yas khang du bsgom pa'i nang du bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:1196: me lha'i sku gsung thugs brlab/
NK055(ri)001:1197: tshigs shar dang sngags phyag rgyas shar lho mtshams nas spyan drangs la bstims/
NK055(ri)001:1198: khrus byas dbang bskur rin chen 'byung ldan gyis dbur brgyan ljags la yi ge ram bsgom/
NK055(ri)001:1199: de nas mchod pa rnam lnga 'bul/
NK055(ri)001:1200: bsreg rdzas rnams rim pa bzhin du 'bul/
NK055(ri)001:1203: bsang chab kyis bsang skabs su byed pa rnams shes par bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:1204: de nas me lha'i lto ba gzhal yas khang du
NK055(ri)001:1205: bsgom pa'i nang du lha rnams rgyas pa'i cha lugs
NK055(ri)001:1206: su bskyed/ rin chen 'byung ldan gyis gtso bor byed/
NK055(ri)001:1208: sngags kyis ye shes pa spyan drang la bstim/
NK055(ri)001:1210: de nas bsreg rdzas 'bul ba ni/
NK055(ri)001:1211: ba dmar ser la sogs pa'i mar/
NK055(ri)001:1216: lha so so'i sngags kyi rting pa la che ge mo push+tam ku ru btags/
NK055(ri)001:1218: 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba btab/
NK055(ri)001:1219: me nang gi ye shes dam tshig bcas pa rang gi thugs kar bsdu/
NK055(ri)001:1220: de nas me lha gsal gdab/
NK055(ri)001:1221: lhag chad kha bskangs kyi mchod pa rnams 'bul/
NK055(ri)001:1223: tshar nas me lha'i ye shes pa rang bzhin gyi gnas su gshegs/
NK055(ri)001:1224: de rnams ni lag tu len pa'i rim pa bsdus pa yin te/
NK055(ri)001:1225: zhal du gyur pa'i me bos la //
NK055(ri)001:1227: sngon lha dang lha ma yin 'thab pa'i dus su lha pham lha ma yin rgyal bas/
NK055(ri)001:1228: lha ma yin gyi khrag thig pa re re la'ang
NK055(ri)001:1229: rta bra nag can re re tsho red nas lha
NK055(ri)001:1230: pham nas rnam par rgyal ba'i khang bzang na 'dug
NK055(ri)001:1231: pa'i dus su/ lha rnams kyis bgros byas mngon shes
NK055(ri)001:1232: kyis gzigs nas ri rab kyi byang shar mtshams na
NK055(ri)001:1233: ma h+aa de wa 'dod chags zad pa'i ting nge
NK055(ri)001:1234: 'dzin la zhugs pa de dka' bzlog thub na lha
NK055(ri)001:1235: ma yin gyi dmag pham par dag gzigs nas lha
NK055(ri)001:1236: rnams kyi mdangs las sprul pa'i lha mo lan tsha
NK055(ri)001:1237: ma bya ba phyungs nas ma h+aa de wa'i dka'
NK055(ri)001:1238: pa'i dus su/ bzlog song ba la/ ma h+aa de
NK055(ri)001:1239: wa la 'dod chags zad pa'i rting pa sna'i rtse
NK055(ri)001:1240: mo na yungs kar gyi 'bru gu tsam zhig la/
NK055(ri)001:1241: de dang tshul mthun par g.yog mo zhig gi sna la zangs kyi 'dzer bu zhig btabs nas song /
NK055(ri)001:1242: ma h+aa de was de mthong bas kho bdag gi
NK055(ri)001:1243: sna 'dod chags kyi lhag ma yod pa gnyis 'dzom
NK055(ri)001:1244: pas 'dzum gcig shor bas glags rnyed/
NK055(ri)001:1245: der lha mo lan tsha ma dang ma h+aa de wa gnyis nyal po byas pas ye bye ma thub/
NK055(ri)001:1246: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyis 'dod chags kyis chog pa'i chos bshad kyang ma bye/
NK055(ri)001:1247: der me lhas khri rkang la me bkyes nas e
NK055(ri)001:1248: bye ba bltas tsa lha mo khros pas mo bdag
NK055(ri)001:1249: gi rkang bar nas sa bon khyor gang blangs pa
NK055(ri)001:1250: me lha'i khar brgyabs/ me lha'i khong du song bas me lha pho rmun red/
NK055(ri)001:1251: der bcom ldan 'das kyis lha thams cad kyi zhal
NK055(ri)001:1252: 'byung po thams cad kyi khar byin gyis brlabsa pas
NK055(ri)001:1253: sbyin sreg gzhal yas khang du gyur pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:1254: bos pa ni ye shes pa spyan drang pa ste
NK055(ri)001:1255: de'i sngon du dam tshig pa bskyed pa'i bshad pa
NK055(ri)001:1256: rnams bya'o // bza' btung bro ba'i tshogs rnams kyis //
NK055(ri)001:1258: bsreg rdzas te dri zhim ro zhim pa reg na dga' ba bskyed pa'i zhal zas rnams so //
NK055(ri)001:1259: las bzhi'i mchod pa rab tu sbyin //
NK055(ri)001:1261: zhi ba'i las la sogs pa bzhi'i sgo nas/
NK055(ri)001:1262: mchod par rab tu sbyin ni/
NK055(ri)001:1263: phrin las bzhi'i sbyin sreg byed pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:1264: de yang sa chog gi dus la zhi ba'i sbyin sreg byed/
NK055(ri)001:1265: sta gon dus rmi lam ngan na drag po'i sbyin sreg byed/
NK055(ri)001:1266: dkyil 'khor rab gnas rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg byed pa gong du smos pa de nyid do //
NK055(ri)001:1267: dbang bskur ba'i dus su dngos grub dbang du bya ba'i phyir dbang gi sbyin sreg bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:1268: des na dbang bskur ba gcig la sbyin sreg bzhi ka 'gro ste/
NK055(ri)001:1269: sbyin sreg bzhi ka'i mngon par rtogs pa ni sbyin sreg gi cho ga dngos su shes par bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:1270: khro bo dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bstan pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:1271: khro bo'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin te/
NK055(ri)001:1273: zhi ba'i skabs su bstan pa'i sa'i cho ga dang /
NK055(ri)001:1275: go ma ye btang ba la sogs pa mgo sgre mthun/
NK055(ri)001:1276: dkyil 'khor rgyas bsdus kyang khro bo la'ang gsum yod pas mthun/
NK055(ri)001:1277: sta gon kyang lha thams cad khro bor bsgom pa min pas mthun/
NK055(ri)001:1278: khro bo na thig skud ba su ta la byed/
NK055(ri)001:1279: tshon rnams dur khrod las byung ba'i tshon la byed de/
NK055(ri)001:1280: sgyu 'phrul rgyas pa na gsal lo //
NK055(ri)001:1281: sbyin sreg kyang 'di bzhin du bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:1282: shin tu phra la sbyangs pa yis //
NK055(ri)001:1284: khro bo na'ang gong du bstan pa bzhin phra mo'i ting nge 'dzin la sbyangs par bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:1285: bsam yas dag la'ang de bzhin bya //
NK055(ri)001:1286: zhes pa zhi khro gang yin pa'i dpag tshad dang
NK055(ri)001:1287: rgyang grags la sogs pa'i gnas skabs su yang sbyin
NK055(ri)001:1288: sreg bshad pa bzhin du bya'o zhe'o //
NK055(ri)001:1289: rig pas dpag pa tsam du'o //
NK055(ri)001:1291: lhag pa ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor dpag tshad dang rgyang grags la sogs pa'i tshad bstan kyang /
NK055(ri)001:1292: de bas che yang rung chung yang rung ste/
NK055(ri)001:1293: mdor na rnal 'byor pa'i rig pas ji tsam dpags pa des tshod bzung ste/
NK055(ri)001:1294: ting nge 'dzin gsal ba kho na gtsor che/
NK055(ri)001:1296: de ni zhar byung lta bu'ang yin no //
NK055(ri)001:1297: slob dpon slob ma 'jug pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:1298: 'og kun byas dbang phyug rig pas 'jug /zhes pa
NK055(ri)001:1299: 'dir slob ma la dbang bskur zhing byin rlabs nod
NK055(ri)001:1300: pas/ de rgyu rkyen phun sum tshogs par bya ba'i phyir/
NK055(ri)001:1301: rab tu gnas par byas pa'i dkyil 'khor byin rlabs can du/
NK055(ri)001:1302: rdo rje slob dpon 'jug pa yang //
NK055(ri)001:1305: rab tu gnas pa'i mjug nas sbyin sreg bya ba la sogs pa'i las thams cad rdzogs nas/
NK055(ri)001:1306: dbang phyug ces pa rdo rje slob dpon te/
NK055(ri)001:1307: dbang mang po thob nas phyug pa'am dbang bzhi thob nas rdzogs par phyug pa'am/
NK055(ri)001:1308: yang na theg pa 'di'i lugs kyi dbang phyug ni/
NK055(ri)001:1309: dbang thob lta ba rtogs ting nge 'dzin goms/
NK055(ri)001:1310: 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad rig par gsal bas/
NK055(ri)001:1311: lha yang sku dang ye shes gsal ba dus mtshungs
NK055(ri)001:1312: pa ste 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad la dbang
NK055(ri)001:1313: thob cing dngos grub zad pa med pa'i bdag nyid
NK055(ri)001:1314: du bzhugs pa ni phyug pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:1315: slob dpon rgyas pa'i gos lnga dang ldan pas dkyil 'khor gyi shar phyogs su bzhugs so //
NK055(ri)001:1316: le'u bdun par gsungs pa'i tshig gis gsol ba gdab/
NK055(ri)001:1317: h'u badz+ra sa ma ya la sogs pa'i sngags lnga brjod/
NK055(ri)001:1318: dkyil 'khor la me tog 'thor nas rang nyid gtso bo'i thugs kar bstims nas/
NK055(ri)001:1319: gtso bo dang dbyer med par bsgom pa ni rig pas 'jug pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:1320: yang na shar nas sngags gnyis brjod/
NK055(ri)001:1321: lho nas gcig /nub nas gcig /byang nas gcig brjod
NK055(ri)001:1322: pa'i lan bzhir zhugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gong dang
NK055(ri)001:1323: mthun/ de nas slob ma gzhug par bya //
NK055(ri)001:1325: slob dpon zhugs pa'i rjes thog de nas slob ma gzhug pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:1328: de nas las kyi slob dpon gyis nang du khrid la/
NK055(ri)001:1329: dkyil 'khor gyi 'gram du khrid la bgegs bskrad/
NK055(ri)001:1330: de nas ci la dga' ba'i dri ba bya/
NK055(ri)001:1331: bla ma dang sangs rgyas la lus 'bul/
NK055(ri)001:1334: lha bsgoms pa'i nan cag bya/
NK055(ri)001:1336: me tog gang la phog pa'i lha bstim/
NK055(ri)001:1339: lhag pa'i lha ngo bstan par bya/
NK055(ri)001:1340: zhugs pa'i yon tan dngos ni/
NK055(ri)001:1341: 'og bde ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor la //
NK055(ri)001:1342: zhes pa la sogs te rigs lnga thams cad dang
NK055(ri)001:1343: shes rab 'brel ba ni bde ba chen po'i dkyil
NK055(ri)001:1344: 'khor zhes bya ste/ 'dod khams pa 'dod yon lnga'i bde ba dang /
NK055(ri)001:1345: gzugs khams gzugs med ting nge 'dzin gyi bde ba dang /
NK055(ri)001:1346: nyan thos dang rang rgyal ba dag zhi ba phyogs gcig pa'i bde ba dang /
NK055(ri)001:1347: byang chub sems dpa' dag sa dang po nas bcu
NK055(ri)001:1348: pa'i bar gyi bde ba rnams snang stong dbyer med
NK055(ri)001:1349: par rang rig pa'i ngang du rdzogs te/
NK055(ri)001:1350: de'i ngang las 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad ma 'gag par snang ba ni 'khor ba'i bde ba/
NK055(ri)001:1351: ngo bo byang chub sems su rdzogs te snang stong
NK055(ri)001:1352: gi mtha' dang bral ba ni mya ngan las 'das
NK055(ri)001:1353: pa'i bde ba/ de gnyis dbyer med pa phyogs 'dzin
NK055(ri)001:1354: dang bral ba ni kun tu bzang po min pa
NK055(ri)001:1355: gang gi'ang spyod yul ma yin pas na chen po
NK055(ri)001:1356: pa'i bde ba/ ste/ de'i ngo bo nyid ni rang
NK055(ri)001:1357: byung gi ye shes la ye shes lnga'i 'khor gyis
NK055(ri)001:1359: de nyid rang snang ba mi 'gag pa'i sku rigs
NK055(ri)001:1360: lngar snang ba la ni dgongs pa gong du bstan
NK055(ri)001:1361: pa de nyid rdzogs pa la bde ba chen po
NK055(ri)001:1362: zhes bya'o // stangs dpyal gnyis sam yang na lnga //
NK055(ri)001:1364: de dag lhag pa gzugs brnyan gyi skabs su dkyil
NK055(ri)001:1365: 'khor bsdus pa la rigs lnga gang rung zhig gis
NK055(ri)001:1366: gtso bor byed pa'i yab yum gnyis ni/
NK055(ri)001:1367: stangs dpyal ni yab yum ste de la 'khor bcu drug gis bskor ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:1369: rgyas pa dang 'bring po gnyis la rigs lnga yab yum bcu bcus gtso bor byed pa 'dra'o //
NK055(ri)001:1372: zhes pa bri ba nas sbyin sreg gi bar ro //
NK055(ri)001:1373: dad ldan rab zhugs ni slob ma ste/
NK055(ri)001:1374: dad pa ni kun gyi sngon du 'gro bas dang por smos kyi/
NK055(ri)001:1375: shes rab dang brtson 'grus dang 'byor pa dang gtong
NK055(ri)001:1376: ba dang brtul zhugs dang mos gus chen po dang
NK055(ri)001:1378: rab zhugs ni 'jug pa'i thabs su rgyas par bshad pa bzhin no //
NK055(ri)001:1379: na ni de ltar nyams su blangs pa'i tshe skabs na'o //
NK055(ri)001:1380: 'dod pa ni yid la dmigs pa'i byin rlabs dang dngos grub rnams so //
NK055(ri)001:1381: yid 'ong ni yon tan thams cad phun sum tshogs pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:1382: mnyam par 'gyur ni 'og min du sa bcu pa
NK055(ri)001:1383: rnams kun tu bzang po'i spyan sngar bzhugs pa dang
NK055(ri)001:1384: mnyam zhes bya ste/ lung gzhan las/
NK055(ri)001:1385: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i //
NK055(ri)001:1386: dkyil 'khor mngon du mthong ba yi //
NK055(ri)001:1387: bsod nams thob pa gang yin pa //
NK055(ri)001:1388: phyis byas pa'ang de bzhin no //
NK055(ri)001:1390: phogs pa'i lha bsgom par nan tan bya ba ni/
NK055(ri)001:1391: skal ba mnyam pa'i ye shes te //
NK055(ri)001:1392: zhes pa skal pa mnyam pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:1393: ngo bo nyid kyis mnyam pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:1394: sbyangs pas mnyam pa gnyis te/
NK055(ri)001:1395: ngo bos mnyam pa ni 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad sems nyid rang snang ba yin pa'i phyir/
NK055(ri)001:1396: rnal 'byor pa bdag gi lus ngag yid gsum rang
NK055(ri)001:1397: bzhin sku gsung thugs rdo rjer lhun grub gyis grub
NK055(ri)001:1398: pa dang / yi dam gyi lha rang bzhin mngon
NK055(ri)001:1399: du gyur pa'i sku gsung thugs rdo rjer lhun gyis
NK055(ri)001:1400: grub pa la ni khyad med de dbyer med pa
NK055(ri)001:1403: rnal 'byor bas thog ma nas sbyangs bsags yun ring
NK055(ri)001:1404: ba'i stobs kyis yi dam gyi lha dang 'brel nas
NK055(ri)001:1405: mngon du gyur pa ni sbyangs pa'i 'bras bu yin
NK055(ri)001:1407: ye shes ni rang byung gi ye shes rang snang
NK055(ri)001:1408: ba'i yi dam lha rigs lnga gang yin pa de
NK055(ri)001:1409: nyid do // de ltar mnyam pa'i gtan tshigs kyis
NK055(ri)001:1410: gzung 'dzin phra rags rnams kyis rang gi ngo bo
NK055(ri)001:1411: nyid do // bsgrib pa de/ gnyer na nye bar 'byung ba yi //
NK055(ri)001:1414: nye bar 'byung ba'i rgyu ni ting nge 'dzin la
NK055(ri)001:1415: nan tan dang brtson 'grus byas na myur du 'grub
NK055(ri)001:1416: ste/ ya mtshan chen po ni khams gsum sku dang
NK055(ri)001:1417: ye shes su gsal ba 'bras bu mthar phyin pa'o
NK055(ri)001:1418: ste/ // 'byung bar nges ni rig 'dzin mtho dman rnams dang /
NK055(ri)001:1419: thun mong gi dngos grub rnams the tshom mi za ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:1420: de bas na dam tshig tu yang thams cad kyi rtsa ba yi dam gyi lha yin pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:1421: rdo rje slob dpon yin pa gnyis kyi phyir/
NK055(ri)001:1422: bla med mi spang bla ma bkur //
NK055(ri)001:1424: dad med nyams na phung bar 'gyur //
NK055(ri)001:1425: zhes pa dad pa med pa ni skyon thams cad kyi rtsa ba yin par smos so //
NK055(ri)001:1426: nyams pa ni rtsa ba dang yan lag thams cad
NK055(ri)001:1427: de yi dam gyi lha dang bla ma gnyis so
NK055(ri)001:1429: yi dam ni sgrub pa'i dam tshig yin pa la bsgrub pa dus las 'gyangs pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:1430: bla ma bsrung ba'i dam tshig yin pas lus ngag yid kyis mnyes par bya ba las nyams pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:1431: dam tshig nyams na sa gzhi med pa'i lo tog dang 'dra bar/
NK055(ri)001:1432: dge ba dang bsod nams ci byas kyang 'bras bu
NK055(ri)001:1433: med cing ngan song gsum du phung bar 'gyur ro
NK055(ri)001:1434: // dbang gi sngon du 'gro ba rigs lnga dang sbyar ba'i yon 'bul ba ni/
NK055(ri)001:1435: gong de nas rigs kyi bu mchog des //
NK055(ri)001:1437: dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa'i yon tan dang /
NK055(ri)001:1438: lha bsgom pa'i gu na bshad pa de nas/
NK055(ri)001:1439: rigs kyi bu ni gdung 'tshob nges pas na bu ste/
NK055(ri)001:1440: sangs rgyas la sbyor ba ni the tshom med pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:1441: de ni byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang yod pas 'dir ni mchog ces bya ste/
NK055(ri)001:1442: tshe gcig gis sangs rgyas la sbyor ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:1443: de yang slob ma des dad pa dang mos gus rgya chen po dang ldan pas/
NK055(ri)001:1444: sgo gsum nas g.yo sgyu med pa 'jig rten gyi
NK055(ri)001:1445: bya byed kyis ma gos pa 'bras bu kho na
NK055(ri)001:1448: rgyal srid dang ni rang gi lus //
NK055(ri)001:1450: me tog phog pa'i lha de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs yin na/
NK055(ri)001:1451: r+aa dza yin na r+aa dza'i srid 'bul/
NK055(ri)001:1452: rgyal po min yang rgyal srid dang 'dra bas 'khor bcas 'bul/
NK055(ri)001:1453: lha rdo rje'i rigs yin na rang lus 'bul/
NK055(ri)001:1454: lus phul nas ri ba'i rin gyis kyang 'bul bar bshad do //
NK055(ri)001:1455: pad+ma'i rigs yin na bu dang chung ma 'bul/
NK055(ri)001:1456: rin po che'i rigs yin na rin po che'i rigs 'bul te/
NK055(ri)001:1457: rin po che bsgrubs nas 'bul ba'am/
NK055(ri)001:1458: yang na nor rigs 'gang che ba 'bul/
NK055(ri)001:1460: rab tu gces dang zhes pa/
NK055(ri)001:1461: rang gi yid la gang gces pa de 'bul/
NK055(ri)001:1462: bdag po'i rigs kun tu bzang po yab yum la me tog phog na/
NK055(ri)001:1464: bla ma'i yid la gang 'thad pa 'bul lo //
NK055(ri)001:1465: yon 'bul ba'i yon tan bstan pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:1466: dbang phyug longs spyod lngas mchod na //
NK055(ri)001:1469: slob mas dngos grub ci 'dod pa thams cad la mnga' brnyes shing dbang bsgyur ba'o //
