NK055(ri)001:1470: longs spyod lnga ni 'dod yon lnga ste yo byad gong du smos pa rnams so //
NK055(ri)001:1471: mchod pa ni 'bul ba gang byas kyang bla ma mnyes par 'gyur ba ste/
NK055(ri)001:1472: mi mnyes pa ni spang bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:1473: dkyil 'khor thams cad mchod pa yin //
NK055(ri)001:1475: bla ma'i thugs phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i dkyil 'khor thams cad dang dbyer med pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:1476: lus sku dang ye shes bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis su gsal ba dang /
NK055(ri)001:1477: ngag gi brjod pa'ang ye shes chen po'i don kho na brjod pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:1478: des na bla ma mnyes pas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas ma lus pa mnyes so //
NK055(ri)001:1479: yang don dang ldan pa'i bla ma la bsnyen bkur byas pas sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:1481: don dang ldan pa'i dam pa la //
NK055(ri)001:1482: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kun 'dus te //
NK055(ri)001:1483: nyin dang mtshan mo lan gsum du //
NK055(ri)001:1484: basngagasa dang 'dun pas phyag mdzad do //
NK055(ri)001:1485: ci phyir phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams //
NK055(ri)001:1486: slob dpon dag las brten nas byung //
NK055(ri)001:1487: slob dpon dag la ma brten pa'i //
NK055(ri)001:1490: nye ba'i dkyil 'khor smos ci dgos //
NK055(ri)001:1491: zhes pa nye ba'i dkyil 'khor ni yi dam gyi lha'o //
NK055(ri)001:1492: de rdo rje slob dpon las byung bas mnyes zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:1493: slob dpon bra man sh+aan+tim gar+b+hasa ni/
NK055(ri)001:1496: nyes pa thams cad dag par 'gyur //
NK055(ri)001:1498: 'jig rten pa'i nyes pa nyan thos rang rgyal byang chub sems dpa'i nyes sdig thams cad byang la/
NK055(ri)001:1499: gsang sngags phyi nang gi nyams pa dang nyes pa
NK055(ri)001:1500: thams cad kyang lhag ma ma lus par dag par
NK055(ri)001:1501: 'gyur zhes bya ste/ yon tan shin tu che bas yon 'bul ba la ser sna mi bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:1502: gsang dbang gi dkyil 'khor bri gzhi chung ba'i tshad ni/
NK055(ri)001:1503: gong shin tu phra ba'i dam tshig mchog /ces pa la sogs te/
NK055(ri)001:1504: dkyil 'khor rgyas bsdus rnams kyi chung ba yin pas kyang shin tu phra ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:1505: des gsang dbang gi rgyu rkyen rten 'brel rnams 'dzom pa las mi 'da' bas na dam tshig go //
NK055(ri)001:1506: phyag mthil ni rdo rje slob dpon mnyam bzhag mdzad pa'i phyag go //
NK055(ri)001:1507: der dkyil 'khor bri tshar zin te bzhugs pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:1508: thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa de //
NK055(ri)001:1509: zhes pa slob dpon gyi thugs gnyis su med pa'i
NK055(ri)001:1510: ye shes yab yum gnyis su med pa'i byang chub
NK055(ri)001:1511: kyi sems dga' ba bcu drug gi 'khor dang bcas
NK055(ri)001:1513: der rdo rje slob dpon gyis myong ba de nyid
NK055(ri)001:1514: slob ma'i spyod yul du ma gyur pas gsang ba'am
NK055(ri)001:1516: slob ma la dbang bskur ba don dam rtog med
NK055(ri)001:1517: kyi ye shes mngon du byas pa la yang dam
NK055(ri)001:1518: pa zhes bya'o // che chung gi tshad ni/
NK055(ri)001:1519: sor ni bzhi yi tshad du bya //
NK055(ri)001:1521: rgyu dang bya thabs rnams gong du bstan zin to //
NK055(ri)001:1522: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rgyas pa'i tshad ni/
NK055(ri)001:1523: 'og phyag rgya chen po'i pang du ni //
NK055(ri)001:1524: zhes bya ba la sogs te/
NK055(ri)001:1525: rdo rje slob dpon sku phyag rgya chen por bzhugs pa'i pang phyag mthil ni dkyil 'khor bzhugs pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:1527: dkyil 'khor mdzub gang tshad du yang //
NK055(ri)001:1528: zhes pa lhag pa gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor gzhi che chung mdzub gang ba ste/
NK055(ri)001:1529: sor brgyad pa dang mtshungs so //
NK055(ri)001:1530: mkhas pas cho ga ji bzhin bya //
NK055(ri)001:1532: mkhas pa ni rdo rje slob dpon no //
NK055(ri)001:1533: cho ga ni go ma ye dang bri ba rnams so //
NK055(ri)001:1534: ji bzhin pa ni sor bzhi'i dkyil 'khor gyi skabs su bstan pa bzhin du bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:1536: lte ba rtsibs dang ldan pa yi //
NK055(ri)001:1537: zhes pa dkyil 'khor 'bring po'i bri thabs rnams la rtags dgod pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:1538: sen zlum tsam gyi nyi zla la //
NK055(ri)001:1540: sen mo sngon po zlum pa tsam gyi nyi zla'am/
NK055(ri)001:1541: tsa na'i 'bru tsam gyi pad+ma'i gdan/
NK055(ri)001:1543: til 'bru tsam gyi phyag rgya dgod pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:1545: 'og dad brtson brtul zhugs rab rtogs na //
NK055(ri)001:1547: dad pa che ba ste tshe 'di la bsgrub pa
NK055(ri)001:1548: tshogs kyis nyams su len par ni cung mi nus
NK055(ri)001:1549: pa ste/ theg pa 'di nyid dang bla ma la
NK055(ri)001:1550: ma bu gcig pa la sems pa bzhin du mi
NK055(ri)001:1551: brjed pa'i dad pa dang ldan/
NK055(ri)001:1552: yo byad ci gtong ba'ang ser sna med pas dad pa mi 'gyur ba dang ldan na/
NK055(ri)001:1555: phan pa ni tshe 'di la phan pa ni zag bcas kyi nyes pa thams cad dag pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:1556: des bar chad thams cad zhi ba dang mi ma yin pa thams cad kyis bkur ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:1557: phyi ma la phan pa ni ngan song gi 'jigs pa dang bral ba dang /
NK055(ri)001:1558: bde 'gro lha mi'i go 'phang thob pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:1560: rgyud nyan pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa/
NK055(ri)001:1563: nyan pa min pa 'jig rten gyi bya ba dor ba/
NK055(ri)001:1564: de dag dang ldan na nyan pa'i dbang bskur/
NK055(ri)001:1565: de'i thog tu bsgrub pa'i brtson 'grus ni/
NK055(ri)001:1566: yi dam gyi bsgom bzlas la rab chu bo rgyun gyi rnal 'byor/
NK055(ri)001:1567: 'bring thun drug /tha ma thun bzhi'i rnal 'byor nus
NK055(ri)001:1568: na bsgrub pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pas de'i dbang
NK055(ri)001:1569: bskur/ de'i thog tu bdag gzhan gyi don du phrin
NK055(ri)001:1570: las bzhi gang byed pa'i dkyil 'khor dang cho ga'i
NK055(ri)001:1571: 'grigs dang ngag gi bzlas pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:1572: ting nge 'dzin gsal na phrin las la thogs pa med par nus pa'i dbang bskur/
NK055(ri)001:1573: de'i thog tu 'chad nus pa ste gzhan gyi don rnams la mkhas/
NK055(ri)001:1574: rgyud lung man ngag gsum gyis lta spyod bsgom gsum so sor phyed/
NK055(ri)001:1575: slob ma'i blo shes rab kha phye nus na 'chad pa'i dbang bskur/
NK055(ri)001:1579: lag len gyi don gyis gzhan gyi shes pa 'dren
NK055(ri)001:1580: pa dang mos gus kyis rgyud byin gyis rlob nus
NK055(ri)001:1581: na/ dkyil 'khor gyi las nus pa rdo rje rgyal po'i dbang sbyin no //
NK055(ri)001:1582: de ni nus pa'i dbang lnga'o //
NK055(ri)001:1586: de yang spyod pa'i brtul zhugs ni lta bsgom gyi don gyis sems gnad chud na dmigs 'dzin dag ste/
NK055(ri)001:1587: dam rdzas lnga spyod pa la spong len gyi sems phra ba'ang mi 'byung na/
NK055(ri)001:1588: rim pa bzhin du sbyin par bya //
NK055(ri)001:1589: zhes pas gsang ba'i dbang sbyin no //
NK055(ri)001:1590: rig pa'i brtul zhugs ni lta bsgom stobs su gyur
NK055(ri)001:1591: pas thabs shes rab gnyis su med pa'i bde stong
NK055(ri)001:1592: gis 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad kyi de kho
NK055(ri)001:1593: na nyid mngon du rig nus na/
NK055(ri)001:1594: bde ba chen po'i dbang sbyin par bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:1596: 'khor 'das dbyer med mnyam pa nyid kyi dgongs pa
NK055(ri)001:1597: la phyogs 'dzin phra ba'ang med na de nyid mngon
NK055(ri)001:1598: du gyur cing dbang thob pa'i phyir/
NK055(ri)001:1599: shin tu brtan pa'i dbang sbyin no //
NK055(ri)001:1600: snying rjes chud ma zos par gzung //
NK055(ri)001:1601: zhes pa rdo rje slob dpon gyis slob ma brtse
NK055(ri)001:1602: ba dang don du 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir dang
NK055(ri)001:1603: / slob ma la phan par bya ba'i phyir dbang bskur gyi/
NK055(ri)001:1604: 'og ma'i sa tshod la mthon po'i dbang bskur na/
NK055(ri)001:1605: bong bu la glang po che'i khal bkal ba ltar
NK055(ri)001:1606: mi khyog ste slar nyes par 'gyur bas slob ma'i
NK055(ri)001:1607: blo tshod kyi mtho dman bzung ste rim pa bzhin
NK055(ri)001:1609: tshogs bsgrub pa la gsum gyi sgrub pa po bsgrub pa'i yan lag dang bcas pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:1610: 'og cho ga lnga ni rdzogs byas shing //
NK055(ri)001:1612: 'di na mar lnga gsum bco lnga pa gnyis las/
NK055(ri)001:1613: 'dir las dang po pa'i cho ga lnga gsum bco
NK055(ri)001:1614: lnga brtsi na g.yo sgyu med pa'i dad pa dang
NK055(ri)001:1615: ldan pa dang / bla ma gus nas mnyes pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:1616: dam tshig mnos nas ma nyams pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:1617: dkyil 'khor du bzhugs nas sngags kyi mtshan nyid shes pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:1618: dbang thob nas lung mnos te bsgom bsgrub la brtson pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:1619: yo byad lnga ni rdzogs par ldan //
NK055(ri)001:1621: gnas gzhung dang mthun pa yid du 'ong ba dang /
NK055(ri)001:1622: sgrub pa'i grogs 'khor gyi rnam grangs rnams tshang ba dang /
NK055(ri)001:1623: thabs shes rab la mi 'bral ba'i gzungs ma dang /
NK055(ri)001:1624: rdo rje la sogs pa'i sngags cha smos pa rnams dang /
NK055(ri)001:1625: mchod pa dang 'tsho ba'i yo byad du ldan pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:1626: gzungs ma ni grogs kyi nang du brtsi bas lnga'o //
NK055(ri)001:1627: sngags kyi yan lag lnga rdzogs pas //
NK055(ri)001:1629: de bzhin nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dbyings dang /
NK055(ri)001:1630: de'i gzugs brnyan nyi zla pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor dang /
NK055(ri)001:1633: de las lha'i sku phyag rgya yum dang bcas pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:1634: yang na bzlas pa la brtsi ste/
NK055(ri)001:1635: thugs kar nyi ma zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang /
NK055(ri)001:1636: de'i steng du thugs phyag mtshan dang /
NK055(ri)001:1637: de las sa bon dang ldan pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:1638: de las chos kyi phyag rgya bzlas pa'i sngags kyis bskor ba dang /
NK055(ri)001:1639: de las yig 'bru 'phros pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'od
NK055(ri)001:1640: zer spro bsdu'i ting nge 'dzin gnyis gcig tu brtsi
NK055(ri)001:1641: bas lnga'o // tshogs bsgrub pa la nye ba'i bco lnga ni/
NK055(ri)001:1642: cho ga lnga ni rdzogs byas shing //
NK055(ri)001:1644: stong pa chen po'i rnal 'byor bsgom pa'i dus su shes rab kyi spyod pa zhes bya ste/
NK055(ri)001:1645: gang mthong ci byed thams cad stong pa nyid du bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:1646: snying rje'i rnal 'byor gyi dus su khams gsum sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po bskyed de/
NK055(ri)001:1647: tshad med pa bzhi la gnas par bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:1648: de nas yig 'bru la sems sbyang ba'i dus su
NK055(ri)001:1649: chos thams cad snang stong dbyer med du brlab bo
NK055(ri)001:1650: // de nas phyag mtshan la sems sbyangs pa'i dus
NK055(ri)001:1651: su chos thams cad thugs rig pa'i ngo bor brlab
NK055(ri)001:1652: // bo // de nas lha'i sku rgyan gcig pa
NK055(ri)001:1653: la slob cing sbyang ba'i dus su snang ba thams
NK055(ri)001:1654: cad rdo rje sems dpa'i sku kho nar byin gyis
NK055(ri)001:1655: // bo // brlab bo // de dag 'byongs pa la ni rdzogs zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:1656: sngags kyi yan lag ces pa/
NK055(ri)001:1657: sngags ni man+t+ra zhes bya ste/
NK055(ri)001:1659: tra tra ya ni skyob pa/
NK055(ri)001:1660: yid skyob par byed pa'i don gyis sngags te/
NK055(ri)001:1661: de'i don ni byin rlabs kyis don gyis 'khor ba'am
NK055(ri)001:1662: nyon mongs pa las skyob pa'i phyir sngags zhes bya
NK055(ri)001:1663: ste/ de nyid ni lha'i dkyil 'khor snang ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:1664: de la 'dir don gyis lus kyi yan lag mgo
NK055(ri)001:1665: dang bzhi po la lha'i sku phyag rgya lnga bcu
NK055(ri)001:1666: tham pa phyag rgya'i le'u stod du smos pa bzhin
NK055(ri)001:1667: du bkod pa ste/ dbu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs yab yum bcu/
NK055(ri)001:1668: lag pa g.yas pa la rdo rje'i rigs yab yum bcu/
NK055(ri)001:1669: g.yon pa la rin chen rigs yab yum bcu/
NK055(ri)001:1670: rkang pa g.yas pa la las kyi rigs yab yum bcu/
NK055(ri)001:1671: rkang pa g.yon pa la pad+ma'i rigs kyi yab yum
NK055(ri)001:1672: bcu ste lnga bcu'i dkyil 'khor bsgom pa ni gong
NK055(ri)001:1673: du yan lag ces pas gsal lo //
NK055(ri)001:1674: rtog pa'i yan lag phung po la sogs pa rtog
NK055(ri)001:1675: pa bzhi bcu zhe gnyis lha bzhi bcu zhe gnyis
NK055(ri)001:1676: su snang ba rnam par 'byed pa thabs kyi lha
NK055(ri)001:1677: dang / de la shes rab kyi lha ye shes sems dpa' bzhi bcu dang /
NK055(ri)001:1678: sku gsung thugs kyi lha bzhi bcu po tsho gsum dang /
NK055(ri)001:1679: de rnams brtsis pa'i lha brgya la rigs lnga lnga rdzogs pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:1680: yan lag gi lha sangs rgyas nyi khri bzhi stong la goms nas bsgrub pa la 'jug ste/
NK055(ri)001:1681: 'khor khang ru gsum pa byas pa'i nang du dkyil
NK055(ri)001:1682: 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i 'bur du byas pa la lha
NK055(ri)001:1683: gnas rnams su stan nang tshangs can gyi steng du
NK055(ri)001:1684: rnal 'byor pa yab yum rnams bzhugs/
NK055(ri)001:1685: skor khang bar ma mchod pa byed pa'i rol mo pa'i 'grim/
NK055(ri)001:1686: phyi mtha' tshang mang sa dang yo byad kyi bzhag sa bya ste/
NK055(ri)001:1687: yo byad lnga ni rdzogs par ldan //
NK055(ri)001:1688: zhes pa bza' ba dang bca' ba btung ba rnams gcig /gos rgyan dang gnyis/
NK055(ri)001:1689: bro gar glu tshigs dang gsum/
NK055(ri)001:1690: rol mo'i cha byad rnams dang bzhi/
NK055(ri)001:1691: +aa li'i ga na dang lnga ma tshogs pa med par ldan zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:1692: des tshogs bsgrub par bya'o zhes smos so //
NK055(ri)001:1693: ma nyams 'jug la rab brtson pas //
NK055(ri)001:1694: zhes pas ma nyams pa ni cho ga lnga rdzogs/
NK055(ri)001:1696: sngags kyi yan lag lnga mthar phyin pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:1697: yang na lta ba dang dam tshig gnyis tshad du
NK055(ri)001:1698: skyol ba dang phra ba'i phra ba'ang ma nyams pa'o
NK055(ri)001:1699: // 'jug pa ni lam nyams su blangs pa'i ngo bo ste/
NK055(ri)001:1700: tshogs kyi spyod pa'i ngo bo rnams nyams su blang ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:1701: brtson 'grus ni tha mal gyi shes pa skad cig
NK055(ri)001:1702: kyang mi rgyu bar bco lnga pa'i lta spyod 'dzom
NK055(ri)001:1703: pa la rgyun chad med pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:1704: pas zhes pa byed pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:1705: des myur bar 'bras bu la 'jug go //
NK055(ri)001:1707: zhag ni sum cu phrag drug gam //
NK055(ri)001:1709: zhag sum cu phrag drug ni zla ba drug ste/
NK055(ri)001:1710: sngon gyi sbyangs bsags stobs che ba dus de nyid shes rab dang /
NK055(ri)001:1712: sbyangs bsags mchog tu gyur pa dbang po rab kyi
NK055(ri)001:1713: rten gyi gang zag gis zla ba drug gis tshe
NK055(ri)001:1714: dbang la sbyor/ rab 'og bcu gnyis zhes pa/
NK055(ri)001:1715: dbang po rab 'og gis zla ba bcu gnyis kyis sbyor/
NK055(ri)001:1716: de bas cung dman pas kyang zla ba bcu bzhis sbyor/
NK055(ri)001:1717: dbang po nang gi dman pa zla ba bcu drug gis sbyor te/
NK055(ri)001:1718: sbyor ba'i 'bras bu ci lta bu zhe na/
NK055(ri)001:1720: tshe la dbang bsgyur ba ste skye shi dang bral/
NK055(ri)001:1722: rigs kyi dam pa 'grub ces pas/
NK055(ri)001:1723: bsgrub pa byas pa'i 'bras bu gnyis te/
NK055(ri)001:1724: rnam par smin pa'i rig 'dzin dang /
NK055(ri)001:1725: tshe la dbang ba'i rig 'dzin no //
NK055(ri)001:1726: rnam par smin pa'i rig 'dzin ni/
NK055(ri)001:1727: rnam smin gyi lus bzhag nas rig pa phyag rgya chen po'i rig 'dzin la sbyor ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:1728: tshe la dbang ba'i rig 'dzin ni/
NK055(ri)001:1731: spyod pa gsum bsgrub pa'i ring la dbyer med nas 'dod yon lnga chos nyid du rol te/
NK055(ri)001:1732: de la 'byongs nas gzung 'dzin rang dag ste ched 'dzin phra ba'ang med pas/
NK055(ri)001:1733: dper na nam mkha' la bya 'phur ba lam la
NK055(ri)001:1734: 'dzin pa med pa bzhin mdzad spyod thams cad chos
NK055(ri)001:1735: nyid du shar bas dmigs 'dzin dag ste/
NK055(ri)001:1736: mnyam pa nyid kyi dgongs pa lhun gyis grub pa rnam smin gyi lus lha'i lus su gsal/
NK055(ri)001:1737: lha'i lus rig 'dzin gyi skur gsal nas skye 'chi dang bral te 'byung bzhi'i gnod pa bral/
NK055(ri)001:1739: khams gsum gyi 'jigs pa dang bral nas chos nyid bden pa'i don mthong /
NK055(ri)001:1740: gzhan ngo la ni snga ma'i rten der snang /
NK055(ri)001:1741: rang ngo la ni lha'i dkyil 'khor du snang bas na/
NK055(ri)001:1742: rig 'dzin dam pa ni tshe dbang gi rig 'dzin yin pas de 'grub bo //
NK055(ri)001:1743: des bud+d+ha la sbyor tshul ni/
NK055(ri)001:1744: de tshe bcu drug tshun chad kyis //
NK055(ri)001:1747: rig 'dzin dngos la tshe lo brtsi rgyu med de/
NK055(ri)001:1748: ston pa bcom ldan 'das zhal bzhugs tsa na skye
NK055(ri)001:1749: rgu tshe lo brgya pa yin pas de'i tshod bzung
NK055(ri)001:1750: ba ste/ bcu dang drug pa ni brgya tsho drug yin te/
NK055(ri)001:1752: de'ang blo dman gyi 'grub pa'i yun ring tshad brtsi ba yin pas/
NK055(ri)001:1753: shes rab dang brtson 'grus che chung gi dbang gis brgya phrag gcig na 'bras bu la sbyor ba'ang yod/
NK055(ri)001:1754: nya sa brgya na sbyor ba'ang yod/
NK055(ri)001:1755: de'i rim pa'i bye brag gis brgya phrag bcu drug gi ring tshad yin te/
NK055(ri)001:1756: phyin chad du mi 'gyangs zhes so //
NK055(ri)001:1757: de yang rgyas pa'i rgyud las/
NK055(ri)001:1758: tshe ni bcu dang drug pa yi //
NK055(ri)001:1759: brgya brgya dag tu bsnur zhing gnas //
NK055(ri)001:1760: lus ma bor bar sangs rgyas pa //
NK055(ri)001:1762: sku lnga lhun gyis grub pa ni //
NK055(ri)001:1765: chos sku dang longs sku dang sprul sku dang rdo
NK055(ri)001:1766: rje'i sku dang mngon par byang chub pa'i sku dang
NK055(ri)001:1767: lnga ste/ gong du rgyas par bshad do //
NK055(ri)001:1770: ngo bo nyid kyi sku mngon du gyur pas sku lnga'i rig pa'i ngang la lhun grub tu gsal te/
NK055(ri)001:1771: 'bras bu mthar phyin pa'i don ni //
NK055(ri)001:1772: ye shes thig le de nyid la //
NK055(ri)001:1774: rig 'dzin dgongs pa mthar thug pa'i rig pa rang sar phyin pa'i dgongs pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:1775: chos thams cad kyi de kho na nyid ye nas
NK055(ri)001:1776: yin pa rig 'dzin gyis rtogs pa mngon du gyur
NK055(ri)001:1777: pa ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid las ma gtogs
NK055(ri)001:1778: pa/ shes bya shes byed med pa'i bdag nyid ni ye shes so //
NK055(ri)001:1779: thig le ni dgongs pa de lta bu'i ngang la
NK055(ri)001:1780: 'khor ba dang 'das pa snang ba dang mi snang
NK055(ri)001:1781: ba bem rig yul sems la sogs te/
NK055(ri)001:1782: dmigs kyi phra rags spangs pa med par rang dag
NK055(ri)001:1783: pa nyid spros pa'i mtha' dang bral bas thig le'o
NK055(ri)001:1784: // spros bral yul du 'dzin pa lta bu ni ma yin te mnyam pa nyid kyi ngang ngo //
NK055(ri)001:1785: de nyid la zhes pa ngo bo bzung ba ste bud+d+ha'i dgongs pa nyid/
NK055(ri)001:1786: rnal 'byor pa'i dgongs par lhun gyis grub pa de nyid la/
NK055(ri)001:1787: ye shes thig le nyid snang ba //
NK055(ri)001:1789: mthar phyin pa'i bud+d+ha dgongs pa mnyam pa nyid kyi
NK055(ri)001:1790: ngang la rang byung gi ye shes cir yang mi
NK055(ri)001:1791: 'gag pa'i rtsal rang snang ba'i yon tan thams cad
NK055(ri)001:1792: lhun gyis grub pa'i bdag nyid/
NK055(ri)001:1794: mthun pa la mthun par snang ste/
NK055(ri)001:1795: yul dang bral bar rang snang ba yang gnyis su
NK055(ri)001:1796: med pa'i tshul gyis rang snang bas lhun gyis grub
NK055(ri)001:1797: pa'i 'bras bu zhes kyang brjod de/
NK055(ri)001:1798: chu la chu thim pa lta bu la ni nyid las nyid snang zhes brjod de/
NK055(ri)001:1799: don la dus gsum gyi bud+d+ha dang dgongs pa gnyis su med pa'i ye shes la dbyer med pa la/
NK055(ri)001:1800: bsam gyis mi khyab mtha' yas mchog /ces bya ste/
NK055(ri)001:1801: ngo bo dang rnam grangs gnyis las ngo bo bsam gyis mi khyab pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:1802: rig 'dzin gyi lam mthar phyin pa'i dgongs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid la/
NK055(ri)001:1803: bud+d+ha'i dgongs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang dbyer med par gyur pa la ni/
NK055(ri)001:1804: shar phyogs kyi nam mkha' dang nub phyogs kyi nam mkha' dbyer med pa bzhin no //
NK055(ri)001:1805: gnyis su med pa'i thugs rje mngon du gyur pas
NK055(ri)001:1806: rig pa chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa ni ngo
NK055(ri)001:1807: bo bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:1808: rnam grangs sam yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:1809: sku rig rgyan gyi 'khor lo ni nyi shu rtsa
NK055(ri)001:1810: lnga lhun gyis grub pa'i mdzad pa'i phrin las chos
NK055(ri)001:1811: kyi dbyings dang mnyam par rang snang ste gdul bya'i
NK055(ri)001:1813: bgrangs kyis mi lang bas na bsam yas/
NK055(ri)001:1814: mchog ni gdul bya 'dul byed mdzad pa thams cad sems nyid du lhun gyis grub pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:1815: de dag kyang lhun grub rig 'dzin gyi snang ba yin pas mnyam rjes phra ba dang bcas pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:1816: ma btsal bar snang ba'i ngo bo ni/
NK055(ri)001:1817: phyogs bcu dus bzhi mngon rdzogs pa'i //
NK055(ri)001:1819: phyogs bcu na bzhugs shing dus bzhir gshegs pa'i khams
NK055(ri)001:1820: gsum gyi chos thams cad rang rig pa'i mngon sum
NK055(ri)001:1821: du/ ma 'dres la yongs su rdzogs pa mnyam pa
NK055(ri)001:1822: nyid lhag pa'i chos skur rdzogs pa'i chos kyi dbyings
NK055(ri)001:1823: du/ mtha' klas pa'i/ zhing khams rnam dag bsam yas dang //
NK055(ri)001:1824: zhes pa kun tu bzang po'i zhing khams dang /
NK055(ri)001:1825: rigs lnga'i zhing khams bsam yas pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:1826: 'gro drug gi ngo la snang ba'i sprul pa'i sku'i zhing khams bsam yas pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:1827: de dag bzhugs gnas rgya khyon tshad bzung du med
NK055(ri)001:1828: pa'i gzhal yas khang gleng bzhi'i le'ura smos pa bzhin
NK055(ri)001:1829: du snang ba ste/ 'og gzhi 'khor lo dang rin
NK055(ri)001:1830: po che las grub pa'i phyi nang gi rgyan rnams
NK055(ri)001:1831: du snang ba ste/ dang / 'dod yon lnga'i rol
NK055(ri)001:1832: mo'i longs spyod kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa dang
NK055(ri)001:1833: du snang ba ste/ dang / bcas pa dang / dkyil 'khor ma lus mtha' yas kun //
NK055(ri)001:1835: rgyan gyi 'khor lo nyi shu rtsa lnga'i dkyil 'khor rgyu 'bras kyi sprul pa bsam yas kun/
NK055(ri)001:1837: zhes pa de dag thams cad yul dang yul can
NK055(ri)001:1838: med par rig pa'i ngang la dus gcig tu rig
NK055(ri)001:1839: pa rang gsal bar snang nas/
NK055(ri)001:1840: nye bar mnyes pa dang bya ba thams cad rig
NK055(ri)001:1841: pa'i ngang du rang snang las yul dang yul can
NK055(ri)001:1842: med pa ni mnyes pa'i mchog go //
NK055(ri)001:1844: zhes pa gsung lnga lhun grub kyi gsung /
NK055(ri)001:1845: gsung gi brjod pa mi mnga' bar chu zla ltar
NK055(ri)001:1846: rig pa las brda mjal ba de'i gsung gis rig
NK055(ri)001:1849: ma 'dres la yongs su rdzogs pa chos thams cad
NK055(ri)001:1850: kyi de kho na nyid kyi don mngon du gyur
NK055(ri)001:1851: nas le'u gnyis par bshad pa bzhin dbang thob ste/
NK055(ri)001:1852: mthun pa'i ye shes rang snang ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:1853: zhes pa ston pa dang mthar lam pa dgongs pa
NK055(ri)001:1854: mthun pa ste dbyer med pa'i rang byung gi ye
NK055(ri)001:1855: shes rang snang / mthar lam pa'i dgongs pa dang
NK055(ri)001:1856: bud+d+ha'i dgongs pa chu la chu thim pa bzhin du
NK055(ri)001:1857: shes rang snang / dbyer med/ chos sku chen po mngon du gyur ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:1858: don de la ni lam pas lta bsgom mthar thug
NK055(ri)001:1859: pa'i ye shes dang dus gsum gyi bud+d+ha 'bras bu
NK055(ri)001:1860: mngon du byas pa'i ye shes dang /
NK055(ri)001:1861: de dbyer med pa nyid lam bsgrub pa mthar phyin
NK055(ri)001:1862: pa 'bras bu'i ngo bo yin pa gsum gcig tu
NK055(ri)001:1863: dbyer med pa la ni mthun pa'i ye shes zhes
NK055(ri)001:1864: bya ste/ de nyid rgyu rkyen dang bral ba'i tshul gyis rang snang zhes smos so //
NK055(ri)001:1865: rang snang gi dpe bstan ni/
NK055(ri)001:1866: gong dpag bsam shing dang yid bzhin gyi //
NK055(ri)001:1868: dpag bsam ni byang sgra mi snyan gyi longs spyod
NK055(ri)001:1869: dpag bsam gyi shing las dgos 'dod thams cad tshig
NK055(ri)001:1870: gis zlo mi dgos bsam pa tsam gyi 'byung yang
NK055(ri)001:1871: shing la 'di la 'adi'o snyam pa'i rtog pa med
NK055(ri)001:1872: pa dang / de dang 'dra bar de bzhin sems
NK055(ri)001:1873: kyi ye shes chen po rtogs pa mthar phyin pa'i
NK055(ri)001:1874: pa dang / dus su/ mthar lam pa'i dgongs pa
NK055(ri)001:1875: thams cad skong ba la ma tshogs pa med pa'o
NK055(ri)001:1876: pa dang / dus su/ // 'o na dpag bsam gyi shing ni sgra mi snyan yin gyi/
NK055(ri)001:1878: byang chub kyi sems ni phyogs thams cad pa yin pas dpe des mi mtshon zhe na/
NK055(ri)001:1881: rin po che klu'i dbang po la yod pa skyes
NK055(ri)001:1882: bu chen pos blangs nas gdul bya mtho dman rnams
NK055(ri)001:1883: kyis gsol ba gang btab snang ba bzhin/
NK055(ri)001:1884: byang chub sems rtogs tshabs che chung gi dbang gis blo ngo bzhin du dgos pa skong ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:1885: 'o na dpe de'i dbang du byas na byang chub
NK055(ri)001:1886: sems phyogs thams cad pa yin kyang lam pa la
NK055(ri)001:1887: 'gro ba rang rgyud pa la mi phan no zhe
NK055(ri)001:1890: 'byung ba lnga'i rten 'brel gyis khams gsum gyi dgos
NK055(ri)001:1891: pa thams cad lhun gyis grub pa bzhin byang chub
NK055(ri)001:1892: sems phyogs gcig pa dang bral zhing rang snang mi
NK055(ri)001:1893: 'gag pa'i ngo bo dpe gsum yang de'i rtsal las
NK055(ri)001:1894: snang bas phyogs thams cad pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:1895: de bas na dpe gsum gyis dgos pa skong ba yang dpe gsum de dag rdzas yod ma yin te/
NK055(ri)001:1896: dngos po rang rgyud du grub pa med de/
NK055(ri)001:1897: de gsum gyi yul can rnams kyang rang gi sems
NK055(ri)001:1898: rang snang ba'i bsod nams kyi ngo bo bstan pa
NK055(ri)001:1899: nyid yon tan gyi tshogs gsum du snang ngo //
NK055(ri)001:1901: ngo mtshar cho 'phrul rmad kyi chos //
NK055(ri)001:1903: gzhi sems ye shes kyi rang bzhin 'khor 'das la
NK055(ri)001:1904: sogs pa btags pa'i tha snyad thams cad kyis ma
NK055(ri)001:1905: reg pa ni ngo mtshar ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:1907: de nyid las sku lnga la sogs pa nyi shu
NK055(ri)001:1908: rtsa lnga cir yang 'char ba cir yang bya byed
NK055(ri)001:1909: med par 'gro ba'i dgos pa skong ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:1910: rmad du byung ba ni des 'gro ba'i don ji
NK055(ri)001:1911: tsam mdzad kyang mdzad bya mdzad byed la sogs pa
NK055(ri)001:1912: gnyis 'dzin gyi chos phra ba'ang mi mnga' ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:1913: de lta bu'i 'bras bu lhun grub kyi ye shes
NK055(ri)001:1914: theg pa dgu'i lam pa rnams kyis bsgrub nas mthar
NK055(ri)001:1916: gzhan zhig na yod pa lam gyi stobs kyis bkug pa'am/
NK055(ri)001:1917: yang na dag pa'i zhing gzhan zhig na yod pa lam pas bgrod nas der phyin pa'am/
NK055(ri)001:1918: yang na rgyu rkyen gyis bsgrubs nas des 'grub pa lta bu ma yin te/
NK055(ri)001:1919: thabs la brten pa'i shes rab nya da //
NK055(ri)001:1921: theg pa 'di nyid kyi skabs su phung po la
NK055(ri)001:1922: sogs pa rtogs pa bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis spangs pa
NK055(ri)001:1923: med par nyams su blangs te/
NK055(ri)001:1924: dang por gsung gi phyag rgya yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis su gsal/
NK055(ri)001:1925: de las thugs kyi phyag rgya thugs phyag mtshan bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis su gsal/
NK055(ri)001:1926: de las sku phyag rgya bzhi bzhu rtsa gnyis su
NK055(ri)001:1927: gsal ba de ni ma 'gag pas thabs zhes bya'o
NK055(ri)001:1928: // de la brten pa'i shes rab ni gsung gi
NK055(ri)001:1929: dkyil 'khor gsal ba'i dus su yang rang rig pa
NK055(ri)001:1930: nyid gsung du snang bas snang stong gi mtha' dang
NK055(ri)001:1931: // bral/ de dang 'dra bas sku gsung thugs kyi
NK055(ri)001:1932: phyag rgya gang bsgom yang rang rig pa nyid rang
NK055(ri)001:1933: snang bas de las snang 'dzin stong 'dzin gang gi'ang
NK055(ri)001:1935: sku gsung thugs phyag rgya'i thabs la brten pa'i rang
NK055(ri)001:1936: rig pa dngos po thams cad dang bral ba'i ngang
NK055(ri)001:1937: la gnas pa ni rgyud du bsgom pa shes rab
NK055(ri)001:1938: kyi bdag nyid de/ de lta bu yi ngang du 'byung //
NK055(ri)001:1940: 'bras bu ma 'dres la yongs su rdzogs pa yi
NK055(ri)001:1941: ge 'khor lo'i sa nyid lam gyi ngo bor byas
NK055(ri)001:1942: nas lam 'dris shing goms pa mthar phyin pa nyid
NK055(ri)001:1943: 'bras bu'i ngo bo bas rgyu 'bras gnyis su med
NK055(ri)001:1944: pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes lhun
NK055(ri)001:1945: gyis grub pa'i ngang du rang snang ba la byung
NK055(ri)001:1946: zhes bya'o // rgyu rkyen gyis ma gos pa'i phyir/
NK055(ri)001:1947: shes rab dbyings kyi de bzhin nyid //
NK055(ri)001:1949: sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nyid rang rig pa
NK055(ri)001:1950: las mi gzhan pas gang du yang ma dmigs pa
NK055(ri)001:1951: ni lhag pa'i shes rab bo //
NK055(ri)001:1952: de nyid 'og ma'i shes rab bzhin spros bral gyi mtha' lta bu ma yin te/
NK055(ri)001:1953: rang gsal ba'i bdag nyid ni mi 'gag pa'i ngo
NK055(ri)001:1954: bo nyid du bzhugs pas dbyings gsum las mnyam pa
NK055(ri)001:1956: de bzhin nyid ces pa med la zad mi shes
NK055(ri)001:1957: stong la thams cad 'byung ba'i mtshan nya da dang
NK055(ri)001:1958: ldan pa'i dbyings ni rang rig rang gsal ba ye
NK055(ri)001:1959: nas lhun gyis grub pa'i bdag nyid ni/
NK055(ri)001:1960: sems kyi chos nyid rig pa nyid de/
NK055(ri)001:1961: de las yul dang yul can med pas gzhan pa ma dmigs pas nyid do //
NK055(ri)001:1962: thabs kyi phyag rgyar gyur pa'i phyir //
NK055(ri)001:1964: lhun grub kyi ye shes nyid gdod nas rang snang
NK055(ri)001:1965: mi 'gag pa'i rtsal cir 'char bas thabs su snang
NK055(ri)001:1966: ste/ phyag rgya ni sems kyi chos nyid las mi
NK055(ri)001:1967: gzhan zhing de nyid kyi rgyas thebs pas snang tsam
NK055(ri)001:1968: nyid na rig pa las mi gzhan pas phyag rgya
NK055(ri)001:1969: ste/ zhes bya'o // gyur pa ni de'i dus su
NK055(ri)001:1970: snang bya snang byed rgyu 'bras kyi rtsol ba dang
NK055(ri)001:1971: bral ba nad las mtshon pa'i tha snyad du gyur
NK055(ri)001:1973: gtan tshigs de lta bu'i phyir/
NK055(ri)001:1974: ye shes la ni ye shes rol //
NK055(ri)001:1976: lhun grub kyi ye shes mngon du gyur pa'i mthar
NK055(ri)001:1977: phyin pa'i rang byung gi ye shes nyid las lam
NK055(ri)001:1978: pas 'bras bu mthar phyin pa'i ye shes ma 'dres
NK055(ri)001:1979: la yongs su rdzogs pa 'bras bu bsam gyis mi
NK055(ri)001:1980: khyab pa'i ye shes su rang snang ba la/
NK055(ri)001:1981: rgyu 'bras sam don rtags sam shes bya shes byed
NK055(ri)001:1982: med pa'i ngo bo nyid las mi 'da' ba la
NK055(ri)001:1983: rol zhes bya'o // rol zhes pa/
NK055(ri)001:1984: gnyis 'dzin du ma song ngam zhe na/
NK055(ri)001:1985: ye shes rol pa nyid kyang gsog /ces pa/
NK055(ri)001:1986: gong du bstan pa'i ye shes las ye shes rol
NK055(ri)001:1987: nas lhun grub kyi ye shes chen po nyid du
NK055(ri)001:1988: gyur tsam na/ gsog ces pas/
NK055(ri)001:1989: 'khor ba las grol ba'i sangs rgyas thob pa'i 'bras bu dag pa mngon du gyur pa'am/
NK055(ri)001:1990: lam mthar phyin pa lta bu'i 'du shes kyi 'dzin
NK055(ri)001:1991: pa thams cad nam mkha' dngos por mi snang ba
NK055(ri)001:1992: ltar 'du shes thams cad dag pa la ni gsog
NK055(ri)001:1993: ces bya ste/ de dag gi 'dzin pa gzhi nas ma dmigs pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:1995: 'du shes thams cad dang bral ba ni bcom ldan 'das so zhes gsungs so //
NK055(ri)001:1996: gsog na 'gro don mi nus so snyam na/
NK055(ri)001:1997: 'gro don snang ba'i mtshan nyid bstan pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:1998: rgyal ba mngon byung skyob pa dang //
NK055(ri)001:2000: rgyal ba mngon byung zhes pa/
NK055(ri)001:2001: gdul bya 'gro ba drug la snang ba'i rgyal ba
NK055(ri)001:2002: sprul pa'i sku mdzad pa bcu gnyis kyis 'gro don
NK055(ri)001:2003: mdzad de/ sku gsung thugs kyi mdzad pa bsam gyis
NK055(ri)001:2004: mi khyab pa gdul bya'i mngon sum du byung ba
NK055(ri)001:2005: mdzad de/ dang / des gdul bya khams gsum pa
NK055(ri)001:2006: rnams ngan song dang 'khor ba las skyob pa'i bstan
NK055(ri)001:2007: pa sde snod rin chen gsungs pa thams cad dang
NK055(ri)001:2008: mdzad de/ dang / / byin rlabs ston pa'ang de bzhin te //
NK055(ri)001:2010: gdul bya zag med la snang ba'i chos kyi sku'i byin rlabs ston pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:2011: longs skus kyang sprul sku bzhin gsung gis mi ston te/
NK055(ri)001:2012: sku dang thugs kyi byin rlabs kyis shes bya'i sgrib pa sbyong ba'i chos ston pa yang /
NK055(ri)001:2014: ting nge 'dzin gyis shes bya'i sgrib pa sbyong bar
NK055(ri)001:2015: byed cing 'bras bu la sbyor bar byed pa gdul
NK055(ri)001:2016: bya'i don mdzad pa nus pa thogs med dang ldan
NK055(ri)001:2017: pa'ang 'gro don mdzad pa sprul sku bzhin te/
NK055(ri)001:2018: snang stong dbyer med pa'i tshul lo //
NK055(ri)001:2019: bya byed nus pa'i gzi byiin gyis //
NK055(ri)001:2021: sprul pa'i skus gsung gi sgo nas gdul bya'i bya ba byed nus te/
NK055(ri)001:2022: ngan song dang 'khor ba las 'dren zhing mtho ris dang thar par sbyor nus pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:2023: longs skus sku dang thugs kyi sgo nas sa la
NK055(ri)001:2024: gnas pa rnams kyi sgrib pa sbyong zhing gong nas
NK055(ri)001:2025: gong du 'phar/ mthar thug 'bras bu la sbyor ba'i
NK055(ri)001:2026: sku gsung thugs gsum rig pa rang snang ba'i gzi
NK055(ri)001:2027: gong du 'phar/ byin dang / sgyu ma zhes pa/
NK055(ri)001:2030: ltad mo ba'i mig gi shes pa 'dren pa'i bya ba byed pa bzhin/
NK055(ri)001:2031: sku gnyis kyis mdzad pa'i phrin las snang stong dbyer
NK055(ri)001:2032: med pa sgyu ma lta bus gdul bya dang yul
NK055(ri)001:2033: dang yul can med par rang la rang rol te
NK055(ri)001:2034: 'gro don lhun gyis grub pa'i dus na/
NK055(ri)001:2035: rdo rje btsan po zhes pa/
NK055(ri)001:2036: mdzad pa'i phrin las nyid ngo bo 'dus ma byas pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:2037: mtshan nyid gdul bya gdul byed mdzad pa thams cad
NK055(ri)001:2038: dbyer med pa'i phyir skye 'gag med pas rdo rje'i
NK055(ri)001:2039: sku ste/ dus gsum du 'gyur ba med pas btsan po/
NK055(ri)001:2040: theg 'og gi sangs rgyas las 'phags pas mchog go //
NK055(ri)001:2041: dgongs pa chos skur bstan pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:2042: 'og gcig dang du mar bral ba yi //
NK055(ri)001:2044: 'dir 'bras bu'i chos sku'i ngo bo bstan te/
NK055(ri)001:2045: gong du phyogs bcu dus bzhii mngon rdzogs/
NK055(ri)001:2046: zhes pa nas zhing khams dang gzhal yas khang rnams bstan/
NK055(ri)001:2047: mthun pa'i ye shes rang snang ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:2049: de rnams gud na log pa gcig yod dam snyam na/
NK055(ri)001:2050: gong du bstan pa rnams ni mthar lam pa yi snang ba yin la/
NK055(ri)001:2051: 'dir sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo ston pas gcig dang du ma zhes pa/
NK055(ri)001:2052: spyir na 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i
NK055(ri)001:2053: chos thams cad rang byung gi ye shes rang gsal
NK055(ri)001:2054: ba ni tha snyad du bdag nyid chen por lhun
NK055(ri)001:2056: nam mkha' la phan tshun yul ma grub pa bzhin
NK055(ri)001:2057: du dpe des rang byung gi ye shes la ltos
NK055(ri)001:2058: pa med par gsal yang de nyid du'ang gzung ba
NK055(ri)001:2059: med pa ni gcig pa'i mtha' ma spangs bral ba'o
NK055(ri)001:2060: // byang chub kyi sems rang snang gi ye shes
NK055(ri)001:2061: nyid gang du yang ma grub pa nyid thams cad
NK055(ri)001:2062: kyi ngo bo nyid du lhun gyis grub pa'i phyir
NK055(ri)001:2063: 'gro drug so so la yang mthun snang so sor
NK055(ri)001:2064: // snang la/ lam pa dma' ba la dma' ba/
NK055(ri)001:2065: mtho ba la mtho ba cir yang 'char te/
NK055(ri)001:2066: de yang so sor ma 'dres par shar ba ni
NK055(ri)001:2067: lha la dmyal ba'i snang ba mi shar ba lta
NK055(ri)001:2068: bu'o // de yang rgyas pa las/
NK055(ri)001:2069: thabs chen ma 'dres rnam par thar pa yis //
NK055(ri)001:2070: dmigs med bder gshegs nyid dbyings thugs chud pas //
NK055(ri)001:2071: dus bzhi'i rgyal ba kun dang mnyam pa 'jug /ces so //
NK055(ri)001:2072: thams cad rang snang bas ni gcig pa'i mtha' dang bral/
NK055(ri)001:2073: ngo bo gang du ma grub pa ni du ma'i mtha' dang bral te/
NK055(ri)001:2074: de gnyis kyang tshig gi tha snyad la rim pas
NK055(ri)001:2075: yod kyang ngo bo dbyer med cig car du lhun
NK055(ri)001:2076: gyis grub ste de nyid du yang 'dzin pa med
NK055(ri)001:2078: de lta ba'i don la ni yod pa'i mtha' dang bral te gang du yang ma grub/
NK055(ri)001:2079: med pa'i mtha' dang bral te cir yang rang snang /
NK055(ri)001:2080: mtha' gnyis dang bral te dbus su yang grub pa
NK055(ri)001:2081: med pa'i ngang la skye 'gag dran rtog rtag chad
NK055(ri)001:2082: 'gro 'ong la sogs pa'i mtha' thams cad las 'das
NK055(ri)001:2083: pa'i phyir/ ngo bo nyid bstan du med pa chos thams cad lhun gyis grub cing /
NK055(ri)001:2084: rang snang ba'i rang byung gi ye shes de bzhin
NK055(ri)001:2085: nyid de mngon du byas pa'i phyir don gting phebs
NK055(ri)001:2086: pas de bzhin nyid du gshegs pa zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:2087: khams gsum gyi chos thams cad 'bras bu sku dang
NK055(ri)001:2088: ye shes su rdzogs pas yang dag par rdzogs pa
NK055(ri)001:2089: zhes bya'o // shes bya'i sgrib pa phra ba'i phra
NK055(ri)001:2090: ba'ang sangs nas mkhyen pa gnyis rgyas pas sangs rgyas
NK055(ri)001:2091: zhes bya'o // zhes bya'o // spyod yul thams cad
NK055(ri)001:2092: yongs su dag pas kun tu bzang po zhes bya
NK055(ri)001:2093: zhes bya'o // zhes bya'o // ste/ de ni gnas
NK055(ri)001:2094: bya gnas byed gnyis med pa'i gtan tshigs kyis thams
NK055(ri)001:2095: cad du rang snang ba zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:2096: mkhyen pa mi 'gag par shar tshul ni gnyis snang
NK055(ri)001:2097: med na gdul bya mi gzigs pas gzhan don mi
NK055(ri)001:2098: 'byung ngo snyam na/ gdul bya mkhyen tshul bstan te/
NK055(ri)001:2099: log par rtog brtags rnam dag cing //
NK055(ri)001:2100: zhes pa 'khor 'das sam snod bcud kyi chos thams
NK055(ri)001:2101: cad du rang snang mi 'gag pa'i chos can gyi
NK055(ri)001:2102: dngos po thams cad rang rig pa kho na'i phyir/
NK055(ri)001:2103: yul yang rig pa yul can yang rig pa/
NK055(ri)001:2104: snang stong la sogs pa thams cad rang rig pa'i
NK055(ri)001:2105: phyir yul dang yul can med de gnyis su med
NK055(ri)001:2106: pa'i ye shes kho na la de ma shes pas
NK055(ri)001:2107: 'khrul pa dag gis snod bcud la sogs pa gnyis
NK055(ri)001:2108: su rtogs pa thams cad ni log rtog ste/
NK055(ri)001:2109: log rtog gi rgyun gyis log rtog snga phyi rgyu 'bras su snang ba ni/
NK055(ri)001:2110: kun tu brtags pa'i ma rig pa ste glo bur gyi gzung 'dzin gnyis so //
NK055(ri)001:2111: rtsa ba des bskyed pa'i bdag tu 'dzin pa las
NK055(ri)001:2112: snang ba'i nyon mongs pa lnga ni nyon mongs pa'i
NK055(ri)001:2113: sgrib pa'o // de dag kyang lta bsgom gnyis kyi
NK055(ri)001:2114: 'du shes rags pa dang phra ba dang phra ba'i
NK055(ri)001:2116: dag pa'i tshul yang thun mong gi theg pas ni
NK055(ri)001:2117: yun bskal pa grangs med gsum gyis sbyangs te tshogs
NK055(ri)001:2119: rnam par dkar ba dge ba'i las ni lam gyi
NK055(ri)001:2120: gazhi'am ngo bo yin pas des mi mthun pa'i gnag
NK055(ri)001:2121: las rnams 'joms te mi gnas par byas pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:2122: tshogs lam chen po ste sprul pa'i sku'i zhal mthong ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:2123: sbyor lam du chos dang gang zag gi bdag med
NK055(ri)001:2124: sbyangs te mthong lam du don dam pa'i bden pa
NK055(ri)001:2125: mngon du gyur te 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa dang bral
NK055(ri)001:2126: ba ni nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dag /bdag med
NK055(ri)001:2127: mngon du gyur thun mong gi longs sku mthong /
NK055(ri)001:2128: bsgom lam dang mthar lam du shes bya'i sgrib pa rags pa dang phra ba rnams sbyangs nas/
NK055(ri)001:2129: sa bcu rgyun gyi tha mar shes bya'i sgrib pa phra ba dag nas sangs rgyas te/
NK055(ri)001:2130: gzhan don yang dag pa 'jig rten pa'i ye shes
NK055(ri)001:2131: kyis gdul bya'i don mdzad pa yul yul can no
NK055(ri)001:2132: // 'dir theg pa 'di nyid kyi lugs kyis sgrib pa gsum dus gcig sbyangs te/
NK055(ri)001:2133: dbang po rab kyis lta ba rtogs pa'i dus su
NK055(ri)001:2134: chos thams cad rang byung ye shes su rtogs pas
NK055(ri)001:2135: gnyis 'dzin dag ste/ des mun pa snang bar gyur pa dang 'dra bar/
NK055(ri)001:2136: las sgrib rang byung ye shes su gsal bas/
NK055(ri)001:2137: spang bya ma dmigs par rang dag go //
NK055(ri)001:2138: des rang byung ye shes kyi ngang la bdag gzhan ma dmigs pas bdag 'dzin dag ste/
NK055(ri)001:2139: yul dang yul can ma dmigs pas nyon mongs pa dag go //
NK055(ri)001:2140: shes bya'i sgrib pa ni lta bsgom la dam par 'dzin pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:2141: 'dir rig pa phyogs 'dzin thams cad dang bral ba'i
NK055(ri)001:2142: ngang la lta bsgom la 'dzin pa ma dmigs par
NK055(ri)001:2143: rang dag go // de yang dper na lcags kyi
NK055(ri)001:2144: thur ma dang dngul dang gser gyi thur ma gsum
NK055(ri)001:2145: rim pa bzhin du bdar na rim pa bzhin du
NK055(ri)001:2146: zad pa ni theg pa 'og ma'i gzhung ngo //
NK055(ri)001:2147: cig car dus gcig bdar na dus gcig zad pa
NK055(ri)001:2148: ni theg pa 'di nyid kyi lugs zhes bla ma
NK055(ri)001:2149: bde bar gshegs pas gsungs so //
NK055(ri)001:2150: rnam dag /ces pas de dag pa'i tshul ni gzhi
NK055(ri)001:2151: la yod na lan gcig dag kyang slar 'byung ba
NK055(ri)001:2152: la chu'i rnyog ma ltar yang /
NK055(ri)001:2153: gzhi la med pa brtags pa'i dbang gis glo bur
NK055(ri)001:2154: du snang bas de dag pa ni mthar phyin pa'i
NK055(ri)001:2155: bud+d+ha'o // ye shes dbyings las mi gzhan phyir //
NK055(ri)001:2156: zhes pa sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo rang rig pa rang byung gi ye shes ni/
NK055(ri)001:2157: gsal la mi 'gag pa'i ngos nas ye shes zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:2158: mtha' thams cad dang bral ba nyid rang snang ba'i
NK055(ri)001:2159: gzhi'i ngo bor bzhugs pa la ni dbyings zhes bya
NK055(ri)001:2160: ste/ de gnyis dbyer med pa ni rang rig pa'i
NK055(ri)001:2161: ye shes te sangs rgyas kun gyi ngo bo nyid
NK055(ri)001:2162: ste/ do // khams gsum gyi sems can thams cad kyang de las mi gzhan te/
NK055(ri)001:2163: rtogs ma rtogs tsam las ma gtogs par khyab che chung med par kun tu bzang pos gsungs so //
NK055(ri)001:2164: thugs rje chen pos 'brel bas na //
NK055(ri)001:2165: zhes pa dbyings rig pa dbyer med ni bud+d+ha thams cad kyi thugs yin pas/
NK055(ri)001:2166: bem rig gi chos thams cad la khyab pa ni rje zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:2167: de la ni gnyis su med pa'i thugs rje chen po zhes kyang bya ste/
NK055(ri)001:2168: gdul bya 'dul byed thams cad dbyings ye shes kyi ngang du dbyer med pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:2169: 'o na khams gsum ji ltar 'khrul ce na rang
NK055(ri)001:2170: gi log rtog gi gzhi las ma grub pa 'khrul
NK055(ri)001:2171: pa glo bur du snang ba la me long gi
NK055(ri)001:2172: g.ya' dang nam mkha'i sprin bzhin te/
NK055(ri)001:2173: rtog pa tsam gyis rang byung gi ye shes bsgrib ste/
NK055(ri)001:2174: dper na pha la dgrar brtags pa lta bu'o //
NK055(ri)001:2176: thugs rje chen po des gdul bya mtho dman thams cad 'dzin pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:2177: thams cad la khyab bya khyab byed med par khyab pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:2178: dag ma dag gis gdul bya 'dul byed gnyis su 'dzin pa mi mnga' ba'i phyir gsum grub ste/
NK055(ri)001:2179: de'i phyir na thugs rje chen po zhes bya/
NK055(ri)001:2180: dgongs pa de lta bu la smon lam gyi stobs kyis kyang bstangs pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:2181: des na thugs rje chen po gsum yang thugs rje chen po'i rtsal rang snang ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:2182: de nyid ni gsang sngags nang pa gsum gyi thugs rje'i ngo bo'o //
NK055(ri)001:2184: 'gro drug dus gnas ma lus mkhyen //
NK055(ri)001:2186: me long gzugs brnyan snang ba ltar rig pa byang
NK055(ri)001:2187: chub kyi sems chos sku las ma rtogs pa'i 'gro
NK055(ri)001:2188: ba thams cad ma g.yos pa'i phyir yul du byas
NK055(ri)001:2189: pa med par gdul bya 'gro ba drug gi dus
NK055(ri)001:2190: thog ma med pa nas tha ma med pa'i bya
NK055(ri)001:2192: 'gro ba drug gi gnas kyi nang gi dma' ba
NK055(ri)001:2193: srin bu shi ka tsam zhig kyang ma lus par
NK055(ri)001:2194: mkhyen te/ de dag rim pa bzhin du brgyud pa
NK055(ri)001:2195: ma yin par skad cig la ji yod dus gcig
NK055(ri)001:2196: mkhyen te/ la mkhyen pa ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa gang yin pa ye shes/
NK055(ri)001:2197: ye shes gang yin thams cad mkhyen pa/
NK055(ri)001:2198: de bzhin du thugs rje dang mdzad pa thams cad
NK055(ri)001:2199: lhun gyis grub pa ni gdul bya thams cad nyid
NK055(ri)001:2200: las mi gzhan pa ni ji snyed mkhyen pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:2201: mkhyen bya mkhyen byed kyi rtog pa las grol ba ni ji lta ba mkhyen pa'o zhes pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:2202: yang rtog pa med par rang gsal ba'o zhes brjod do //
NK055(ri)001:2203: zhes ched du brjod do zhes pa/
NK055(ri)001:2204: ston pa kun tu bzang pos go phye ba'i 'khor gyi ched du brjod pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:2205: gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/
NK055(ri)001:2206: rdo rje bkod pa gsang ba'i dam tshig ces pa/
NK055(ri)001:2208: dgu pa man ngag gi rim pas bshad pa'o////le'u bcu pa la 'jug par bya ste/
NK055(ri)001:2209: le'u'i mtshams thag sbrel ba ni/
NK055(ri)001:2210: le'u dgu par dkyil 'khor dang 'jug pa dang yon
NK055(ri)001:2211: tan rnams bshad nas 'jug pa'i rting la 'ong ba
NK055(ri)001:2213: dbang bskur ba dngos gzhi le'u bcu par bstan pa
NK055(ri)001:2214: ni go phye ba'i 'khor phyi rabs pa rang byan
NK055(ri)001:2216: thugs rje chen pos rgyud dkrugs/
NK055(ri)001:2218: man ngag sbas pa rdo rje slob dpon la rag las pa'i phyir ro //
NK055(ri)001:2219: le'u bcu pa dbang gi gsung ba lo rgyus ni/
NK055(ri)001:2220: de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po zhes pa/
NK055(ri)001:2221: tshig gi de ma thag pa ni le'u dgu pa song ba'i rjes thog go //
NK055(ri)001:2222: don gyi de ma thag pa ni dgu par rdo
NK055(ri)001:2223: rje slob dpon dang slob ma 'jug pa tshar nas
NK055(ri)001:2224: dbang bas de nas zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:2225: bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po kun tu bzang po gong du bshad pa bzhin no //
NK055(ri)001:2227: lam pa gong mas 'og ma la lam thad so'i
NK055(ri)001:2228: chos la dbang thob pa'i chos kyi longs spyod sbyin
NK055(ri)001:2229: pa ste/ byin pas dbang bsgyur bas rgyal po zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:2230: de yang las dang po'i dus su rdo rje slob
NK055(ri)001:2231: dpon drod thob pas slob ma dad pa can la
NK055(ri)001:2232: rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor la brten nas/
NK055(ri)001:2233: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba tshogs pa'i mthus dbang bskur ba ni/
NK055(ri)001:2234: dbang gi sa bon gzhag pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:2235: slob dpon mthong lam yan chad bsgom lam pas slob
NK055(ri)001:2236: ma drod thob pa'i skyes bu la lhag pa ting
NK055(ri)001:2237: nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor la brten pa zhes bya
NK055(ri)001:2238: ste/ slob dpon gyi ting nge 'dzin gyis dkyil 'khor
NK055(ri)001:2239: sprul pa slob mas mthong nus pa ni lhag pa
NK055(ri)001:2240: ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang bskur zhes bya ste dbang
NK055(ri)001:2242: de nas slob dpon phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyis/
NK055(ri)001:2243: slob ma mthar lam mthar phyin pa la dbang bskur ba ni/
NK055(ri)001:2244: rgyud 'di'i le'u gnyis pa lta bu ste dbang mngon du gyur pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:2245: des na dbang bskur gsum thob na sangs rgyas zhes kyang smos so //
NK055(ri)001:2246: 'bru la bcar na rgyal po sbyin pa zhes bya ba ni/
NK055(ri)001:2247: rgyal po dang sbyin pa gnyis te/
NK055(ri)001:2248: rgyal po ni dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal
NK055(ri)001:2249: po'i bu lus la mtshan dpe dang ldan pa dbang
NK055(ri)001:2250: bskur bas gling bzhi la dbang bsgyur/
NK055(ri)001:2251: longs spyod rat+na sna bdun dang ldan/
NK055(ri)001:2252: gling bzhi dkar po la bkod/
NK055(ri)001:2253: de bzhin du dbang gi rim pa rnams bskur bas/
NK055(ri)001:2254: phan dbang gis tshe 'di dang phyi ma thams cad 'grub/
NK055(ri)001:2255: nus pa'i dbang lngas so so'i las lnga la dbang bsgyur/
NK055(ri)001:2256: zab mo'i dbang gsum gyis don dam rtog med kyi ye shes dang /
NK055(ri)001:2257: rang rig rang gsal gyi ye shes dang /
NK055(ri)001:2258: thams cad mnyam pa nyid du lhun gyis grub pa
NK055(ri)001:2259: gsum la dbang bsgyur ba'i phyir rgyal po zhes bya'o
NK055(ri)001:2260: // mtshon pa'i tha snyad du dbang phyug ces kyang smos so //
NK055(ri)001:2261: sbyin pa ni rdo rje slob dpon la brten te thob pas sbyin pa zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:2262: rgyal po dang dbang bsgyur ba gnyis ni ming dang mkhan lta bu ste gcig go //
NK055(ri)001:2263: de lta bu'i don de snod bcud 'dzom par slob
NK055(ri)001:2264: dpon gyis slob ma la phog pa la ni sbyin
NK055(ri)001:2265: pa zhes bya'o // bskur ba'i rim pa la 'dir yang lag len man ngag gi rim pas 'jug ste/
NK055(ri)001:2266: bskur ba'i rim pas phan dbang bskur ba ni/
NK055(ri)001:2267: dang por dbang tsho gsum ste/
NK055(ri)001:2268: phan pa bcu nus pa lnga zab mo gsum/
NK055(ri)001:2269: de gsum kun la mtshungs ldan gyi rgyu rang la gnas pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:2270: de rkyen gyis slong ba dang /
NK055(ri)001:2271: dbang du grub pa dang gsum mo //
NK055(ri)001:2272: de la dbang bcu la bum pa sngon du 'gro ste/
NK055(ri)001:2273: de yang dang por dkyil 'khor gyi shar sgor slob ma dbang stegs du 'dug bcug ste/
NK055(ri)001:2274: de yang sngon du yon 'bul man+dala zhu ba byed/
NK055(ri)001:2275: de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis dbang gi chas lnga gsol/
NK055(ri)001:2276: phyogs bcu'i bud+d+ha la byin rlabs rtsol ba'i gsol ba gdab/
NK055(ri)001:2277: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad nam mkha' la 'dus
NK055(ri)001:2278: pa kun kyang longs sku thabs dang shes rab dbyer
NK055(ri)001:2279: med du bsgom/ de nas slob ma'i lus ngag gi bag chags dag pa'i cho ga bya/
NK055(ri)001:2280: bum chu rnams rnam rgyal du bsdu ste/
NK055(ri)001:2281: 'di'i dus su sangs rgyas thams cad thugs dam las mi 'da' ba'i phyir/
NK055(ri)001:2282: rigs lnga ni ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs par bsgom/
NK055(ri)001:2283: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bkra shis brjod/
NK055(ri)001:2284: rigs kyi yum bzhis ye shes bdud rtsis khrus chu blugs/
NK055(ri)001:2285: sems ma yum rnams kyis mchod pa'i tshogs kyis 'bul/
NK055(ri)001:2286: khro bo bcus bar chod kyi bgegs bsrung bar bsgom/
NK055(ri)001:2287: sangs rgyas rnams kyis gdul bya'i don la de ltar mdzad pa yin pas so //
NK055(ri)001:2288: dngos su bkra shis kyang barjooda do //
NK055(ri)001:2289: de la mtshungs ldan gyi rgyu ni/
NK055(ri)001:2290: bum pa'i mtshungs ldan gyi rgyu ni lus kyi rtsa
NK055(ri)001:2291: thams cad byang chub sems kyis gang nas yod pa
NK055(ri)001:2292: ni rgyu'o // de dbang du slong ba'i rkyen ni/
NK055(ri)001:2300: rgyu rkyen gnyis mtshungs pa las dbang gi nus pa'i sa bon du 'gyur ro //
NK055(ri)001:2301: dngos su ni rig 'dzin gyi sras dam par 'gyur
NK055(ri)001:2302: nas lha mi thams cad kyi mchod pa'i gnas su
NK055(ri)001:2303: 'gyur ro // phyi mar mtho ris dngos su myur
NK055(ri)001:2304: du thob nas thar ba'i lam la bar chod med
NK055(ri)001:2305: 'gyur ro // par 'gyur ro // de'i dus su
NK055(ri)001:2306: me tog phog pa'i lha gang yin pa'am yang na
NK055(ri)001:2307: gtso bo rdo rje sems dpar bsgom/
NK055(ri)001:2308: de nas dbu rgyan gyis dbang bskur te/
NK055(ri)001:2309: de'i mtshungs ldan gyi rgyu ni rnam shes tshogs brgyad ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid yin pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:2311: tshigs bcad dang sngags dang sgom pa rnams lag len la gsal/
NK055(ri)001:2312: de nas dar mthing dmar gyi cod pan rin chen 'byung ldan gyi rab gnas can gyis dbang bskur te/
NK055(ri)001:2313: mtshungs ldan ni rtsa la la na dang ra s+aa na gnyis kyis lus mgo mjug tu g.yo ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:2314: de rat+na'am me tog gi phreng ba snang ba mtha' yas kyis rab gnas byas pas dbang bskur te/
NK055(ri)001:2315: mtshungs ldan ni rtsa dbu ma la mdud pa sum cu rtsa gnyis yod pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:2316: de nas go cha don grub kyi rab gnas can bskur te/
NK055(ri)001:2317: lus la rtsa'i d+r+wa bas khyab pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:2318: de nas chu srin la sogs pa'i rgyal mtshan mi bskyod pa'i rab gnas can bskur te/
NK055(ri)001:2319: mtshungs ldan ni gsang ba'i dbang po'o //
NK055(ri)001:2320: de nas phyag rgya'i dbang la rgyas pa dang bsdus pa gnyis/
NK055(ri)001:2321: rgyas pa la dkyil 'khor gsum gyi 'bring po'i dbang du byas te/
NK055(ri)001:2322: le'u byang rnams kyis dbang bskur ba ni gzhung bzhin du bskur ba'i gnas ni spyi bo/
NK055(ri)001:2323: bstim pa'i gnas ni thugs ka rim bzhin du bya ste/
NK055(ri)001:2324: so so rang skal gyi rtog pa dag nas lha de'i ngo bor gyur par bsgom/
NK055(ri)001:2325: bsdus pa yin na phyag rgya lnga ste/
NK055(ri)001:2326: bskur thabs sngar dang 'dra ba las rdo rjes dbang
NK055(ri)001:2327: bskur bas rang byung gi ye shes dang ldan pa
NK055(ri)001:2328: dang / 'khor los dbang bskur bas 'gro ba'i rgyud la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /
NK055(ri)001:2329: rat+nasa dbang bskur bas gdul bya'i dgos 'dod skong ba dang /
NK055(ri)001:2330: pad+mas dbang bskur bas mtha' gnyis kyi skyon gyis ma gos pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:2331: ral gris dbang bskur bas bdag gzhan gyi mtha' ganya sa las rgyal ba'i dbang ngo //
NK055(ri)001:2332: rgyas pa'i mtshungs ldan ni rtog pa bzhi bcu zhe gnyis so //
NK055(ri)001:2333: bsdus pa'i mtshungs ldan ni phung po lnga'o //
NK055(ri)001:2334: de nas dar ram ras sam rma bya la sogs
NK055(ri)001:2335: rgyu bzang po las byas pa'i gdugs rnam snang gi
NK055(ri)001:2337: mtshungs ldan ni spyi bo bde chen gyi 'khor lo'o //
NK055(ri)001:2338: de nas bza' btung zhal zas kyi dbang bskur te/
NK055(ri)001:2339: byin rlabs byas pas bdud rtsi'i kha la las 'dod yon gyi lha mo rnams spro bas bskor te/
NK055(ri)001:2340: mtshungs ldan ni mgrin pa dngos grub kyi 'khor lo'o //
NK055(ri)001:2341: snying po lngas dbang bskur te/
NK055(ri)001:2342: sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las kyi lha rnams bkod pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:2343: de ltar phan pa'i dbang bskur nas nyan nus na nyan pa'i dbang bskur te/
NK055(ri)001:2344: de nas nus pa'i dbang la lnga'i nyan pa'i dbang ni/
NK055(ri)001:2345: nyan byed 'khor lo'i gzhal yas su //
NK055(ri)001:2347: nyan pa'i dbang bskur ba'i gnas ni nyan byed ni sgra nyan par byed pa rna ba'i dbang po'o //
NK055(ri)001:2348: 'khor lo ni sgra rgyun mi chad pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:2349: gzhal yas su ni der gzhal yas khang bsgom pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:2350: rna ba gnyis 'dus pa'i ngo bo'i rtsa'i nang na
NK055(ri)001:2351: sgra mi 'gag par byed pa'i bcud 'dus pa'i thig
NK055(ri)001:2352: le shin tu dwangs pa zhig gnas pa ni mtshungs
NK055(ri)001:2353: ldan gyi rgyu'o // der thig le zhig bzhag pa la b+h+r+aum du bsgom/
NK055(ri)001:2354: b+h+r+aum zhu ba las rtsa'i tsakra gzhal yas khang 'og
NK055(ri)001:2355: gzhi 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi lte ba dang bcas pa
NK055(ri)001:2356: sgo bzhi dang bcas pa'i rin po che'i gzhal yas
NK055(ri)001:2357: chung ngu gcig bsgom/ rtsibs bzhi'i lte ba dang lnga la pad zla nyi ma'i gdan sum brtsegs lnga bsgom/
NK055(ri)001:2358: sgo bzhir nyi ma bzhi bsgom/
NK055(ri)001:2359: t+r+aam gi phyag rgya'i tshogs mchog las //
NK055(ri)001:2360: zhes pa 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi'i lte ba dang lnga la t+r+aam zung lnga bsgom/
NK055(ri)001:2361: de nas t+r+aam zung lnga ya bcu 'od du zhu
NK055(ri)001:2362: ba las rin chen 'byung ldan 'khor dang bcas pa'i
NK055(ri)001:2363: yab yum bcur gyur te bskyed/
NK055(ri)001:2364: dbus su rin chen 'byung ldan dang yum m+aa ma k+ai/
NK055(ri)001:2365: de'i mdun du rdo rje rin chen dang phreng ba ma/
NK055(ri)001:2366: g.yas su rdo rje gzi brjid dang me tog ma/
NK055(ri)001:2367: rgyab tu rdo rje rgyal mtshan dang zhags pa ma/
NK055(ri)001:2368: g.yon du rdo rje bzhad pa dang bde ba ma/
NK055(ri)001:2369: kun kyang sku mdog ser po/
NK055(ri)001:2370: sgo bzhir h'u phata bzhi las khro bo yab yum bzhi ste/
NK055(ri)001:2371: dkyil 'khor gyi sgo bzhi dang mthun/
NK055(ri)001:2372: lha bco brgyad po de bskyed thon pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:2373: thugs ka nas 'od zer spros te rang bzhin gyi
NK055(ri)001:2374: gnas nas bco brgyad po gzhal yas khang dang bcas
NK055(ri)001:2375: pa spyan drangs la rna ba'i lha la bstim/
NK055(ri)001:2376: de la bdud rtsi'i mchod pa zhig byed pa yang 'byung ste/
NK055(ri)001:2378: dkyil 'khor 'od du zhu nas rna ba la thim/
NK055(ri)001:2379: de nyid du slob ma nyid rin chen 'byung ldan
NK055(ri)001:2380: rin po che dang dril bu bsnams pa longs skur
NK055(ri)001:2381: bskyed/ dbang rdzas po ti lag tu gtad de bskur ba'i tshig /t+r+aam/
NK055(ri)001:2382: gsang ba gsang chen gsang mchog gang //
NK055(ri)001:2384: t+r+aam ni 'bod pa rigs kyi sa bon/
NK055(ri)001:2385: gsang ba ma h+aa yo ga /gsang chen a nu/
NK055(ri)001:2386: gsang mchog a ti gang yin pa rnams/
NK055(ri)001:2387: gsang ba kun las mnyan par bya //
NK055(ri)001:2389: gsang ba kun las mnyan pa/
NK055(ri)001:2390: gsang ba'i de nyid brtag pa las //
NK055(ri)001:2391: zhes pa grogs po dang zin ma zin gtam dbang yod kyi/
NK055(ri)001:2392: slob dpon gyi dbang ma thob par slob dpon gyis bshad pa mi dbang bar/
NK055(ri)001:2393: gzhan du smra bar bya ba min //
NK055(ri)001:2395: nyan dbang thob pa'i smon lam yang gdab bo //
NK055(ri)001:2396: de nas bsgrub nus na bsgrub pa'i dbang bskur ba ni/
NK055(ri)001:2397: gsal ba'i 'khor lo'i gzhal yas su //
NK055(ri)001:2398: zhes pa la sogs pa te/
NK055(ri)001:2399: yid kyi shes pa gsal ba'i bdag nyid snying ga'o //
NK055(ri)001:2400: 'khor lo ni gsal ba rgyun mi 'chad pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:2401: gzhal yas su ni thig le'i thigs pa las b+h+r+aum
NK055(ri)001:2402: dmar smug 'od du zhu ba las gzhal yas khang
NK055(ri)001:2403: gdan dang bcas pa sngar dang 'dra bar gyur/
NK055(ri)001:2404: gsal ba'i thig le'i ngo bo nyid //
NK055(ri)001:2405: ces pa rig pa gsal ba la dwangs pa'i thig le yod pa de mtshungs ldan gyi rgyu yin/
NK055(ri)001:2406: yi ge phreng ba'i tshogs mchog las //
NK055(ri)001:2408: yi dam de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs yin na /
NK055(ri)001:2409: rdo rje'i rigs yin na h'u/
NK055(ri)001:2412: las kyi rigs na h+aa ste thams cad rdo rje rigs yin pas/
NK055(ri)001:2413: h'u zung lnga ya bcu las/
NK055(ri)001:2414: rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gsal spro thim //
NK055(ri)001:2415: zhes pa rigs lnga'i gang bsgom pa bzung ste/
NK055(ri)001:2416: 'dir rdo rje'i rigs bsgom pa yin pas/
NK055(ri)001:2417: rdo rje rigs kyi lha ste dbus su mi bskyod pa dang bud+d+ha spyan gnyis/
NK055(ri)001:2418: de'i mdun du rdo rje sems dpa' dang sgeg mo/
NK055(ri)001:2419: g.yas su rdo rje rgyal po dang bdug pa ma/
NK055(ri)001:2420: rgyab tu rdo rje zhags pa dang lcags kyu ma/
NK055(ri)001:2421: g.yon du rdo rje legs pa dang sgrol ma sbyor ba'i tshul du bsgom/
NK055(ri)001:2422: sgo bzhir sgo ba yab yum sngar dang 'dra/
NK055(ri)001:2423: ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs la bstim/
NK055(ri)001:2424: 'od du zhu ba thugs kar thim/
NK055(ri)001:2425: slob ma mi bskyod par bskyed/
NK055(ri)001:2426: dbang rdzas phreng ba lag tu gtad de/
NK055(ri)001:2428: dus gsum rgyal ba'i sras chen po //
NK055(ri)001:2430: rigs kyi bu khyod sgrub pa byed pas dus gsum gyi rgyal ba rnams kyi gdung 'tshob pa yin te/
NK055(ri)001:2431: sras ni byang chub sems dpa' la'ang yod kyang khyod gsang sngags kyi sgo nas sras chen po yin/
NK055(ri)001:2432: yi dam lha'i sku rdo rje lta bu/
NK055(ri)001:2434: thugs rdo rje lta bu la/
NK055(ri)001:2435: zung ni rgyun du gnas par gyis shig pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:2436: bsgrub pa'i ngos nas dus gsum gyi rgyal ba thams cad mchod pas mnyes par gyis la/
NK055(ri)001:2437: de ltar bsgrub pa'i dus su yang lus ngag yid
NK055(ri)001:2438: gsum rgyal ba'i sku gsung thugs dang mnyam par sbyor
NK055(ri)001:2439: la mthar 'bras bu yang de nyid thob par gyis
NK055(ri)001:2440: shig pa'o // de nas bdag gzhan gyi don du phrin las bsgrub nus na/
NK055(ri)001:2441: phrin las kyi dbang bskur te/
NK055(ri)001:2442: lag pa'i mthil gnyis brtsegs la thig le bzhag ste/
NK055(ri)001:2443: b+h+r+aum 'od du zhu ba las gzhal yas khang gdan dang bcas pa sngar dang 'dra bar bsgom/
NK055(ri)001:2444: gsal ba'i thig le'i ngo bo nyid //
NK055(ri)001:2445: ces pa lag pa'i rtsa la bya ba thams cad
NK055(ri)001:2446: ngo bo nyid kyis 'grub par byed pa'i rtsa'i dwangs
NK055(ri)001:2447: ma yod pa ni mtshungs ldan gyi rgyu'o //
NK055(ri)001:2448: de gnyis kyi ngo bo nyid las gzhal yas kyi
NK055(ri)001:2449: gdan thog tu h+aam zung lnga ya bcu sgo ba'i
NK055(ri)001:2450: yi ge dang bcas pa bsgom/
NK055(ri)001:2451: yi ge 'od du zhu ba las dbus su don grub dang sgrol ma/
NK055(ri)001:2452: mdun du rdo rje las dang yum gar mkhan ma/
NK055(ri)001:2453: g.yas su rdo rje bsrung ba dang dri chab ma gnyis/
NK055(ri)001:2454: rgyab tu rdo rje gnod sbyin dang dril bu ma gnyis/
NK055(ri)001:2455: g.yon du rdo rje khu tshur dang 'bebs ma gnyis sbyor ba'i tshul du bsgom/
NK055(ri)001:2456: sgo bzhir sgo ba sngar dang 'dra/
NK055(ri)001:2457: spros thim zhes pas 'od zer spros pas ye shes pa spyan drangs la bstim/
NK055(ri)001:2458: gzhal yas khang dang bcas pa 'od du zhu nas lag pa thim/
NK055(ri)001:2459: slob ma don yod grub pa phyag mtshan dang bcas par bsgom/
NK055(ri)001:2460: dbang rdzas rdo rje rgya gram lag tu gtad la bskur byang ni //
NK055(ri)001:2461: khyod ni rdo rje sogs te/
NK055(ri)001:2462: rigs kyi bu khyod ni rdo rje las su dbang bskur bas/
NK055(ri)001:2464: phrin las rnam pa bzhi ma lus pa kun bdag
NK055(ri)001:2465: gzhan gyi don du gyis shig /khyod dbang bskur bas
NK055(ri)001:2466: las 'grub par byed pa'i pho nya'i 'phro 'du kun/
NK055(ri)001:2467: rigs kyi bu khyod kyi dgos pa thams cad byed pa yin zhes so //
NK055(ri)001:2469: de nas 'chad par nus na 'chad pa'i dbang bskur te/
NK055(ri)001:2470: smra byed 'khor lo'i gzhal yas su //
NK055(ri)001:2473: der thig le bzhag pa las b+h+r+aum las gzhal yas khang sngar dang 'dra ba gdan dang bcas pa bsgom/
NK055(ri)001:2474: gsal ba'i thig le'i ngo bo nyid //
NK055(ri)001:2475: zhes pa lce la sgra gsal bar byed pa'i rtsa'i
NK055(ri)001:2476: dwangs ma thig le'i ngo bo nyid yod pa mtshungs
NK055(ri)001:2477: ldan gyi rgyu ste/ de nyid ngo bo las hrihzunga
NK055(ri)001:2478: lnga ya bcu sgo ba'i yii ge dang bcas pa
NK055(ri)001:2479: ldan gyi rgyu ste/ bsgom/ h+r+aihzunga lnga ya bcu 'od
NK055(ri)001:2480: du zhu ba las dbus su snang mtha' dang gos
NK055(ri)001:2481: ldan gyi rgyu ste/ bsgom/ dkar mo/ mdun du rdo rje chos dang dbyangs mkhan ma/
NK055(ri)001:2482: g.yas su rdo rje rnon po dang mar me ma/
NK055(ri)001:2483: rgyab tu rdo rje 'khor lo dang lcags sgrog ma/
NK055(ri)001:2484: g.yon tu rdo rje smra gsung dang gsal bkra ma rnams sbyor ba'i tshul du bsgom/
NK055(ri)001:2485: sgo bzhir khro bo yab yum sngar bzhin bsgom/
NK055(ri)001:2486: 'od zer spros nas ye shes pa spyan drangs la bstim/
NK055(ri)001:2487: dkyil 'khor lce la thim pas slob ma snang mtha' phyag mtshan dang bcas par bsgom/
NK055(ri)001:2488: dbang rdzas 'khor lo lag tu gtad de lung bstan pa ni //
NK055(ri)001:2489: chos kyi bdud rtsi bla med kyis //
NK055(ri)001:2491: mtha' gnyis kyi nad las gso ba'i gsang sngags nang pa bla na med pas/
NK055(ri)001:2492: slob ma dad pa dang ldan pa'i skyes bu sbyangs pa can shes rab dang ldan pa/
NK055(ri)001:2493: ngoms pa ni blo'i rim pa bzhin du tshim pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:2494: byos pa ni gyis shig pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:2495: 'on kyang slob ma blo rab 'bring dang tha ma'i
NK055(ri)001:2496: blo can rnams la blo dang mthun par gsang ba
NK055(ri)001:2497: bsgrags te/ blo rab la a ti/
NK055(ri)001:2499: blo tha ma la ma h+aa bshad de/
NK055(ri)001:2501: blo tha ma la rdzogs chen bshad pa lta bu mi bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:2502: de nas rdo rje rgyal po'i las nus na/
NK055(ri)001:2503: bskyod chen 'khor lo'i gzhal yas su //
NK055(ri)001:2504: zhes pa bskyod chen ni yan lag bzhi mgo dang lnga'o //
NK055(ri)001:2505: de lnga la thig le lnga bzhag ste/
NK055(ri)001:2506: mgo bo ni mtshog ma skra mtshams/
NK055(ri)001:2508: rkang pa'i bol gnyis der thig le lnga las b+h+r+aum gyur/
NK055(ri)001:2509: b+h+r+aum 'od du zhu ba las gzhal yas khang 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi gdan dang bcas pa lnga bsgom/
NK055(ri)001:2510: de yang rkang lag bzhi ni sor mo lnga'i ngo bo'o //
NK055(ri)001:2511: mgo ni dbang po bzhi mgo dngos dang lnga'i ngo bo'o //
NK055(ri)001:2513: des/ bskyod chen 'khor lo'i gzhal yas su //
NK055(ri)001:2514: gsal ba'i thig le'i ngo bo nyid //
NK055(ri)001:2516: mgo yan lag gi spyi yin pa la spyi la
NK055(ri)001:2517: khyab pa'i rtsa'i dwangs ma gnas dag na rnam par
NK055(ri)001:2518: snang mdzad kyi ngo bo yin pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:2519: lag pa g.yas pa rdo rje'i rigs kyi ngo bo/
NK055(ri)001:2521: rkang pa g.yas pa las kyi rigs/
NK055(ri)001:2523: de dag gi ngo bo rtsa'i dwangs ma thig le'i tshul du gnas pa ni mtshungs ldan gyi rgyu'o //
NK055(ri)001:2524: de rnams la yi ge'i 'brur gsal ba ni/
NK055(ri)001:2526: mgo'i 'khor lo la +amo zung lnga ya bcu/
NK055(ri)001:2527: lag pa g.yas pa la h'u zung lnga ya bcu/
NK055(ri)001:2528: g.yon pa la t+r+aam zung lnga ya bcu/
NK055(ri)001:2529: rkang pa g.yon pa la h+r+aihzunga lnga ya bcu/
NK055(ri)001:2530: g.yas pa la h+aa zung lnga ya bcu/
NK055(ri)001:2531: dkyil 'khor dang lnga khro phreng bsgom //
NK055(ri)001:2532: zhes pa rigs lnga'i dkyil 'khor lnga ste/
NK055(ri)001:2533: dbu'i 'od du zhu ba las dbus su rnam par snang mdzad dang thams cad bdag nyid ma/
NK055(ri)001:2534: mdun du rdo rje sems dpa' dang brtan ma rdo rje gnyis/
NK055(ri)001:2535: g.yon du rin chen rdo rje dang sdud ma rdo rje gnyis/
NK055(ri)001:2536: rgyab tu chos kyi rdo rje dang 'bar ma rdo rje gnyis/
NK055(ri)001:2537: g.yon du las kyi rdo rje dang spyod ma rdo rje sbyor ba'i tshul du bsgom/
NK055(ri)001:2538: lag pa g.yas pa h'u las sngar snying gar bsgom pa'i yab yum bcu bsgom/
NK055(ri)001:2539: g.yon pa'i t+r+aam las sngar rna ba la bsgom pa'i yab yum bcu bsgom/
NK055(ri)001:2540: rkang pa g.yas pa'i h+aa las sngar lag pa la bsgom pa'i yab yum bcu bsgom/
NK055(ri)001:2541: g.yon pa h+r+aihls sngar lce la bsgom pa'i yab yum bcu bsgom/
NK055(ri)001:2542: phyi rol 'khor bar khro bo yab yum nyi shu bsgom/
NK055(ri)001:2543: de ltar bsgom thon pa dang dbu'i thugs ka nas 'od zer spros/
NK055(ri)001:2544: rang bzhin gyi gnas nas ye shes dpa' yab yum bcu spyan drangs la dbu'i dam tshig pa la bstim/
NK055(ri)001:2545: de nas lag g.yas pa'i lha las 'od zer spros te ye shes pa spyan drangs la bstim/
NK055(ri)001:2546: gsum po la'ang de bzhin du bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:2547: khro bo bcu la yang 'od zer spros te ye
NK055(ri)001:2548: shes pa re rang bzhin gyi gnas nas spyan drangs
NK055(ri)001:2549: la bstim/ de nas dbu'i lha 'od du zhu bas dbu la thim/
NK055(ri)001:2550: yan lag bzhi po'ang 'od du zhu nas so sor thim /
NK055(ri)001:2551: khro bo bcu yang 'od du zhu ste sku la thim/
NK055(ri)001:2552: slob ma nyid las kun tu bzang po zhal gsum phyag drug par bsgom ste/
NK055(ri)001:2553: sku mdog sngon po zhal g.yas dkar g.yon dmar/
NK055(ri)001:2554: phyag drug gi dang po gnyis kyis rdo rje dril bu bsnams te yum la 'khyud pa'i phyag rgya/
NK055(ri)001:2555: bar pa gnyis pang du mnyam bzhag /tha ma gnyis
NK055(ri)001:2556: kyis phyogs bcu'i bud+d+ha bsdu ba'i phyag rgya se gol
NK055(ri)001:2557: gtogs pa/ zhabs skyil krung gis bzhugs pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:2558: de nas dbang rdzas ni g.yas par rdo rje g.yon par dril bu gtad la //
NK055(ri)001:2559: phyogs bcu dus bzhi thams cad kyi //
NK055(ri)001:2561: +amo ye shes rnam pa lnga'i mgo 'dren no //
NK055(ri)001:2562: phyogs bcu na bzhugs shing dus bzhir gshegs pa'i bud+d+ha thams cad sku rdo rjee lta bu dang /
NK055(ri)001:2563: gsung rdo rje lta bu dang /
NK055(ri)001:2564: thugs rdo rje lta bu dang ldan pa'i bdag nyid
NK055(ri)001:2565: du khyod dbang bskur ba yin pas khyod la de
NK055(ri)001:2566: dag gi byin rlabs dang nus pa yod pas gsang
NK055(ri)001:2567: sngags kyi gzhung gi dkyil 'khor thams cad la mnga'
NK055(ri)001:2568: brnyes shing dbang bsgyur ba'i byed pa po yin pas/
NK055(ri)001:2569: slob ma gang la gang dad la dkyil 'khor kun
NK055(ri)001:2570: gyi sgo nas dbang bskur zhing dkyil 'khor bsgom par
NK055(ri)001:2571: gnyer gtad pa'i sbyin pa spyod ces so //
NK055(ri)001:2572: zab mo'i dbang gsum bstan pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:2573: gong shes rab thabs kyi phyag rgya las //
NK055(ri)001:2574: zhes pa la sogs pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:2575: slob ma la zab mo'i dbang gsum len pa'i nus pa dang ldan te/
NK055(ri)001:2576: brtul zhugs gsum gang dang gang yin pa dang ldan na dbang gsum rim pa bzhin du bskur te/
NK055(ri)001:2577: dang po gsang ba'i dbang ni/
NK055(ri)001:2578: shes rab thabs kyi phyag rgya las //
NK055(ri)001:2580: shes rab ni yum lo grangs dang mtshan nyid dang ldan pa ste yum/
NK055(ri)001:2582: dbang gi gal po nas bstan pa bzhin no //
NK055(ri)001:2583: thabs ni yab rdo rje slob dpon te rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:2584: der yum yang yum du bsgom ste/
NK055(ri)001:2585: yab yum gnyis kyi mkha' gsang byin gyis brlab pa gzhung bzhin bya/
NK055(ri)001:2586: dbang du sor bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor cho ga bzhin
NK055(ri)001:2587: byas pa bzhag /de la yum gyi mkhar byang chub
NK055(ri)001:2588: sems las gzhal yas khang bskyed/
NK055(ri)001:2589: byang sems las yig 'bru rnams bkod/
NK055(ri)001:2590: de la skur gsal ba dkyil 'khor rgyas par bskyed/
NK055(ri)001:2591: ye shes pa spyan drangs la bstim/
NK055(ri)001:2592: mchod pa rnams rgyas par bya/
NK055(ri)001:2593: slob ma dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i cho ga yang gzhung bzhin bya/
NK055(ri)001:2594: de nas dngos gzhi ni shes rab ni yum byin gyis brlab pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:2595: thabs ni rdo rje slob dpon te lha'i ting nge 'dzin dang bcas pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:2596: phyag rgya ni phyag rgya rnam pa bzhi ste/
NK055(ri)001:2597: dzahmh'u bam hohbazhi'i las kyi yab yum rol pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:2599: thabs dang shes rab dbyer med par rol bas myong
NK055(ri)001:2600: ba'i ye shes kyi bde ba dang bcas pa'i sems
NK055(ri)001:2601: kyi rgyun yig 'bru h'u gi tshogs su gsal ba'i
NK055(ri)001:2603: rdo rje'i lam nas zhes pa/
NK055(ri)001:2604: gsang ba'i rdo rje nyid byang sems h'u du gsal ba nyid 'grim pa'i lam yin pa de nas/
NK055(ri)001:2606: rdo rje'i rtse mo nas 'phros pas yum gyi mkhar 'khyil ba de/
NK055(ri)001:2608: zhes pa yab kyi ljags rdo rje rtse lnga par byin gyis brlabsa pas/
NK055(ri)001:2609: yum gyi mkha' nas blangs te/
NK055(ri)001:2610: slob ma'i lce la gtigs pa la ni/
NK055(ri)001:2613: byang chub kyi sems h'u gi tshogs su gsal ba slob ma'i lce thog tu bzhag pa de/
NK055(ri)001:2614: slob mas h'u gi tshogs su gsal ba mid de snying ga chos kyi 'khor lor phyin tsa/
NK055(ri)001:2615: chos kyi tsakra'i rtsa la a n+ri la sogs pa'i
NK055(ri)001:2616: rigs drug gi sa bon h'u gi 'od zer gyis
NK055(ri)001:2617: bsregs te h'u gi tshogs las rdo rje sems dpa'
NK055(ri)001:2618: thim pa nam par gyur nas/
NK055(ri)001:2619: de la lung sum rgyud du bsgom ste/
NK055(ri)001:2620: skabs der gsang ba nang gi phan pa'i dbang bcu/
NK055(ri)001:2621: shun gyi cod pan la sogs pa bskur ro //
NK055(ri)001:2622: sbyin tshul de la ni thabs kyi gsang dbang zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:2623: shes rab kyi gsang dbang dang phyi'i gsang dbang yang bskur ro //
NK055(ri)001:2624: shes rab ye shes kyi dbang ni/
NK055(ri)001:2625: yang gzungs ma bde ba chen po'i yum gyi mtshan
NK055(ri)001:2626: nyid rnams dang ldan pa la gsang ba'i dbang thob
NK055(ri)001:2627: pa yum du bsgom/ yan lag byin gyis brlab/
NK055(ri)001:2628: mkha' gsang byin gyis brlab pa ni shes rab bo //
NK055(ri)001:2629: thabs ni slob ma ste rdo rje sems dpar bsgom/
NK055(ri)001:2630: yan lag gi lha rnams bkod/
NK055(ri)001:2631: mkha' gsang byin gyis brlab pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:2632: 'di la gong sgo'i thabs lam la goms/
NK055(ri)001:2633: rlung bzung ste byang sems dbab bzlog la dbang thob pa dgos/
NK055(ri)001:2634: phyag rgya ni sngar dang 'dra ste sgo bzhi'i phyag rgyas yab yum rol pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:2635: bde ba'i 'bru tshogs ni rten gyi ye shes gsal
NK055(ri)001:2636: ba'i ngang la rten can gyi ye shes bde stong
NK055(ri)001:2637: dbyer med kyi ngo bo rig pa gsal ba'i rgyun
NK055(ri)001:2638: rten dang rten can gyi ye shes dbyer med pa
NK055(ri)001:2639: skad cig ma bcu drug gi rgyun dang bcas pa'o
NK055(ri)001:2640: // 'di'i dus su gsang ba'i lha mo bcu gnyis ngos bzung bar yang bshad/
NK055(ri)001:2641: rdo rje ni byin gyis brlabsa pa'i ting nge 'dzin
NK055(ri)001:2642: dang ldan pa'i gsang ba'i rdo rje de ni lhan
NK055(ri)001:2643: cig skyes pa'i ye shes rten dang brten par bcas
NK055(ri)001:2644: pa'i rten rdo rje'i lam nas byung nas shes rab
NK055(ri)001:2646: rtse nas bstim zhing zhes pa/
NK055(ri)001:2647: slob ma gong sgo'i rlung la goms pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:2649: rig pa yang dbang cung thob pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:2650: sa'i rlung rgyu ba dang 'dzom pa'i dus su go bzlog ste/
NK055(ri)001:2651: mkha' nas rdo rje'i rtse mo na tshur la bstims
NK055(ri)001:2652: shing bzlog pas byang sems gyen du bzlogs te sngar
NK055(ri)001:2653: gyi phung po'i gnas rnams su bstim zhing gnas rnams
NK055(ri)001:2655: rtog tshogs rnams lha'am ye shes su gnyis med du gsal ba la ni dkyil 'khor bsgyur zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:2656: de la yang byang sems blang thabs gsum yang shes par bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:2657: shin tu brtan pa'i dbang ni dbang gi 'bras bu lta bu yang yin te/
NK055(ri)001:2658: thabs lam lam du slob pa'ang yin pas/
NK055(ri)001:2659: gong gi bshad pa gnyis po'i don nyams su blangs pa yin pas des 'bras bu la sbyor ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:2660: des na rnal 'byor rab kyis nyams su blang ba ni gnyis des mchog go //
NK055(ri)001:2661: dbang ma thob pa'i skyon ni/
NK055(ri)001:2662: 'og slob dpon mnyes par ma byas shing //
NK055(ri)001:2664: rdo rje slob dpon ni tshe 'di dang phyi ma
NK055(ri)001:2665: 'bras bu byang chub ma thob bar du yon tan
NK055(ri)001:2666: thams cad 'byung bas spyod lam ci'i sgo nas kyang
NK055(ri)001:2667: mnyes par bya dgos pa la/
NK055(ri)001:2668: lus ngag yid gsum gyis mnyes par ma byas na/
NK055(ri)001:2669: skyon thams cad kyi rtsa ba yin pas so //
NK055(ri)001:2670: slob dpon mnyes par byas kyang /
NK055(ri)001:2671: dbang rnams thob par ma byas par //
NK055(ri)001:2673: phan pa'i dbang bcu ni snod dag par byas pa lta bu yin pas kun gyi thog mar 'agre'o //
NK055(ri)001:2674: nyan pa'i dbang ma thob par nyan par rtsom pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:2675: sogs khongs su bsgrub pa'i dbang ma thob par bsgrub par rtsom pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:2676: phrin las kyi dbang ma thob par phrin las rtsom pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:2677: 'chad pa'i dbang ma thob par 'chad par rtsom pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:2678: rdo rje rgyal po'i dbang ma thob par gzhan la dbang bskur rtsom pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:2679: gsang sngags byin rlabs kyi lam pa yin pas dbang
NK055(ri)001:2680: thob nas gzod pa rtsams na byin rlabs kyi ngo
NK055(ri)001:2681: bo snang ba'i dbang gis 'grub la/
NK055(ri)001:2682: dbang ma thob na byin rlabs brgyud pa chad pa'i dbang gis mi snang bas/
NK055(ri)001:2683: lnga po gang yang nyan dbang ma thob na nyan pa 'bras bu med de/
NK055(ri)001:2684: sems kyi rgyud la mi phan/
NK055(ri)001:2685: bdag gzhan gyi rgyud dgrol bar mi nus pas dam
NK055(ri)001:2686: tshig nyams pa'i dbang gis tshe phyi ma la dmyal
NK055(ri)001:2688: de bzhin du bzhi po la yang de dang 'dra
NK055(ri)001:2689: bar tshe 'di la 'bras bu med cing phyi ma
NK055(ri)001:2690: ngan song gsum du dmyal bar brlag par 'gyur ro
NK055(ri)001:2691: // phan dbang gi yon tan ni/
NK055(ri)001:2692: 'og dus 'di phyin chad rgyal ba'i sras //
NK055(ri)001:2694: phan pa'i dbang thob pa'i dus skad cig ma phyin chad la/
NK055(ri)001:2696: dam tshig ma nyams gzhung bzhin du spyad na/
NK055(ri)001:2697: sku gsung thugs rdo rje lta bu'i rgyal ba'i rig
NK055(ri)001:2698: pa 'dzin pa yin pas sras su nges pa dam
NK055(ri)001:2700: ngan song thams cad med pa dang //
NK055(ri)001:2701: zhes pa dmyal ba yi dwags byol song gsum du mi skye ste/
NK055(ri)001:2702: sngar rgyu dang las sa bon bag cig yod kyang
NK055(ri)001:2703: me 'bar ba la sbrang bu mi chud pa dang
NK055(ri)001:2704: 'dra bar/ dbang bskur ba'i byin rlabs kyis nyes pa thams cad dag ste mi gnas par byed do //
NK055(ri)001:2705: de ni tshe phyi ma'i yon tan no //
NK055(ri)001:2706: tshe 'di'i yon tan ni yon tan thams cad kyi rtsa ba tshe ring ba yin pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:2707: gzhan yang bde ba phun sum tshogs //
NK055(ri)001:2708: zhes pa longs spyod che ba dang /
NK055(ri)001:2713: thams cad kyis bkur ba dang /
NK055(ri)001:2714: yid la ci 'dod pa thams cad lhun gyis grub bo //
NK055(ri)001:2715: phyi ma la lha dang mir skye nas kyang kun la mnga' brnyes pa'i dbang por gyur te/
NK055(ri)001:2716: lhar skyes kyang brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa lta bu'o //
NK055(ri)001:2717: mir skyes kyang 'khor los sgyur ba dang mkhar gyi rgyal por skye'o //
NK055(ri)001:2718: de bas na mtho ris zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:2720: nus pa'i dbang thob nas thar pa'i lam ston pa'i bdag po ste/
NK055(ri)001:2721: sprul skur gyur nas 'gro drug la thar pa'i lam ston par 'gyur ro //
NK055(ri)001:2722: longs skur gyur nas zag med kyi lam pa rnams
NK055(ri)001:2723: la sa lam gong nas gong du 'phel zhing 'bras
NK055(ri)001:2724: bu la sbyor ba'i ston par 'gyur ro //
NK055(ri)001:2725: zab mo'i dbang thob pas ni rigs kyi bdag po drug pa rdo rje 'chang du 'gyur te/
NK055(ri)001:2726: 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid
NK055(ri)001:2727: la mnga' brnyes pa'i bdag por 'gyur zhes bya'o zhes
NK055(ri)001:2728: brjod do // zhes pa rigs kyi bdag pos go phye ba'i 'khor gyi ched du brjod pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:2729: gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/
NK055(ri)001:2730: dbang sbyin pa'i le'u zhes pa/
NK055(ri)001:2732: grangs kyi bcu pa'i bshad pa'o////le'u bcu gcig pa dang bcu gnyis pa bsdebs te bshad na/
NK055(ri)001:2733: rgyud gsum las lam gyi rgyud do //
NK055(ri)001:2734: rgyud kyi dngos po bcu las na lta ba dang tshogs bsgrub pa bstan/
NK055(ri)001:2735: dkyil 'khor bcu gnyis las tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor bstan/
NK055(ri)001:2736: lam pa lta ba rtogs nas phyag rgya spros pa yan chad kyi yul lo //
NK055(ri)001:2737: de yang lhag pa rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor la
NK055(ri)001:2738: brten te dbang thob nas bdag gzhan gyi don du
NK055(ri)001:2740: dgu par sgrub pa po dang /
NK055(ri)001:2742: 'bras bu'i thob tshul ji ltar yin bstan nas/
NK055(ri)001:2743: le'u gnyis kyis tshogs kyi 'khor lo la brten te sgrub thabs dngos bstan to //
NK055(ri)001:2745: le'u drug pa yan chad gong du bshad pa bzhin no //
NK055(ri)001:2747: brgyad par phyag rgya dang snang ba rnam par 'byed pa bstan/
NK055(ri)001:2748: le'u dgu par dbang gi dkyil 'khor bstan/
NK055(ri)001:2749: le'u bcu par dbang bskur ba dngos gzhi bstan/
NK055(ri)001:2750: dbang thob nas bdag gzhan gyi don du bsgrub pa
NK055(ri)001:2751: nyams su blang ba bcu gcig bcu gnyis su bstan
NK055(ri)001:2752: pa ste/ de la lo rgyus la gnyis kyi dang po tshogs kyi bsgrub pa la 'jug pa'i dus ni/
NK055(ri)001:2753: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa chen po zhes pa la sogs pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:2754: tshig gi de ma thag pa ni bcu pa la 'brel to //
NK055(ri)001:2755: don gyi de ma thag pa ni dbang thob spros
NK055(ri)001:2756: pa mthar phyin nas tshogs bsgrub pas der 'brel lo
NK055(ri)001:2757: // de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa chen po ni/
NK055(ri)001:2758: drug pa kun tu bzang po ste gong du yang yang bshad pa bzhin no //
NK055(ri)001:2759: sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba ni sgyu ma snang bzhin ma grub par chos kyi dbyings so //
NK055(ri)001:2760: 'phrul pa ni med bzhin du mi 'gag par snang ba rig pa rang snang ba ste/
NK055(ri)001:2761: 'dir shes rab mtshon pa'i yum rnams dang /
NK055(ri)001:2762: thabs mtshon pa'i yab rnams dang /
NK055(ri)001:2763: thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa d+r+wa ba ltar mi phyed pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:2764: de'i phyir tshogs kyi bsgrub pa 'di'i skabs su rnal 'byor pa rnams/
NK055(ri)001:2766: yum rnams yum du bsgom ste/
NK055(ri)001:2767: thabs dang shes rab d+r+wa ba ltar 'brel bar bsgom pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:2768: des yo byad rnam pa lnga las ma bkag ma
NK055(ri)001:2769: dmigs pa dbyer med pa gsum gcig tu tshogs par
NK055(ri)001:2770: lta spyod bsgom gsum mnyam pa nyid du chud pa
NK055(ri)001:2771: la yang sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:2773: tshogs kyi skabs 'dir dkyil 'khor rgyas 'bring bsdus gsum gyi lha'i grangs sam/
NK055(ri)001:2774: tshom bu rgyas 'bring bsdus gsum gyi lha'i grangs rnams
NK055(ri)001:2775: sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba'i don gyis yab yum 'brel ba
NK055(ri)001:2776: yang thams cad kyi blar gyur pas kyang rgyal po'o
NK055(ri)001:2777: // bsgrub pa nyams su blang ba'i dus su yo
NK055(ri)001:2778: byad lnga tshogs par spyad pa yang thams cad longs
NK055(ri)001:2779: spyod pa'i don gyis kyang rgyal po zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:2781: rnal 'byor pa 'dus pa che chung gi grangs mang
NK055(ri)001:2782: nyung de dag rtogs pa rnam pa bzhi'i gtan tshigs
NK055(ri)001:2783: kyis chos thams cad ma 'gag pa sku/
NK055(ri)001:2784: ma dmigs pa ye shes kho nar gsal ba'i phyir/
NK055(ri)001:2785: tha mal pa'i gzung 'dzin mi mnga' bas spyod yul thams cad yongs su dag pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:2786: lta bsgom gnyis kyis chos thams cad rtogs pa rnam
NK055(ri)001:2787: gnyis su gsal ba ni tha mal las spags pas
NK055(ri)001:2789: ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas zhes pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:2790: gong du bshad pa'i rgyal po dang bsgyur ba gnyis
NK055(ri)001:2791: kyi don go phye ba'i 'khor la snang ba'i dgongs
NK055(ri)001:2793: thams cad mkhyen pa la bzhengs bzhugs mi mnga' yang //
NK055(ri)001:2794: gdul bya'i snang ba kho na'o //
NK055(ri)001:2795: bsgrub pa nyams su blangs pa'i dus ni/
NK055(ri)001:2796: de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po zhes pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:2797: de nas zhes pa tshig gi de ma thag pa ni bcu gcig pa la 'brel to //
NK055(ri)001:2798: don gyi de ma thag pa ni le'u bcu gcig
NK055(ri)001:2799: par bsnyen pa nye bsnyen gong du song nas bsgrub
NK055(ri)001:2801: dgyes pa chen po yan chad bshad pa yin bzhin no //
NK055(ri)001:2802: rol mo'i sprin rnam par 'phros te zhes pa/
