NK055(ri)001:2803: rol mo ni ngo bo'i gzhi ma nges pa las
NK055(ri)001:2804: thabs kyi bye brag gi rim pa sna tshogs kyis
NK055(ri)001:2805: gzhan gyi yid 'dren par byed pa'i bye brag sna
NK055(ri)001:2806: tshogs su snang bas ltad mo ba thams cad kyi
NK055(ri)001:2807: yid tshim par byed pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:2808: 'dir ni dngos grub nyams su len pa'i thabs te/
NK055(ri)001:2809: de yang dngos grub nyid rang rig la gzhi gang
NK055(ri)001:2810: du'ang ma nges pa las rnal 'byor pa'i blo'i rim
NK055(ri)001:2811: pa bzhin cir yang 'char ba zad pa med pa
NK055(ri)001:2812: sprin rnam par 'phro ba lta bu'am/
NK055(ri)001:2813: yang na rol mo ni dngos te yo byad lnga yin la/
NK055(ri)001:2815: rol mo longs spyod kyi tshogs gtibs pa rgyun chad
NK055(ri)001:2816: med pa las lta spyod bsgom gsum 'phrugs pa'i stobs
NK055(ri)001:2817: kyis rnam par 'phros pa ni rnal 'byor pa'i dbang
NK055(ri)001:2818: po'i mtho dman rim pa bzhin du/
NK055(ri)001:2819: dngos grub kyi tshogs rnams rang snang ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:2820: spyir bsgrub pa dngos kyi skabs 'dir bsnyen pa nye
NK055(ri)001:2821: bsnyen stobs su gyur pas lta bsgom stobs su gyur
NK055(ri)001:2822: te/ spyod pa rang snang ba nyid rig pa rang
NK055(ri)001:2823: snang gi ngo bo nyid du lhun gyis grub pa
NK055(ri)001:2824: rnal 'byor pa'i blos byed mi dgos par rang shar
NK055(ri)001:2826: tshogs kyi longs spyod la spyod pa nyid na ye
NK055(ri)001:2827: shes kyi spyod pa rang shar ba nyid las ma
NK055(ri)001:2828: gtogs pa tha mal pa zur tsam yang mi gnas
NK055(ri)001:2830: zhes pa ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par te/
NK055(ri)001:2831: 'dir rnal 'byor pa lta bsgom stobs su phyin pa'i
NK055(ri)001:2832: dus su spyod pa'i dngos po nyid rig pa chos
NK055(ri)001:2833: nyid ma skyes pa'i ngang las rang snang ma 'gag
NK055(ri)001:2834: pa snang ba bzhin ma grub pa sgyu ma lta
NK055(ri)001:2835: bu'i/ snang stong dbyer med pa mnyam pa nyid kyi
NK055(ri)001:2836: phyag rgya mang po rang snang ba la bkod pa
NK055(ri)001:2837: bu'i/ zhes bya ste/ de dag rang snang phyi nang
NK055(ri)001:2838: gi chos thams cad 'khor 'das dbyer med pa gnyis
NK055(ri)001:2839: su med par lta spyod bsgom gsum dbyer med par
NK055(ri)001:2840: bsgrub pa'i thabs su mdzes pa la ni rgyan zhes
NK055(ri)001:2841: bu'i/ zhes bya ste/ bya'o // rang snang lhun gyis grub pa la ni bkod pa zhes bya ste/
NK055(ri)001:2842: der snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa ni gdul bya'i snang ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:2843: go phye ba'i 'khor gyi ched du brjod pa 'og nas 'byung ba 'di dag brjod ces bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:2844: tshogs kyi gzhung mdor bstan pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:2848: 'dir lam kun gyi sdom yang yin pas bskyed pa'i rim pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:2849: rdzogs pa'i rim pa gnyis sam/
NK055(ri)001:2850: thabs kyi lam dang shes rab kyi lam gnyis ka'i thun mong du bstan te/
NK055(ri)001:2851: de yang rig 'dzin gyi spyi bsdom/
NK055(ri)001:2852: shes pa'i mtshan nyid 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid ma nyams
NK055(ri)001:2853: par mgo mnyam pa ni sar chud pa'i gzungs kyis
NK055(ri)001:2854: zin pas/ de phyin chad 'khor bar mi ltung ba'i mtshan nyid can no //
NK055(ri)001:2855: de nas rig pa 'dzin pa'i bsgom pa'i lam rnyed de mngon du gyur pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:2856: de nas sa dgu pa man chad kyi yon tan ldan zhes kyang 'chad do //
NK055(ri)001:2857: rgyu rkyen gnyis pa la gnas pa de rgyu rkyen
NK055(ri)001:2858: gnyis tshogs nas 'bras bu thogs pa med pa'i mtshan
NK055(ri)001:2861: rgyu shes pa'i mtshan nyid ni sngon du gzhal bya
NK055(ri)001:2862: phyi nang gi chos thams cad la gsang sngags 'di
NK055(ri)001:2863: nyid kyi gtan tshigs rtogs pa rnam pa bzhi ste/
NK055(ri)001:2864: rgyu gcig pas 'khor 'das dbyer med mnyam pa nyid du rtogs/
NK055(ri)001:2865: yig 'bru'i tshul du chos thams cad skye med as mtshon pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:2866: de gsang sngags rang gzhung gi bden pa dbyer med gyis mtshon pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:2867: yi ge gsum gyi gtan tshigs kyis chos thams cad
NK055(ri)001:2868: snang stong dbyer med sku gsum du byin gyis brlab
NK055(ri)001:2869: pa dang / don de'ang bshad pa yid yul ma
NK055(ri)001:2870: yin pas rnal 'byor pa'i rig pa de nyid du
NK055(ri)001:2871: gyur nas rang rig pa'i mngon sum du gsal ba
NK055(ri)001:2872: ni theg pa 'di nyid kyi gtan tshigs te/
NK055(ri)001:2873: gzhal ba'i ngos nas gtan tshigs de nyid 'bras bu
NK055(ri)001:2874: rig pa nyid grub mthar gyur pa ni grub mtha'o
NK055(ri)001:2875: // de lta bu'i don gyis chos thams cad mnyam
NK055(ri)001:2876: pa nyid du lhun gyis grub nas rig pa mnyam
NK055(ri)001:2877: pa nyid du gyur pas lta mkhan bral/
NK055(ri)001:2878: yul mnyam pa nyid du gyur pas gzung yul ma
NK055(ri)001:2879: grub pa'i dus su chos thams cad rang snang rig
NK055(ri)001:2880: par gsal ba nyid/ snang stong gi zhe 'dod thams
NK055(ri)001:2881: cad dang bral bar lhun gyis grub pa ni mnyam
NK055(ri)001:2882: rdzogs chen po'i don zhes bya ste/
NK055(ri)001:2883: de nyid rnal 'byor pa'i rig par gsal nas don
NK055(ri)001:2884: dang rig pa dbyer med pa la ni rgyu shes
NK055(ri)001:2885: pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya ste/
NK055(ri)001:2886: lam gyi ngo bo bsgom pa'i ting nge 'dzin yin pa'i gazhi'am rgyu zhes bya ste/
NK055(ri)001:2887: de la shes pa zhes bya ba ni ting nge
NK055(ri)001:2888: 'dzin gyis goms par ma byas pa'am ma 'dris pa'i
NK055(ri)001:2889: dbang gis yengs dang ma yengs yod/
NK055(ri)001:2890: rkyen gyis 'phrog pa yod pa dang yul bral yin
NK055(ri)001:2891: kyang de la der 'dzin gyi shes pa phra ba
NK055(ri)001:2892: gcig dang bcas pas rgyu shes pa'i mtshan nyid ces
NK055(ri)001:2893: bya'o // rkyen 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid ni lta ba
NK055(ri)001:2894: de dang ldan na ting nge 'dzin gyis mnyam rdzogs
NK055(ri)001:2895: lhun grub kyi ngang la spyod yul rnam bzhir 'da'
NK055(ri)001:2896: ba med pa la ni rkyen 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid
NK055(ri)001:2898: lta bsgom gnyis de ltar yin na spyod pa ci ltar spyad ce na/
NK055(ri)001:2900: spyod pa ci la'ang thogs med pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:2902: bya nam mkha' la 'phur ba'i lam la 'dzin pa med pa bzhin/
NK055(ri)001:2903: spyod pa'i dngos po mtho dman ji ltar spyad kyang
NK055(ri)001:2904: chags zhen re dogs ched bsgrub ched spang gi shas
NK055(ri)001:2905: mi bya ba ni spyad pa'i ngo bo ste/
NK055(ri)001:2906: de lta bu'i rig pa thag chod na lta spyod
NK055(ri)001:2907: bsgom gsum mgo snyoms pa de la ni 'bras bu
NK055(ri)001:2909: tshig gi tha snyad tsam mo //
NK055(ri)001:2910: de lta bu'i rig pa gdengs chod de de nyid du yang 'dzin pa med na/
NK055(ri)001:2911: khams gsum gyi 'jigs pa dang bral nas zag med kyi lam pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:2912: nus mthu can du gang gyur pa //
NK055(ri)001:2914: de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la goms pa skyed du song ba nus pa mthu can du gyur te/
NK055(ri)001:2915: rtogs bsgom gong nas gong du 'phel nas lhun gyis
NK055(ri)001:2916: grub pa'i rig 'dzin 'byung la ma rag par gnas
NK055(ri)001:2917: pa ni dgongs pa rang gi ngo bo yongs su
NK055(ri)001:2918: smin te/ de nyid 'bras bu nye bar len pa'i phyir 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid de/
NK055(ri)001:2919: de dag ni rdzogs rim gyi lam shas che ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:2920: de la bskyed rim lha'i sku phyag rgya'i rnal 'byor ba ni/
NK055(ri)001:2921: rang gi yi dam gyi lha dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo so so gang yin pa de dang /
NK055(ri)001:2923: lam nus pa mthu can du gyur pa'i skabs na rnam smin gyi lus bzhags nas/
NK055(ri)001:2924: phyag rgya chen po'i rig 'dzin la sbyor ba dang /
NK055(ri)001:2925: lus ma bzhags nas tshe dbang gis phyag rgya chen po la sbyor ba ste/
NK055(ri)001:2926: de dag gi skabs su phyag rgya'i rnal 'byor pa
NK055(ri)001:2927: la lha'i sku rig par snang ba snang stong dbyer
NK055(ri)001:2928: med pa mnyam pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin las
NK055(ri)001:2929: ma gtogs pa'i lta spyod bsgom gsum rdzogs rim pa
NK055(ri)001:2930: dang mthun no // de dag ni blo che ba'i dbang ste/
NK055(ri)001:2931: blo dman rim 'jug gi dbang du na ting nge
NK055(ri)001:2932: 'dzin yul gyis mi 'phrog yan chad rig 'dzin zhes
NK055(ri)001:2933: bya ste/ ting nge 'dzin gyi 'gal rkyen dag pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:2934: 'on kyang ting nge 'dzin gyi ngo bo nyid du
NK055(ri)001:2935: gyur pa min pa bsgom bya sgom byed kyi yid
NK055(ri)001:2936: la byed pa ni 'dir mi chud de/
NK055(ri)001:2937: rdo rje'i theg pa chen po zhes brjod pas ting
NK055(ri)001:2938: nge 'dzin la yul dang yul can gyi brtags pa
NK055(ri)001:2939: dang / don spyi yid la byed pa'i spyi'i mtshan nyid tsam la 'dzin pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:2940: rgyu rkyen gzhan gyis bsgrub cing gzhan dbang las yongs su grol ba'i phyir ro //
NK055(ri)001:2941: rim 'jug 'di nyid kyis tshe dbang la sogs kyi rig 'dzin gsum nyams su myong ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:2942: yo ga la sogs pa'i lugs kyi lam pa dag gis 'di'i don la mi chud do //
NK055(ri)001:2945: rgyu gcig pa dang yig 'bru'i tshul //
NK055(ri)001:2946: zhes pa la sogs te lta ba'i gtan tshigs ston te/
NK055(ri)001:2947: zhen pa dag pas lhag pa'i chos sku nyid/
NK055(ri)001:2948: me long g.ya' dag na gzugs brnyan phun sum tshogs
NK055(ri)001:2949: pa nyid khams gsum dang lam gyi 'du shes phra
NK055(ri)001:2950: rags dag pa gdul bya'i ngo la rang snang ba'i
NK055(ri)001:2951: sku gnyis kyi mdzad pa thams cad 'bras bu'i ngo
NK055(ri)001:2952: bo ste/ rnal ma don gyi kun gzhi rtogs pa'i rang byung gi ye shes chos sku dbyer med/
NK055(ri)001:2953: khams gsum gyi chos snod bcud kyis bsdus pa'i bde sdug gi dngos po thams cad/
NK055(ri)001:2954: rgyu lhan cig skyes pa'i ma rig pa'i dbang gis kun gzhi'i rnam par shes par snang bas dbyer med/
NK055(ri)001:2955: des na 'khor 'das gnyis kyang gzung 'dzin gyi zhen pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:2956: lam gyi zhen pa bsal ba'i dbang gis tha dad
NK055(ri)001:2957: kyang ngo bo rnams la rnal ma don gyi kun
NK055(ri)001:2958: gzhir gcig ste/ rnal ma don gyi kun gzhi nyid
NK055(ri)001:2959: las yengs pa'i tshul du lhan cig skyes pa'i ma
NK055(ri)001:2961: rkyen las dang nyon mongs pa gnyis kyis byas te/
NK055(ri)001:2962: 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i bu rigs 'khyar yang ngo bo mi 'gyur ba bzhin/
NK055(ri)001:2964: phyin ci log gnyis yang dag ste //
NK055(ri)001:2965: ma rig pa nyid ye shes gsal //
NK055(ri)001:2966: nyon mongs sdug bsngal byang chub mchog /ces 'byung bas/
NK055(ri)001:2967: 'khor ba log rtog tsam nyid na rnal ma don
NK055(ri)001:2968: gyi kun gzhi rang snang bas de nyid rang byung
NK055(ri)001:2969: gi ye shes te/ ngo bo bstan du med pa
NK055(ri)001:2970: ni rnal ma don gyi kun gzhi mnyam pa nyid
NK055(ri)001:2971: kyi dbyings su gsal bas 'khor 'das lam pa thams
NK055(ri)001:2972: cad der snang zhing der gcig pa la ni rgyu
NK055(ri)001:2973: gi ye shes te/ gcig zhes bya ste/ de'i don
NK055(ri)001:2974: rnal 'byor pas rtogs nas rig pa skad cig la
NK055(ri)001:2975: gsal ba ni rgyu gcig pa'i rtogs pa zhes bya'o
NK055(ri)001:2976: gi ye shes te/ gcig zhes bya ste/ // yig 'bru'i tshul du rtogs pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:2977: yi ge 'bru gsum ste 'khor 'das thams cad rig
NK055(ri)001:2978: pa byang chub sems su dbyer med pa'i gtan tshigs
NK055(ri)001:2979: kyis thams cad sems nyid las dngos po'i chos gang
NK055(ri)001:2981: sems nyid rnal ma don gyi kun gzhi ni mtha'i
NK055(ri)001:2982: ngo bo cir yang ma skyes pa nyid mtshon bya
NK055(ri)001:2983: don te/ de mtshon par byed pa'i gtan tshigs ni yi ge las skye med mtshon pa a ste/
NK055(ri)001:2984: sku gsung thugs gsum las na gsung ngo //
NK055(ri)001:2985: des na gsung gang du yang ma 'gag cir yang
NK055(ri)001:2986: 'char 'on kyang ngo bo la grub pa med pa'o
NK055(ri)001:2987: // as mtshon pa'i sems kyi ngo bo nyid gcig
NK055(ri)001:2988: tu ma grub pa nyid rig pa rang gsal ba
NK055(ri)001:2989: cir yang mi 'gag par snang ba ni mtshon bya
NK055(ri)001:2990: // don no // de mtshon byed kyi tshig ni
NK055(ri)001:2991: stong pa snang bar gsal ba mtshon pa a las
NK055(ri)001:2992: na ro bzhag pas o lta bu ste/
NK055(ri)001:2993: de ni snang ba mi 'gag pa'i ngos nas sku'o //
NK055(ri)001:2994: snang stong de gnyis kyi tshig la snga phyir byung
NK055(ri)001:2995: yang don dbyer med pas gcig par rtogs pa'i rig
NK055(ri)001:2996: pa nyid ye shes lngar gsal te/
NK055(ri)001:2997: rig pa dngos po thams cad dang bral ba stong
NK055(ri)001:2998: pa nyid gsal ba cir yang mi 'gag par snang
NK055(ri)001:2999: ba ni me long lta bu mi 'gag pa nyid
NK055(ri)001:3000: cir yang 'char ba gdul bya'i dgos pa skong ba
NK055(ri)001:3001: chos thams cad so sor rtog pa de tsam nyid
NK055(ri)001:3002: na chos kyi dbyings las ma g.yos pa snang stong
NK055(ri)001:3003: gi phyogs 'dzin dang bral ba mnyam pa nyid/
NK055(ri)001:3004: ma 'gag pas gdul bya rnams kyi re 'dod skong
NK055(ri)001:3005: ba bya ba grub pa ste mtshon bya'i don no
NK055(ri)001:3006: // de mtshon byed ni yi ge cha lnga pa ste rang byung gi ye shes thugs kho na'o //
NK055(ri)001:3007: yi ge 'bru gcig yin pa las sku gsung thugs
NK055(ri)001:3008: gsum gyis mtshon nas phyi nang gi chos phung po
NK055(ri)001:3009: khams skye mched thams cad gong du bshad pa'i sku
NK055(ri)001:3010: gsung thugs gsum ste/ ma 'gag pa skur bud+d+ha dbyer med pa thugs su bud+d+ha ba ste/
NK055(ri)001:3011: de yang bud+d+ha'i gtan tshigs ni tha mal pa gzung
NK055(ri)001:3012: 'dzin gyi zhen pa yi ge gsum gyi gtan tshigs
NK055(ri)001:3014: des med pa phyogs gcig tu 'dzin pa lta bu ma yin te/
NK055(ri)001:3015: rtog pa'i don rang byung gi ye shes thams cad gsal ba ni rgyas pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:3016: de lta bu'i don gyis phyi nang gi chos thams cad de nyid du gsal ba ni/
NK055(ri)001:3017: dper na ras dkar po dmar por byin gyis brlabsa
NK055(ri)001:3018: pa'i mthu btsod la yod pas dmar por byin gyis
NK055(ri)001:3019: brlab pa'i phyir na/ byin gyis brlabsa zhes gsungs so //
NK055(ri)001:3021: gang gi rtogs pa gsum po de bde bar gshegs
NK055(ri)001:3022: pa'i lung dang bla ma'i man ngag tha snyad tsam
NK055(ri)001:3024: lung dang man ngag gi don rig pa la gdengs su chud/
NK055(ri)001:3025: lung dang man ngag la ma brten par yang ma yin te/
NK055(ri)001:3026: lung dang man ngag gis mtshon pa'i don ma nor ba mngon du byas pa yin/
NK055(ri)001:3027: don ma nor ba mngon du byas pa de yang
NK055(ri)001:3028: thos pa'i shes rab dang bsam pa'i shes rab tsam
NK055(ri)001:3029: du bzhag pa ma yin te/
NK055(ri)001:3030: thos bsam gyi don bsgom ste/
NK055(ri)001:3031: bsgom pa'i shes rab kyi 'bras bu mngon sum bzhi'i
NK055(ri)001:3032: tha ma rang rig pa'i mngon sum du chu la
NK055(ri)001:3033: chu bsnan thim pa bzhin du blta bya lta byed
NK055(ri)001:3034: med par rig par lhun gyis grub pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:3035: rtogs pa des 'khor 'das sam yul sems kyi chos
NK055(ri)001:3036: thams cad gtan tshigs gsum gyi rjes su lhun gyis
NK055(ri)001:3037: grub ste/ gzung 'dzin gyi shes pa gtan nas dag pa ni rab tu rtogs pa zhes bya ste/
NK055(ri)001:3038: rtogs pa tsam ni theg pa 'og ma rnams la'ang yod de/
NK055(ri)001:3039: don spyi yid kyi yul du byed pa tsam yin la/
NK055(ri)001:3041: blta bya lta byed gnyis med pa ni rtogs pa mthar phyin pas rab tu zhes bya la/
NK055(ri)001:3042: yang na 'og ma rnams las dpags pas rab tu zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:3043: rtogs pa gong du bstan pa rnam pa bzhi po yis/
NK055(ri)001:3044: thams cad mnyam rdzogs rgyal po ches //
NK055(ri)001:3046: 'khor 'das 'dus byas 'dus ma byas snod bcud kyi
NK055(ri)001:3047: chos thams cad ye nas yin pa'i don rtogs pa
NK055(ri)001:3049: chos thams cad sku gsung thugs gsum du ma rdzogs pa med pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:3052: dbyer med pa thugs su rdzogs pas mtha' gnyis las rgyal te/
NK055(ri)001:3053: ma 'gag pas stong pa'i mtha' las rgyal/
NK055(ri)001:3054: ma dmigs pas dngos po'i mtha' las rgyal/
NK055(ri)001:3055: de gnyis kyang dbyer med pas phyogs 'dzin gyi tha
NK055(ri)001:3056: snyad phra ba yang mi gnas pa ni che zhes
NK055(ri)001:3057: bya'o // dag mnyam gyi gtan tshigs ni/
NK055(ri)001:3058: 'og snod bcud rgyud rnams dag rtogs shing //
NK055(ri)001:3059: zhes pa 'dir dag mnyam gyi gtan tshigs te/
NK055(ri)001:3060: rtogs pa bzhi rgyud 'di nyid nas de'i ngo bo
NK055(ri)001:3061: nyid yin pas rtogs pa'i dus su gzung 'dzin gyi
NK055(ri)001:3062: shes pa mi gnas par sems su chos thams cad
NK055(ri)001:3063: dag pa'i phyir/ 'khor 'das snod bcud kyi chos thams
NK055(ri)001:3064: cad sems kyi ye shes kho nar rang gsal bas
NK055(ri)001:3065: gong du sku dang gsung du bstan pa'i gtan tshigs
NK055(ri)001:3066: dag pa'i phyir/ kyis/ 'dir sku dang ye shes sha
NK055(ri)001:3067: stag las snod yul 'byung ba chen po lnga rigs
NK055(ri)001:3069: nam mkha' chos thams cad kyi bdag nyid gsal la
NK055(ri)001:3070: go 'byed pa'i ngo bo nyid du bzhugs kyang 'du
NK055(ri)001:3071: shes dag pa'i ngo bo nyid pas skyon ngang gis
NK055(ri)001:3072: ma grub pa la kun tu bzang mo zhes tha
NK055(ri)001:3074: bar gyi bskal pa gcig la rtag cing brtan pa mi 'gyur ba ste/
NK055(ri)001:3075: snod bcud kyi chos thams cad dang /
NK055(ri)001:3076: rtsi shing nags tshal lo 'bras la sogs pa rnams
NK055(ri)001:3077: nar son par byed pa'i bdag nya da skad cig
NK055(ri)001:3079: sems kyi chos nyid rang byung ye shes su gsal
NK055(ri)001:3080: la snang bya snang byed dam snang stong la sogs
NK055(ri)001:3081: pa'i phyogs 'dzin thams cad dang bral ba nyid thams
NK055(ri)001:3082: cad kyi rten byed kyang de nyid kyi 'dzin pa
NK055(ri)001:3083: yang mi mnga' ba ni mnyam pa nyid kyi dbyings
NK055(ri)001:3084: te/ dngos po snang tsam las ming btags pas sangs rgyas spyan zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:3085: 'byung ba chu bar gyi bskal pa gcig la snod
NK055(ri)001:3086: bcud kyi dngos po thams cad mi gyes shing gong
NK055(ri)001:3087: nas gong du skyed par byed pa'i bdag nyid sems
NK055(ri)001:3088: kyi dbyings su gsal nas mnyam pa nyid kyi chos
NK055(ri)001:3089: thams cad kyi skyed byed du gnas pa ni yum
NK055(ri)001:3090: m+aa ma k+ai'i bdag nyid do //
NK055(ri)001:3091: 'byung ba me bar gyi bskal pa gcig la dngos po thams cad bsreg cing gsal te/
NK055(ri)001:3092: rtsi 'bras smin pa'i bdag nyid sems su lhun gyis grub nas snang stong dbyer med pa nyid/
NK055(ri)001:3093: yum gos dkar mo ste mtha' gnyis mi gnas par byed pa'i mtshan no //
NK055(ri)001:3094: 'byung ba rlung bar gyi bskal pa gcig la g.yo
NK055(ri)001:3095: ba'i bdag nyid sems su gsal nas snang stong dbyer
NK055(ri)001:3096: med pa yum sgrol ma ste/
NK055(ri)001:3097: gdul bya gong nas gong du bskyed pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:3098: de ni yul 'byung ba lnga gnas su dag pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:3100: phung po lnga rigs lngar dag pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:3101: rnam par shes pa'i tshogs brgyad sems su gsal ba
NK055(ri)001:3102: nyid snang stong gi mtha' thams cad dang bral ba
NK055(ri)001:3103: mnyam pa nyid de dngos po dang bral bas skye
NK055(ri)001:3104: 'jig med pa rdo rje'i rigs mi bskyod pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:3105: gzugs kyi phung po sems su gsal ba snang stong
NK055(ri)001:3106: dbyer med pa nyid mi 'gag par rang snang ba
NK055(ri)001:3107: rnam par snang mdzad de mi 'gag par snang ba'i
NK055(ri)001:3108: mtshan no // tshor ba'i phung po bde sdug btang
NK055(ri)001:3109: snyoms gsum sems su gsal ba mnyam pa nyid rtog
NK055(ri)001:3110: pa med kyang dgos 'dod skong ba rin po che'i
NK055(ri)001:3111: mtshan no // rigs te/ don dang ldan pa'i mtshan nyid rin chen 'byung ldan no //
NK055(ri)001:3112: 'du shes kyi phung po rgya che chung tshad med
NK055(ri)001:3113: pa gsum sems su gsal ba snang stong dbyer med
NK055(ri)001:3114: pa nyid rang snang mi 'gag par bden pa gnyis
NK055(ri)001:3115: kyi tshul du gsal ba ni phyogs 'dzin dang bral
NK055(ri)001:3116: zhing mtha' yas pas snang ba mtha' yas so //
NK055(ri)001:3117: 'du byed kyi phung po 'du byed lnga bcu rtsa
NK055(ri)001:3118: gcig sems su gsal ba snang stong dbyer med pa
NK055(ri)001:3119: mnyam pa nyid rang snang mi 'gag pas don thams
NK055(ri)001:3120: cad grub pas don yod grub pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:3121: rgyud dag pa ni bar gyi rnam par shes pa'i
NK055(ri)001:3122: tshogs brgyad snod bcud kyi 'brel bas rgyud ces bya
NK055(ri)001:3123: ste/ de yang ye shes lngar dag pa'i phyir sgo
NK055(ri)001:3124: lnga'i shes pa lhun gyis grub pas yul dang yul
NK055(ri)001:3125: ste/ can med de/ ma 'gag pa tsam mthong bya mthong byed la sogs pa bral te/
NK055(ri)001:3126: ma chags pa nyid rang byung gi ye shes su gsal bas bya ba grub pa'i ye shes so //
NK055(ri)001:3127: yid kyi shes pa gsal cha nyid snang stong dbyer
NK055(ri)001:3128: med pa sems nyid du gsal bas chos thams cad
NK055(ri)001:3129: rang bzhin med pa ni don dam/
NK055(ri)001:3130: mkhyen pa ma 'gags par gsal ba ni kun rdzob mkhyen pa so sor rtogs pa'i ye shes so //
NK055(ri)001:3131: de'i dus su nyon mongs pa can gyi yid bdag 'dzin dag ste/
NK055(ri)001:3132: bdag gzhan nam phyogs ris med pa mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes so //
NK055(ri)001:3133: kun gzhi'i rnam shes 'khrul pa la kha bltas pa'i
NK055(ri)001:3134: dus su 'khor ba mi 'gag pa yin la 'dir
NK055(ri)001:3135: 'khrul pa dag ste sems kyi rang bzhin mngon du
NK055(ri)001:3136: snang ba me long lta bu'i ye shes gsal la
NK055(ri)001:3138: de bzhi gnas su dag pa de ltar gyur pas
NK055(ri)001:3139: rnal ma don gyi kun gzhi mngon du gyur pa
NK055(ri)001:3140: ni chos kyi dbyings kyi yi shes so //
NK055(ri)001:3141: de ltar snod bcud rgyud rnams ye nas dag pa'i
NK055(ri)001:3142: ngo bo nyid rnal 'byor mngon du gyur pa ni
NK055(ri)001:3143: rtogs zhes bya'o // shing zhes pas gzhan sdud de/
NK055(ri)001:3144: mnyam gnyis lhag pa'i mnyam gnyis dang //
NK055(ri)001:3146: mnyam gnyis ni don dam par chos thams cad ma
NK055(ri)001:3147: byung ma skyes skye ba med par mnyam pa don
NK055(ri)001:3148: dam/ kun rdzob kyi chos thams cad rgyu rkyen rten
NK055(ri)001:3149: 'brel las byung ba sgyu ma tsam du mnyam pa
NK055(ri)001:3150: ni kun rdzob tu mnyam pa ste mdo sde'i gzhung
NK055(ri)001:3151: dam/ dang mthun no // 'o na de 'bras bu'i skabs 'dir bstan ci dgos zhe na/
NK055(ri)001:3152: de ni blo dman rim gyis 'jug pa bstan pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:3154: lhag pa'i mnyam pa gnyis ni/
NK055(ri)001:3155: gong ma gnyis las lhag pa kun rdzob ma 'gag par snang tsam nyid na/
NK055(ri)001:3156: phung po khams dang skye mched lha dang lha mor
NK055(ri)001:3157: gsal ba ni mdo sde las lhag pa kun rdzob
NK055(ri)001:3158: bo // don dam mnyam pa ni rang byung gi ye shes/
NK055(ri)001:3159: ye shes lngar mnyam pa ste mdo sde las lhag pas so //
NK055(ri)001:3160: dag pa gsum dang lhag pa'i mnyam pa gnyis don
NK055(ri)001:3161: la dbyer med kyang rgyud gzhung gis mtshon pa'i tha
NK055(ri)001:3162: snyad so so'i de dag gi yon tan nam 'bras
NK055(ri)001:3163: bu'am dag pa mngon sum du gyur pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:3164: dkyil 'khor kun tu bzang po'i zhing //
NK055(ri)001:3166: phung po khams dang skye mched rnams bshad pa'i rtogs
NK055(ri)001:3167: pa bzhi dag pa gsum dang mnyam pa bzhis gzhal
NK055(ri)001:3168: nas/ log rtog gi dkyil 'khor 'khrul pa snang ba nyid rtogs pas dag nas/
NK055(ri)001:3169: dngos po rnams kyi de kho na nyid ma 'gag pa sku/
NK055(ri)001:3170: ma dmigs pa ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor du ye nas dag par rtogs te gnas pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:3171: sku dang ye shes las ma gtogs pa 'khrul pa
NK055(ri)001:3172: phra ba'ang mi gnas pas kun tu bzang po zhes
NK055(ri)001:3173: bya ste/ ngo bo nyid kyi zhing khams rtogs pa
NK055(ri)001:3174: kun tu bzang po'i zhing khams su lhun gyis grub
NK055(ri)001:3175: bya ste/ ba'o // de lta bu rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas/
NK055(ri)001:3176: byed spyod tshogs chen gnyis 'gyur nas //
NK055(ri)001:3177: zhes pa kun tu bzang po'i zhing khams gsal bas
NK055(ri)001:3178: byed spyod mi 'gag pa'i chos thams cad ma 'gag
NK055(ri)001:3180: ma dmigs pa ye shes kyi tshogs/
NK055(ri)001:3181: de yang dbyer med pas skad cig la lhun gyis grub pas chen po ste/
NK055(ri)001:3183: mdo sde pa las dgar ba ste/
NK055(ri)001:3184: rgyu 'bras dbyer med pa dang rtsa ba dag pas rang snang min pa ched bsgrubs bral ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:3185: nas ni sngon du song nas bsgrub pa phyi ma la 'jug pa'i tshul te/
NK055(ri)001:3186: de yan chad rgyu shes pa'i mtshan nyid bstan nas lta ba dang ldan nas/
NK055(ri)001:3190: yan lag ma nyams yo byad ldan //
NK055(ri)001:3192: spyir sgrub pa'i rnal 'byor pas lta spyod ting 'dzin 'phrugs par bya ba'i phyir de nyid bstan te/
NK055(ri)001:3193: de la sngags kyi yan lag lnga //
NK055(ri)001:3195: bla ma dam pa la dbang rnams rim bzhin du mnos nas rdzogs pas/
NK055(ri)001:3196: des dam tshig dang ldan nas dam tshig phra ba'ang ma nyams pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:3197: de nas ting nge 'dzin gsum goms par byas pa'i
NK055(ri)001:3198: dus su rgyu yig 'bru'i gdan ma nyams pa dang
NK055(ri)001:3199: / yig 'bru'i ting nge 'dzin gsal ba ma nyams pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:3200: de las phyag rgyar gsal ba dang /
NK055(ri)001:3201: de las sku phyag rgya chen por gsal ba ma nyams pa ni sngags kyi yan lag lnga zhes bya/
NK055(ri)001:3202: yang na 'dir mchog gi dngos grub sgrub pa yin pas gong ma lnga po bas kyang cung lhag ste/
NK055(ri)001:3203: dbang rim pa bzhin du mnos pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:3204: de nas lta ba'i dam tshig gsum gyis phyi nang
NK055(ri)001:3205: gi chos la gzhal bas lta ba de kho na
NK055(ri)001:3206: nyid kyi don blo dang 'byor bar byas pa ni
NK055(ri)001:3207: gazhi'o // de nas de bzhin nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin/
NK055(ri)001:3208: kun tu snang gi ting nge 'dzin/
NK055(ri)001:3210: yongs su rdzogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin bzhi la rim par sems sbyangs te/
NK055(ri)001:3211: snang ba rnam par 'byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la
NK055(ri)001:3212: dbang thob pa'i rnal 'byor pa pho mo tshom bu
NK055(ri)001:3213: rgyas 'bring gi grangs dang mthun pas/
NK055(ri)001:3215: gnas rgyud kyi gzhung dang mthun pa'i bar chod med pa'i gnas su/
NK055(ri)001:3216: dbu rtse nang ma sgrub pa po'i bzhugs sa/
NK055(ri)001:3217: bar pa rol mo'i longs spyod kyi rol sa/
NK055(ri)001:3218: phyi tha g.yos khang dang yo byad kyi snod du byas te/
NK055(ri)001:3219: de nas yo byad dngos ni/
NK055(ri)001:3222: bro gar glu tshig /+aa li k+aa li gnyis dang lnga'o //
NK055(ri)001:3223: yang na las dang po pa'i lnga ni/
NK055(ri)001:3230: ngag gi brjod pa dbyangs dang bcas pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:3232: yan lag gi gar gyi phyag rgya dang /
NK055(ri)001:3235: +aa li k+aa li las kyi go rim ma nor bar mkhas par shes par bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:3236: yang na cho ga lnga ni/
NK055(ri)001:3237: ting 'dzin bzhi'i mthar phyin pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:3238: snang ba rnam 'byed la goms pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:3240: zhes pa dkyil 'khor rgyas 'bring gi grangs dang mthun
NK055(ri)001:3241: pa'i pho mo'i tshogs kyis dkyil 'khor du bkod pa
NK055(ri)001:3242: dang bsgom pas dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:3243: nges pa ni the tshom mi za'o //
NK055(ri)001:3244: legs pa'i dgos pa 'grub ni rig 'dzin gsum dang /
NK055(ri)001:3245: mthar sku lnga'ang lhun gyis grub pa'o zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:3246: bsgrub pa'i dus bstan pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:3247: 'og sgrub pa'i zhag dang tshes grangs rnams //
NK055(ri)001:3248: rgyud las gsungs pa bzhin du bshad //
NK055(ri)001:3249: ces pa 'di nyid las gsungs te/
NK055(ri)001:3250: bsgrub pa 'grub pa'i zhag grangs ni //
NK055(ri)001:3251: zhag ni sum cu phrag drug gam //
NK055(ri)001:3252: zhes pa dbang po rab kyis so //
NK055(ri)001:3253: bcu gnyis zhes pa rab 'og gis so //
NK055(ri)001:3256: dbang po dman pas kyang bcu drug phyin chad mi
NK055(ri)001:3257: 'gyangs pas na bcu drug gis te grangs ni zla
NK055(ri)001:3258: ba'o // le'u dgu par bshad do //
NK055(ri)001:3260: rgyud las smos pa bzhin du bshad //
NK055(ri)001:3262: tshes grangs bzang po dang yar ngo dang /
NK055(ri)001:3264: rngam pa glog gi 'khor lo dang bam brgyad nas kyang ston to //
NK055(ri)001:3265: gnas dang longs spyod bstan pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:3266: gong gnas dang longs spyod ci bde dang //
NK055(ri)001:3269: shin tu dben pa'i sa phyogs su //
NK055(ri)001:3270: 'khor khang rim gsum dri zhim pa //
NK055(ri)001:3271: yangs pa rgyan gyis spras bya ba //
NK055(ri)001:3273: gong du rim gsum bshad pa de yangs pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:3274: 'jam pa gzugs brnyan 'char ba lta bur byas pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:3275: dri zhim pa sna tshogs kyis byugs pa/
NK055(ri)001:3276: gnam rgyan dang bar rgyan la sogs pa rgyan sna
NK055(ri)001:3277: tshogs te yid du 'ong bas nyams dga' bar byas
NK055(ri)001:3278: pa ni/ rnal 'byor pa nyams dga' bas ting nge 'dzin gsal ba dang /
NK055(ri)001:3279: ye shes kyi lha gshegs pa'i yang rgyu'o //
NK055(ri)001:3280: longs spyod ni yo byad rnam pa lnga'o //
NK055(ri)001:3281: ci bde ni lta bsgom stobs su gyur pas longs spyod lnga la spyod pa'i dus su/
NK055(ri)001:3282: spang blang dang lta spyod bsgom gsum mgo snyoms pa
NK055(ri)001:3283: spyod pa'i ngo bo yin pa blos byas kyi ri
NK055(ri)001:3284: mo med pa ste/ mnyam pa nyid kyi ngang la
NK055(ri)001:3285: 'di bya 'di mi bya med par 'jol nyog tu
NK055(ri)001:3286: mo med pa ste/ spyod pa'o // ma nyams ni
NK055(ri)001:3287: dam tshig rnams phra ba'i phra ba'ang ma nyams pa'o
NK055(ri)001:3288: mo med pa ste/ spyod pa'o // // blo ni rab ldan zhes pa/
NK055(ri)001:3289: dang po rtogs pa lta ba'i blo dang ldan pas mnyam pa nyid gdengs chud/
NK055(ri)001:3290: bsgom pa ting nge 'dzin gyi blo dang ldan pas
NK055(ri)001:3291: bya lam rjes med kyi dgongs pas ched 'dzin phra
NK055(ri)001:3292: ba'ang med pa gsum ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas/
NK055(ri)001:3293: dang por dam mnos bzhin du bya //
NK055(ri)001:3294: zhes pa bla mas dbang bskur ba'i dus su dang
NK055(ri)001:3295: por phog pa'i dam tshig rnams phra ba yang mi
NK055(ri)001:3296: nyams par gzhung thub par bya ba dang /
NK055(ri)001:3297: de nas bsgrub pa la 'jug pa'i dus su tshom
NK055(ri)001:3298: bu rgyas bsdus kyi bye brag rnams gang gi sgo
NK055(ri)001:3299: nas bsgrub pa bla ma las lung nos la bla
NK055(ri)001:3300: mas 'di ltar sgrubs shig pa'i lung phogs pa bzhin
NK055(ri)001:3301: du bsgrub pa nya mas su blang bar bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:3302: de'i zhar la +aa li k+aa li la spyad thabs kyang bla mas gsungs pa bzhin du bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:3303: le lo sgyid snyoms med pa yi //
NK055(ri)001:3304: zhes pa la sogs pa le lo ni bsgrub bya'i don la lhod nas gzhan gyis phrog pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:3305: rgyud snyoms las su song ba ni zhan pa ste lus pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:3307: de gnyis ka brtson 'grus drag pos sel te chu
NK055(ri)001:3308: gzhol phyogs su 'bab pa bzhin rgyun mi chad par
NK055(ri)001:3309: bya'o // the tshom ni bya mi bya dang 'grub mi 'grub kyi yid gnyis te/
NK055(ri)001:3310: gang sgrub pa thams cad kyi gegs chen po yin/
NK055(ri)001:3311: rig pa rtse gcig tu mi yengs pa'i brtson 'grus kyis 'bad pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:3312: de lta bu ni dngos grub kyi rgyu'o //
NK055(ri)001:3315: 'di nyid sgrub pa nyams su blangs na bzhi bcu
NK055(ri)001:3316: rtsa gnyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid
NK055(ri)001:3317: yin pas/ 'bras bu sangs rgyas thams cad dbyer med
NK055(ri)001:3318: pa'i ngo bo yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
NK055(ri)001:3319: yin pas/ 'grub bo // bsnyen bsgrub bzhi mdor bstan pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:3320: gong bsnyen pa dang ni nye bsnyen dang //
NK055(ri)001:3322: de sny bsgrub bzhi 'di lam gyi ngo bo yin pas/
NK055(ri)001:3324: 'dir dang po bskyed pa'i rim pa dang sbyar na bsnyen pa dang lta ba ste/
NK055(ri)001:3325: chos thams cad dag mnyam gyi gtan tshigs kyis gong
NK055(ri)001:3326: ltar gzhal bas tha mal gzung 'dzin shes pa dag
NK055(ri)001:3327: ste/ sems nyid mnyam pa nyid kyi don shes pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:3328: de ni 'bras bu sgrub par byed pa'i lam gyi
NK055(ri)001:3329: gzhi ste lam gyi go bzlog pas bsnyen pa zhes
NK055(ri)001:3330: bya'o // nye ba'i bsnyen pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:3331: gong du chos thams cad lta ba'i ngang du dag
NK055(ri)001:3332: pas rnal 'byor pa bdag nyid kyang ye nas dag
NK055(ri)001:3333: pa lha'i rang bzhin yin par shes pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:3334: gong ma bas lam la nye bas nye ba'i bsnyen pa zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:3335: de ni bdag nyid lhar bskyed nas sku mdog rgyan dang cha lugs gsal ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:3336: sgrub pa ni yum bskyed pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:3337: yum ni mkha' dbyings sa thams cad kyi bdag nyid ma/
NK055(ri)001:3338: chos thams cad bskyed pa'i yum 'byung ba bzhi thon
NK055(ri)001:3339: pa las sras sprul pa lcam dral du thon pa
NK055(ri)001:3340: ni lta ba'i ngo bo yin pas 'dir dngos su
NK055(ri)001:3341: yum bskyed pa'o/ sgrub pa chen po ni gong du
NK055(ri)001:3342: bstan pa ltar thabs shes rab dbyer med las sras
NK055(ri)001:3343: yum bskyed pa'o/ lcam dral spros te/ dkyil 'khor bskyed
NK055(ri)001:3344: thon pa ni 'bras bu lta bu ste spyir bstan
NK055(ri)001:3345: yum bskyed pa'o/ lcam dral spros te/ pa'o // 'dir
NK055(ri)001:3346: nye bar tshogs sgrub pa po 'jug nas 'bras bu
NK055(ri)001:3347: mthar phyin pa'i bsnyen sgrub bzhi'i bsnyen pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:3348: dang po de bzhin nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin don
NK055(ri)001:3349: dam pa byang chub kyi sems la sbyangs pa mthar
NK055(ri)001:3350: phyin pa dang / de nas snying rje chen po'i
NK055(ri)001:3351: ting nge 'dzin rig pa rang gsal la sbyangs pa
NK055(ri)001:3352: mthar phyin pa kun rdzob byang chub kyi sems gnyis
NK055(ri)001:3353: ni ye shes rang snang gi dkyil 'khor gyi rgyur
NK055(ri)001:3354: nges pas bsnyen pa zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:3355: nye ba'i bsnyen pa ni gong ma gnyis las 'bras bu la gud nye bas nye bsnyen zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:3356: phyag rgya gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 'byongs pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:3357: spros pa la 'byongs pa la gnyis mngon du byas pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:3358: sgrub pa 'dir rgyu 'bras dbyer med pa yin pas
NK055(ri)001:3359: 'dir 'bras bu nyams su len nas rim par sbyangs
NK055(ri)001:3360: shing slob pa ste/ dngos su yo byad lnga la
NK055(ri)001:3361: lta spyod mgo snyoms pa'i ngos nas bsod nams dang
NK055(ri)001:3362: ye shes kyi tshogs gnyis rgyu 'bras dang bral bas
NK055(ri)001:3363: bslab cing sbyangs te mngon du gyur pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:3364: sgrub pa chen po ni yo byad lnga las bskyed
NK055(ri)001:3365: pa'i dus su +aa li k+aa li gnyis kyi don
NK055(ri)001:3366: nyams su lon nas 'bras bu tshe dbang rig 'dzin
NK055(ri)001:3367: thob pa la ma rag pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:3368: gsang ba'i bsnyen sgrub bzhi ni skabs su 'chad par 'gyur ro //
NK055(ri)001:3369: rgyas bshad kyi bsnyen pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:3371: mkha' dbyings dwangs pa'i dbyings nyi zla //
NK055(ri)001:3373: mkha' ni chos nyid kyi nam mkha' ste/
NK055(ri)001:3374: chos nyid bsam du med pas nam mkha' che //
NK055(ri)001:3376: zhe 'dod thams cad bral ba'i ngang la blo'i dmigs
NK055(ri)001:3377: pa phra ba yang mi gnas pa ni rang gsal
NK055(ri)001:3378: ba'o // dkyil ni de nyid la spros pa brgyad
NK055(ri)001:3379: la sogs pa'i mtha' ma dmigs pa de la dkyil
NK055(ri)001:3380: zhes bya ste tha snyad tsam mo //
NK055(ri)001:3381: dwangs pa ni mi mthun pa'i sgrib byed kyi skyon thams cad rang dag pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:3382: dper na chu dwangs bya ba dang mtshungs so //
NK055(ri)001:3383: dbyings ni de nyid spros bral 'ba' zhig gi mtha'
NK055(ri)001:3384: ma yin pas cir yang 'char ba las dkyil 'khor
NK055(ri)001:3385: du gsal ba'o // sngon la ting nge 'dzin la
NK055(ri)001:3386: goms pas lung gi dgongs pa nyams su len pa'o
NK055(ri)001:3387: du gsal ba'o // // rim gyis pas na lha yab yum bsnol ba'ang ston to //
NK055(ri)001:3388: nyi zla la sogs pa'i gdan gyi thog tu/
NK055(ri)001:3389: ye shes rgyal po stangs dpyal bsgom //
NK055(ri)001:3391: 'khor 'das thams cad kyi de kho na nyid rang byung gi ye shes/
NK055(ri)001:3393: gsal la mi 'gag par rang snang bas stong pa'i mtha' las rgyal/
NK055(ri)001:3394: mtshan nyid ji ltar shar yang ngo bo rang byung
NK055(ri)001:3395: ye shes las ma g.yos pas dngos po'i mtha' las
NK055(ri)001:3396: rgyal bas rgyal po/ stangs ni yab lnga'o //
NK055(ri)001:3398: nyi ma dang 'od ltar sems dpa' sems ma rnams kyang gsal lo //
NK055(ri)001:3399: 'di las mang po bsgom mi nus pas me tog
NK055(ri)001:3400: gang la phog pa'i rigs kyi lha yab yum gnyis
NK055(ri)001:3401: kho na yi dam du bsgom par yang bzhed do
NK055(ri)001:3403: rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kun //
NK055(ri)001:3404: zhes pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba kun tu bzang po nyid/
NK055(ri)001:3405: gdul bya'i ngo la snang ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad
NK055(ri)001:3406: rigs lngar ma 'dus pa med pa dang thams cad
NK055(ri)001:3407: kun tu bzang po'i ngo bo nyid du ma gyur
NK055(ri)001:3408: pa med pas/ ma lus par ni bsgoms par 'gyur //
NK055(ri)001:3410: thams cad dbyer med pa yin pa'i bdag nyid ni ngo bo nyid kyi yin tshul lo //
NK055(ri)001:3411: rnal 'byor pa'i rtogs pa'i de nyid du gyur pa dgos te/
NK055(ri)001:3412: gong du dag rtogs kyi gtan tshigs kyis mnyam pa nyid du bstan pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:3413: de ltar min pa'i gang zag ltar bud+d+ha'i rgyud so
NK055(ri)001:3414: sor 'dzin pa rnams la ni sems brtags pa ltar
NK055(ri)001:3415: snang ba'o // gtan tshigs des na/
NK055(ri)001:3416: dus bzhi phyogs bcu gang nas kyang //
NK055(ri)001:3418: 'dir bskyed rdzogs ganya sa sam thabs lam grol lam gnyis lam kun gyi thun mong gi don yin te/
NK055(ri)001:3420: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gnyis las/
NK055(ri)001:3421: 'dir sangs rgyas ni tshigs yul du byed pa rnams kyi lugs kyis bstan pa ltar kyang mi rnyed kyi/
NK055(ri)001:3422: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtshan bdun dang ldan pa'i drug pa zhes bya ba ni/
NK055(ri)001:3423: gdul bya'i dbang gi mtshan de nyid du gdags su
NK055(ri)001:3424: zin kyang ngo bo nyid ni sangs rgyas de nyid
NK055(ri)001:3425: min pa gang gi yang spyod yul du ma gyur
NK055(ri)001:3426: pas bstan par dka' ba'i phyir/
NK055(ri)001:3430: yul sems gang nas kyang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
NK055(ri)001:3431: sangs rgyas bshad pa nyid ni tha snyad gang gis
NK055(ri)001:3432: kyang ma reg pas rnyed par mi 'gyur te rnyed
NK055(ri)001:3434: 'o na ye 'brel ba med pa rgyang chad do snyam na/
NK055(ri)001:3435: sems nyid rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te //
NK055(ri)001:3436: zhes pa lam gyi gzhi lta ba thag chod pa'i
NK055(ri)001:3437: dus su khams gsum sems nyid ye shes su gsal
NK055(ri)001:3438: ba ni chos thams cad spangs pa med par nyi
NK055(ri)001:3439: ma'i dkyil 'khor shar na mun pa snang bar gyur
NK055(ri)001:3440: pa dang 'dra bar/ ma 'gags pa sku/
NK055(ri)001:3441: ma dmigs pa ye shes su gyur pa nyid bdag
NK055(ri)001:3442: nyid chen po'i ngo bo nyid la dmigs bya dmigs
NK055(ri)001:3443: byed med par dmigs pa thams cad dang bral ba
NK055(ri)001:3444: ni ngo bo nyid de lam mthar phyin pa'i ngos
NK055(ri)001:3445: nas rnyed pa zhes kyang bya/
NK055(ri)001:3446: nam mkha' nam mkha' las mi 'da' ba ltar gnas pa zhes bya ste/
NK055(ri)001:3447: ched du btsal ba med par rang gsal ba ni ye nas yin pa'i don gyis/
NK055(ri)001:3448: bud+d+ha gzhan du ma tshol zhig /ces gdams pa brjod pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:3449: gzhan du tshol ba'i 'du shes nyid kyis slar sgrib pa'i phyir ro //
NK055(ri)001:3450: de'i phyir sgyu 'phrul rdo rje las/
NK055(ri)001:3451: rang bzhin gnas phyir gzhan nas 'ong thob med //
NK055(ri)001:3452: zhen pa log pas bdag zhal bdag gis mthong //
NK055(ri)001:3454: dkyil 'khor kun tu rab sbyor bas //
NK055(ri)001:3456: dkyil 'khor kun ni dus gsum gyi bud+d+ha thams cad
NK055(ri)001:3457: dbyer med pa bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi dkyil 'khor
NK055(ri)001:3459: kun tu rab sbyor zhes pa/
NK055(ri)001:3460: ting nge 'dzin gyis bsgom bya sgom byed las kyang grol te/
NK055(ri)001:3461: rnal 'byor pa de'i ngo bo nyid du gyur pas
NK055(ri)001:3462: de snang ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad du rnal 'byor
NK055(ri)001:3463: pa'i rig pa gsal ba ni 'grub par 'gyur zhes
NK055(ri)001:3464: bya'o // cho ga lhag gam ma tshang na'ang //
NK055(ri)001:3465: skyon nyid dag ste nyes pa med //
NK055(ri)001:3467: rnal 'byor pa lta ba rtogs dam tshig phra ba'ang
NK055(ri)001:3468: ma nyams pa ting nge 'dzin las su rung nas
NK055(ri)001:3471: gnas la sogs pa'i cho ga rnams lhag pa ni
NK055(ri)001:3472: dgos pa 'phel ba la ma tshang ba ni dgos
NK055(ri)001:3473: pa ma chog pa ste gang yin yang /
NK055(ri)001:3474: de'i skyon nyid kyis mi gos pas na dag ste lta bsgom gyi don gyis nyes pa med ce'o //
NK055(ri)001:3475: tshom bu lnga pa la bsnyen pa bya ba ni/
NK055(ri)001:3477: lnga dang lnga yi sbyor ba yis //
NK055(ri)001:3480: dbus kyi rdo rje'i rigs yab lnga dang yum lnga
NK055(ri)001:3481: sbyor ba ste dbus mi bskyod pa yab yum gyi
NK055(ri)001:3483: de'i mdun du rdo rje sems dpa' yab yum gnyis/
NK055(ri)001:3484: lhor rdo rje r+aa dza yab yum gnyis/
NK055(ri)001:3485: nub tu rdo rje 'dod pa yab yum gnyis/
NK055(ri)001:3486: byang du rdo rje legs pa yab yum gnyis/
NK055(ri)001:3487: de bzhin du shar gyi dkyil 'khor rtsibs bzhi dbus dang lnga la/
NK055(ri)001:3488: dbus su rnam snang yab yum gnyis/
NK055(ri)001:3489: de'i mdun du rdo rje sems dpa' yab yum gnyis/
NK055(ri)001:3490: g.yas su rin chen rdo rje yab yum gnyis/
NK055(ri)001:3491: nub tu chos kyi rdo rje yab yum gnyis/
NK055(ri)001:3492: byang du las kyi rdo rje yab yum gnyis/
NK055(ri)001:3493: lhor 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi la dbus su rin 'byung yab yum gnyis/
NK055(ri)001:3494: mdun du rdo rje rin chen yab yum gnyis/
NK055(ri)001:3495: g.yas su rdo rje gzi brjid yab yum gnyis/
NK055(ri)001:3496: rgyab tu rdo rje rgyal mtshan yab yum gnyis/
NK055(ri)001:3497: g.yon du rdo rje bzhad pa yab yum gnyis/
NK055(ri)001:3498: nub tu 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi la/
NK055(ri)001:3499: dbus su snang ba mtha' yas yab yum gnyis/
NK055(ri)001:3500: mdun du rdo rje chos yab yum gnyis/
NK055(ri)001:3501: g.yas su rdo rje 'khor lo yab yum gnyis/
NK055(ri)001:3502: rgyab tu rdo rje rnon po yab yum gnyis/
NK055(ri)001:3503: g.yon du rdo rje smra gsung yab yum gnyis/
NK055(ri)001:3504: byang gi 'khor lo'i rtsibs bzhi la/
NK055(ri)001:3505: dbus su don grub yab yum gnyis/
NK055(ri)001:3506: mdun du rdo rje las yab yum gnyis/
NK055(ri)001:3507: g.yas su rdo rje bsrung ba yab yum gnyis/
NK055(ri)001:3508: rgyab tu rdo rje gnod sbyin yab yum gnyis //
NK055(ri)001:3509: g.yon du rdo rje khu tshur yab yum gnyis bsgom mo //
NK055(ri)001:3510: de ltar rigs lnga'i tshom bu lnga las yab yum lnga bcu tham pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:3511: tshom bu lnga yi lha bkod pas //
NK055(ri)001:3513: de'i phyir rol du 'khor lo rtsibs bcu pa zhig la khro bo yab bcu dang /
NK055(ri)001:3514: khro mo yum bcu thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa/
NK055(ri)001:3515: 'khor lo'i tshul du rnam par bsgom //
NK055(ri)001:3516: zhes pa lha lnga bcu'i rgyab na tshur 'khor bar yab yum bcu bsgom mo //
NK055(ri)001:3517: des na tshom bu rgyas pa la lha bdun cu'o //
NK055(ri)001:3519: de bzhin rigs dang rdo rje'i rigs //
NK055(ri)001:3521: 'khor lo'i dbus su sngar lnga pa'i gtso bo rdo rje'i rigs mi bskyod pa yab yum bcu bsgom/
NK055(ri)001:3522: shar gyi dkyil 'khor la rnam snang gis gtso bor byas pa'i yab yum bcu bsgom/
NK055(ri)001:3524: pad+ma'i rigs zhes pas snang ba mtha' yas kyis gtso bor byas pa'i yab yum bcu bsgom/
NK055(ri)001:3525: khro bo'i tshogs dang ldan pa yi //
NK055(ri)001:3527: 'di la steng 'og gi khro bo mi bsgom ste/
NK055(ri)001:3528: phyogs mtshams kyi khro bo brgyad yab yum bcu drug bsgom/
NK055(ri)001:3531: zhes pas rnam snang sku'i tshom bu/
NK055(ri)001:3532: snang ba mtha' yas gsung gi tshom bu/
NK055(ri)001:3533: mi bskyod pa thugs kyi tshom bu dang gsum mo //
NK055(ri)001:3534: 'o na yon tan phrin las gnyis mi bsgom pa ci zhe na/
NK055(ri)001:3535: yon tan gyi rigs ni skur bsdu ste/
NK055(ri)001:3536: bde bar gshegs pa'i yon tan gdul bya'i dgos pa rnams sku las snang ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:3537: phrin las ni thugs su bsdu ste/
NK055(ri)001:3538: mdzad pa'i phrin las gzhan don grub pa rnams thugs kyi las yin pas so //
NK055(ri)001:3539: des na rigs lnga ka tshang ngo //
NK055(ri)001:3540: tshom bu bar pa la dbus su yab yum sum cu/
NK055(ri)001:3541: khro bo yab yum bcu drug dang bzhi bcu rtsa drug go //
NK055(ri)001:3543: rigs kyi rigs te rigs kyi gtso //
NK055(ri)001:3544: thugs kyi thugs te thugs kyi mchog /ces pa la sogs pa/
NK055(ri)001:3548: thugs su thams cad 'dus pas rdo rje'i rigs su rigs lnga 'dus pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:3550: rdo rje'i rigs ni rgyud 'di ni thugs kyi sgyu
NK055(ri)001:3551: 'phrul gyi rgyud yin pas de'i dkyil 'khor gyi skabs
NK055(ri)001:3552: kyis rigs kyi gtso bo kho na'o //
NK055(ri)001:3553: sems nyid snang stong gi mtha' dang bral ba stong
NK055(ri)001:3554: pa chen po'i ye shes ni mtha' thams cad las
NK055(ri)001:3556: rnam snang dbus su bsgom pa lta bu yang yin kyang ye shes mi 'gyur te/
NK055(ri)001:3557: des na thugs kyi zhes pa/
NK055(ri)001:3558: ye shes lnga ste de yang rang byung ye shes kho nar 'dus pas thugs te/
NK055(ri)001:3559: de ni ye shes thams cad mtha' dang bral ba
NK055(ri)001:3560: stong pa chen po'i ye shes kyi ngang las mi
NK055(ri)001:3561: 'da' bas ye shes thugs kyi mchog ces bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:3562: khro bo'i tshogs dang ldan pa yi //
NK055(ri)001:3564: yab yum brgyad de sgo ba yab yum brgyad kho na'o //
NK055(ri)001:3565: tshom bu gcig pa ni rigs lnga thugs kyi lhar 'dus pas de nyid kyi lha bcu'o //
NK055(ri)001:3566: khro bo yab yum brgyad da nga lha bco brgyad de tshom bu gcig pa'i lha rnams bsgom pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:3567: bsgrub pa'i rnal 'byor pas lha spyi'i bye brag so sor bsgom pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:3569: zhes pa la sogs pa 'dir rtogs pa mchog tu gyur pas lta spyod zung du 'brel te/
NK055(ri)001:3570: lta spyod bsgom gsum mnyam pa nyid du gyur nas
NK055(ri)001:3571: gang la yang 'tsho rdzi mi dgos pa'i rten gyi
NK055(ri)001:3572: gang zag gis kyang blo rab cig car ba'i lam
NK055(ri)001:3574: de la rnal 'byor ni gsum ste/
NK055(ri)001:3575: rang bzhin gyi rnal 'byor ni rtogs pa'i lta ba
NK055(ri)001:3576: mnyam pa nyid la yul shes med pa ste lam
NK055(ri)001:3577: gyi gazhi'o // lhun gyis grub pa'i rnal 'byor ni
NK055(ri)001:3578: rtogs pa mthar phyin pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
NK055(ri)001:3579: gyi gazhi'o // sangs rgyas nyid de/ phyogs kyi 'dzin
NK055(ri)001:3580: pa thams cad dang bral nas mnyam pa nyid lhun
NK055(ri)001:3581: grub kyi ye shes kho na'o //
NK055(ri)001:3582: lam la phyag rgya'i rnal 'byor lha'i skur bsgom pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:3583: ye shes kyi rnal 'byor rang byung gi ye shes
NK055(ri)001:3584: mtha' dang bral ba le'u drug pa'i stod du bstan
NK055(ri)001:3586: rgyud 'dir phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor bsgom pa'i dus na
NK055(ri)001:3587: yang sku dang ye shes rang snang ba kho nar
NK055(ri)001:3588: gsal bas cig car du bsgom pas nyams su blang
NK055(ri)001:3589: ba'i dus su mi 'byed pa kho na'o //
NK055(ri)001:3591: sku dang ye shes mtho dman gyis kha khar bsgom yang rung /
NK055(ri)001:3592: blo rab kyis cig car du gsal te bsgom kyang rung ste/
NK055(ri)001:3594: tra ya na skyob pa zhes bya bas tha mal
NK055(ri)001:3595: pa'i yid 'khor ba'i gzung 'dzin gyi rtsa ba de
NK055(ri)001:3596: spangs pa med par rang dag ste sku dang ye
NK055(ri)001:3598: yid kyi shes pa nyid dag pa rang rig pa'i thog tu phyin/
NK055(ri)001:3599: de nyid lam pa'i blo la sku dang ye shes
NK055(ri)001:3600: su gsal bas khams gsum rgyu 'bras rtsa ba nas
NK055(ri)001:3601: dag pas yid skyob pa zhes bya la/
NK055(ri)001:3602: yid skyob pa'i don gyis rang byung gi ye shes
NK055(ri)001:3603: rang snang ba mi 'gag pa'i rtsal las lam pa'i
NK055(ri)001:3604: blo ngo la/ thun mong dang mchog las bzhi 'grub pa yan chad kyi byin rlabs snang ba dang /
NK055(ri)001:3605: mthar phyin pa 'bras bu'i dus su/
NK055(ri)001:3606: sems phyi mo'i gnas slebs rig pa rang sa zin
NK055(ri)001:3607: nas chos sku lhun gyis grub pa'i dus su gdul
NK055(ri)001:3608: bya'i dgongs pa lhun grub tu 'char ba ni mi
NK055(ri)001:3609: 'gag pa'i byin rlabs kyi rtsal rang snang ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:3610: 'chang ba yang rnal 'byor gyi mngon sum du 'chang ba dang /
NK055(ri)001:3611: rang rig pa'i mngon sum du 'chang ba ste/
NK055(ri)001:3612: rnal 'byor gyi mngon sum ni bsgom pa'i yul du rig 'dzin la ma sbyar gyi bar du/
NK055(ri)001:3613: sku dang ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor du rang gsal
NK055(ri)001:3614: ba la bsgom bya sgom byed kyi 'du shes rags
NK055(ri)001:3616: dgongs pa la der 'dzin gyi shes pa phra ba dang bcas pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:3617: de la ni 'chang ba zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:3618: rang rig pa'i mngon sum ni 'bras bu'i ngo bo
NK055(ri)001:3619: ste rnal 'byor pa rang nyid kyi ngo la me
NK055(ri)001:3620: long g.ya' dag pa la gzugs brnyan gsal ba me
NK055(ri)001:3621: long la 'dzin pa med pa bzhin/
NK055(ri)001:3622: rnal 'byor pa nyid du sku dang ye shes su
NK055(ri)001:3623: lhun gyis grub pa de nyid las ma gtogs pa'i
NK055(ri)001:3625: chu gsher ba las mi 'da' ba bzhin rang rig pa'i mngon sum du lhun gyis grub pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:3626: rnal 'byor mngon sum la ltos na shin tu 'chang ba zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:3627: de nyid la'ang tshe dbang rig 'dzin nas sangs rgyas pa'i bar la skyed du 'gro ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:3629: 'dir gtso bor rig 'dzin gyi lam stegs la bgrod pa mchog gi dngos grub yin kyang /
NK055(ri)001:3630: 'bras dang phub ma ltar thun mong gi dngos grub kyang zhar la 'byung ngo //
NK055(ri)001:3631: mnyam rdzogs lhun grub ngang gnas shing //
NK055(ri)001:3634: thabs kyi theg pa chen po ni //
NK055(ri)001:3635: bla med theg pa las 'phags pas //
NK055(ri)001:3636: don dam du ni dkor bdun no //
NK055(ri)001:3637: lhun grub tu ni mnyam rdzogs so //
NK055(ri)001:3639: sems dngos po med par rig pa nyid dngos po'i chos 'khor 'das sam snod bcud rang snang bas/
NK055(ri)001:3640: gtan tshigs des na 'khor 'das gnyis ka rang rig pa nyid ma 'gags pa sku/
NK055(ri)001:3641: ma dmigs pa ye shes su gsal bar don de la gnyis 'dzin nam/
NK055(ri)001:3644: gnyis su med pa'i tha snyad thams cad tshig gis
NK055(ri)001:3645: mtshon pa'i don nyid la mnyam pa chen po'i ngang
NK055(ri)001:3646: la/ 'bras bu'i chos thams cad de nyid las ma
NK055(ri)001:3647: gtogs pa'i logs su grub pa med par lhun gyis
NK055(ri)001:3648: rdzogs pa la rgyu 'bras dang bya btsal med par
NK055(ri)001:3649: rang snang ba la ni lhun grub ces bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:3651: skye ba med pa'i ngang ni sems nyid rgyu rkyen
NK055(ri)001:3652: las 'das pa'i ngo bo spros pa'i mtha' brgyad dang
NK055(ri)001:3654: mnyam pa nyid kyi ngang ni sems nyid rang byung
NK055(ri)001:3655: gi ye shes ngang las bzang ngan snang stong rgyu
NK055(ri)001:3656: 'bras la sogs pa'i ltos pa'i chos thams cad mi
NK055(ri)001:3657: gnas te/ nam mkha' dang 'dra bar rig pa rang gsal mnyam pa nyid do //
NK055(ri)001:3658: lhun gyis grub pa'i ngang ni 'khor 'das snang srid
NK055(ri)001:3659: snod bcud tshig gis gdags su rung ba'i chos thams
NK055(ri)001:3660: cad sems nyid kho na'i phyir sems rang byung ye
NK055(ri)001:3661: shes nyid cir yang ma yin pa nyid rang snang
NK055(ri)001:3662: ba'i yon tan rang 'char ba ni/
NK055(ri)001:3663: gdul bya'i blo ngo bzhin cir yang 'char ba rgyun chad med kyang /
NK055(ri)001:3664: 'char bya 'char byed kyi 'du shes dang bral te lhun grub tu gnas pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:3665: ngang zhes bya ba ni gnas tshul yin tshul gyi
NK055(ri)001:3666: don la sgros ma btags skur pa ma btab dbri
NK055(ri)001:3667: bsnan bral ba nyid/ phyogs gcig gi mtha' ma yin pas rang snang lhun gyis grub pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:3668: gong ma'i bshad pa'i don de rnams ni gnas tshul te/
NK055(ri)001:3669: lam pas de nyid ston pa'i lung dang bla ma
NK055(ri)001:3670: dam pa'i man ngag gis thos bsam gyi sgo nas
NK055(ri)001:3671: gzhi ji lta bar rig pa la mngon du gyur
NK055(ri)001:3672: pa ni blta bya lta byed med kyang /
NK055(ri)001:3673: de'i ngang las mi 'da' ba ni lta ba zhes bya ste/
NK055(ri)001:3674: lam gyi gzhi'i rgyu shes pa'i mtshan nyid yin pa/
NK055(ri)001:3675: lam bsgrub pa'i gzhi yin pas dgos 'brel bzhi'i dbang du byas na dgos pa/
NK055(ri)001:3676: bsnyen bsgrub bzhi'i dbang du byas na 'bras bu la bsnyen pa tsam yin pas bsnyen pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:3677: theg pa mchog gi thar lam pa gang gis lta
NK055(ri)001:3678: ba rtogs pa de ltar 'dris shing goms te dbang
NK055(ri)001:3679: bsgyur ba'i phyir ting nge 'dzin gyis bsgom pas nyams
NK055(ri)001:3680: su blang ba ni/ sku dang ye shes kyi ngo
NK055(ri)001:3681: bo la gnas bya gnas byed med pa'i tshul gyis
NK055(ri)001:3682: ting nge 'dzin la mi 'gyur bar gnas pa ni
NK055(ri)001:3683: su blang ba ni/ sngags 'chang ba/ lam gyi rnal 'byor zhes bya ste/
NK055(ri)001:3684: 'bras bu thob par byed pa'i rkyen bsgom pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis lam la 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid de/
NK055(ri)001:3685: lta ba ni shes pa zhes bya ste/
NK055(ri)001:3686: dper na rdo rje gdan lo rgyus kyi sgo nas shes pa lta bu'o //
NK055(ri)001:3688: lo rgyus kyi sgo nas shes pa'i yul de mthong zhing nyams su myong bar bya ba'i phyir/
NK055(ri)001:3689: lam la 'jug nas gom pa 'dor ba lta bu'o //
NK055(ri)001:3690: des na ting nge 'dzin la rkyen 'jug pa zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:3691: spyod pa ci la'ang thogs med pa'i //
NK055(ri)001:3693: gong du bshad pa'i lta ba rtogs/
NK055(ri)001:3694: bsgom pas nyams su blang ba'i spyod pa'i sgo nas kyang rkyen 'jug bstan te/
NK055(ri)001:3695: ci la'ang thogs pa med pa yi //
NK055(ri)001:3696: zhes pa'i spyod pa'i dngos po gang yang 'gag pa med pa kho na ste/
NK055(ri)001:3697: lta spyod gnyis kyi 'brel pa ni spyod pas gang la yang chags zhen mi byed/
NK055(ri)001:3700: rang snang du dper na thang shing yal ga rlung gis g.yo ba lta bu'i don dam dang ldan na/
NK055(ri)001:3701: lta ba klong du gyur la dbang sgyur bar byed/
NK055(ri)001:3702: ces pa klong ni chu klung chen po 'khrugs na/
NK055(ri)001:3703: chu'i 'gal rkyen shing rdo sa gsum la sogs pa
NK055(ri)001:3704: thams cad chu'i nang du phyin na slar chu'i sdongs
NK055(ri)001:3705: su 'gyur te/ nus pa che ba bongs che ba
NK055(ri)001:3706: klong che ba bzhin du la bzla ba'i dbang du
NK055(ri)001:3707: byas na gnag las spyod kyang rang byung ye shes
NK055(ri)001:3709: des na spyod pa ni lta bsgom gnyis kyi rlan zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:3710: lta ba spyod pa'i rlan zhes bya ste/
NK055(ri)001:3711: lta ba mnyam pa nyid ched 'dzin thams cad dang
NK055(ri)001:3712: bral bas de nyid rang snang bar spyod pa lta
NK055(ri)001:3713: ba'i dbang gis spyod pa ji ltar spyad kyang de'i
NK055(ri)001:3714: dbang gis gos pa med pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:3715: spyad pas dkar nag gi las gang la yang bya
NK055(ri)001:3716: ba'i yul dang byed pa po'i byed mkhan dang dngos
NK055(ri)001:3717: su byed bdo ba'i dngos po rnams yid la byed
NK055(ri)001:3718: pa ni/ thogs pa dang bcas pa zhes bya ste 'du shes kyi gzung 'dzin dang bcas pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:3719: gang de bsrung gi 'dzin pa med pa rang snang
NK055(ri)001:3720: du shar ba ni thogs pa med pa zhes bya'o
NK055(ri)001:3721: // gang la'ang spang bsgrub bag tsha ba dogs pa
NK055(ri)001:3722: med pa ni bu chung lta bu'o zhes kyang gsungs
NK055(ri)001:3723: // so // thams cad ye nas dbyer med pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:3724: zhes pa gong gi lta spyod bsgom gsum dbyer med pa'i gtan tshigs te/
NK055(ri)001:3725: yul du byas pa'i btags pa thams cad ni gdod
NK055(ri)001:3726: ma nyid nas sems kyi ye shes su snang stong
NK055(ri)001:3727: gnyis su dbyer med pa kho nar gnas pa'i phyir/
NK055(ri)001:3728: don gyi gnas tshul de nyid la gnas tshul bzhin
NK055(ri)001:3729: du lta spyod bsgom gsum dbyer med pa'i sgo nas
NK055(ri)001:3730: nyams su blangs pa goms pa mthar phyin pa 'bras
NK055(ri)001:3731: bu'i phyir theg pa'i dngos gazhi'o //
NK055(ri)001:3732: de ltar lta spyod gnyis dang ldan pa ni rkyen
NK055(ri)001:3733: 'jug pa rten gyi gang zag gis nyams su len
NK055(ri)001:3734: pa lta spyod 'brel ba dang nyes pa'i bsnyen pa
NK055(ri)001:3735: ste/ mi phyed pa'i gzungs kyi rgyal mo dang /
NK055(ri)001:3736: 'du 'bral med pa bsgrub pa'i ngo bo'o //
NK055(ri)001:3737: de nyid mngon du byas pa ni bsgrub pa chen
NK055(ri)001:3738: po'i 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid de dgos pa'i dgos pa
NK055(ri)001:3739: zhes bya'o // tshom bu gcig pa la sgrub pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:3740: rdo rje'i rigs su thams cad dkyil //
NK055(ri)001:3742: 'di la rnal 'byor pa grangs mang nyung nges pa
NK055(ri)001:3743: med pas thams cad kyis gsang chen rdo rje sems
NK055(ri)001:3744: dpa' kho nar bsgom/ de nas ting nge 'dzin gyi 'phro 'du dang /
NK055(ri)001:3745: yo byad la spyad pa rnams mthun pa nyid du bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:3746: tshom bu gcig pa'i dbang du na tshogs kyi dkyil
NK055(ri)001:3747: 'khor sgrub pa'i dbang du bsgrub pa'i thabs ston pa
NK055(ri)001:3748: ni/ rdo rje'i rigs su rigs bzhi po 'dus pa'i phyir thams cad dkyil zhes bya ba kho na'o //
NK055(ri)001:3749: drug pa rdo rje 'chang gi rigs kyang /
NK055(ri)001:3750: rigs thams cad dbyer med cing lhun gyis grub par
NK055(ri)001:3751: mi phyed pa'i don gyis bla dwags su rdo rje'i
NK055(ri)001:3752: rigs zhes bya'o // 'od 'phro 'bar ba rab tu bsgom //
NK055(ri)001:3753: zhes pa'i 'od 'phro ba ni tshom bu gcig pa'i
NK055(ri)001:3754: lha rnams kyi yan lag gi lha rnams dang bcas
NK055(ri)001:3755: par bsgom pa'o // 'bar ba ni rtsa ba dang
NK055(ri)001:3756: yan lag gi lha rnams dang bcas pa 'od 'bar
NK055(ri)001:3757: ba dang bcas pa ting nge 'dzin gsal ba la
NK055(ri)001:3758: par bsgom pa'o // bsgom zhes bya'o // chags med tshul gyis bstim par bya //
NK055(ri)001:3759: zhes pa rnal 'byor ba rnams bsgrub pa'i longs spyod rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/
NK055(ri)001:3760: nam mkha'i bya lam ltar chags pa med 'dzin pa med de/
NK055(ri)001:3761: 'du shes thams cad dang bral bas lha'i 'od zer
NK055(ri)001:3762: 'phro ba nyid rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis nang du
NK055(ri)001:3764: byas 'dzin gyi ngo bo med par mnyam pa nyid
NK055(ri)001:3765: du lhun gyis grub pa la thim pa zhes bya'o
NK055(ri)001:3766: // gnyis med gyur nas phyag rgya che //
NK055(ri)001:3768: +aa li k+aa li ma gtogs pa'i yo byad bzhi
NK055(ri)001:3769: po lta spyod gnyis su med pa'i dgongs pa gyur
NK055(ri)001:3770: pa ni gnyen pos ma bcos pas de nyid du
NK055(ri)001:3771: rang bral ba ste/ 'bras bu phyag rgya chen po'i rig 'dzin thob bo //
NK055(ri)001:3772: yo byad lnga la +aa li k+aa li la spyad pas ni/
NK055(ri)001:3773: nyi zla gnyis su med pa'i thabs dang shes rab kyi phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub thob pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:3774: lhun gyis grub pa'i rig 'dzin lhun gyis grub pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:3776: yang na sku gsung thugs nyid de //
NK055(ri)001:3778: yang na ni tshom bu gcig pa las dgar ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:3779: sku gsung thugs nyid de zhes pa/
NK055(ri)001:3780: shar du sku rnam par snang mdzad yab yum bcu/
NK055(ri)001:3781: gsung rgyab tu pad+ma'i rigs yab yum bcu/
NK055(ri)001:3782: thugs dbus su mi bskyod pa'i rigs yab yum bcu ste khro bo yab yum brgyad zung ngo //
NK055(ri)001:3783: de ltar tshom bu gsum pa bsgom pa'i dgos pa
NK055(ri)001:3784: ni bsgyur bya khams gsum gyi chos thams cad snang
NK055(ri)001:3786: dran rtog thams cad thugs su lhun gyis grub pa'i phyir/
NK055(ri)001:3787: de sbyong bar byed pa'i lam du yang /
NK055(ri)001:3788: tshom bu gsum pa'i bsgrub pa ston pas lha bzhi
NK055(ri)001:3789: bcu rtsa drug gi ting nge 'dzin rig pa lhun
NK055(ri)001:3790: gyis grub cing gsal ba dang /
NK055(ri)001:3791: 'od zer phar 'phro tshur 'phro dang bcas par bsgom/
NK055(ri)001:3792: gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du thim //
NK055(ri)001:3794: longs spyod la longs spyad pa'i dus su/
NK055(ri)001:3795: lta spyod gnyis su med par gyur pa'i don byas
NK055(ri)001:3796: 'dzin dang bral ba dbyings kyi ngang du thim ste
NK055(ri)001:3797: mnyam pa nyid kyi dgongs pa gsal ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:3800: rnal 'byor pas yo byad rnam pa lnga la spyad pa'i dus su/
NK055(ri)001:3801: lta spyod sgom gsum mgo snyoms pa'i dgongs par lhun
NK055(ri)001:3802: gyis grub pas mnyam pa nyid kyi dbyings las ma
NK055(ri)001:3803: gtogs pa'i 'du shes kyi rgyu ba rgyun dag pa'i
NK055(ri)001:3804: dus su 'bras bu rig pa 'dzin pa gsum las/
NK055(ri)001:3807: mchog lhun gyis grub pa'i rig 'dzin te/
NK055(ri)001:3808: de thob pa ni dbang po yang rab kyi spyod yul te/
NK055(ri)001:3810: brgya dor cig car mthar 'gro ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:3813: bcud len sman gyi rig 'dzin dang /
NK055(ri)001:3814: rtsa rlung sgrol ma'i rig 'dzin dang /
NK055(ri)001:3815: 'jig rten pa'i rig 'dzin me chu rlung gi rig 'dzin bshad pa rnams kyang /
NK055(ri)001:3816: dngos po med kyang dngos po ltar snang ba dngos
NK055(ri)001:3817: grub tu bshad pa yin par de nyid las dgar
NK055(ri)001:3818: te/ 'dir rig 'dzin rnam gsum gang yin yang /
NK055(ri)001:3819: lta spyod sgom gsum dbyer med pa'i 'bras bu dngos
NK055(ri)001:3820: po med pa'i ngo bo nyid mngon du 'grub pa
NK055(ri)001:3821: mchog gi dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:3824: bsgrub pa mthar phyin pa'i drod tshad sgrub pa chen po 'bras bu la nye ba ste/
NK055(ri)001:3825: lta spyod mgo snyoms pa'i spyod pa'i dngos po 'jol nyog tu gzhung dang mthun par nyams su lon/
NK055(ri)001:3826: ting nge 'dzin gyi spro bsdu rnal 'byor pa nang
NK055(ri)001:3827: du gcig la gcig gi 'od zer bstim pa goms
NK055(ri)001:3828: pa mthar phyin pa'i dus su/
NK055(ri)001:3829: rtsol ba phra ba tsam yang mi dgos par rang
NK055(ri)001:3830: snang du lhun gyis grub pa'i dus su dkyil 'khor
NK055(ri)001:3831: ma lus ni/ tshom bu'i dkyil 'khor ma lus pa thams cad 'ong phung du gyur pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:3833: 'od zer 'phro ba dang bcas te shar phyogs kyi
NK055(ri)001:3834: 'od phung rnams nub phyogs pa la thim pa la
NK055(ri)001:3835: sogs pa'i phyogs phyogs rnams gcig la gcig thim nas
NK055(ri)001:3836: 'od phung du gyur pa'i dus su/
NK055(ri)001:3837: phyogs bcu'i bud+d+hasa kyang 'od zer bstim pa rnal 'byor
NK055(ri)001:3838: pa'i rig pa la gsal nas grub pa mthar phyin
NK055(ri)001:3841: nyon mongs sdug bsngal sel bar byed //
NK055(ri)001:3842: ces pa sa tshod na mthong ba'i lam yan chad
NK055(ri)001:3843: kyi rim pa rnams yin pa'i dbang gis lam pa
NK055(ri)001:3844: rang ngo la khams gsum rtogs pa'i ngo la rang
NK055(ri)001:3845: sar dag ste/ nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams dag pa ni rgyud dag pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:3846: des khams gsum gyi sdug bsngal mun pa snang bar
NK055(ri)001:3847: gyur pa dang 'dra ba ni 'bras bu dag pa'o
NK055(ri)001:3848: // sel ba ni lam pa la nyams su blangs pa'i stobs kyis te/
NK055(ri)001:3849: dbang po mtho dman gyi bye brag gis rig 'dzin gsum la gnas pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:3850: rdo rje'i rigs su skye ba'o gnas //
NK055(ri)001:3852: 'bras bu mngon du byas pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad sku gsung thugs kho nar 'dus la/
NK055(ri)001:3853: de dag kyang dbyer med cing mi phyed de/
NK055(ri)001:3854: thugs rdo rje'i rigs kyi ngo bo yin pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:3856: rig 'dzin rnam gsum gong nas gong du son pa
NK055(ri)001:3857: las gzhan du ma yin pas na gnas zhes smos
NK055(ri)001:3858: so // tshom bu lnga pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:3859: sngags 'chang dngos grub yang dag ni //
NK055(ri)001:3861: sngags 'chang ni 'dir rten gyi gang zag gong du
NK055(ri)001:3862: bshad pa'i rnal 'byor gyi mngon sum du 'chang ba'i
NK055(ri)001:3864: dngos grub ni mchog ste tshe dbang yan chad do //
NK055(ri)001:3865: yang dag ni de las snang ba'i 'bras bu bud+d+ha'o //
NK055(ri)001:3866: de bsgrub pa'i phyir tshom bu lnga pa bstan pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:3867: thabs dang shes rab thams cad kyis //
NK055(ri)001:3868: zhes pa thabs ni yab rnams so //
NK055(ri)001:3869: shes rab ni yum rnams so //
NK055(ri)001:3871: tshom bu lnga'i dkyil 'khor te nye bsnyen gyi skabs su bshad pa bzhin du shes par bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:3872: khro phreng ni khro bo yab yum nyi shu ste gong du bstan pa bzhin bsgom mo //
NK055(ri)001:3873: chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis ni //
NK055(ri)001:3875: de ltar tshom bu rgyas pa'i lha rnams kyis sgrub pa'i yo byad lnga la spyad pa'i dus su/
NK055(ri)001:3876: yo byad lnga yul lnga'i longs spyod du ma 'dus pa med pas/
NK055(ri)001:3877: gzugs thams cad mig gis mthong /
NK055(ri)001:3878: mthong bya mthong byed gnyis 'dzin mi mnga' ba mnyam
NK055(ri)001:3879: pa nyid kyi ngang la yul dang yul can med
NK055(ri)001:3880: pas chags med/ rna bas glu gar rol mo'i sgra thos/
NK055(ri)001:3881: thos bya thos byed med pa sems kyi ye shes su gsal/
NK055(ri)001:3882: mnyam pa nyid kyi ngang la yul dang yul can med/
NK055(ri)001:3883: gnyis 'dzin mi mnga' bas mnyam nyid ngang du thim/
NK055(ri)001:3884: yul drug gi chos thams cad des 'gre ba ni chags pa med pa zhes bya/
NK055(ri)001:3885: tshul ni de lta bu'i dgongs pa la 'bras bu lam du byed pa'i gtan tshigs kyis/
NK055(ri)001:3886: g.yo thob goms brtan mthar phyin pa'i tshul gyis nyams su len par byed pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:3889: ting nge 'dzin gyi 'od zer rnal 'byor pa'i nang
NK055(ri)001:3890: du 'phro ba sngar bshad pa bzhin bya ba dang
NK055(ri)001:3891: / phyogs bcur spros nas mdzad pa bcu gnyis kyis 'gro don byed pa rnams kyang shes par bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:3892: gnyis su med par bstim par byas //
NK055(ri)001:3894: de ltar sgrub pa mthar phyin pa lta ba'i skabs te/
NK055(ri)001:3895: spyod pa'i dngos po ci spyad kyang lta sgom spyod
NK055(ri)001:3896: gsum dbyer pa'i ngang la bya ba dang byed pa'am
NK055(ri)001:3898: spyod bya spyod byed gnyis su med par nyams su blangs te/
NK055(ri)001:3899: brtan pa mthar phyin nas rang gi ngo bo nyid
NK055(ri)001:3900: du gyur te 'dzin pa phra ba yang med par
NK055(ri)001:3901: goms pa la ni bstim par bya zhes bya ste/
NK055(ri)001:3904: zhi ba'i bsnyen bsgrub byas nas/
NK055(ri)001:3905: khro bo'i sgo nas dngos grub nyams su blang ba'i cho ga byas nas/
NK055(ri)001:3906: dngos grub mchog gi snying po 'grub //
NK055(ri)001:3908: dngos grub mchog mthar phyin pa'i 'bras bu sku lnga lhun gyis grub pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:3909: snying po ni sgra gsum las 'dir rtsa ba'am gzhi
NK055(ri)001:3910: las 'dir sa bon lta bur gyur pa'i don gyis
NK055(ri)001:3911: snying po ste/ sku lnga lhun gyis grub pa'i rig 'dzin la snang bas de 'grub ces bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:3912: rnal 'byor thabs dang shes rab kyis //
NK055(ri)001:3914: 'di ni dkyil 'khor rgyas 'bring bsdus gsum gyi spyi khyab tu bstan te/
NK055(ri)001:3915: rnal 'byor ni rten gyi gang zag go //
NK055(ri)001:3918: thabs yab rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs par bsgom/
NK055(ri)001:3919: shes rab rnams yum du bsgom/
NK055(ri)001:3921: yab rnams kyis sems dpar bsgom/
NK055(ri)001:3922: yum rnams kyis sems mar bsgom/
NK055(ri)001:3923: gtso bo dang sems dpa' yab dang yum rnams kyi so so'i sngags ma 'dres pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:3924: phyag rgya bsgom pa dang 'ching ba so sor ma 'dres pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:3925: so so'i ting nge 'dzin yang dag par so sor gsal bar bsgom zhes bya ste/
NK055(ri)001:3926: dkyil 'khor gyi lha spyi khyab yin/
NK055(ri)001:3927: slob dpon sgeg pa'i rdo rjes ni/
NK055(ri)001:3928: dkyil 'khor bsdus pa'i lha bco brgyad du'ang bzhed de/
NK055(ri)001:3930: lhag pa ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor dang /
NK055(ri)001:3931: lhag pa gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor kun dang sbyar te/
NK055(ri)001:3932: tshogs bsgrub pa'i zhar byung lta bu'o //
NK055(ri)001:3934: so so'i sngags dang phyag rgya dang //
NK055(ri)001:3935: ting 'dzin yang dag so sor gsal //
NK055(ri)001:3937: rnal 'byor pa rnams dkyil 'khor gcig yin kyang de rnams so sor ma 'dres par gdams pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:3938: yo byad bzhi la spyad thabs ni/
NK055(ri)001:3939: gong yan lag dbang po rnam shes kun //
NK055(ri)001:3941: yan lag ni rnam pa lnga ste mgo la sogs pa lnga'o //
NK055(ri)001:3942: dbang po yang mig gi dbang po la sogs pa lnga'o //
NK055(ri)001:3943: rnam shes kyang mig la sogs pa'i rnam shes lnga ste yul can thabs kyi cha'o //
NK055(ri)001:3944: de yang 'dir spyod pa'i dus kyi lta ba snyam blo yang ma yin/
NK055(ri)001:3945: nyams su myong ba'i ting nge 'dzin kho na ston te/
NK055(ri)001:3946: 'dir zag bcas las 'das te zag med kho na mngon du snang bar byas pa'i sgrub pa yin pas/
NK055(ri)001:3947: da lta'i lta ba yid yul tsam dang ting nge
NK055(ri)001:3948: 'dzin ched byas snyam blo tsam gyis la mi chod
NK055(ri)001:3949: de/ de'i dus kyi rnal 'byor pas lta ba rtogs pa gdengs chud/
NK055(ri)001:3950: ting nge 'dzin spros pa mthar phyin pa yan chad
NK055(ri)001:3951: snang ba rnam 'byed kyi ting nge 'dzin mngon du
NK055(ri)001:3952: byas pa'ang btub ste/ de dag gi skabs kyi ting nge 'dzin ni/
NK055(ri)001:3953: bsgom bya sgom byed bral ba'i rig pa rang snang
NK055(ri)001:3954: kho na yin zhing btsal ba med pas mi 'gag
NK055(ri)001:3955: pa kho na'o // des na spyod pa spyad pa'i
NK055(ri)001:3956: ting nge 'dzin nyams su myong ba'i lta bas blo
NK055(ri)001:3957: byas kyi de yin snyam pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi
NK055(ri)001:3958: nyams kyis bsgoms nas gcig bsgom pa lta bu ma
NK055(ri)001:3959: pa kho na'o // yin te/ rtsol ba bral bas
NK055(ri)001:3960: bsgom bya sgom byed ma dmigs par rang snang du
NK055(ri)001:3962: de'i gtan tshigs kyang yan lag dbang po rnam shes la sogs te/
NK055(ri)001:3963: phyi nang gi chos thams cad sems rang rig pa
NK055(ri)001:3964: nyid rang snang bas rtogs te brtan nas snang bya
NK055(ri)001:3965: snang byed ma dmigs pa ni lta ba'i ngo bo'o
NK055(ri)001:3967: gzung 'dzin tha mal pa'i yul gyi rnam pa bzang ngan bar ma gsum du mi dmigs te/
NK055(ri)001:3968: gtan tshigs ni sems rang rig par dbyer med pas
NK055(ri)001:3969: de nyid la yul dang yul can med pa dang
NK055(ri)001:3970: / de'i dbang gis 'du shes kyi gzung 'dzin las grol ba dang /
NK055(ri)001:3971: mnyam pa nyid kyi ngang las ma dmigs pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:3972: de las grol ba'i ngo bo gang yin na snang
NK055(ri)001:3973: stong mnyam pa nyid sems nyid rang rig pa'i ngang
NK055(ri)001:3974: du gsal ba ni/ +amo yi ge cha lnga pa
NK055(ri)001:3975: yi ge'i bdag nyid snang stong dbyer med ces bya
NK055(ri)001:3976: du gsal ba ni/ ste/ snang 'dzin stong 'dzin dag
NK055(ri)001:3977: ma dag gnyis 'dzin thams cad dag ste btsal kyang
NK055(ri)001:3978: ma rnyed byas kyang nam mkha' gzugs su mi snang
NK055(ri)001:3979: ba dang 'dra bar lhun gyis grub pa'i rang rig
NK055(ri)001:3980: pa rang byung gi bdag nyid ni ye shes lngar
NK055(ri)001:3981: du gsal ba ni/ ste/ snang ste/ dngos po thams
NK055(ri)001:3982: cad dang bral bas mtha' stong bas stong pa nyid
NK055(ri)001:3983: du gsal ba ni/ ste/ snang ste/ kyi ye shes/
NK055(ri)001:3984: stong pa'i mtha' ma yin par rang gsal ba'i bdag
NK055(ri)001:3985: nyid du bzhugs pas me long lta bu'i ye shes/
NK055(ri)001:3986: rang gsal ba nyid cir yang mi 'gag par snang ba so sor rtogs pa'i ye shes/
NK055(ri)001:3987: dgos pa thams cad tshim par byed pa bya ba grub pa'i ye shes/
NK055(ri)001:3988: ji ltar snang yang chos kyi dbyings las ma g.yos pa mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes/
NK055(ri)001:3989: des na dbang po dang rnam shes ma 'gag yul
NK055(ri)001:3990: can gyi chos thams cad spyod pa la rol bdo
NK055(ri)001:3991: ba'i dus su/ du shes par bya zhes pas/
NK055(ri)001:3992: ye shes lnga'i ngo bo de nyid rang gsal ba'i
NK055(ri)001:3993: dgongs pa nyams su lon pa la ni shes par
NK055(ri)001:3994: bya zhes so // de la rgyud 'di'i gzhung gis ma bsgyur rnal ma'i dkyil 'khor zhi ba dang /
NK055(ri)001:3995: bsgyur ba khrag 'thung gi dkyil 'khor khro bo gnyis/
NK055(ri)001:3996: zhi ba la yang dkyil 'khor rgyas bsdus tshom bu
NK055(ri)001:3997: rgyas bsdus drug /khro bo la yang dkyil 'khor tshom
NK055(ri)001:3998: bu gsum drug zhi khro gnyis mnyam pas/
NK055(ri)001:3999: 'dir zhi ba gtso che bar bshad de/
NK055(ri)001:4000: khro bo zhi ba'i shugs kyis mgo bsgre ste/
NK055(ri)001:4002: yo byad kyi skabs 'dir yang zhi ba dngos su bshad nas khro bo shugs las bstan pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:4003: de la zhi khro gnyis ka'i skabs su mchog gi
NK055(ri)001:4004: bsgrub pa nyams su blang ba'i dus su snang ba
NK055(ri)001:4005: rnam par 'byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin gtso bas bsgrub
NK055(ri)001:4006: pa dngos gzhi khro bo'i dkyil 'khor yin kyang /
NK055(ri)001:4007: longs spyod rnams zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor byas kyang mi sto ste/
NK055(ri)001:4008: zhi khro gnyis dbyer med pa'i phyir khro bo'i dkyil 'khor yang bshad de/
NK055(ri)001:4009: gong du lta ba bstan nas ting nge 'dzin dngos ni/
NK055(ri)001:4010: 'dir bskyed pa'i rim pa'i lam yin pa'i dbang gis yan lag lnga'am rnam shes lnga rnams/
NK055(ri)001:4011: rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor nyid du bsgom //
NK055(ri)001:4013: 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad ma 'dres la yongs
NK055(ri)001:4014: su rdzogs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor
NK055(ri)001:4015: ni rigs lnga nyid du bsgom zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:4018: khro bo'i bsgrub pa yin na khrag 'thung lnga'i dkyil 'khor du bsgom mo //
NK055(ri)001:4020: gzugs sgra dri ro reg la sogs //
NK055(ri)001:4021: zhes pa yul brlab pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:4022: yul lnga po der chos thams cad ma 'dus pa
NK055(ri)001:4023: med par sogs khongs su gong ma rnams bsdu ba
NK055(ri)001:4024: ste/ 'on kyang gos rgyan bza' btung logs su dgar ba'ang mi 'gal lo //
NK055(ri)001:4025: de'i lta ba ni gong du yul can gyi skabs su bshad pa'ang 'gre ste/
NK055(ri)001:4026: bdag nyid chen po las mi gzhan pa'i phyir/
NK055(ri)001:4027: rnam smin ni tha mal pa'i 'du shes dag pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:4028: de'i ngang las snang bya snang byed med par rang
NK055(ri)001:4029: snang du gsal ba ni dbyings gsum las mnyam pa
NK055(ri)001:4030: nyid kyi dbyings te/ dbyings mtshon pa ni yi ge m+aum du shes par bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:4031: shes pa ni rtogs pa mngon du gyur nas gsal ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:4032: yum gyi dkyil 'khor nyid du bsgom //
NK055(ri)001:4033: zhes pa yul lnga snang tsam nyid na kun tu bzang mo la sogs pa yum lngar bsgoms nas/
NK055(ri)001:4034: yul dang rnam shes 'dzom pa'i myong ba rigs lnga
NK055(ri)001:4035: yab yum thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa dgongs
NK055(ri)001:4036: pa gsal ba'o // yang na khro mo'i dkyil 'khor bsgom //
NK055(ri)001:4038: khro bo'i bsgrub pa yin na khrag 'thung yum lngar bsgom pa'i dgongs pa zhi ba dang mthun no //
NK055(ri)001:4039: de yan chad ni spyir 'gro ba ste tshogs kyi
NK055(ri)001:4040: spyod pa'i dus su lta bsgom spyi'i bdag nyid du
NK055(ri)001:4041: shes par bya'o // tshogs kyi yo byad bzhi so sor byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir/
NK055(ri)001:4042: gos rgyan bza' btung glu dang tshig /zhes pa la sogs pa/
NK055(ri)001:4043: zhi ba'i skabs su gos ni mnabs pa'i yan lag
NK055(ri)001:4044: ste dar zab dang spu slag la sogs pa rnams
NK055(ri)001:4045: so // rgyan ni rin po che'i rgyan la sogs pa lnga'o //
NK055(ri)001:4046: bza' ba ni zhal zas kyi tshogs sha thud dang g.yos kyi tshogs so //
NK055(ri)001:4047: btung ba ni 'bras chang dang rgun chang la sogs pa rnams so //
NK055(ri)001:4048: glu ni gre ba'i 'gyur ka gzhan gyi yid 'phrog par byed pa'i ngag go //
NK055(ri)001:4049: tshig ni bstod pa dang dngos su skye med ston par byed pa'i tshigs rnams so //
NK055(ri)001:4051: gar ni lag pa'i las te rigs so so'i bro gar rgyud gzhung rnams nas ston pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:4052: rigs spyi'i bro gar ni rgyas pa'i rgyud nas le'u gcig gis ston pa de dag go //
NK055(ri)001:4053: de dag mang zhing bung che bar bya ba'i phyir kun tshogs pa la ni tshogs zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:4054: bungs che ba la ni sprin dpung zhes smos so //
NK055(ri)001:4055: h'u du shes pas rab spyad na //
NK055(ri)001:4057: gong du bshad pa ltar rang rig rang snang du dgongs pa lhun gyis grub pa ni h'u/
NK055(ri)001:4058: rig pa rang snang bas h'u du zhes bya ste/
NK055(ri)001:4060: spyod pa'i dus su rab tu spyad pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:4061: gzung 'dzin gyis ma gos pa yin te/
NK055(ri)001:4062: spyod bzhin du ma chags pa spyod bya spyod byed
NK055(ri)001:4063: med par nya chu las 'phyo ba kha gting gar
NK055(ri)001:4064: yang chu las mi 'da' ba bzhin/
NK055(ri)001:4065: spyod pa'i dngos po ci spyad kyang lta ba la 'phel 'grib med pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:4066: bya nam mkha' la 'phur ba bde blag tu dbang bsgyur zhing rjes la 'dzin pa med pa bzhin/
NK055(ri)001:4067: spyod pa'i dngos po ji ltar spyad kyang lta spyod
NK055(ri)001:4068: sgom gsum gyi ngang la tshogs gnyis rgyu 'bras med
NK055(ri)001:4070: ma 'gag par rang snang ba bsod nams/
NK055(ri)001:4071: ma dmigs pa ye shes de gnyis kyang cig car
NK055(ri)001:4072: du lhun gyis grub pa ni theg pa 'og ma'i
NK055(ri)001:4073: spang bya 'dir tshogs gnyis lhun gyis grub pa ni
NK055(ri)001:4074: ngo mtshar la de bas che ba med na/
NK055(ri)001:4075: mnyam pa nyid kyi mchod pa zhes bya ste/
NK055(ri)001:4076: yul dang bral ba'i mnyes pa chen po mchod pa'i 'bras bu lhun gyis rdzogs pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:4079: dngos grub thams cad 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid spyod
NK055(ri)001:4080: pa nyams su lon pas phul ba med par mnyes
NK055(ri)001:4083: lha mo klu mo rigs ngan mo //
NK055(ri)001:4085: de'i dus su 'di dag dngos su bkug pa yang yin la/
NK055(ri)001:4086: yang lo grangs kyi dbang du byas pa yin na/
NK055(ri)001:4087: lha mo klu mo gsum gyi thad sor lo bcu gnyis ma dang /
NK055(ri)001:4089: nyi shu ma dang gsum mo //
NK055(ri)001:4094: yang na zla ba dang nyi ma dang gnyis ka dang gsum/
NK055(ri)001:4095: yang na thabs kyi sgo nas kyang ston no //
NK055(ri)001:4096: dbye 'am yang na mi dbye bar //
NK055(ri)001:4098: dabye'am zhes pa ni rang gi rtogs pa'i ngo ste/
NK055(ri)001:4099: lta ba dang ting nge 'dzin dang spyod pa'i ngang
NK055(ri)001:4100: la spang blang gi cha yod na dbye la bzang
NK055(ri)001:4101: na gdam/ mi dbye zhes pa/
NK055(ri)001:4102: dgongs pa la bzang ngan gyi 'du shes dang bral na mi dbye ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:4103: nyams su blang ba'i thabs dngos ni/
NK055(ri)001:4104: de la bsnyen pa ni 'dir sbyor ba'i bsnyen bsgrub bzhi ste/
NK055(ri)001:4105: rnyed na lus ngag yid gsum gyi chos kyis brtan par bya ba ste/
NK055(ri)001:4106: lus kyi sgo nas zas bsrung dri bzang gis khrus bya/
NK055(ri)001:4108: ngag gi sgo nas sngags dang brda tshigs dang tha mal pa'i 'du shes mi brjod por bslab/
NK055(ri)001:4109: sems kyi sgo nas ting nge 'dzin dang sems kyi
NK055(ri)001:4110: las rnams bslab ste goms par byas pa ni bsnyen
NK055(ri)001:4111: pa'o // yo byad gos rgyan dang bza' btung gi tshogs kyis mnyes par byas pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:4112: ka ra na'i chos kyis ye shes rgyas pa ni nye ba'i bsnyen pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:4114: phyag rgya bzhi'i don dngos nyams su blangs pa ni bsgrub pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:4115: nyams su blang ba'i dus su bde ba'i ye shes la sgo ma bzhi dang /
NK055(ri)001:4117: mnyes pa'i lha mo bzhi dang bcu gnyis nyams su myong nas sems la 'bebs pa'i tshe/
NK055(ri)001:4118: nyi zla gnyis lce rdo rje rtse lnga par byin
NK055(ri)001:4119: gyis brlabsa pas blangs pa ni bsgrub pa chen po
NK055(ri)001:4120: ste/ de nyid gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir //
NK055(ri)001:4122: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te yum ni dngos so //
NK055(ri)001:4123: pad+ma ni sna rtser yungs 'bru'i gzhal yas khang ngo //
NK055(ri)001:4124: dkyil 'khor ni deng lha zhe gnyis sam/
NK055(ri)001:4127: bco brgyad kyi lha gang yin pa mkha' nyid b+h+r+aum las gzhal yas khang gdan dang bcas par gyur nas/
NK055(ri)001:4128: der byang sems las yig 'bru rnams gdan thog tu bkod/
NK055(ri)001:4130: de las sku rdzogs par bskyed na/
NK055(ri)001:4131: dbyings nas ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor spyan drangs la bstim dbyer med pa la/
NK055(ri)001:4132: bde ba thugs kyi dkyil 'khor spro //
NK055(ri)001:4133: zhes pa lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes kyi rten/
NK055(ri)001:4134: lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i bde ba/
NK055(ri)001:4135: rten dang brten can dbyer med pa'i byang chub kyi
NK055(ri)001:4136: sems ni thugs kyi bdag nyid yin pas thugs kyi
NK055(ri)001:4137: zhes bya'o // dkyil 'khor spro zhing byang chub kyi sems yum gyi mkha' la spros pa las/
NK055(ri)001:4138: mkha'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kyang de'i ro myong bar bsgom pa ni mchod pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:4139: sangs rgyas sprin tshogs ma lus la //
NK055(ri)001:4141: phyogs bcu'i bud+d+ha dkyil 'khor ma lus pa thams cad mkha'i dkyil 'khor du 'dus pa'am/
NK055(ri)001:4142: dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rtsa ba yin pas mkha'i
NK055(ri)001:4143: dkyil 'khor mnyes pas bud+d+ha'i dkyil 'khor ma lus pa
NK055(ri)001:4144: thams cad la dgyes pa chen po'i longs spyod kyis
NK055(ri)001:4145: myong nas mnyam pa chen po'i mchod pa mchog tu
NK055(ri)001:4147: mchog gi sbyin pas bstim zhes pa/
NK055(ri)001:4148: rgyal ba de ltar mnyes bas khams gsum gyi rtog
NK055(ri)001:4149: tshogs la'ang bde ba chen po'i ro myong bar 'gyur
NK055(ri)001:4150: pas sbyin pas bstiim zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:4151: de nas bsgrub pa chen po dngos grub blang ba ni/
NK055(ri)001:4152: bsgrub pa nyi zla'i snying po de //
NK055(ri)001:4154: thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa phyag rgya bzhi
NK055(ri)001:4155: yis rol pa nyams su blangs pa ni sgrub pa
NK055(ri)001:4156: zhes bya'o // nyi zla'i snying po ni nyi zla gnyis gcig tu 'dres te/
NK055(ri)001:4157: snying po ni de nyid ye shes lnga'i dkyil 'khor du gsal ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:4158: dkyil 'khor ni rten can ye shes lnga lhun gyis grub pa'i rten nyi zla gnyis 'dren pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:4159: rdo rje lce yis blang zhes pa/
NK055(ri)001:4161: rdo rje nyid lce'i ngo bo yin pas rlung la
NK055(ri)001:4162: dbang thob pa'i skyes bus rngubs nas lus kyi gnas
NK055(ri)001:4163: rnams su bkrams pa/ rtog tshogs bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis
NK055(ri)001:4164: sku dang ye shes su gsal ba ni dngos grub
