NK055(ri)001:4165: rnams su bkrams pa/ bo // de mi nus pa rnams kyi don du/
NK055(ri)001:4166: rdo rje lce yis blang zhes pa/
NK055(ri)001:4167: lce la rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsgoms nas des len pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:4169: 'dir yon tan spyi khyab yin kyang /
NK055(ri)001:4170: lce rdo rjer bsgoms nas blangs pa'i yon tan ni/
NK055(ri)001:4172: nam mkha' la bya bzhin du thogs pa med par 'gro ba dang /
NK055(ri)001:4174: lus shin tu gsal te gzhan gyi yid du mi 'ong ba med pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:4175: lus la 'od 'bar ba 'dod khams kyi lha'i rgyal po lta bu dang /
NK055(ri)001:4176: tshe ring ste nyi zla dang mnyam pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:4177: sogs khongs su mthong snang gi yon tan thams cad
NK055(ri)001:4178: lhun gyis grub par bstan te thun mong shas che
NK055(ri)001:4179: ba lta bu'o // rdo rje dngos kyis blangs pa'i 'bras bu ni/
NK055(ri)001:4180: yid bzhin sprin gyi bdag por 'gyur //
NK055(ri)001:4181: zhes pa rigs kyi bdag po rdo rje 'dzin pa chen por gyur nas/
NK055(ri)001:4182: gzhan don gyi mdzad pa rtog pa med kyang dgos
NK055(ri)001:4183: 'dod skong ba rin po che dbang gi rgyal po
NK055(ri)001:4184: lta bu dang / de'ang rgyun chad med par mang la gtibs pa sprin phung lta bur 'gyur ro //
NK055(ri)001:4185: yang na gong ma ni gnas skabs kyi 'bras bu yin la/
NK055(ri)001:4186: 'og ma ni mthar thug gi 'bras bu'o //
NK055(ri)001:4187: k+aa li'i phrin las kyi spyod pa ston te/
NK055(ri)001:4188: zhing gyur mchog dang mchog phran rnams //
NK055(ri)001:4189: zhes pa zhing ni gnyis te/
NK055(ri)001:4190: bkra shis dag pa'i zhing dang /
NK055(ri)001:4192: bkra shis dag pa'i zhing ni pha skye ba bdun pa lta bu ste/
NK055(ri)001:4193: rten 'brel gyis dngos grub snang ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:4195: bsgral ba'i zhing bcu lta bu'o //
NK055(ri)001:4196: de la mchog dang mchog phran zhes brjod pas/
NK055(ri)001:4197: mchog bdun ni dkon mchog gsum la gnod pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:4198: rdo rje slob dpon la gnod pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:4199: rtsa ba'i dam tshig nyams nas rdo rje dmyal bar 'gro nges pa lta bu dang /
NK055(ri)001:4200: ban+de yin kyang dam tshig mi bsrung ba dang /
NK055(ri)001:4201: dge ba byed pa thams cad kyi bar gcod byed pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:4202: sems can yongs la gnod pa'i mi nag lta bu dang /
NK055(ri)001:4203: dam tshig can gcig pa'i dgra byed cing chos byed
NK055(ri)001:4204: pa'i dgra byed pa dang bdun ni mchog chen no
NK055(ri)001:4205: // ngan song gsum ni mchog phra ba rnal 'byor pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi yul lo //
NK055(ri)001:4207: nyi zla'i dkyil du mkhas pas bzhag /ces pa/
NK055(ri)001:4208: e gru gsum gyi thog tu nyi zla bsgom ste/
NK055(ri)001:4210: he ru ka'i ting nge 'dzin ma yengs par 'khor ba ru bzlog pa'i tshul du gnan pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:4211: yang na nyi zla gnyis ni gnas spar ba'i dus su yang 'agro'o //
NK055(ri)001:4212: nga rgyal lag gi 'du byed bsgom //
NK055(ri)001:4213: zhes pa rang nyid yi dam lha'i nga rgyal dang ldan pa ni nga rgyal lo //
NK055(ri)001:4214: lag gi 'du byed bsgom pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:4215: rang nyid yi dam gyi ting nge 'dzin dang ldan
NK055(ri)001:4216: pas lag pa g.yas pa'i sor mo la yab lnga'i
NK055(ri)001:4217: sa bon/ g.yon pa la yum lnga'i sa bon/
NK055(ri)001:4218: de bcu las rigs lnga yab yum bcur bsgom ste/
NK055(ri)001:4219: thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i 'od zer gyis
NK055(ri)001:4220: bsgrub bya'i snying ga na gnas pa'i 'gro ba ris
NK055(ri)001:4221: drug gi sa bon bsregs te sbyangs nas sems mi
NK055(ri)001:4222: shigs pa'i thig le'i ngo bo nyid h'u de nyid
NK055(ri)001:4223: rnam shes rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo'o //
NK055(ri)001:4225: dbyings su thim nas phyag rgyar 'bar //
NK055(ri)001:4226: zhes pa bdag gi shangs su thim nas klad pa spyi bo bde chen gyi 'khor lo'i dbus nas/
NK055(ri)001:4227: zhes pa ni dbyings su thim pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:4229: klad pa nas sgal pa la brgyud/
NK055(ri)001:4230: gsang ba'i rdo rje nas yum gyi mkha' la phabs
NK055(ri)001:4231: te byang chub kyi sems kyis kyang bstims te bag
NK055(ri)001:4232: chags dag par byas pas h'u las thugs dam tshig
NK055(ri)001:4233: gi phyag rgya 'od 'bar ba dang bcas pa rdo
NK055(ri)001:4235: de rdo rje sems dpa'i skur gyur te/
NK055(ri)001:4237: dngos kyi nyon mongs pa lnga gnas su dag pa
NK055(ri)001:4238: sku chung ngu 'od zer sna lnga dang ldan par
NK055(ri)001:4239: bsgom/ gtsug tu rnam par rgyal bar bsgom //
NK055(ri)001:4240: zhes pa rdo rje sems dpa'i spyi gtsug tu kun
NK055(ri)001:4241: tu bzang po'i sku tshon gang ba gcig bsgom pa
NK055(ri)001:4242: ni/ bsgrub bya nyid 'khor ba las rgyal ba'i rtags so //
NK055(ri)001:4243: de nas nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor kha sbyar du bcugs
NK055(ri)001:4244: nas 'og min rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs kar
NK055(ri)001:4245: 'phang ngo // ngo mtshar ngan 'gro thar pa'i thabs //
NK055(ri)001:4247: yo ga man chad kyi theg pa la med cing /
NK055(ri)001:4248: de dag gi 'gal rkyen du gyur pa'i mdzad pa 'di ngo mtshar che zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:4250: kho dag la ngan song gi rgyu ma gtogs pa
NK055(ri)001:4251: mtho ris dang thar pa'i sa bon tsam yang med
NK055(ri)001:4252: pa las theg pa 'di nyid kyi stobs kyis thar
NK055(ri)001:4253: pa'i sa la bkod pa ste ngo mtshar che zhes
NK055(ri)001:4254: bya'o // brtsad pa'i skyon spang ba ni/
NK055(ri)001:4256: ngan song gsum gyi rgyu yin pas der mi 'agro'am zhe na mi 'gro bar bstan pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:4257: ye nas skye med de bzhin nyid //
NK055(ri)001:4259: spyod pa de dag gi ngo bo ye nas yin tshul gyi snang ba ni/
NK055(ri)001:4260: chos thams cad ye'am thog ma nas rgyu rkyen dang
NK055(ri)001:4261: bral bas skye med de kho na nyid sems kyi
NK055(ri)001:4262: de bzhin nyid du ye nas yin pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:4263: sgyu mar snang ba mig yor tshul //
NK055(ri)001:4265: gzhi de nyid las sgyu ma rgyu rkyen gyis bskyed pa'i tshul bzhin du/
NK055(ri)001:4266: rang gi ma rig gnyis kyis rgyu/
NK055(ri)001:4267: las dang nyon mongs pas rkyen byas/
NK055(ri)001:4268: rgyu rkyen 'dus pa tsam las 'khor ba'i 'khrul 'khor snang ba ni/
NK055(ri)001:4269: ngo bo la snang bya snang byed med kyang 'khrul
NK055(ri)001:4270: ngo'i shes pa tsam sgyu ma lta bur snang ba'o
NK055(ri)001:4271: // de la ngo bo nyid med pa la yod par mthong ba ni/
NK055(ri)001:4273: tho yor las mir snang nas 'khrul pa'i shes pa bskyed pa lta bu'o //
NK055(ri)001:4274: de'i dbang gis sgyu ma dang mig yor lta bur
NK055(ri)001:4275: rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas lta spyod bsgom gsum mgo
NK055(ri)001:4276: snyoms pas 'og ma'i spang bya kun byas pa lta
NK055(ri)001:4277: bur snang yang / yul dang yul can bya byed
NK055(ri)001:4278: kyi chos rdul phra rab tsam yang byas pa med
NK055(ri)001:4279: par mnyam pa nyid kyi ngang las 'du shes thams
NK055(ri)001:4280: cad dang bral te gang du yang ma grub pa'o
NK055(ri)001:4281: bur snang yang / // khro bo'i dkyil 'khor bsdus te bstan pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:4282: 'og khro bo khro mo'i tshogs chen po //
NK055(ri)001:4284: 'dir tshom bu rgyas bsdus kyi grangs dang /
NK055(ri)001:4285: bsnyen pa nye bsnyen bsgrub pa sgrub pa chen po bzhi dang /
NK055(ri)001:4286: yo byad lnga la spyad thabs rnams ni rnal 'byor
NK055(ri)001:4287: pa khro bor bsgom pa tsam min pas thams cad
NK055(ri)001:4289: de la khro bo khro mo'i tshogs chen po //
NK055(ri)001:4290: zhes pa ni khro bo khrag 'thung yab lnga'o //
NK055(ri)001:4291: khro mo ni khrag 'thung yum lnga'o //
NK055(ri)001:4292: de yang tshom bu rgyas pa'i dbang du na lha lnga bcu khro bo khro mo lnga bcu'o //
NK055(ri)001:4293: 'bring po'i dbang du byas nas khro bo khro mo sum cu'o //
NK055(ri)001:4294: chung ngu'i dbang du byas na khro bo yab yum bcu'o //
NK055(ri)001:4295: de la khro bo khro mo'i tshogs chen po zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:4296: zhi ba bas lhag pa khro bo la/
NK055(ri)001:4297: pho nya phyag brnyan bka' nyan sogs //
NK055(ri)001:4299: pho nya ni gnas kyi lha mo brgyad/
NK055(ri)001:4300: phyag brnyan ni yul gyi lha mo brgyad/
NK055(ri)001:4301: bka' nyan ni sgo ma bzhi dang nyi shu'o //
NK055(ri)001:4303: zhi rgyas dbang drag gi las la mnga' mdzad pa dbang phyug ma nyi shu rtsa brgyad/
NK055(ri)001:4304: sogs khongs su khro bo yab yum nyi shu bsdu ba ste/
NK055(ri)001:4305: rnal 'byor pa pho mo bdun cu rtsa brgyad tshogs pa rnams kyis bsgrubs na/
NK055(ri)001:4306: dngos grub las rnams rdzogs par byed //
NK055(ri)001:4308: las ni rnam bzhi dngos grub ni mchog thun mong gnyis ka yang 'grub bo zhes bya ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:4309: yo byad lnga la spyad pa'i 'bras bu ni/
NK055(ri)001:4310: le'u 'og ma'i mgo sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa bas mngon rdzogs pa'i //
NK055(ri)001:4312: sgyu ma ni snang bzhin du ma grub pa shes rab kyi bdag nyid yum rnams so //
NK055(ri)001:4313: 'phrul pa ni med bzhin du mi 'gag par 'char ba dkyil 'khor rgyas bsdus kyi thabs rnams so //
NK055(ri)001:4314: d+r+wa ba ni dbyer med pa ste don dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med/
NK055(ri)001:4315: rtags thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med/
NK055(ri)001:4316: lha yab yum thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:4317: tshom bu rgyas bsdus 'bring gsum gang yin pa'i sgo
NK055(ri)001:4318: nas tshogs sgrub par 'dod pa'i rten gyi gang zag
NK055(ri)001:4319: gis/ 'di gnyis kyi tshogs kyi las rgyas 'bring bsdus gsum la blo sbyang ste/
NK055(ri)001:4320: snang ba rnam par 'byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa des bsgrub ces pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:4321: spyir na bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi dkyil 'khor la
NK055(ri)001:4322: blo 'byongs nas snang ba rnam 'byed kyi ting nge
NK055(ri)001:4324: gzod sgrub pa tshom bu gsum gang mos la bsgrub pa bya'o zhes kyang bshad do //
NK055(ri)001:4325: yang zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor la blo 'byongs nas snang ba rnam 'byed thob pas/
NK055(ri)001:4326: khro bo la sgrub pa nyams su blang bar byas
NK055(ri)001:4327: na dngos grub nye bar slob dpon pad+mas gsungs so
NK055(ri)001:4328: // spyir snang ba rnam 'byed kyi ting nge 'dzin
NK055(ri)001:4329: la goms na lam pa'i rig pa rtsal rdzogs pas
NK055(ri)001:4330: gang ltar yang 'grub pa la thogs pa med do
NK055(ri)001:4331: // // des na sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba'i dkyil 'khor
NK055(ri)001:4332: rang rig pa'i mngon sum du rdzogs pa snang ba
NK055(ri)001:4334: dkyil 'khor gang bsgom yang ngo bo nyid du gyur pa la ni brtan pa zhes bya ste/
NK055(ri)001:4335: de ni dngos grub kyi dngos rgyu yin pa ste spyir bstan pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:4336: yo byad lnga la spyad thabs 'bras bu dang bcas pa so sor bstan pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:4339: dkyil 'khor gnas khang dang sa gzhi thams cad rdo
NK055(ri)001:4340: rje'i sa gzhi rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras
NK055(ri)001:4341: pa blta na sdug par byin gyis brlab/
NK055(ri)001:4342: de nas rnal 'byor pa lhar gsal ba'i yan lag lnga la lha lnga bcu'i dkyil 'khor bkod/
NK055(ri)001:4343: yan lag gi lha kun gsal bar byas nas dar ber dang spu slag gyon/
NK055(ri)001:4344: lus po la rgyan gyis brgyan/
NK055(ri)001:4345: de nas dag pa rigs lnga'i bro stabs kyis phyag rgya dang /
NK055(ri)001:4346: lag pa'i gar sna tshogs dang /
NK055(ri)001:4349: 'od zer gyi 'du 'phro rnal 'byor pa'i nang du bstim pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:4350: phyogs bcur spros pas bud+d+ha thams cad kyi thugs dam bskul ba dang /
NK055(ri)001:4351: khams gsum sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal sbyang ba'i 'phro 'du rgyun mi chad par bya ste/
NK055(ri)001:4353: de'i dus su sgyu 'phrul rgyas pa las 'byung ba'i glu rnams sam/
NK055(ri)001:4354: rgyud lung so so nas 'byung ba'i glu'i tshogs rnams ngag gi gre 'gyur dang bcas pas brjod do //
NK055(ri)001:4355: ngag gi brjod pa dbyangs kyi gre 'gyur gyi rgyun mi chad pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:4356: lus bro gar rgyun mi chad pa/
NK055(ri)001:4357: sems lha dang ting nge 'dzin rgyun mi chad pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:4358: yan lag lnga bskyod pa'i dkyil 'khor lnga la yang sprul pa'i 'phro 'du rgyun mi chad pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:4359: da lta'i rnal 'byor pa bzhin a thog h'u bzhag ma yin/
NK055(ri)001:4360: ting nge 'dzin mang po zhig dus gcig bsgom yang
NK055(ri)001:4361: mi gsal ba med pa'i don mngon du gyur pa
NK055(ri)001:4362: yin pas/ de dag gi 'bras bu ni/
NK055(ri)001:4366: ri dang brag dang sa gzhi la 'dzul zhing klu
NK055(ri)001:4367: lha ma yin la sogs pa'i sa 'og gi phyag
NK055(ri)001:4368: rgya mo rnams la spyod pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:4369: nam mkha' la bya bzhin bya ba byed de 'gro zhing lha dang gnod sbyin mo rnams la spyod/
NK055(ri)001:4370: lha ma srin sde brgyad bran gyi tha mar 'khol bar 'gyur ro //
NK055(ri)001:4371: nam mkha' la 'gro zhing gyen du 'gro nas gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /
NK055(ri)001:4374: glu tshig sgra yi phyag rgya yis //
NK055(ri)001:4375: zhes pa sgra'i brjod pa thams cad sku gsung thugs
NK055(ri)001:4376: las 'da' ba med pa rang bzhin gyi phyag rgya
NK055(ri)001:4377: yin la/ de nyid rtogs pa mngon du gyur bas de las mi 'da' ba'i phyag rgya yis/
NK055(ri)001:4378: chos kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur //
NK055(ri)001:4380: chos mi slob pa rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin mngon
NK055(ri)001:4381: du byas pas gdul bya 'gro ba drug la so
NK055(ri)001:4382: so'i skad dang mthun par chos ston par 'gyur pa
NK055(ri)001:4383: dang / yang phyogs bcu'i bud+d+ha dang rig 'dzin gong
NK055(ri)001:4384: ma rnams kyis bdag la lam gong nas gong du
NK055(ri)001:4386: rgyan dang bgo ba'i phyag rgya yis //
NK055(ri)001:4388: zhi ba ni dbu rgyan la sogs zhi ba'i rgyan thams cad do //
NK055(ri)001:4389: khro bo ni rus pa'i rgyan lnga dang /
NK055(ri)001:4393: bgo ba ni zhi ba la chas lnga dang gyon pa'i bye brag rnams so //
NK055(ri)001:4394: khro bo la glang po che'i pags pa la sogs pa gsum mo //
NK055(ri)001:4396: rang rig pa sems nyid las ma g.yos shing mi 'da' ba dang /
NK055(ri)001:4397: ma 'gag pa tsam gong du dbang yul gyi rtog pa dang ldan pas lha la lha rol/
NK055(ri)001:4398: chos nyid la chos nyid rol pa ma gtogs pa
NK055(ri)001:4399: tha mal pa'i 'du shes phra ba'ang mi gnas pa
NK055(ri)001:4400: las rang snang du rol pa ni ma 'gag pa
NK055(ri)001:4401: dang ma dmigs pa'i phyag rgya gnyis las mi 'da'
NK055(ri)001:4405: 'dod khams kyi lha mi'i rgyal po dang /
NK055(ri)001:4406: tshangs pa'i rgyal po lta bu ste lus gzhan pas dpags shing lus la 'od 'bar ba dang /
NK055(ri)001:4407: gzi byin che bas gzhan thams cad zil gyis gnon zhing gzhan dbang du bsdu ba'i rgyal por 'gyur la/
NK055(ri)001:4408: gzhan gyi dpung bzhi'i tshogs kyis drangs kyang thub pa med pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:4410: bza' dang btung ba'i phyag rgya yis //
NK055(ri)001:4412: dam rdzas lngas gzhi byas pa'i bza' ba dang btung
NK055(ri)001:4413: ba'i bye brag thams cad gong gi dbang yul gyi
NK055(ri)001:4414: lta ba dang ldan pas 'dod yon gyi lha mor
NK055(ri)001:4415: brlabsa nas/ gong du bstan pa bzhin ma 'gag pa lha la lha thim/
NK055(ri)001:4416: ma dmigs pa ye shes la ye shes rol pa'i phyag rgya yis/
NK055(ri)001:4417: yid bzhin sku dang zhes pa/
NK055(ri)001:4419: yid kyi sku rin po che tshon shel du bcugs
NK055(ri)001:4420: pa lta bur lus cir yang bsgyur du rung zhing
NK055(ri)001:4421: 'od zer 'bar ba dang ldan pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:4422: lus mi snang ba dang lus la bdud rtsi 'byung ba dang /
NK055(ri)001:4423: des 'gro ba rnams kyi na ba gso/
NK055(ri)001:4424: 'chi ba slong bar byed pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:4425: 'gro ba thams cad tshim par byed pas kyang bdud rtsi 'grub ces bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:4426: a li ka li'i phyag rgya yis //
NK055(ri)001:4430: phyag rgya ni yab yum byin gyis brlab pa yan lag gi lha dang bcas pa rdzogs nas/
NK055(ri)001:4433: byang sems bde ba chen pos dkyil 'khor mchod pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:4434: 'gro ba thams cad la khyab pa'i sbyin pa gnyis gong du yang bshad/
NK055(ri)001:4435: le'u dgu par yang bshad pa'i don phyag rgya yin te/
NK055(ri)001:4436: gsang sngags 'di nyid kyi 'bras bu dang dngos grub kyi gzhi kho na'o //
NK055(ri)001:4437: thams cad thams cad ces pas/
NK055(ri)001:4438: las dang dngos grub gnyis sam/
NK055(ri)001:4439: yang na mchog dang thun mong gi dngos grub gnyis
NK055(ri)001:4440: rgyu 'bras dkar ba tha dad du byed pa med
NK055(ri)001:4441: pas rnal 'byor pas ci 'dod pa thams cad bsam
NK055(ri)001:4442: pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
NK055(ri)001:4443: dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga nyams pa thams cad kyang 'dis skongs/
NK055(ri)001:4444: dam tshig gi chag nyams rnams kyang 'dis skongs so //
NK055(ri)001:4445: tshe dbang gi mtshan nyid ni/
NK055(ri)001:4446: 'og mi dang lha dang tshangs pa yi //
NK055(ri)001:4448: de ltar bsgrub pa mthar phyin nas khams gsum las
NK055(ri)001:4449: 'das gsang sngags kyi don gyi gzungs kyis zin pa'i
NK055(ri)001:4450: skyes bu de/ cha lugs ni mi'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'am/
NK055(ri)001:4451: 'dod khams kyi lha la brgya byin nam tshangs pa ni gzugs khams kyi lha'i rgyal po ste/
NK055(ri)001:4452: de dag gi dngos po grub nas/
NK055(ri)001:4453: skye ba rnam dag ces pa/
NK055(ri)001:4454: zag bcas kyi dge bas 'dod khams lha mi'i rgyal por skye ba dang /
NK055(ri)001:4455: 'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan gyis tshangs pa'i rgyal po 'grub pa ni skye ba ma dag pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:4457: zag bcas la snang ba ste 'khor ba las mi 'da' ba dang /
NK055(ri)001:4459: skye ba rnam dag ces pas/
NK055(ri)001:4460: rig 'dzin 'di nyid lta sgom spyod pa gsum mgo snyoms pa'i stobs kyis 'khor ba dag ste/
NK055(ri)001:4461: las dag nas rang dbang can du gyur te/
NK055(ri)001:4462: sa lam gong nas gong du 'phel bar byed pas na/
NK055(ri)001:4463: lha mir skyes kyang 'phags pa las 'phags pas skye ba rnam dag ces bya/
NK055(ri)001:4465: rang snang gis de ltar snang ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:4467: khyad par sa la gnas 'gyur yin //
NK055(ri)001:4469: tshe dbang sa dang po pa dang mnyam/
NK055(ri)001:4470: phyag rgya chen po sa brgyad pa dang mnyam/
NK055(ri)001:4471: lhun grub rig 'dzin sa bcu pa dang skal ba mnyam pas/
NK055(ri)001:4472: khams gsum pa dang mthun kyang dgongs pa sa'i khyad par bstan pa de dag go //
NK055(ri)001:4473: yang na mi'i 'khor los sgyur ba sa dang po ste mthong lam pa/
NK055(ri)001:4474: brgya byin dang dbang por snang ba sa brgyad pa/
NK055(ri)001:4476: mthar phyin pa'i 'bras bu bstan pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:4477: pha rol phyin pa kun tu rdzogs //
NK055(ri)001:4479: spyir theg pa spyi skad kyi lam gyi ngo bo sa bcu yin/
NK055(ri)001:4480: de pha rol tu phyin pa bcu nyams su blangs pa las snang bas/
NK055(ri)001:4481: 'dir rig 'dzin gyi lam la rdzogs na ji ltar rdzogs/
NK055(ri)001:4482: ma rdzogs na 'bras bu snang btub bam zhe na/
NK055(ri)001:4483: 'dir rig 'dzin gyis pha rol tu phyin pa bcu rdzogs pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:4484: rgyu shes pa'i mtshan nyid lta ba'i dus su yang rdzogs la/
NK055(ri)001:4485: rkyen 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid ting 'dzin dang spyod pa'i dus su yang rdzogs te/
NK055(ri)001:4486: de lta spyod gnyis 'og ma bzhin du rten gyi
NK055(ri)001:4487: gang zag gcig gis bsgom pa'i ngo bo bsgom bya
NK055(ri)001:4488: sgom byed dang bcas pa zhig la dus tshod kyis
NK055(ri)001:4489: 'jug ste/ spyod pa'i ngo bo spyad bya spyod byed
NK055(ri)001:4490: dang bcas pa zhig la gzung 'dzin gyis bsgrub pa
NK055(ri)001:4492: lta ba blos byas bral ba'i rig pas thog tu phebs/
NK055(ri)001:4493: blta bya lta byed med kyang lta ba'i ngang las mi 'da'/
NK055(ri)001:4494: de tsa ting nge 'dzin de gzhin nyid dang kun tu snang gnyis kyis nyams su lon/
NK055(ri)001:4495: mi 'gag pa'i rtsal rang snang ba rgyu'i ting nge
NK055(ri)001:4496: 'dzin phyag rgya gcig pa rags pa phra ba rnams
NK055(ri)001:4497: gong nas gong du stobs su 'gyur/
NK055(ri)001:4498: sngon du lta sgom gnyis la goms pa'i dbang gis
NK055(ri)001:4499: lha'i sku rgyas par bsgom kyang rgya mtsho dwangs pa'i
NK055(ri)001:4500: gzugs brnyan thams cad chur mtshungs pa dang 'dra bar
NK055(ri)001:4501: dkyil 'khor rgyas bsdus gnyis kyi lha thams cad rig
NK055(ri)001:4502: par gsal bas snang 'dzin stong 'dzin gang yang mi
NK055(ri)001:4503: mnga' ba'i mnyam pa nyid du lhun gyis grub/
NK055(ri)001:4504: rig pa mnyam pa nyid 'du shes dang bral bas
NK055(ri)001:4505: lhar gsal ba yang de nyid du lhun gyis grub
NK055(ri)001:4506: ste/ phyi nang gi chos thams cad kyang de ltar gsal te/
NK055(ri)001:4507: 'on kyang don de nyid la lam dma' ba'am/
NK055(ri)001:4508: bar pa'i blo ngo mthar phyin pa'i blo ngo rnams la skyed kyi bye brag gis g.yo ba dang /
NK055(ri)001:4511: mthar phyin pa ni yod de/
NK055(ri)001:4512: skye ba med pa ni 'bras bu'i ngo bo'o //
NK055(ri)001:4513: de lta bu'i ngang na rig 'dzin gyi dgongs pa pha rol tu phyin pa bcu rdzogs pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:4514: rig 'dzin lta sgom stobs su gyur pa rig pa
NK055(ri)001:4515: mnyam pa nyid kyi ngang la 'khor 'das kyi 'dzin
NK055(ri)001:4516: pa'ang ma dmigs pa'i rang byung gi ye shes la
NK055(ri)001:4517: lta bsgom stobs su gyur pa'i dbang gis rang gi
NK055(ri)001:4518: lta bsgom la 'dzin pa phra ba'ang med na/
NK055(ri)001:4519: yul 'dzin rags pa lta ga la yod de/
NK055(ri)001:4520: don de nyid ni yul du byas pa med pa'i phyir sbyin pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:4521: rig pa de lta bu'i ngang la bzang ngan bar
NK055(ri)001:4522: ma gsum mnyam pa nyid du gyur pas chags bya'i
NK055(ri)001:4523: yul dag /des sdang ba'ang dag /de nyid nyams pa
NK055(ri)001:4524: rgyu nas dag pa tshul khrims so //
NK055(ri)001:4525: mnyam pa nyid kyi ngang la gzhan ma grub des
NK055(ri)001:4526: bdag 'dzin rtsa ba nas dag pa nam mkha' lta
NK055(ri)001:4527: bur gyur/ srin po'i dmag tshogs stong du byung yang
NK055(ri)001:4528: gces par 'dzin pa'i 'du shes mi mnga' bas ba
NK055(ri)001:4529: spu g.yo ba'ang mi mnga' ba ni bzod pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:4530: chu bo 'bab pa gsher ba'i rang bzhin las rgyun chad pa med pa ltar/
NK055(ri)001:4531: spyod lam bzhi dus gsum du de'i ngang las mi 'da' ba ni brtson 'grus so //
NK055(ri)001:4532: nam mkha' nam mkha' mi tshol yang nam mkha' las mi 'da' ba bzhin du/
NK055(ri)001:4533: bsgom bya sgom byed med pa'i ngang las g.yo ba med pa ni bsam gtan no //
NK055(ri)001:4534: chos thams cad de nyid du gsal yang de nyid
NK055(ri)001:4535: du 'dzin pa'ang med pa'i rang gsal ba ni shes
NK055(ri)001:4536: rab bo // de lta bu'i don mngon du gyur
NK055(ri)001:4537: pa las gzhan du dmigs bya med pa ni smon
NK055(ri)001:4538: rab bo // lam mo // rgyus 'bras bu logs
NK055(ri)001:4539: su tshol ba las dpags pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i
NK055(ri)001:4540: rgyal po'i bus dpes rang nyid la lhun gyis grub
NK055(ri)001:4541: rab bo // lam mo // pa thabs/ phyogs 'dzin
NK055(ri)001:4542: can gyi lta ba thams cad zil gyis gnon zhing
NK055(ri)001:4543: rab bo // lam mo // pa thabs/ mi gnas
NK055(ri)001:4544: pa stobs/ 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad ma 'dres
NK055(ri)001:4545: la yongs su rdzogs pa rang gsal ba ye shes
NK055(ri)001:4546: rab bo // lam mo // pa thabs/ mi gnas
NK055(ri)001:4547: pa stobs/ te bcu'o // lam pa'i dbang du de
NK055(ri)001:4548: lta ba shas che ba yin pas spyod pa'i ngos
NK055(ri)001:4549: nas bcu po spyod la mi 'dzin pa snang ba'o
NK055(ri)001:4550: rab bo // lam mo // pa thabs/ mi gnas
NK055(ri)001:4551: pa stobs/ te bcu'o // // kun tu rdzogs zhes
NK055(ri)001:4552: rab bo // lam mo // pa thabs/ mi gnas
NK055(ri)001:4553: pa stobs/ te bcu'o // // pas/ spyod lam bzhi
NK055(ri)001:4554: dus gsum du 'da' ba med pa'i ngo bo yang
NK055(ri)001:4555: rab bo // lam mo // pa thabs/ mi gnas
NK055(ri)001:4556: pa stobs/ te bcu'o // // pas/ yin la/ bshad
NK055(ri)001:4557: pa bcu'i nang du 'khor 'das yul sems snod bcud
NK055(ri)001:4558: thams cad ma 'dres la yongs su rdzogs pa'i don
NK055(ri)001:4559: rab bo // lam mo // pa thabs/ mi gnas
NK055(ri)001:4560: pa stobs/ te bcu'o // // pas/ yin la/ no
NK055(ri)001:4561: // sa yi khyad par bcu dang gsum //
NK055(ri)001:4563: mnyam pa nyid kyi dbyings mthong bas rab tu dga' ba ste/
NK055(ri)001:4564: 'dir dga' ba'i dngos po ma dmigs kyang 'dzin pa
NK055(ri)001:4565: thams cad dang bral bas zug rngu ma dmigs pa'i
NK055(ri)001:4566: ngo bo'o // dgongs pa de nyid kyi ngang la
NK055(ri)001:4567: theg pa 'og ma rnams kyi mthar 'dzin gyi lta
NK055(ri)001:4568: ba mi gnas pa gnyis pa dri ma med pa/
NK055(ri)001:4569: sems mnyam pa nyid rang gsal ba las rang snang
NK055(ri)001:4570: ba mi 'gag pas 'gro don byed pa gsum pa
NK055(ri)001:4571: 'od byed pa/ yul gyi dngos po ci byed pa
NK055(ri)001:4572: thams cad rang rig tu snang bas bzhi pa 'od
NK055(ri)001:4573: 'od byed pa/ 'phro ba/ rig pa'i ngang las bdag
NK055(ri)001:4574: gzhan gyi don gnyis cig car du rdzogs pas lnga
NK055(ri)001:4575: 'od byed pa/ 'phro ba/ pa sbyangs dka' ba/ yengs
NK055(ri)001:4576: med rang gsal gyi ye shes chen po mngon du
NK055(ri)001:4577: gyur pa drug pa mngon du gyur pa/
NK055(ri)001:4578: mthar 'dzin gyi lta ba spangs pa med par rang dag pa bdun pa ring du song ba/
NK055(ri)001:4579: thams cad rig par gsal bas yul ma grub/
NK055(ri)001:4580: yul can nam mkha' ltar dag pas g.yeng bya g.yeng byed mi mnga' bas brgyad pa mi g.yo ba/
NK055(ri)001:4581: yon tan lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes mnga' bas dgu pa legs pa'i blo gros/
NK055(ri)001:4582: mthar thug pa'i yon tan thams cad kyi 'byung gnas su gyur pas bcu pa chos kyi sprin no //
NK055(ri)001:4584: sangs rgyas kyis gsum ste phyi nas 'chad do //
NK055(ri)001:4585: rgyu 'bras khyad par lhun gyis rdzogs //
NK055(ri)001:4587: rgyu ni pha rol tu phyin pa bcu dang sa bcu'o //
NK055(ri)001:4589: gong du lta ba'i ngang du yang rgyu'i sa dang /
NK055(ri)001:4590: pha rol tu phyin pas ma chud pa med la/
NK055(ri)001:4591: spyod pa bcu ma 'gag mi dmigs pa'i ngang du yang kun rdzogs te/
NK055(ri)001:4592: rgyu las 'bras bu'i sa bcu khyad par che bas
NK055(ri)001:4593: rgyu'i sa bcu ma 'dres la yongs su rdzogs pa'i
NK055(ri)001:4594: don gyis spangs pa med par rang bzhin du lhun
NK055(ri)001:4595: gyis rdzogs so // thabs dang shes rab thabs kyi mchog /zhes pas/
NK055(ri)001:4596: 'dir gong du 'chad par 'gyur bas khas blangs pa'i 'bras bu'i sa gsum ston to //
NK055(ri)001:4597: 'dir lha rje zur pas thabs ni gzhan don gyi snang ba mi 'gag pa/
NK055(ri)001:4598: shes rab ni gzhan don mdzad pa bdo tsam nas
NK055(ri)001:4599: chos kyi dbyings las ma g.yos pa yul yul can
NK055(ri)001:4600: med pa/ mdzad bya mdzad byed med pa rtsol ba dang bral bar 'gro don lhun gyis grub pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:4601: thabs kyi mchog ces gsungs pa 'bras bu kho na'i gnas skabs so //
NK055(ri)001:4603: thabs ni lam ste nyams su blangs pas nus pa
NK055(ri)001:4604: stobs su gyur te 'bras bu mngon du snang bar
NK055(ri)001:4605: byed pa'i mthu dang ldan pa ni thabs so //
NK055(ri)001:4606: de yang gdul bya dbang po rab 'bring gi dbang
NK055(ri)001:4607: gis theg pa so so la lam gyi ngo bo
NK055(ri)001:4608: re re yod de/ 'dir theg pa 'di nyid kyi lam gyis/
NK055(ri)001:4611: rgyu shes pa'i mtshan nyid lta ba ni chos thams
NK055(ri)001:4612: cad dag mnyam gyi tshul du gnas pa rtogs pa
NK055(ri)001:4613: bzhi'i tshul gyis mngon du gyur pa la yul dang
NK055(ri)001:4614: yul can med par lhun gyis grub pa ni gazhi'o
NK055(ri)001:4615: // 'jug pa la lam gyi ngo bo ni/
NK055(ri)001:4616: gzhi de las ting nge 'dzin bzhi'i gnas skabs su
NK055(ri)001:4617: snang stong dbyer med pa mnyam pa'i ngang la gnas
NK055(ri)001:4618: pa dang / de nyid nus pa stobs su gyur
NK055(ri)001:4619: nas snang ba rnam 'byed kyi dus su'ang thams cad
NK055(ri)001:4620: rig par gsal ba mnyam pa'i ngang dang /
NK055(ri)001:4621: tshogs bsgrub pa'i dus su lta spyod bsgom gsum mgo snyoms par mnyam pa'i ngang la gnas pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:4622: theg pa 'di nyid kyi dbang du lta ba mngon du gyur pa ni mthong lam/
NK055(ri)001:4623: tshogs kyi lta spyod mgo snyoms pa man chad rnams ni bsgom lam du'ang bzhed de/
NK055(ri)001:4624: de nas bsgrub pa mthar phyin pa'i skabs su lam
NK055(ri)001:4625: stobs su gyur pa dgos pas rig pa rang byung
NK055(ri)001:4626: gi ye shes lam mthar phyin pa nus pa'i mthu
NK055(ri)001:4627: dang ldan pa ni/ chos thams cad rig pa mnyam
NK055(ri)001:4628: pa nyid kyi ngang du gsal ba la phyogs su
NK055(ri)001:4629: 'dzin pa'i tha snyad dang bral nas sgro skur phra
NK055(ri)001:4630: ba'i phra ba yang mi mnga' ba ni don gyi
NK055(ri)001:4631: lung mngon du gyur pa zhes bya ste lung thams
NK055(ri)001:4633: chos thams cad rig par gsal ba ni/
NK055(ri)001:4634: dbang mthar phyin pa rang gi ngo bo yin pas thob pa zhes bya/
NK055(ri)001:4635: tshig gi tha snyad du thar lam pa bya ste/
NK055(ri)001:4636: de man chod ni lam ste 'bras bu la sbyor ba'i thabs yin pas so //
NK055(ri)001:4638: lung mngon du gyur dbang thob pa'i nus pa mthu
NK055(ri)001:4639: go phye nas kun tu 'od mngon du gyur pa
NK055(ri)001:4640: ni/ chos thams cad kyi de kho na nyid spros pa dang bral bas shes rab ste/
NK055(ri)001:4641: de yang rig pa nyid thugs rje chen po'i skabs
NK055(ri)001:4642: su bshad pa bzhin chos thams cad la khyab pa
NK055(ri)001:4643: 'dir mngon du byas pas chos thams cad kyi ngo
NK055(ri)001:4644: bo nyid du gyur pa ni kun tu 'od ces
NK055(ri)001:4645: bya'o // thabs kyi mchog ces pa/
NK055(ri)001:4646: thabs ni nam mkha' dang sprin ltar rang snang ba ma 'gag pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:4647: mthar phyin pa'i 'bras bu'i gzhan don te/
NK055(ri)001:4648: chos kyi dbyings kyis khyab tshad du gdul bya'i ngo
NK055(ri)001:4649: la mdzad pa'i bye brag gdul bya so so'i blo
NK055(ri)001:4650: ngo dang mthun par dus gcig car du 'char nas
NK055(ri)001:4651: don mdzad kyang rtsol ba phra ba yang mi mnga'
NK055(ri)001:4652: zhing dgongs pa mnyam pa nyid kyi dbang gis gos
NK055(ri)001:4654: pad+ma 'dam na gnas pa nyid 'dam gyi skyon gyis ma gos pa bzhin pas pad+ma spyan no //
NK055(ri)001:4655: shes rab mchog gi zhes pa/
NK055(ri)001:4657: de yang shes rab chos kyi sku ni kun tu khyab par gnas so zhes pas/
NK055(ri)001:4658: 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad kyi de kho na
NK055(ri)001:4659: nyid sems nyid ma bcos pa'i ngo bo nyid chu
NK055(ri)001:4660: thams cad la gsher bas khyab pa bzhin du chos
NK055(ri)001:4661: thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid yin pa ni mtshan
NK055(ri)001:4662: nyid thams cad dang bral ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:4663: de ni kun tu 'od ces pas/
NK055(ri)001:4664: kun tu ni chos thams cad do //
NK055(ri)001:4665: 'di ni dngos po med kyang thams cad la thogs chags med pa'i bdag nyid do //
NK055(ri)001:4666: thog ma'i mu nas rgyu rkyen dang bral bas rang byung ye shes zhes kyang bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:4667: gsal bya gsal byed med kyang nam mkha' ltar rang
NK055(ri)001:4668: gsal ba ni don gyi ye shes zhes kyang bya'o
NK055(ri)001:4669: // de ni mtshan ma med pa phyogs gcig gi mtha' lta bu ste/
NK055(ri)001:4670: 'dir tha snyad tsam du mtshon pa'i phyir rig pa'i
NK055(ri)001:4671: ye shes kyis chos kyi dbyings la bltas na chos
NK055(ri)001:4672: kyi dbyings yod med gang du yang ma grub pas
NK055(ri)001:4673: yod pa'i ngo bor yang ma gzigs/
NK055(ri)001:4674: rang snang mi 'gag pas mtha' gnyis kyi yang 'du shes gtan nas ma grub ste/
NK055(ri)001:4675: mtha' gnyis kyi skyon dang bral ba la ni pad+ma zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:4676: spyan zhes bya ba ni rig bya dang rig byed
NK055(ri)001:4677: med pa'i rig pa rang gsal la yang spyan zhes
NK055(ri)001:4678: bya ste/ chos thams cad de'i ngang du gsal ba la spyan zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:4679: de la shes rab rkyang ba ni/
NK055(ri)001:4680: mtshan ma med pa 'ba' zhig gi phyogs lta bu yin la/
NK055(ri)001:4681: mchog ni spyan gyis mtha' gnyis kyi skyon gyiis ma gos pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:4682: de'i dus su pad+ma spyan gyi ngang la 'bras bu'i mthong ba med pa'i tshul gyis mthong ba dang /
NK055(ri)001:4683: sgra thams cad dang bral ba'i tshul gyis thos pa
NK055(ri)001:4684: dang zhes pa la sogs pa rnams lhun gyis grub
NK055(ri)001:4685: bo // mchog gyur pa zhes pa/
NK055(ri)001:4686: yi ge'i 'khor lo tshogs chen gyi sa ste/
NK055(ri)001:4687: kun tu 'od kyi sa mtha' gnyis bral ba nyid
NK055(ri)001:4688: rang snang mi 'gag pa'i rtsal rang snang ba khams
NK055(ri)001:4689: gsum gyi chos ma 'gag pa tsam nyid rang snang
NK055(ri)001:4690: ba sku dang ye shes su rtsal rdzogs te/
NK055(ri)001:4691: gdul bya'i dgos pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa lhun gyis grub ste/
NK055(ri)001:4692: rang byung gi ye shes rang snang bas yi ge 'khor lo tshogs chen no //
NK055(ri)001:4694: 'og dkyil 'khor kun tu rab sbyor bar //
NK055(ri)001:4695: zhes pa lta spyod bsgom gsum dbyer med pa mnyam
NK055(ri)001:4696: pa nyid lhun gyis grub pa'ang bud+d+ha'am dkyil 'khor thams
NK055(ri)001:4697: cad kyi ngo bo nyid yin pas sbyor ba ni
NK055(ri)001:4698: nyams su myong ba'i ngo bo'o //
NK055(ri)001:4700: sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor bas //
NK055(ri)001:4701: sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam par 'gyur //
NK055(ri)001:4702: sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam pa'i phyir //
NK055(ri)001:4704: zhes pa mthar phyin pa'i dus su phyogs bcu dus
NK055(ri)001:4705: bzhi'i dkyil 'khor rnams dang dbyer med par 'grub par
NK055(ri)001:4706: 'gyur ba'o // yang na dkyil 'khor kun ni zhi khro'i dkyil 'khor rgyas 'bring bsdus gsum mo //
NK055(ri)001:4707: sbyor ba ni bsgrub pa nyams su blang ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:4709: zhes pa rgyas 'bring bsdus gsum du phyogs bcu'i dkyil
NK055(ri)001:4710: 'khor thams cad 'dus pas rgyas 'bring bsdus gsum gyi
NK055(ri)001:4711: bsgrub pa nyams su blangs pas rgyu 'bras mi bslu
NK055(ri)001:4712: bas de kho na nyid nyams su myong ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:4714: zhes de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la ched du gleng ngo zhes pa/
NK055(ri)001:4715: ston pa kun tu bzang pos de skad gsungs pas/
NK055(ri)001:4716: ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa go phye ba'i 'khor la ched du brjod pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:4720: go phye ba'i 'khor gyi ched du brjod pa bskyod
NK055(ri)001:4721: pa dang ting nge 'dzin gang du yang ma grub
NK055(ri)001:4722: cir yang snang bas rol mo ste/
NK055(ri)001:4723: mchog dang thun mong gi dngos grub sprin dang 'dra ba rgyun chad med par snang ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:4724: gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/
NK055(ri)001:4726: bsnyen sgrub bzhi'i ngos nas zhi khro gnyis kyi tshom bu rgyas bsdus rnams bstan pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:4727: de gzhung skyong bas le'u bcu ste bcu gcig pa bshad pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:4730: sgrub pa chen po mthar phyin pa'i 'bras bu mthar phyin pa sangs rgyas dang bcas pa bstan pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:4731: bcu gnyis pa'i bshad pa'o////le'u bcu gsum pa shin tu
NK055(ri)001:4732: gsang ba man ngag gi le'u la rgyud gsum las
NK055(ri)001:4733: lam gyi rgyud ston/ gzhi yang zur tsam ston/
NK055(ri)001:4734: rgyud kyi dngos po bcu las dbang po 'bring gi lta ba dang /
NK055(ri)001:4735: lhag pa ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor lam rim
NK055(ri)001:4736: dang bcas pa dang byang chub sems kyi dkyil dkyil
NK055(ri)001:4737: 'khor ston/ de yan chad grol lam shas che bas/
NK055(ri)001:4738: le'u 'dis thabs lam dang rdzogs pa chen po rgyas par ston te/
NK055(ri)001:4739: de yang le'u'i mtshams thag sbrel na le'u gsum pa yan chad sngar bzhin/
NK055(ri)001:4740: de man chad kyi grol lam gtso cher ston pa las/
NK055(ri)001:4741: bzhi pas lha'i dkyil 'khor bkod pa'i sa bon bstan/
NK055(ri)001:4742: lnga pas de'i sgo nas thun mong gi dngos grub bstan/
NK055(ri)001:4743: drug pas sku'i dkyil 'khor bskyed pa bstan/
NK055(ri)001:4744: bdun pas bskyed pa'i rkyen sngags bstan/
NK055(ri)001:4745: brgyad pas mchod pa phyag rgya bstan/
NK055(ri)001:4746: bskyed rim 'khor lo rdzogs pa'i nus pa dang ldan
NK055(ri)001:4747: pas gzhan don dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor dgu pas
NK055(ri)001:4748: bstan/ bcu pas dbang gi dngos gzhi sems dang sbyar nas rim par bskur bar bstan/
NK055(ri)001:4749: dbang thob pa'i skyes bus tshogs bsgrub pa le'u bcu
NK055(ri)001:4750: gnyis pa dang bcu gcig pa dang gnyis kyis ston
NK055(ri)001:4751: te/ 'bras bu rig 'dzin dang sangs rgyas pa la sogs pa ston/
NK055(ri)001:4752: le'u bcu gsum pa 'dis grol lam gyi mdor bsdus pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:4753: thabs lam gong 'og gnyis kyi bye brag nyams su len pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:4754: rgyud kyi don dkyil 'khor bcu gnyis rgyas par bstan pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:4755: mthar thug pa'i don rdzogs pa chen po'i lam rim rgyas par ston to //
NK055(ri)001:4756: smad kyis de rnams mthar phyin pa'i 'bras bu ston/
NK055(ri)001:4757: da ni dkyus la 'jug ste le'u bcu gsum pa
NK055(ri)001:4758: shin tu gsang ba man ngag gi le'u'i lo rgyus
NK055(ri)001:4759: kyi don ni/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i zhes pa la sogs te/
NK055(ri)001:4761: tshig gi de ma thag pa ni le'u bcu gnyis pa'i rjes thog go //
NK055(ri)001:4762: don gyi de ma thag pa ni gong du grol
NK055(ri)001:4763: lam rim gyis pa'i lam rdzogs pa'i khong du bcu
NK055(ri)001:4764: bzhi pa'i bstod pa'ang 'dus par song nas shin tu
NK055(ri)001:4765: gsang ba man ngag gi le'u 'dis rang bzhin gsang
NK055(ri)001:4766: ba'i snying po mngon du mthong bar bya ba'i phyir
NK055(ri)001:4768: de bzhin gshegs pa ni rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa 'bras bu mngon du byas pa rnams te/
NK055(ri)001:4769: gnas phyogs bcu na bzhugs shing dus bzhir rang don dgongs pa mngon du gyur pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:4770: thugs rjes gzhan don la gshegs pa rnams kyi sku ma 'gag pa sku'i dkyil 'khor/
NK055(ri)001:4771: gsung ma 'gag par rang snang ba gsung gi dkyil 'khor/
NK055(ri)001:4772: thugs ma 'gag par gsal ba thugs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad/
NK055(ri)001:4774: 'dir rgyud kyi don rang bzhin gsang ba'i snying po
NK055(ri)001:4775: cig car du mthong ba'i thabs ston pas gal che
NK055(ri)001:4776: zhing / thugs kyi dgongs pa mngon du snang bar
NK055(ri)001:4777: bya ba'i phyir gcig tu tshogs pa lta bur snang
NK055(ri)001:4778: ba yang bkag pa ma yin te gdul bya'i snang
NK055(ri)001:4780: 'on kyang chu thams cad gsher bar mtshungs pa bzhin du/
NK055(ri)001:4781: 'dir dgongs pa mtshungs pa'i ngo bo ste thams cad sems kyi chos nyid rang snang ba'i phyir/
NK055(ri)001:4782: sku gsung thugs kyi bye brag rnams rang rig pa
NK055(ri)001:4783: kho nar mi phyed pa las mtshon pa'i bla dwags
NK055(ri)001:4784: su rdo rje zhes kyang smos pas/
NK055(ri)001:4785: don de la ni phyogs 'dzin gyi tha snyad thams
NK055(ri)001:4786: cad ma spangs ngang gis dag pas rnam pa'am zla
NK055(ri)001:4787: dang bral ba gcig tu 'dus pa zhes brjod do
NK055(ri)001:4788: // don de nyid le'u 'dis tha dad du phyes nas ston pas kyang de skad ces bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:4789: rang byung ye shes kyii ngang la thams cad dbyer med pa'i bdag nyid bstan pas/
NK055(ri)001:4790: phyogs dus kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi dgongs pa rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir/
NK055(ri)001:4792: rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus pa //
NK055(ri)001:4793: 'di las gsang ba'i nges don med //
NK055(ri)001:4795: dus gsum gyi rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor la dgongs mdzad
NK055(ri)001:4796: thams cad dbyer med pa'i rang byung gi ye shes
NK055(ri)001:4797: la/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bde ba thams cad dgyes pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:4798: ma 'dres la yongs su rdzogs pa'i ngo bo nyid
NK055(ri)001:4799: tsam la phyogs 'dzin ma spangs ngang gis dag pa
NK055(ri)001:4800: la ni chen po zhes bya ste/
NK055(ri)001:4801: dngos drug pa kun tu bzang po'o //
NK055(ri)001:4803: chos ni dngos po gnyis kyis bsdus pa thams cad de/
NK055(ri)001:4804: de ni ye nas zhes pa/
NK055(ri)001:4805: rgyu rkyen dang bral ba'i rang byung gi ye shes chen po nyid du ye nas/
NK055(ri)001:4807: zhes pas chos thams cad rang rig pa nyid du
NK055(ri)001:4808: gsal ba la snang stong gi 'dzin pa ma spangs
NK055(ri)001:4809: pa nyid ma dmigs pas rang snang thams cad ma
NK055(ri)001:4810: 'gag pa yul du ma skyes bdag nyid du gsal
NK055(ri)001:4811: yang / gsal bya gsal byed med de/
NK055(ri)001:4812: de'i ngang la snang ba sku/
NK055(ri)001:4814: dran rig thugs su gsal bas de las ma gtogs
NK055(ri)001:4815: pa'i chos ma dmigs pas rdzogs pa chen po zhes
NK055(ri)001:4816: bya'o // don de nyid la theg pa 'og ma
NK055(ri)001:4817: la ltos pa'i kun brtags pa rnams kyis phyi nang
NK055(ri)001:4818: gi chos thams cad rgyu rkyen gyi rnam pa kho
NK055(ri)001:4819: bya'o // na brjod kyang / brjod pa dang brtags
NK055(ri)001:4820: pa gnyis rang byung gi ye shes nyid las rgyu
NK055(ri)001:4821: rkyen med par rang snang ba las 'da' mi srid
NK055(ri)001:4822: bya'o // na brjod kyang / pa dang / rang
NK055(ri)001:4823: gi ngo bo nyid 'gyur ba med pa'i bdag nyid
NK055(ri)001:4824: bya'o // na brjod kyang / pa dang / de/
NK055(ri)001:4825: rang snang du lhun gyis grub pa las mi 'da'
NK055(ri)001:4827: shin tu gsang ba'i snying po/
NK055(ri)001:4828: zhes pa mchog tu gsang ba zhes pa dang shin tu gsang ba 'dra ste/
NK055(ri)001:4829: rdzogs pa chen po'i ngo bo rang bzhin gsang ba'i
NK055(ri)001:4830: snying po ni shin tu gsang ste dngos po thams
NK055(ri)001:4832: rang gi ngo bo nyid yin pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:4833: 'dzin pa phra rags kyis bsgribs pas gsang la/
NK055(ri)001:4835: dngos po thams cad dang bral ba nyid rang snang
NK055(ri)001:4836: cir yang 'char bas na gazhi'am rtsa ba lta bu
NK055(ri)001:4837: ste snying po'o // sprin bkod pa zhes pa/
NK055(ri)001:4838: stong pa nyid mi 'gag pa las 'og nas 'byung ba'i gdams pa'i ngo bo lnga/
NK055(ri)001:4839: gnas skabs dang mthar thug gi 'bras bu gnyis mang po sprin 'byung ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:4840: de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas zhes pa/
NK055(ri)001:4841: don de nyid ston pa'i dgongs pa la mi g.yo
NK055(ri)001:4842: ba ste gsang ba'i snying po'i ngo bo dngos so
NK055(ri)001:4843: // go phye ba'i 'khor gyi nang na yang /
NK055(ri)001:4844: gsang ba'i man ngag gi skal ba can rnams kyi
NK055(ri)001:4845: ched du brjod pa 'og nas 'byung ba 'di brjod
NK055(ri)001:4847: ma rtogs pa dang log par rtogs //
NK055(ri)001:4848: zhes pa ma rtogs pa ni 'jig rten 'di'i rgyu 'bras la yang shes rab ma zhugs pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:4849: de la yang gnyis kyi shes rab shin tu zhan
NK055(ri)001:4850: pa so so'i skye bo phyugs dang 'dra ba 'phral
NK055(ri)001:4851: gyi za gyon kho na tsam min pa bsam pa
NK055(ri)001:4852: med pa dang / de bas cung lhags pa 'jig rten 'di'i btsan phyug la sogs pa bsgrub pa'i phyir/
NK055(ri)001:4853: srog gi mchod sbyin gyis lha dga' bar byed pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:4856: rnam rtog bsrung ba rnams te/
NK055(ri)001:4857: yang dag pa rgyu 'bras kyi don las ni ring du song /
NK055(ri)001:4858: 'jig rten gyi phan yon kho na bsgrub pas rgyang 'phen pa zhes bya ste/
NK055(ri)001:4859: de gnyis ni zhen zhing rmongs pa'i dbang gis yang dag pa'i don las ring du 'gyang ngo //
NK055(ri)001:4860: log par rtogs pa ni gnyis te/
NK055(ri)001:4865: tshe phyi ma med pa kho nar lta ste/
NK055(ri)001:4866: mig btsums nas ci yang med par lta'o //
NK055(ri)001:4867: mu stegs la ni lta ba sum brgya drug cu yod kyang chad lta rtag lta gnyis su 'dus te/
NK055(ri)001:4868: de las chad lta ba ni sems kyi mtshan nyid mtha' thams cad dang bral ba'i phyogs la gol te/
NK055(ri)001:4870: rgyu med pa'i rkyen las sems can gyi lus su grub pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:4871: dper na dbyar gyi sha mong sa bon med pa
NK055(ri)001:4872: las rlan dang char pa'i rkyen gyis sha mong du
NK055(ri)001:4873: grub pa bzhin/ 'byung ba bzhi'i rkyen gyis lus por grub la/
NK055(ri)001:4874: shi na tshe phyi ma med //
NK055(ri)001:4879: sems nam mkha' la thim ste med par 'dod pa chad lta ba'i gtan tshigs mang ngo //
NK055(ri)001:4881: sems kyi rang bzhin dus gsum du g.yo ba med pa las gol te/
NK055(ri)001:4882: sems can gyi sems rang rig rang gsal che na
NK055(ri)001:4883: mthe bong tsam chung na yungs 'bru tsam phra na
NK055(ri)001:4884: rta rnga tsam sbom na lcag yu tsam ci na
NK055(ri)001:4885: yang mi 'gyur ba gcig yod pas/
NK055(ri)001:4886: thams cad byed par 'dod pa la sogs pa rtag par lta ba'i gtan tshigs mang du smra'o //
NK055(ri)001:4887: mu stegs spyir rang bzhin gyis log pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:4888: gzhan rkyen gyis log pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:4889: zhar byung gi mu stegs dgu la sogs pa logs su shes par bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:4890: de dag ni 'khor ba'i khams pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:4891: 'das pa'i khams pa bstan pa'i phyir //
NK055(ri)001:4892: phyogs rtogs yang dag nyid ma rtogs //
NK055(ri)001:4895: phyogs tsam rtogs pa nyan thos dang rang rgyal ba ste/
NK055(ri)001:4896: gnyis kas yul snang ba dngos po rags pa ni kun rdzob/
NK055(ri)001:4897: rdul phra rab tu bshigs pa rdul phran cha med
NK055(ri)001:4898: 'byar la ma reg pa tsam don dam pa zhes
NK055(ri)001:4899: brjod la/ nang 'dzin pa'i sems rags pa kun rdzob/
NK055(ri)001:4900: skad cig ma cha med don dam par 'dod pa phyogs tsam zhes bya la/
NK055(ri)001:4901: rang rgyal bas de'i thog tu gzugs kyi phung po chos kyi phyogs gcig bdag med par rtogs pas/
NK055(ri)001:4903: de gnyis ni don dam pa las phyogs tsam rtogs pas phyogs rtogs zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:4904: yang dag nyid ma rtogs ni theg pa chen po ste/
NK055(ri)001:4905: de la gnyis kyi sems tsam ni chos thams cad
NK055(ri)001:4906: sems snang ba tsam rtogs pas phyogs gcig ces brjod
NK055(ri)001:4907: kyang / sems rang rig rang gsal bum pa nang
NK055(ri)001:4908: gi mar me rlung gis ma bskyod pa bzhin gsal
NK055(ri)001:4909: la mi g.yo ba'i 'dzin pa dang bcas pas phyogs
NK055(ri)001:4910: kyang / gcig rtogs pa'o // dbu ma ni/
NK055(ri)001:4912: mthar phyin pa'i don rdzogs pa chen po ste gzhi rang bzhin don dam/
NK055(ri)001:4914: 'bras bu chos sku don dam phyi nang gi chos
NK055(ri)001:4915: thams cad kun tu bzang po'i ngo bo nyid du
NK055(ri)001:4916: gsal ba gsum dbyer med pa'i don ma rtogs te/
NK055(ri)001:4917: bden pa gnyis dbyer med pa spyod yul dang bral ba mngon du ma byas pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:4918: 'dul ba dgongs pa gsang ba dang //
NK055(ri)001:4920: 'dul ba ni yang dag pa nyid rtogs par bstan pa'i phyogs su bsdu ba yin mod kyang /
NK055(ri)001:4922: gza' dang dus tshigs dag gtsang gi dgos pa ched du blangs pas/
NK055(ri)001:4923: lus ngag yid gsum 'dul bar byed pa kri ya pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:4924: dgongs pa ni yo ga ste spyod pa ched du gnyer yang kri ya bzhin mi rags la/
NK055(ri)001:4925: dgongs pa ting nge 'dzin gtsor byed pa mngon par
NK055(ri)001:4926: byang chub pa lnga'i sgo nas lha'i sku bskyed pa
NK055(ri)001:4928: gsang ba ni ma h+aa yo ga'i lta spyod de/
NK055(ri)001:4929: yo ga phyin chad kyi spyod yul ma yin pa'i
NK055(ri)001:4930: lta ba dag mnyam rtogs pa gsum gyis sems nyid
NK055(ri)001:4931: mnyam pa nyid kyi don myong ba dang /
NK055(ri)001:4932: spyod pa'i dngos po lnga phrag gsum dang /
NK055(ri)001:4933: +aa li k+aa li rnams nyams su len pa'i ma h+aa yo ga dang /
NK055(ri)001:4934: rang bzhin gsang ba'i don ni dngos po rnams kyi
NK055(ri)001:4935: de kho na nyid gong du bshad pa'i bden pa
NK055(ri)001:4936: gsum dbyer med par rang bzhin gyi 'bras bur ye
NK055(ri)001:4937: nas gnas kyang / brtags pa'i zhen pa'i rim pa
NK055(ri)001:4938: sna tshogs kyis bsgribs pa dbyings ye shes kyi cha
NK055(ri)001:4939: nas skad cig mas rtogs pa a nu yo ga
NK055(ri)001:4940: nas gnas kyang / dang / don ji lta ba
NK055(ri)001:4941: nyid skad cig ma dang bral bar rang rig pa'i
NK055(ri)001:4942: mngon sum du gsal ba a ti yo ga'o //
NK055(ri)001:4943: de dag gi don mtshon par byed pa'i thabs ni/
NK055(ri)001:4944: yi ge'i sgras btags ming tshogs la //
NK055(ri)001:4946: yi ge ni spyir mya ngan las 'das pa'i yi ge ste h'u m+aum mo/
NK055(ri)001:4947: 'jiig rten pa'i yi ge la lha'i yi ge'i rigs rnams dang /
NK055(ri)001:4948: thun mong gi yi ge ka kha la sogs pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:4949: sa bon yi ge a n+ri sum tri pre duh'o //
NK055(ri)001:4950: de la 'dir ni yi ge thams cad kyi gazhi'am
NK055(ri)001:4951: rtsa ba thun mong gi yi ge'i nang na a
NK055(ri)001:4952: thung ngu ste/ sprul pa'i 'khor lo'am kun tu bzang mo'i 'khor lo'i dbus na gnas so //
NK055(ri)001:4953: a'i nang las byung ba ni sgra yig so gnyis so //
NK055(ri)001:4954: a dngos las byung ba ni dbyangs yig bcu gnyis so //
NK055(ri)001:4955: gnyis ka las byung ba ni ma ning gi yi ge bzhi'o //
NK055(ri)001:4957: zhes pa sgra yig bsdebs na ming du grub ste/
NK055(ri)001:4958: dper na ka ba lta bu'am bum pa lta bu'o //
NK055(ri)001:4959: ming 'dus pa las tshig gi tshogs te/
NK055(ri)001:4960: dper na tshigs rkang gcig lta bu'o //
NK055(ri)001:4961: tshigs rkang bzhi las tshigs su bcad pa sho lo
NK055(ri)001:4962: ka gcig /de sum brgya la bam po gcig /de'i
NK055(ri)001:4963: tshogs 'dus pa las so so'i gzhung dbu zhabs tshang
NK055(ri)001:4964: ba ste rgyud 'di nyid kyi le'u nyi shu rtsa
NK055(ri)001:4965: gnyis lta bu'o // bde bar gshegs pas gsungs pa'i ming gi tshogs gsang snying lta bu la brten nas/
NK055(ri)001:4966: rdo rje slob dpon gyi gsung mtshon byed tshig gis mtshon bya don rab tu ston te/
NK055(ri)001:4968: rdo rje slob dpon la rag las pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:4969: khong nas gab sbas don 'byin pa //
NK055(ri)001:4971: rjod byed kyi tshig gis mtshon pa'i brjod bya'i don ni/
NK055(ri)001:4972: rang bzhin gsang ba'i snying po chos thams cad kyi
NK055(ri)001:4973: de kho na nyid gzung 'dzin gyis zhen pas brtags
NK055(ri)001:4974: pa'i dbang gis gab pa ltar mi rtogs pa ni
NK055(ri)001:4975: ston pa kun tu bzang pos 'byin la/
NK055(ri)001:4976: de mtshon pa'i lam gyi rgyud 'di las ston pa
NK055(ri)001:4977: kun tu bzang po'i thugs rjes gsang sngags byin rlabs
NK055(ri)001:4978: kyi lam yin pas bla ma la thug pa'i phyir/
NK055(ri)001:4979: rgyud dkrugs lung gcus man ngag sbas pa rnams rdo rje slob dpon gyis 'byin pas/
NK055(ri)001:4980: rdo rje'i thugs la gnas zhes bya ste/
NK055(ri)001:4981: kun tu bzang po'i lung rgyud kyi gzhung yod kyang bla ma la rag las la/
NK055(ri)001:4982: de'i nang du le'u 'di bla ma la rag las
NK055(ri)001:4983: pa kho na bas de'i dbang gis bla ma mnyes
NK055(ri)001:4984: par bya ba yang shugs las 'byung ngo //
NK055(ri)001:4985: grol lam rim gyis pas bskyed pa'i rim pa'i sgo
NK055(ri)001:4986: nas rig 'dzin la lam stegs bcas pas phyi ltar
NK055(ri)001:4988: zhes pa la sogs pas lta ba sngon du song
NK055(ri)001:4989: bas de bzhin nyid kyi dkyil 'khor kho na ston
NK055(ri)001:4990: te/ sems kyi chos nyid ma bcos pa'i ngo bo
NK055(ri)001:4991: 'phags pa'i nor bdun dang ldan pa ni don dam
NK055(ri)001:4993: sems rang byung gi ye shes gsal la ma 'gag
NK055(ri)001:4994: pa phung po khams dang skye mched rang snang ba
NK055(ri)001:4995: nyid na chu'i gzugs brnyan ltar snang stong gi chos
NK055(ri)001:4996: nyid thams cad dang bral ba mnyam rdzogs ni tha
NK055(ri)001:4997: snyad du kun rdzob kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
NK055(ri)001:4998: de gnyis brjod pa la snga phyi byung yang chu
NK055(ri)001:4999: dang gsher ba bzhin du rig pa la skad cig
NK055(ri)001:5000: gis rdzogs pa ni bden pa dbyer med kyi dkyil
NK055(ri)001:5001: 'khor ro // don de nyid gzhal bya gzhal byed
NK055(ri)001:5002: med par rang rig pa'i ngo bo nyid du gsal
NK055(ri)001:5003: 'khor ro // te/ rtogs snyam gyi 'du shes dang
NK055(ri)001:5004: bral ba ni lta ba'i ngo bo thog tu phebs
NK055(ri)001:5006: zhes pa'i tshig gis mtshon no //
NK055(ri)001:5007: dngos po gang la ldan na 'khor 'das thams cad la ldan no //
NK055(ri)001:5008: sangs rgyas la ldan pa lta ba ngo bo nyid yin na/
NK055(ri)001:5009: sems can 'khrul pa la ldan pa ji ltar ldan zhe na/
NK055(ri)001:5010: ldan pa ma shes pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:5011: dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i bu lus
NK055(ri)001:5012: la mtshan dpe dang ldan pa rigs 'khyar nas 'bangs
NK055(ri)001:5013: tha mal pa dang ldan pa bzhin/
NK055(ri)001:5014: 'khrul pa brtags pa nyid kyis ngo bo nyid ma
NK055(ri)001:5015: mthong yang rtogs pa'i don gyis ngo bo la sangs
NK055(ri)001:5016: rgyas sems can la che chung du song ba med
NK055(ri)001:5017: do // de yang tshul ji ltar ldan na/
NK055(ri)001:5018: khyab bya khyab byed med de nam mkha' dang stong gsal bzhin rang bzhin gyis bzhugs so //
NK055(ri)001:5019: des ni lam gyi gzhi lta ba bstan to //
NK055(ri)001:5021: lta ba rtogs pa dang ldan pa'i lam gyi gzhi yin pa'i gtan tshigs so //
NK055(ri)001:5023: zhes pa gong du bstan pa'i lta ba de nyid/
NK055(ri)001:5025: zhes pa bsgom pa'i gzhir gzhag pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:5026: bsgom pa rang gi ngo bo ni/
NK055(ri)001:5028: zhes pa de bzhin nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin snang
NK055(ri)001:5029: stong gang gi yang zhe 'dod med pa'i ngang las
NK055(ri)001:5030: mi rtogs pa chen po'i ngo bor rang bzhag par
NK055(ri)001:5031: bsgom pa'o // snying rje chen po bsgom pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:5035: zhes pa snying rje chen po'i ting nge 'dzin te
NK055(ri)001:5036: phyi nang gi chos thams cad rig pa rang gsal
NK055(ri)001:5037: gyi ngang las rang snang gi chos thams cad snang
NK055(ri)001:5038: bya snang byed med par me long gi gzugs brnyan
NK055(ri)001:5039: bzhin/ rig pa ma 'gag chos thams cad du snang
NK055(ri)001:5040: rig par dbyer med pas snang bya snang byed kyi
NK055(ri)001:5041: 'du shes dang yul du 'dzin pa yang mi mnga'
NK055(ri)001:5042: bzhin/ ste/ ma 'gag pa'i ngos nas kun rdzob byang chub sems zhes kyang bya/
NK055(ri)001:5043: snang ba dang ma grub pa dbyer med pas sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin zhes kyang bya/
NK055(ri)001:5044: rang rig pa'i ye shes kyis chos thams cad la khyab kyang /
NK055(ri)001:5045: khyab bya khyab byed kyi 'dzin pa med pas snying rje chen po'i rnal 'byor zhes kyang bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:5046: gtan tshigs gsum des dkyil 'khor gyi nges tshig grub bo //
NK055(ri)001:5047: dkyil 'khor las byung ba zhes pa/
NK055(ri)001:5048: snying rje chen po'i rnal 'byor de/
NK055(ri)001:5049: de bzhin nyid las 'byung ngam snang zhes bya ste/
NK055(ri)001:5050: dper na chu rnyog ma gtan nas dag na gzugs brnyan gsal ba mthar phyin pa bzhin/
NK055(ri)001:5051: stong pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la 'du shes
NK055(ri)001:5052: kyi gzung ba'i phra rags rnyog ma dang 'dra ba
NK055(ri)001:5053: mi mnga' na/ sems rang gsal yin pa'i rang thog tu phyin pas/
NK055(ri)001:5054: rang gsal mi 'gag pa ye shes dkyil 'khor lhun gyis grub pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:5055: phyag rgya gcig par bsgom pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:5056: thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor mchog /ces pa thugs kyi dkyil 'khor ni/
NK055(ri)001:5057: sgyu ma lta bu'i skabs su khams gsum gyi chos thams cad rang rig par gsal ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:5058: dkyil 'khor mchog ni rig pa de nyid h'u cha lnga pa lta bu'i rang bzhin du bsdus pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:5061: h'u las phyag rgya gcig pa phra ba sku rgyan
NK055(ri)001:5062: gcig pa lta bur snang ba ni bden pa dbyer
NK055(ri)001:5063: med kyi ngo bo yin te/
NK055(ri)001:5064: stong pa chen po don dam pa dkyil 'khor spros
NK055(ri)001:5065: pa kun rdzob de nyid rdo rje sems dpa'i sku
NK055(ri)001:5066: rgyan gcig par 'dus pa dbyer med de/
NK055(ri)001:5067: dbyer med kyi don ni gnyis can gyi mtha' thams
NK055(ri)001:5068: cad dang bral bas de nyid dus gsum gyi sangs
NK055(ri)001:5069: rgyas thams cad kyi thugs yin/
NK055(ri)001:5070: thugs mtshon pa'i rdo rje sems dapa'o //
NK055(ri)001:5072: bden pa gnyis so sor 'dzin pa las 'phags pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:5074: gsang ba'i thig le'i dkyil 'khor dbyings //
NK055(ri)001:5076: gsang ba ni thugs kyi rigs mtshon pa'i rdo rje
NK055(ri)001:5077: sems dpa'i sku rgyan gcig pa ngo bo sangs rgyas
NK055(ri)001:5078: thams cad kyi thugs rdo rje'i rigs bden pa dbyer
NK055(ri)001:5080: bud+d+ha 'ba' zhig gi yul yin te/
NK055(ri)001:5081: phal gyi spyod yul du ma gyur pas rang bzhin gyis gsang ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:5082: thig le ni spros pa dang bral bas zlum pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:5083: bden pa dbyer med kyi lha phyag rgya gcig pa'i
NK055(ri)001:5084: khongs su stong pa chen po'i rnal 'byor las ma
NK055(ri)001:5085: g.yos dkyil 'khor spros pa dngos po'i mtha' dang bral/
NK055(ri)001:5086: spros pa ma 'gag par snang bas dngos po med pa'i mtha' dang bral ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:5087: de ltar phyag rgya gcig pa la goms na spros pa'i dkyil 'khor snang bas dkyil 'khor zhes bya la/
NK055(ri)001:5088: spros pa'i dkyil 'khor snang ba'i rgyu'i 'byung khungs lta bur gyur pas dbyings zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:5089: dkyil 'khor rgyas pa bstan pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:5090: de ltar dkyil 'khor spros pa la 'jug pa'i dus su/
NK055(ri)001:5091: spros pa mngon du gyur pa'i rgyu ni stong pa chen po'i rnal 'byor bsgom pa'i dus su/
NK055(ri)001:5092: khams gsum mtha' thams cad dang bral ba'i stong pa chen po'i ngo bor rdzogs/
NK055(ri)001:5093: rig pa sgyu ma nyid sa bon gyi dus su rgyu'i yi ge gang yin par gsal/
NK055(ri)001:5094: de las phyag rgya gcig pa rgyan gcig par gsal/
NK055(ri)001:5095: de dag gi stobs kyis 'dir dkyil 'khor rgyas pa
NK055(ri)001:5096: bsgom pa'i dus su khams gsum dkyil 'khor du gsal
NK055(ri)001:5097: ba yin pas/ 'byung ba shes rab rigs kyi yum //
NK055(ri)001:5098: zhes pa tha mal pa rtogs pa'i dus su sa chu me rlung nam mkha' lnga/
NK055(ri)001:5099: rigs lnga'i yum du gsal te/
NK055(ri)001:5100: de yang nam mkha' sa chu me rlung lnga las/
NK055(ri)001:5102: zhes pa nam mkha'i ngang las sa chu me rlung bzhi snang /
NK055(ri)001:5103: de las snod kyi 'jig rten yang de las byung /
NK055(ri)001:5104: bcud kyi 'jig rten yang de las byung bas/
NK055(ri)001:5105: bskyed cing 'byung ba'i phyir na yum zhes kyang bya/
NK055(ri)001:5106: rgyur smos pas 'byung ba zhes kyang bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:5107: shes rab ni 'byung ba lnga so sor gzhig na
NK055(ri)001:5108: 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid mi rnyed de sa gcig pu
NK055(ri)001:5109: la'ang rags pa sra ba'i mtshan nyid 'dzin pa tsam
NK055(ri)001:5110: sa'i sa/ sa gcig tu 'dus nas mi gyes shing mi 'bo ba sa'i chu/
NK055(ri)001:5111: mi rul zhing mi rlag ste sa'i rlung /
NK055(ri)001:5112: sa gong nas gong du smin zhing brtas par byed pa sa'i me/
NK055(ri)001:5113: de rnams kyis gzhig cing dpyad na sa'i dngos po
NK055(ri)001:5114: grub pa med cing nam mkhar gsal ba sa'i nam
NK055(ri)001:5115: mkha' 'byung ba lnga ka la de ltar gzhal bas
NK055(ri)001:5116: dngos por grub pa med cing thams cad la khyab
NK055(ri)001:5117: pa nyid thabs dang shes rab lan shes rab bo
NK055(ri)001:5118: // yang snod bcud kyi chos thams cad bskyed pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:5119: snod bcud dang mi phyed pa'i don gyis yum gnyis te shes rab bo //
NK055(ri)001:5120: de dag thams cad kyi bdag nyid de/
NK055(ri)001:5121: ting nge 'dzin gyi ngo bo rigs kyi yum/
NK055(ri)001:5122: zhes pa rigs ni lnga ste yum yang lnga'o //
NK055(ri)001:5123: sa sangs rgyas spyan ma rnam snang gi yum/
NK055(ri)001:5124: chu m+aa ma k+ai rin 'byung gi/
NK055(ri)001:5125: me gos dkar mo mtha' yas kyi/
NK055(ri)001:5126: rlung sgrol ma don grub kyi/
NK055(ri)001:5127: nam mkha' kun tu bzang mo rdo rje sems dpa'i yum mo //
NK055(ri)001:5128: chen po'i rigs te de bzhin te //
NK055(ri)001:5130: chen po phung po lnga ste gzugs la sogs pa lnga stobs rags te/
NK055(ri)001:5131: khams gsum snod bcud thams cad phung por lngar 'dus/
NK055(ri)001:5132: las kyi nus pa che ste 'khor ba rgyu 'bras 'phel bar byed/
NK055(ri)001:5133: khyab che ste khams gsum yongs la khyab/
NK055(ri)001:5134: rtsa ba dang yan lag mang ste gzugs la gzugs chen bco lnga lta bu ste kun la des 'gre/
NK055(ri)001:5136: dngos po rags par snang ba de bzhin gshegs pa lngar snang bas de bzhin te/
NK055(ri)001:5137: de yang bsgom pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi ngo la
NK055(ri)001:5138: gzugs kyi phung po de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par
NK055(ri)001:5139: snang mdzad/ tshor ba rin chen 'byung ldan/
NK055(ri)001:5142: rnam shes rdo rje sems dapa'o //
NK055(ri)001:5143: byang chub sems ni rdo rje'i tshogs //
NK055(ri)001:5144: zhes pa rang bzhin nyid kyi dus su sems nyid bden pa gsum pa'i don ni byang chub ste/
NK055(ri)001:5145: don dam gyi ngos nas dngos po thams cad dang bral bas byang /
NK055(ri)001:5146: kun rdzob kyi ngos nas rang snang mi 'gags pa'i
NK055(ri)001:5147: rtsal cir shar yang byang ba las ma g.yos pas
NK055(ri)001:5148: chub/ de gnyis dbyer med pa bden pa dbyer med kyi don la dus gsum 'da' ba med pas sems/
NK055(ri)001:5149: de rang snang ba mi 'gag pa las dbang yul
NK055(ri)001:5150: gyi chos ci snang yang dbyer med kyi don las
NK055(ri)001:5151: mi 'da' bas rdo rje tshogs ni khams dang skye
NK055(ri)001:5152: mched rnams so // bsgom pa'i dus su byang chub
NK055(ri)001:5153: sems ni yab yum gyi mkha' gsang byin gyis brlabsa
NK055(ri)001:5154: pas 'khor bskyed pa'i rgyu byang chub kyi sems spros
NK055(ri)001:5155: pas sku gsung thugs rdo rje mtshon pa'i rdo rje
NK055(ri)001:5156: sems dpa' dang sems ma'i tshogs su gsal ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:5157: dbang po yul dus rig pa rnams //
NK055(ri)001:5159: dang po rig pa zhes pa/
NK055(ri)001:5160: rnam par shes pa ste mig gi rnam shes dang /
NK055(ri)001:5161: rna ba sna lce sa snying la sogs pa bzhir gsal/
NK055(ri)001:5162: lus kyi rnam shes khro bo gshin rje gshed po'o //
NK055(ri)001:5163: mig gi dbang po la sogs pa bzhi byams pa la sogs pa bzhir bsgom/
NK055(ri)001:5164: lus kyi dbang po ni khro bo chen po stobs po che'o //
NK055(ri)001:5165: mig gi yul gzugs la sogs pa bzhi ni sgeg
NK055(ri)001:5166: mo la sogs pa bzhi nang gi sems dpa' bzhi'i
NK055(ri)001:5167: yum mo // lus kyi reg bya ni khro bo rta mgrin no //
NK055(ri)001:5168: dus 'das pa la sogs pa bzhi bdug spos ma la sogs pa bzhi ste/
NK055(ri)001:5169: phyi'i sems dpa' bzhi'i yum mo //
NK055(ri)001:5170: rnams kyi khongs su lus kyi reg shes ni bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:5171: nyon mongs pa drug ni thub pa drug go/
NK055(ri)001:5172: yid dang kun gzhi gnyis ni kun tu bzang po dang bzang mo'o //
NK055(ri)001:5173: kun tu bzang po'i dkyil 'khor la //
NK055(ri)001:5174: zhes pa khams gsum bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi dkyil
NK055(ri)001:5175: 'khor lhun gyis grub tsa bsgom pa ting nge 'dzin
NK055(ri)001:5176: gyi ngo la dkyil 'khor las ma gtogs pa'i dngos
NK055(ri)001:5177: po'i chos phra ba gcig kyang ma dmigs pa ni
NK055(ri)001:5178: blo la gzung 'dzin phra rags ka nas dag pas
NK055(ri)001:5179: spyod yul dag pa la ni/
NK055(ri)001:5180: kun tu bzang po zhes brjod la/
NK055(ri)001:5181: thams cad lhun gyis grub pas dkyil 'khor ro //
NK055(ri)001:5183: bdag nyid chen po lhag pa yi //
NK055(ri)001:5185: bdag nyid chen po zhes pa/
NK055(ri)001:5186: dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad rig pa rang snang ba las/
NK055(ri)001:5187: gzhan yul sems la sogs pa'i gnyis 'dzin ngang gis dag pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:5189: rtsa ba las lhag pa yan lag gi lha ste lha dagu'am bcu gcig bsgom ste/
NK055(ri)001:5190: de'ang dgu'i dbang du byas na dbu la rigs lnga sku gsung thugs kyi gsum/
NK055(ri)001:5191: ye shes sems dpa' dang dagu'o //
NK055(ri)001:5192: bcu gcig gi dbang du na dgu'i thog tu yon
NK055(ri)001:5193: tan phrin las kyi lha gnyis dang bcu gcig go
NK055(ri)001:5194: // thugs kyi ye shes lnga lta zhing //
NK055(ri)001:5195: zhes pa bye brag tu dbu rgyan gyi lha ngo ston pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:5197: snying po thig le mnyam sbyor bas //
NK055(ri)001:5199: bskyed rim mthar phyin nas tshogs bsgrub pa ste yo
NK055(ri)001:5200: byad la sogs pa bco lnga tshogs nas bsnyen bsgrub
NK055(ri)001:5201: bzhis nyams su blangs pa'i bsgrub pa'i mtha' bsgrub pa
NK055(ri)001:5202: chen po la sbyor la khad kyi dus su/
NK055(ri)001:5203: lta spyod bsgom gsum dbyer med par mgo snyoms par
NK055(ri)001:5204: 'byongs pa'i dus su theg 'og dang mi 'dra bar
NK055(ri)001:5205: rgyu 'bras gnyis su med par nyams su blang ba'i
NK055(ri)001:5206: snying po ste las 'og ma rnams kyi 'bras bu
NK055(ri)001:5207: yin pas snying po/ gong ma rnams kyi gazhi'am rtsa ba yin pas snying po'o //
NK055(ri)001:5208: thig le ni snying po de nyid spros pa dang bral ba ste/
NK055(ri)001:5209: thob bya rig 'dzin gyi dgongs pa'i ngo bo snang stong la sogs pa'i mtha' dang bral ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:5210: don de nyid la tshogs kyi sgrub pas nus mthu
NK055(ri)001:5211: bskyed du song bas mthar lam du mnyam par sbyor
NK055(ri)001:5212: ba'o // bde ba'i ye shes rol mo yis //
NK055(ri)001:5214: bde ba ni tshogs kyi bsgrub pa ma 'dres yongs
NK055(ri)001:5215: rdzogs nyams su blangs pas grub pa'i rtags thon pa'i
NK055(ri)001:5216: dngos grub la/ 'du shes kyi zug rngu dang bral bas bde ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:5217: de nyid rang byung ye shes lam pas rtogs pa'i mgo zug pa'i ye shes so //
NK055(ri)001:5219: dper na rol mos ltad mo ba'i yid tshim pa bzhin/
NK055(ri)001:5220: 'dir don gyi rol mo rig pa'i ye shes bde
NK055(ri)001:5221: chen gyi dngos grub kyis lam pa'i yid tshim par
NK055(ri)001:5222: byed pa'o // ye shes dgyes la rol par mchod //
NK055(ri)001:5224: lam pa'i rtogs pa rang byung gi ye shes la
NK055(ri)001:5225: nyon mongs pa'i 'du shes kyis 'dzin pa'i gdung ba
NK055(ri)001:5226: med pas mnyam pa nyid kyi ngang las mthar 'dzin
NK055(ri)001:5227: mi gnas pa ni/ rig pa mnyam pa nyid de dgyes pa'i ngo bo'o //
NK055(ri)001:5228: mchod pa ni mnyes pa'i ngo bo ste/
NK055(ri)001:5229: dper na mi zas kyis mnyes na btang snyoms su
NK055(ri)001:5230: 'dug pa bzhin mnyam pa nyid kyi dgongs pa mngon
NK055(ri)001:5231: du snang ba'o // 'bul ba ni yul yul can
NK055(ri)001:5232: med par bdag nyid chen por lhun gyis grub pa'o
NK055(ri)001:5233: du snang ba'o // // nang ltar rdzogs pa'i rim pa rim 'jug tu bshad na/
NK055(ri)001:5235: zhes pa snying ga chos kyi 'khor lo tsit+ta smug
NK055(ri)001:5236: po gur phub pa 'dra ba'i gzhal yas khang gi
NK055(ri)001:5237: nang nas chos kyi 'khor lo kun tu bzang po'i
NK055(ri)001:5238: ngo bo ste/ chos kyi tsakra'i dbus na rtsa ba rtsa bzhi/
NK055(ri)001:5239: de las gyes pas gsum gsum du song bas drug
NK055(ri)001:5240: ma gyes pa gnyis dang brgyad ni snying ga chos
NK055(ri)001:5242: rtsa de yang rtsa ba gcig las gyes pa lta bu ma yin te/
NK055(ri)001:5243: rtsa bzhi'i khug pa gnyis gnye ma'i snying po 'khyil ba lta bu'o //
NK055(ri)001:5244: tha snyad du sbrul 'khyil ba lta bu zhes kyang brjod do //
NK055(ri)001:5245: de nas 'byung ba lnga'i dwangs ma lnga yod de/
NK055(ri)001:5246: dwangs ma lnga ni ye sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo'o //
NK055(ri)001:5247: sems can rnams kyi sems rang bzhin gyis yengs pa
NK055(ri)001:5248: yin pa dang mtshungs par sems ma rtogs na 'khor
NK055(ri)001:5250: dwangs ma'i 'byung ba lnga de ma rtogs na ma
NK055(ri)001:5251: rtogs pa'i skyon gyis 'phangs pa'i 'khor ba 'byung ba'i
NK055(ri)001:5253: 'khor lo bzhi bsgom pa'i stobs kyis dwangs ma'i 'byung
NK055(ri)001:5254: ba lnga mngon du gyur te mthong na sems rtogs
NK055(ri)001:5255: na bud+d+ha'i ngo bo yin pas snyigs ma'i 'byung ba
NK055(ri)001:5256: dag nas bud+d+ha'i ngo bo nyid du gyur pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:5257: de nas snying ga chos kyi tsakra na ma rtogs
NK055(ri)001:5258: na 'khor ba'i sa bon yi ge drug kyang rtsa
NK055(ri)001:5259: mdud la yod/ rtogs na 'bras bu sangs rgyas kyi
NK055(ri)001:5260: ngo bo +aahmh'u gsum yang rtsa mdud la yod pa'o
NK055(ri)001:5261: mdud la yod/ // de la dwangs ma lnga ni
NK055(ri)001:5262: chos kyi tsakra'i dbus 'byung ba sa'i dwangs ma dar
NK055(ri)001:5264: rgyus pa nar ma 'dra ba dkar la dwangs pa mnyen pa zhig yod de/
NK055(ri)001:5265: phung po'i rten byed pa'i bdag nyid/
NK055(ri)001:5266: yum ldan bud+d+ha spyan gyi ngo bo'o //
NK055(ri)001:5267: sku lnga mngon par byang chub pa'i sku/
NK055(ri)001:5268: ye shes na stong pa nyid kyi ye shes chos
NK055(ri)001:5269: thams cad mtha' dang bral ba'i dag pa'i ngang du
NK055(ri)001:5271: de nas khrag gi dwangs ma mtshal cog la ma'i kha dog lta bu/
NK055(ri)001:5272: skad cig ma'i lus 'degs par byed pa'i bdag nyid
NK055(ri)001:5273: chu'i dwangs ma ste yum chen mo m+aa ma k+ai'i
NK055(ri)001:5274: ngo bo/ sku ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku/
NK055(ri)001:5275: ye shes ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes thams
NK055(ri)001:5276: cad chos kyi dbyings su sdud par byed pa'i las
NK055(ri)001:5277: so // de nas dbugs kyi dwangs ma gser sa
NK055(ri)001:5278: 'og na yod pa'i rlangs pa tsam phung po g.yo
NK055(ri)001:5279: bar byed pa'i las can 'byung ba na rlung /
NK055(ri)001:5280: yum na dam tshig sgrol ma/
NK055(ri)001:5281: ye shes na bya ba grub pa'i ye shes/
NK055(ri)001:5283: mnyam pa nyid kyi dbyings su bskyod par byed pa'i las can no //
NK055(ri)001:5284: de nas drod kyi dwangs ma me long nyi ma la bzhag pa 'i ngad tsam/
NK055(ri)001:5285: phung po smin par byed pa'i bdag nyid yum na gos dkar mo/
NK055(ri)001:5287: ye shes na so sor rtogs pa'i ye shes/
NK055(ri)001:5288: chos thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngang du rtog par byed pa'i bdag nyid do //
NK055(ri)001:5289: de nas sems kyi dwangs ma srog mi shigs pa'i
NK055(ri)001:5290: thig le kha dog gang du yang ma grub la
NK055(ri)001:5291: cir yang snang ba che chung sran phyed tsam phung
NK055(ri)001:5292: po gsal bar byed pa'i las tsam/
NK055(ri)001:5296: ye shes na bdal khyab chen po'i ye shes/
NK055(ri)001:5297: chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings su go skabs 'byed pa'i bdag nyid do //
NK055(ri)001:5298: de nyid 'gro ba rnams la rang chas su yod pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:5299: de ni dkyil 'khor ldan pa'i zhes pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:5301: de lta bu'i ye shes skad cig ma la ye
NK055(ri)001:5302: shes gsal bar bsgom pa'i gnas lugs ji lta ba
NK055(ri)001:5303: bzhin bsgom pa'o // dkyil 'khor la ni dkyil 'khor bsgom/
NK055(ri)001:5305: snying ga chos kyi 'khor lo ye shes lnga'i dkyil
NK055(ri)001:5306: 'khor bsgom pa'i gzhir bzhag pa la ni la zhes
NK055(ri)001:5308: lam rnam par bkod par sgom thabs bzhi bshad pa bzhin shes par bya ba'am/
NK055(ri)001:5311: zhes pa ye shes lnga'i dkyil 'khor ro //
NK055(ri)001:5312: ye shes lnga nyid snying ga chos kyi 'khor lo'i
NK055(ri)001:5313: dwangs ma'i 'byung ba lnga 'khor lo'i man ngag bzhin
NK055(ri)001:5314: bsgoms pa'i stobs las byung ba ste/
NK055(ri)001:5316: thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor mchog /ces pa thugs
NK055(ri)001:5317: kyi dkyil 'khor ni 'byung ba nam mkha'i dwangs ma
NK055(ri)001:5318: srog mi shigs pa'i thig le 'od du 'bar bas
NK055(ri)001:5319: rtsa bzhi las sku gsung thugs kyi yi ge +aahmh'u
NK055(ri)001:5320: gsum bskul bas/ 'gro drug gi sa bon yi ge a n+ri sum tri pre duhdruga dang /
NK055(ri)001:5321: shes pa bzhi'i bag chags sbyangs nas slar thig le ye shes snying po la 'dus te/
NK055(ri)001:5322: cir yang mi dmigs pa'i ye shes lngar rang rig gsal ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:5323: dkyil 'khor mchog ni rang rig ye shes lngar gsal
NK055(ri)001:5324: ba nyid de'i gong na gzhan med pas mchog go
NK055(ri)001:5325: // de ni kun tu bzang po'i 'khor lo bsgom pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:5326: da ni kun tu bzang mo'i thig le bsgom pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:5327: gsang ba'i thig le'i dkyil 'khor dbyings //
NK055(ri)001:5330: kun tu bzang mo'i thig le rtogs dka' ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:5331: de nyid gsang ba'i lte ba na rtsa 'dab drug
NK055(ri)001:5332: cu rtsa bzhi'i dbus na kun tu bzang mo'i thig
NK055(ri)001:5333: le yum lnga'i dkyil 'khor du gsal ba ste yi
NK055(ri)001:5334: ge a thung ngu'i dbyibs so //
NK055(ri)001:5336: zhes pa yum lnga'i dkyil 'khor gyi ngo bo a
NK055(ri)001:5337: thung ngu de las dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi 'byung
NK055(ri)001:5338: khungs su gyur pas dbyings zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:5339: 'byung ba shes rab rigs kyi yum //
NK055(ri)001:5340: chen po'i rigs te de bzhin te //
NK055(ri)001:5341: zhes pa 'byung ba lnga shes rab ni 'byung ba
NK055(ri)001:5342: lnga'i cha phra ba skra'i rtse mo brgyar gshags pa'i
NK055(ri)001:5343: cha tsam mo // de nyid 'byung ba lnga'i ngo bo'o //
NK055(ri)001:5344: chen po ni 'byung ba lnga'i rags pa yab lnga'i ngo bo'o //
NK055(ri)001:5345: byang chub sems ni rdo rje'i tshogs //
NK055(ri)001:5346: zhes pa bsgom pa'i stobs kyis 'byung ba phra ba dang rags pa rnams yum dang yab tu dag nas/
NK055(ri)001:5347: dgongs pa nyams su myong ba'i ngo bo gsang ba'i
NK055(ri)001:5348: sku'i bstan pa ni bde stong dbyer med kyi byang
NK055(ri)001:5349: chub sems te/ rtogs pa'i rtsal gyis khams dang skye mched rnams kyang ma 'gags pa sku/
NK055(ri)001:5350: ma dmigs pa ye shes su shar te/
NK055(ri)001:5351: sdong po dang yal ga'i dpe ngo ti bstan pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:5352: dbang po yul dus rig pa rnams //
NK055(ri)001:5353: zhes pa gong du kun tu bzang mo'i thig le
NK055(ri)001:5354: chos thams cad snang bar byed pa'i gzhi dbyings kyang
NK055(ri)001:5355: smos la/ ma rtogs pa'i rtog pa rnams kyang kun tu bzang mo'i ngang du snang la/
NK055(ri)001:5356: bsgoms na 'khor lo'i don mngon du gyur pa'i dus
NK055(ri)001:5357: su 'byung ba'i cha phra ba yum lngar dag /rags
NK055(ri)001:5358: pa yab lngar dag /rtsa ba shing gi sdong po
NK055(ri)001:5359: dang 'dra ba phra rags yab yum bcur dag tsa/
NK055(ri)001:5360: shing gi yal ga dang 'dra ba'i rnam shes lnga/
NK055(ri)001:5363: dus bzhi la sogs pa rnams dag pa kun bskyed rim gyi skabs su bshad pa bzhin te/
NK055(ri)001:5364: de'i don ni rnam shes lnga snang stong dbyer med pa rang byung ye shes su gsal/
NK055(ri)001:5365: de nyid sems dpa' bzhi dang gshin rje gshed po'i ngo bo/
NK055(ri)001:5366: yul gzugs la sogs pa lnga snang stong dbyer med pa'i ye shes su gsal/
NK055(ri)001:5367: de nyid lha mo bzhi dang rta mgrin gyi ngo bo/
NK055(ri)001:5368: dbang po lnga snang stong dbyer med pa ye shes su gsal/
NK055(ri)001:5369: de nyid sems dpa' bzhi dang stobs po che'i ngo bo/
NK055(ri)001:5370: de la sogs te dag bya'i ngos nas so sor brtsi ba ni/
NK055(ri)001:5371: phyi bshad bskyed rim dang mthun la ngo bo ye shes kho na'o //
NK055(ri)001:5372: kun tu bzang po'i dkyil 'khor la //
NK055(ri)001:5373: zhes pa chos thams cad sku dang ye shes su
NK055(ri)001:5374: gsal bas spyod yul yongs su dag pa ni kun
NK055(ri)001:5376: zhes pa de lta bu'i don bsgom pa'i gzhir bstan pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:5377: bsgom thabs ni rnam bkod ltar yi ge bzhi po'am yang na 'di ltar bsgom ste/
NK055(ri)001:5378: bdag nyid chen po lhag pa yi //
NK055(ri)001:5379: zhes pa dngos po phyi nang gi chos thams cad
NK055(ri)001:5380: yid rang byung gi ye shes su gsal ba de
NK055(ri)001:5381: nyid las ma gtogs pa'i gzhan med pas bdag nyid
NK055(ri)001:5383: lhag pa ni gong gi snying gi thig le la
NK055(ri)001:5384: ye shes lnga ye nas yod pa las 'dir khyad
NK055(ri)001:5385: par du yid ye shes lnga'i ngo bor bsgom pas
NK055(ri)001:5387: thugs kyi ye shes lnga lta zhing //
NK055(ri)001:5388: zhes pa thugs ni snying ga kun tu bzang po'i 'khor lo'o //
NK055(ri)001:5389: ye shes lnga ni snying ye shes lnga'i thig le
NK055(ri)001:5390: dwangs ma chen po'i ngo bo mi rtog pa'i ngang
NK055(ri)001:5391: las 'od du 'bar nas rtsa kun dar ma'i nang
NK055(ri)001:5392: na mar zhugs te/ lte ba sprul pa'i thig le
NK055(ri)001:5393: la ye shes lnga'i bde ba gsal bas lta zhes
NK055(ri)001:5394: na mar zhugs te/ bya ste/ don la dbab bzlog gi ngo bo'i bskul mas 'dzag pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:5395: de'i dus na yid kyi rgyu ba 'du shes kyi
NK055(ri)001:5396: rgyun chad de gzhi'i 'khor lo rang gi ngo bo
NK055(ri)001:5397: yang mi dmigs te/ mtha' dang bral ba ni/
NK055(ri)001:5398: kun tu bzang po'i thig le dang phrad de rnyed mthong ba'i ngo bo'o //
NK055(ri)001:5399: sbyor ba dag pa'i man ngag ni/
NK055(ri)001:5400: snying po thig le mnyam sbyor bas //
NK055(ri)001:5404: gong gi sprul pa'i thig le rgyu 'bras thams cad kyi bcud 'dus pa'i don gyi snying po'o //
NK055(ri)001:5406: mgrin pa longs spyod kyi 'khor lo rtsa 'dab ma bcu drug gi dbus na thig le bzhugs pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:5408: sprul pa bde ba'i 'od rtsa kun dar ma'i nang
NK055(ri)001:5409: na yar zhugs nas longs spyod kyi thig le la
NK055(ri)001:5410: 'od phog pas/ 'od kyi stobs kyis chab rom zhu ba bzhin du 'bab pas/
NK055(ri)001:5411: ye shes kyi thig le bde ba skyes pas thig le gnyis ngo bos mnyam par sbyor ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:5412: de'i dus su bde ba'i ye shes zhes pa/
NK055(ri)001:5413: thig le gnyis ngo bor mnyam pa'i bde ba la ched du 'dzin pa'i zug rngu med pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:5415: dper na rol mo mkhan gyis ltad mo ba'i yid tshim par byed pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:5416: dpe de bzhin du thig le gnyis ngo bos ro
NK055(ri)001:5417: mnyam pa'i bde bas rnal 'byor pa'i rig pa tshim
NK055(ri)001:5418: pa'o // tshim pa'i mtshan nyid ni reg pa zhe
NK055(ri)001:5419: 'dod thams cad dang bral nas zag pa med pa'i
NK055(ri)001:5420: btang snyoms chen por bzhugs pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:5421: ye shes dgyes la mchod pa 'bul //
NK055(ri)001:5422: zhes pa lhan cig skyes pa'i bde ba'i ye shes la/
NK055(ri)001:5424: dgyes/ zhes pa nyon mongs pa rtog pa'i gdung ba med par yid tshim pa ni dgyes pa chen po'o //
NK055(ri)001:5425: de nyid tsam du yang 'dzin pa med pas mchod
NK055(ri)001:5426: pa phul ba gnas su stob pa phan yon dang
NK055(ri)001:5427: bcas pa'o // bdal khyab chen po'i man ngag gi/
NK055(ri)001:5428: zag pa med pa'i bsod nams kyis //
NK055(ri)001:5430: 'bru bsgyur te mgrin pa dang lte ba'i 'khor lo'i
NK055(ri)001:5431: bde ba rim par skyes nas mgrin pa ro drug
NK055(ri)001:5432: gi bde ba ma 'gags pa ni bsod nams te
NK055(ri)001:5433: bde ba'i ngo bo nyid lam pa'i dgongs pa nyams
NK055(ri)001:5434: su len pa ni bsod pa yin la/
NK055(ri)001:5435: de nyid kyis 'bras bu la sbyor ba ni/
NK055(ri)001:5436: nams mi 'gyur ba'i ngo bo gtan du ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:5437: de lta bu'i nyams su myong ba'i dus su yul
NK055(ri)001:5438: gyi chos la spyad kyang 'dzin pa med pas bag
NK055(ri)001:5439: chags bral te/ 'gal ba med pa ni khams gsum
NK055(ri)001:5440: gyi zag pa dang bral bas zag pa med pa
NK055(ri)001:5441: chags bral te/ zhes bya'o // kyis zhes pa byed pa'am nus pa'i tshig ste/
NK055(ri)001:5442: gong gi bde stong gi ye shes de 'od zer
NK055(ri)001:5443: drug tu 'bar nas rtsa kun dar nang na yar
NK055(ri)001:5444: song bas klad pa bde chen gyi 'khor lo rtsa
NK055(ri)001:5446: byang chub sems kyi thig le la 'od phog pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:5447: ye shes sgyu ma rang snang ba //
NK055(ri)001:5448: zhes pa bde chen gyi 'khor lo'i thig le 'od
NK055(ri)001:5449: du zhu nas bde ba'i ye shes su skyes pa
NK055(ri)001:5450: ni snang la rang bzhin med pa'i dpe sgyu ma
NK055(ri)001:5451: lta bur rang rig pa'i sems nyid snang ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:5452: rol mo'i dkyil 'khor mtha' yas mchog /ces pa rol mo ni/
NK055(ri)001:5453: rol mo mkhan gyi lus gzhi gang du yang ma
NK055(ri)001:5454: nges pa las lus dang yan lag gi thabs kyi
NK055(ri)001:5455: drangs na/ bem rig gi dngos po mi 'dra ba sna tshogs su snang ba dang /
NK055(ri)001:5456: des ltad mo ba'i yid tshim par byed pa ste dape'o //
NK055(ri)001:5457: don ni 'khor lo 'bar 'dzag gis myong bas bde
NK055(ri)001:5458: ba'i ye shes kyis bsgom pa po'i rig pa tshim
NK055(ri)001:5460: zhes bya ste rgyun mi chad pa'i bdag nyid do //
NK055(ri)001:5462: mtha' yas mchog /ces pa thig le de'i 'od spyi bo tshangs pa'i bu ga nas 'phros te/
NK055(ri)001:5463: rgyal ba'i zhing khams mtha' yas par khyab ste/
NK055(ri)001:5464: de na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drangs
NK055(ri)001:5465: nas nam mkha' la byon pa rnams yab yum sbyor
NK055(ri)001:5466: ba mdzad pa'i byang chub sems kyi chu rgyun bdag
NK055(ri)001:5467: gi spyi bo nas mar thim pa na 'khor lo
NK055(ri)001:5468: stong pa thams cad gso ste lus po kun la
NK055(ri)001:5469: khyab pas rtog pa bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis gzhi dag
NK055(ri)001:5470: nas bde ba'i ye shes su gsal ba bud+d+ha bzhi
NK055(ri)001:5471: bcu rtsa gnyis su gsal bas mtha' yas mchog ces
NK055(ri)001:5472: bya'o // gsang ba'i thig le nyid kyi dbyings //
NK055(ri)001:5473: zhes pa gsang ba ni yo ga phyin chad kyi yul ma yin la/
NK055(ri)001:5474: theg pa 'di nyid kyi bskyed rim pa'i rten gyi gang zag gi yul ma yin pas gsang ba'am/
NK055(ri)001:5475: yang na thig le de nyid bde ba chen po'i ngor gnas kyang /
NK055(ri)001:5476: rig pa la nyams su myong zhing blo dngos 'phrod pa'i rtogs dka' bas na gsang ba'i thig le'o //
NK055(ri)001:5478: nyid ni bde ba chen po'i ngo bo de snang ba'am 'byung khungs su gyur pas dbyings so //
NK055(ri)001:5479: de ni sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos //
NK055(ri)001:5482: zhes pa dngos po nye bar bzung ba ste las kyis kyang bud+d+ha yin te/
NK055(ri)001:5483: gang bsgom zhing nyams su blangs pa nyid bud+d+ha las mi 'gyur ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:5484: ngo bos kyang sangs rgyas yin te chos thams cad la khyab/
NK055(ri)001:5485: rang byung gi ye shes la gzhan don lhun gyis grub pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:5487: der rgyal ba thams cad dang rang rig bde ba chen po tha mi dad pas/
NK055(ri)001:5488: phyogs bcu dus bzhi mngon rdzogs pa'i //
NK055(ri)001:5489: zhes pa tshigs bzhi gsungs te/
NK055(ri)001:5490: 'bras bu'i skabs yin pas gzhan du yang 'chad pas go sla'o //
NK055(ri)001:5491: de ni thabs lam steng sgo dang sbyar te bshad pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:5492: da ni gsang ba ltar bshad na/
NK055(ri)001:5495: de yang rten gyi gang zag rdzogs pa chen po'i
NK055(ri)001:5496: don cig car rtogs pa gong du song ba de'i
NK055(ri)001:5497: 'og ma'am de la nye ba ste/
NK055(ri)001:5498: sbyangs pa dpag tu med pa song ba'i skyes bu
NK055(ri)001:5499: shes rab ting nge 'dzin dang brtson 'grus dang go
NK055(ri)001:5500: ba dang brtul zhugs rab dang ldan pas/
NK055(ri)001:5501: sngon du bya ba'i cho ga rnams/
NK055(ri)001:5503: mi 'jigs phreng ba nas bshad pa bzhin du bya ba rnams rdzogs nas dngos gzhi la 'jug pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:5505: zhes pa 'dir gsang ba byang chub sems kyi dkyil
NK055(ri)001:5506: 'khor bde ba ye shes kyi ro dang bcas pa
NK055(ri)001:5507: yab yum gnyis ka la rang bzhin gyis ldan pa'o
NK055(ri)001:5509: zhes pa gsang ba thabs lam gyi lung dang /
NK055(ri)001:5510: man ngag gis gtan la 'bebs pa'i byed pa po brjod do //
NK055(ri)001:5512: yab yum gyi sku lha yab yum gyi sku lha
NK055(ri)001:5513: yab yum gnyis su byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir gsal
