NK055(ri)001:5514: gdab pa'o // yum gyi mkha' la pam las pad+ma 'dab brgyad bsgom pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:5515: yab kyi dbang po h+aum las rdo rje rtse lnga
NK055(ri)001:5516: par bsgom ni mkha' gsang byin gyis brlab pa'i gsal
NK055(ri)001:5519: yab lha'i dkyil 'khor du mos pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:5520: yum lha'i dkyil 'khor du mos pa gnyis zhal sbyor du bzhugs pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:5522: yab yum gnyis thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa
NK055(ri)001:5523: rol pa las lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes kyi
NK055(ri)001:5526: thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor mchog /ces pa thugs
NK055(ri)001:5527: ni yab kyi byang chub sems rdo rje nor bu'i
NK055(ri)001:5528: dbu la snang ba'i dus na gnyis su med pa'i
NK055(ri)001:5529: ye shes su gsal ba ni dkyil 'khor gyi ngo
NK055(ri)001:5530: bo'o // dkyil 'khor mchog ni de nyid bde ba
NK055(ri)001:5531: mi rtog pa dgongs pa ma nor ba'i ngo bo
NK055(ri)001:5533: shes rab nyid thabs su sbyor ba ni/
NK055(ri)001:5534: gsang ba'i thig le dkyil 'khor dbyings //
NK055(ri)001:5535: zhes pa gsang ba ni yum shes rab kyi rang bzhin yin pas de nyid rtogs dka' ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:5536: yum gyi thig le las bde ba skyes pa'i dus
NK055(ri)001:5537: su gnyis su med pa'i rtogs pa skyes nas bde
NK055(ri)001:5538: la mi rtog par snang ba'i dus su 'das pa
NK055(ri)001:5539: bud+d+ha'i rgyud 'gyur la/ ma rtogs na gzung 'dzin tha
NK055(ri)001:5540: mal pa zhen par song nas 'khor ba snang bas
NK055(ri)001:5543: zhes pa thig le la bde ba skyes pa'i ro
NK055(ri)001:5544: myong tsam na phung po khams skye mched kyi gzung
NK055(ri)001:5545: 'dzin gyi 'du shes dag nas lhan cig skyes pa'i
NK055(ri)001:5546: ye shes su gsal ba'i dus na/
NK055(ri)001:5547: lhan skyes la dbye ba ngos gzung med kyang /
NK055(ri)001:5548: rtogs pa'i ngos nas gzhal bas rtog tshogs lhar gsal
NK055(ri)001:5549: zhes bya ste de'i rgyu'am gzhi yin pas dbyings zhes
NK055(ri)001:5550: bya'o // lhar gsal ba dngos gang zhe na/
NK055(ri)001:5551: 'byung ba shes rab rigs kyi yum //
NK055(ri)001:5553: 'byung ba lnga'i ngo bo cha phra ba gzung dka'
NK055(ri)001:5554: ba ni shes rab ces bya ste rigs kyi yum
NK055(ri)001:5556: zhes pa 'byung ba lnga rags par snang ba ni chen po rigs lnga'i de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:5557: de ltar phra rags dag pa'i ngang la dbang po
NK055(ri)001:5558: lnga dus bzhi la sogs pa'i rtogs pa rnams lhan
NK055(ri)001:5559: cig skyes pa bdo ba'i ye shes su gsal bas/
NK055(ri)001:5560: rtog pa smos pa'i grangs kyi lha rnams su gsal ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:5561: des na rten gyi byang chub kyi sems las rten
NK055(ri)001:5562: can byang chub sems rig ye shes su gsal ba
NK055(ri)001:5563: la dbyer mi phyed pas rdo rje/
NK055(ri)001:5564: rtog pa'i ngos nas rnam grangs mang po smos pas
NK055(ri)001:5565: tshogs ye shes kyi ngos nas dbye ba med kyang
NK055(ri)001:5566: / thams cad de nyid du gyur pas lhar gsal zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:5567: kun tu bzang po'i dkyil 'khor la //
NK055(ri)001:5569: snang grags thams cad rten dang brten can dbyer med
NK055(ri)001:5570: pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo rnam par dag pas
NK055(ri)001:5571: lhar gsal ba la ni mthar 'dzin pa mi mnga'
NK055(ri)001:5572: bas spyod yul yongs su dag pa la ni kun
NK055(ri)001:5573: tu bzang po zhes bya ste/
NK055(ri)001:5574: thams cad der gsal bas dkyil 'khor ro //
NK055(ri)001:5575: la zhes pa gzhi ste de nyid rang snang ba las/
NK055(ri)001:5576: bdag nyid chen po lhag pa yi //
NK055(ri)001:5577: zhes pa yum gyi thig le pad+ma'i ze'u 'brur thon tsam na/
NK055(ri)001:5578: rang bzhin lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes mngon du
NK055(ri)001:5579: gsal ba'i ngang la nga dang bdag med phyogs dang
NK055(ri)001:5580: ris med gnyis can thams cad de nyid du gsal
NK055(ri)001:5581: bas gnyis can ma grub pa la ni bdag nyid
NK055(ri)001:5582: ces bya ste/ don de tsam du yang 'dzin pa med pa ni chen po'o //
NK055(ri)001:5584: zhes pa lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes ye nas
NK055(ri)001:5585: gnas bya gnas byed med pa'i ngang las mi 'da'
NK055(ri)001:5587: de la ting nge 'dzin gyis bsgoms nas myong ba ni yin tshul las lhag pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:5589: zhes pa rten gyi bde ba nyid kyang thugs byang sems snang ba yin la/
NK055(ri)001:5590: de nyid brten can gyi rang byung ye shes mtha'
NK055(ri)001:5591: gang du yang mi rtogs pas thugs te de nyid
NK055(ri)001:5594: zhes pa thams cad snang la rang bzhin med par gsal zhing dngos grub 'byung ba'i zhing ngo //
NK055(ri)001:5595: thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med par sbyor ba'i man ngag ni/
NK055(ri)001:5597: zhes pa snying po ni yab/
NK055(ri)001:5599: yab yum gyi thig le 'khor 'das kyi bde ba thams cad kyi 'dus pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:5601: zhes pa yab yum gyi thig le dus mnyam du sbyor ba ni 'dres pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:5602: bde ba ni gnyis ngo bos mnyam par sbyor ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:5604: zhes pa dngos po'i chos thams cad lhan cig skyes
NK055(ri)001:5605: pa'i ye shes la ngo bo ngos gzung med pas
NK055(ri)001:5606: 'du shes kyis bzung ba'i gdung ba med pa ste
NK055(ri)001:5607: mnyam pa nyid du gsal ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:5609: rol mo gzhi ma nges pa las thabs tha dad
NK055(ri)001:5610: kyis drangs nas dngos po sna tshogs su 'gyur bas
NK055(ri)001:5611: ltad mo ba'i yid tshim pa bzhin/
NK055(ri)001:5612: rlung la goms pa'i thabs kyis drangs te bzlog nas
NK055(ri)001:5613: 'grems pa'i thabs kyis bkrams na rtog pa sku dang
NK055(ri)001:5614: ye shes su gsal bas rnal 'byor pa'i yid tshim
NK055(ri)001:5615: pas btang snyoms chen po'i ngo bor gnas pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:5616: ye shes dgyes la mchod par 'bul //
NK055(ri)001:5617: zhes pa rang bzhin lhan cig skyes pa ye shes
NK055(ri)001:5618: la 'du shes kyi rtog pa'i zug rngu med pas
NK055(ri)001:5621: zhes pa thig le yar bzlog nas thig le phyi
NK055(ri)001:5622: mo'i gnas gsos btab pa mngon du byas pa ni
NK055(ri)001:5623: dgyes shing tshim par mchod pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:5625: zhes pa chags pa thabs kyis zin pa ste zag pa med ces 'khor bar mi ldog pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:5627: zhes pa yang dag pa'i 'dod chags spyod la mi
NK055(ri)001:5628: 'dzin pa 'bras bu sangs rgyas kyi dngos rgyu yin
NK055(ri)001:5630: ye shes sgyu ma rang snang ba //
NK055(ri)001:5632: dngos po'i chos thams cad dang lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes dpe sgyu ma bzhin ma grub/
NK055(ri)001:5634: dmigs 'dzin thams cad dang bral bar rgyu rkyen dang bral ba'i sems nyid snang ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:5636: zhes pa lhan cig skyes pa'i bde ba de nyid kyis rnal 'byor pa'i yid tshim pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:5637: yon tan sna tshogs su 'char bas dkyil 'khor zhes so //
NK055(ri)001:5640: yon tan grangs las 'das pa brtsir mi btub pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:5641: mchog ni de tsam du yang bzung ba med pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:5642: sa bcu pas kyang mi dpogs pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:5643: gsang ba'i thig le nyid kyi dbyings //
NK055(ri)001:5644: zhes pa rtogs par dka' zhing ngos gzung dang bral
NK055(ri)001:5645: bas thig le de nyid sems mnyam pa nyid kyi
NK055(ri)001:5647: de ni sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos //
NK055(ri)001:5648: zhes pa de ni dngos po bzung ba ste gang zhe na/
NK055(ri)001:5649: bde la mnyam pa'i dbyings rgyal ba kun tu bzang po nyid yin pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:5650: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dngos gzhi yin zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:5651: der rgyal ba ma lus pa 'dus la/
NK055(ri)001:5652: de yang rang sems dang tha mi dad de rig pa rang la ngang gis dbang sgyur ba ni/
NK055(ri)001:5653: phyogs bcu na bzhugs shing dus bzhir gshegs pa'i sangs
NK055(ri)001:5654: rgyas khams gsum gyi chos ma lus pa rang rig
NK055(ri)001:5655: pa'i mngon sum du/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
NK055(ri)001:5656: rgyas su gsal te 'khor ba rdul tsam yang ma
NK055(ri)001:5657: grub pas sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i tha snyad kyang
NK055(ri)001:5659: sku lnga gsung lnga thugs lnga yon tan phrin las
NK055(ri)001:5660: lnga nyi shu rtsa lnga ma lus pa skad cig
NK055(ri)001:5661: ma dang po la yul dang yul can med par
NK055(ri)001:5662: zhal mthong / skad cig ma gnyis pa de nyid
NK055(ri)001:5663: du lhun gyis grub pas nyi shu rtsa lnga la
NK055(ri)001:5664: zhal mthong / dbang sgyur/ 'bras bu sku lnga lhun
NK055(ri)001:5665: gyis grub pa ni mchog nyid 'du shes thams cad
NK055(ri)001:5666: dang bral ba'i rig pa rang gsal bas ched byas
NK055(ri)001:5667: kyi chos phra ba'ang med kyang /
NK055(ri)001:5668: gdul bya'i mdzad pa mi 'gag par rang 'char ba ni dam pa yin zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:5669: lam gyi 'bras bu tshe dbang ni/
NK055(ri)001:5670: zag pa med pa'i bsod nams kyis //
NK055(ri)001:5671: zhes pa tshogs kyi sgrub pa mthar thon nas tshe
NK055(ri)001:5672: la dbang ba'i rig 'dzin gyi ngo bo bshad pa
NK055(ri)001:5673: ste/ zag pa ni gsum ste/
NK055(ri)001:5674: lus kyi zag pa skye shi can te/
NK055(ri)001:5675: 'dir zag pa med pa'i lam mngon du byas pas
NK055(ri)001:5676: las kyi bag chags dag /nyon mongs pa'i bag chags
NK055(ri)001:5677: dag pas bdag 'dzin mi mnga' ste/
NK055(ri)001:5678: nam mkha' la rdul mi chags pa dang 'dra bas las bsags pa'i gzhi med/
NK055(ri)001:5679: des las dbang dag ste rang dbang mngon du gyur pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:5681: khams kyi zas dang bral te lus la snyigs ma
NK055(ri)001:5682: mi gnas pa ni khams kyi zag pa zad pa'o
NK055(ri)001:5683: // skye gnas kyi zag pa zad pa ni las
NK055(ri)001:5684: kyis rang dbang med par mngal kha mi 'grim pa
NK055(ri)001:5685: // ste/ 'dir las dag pas gzhan dbang med de
NK055(ri)001:5686: las kyi mngal kha mi 'grim pa ni skye gnas
NK055(ri)001:5688: des na zag pa zad pa'i bsod nams ni ting
NK055(ri)001:5689: nge 'dzin mthar phyin nas tshogs bsgrubs te yo byad
NK055(ri)001:5690: lnga la rol/ lta spyod bsgom gsum mgo snyoms pa'i dgongs pa mchog tu gyur pas/
NK055(ri)001:5691: theg pa 'og ma'i spang bya 'dir thabs khyad par
NK055(ri)001:5692: can gyi mthus zag pa med pa'i lam grub pa'i
NK055(ri)001:5693: snang ba ste 'byung ba'i lus ting nge 'dzin gyi
NK055(ri)001:5694: lus su grol/ de nyid ye shes kyi lus su grol ba'i sku can no //
NK055(ri)001:5696: kyis/ zhes pa dgongs pa ston pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:5697: ye shes sgyu ma rang snang ba //
NK055(ri)001:5699: dper na sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i rgyal po
NK055(ri)001:5700: las can zhig dmyal ba'i gnas su phyin na sum
NK055(ri)001:5701: cu rtsa gsum snang bar 'gyur ba bzhin/
NK055(ri)001:5702: 'dir tshe dbang gi rig 'dzin gyi snang ba ye shes kyi snang ba yin pas/
NK055(ri)001:5703: spyod yul thams cad rang byung gi ye shes su
NK055(ri)001:5704: gsal te chos thams cad rig pa rang snang bas
NK055(ri)001:5705: bdag nyid las mi gzhan bzhin snang 'dzin stong 'dzin
NK055(ri)001:5706: gyi 'du shes thams cad dag nas snang la ma
NK055(ri)001:5707: dmigs pa'i ngang la/ dpe sgyu ma ltar chos thams cad rang snang la gang du'ang ngos gzung med la/
NK055(ri)001:5709: rang sems nyid yul med par rang snang ste/
NK055(ri)001:5710: snang bya snang byed ma dmigs kyang rang gsal 'dzin med kyi dgongs pa lhun gyis grub pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:5711: de nyid spyod lam bzhi dus gsum du de'i ngang las mi 'da' ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:5712: rol mo'i dkyil 'khor mtha' yas mchog /ces pa rol
NK055(ri)001:5713: mo ni gzhi ma nges pa las ji ltar yang
NK055(ri)001:5714: bsgyur du btub pas ltad mo ba'i yid 'dren pa
NK055(ri)001:5715: ste/ tshe dbang gi dgongs pa'i 'char lugs snang tshul lo //
NK055(ri)001:5716: dkyil 'khor ni tshe dbang gi dgongs pa sems mnyam pa nyid kyi dbyings kyi dkyil la/
NK055(ri)001:5717: rang snang mi 'gag pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:5718: mtha' yas ni tshe dbang gi dgongs pa rang byung gi ye shes cir yang 'char ba dang /
NK055(ri)001:5719: mthar phyin pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa'i cho 'phrul
NK055(ri)001:5720: gzigs pa ste de gnyis lta ba'i ngo bo la
NK055(ri)001:5722: gsang ba'i thig le nyid kyi dbyings //
NK055(ri)001:5723: zhes pa tshe dbang gi dgongs pa'i ngo bo ni/
NK055(ri)001:5725: gzhi gsum pa ni gsang sngags kyi ngo bo nyid la 'jug go //
NK055(ri)001:5726: zhes pa tshe dbang gi gsang sngags kyi ngo bo nyid mngon du 'gyur ba'i mgo zug pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:5727: gsang sngags kyi don de nyid zab cing rtogs dka' bas gsang ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:5729: zhes pa thig le ni zlum po ste tshe dbang
NK055(ri)001:5730: gi dgongs pa yod med la sogs pa mtha'i spros
NK055(ri)001:5731: pa thams cad rang zhi ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:5732: yang na thig le gcig pu ya med yin/
NK055(ri)001:5733: de bzhin du dgongs pa dmigs 'dzin gyi mtha' thams cad dang bral ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:5735: dbyings/ zhes pa dbyings gsum las 'dir mnyam pa nyid kyi dbyings so //
NK055(ri)001:5736: de ni sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos //
NK055(ri)001:5737: zhes pa gang du bshad pa'i don rnams kyi dgongs
NK055(ri)001:5738: pa chos nyid rang gi mtshan nyid mngon du gyur
NK055(ri)001:5739: pa ste/ rang gi mtshan nyid ni dus gsum gyi
NK055(ri)001:5740: bud+d+ha thams cad kyi dgongs pa ma nor ba'i ngo
NK055(ri)001:5741: pa ste/ bo nyid yin te/ dper na mtha'i rgya
NK055(ri)001:5742: mtsho chen po gsher ba las ma 'das pa dang
NK055(ri)001:5743: pa ste/ bo nyid yin te/ / lteng ka chung
NK055(ri)001:5744: ngu zhig gsher ba las ma 'das pa gnyis rgya
NK055(ri)001:5745: che chung yod kyang gsher bar mtshungs/
NK055(ri)001:5746: dpe de dang 'dra bar mthar phyin pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:5747: tshe dbang gi dgongs pa mthar phyin ma phyin gyi ngos nas khyad che yang /
NK055(ri)001:5748: chos nyid rang gi mtshan nyid du dbyer med pas sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos gzhi nyid ces bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:5749: de lta bu'i dgongs pa mnga' ba'i tshe dbang gi spyod yul du/
NK055(ri)001:5750: phyogs bcu dus bzhi mngon rdzogs pa'i //
NK055(ri)001:5752: phyogs bcu na bzhugs shing dus bzhir gshegs pa'i khams
NK055(ri)001:5753: gsum gyi chos rang rig pa'i mngon sum du sangs
NK055(ri)001:5754: rgyas kyi sar rdzogs pa ni 'bras bu mthar phyin
NK055(ri)001:5755: pa'i ngo bo ste/ de'i sku lnga gsung lnga thugs
NK055(ri)001:5756: lnga yon tan lnga phrin las lnga ma lus pa
NK055(ri)001:5757: pa'i ngo bo ste/ thams cad/ tshe dbang bdag nyid kyi zhal mthong /
NK055(ri)001:5758: 'on kyang tha mal pa'i mthong bya mthong byed lta bu ma yin te/
NK055(ri)001:5760: zhes pa tshe dbang bdag nyid kyi rang rig pa
NK055(ri)001:5761: nyid 'bras bu'i chos su snang ba rang zhal rang
NK055(ri)001:5762: gis mthong ba lta bu ste/
NK055(ri)001:5763: de yang lta ba shas che ba lta bu'i shas
NK055(ri)001:5764: yin pas de shes pa'am rtogs pa'i rig pa snyam
NK055(ri)001:5765: tsam phra'u gcig dang bcas pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:5766: dbang sgyur mchog nyid dam pa yin //
NK055(ri)001:5767: zhes pa yul yul can med par rang gsal ba la ji ltar yang 'char/
NK055(ri)001:5768: ji ltar yang longs spyod pa ni dbang bsgyur zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:5769: de la gnyis 'dzin phra ba'ang mi gnas pa ni
NK055(ri)001:5770: chos nyid rang gi mtshan nyid mthong ba brtan pa
NK055(ri)001:5771: zhes bya/ ji ltar na yang dgongs pa mnyam pa'i
NK055(ri)001:5772: ngang las mi g.yo ba dam pa yin zhes bya'o
NK055(ri)001:5773: zhes bya/ // de ni gsang sngags kyi mthong lam tshe la dbang ba'i rig 'dzin no //
NK055(ri)001:5774: phyag rgya chen po'i rig 'dzin ni/
NK055(ri)001:5776: ces pa la sogs pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:5777: gong du tshe dbang rig 'dzin mgo rting bshad pa de rnams ni/
NK055(ri)001:5778: bskyed pa'i rim pa mthar phyin nas tshogs sgrub/
NK055(ri)001:5779: de nas tshe dbang nas rim pa bzhin du 'jug pa'i las sgrigs yin la/
NK055(ri)001:5780: thabs lam gnyis po'i dbang du byas na tshogs sgrub
NK055(ri)001:5781: dang tshe dbang rig 'dzin rnams ting nge 'dzin gyi
NK055(ri)001:5782: phyi rting la rdzogs zin pas logs su brtsi mi
NK055(ri)001:5783: dgos/ phyag rgya chen po'i rig 'dzin man chad ni
NK055(ri)001:5784: lam gsum ka'i thun mong yin par shes par bya'o
NK055(ri)001:5785: dgos/ // de la tshe dbang rig 'dzin gyi dgongs
NK055(ri)001:5786: pa ni dkyil 'khor gyi dgongs par gnas la dkyil
NK055(ri)001:5787: 'khor gyi cha lugs ni lha mi'i cha lugs te
NK055(ri)001:5788: de la yang shas che bar sngar gyi sgrub pa
NK055(ri)001:5789: po'i cha lugs su bzhugs te/
NK055(ri)001:5790: des na rang snang gi lha'i dkyil 'khor gzhan snang lha mi'o //
NK055(ri)001:5791: phyag rgya chen po'i rig 'dzin ni 'byung ba'i lus
NK055(ri)001:5792: dag /ting nge 'dzin gyi lus kyang ye shes su
NK055(ri)001:5795: sngar bsgom pa'i ting nge 'dzin ye shes kyi lus
NK055(ri)001:5796: kyi mgo zug pa snang ba rnam par 'byed pa'i
NK055(ri)001:5797: ting nge 'dzin la rang gi ngo bo nyid du
NK055(ri)001:5798: gyur te/ spyod lam rnam bzhir nam mkha' nam mkha' las mi 'da' ba lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la/
NK055(ri)001:5799: cha lugs dang dgongs pa gnyis ka de nyid/
NK055(ri)001:5800: gzhan du yang mthong ba'i skal pa dang ldan pa'i
NK055(ri)001:5801: lam pa la dgongs pa de nyid min pa gzhan
NK055(ri)001:5802: mi mnga' ste/ de la ni dkyil 'khor la gnas zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:5803: dkyil 'khor nyid ces pa de lta bu dang ldan pa'i phyag rgya chen po'i rig 'dzin zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:5804: 'dir lam rim sa 'dzin tsam du bstan pa yin gyi/
NK055(ri)001:5805: gzhan phyag rgya chen po rig 'dzin gyi dgongs pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:5808: sgrib pa gang dag pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:5809: ston pa gang yin pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:5810: gdul bya 'dul ba'i thabs rnams sgyu 'phrul lam rim na zhib pas der shes par bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:5811: lhun grub rang gi ngo bo ni/
NK055(ri)001:5812: rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor lhun gyis grub //
NK055(ri)001:5813: ces pa lhun gyis grub pa'i rig 'dzin la 'bras
NK055(ri)001:5814: bu mthar phyin pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
NK055(ri)001:5815: rgyas kyi yon tan thams cad lhun gyis grub ces
NK055(ri)001:5816: bya ste/ de la spyir na gsang sngags kyi lugs kyis sangs rgyas dang /
NK055(ri)001:5817: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gnyis las lhun grub rig 'dzin ni sangs rgyas zhes bya ste/
NK055(ri)001:5818: mnyam rjes rnam pa gnyis dang ldan/
NK055(ri)001:5819: mnyam bzhag gi dus su mthar phyin pa'i chos kyi sku dang dbyer med kyang /
NK055(ri)001:5820: rjes la dag pa 'jig rten pa'i ye shes sgyu ma'am rmi lam lta bur gzigs/
NK055(ri)001:5821: mnyam rjes phra ba dang bcas pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:5822: mnyam bzhag las ldang dka' ba lta bu yod pa
NK055(ri)001:5823: ni shes bya'i sgrib pa phra ba dang bcas pa
NK055(ri)001:5824: ste da lta'i rnal 'byor pa'i blos mi reg pa'o
NK055(ri)001:5825: // des na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
NK055(ri)001:5826: rten gyi khams 'dul bas gdul bya 'dul ba la
NK055(ri)001:5827: sprul pa'i sku dang mnyam pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:5829: rgyu'i theg pa'i sde snod gsum gsung nus/
NK055(ri)001:5830: gdul bya'ang de tsam zhig sgrol ba ste/
NK055(ri)001:5831: de bas na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
NK055(ri)001:5832: kyi dkyil 'khor dgongs pa ma 'dres la yongs su
NK055(ri)001:5833: rdzogs par lhun gyis grub ste/
NK055(ri)001:5834: mnyam rjes gnyis kyi dbang gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mthar phyin pa ni ma yin te/
NK055(ri)001:5835: lta ba blo dngos 'phrod pa'i dgongs pa mthar phyin pa mngon du gyur pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:5836: rgyan du dkyil 'khor ma lus thogs //
NK055(ri)001:5837: zhes pa thun mong dang thun mong ma yin pa'i mtshan dpe rnams lhun gyis grub pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:5838: thun mong ni phyag zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan sogs so gnyis dang brgyad cu'o //
NK055(ri)001:5839: thun mong ma yin pa ni sems dpa' bcu drug dang /
NK055(ri)001:5840: sems ma bcu drug rnams te gong du bshad pa rnams rdzogs par shes par bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:5841: de'ang lhun grub rig 'dzin gyi gnas skabs su/
NK055(ri)001:5842: lhun grub mthar phyin pa la g.yo ba ste/
NK055(ri)001:5843: sems kyis khyab tshad dkyil 'khor du gsal/
NK055(ri)001:5844: skad cig ma gnyis pa la thob pa ste nam mkhas khyab tshad gsal/
NK055(ri)001:5845: skad cig ma gsum pa la mthar phyin pa chos
NK055(ri)001:5846: kyi dbyings kyis khyab tshad sku dang ye shes su
NK055(ri)001:5847: gsal ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so
NK055(ri)001:5848: // de la 'dir lhun grub rig 'dzin gyi skabs yin pas sems kyis khyab tshad rdzogs la/
NK055(ri)001:5849: gzhan yang rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor la sogs pa
NK055(ri)001:5850: dkyil 'khor bcu gnyis kyang dgongs pa ma 'dres la
NK055(ri)001:5852: 'bras bu la sbyor tshul dngos ni/
NK055(ri)001:5853: ye shes rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor la //
NK055(ri)001:5855: lhun grub rig 'dzin gyis 'bras bu la sbyor ba'i tshul te/
NK055(ri)001:5856: 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad rang byung gi ye
NK055(ri)001:5857: shes su yang dag par rdzogs pa mngon du byed
NK055(ri)001:5858: pa'i kun tu bzang po'i ngo bo nyid la mthar
NK055(ri)001:5859: lam pa yi/ thos bsam sgom pa'i rnal 'byor gyis //
NK055(ri)001:5863: bsam pa'i shes rab gsum gyis 'bras bu mthar phyin pa la sbyor ba ste/
NK055(ri)001:5864: mthar lam pa'i skyes bus 'khor 'das dbyer med ngo bo nyid kyi sku/
NK055(ri)001:5865: drug pa kun tu bzang po ston pa phun sum tshogs pa la/
NK055(ri)001:5866: bstan pa rang bzhin gsang ba'i snying po 'khor 'das
NK055(ri)001:5867: thams cad kyi de kho na nyid brjod pa'i tshul
NK055(ri)001:5868: ni/ gsung lnga lhun grub kyi don ston pa zhal
NK055(ri)001:5869: zum pa'ang ma bgyis par chu dwangs pa la nyi
NK055(ri)001:5870: zla'i gzugs brnyan 'char ba la 'gro 'ong med par
NK055(ri)001:5871: nam mkha'i zla ba dang chu nang gi zla ba
NK055(ri)001:5872: dus gcig snang ba bzhin du/
NK055(ri)001:5873: 'khor gyi rig pa la rang gsal du shar ba ni mthar lam pa'i bsgom gsum gyi ngo bo ste/
NK055(ri)001:5874: mnyam pa nyid kyi ngang la rim par brtsir med kyang /
NK055(ri)001:5875: skad cig ma dang po thos pa/
NK055(ri)001:5877: gsum pa bsgom pa'i ngo bo'i 'bras bu la sbyor ba dngos te/
NK055(ri)001:5879: ston pa'i thugs manya ma pa nyid dang /
NK055(ri)001:5880: mthar lam pa'i thugs ma nyam pa nyid ngo bo nyid kyi sku la ye nas dbyer med pa yin/
NK055(ri)001:5881: lam mthar phyin pas sems phyi mo'i gnas slebs/
NK055(ri)001:5882: sems rang sa zin zhes bya ste/
NK055(ri)001:5883: dgongs pa dbyer med pa'i don la ye nas yin
NK055(ri)001:5884: pa'i don mthong ba'i dbang gis 'bras bu thob pa'i
NK055(ri)001:5885: mthar phyin pa zhes bya ba'i tha snyad phra ba'ang
NK055(ri)001:5886: mi gnas te/ rang gsal gyi ye shes nyid chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:5888: rang byung kun ngam lhun gyis grub //
NK055(ri)001:5890: chos sku rang byung gi ye shes chos sku'i ngo bo nyid yon tan lhun grub tu bzhugs pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:5892: sems kyis bsam du med pas/
NK055(ri)001:5894: de lta bu'i don rang bzhin gsang ba'i snying po la snang ba'i phyir lhun grub ces bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:5896: zhes pa de lta bu'i yon tan thams cad kyi bdag nyid rang bzhin bsang ba'i snying po 'di ni/
NK055(ri)001:5897: 'bras bu mngon du byas pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad
NK055(ri)001:5898: kyi rang bzhin gyi dam tshig yin pas 'da' bar
NK055(ri)001:5899: mi mdzad/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid yin pas dam tshig mchog ces bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:5901: rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor mnyam sbyor las //
NK055(ri)001:5903: rdzogs pa ni 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das
NK055(ri)001:5904: pa'i chos thams cad rang snang kun tu bzang po'i
NK055(ri)001:5906: 'khor ba'i chos rdul phra rab tsam yang ma dmigs
NK055(ri)001:5907: par snod bcud kyi chos thams cad spangs pa med
NK055(ri)001:5908: par sku dang ye shes su rdzogs pa la/
NK055(ri)001:5909: yang dag par rdzogs zhes tha snyad gdags te/
NK055(ri)001:5911: ma dmigs pa ni ye shes su rdzogs pas/
NK055(ri)001:5912: thams cad dkyil 'khor du gsal ba ni yi ge 'khor lo tshogs chen gyi sa'o //
NK055(ri)001:5913: de'i dus su rang byung gi ye shes la g.yos
NK055(ri)001:5914: pa phra ba'i phra ba yang med pa nyid chos
NK055(ri)001:5915: kyi dbyings su khyab bdal ba ni kun tu 'od
NK055(ri)001:5916: kyi sa'o // skur ma 'gag pa mtshan ma med
NK055(ri)001:5917: pa'i mtha' las 'das pa ni mtha' gnyis las ma
NK055(ri)001:5918: chags pas pad+ma spyan gyi sa'o //
NK055(ri)001:5919: der sku gsum ma 'dres la yongs su rdzogs par lhun gyis grub bo //
NK055(ri)001:5920: 'o na 'khor ba ma dmigs pas rnam dag 'ba' zhig gi mthar gyur te/
NK055(ri)001:5921: gzhan don med do snyam na lhun grub kyi ye
NK055(ri)001:5922: shes nyid mdzad pa mi 'gag par snang bas gzhir
NK055(ri)001:5923: bzhag pas las zhes smos so //
NK055(ri)001:5924: gzhan don ji ltar snang na/
NK055(ri)001:5927: 'dir thugs rje chen po ste 'khor 'das kyi chos
NK055(ri)001:5928: thams cad la rang rig pas bdag nyid ni khyab
NK055(ri)001:5929: pa dang zin pa mi gtong ba dang /
NK055(ri)001:5930: yul dang 'phrad na mdzad pa mi 'gags par 'byung ba'i phyir dang /
NK055(ri)001:5932: don de la sngon gyi smon lam gyis bstangs nas
NK055(ri)001:5933: nye bar bzung ba'i thugs rje gsum snang ba ni
NK055(ri)001:5934: chen po'i ba sbu'i cha tsam du rdzogs so //
NK055(ri)001:5935: ched du dgag sgrub gang yang mi dgos so //
NK055(ri)001:5937: gnyis su med pa'i thugs rje chen po'i rtsal las
NK055(ri)001:5938: gdul bya blo rab 'bring gi cha yis thugs rje
NK055(ri)001:5939: de ltar snang sde thugs rje chen po la 'di
NK055(ri)001:5940: bstan 'di mi bstan gyi dbri bkol med kyang /
NK055(ri)001:5941: gdul bya'i blo dang mthun par snang ba me long lta bu'o //
NK055(ri)001:5942: sprul pa 'byung 'jug bral ba chu zla lta bu'o //
NK055(ri)001:5943: ma rtogs kyang sems can thams cad kyi sems chos
NK055(ri)001:5944: sku yin pas de las snang zhes kyang bya ste
NK055(ri)001:5945: la bzla ba'o // chos thams cad sems yin par thag bcad pa dang yang mthun no //
NK055(ri)001:5947: zhes pa chu rnyog ma dwangs nas rkyen nam mkha' dwangs pa'i zla ba dang 'dzom na/
NK055(ri)001:5948: bsam pa sngon du btang mi dgos par chu zla rang shugs kyis 'char/
NK055(ri)001:5949: de bzhin du sems kyi sgrib byed gsum dag pa
NK055(ri)001:5950: mthar phyin na mdzad pa mi 'gags par 'char ba'i
NK055(ri)001:5952: yong ngam ngang gis 'byung zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:5953: de bas na mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang /
NK055(ri)001:5955: mdzad pa'i phrin las rnams skad cig dus gcig la lhun grub tu 'char te/
NK055(ri)001:5956: res mos bral bas ma dmigs so //
NK055(ri)001:5957: 'du shes kyi rgyun las grol nas bsam gyis mi
NK055(ri)001:5958: khyab pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid rang gsal
NK055(ri)001:5959: ba'o // de ltar thugs rje shar nas ci mdzad ce na/
NK055(ri)001:5960: ma rtogs pa'i phyogs bcu dus bzhis bsdus pa'i log
NK055(ri)001:5961: rtog 'khrul pa'i phung po khams skye mched rnams ni
NK055(ri)001:5962: gdul bya'o // de dag 'dul byed ni de rnams
NK055(ri)001:5963: 'bras bur rdzogs po'i phyogs bcu na bzhugs shing dus
NK055(ri)001:5964: bzhir gshegs pa'i bud+d+ha'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi gdul
NK055(ri)001:5965: gdul bya'o // bya rnams/ 'dul ba'i mgon/
NK055(ri)001:5967: 'khor ba dag nas ma grub par mdzad pa'i phyir ro //
NK055(ri)001:5968: sgyu ma'i dkyil 'khor sgrol ba yis //
NK055(ri)001:5969: zhes pa rtogs pa sangs rgyas kyi sgyu ma ni/
NK055(ri)001:5970: sku gnyis kyi bya ba thams cad de rgyu rkyen
NK055(ri)001:5971: gyis bskyed rgyu bud+d+ha'i ye shes gang du yang ma
NK055(ri)001:5972: grub cir yang mi 'gag pa las rkyen gdul bya'i
NK055(ri)001:5973: dbang po dang 'dzom nas snang ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:5974: mthun par snang ste zag med pa rnams la longs skur snang /
NK055(ri)001:5975: zag bcas pa rnams la sprul skur snang la/
NK055(ri)001:5976: ru dra dang gshin rje rnams la khro bor snang /
NK055(ri)001:5977: don byed nus te zag med kyi lam pa rnams la de'i don byed/
NK055(ri)001:5978: zag bcas rnams la de'i don byed/
NK055(ri)001:5980: chos kyi sku las de dag gang du yang grub pa med/
NK055(ri)001:5981: de lta bu'i don gyis rtogs pa sgyu ma lta bu'i ston pas/
NK055(ri)001:5982: ma rtogs pa sgyu ma lta bu'i 'khor ba'i dkyil
NK055(ri)001:5983: 'khor thams cad 'khor ba ma grub kyang gzung 'dzin
NK055(ri)001:5984: gyis brtags pa'i smig rgyu'i rgya mtsho lta bu las
NK055(ri)001:5985: sgrol ba yis de ltar mdzad kyang /
NK055(ri)001:5986: mdzad bya mdzad byed kyi rtsol ba dang /
NK055(ri)001:5987: don dang byed pa'i 'dzin pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:5988: ched byas kyi chos thams cad dang bral bas bya byed med par zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:5989: de lta bu'i rtsol bral gyi sgo nas rtogs pa'i
NK055(ri)001:5990: dkyil 'khor gyis ma rtogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi don
NK055(ri)001:5991: spyod kyang / spyod bya spyod byed ma dmigs pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:5992: rgyud 'di'i don la mos pa'i yon tan ni/
NK055(ri)001:5995: gang zhig ni tshol ba'i tshig ste 'og nas smos
NK055(ri)001:5996: pa'i thos bsam bsgom gsum la sbyangs pa rnams bsod
NK055(ri)001:5997: nams kyi tshogs rlabs po che bsags pas/
NK055(ri)001:5998: gsang ba'i snying po'i rgyud 'di nyid brjod bya rjod
NK055(ri)001:5999: byed bshad pa'i gdams ngag gsum po'i don 'di la
NK055(ri)001:6000: mos pa skye bar 'gyur pa'i gang zag de yang
NK055(ri)001:6001: / sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor ma lus pa thams
NK055(ri)001:6002: cad kyi phyogs bcu dus bzhi kun nas kun tu
NK055(ri)001:6004: dkyil 'khor ma lus bsnyen pa yin //
NK055(ri)001:6005: zhes pa dkyil 'khor ma lus pa kun la mos pa byas pas bsnyen pa'i ngo bo byas pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:6006: des na sangs rgyas thams cad kyi nye ba'i sras ni byang chub sems dpa' de las dgar ba ste/
NK055(ri)001:6007: yo ga phyi pa man chad la nye bas tshe gcig gis sangs rgyas te/
NK055(ri)001:6008: de bzhin du thugs kyi dgongs par 'gyur te mos pa'i yon tan no //
NK055(ri)001:6009: snod ldan gyi spyod yul du bstan pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:6010: bskal pa zhing gi rdul snyed du //
NK055(ri)001:6012: bskal pa chen po 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad
NK055(ri)001:6013: rdul phra rab tu bsil ba de'i grangs kyi rdul
NK055(ri)001:6014: snyed kyi bskal pa/ shin tu sbyangs la/
NK055(ri)001:6015: zhes pa yul ni nyan thos dang a nu'i bar
NK055(ri)001:6016: theg pa brgyad la shin tu sbyangs pa ni ma
NK055(ri)001:6017: yengs pa dang / theg pa kun gyi don mthar phyin par byas pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:6019: zhes pa lta ba dang ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:6021: phyogs dus kyi sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bsam gyis mi khyab pa bsnyen bsnyen pa'i 'bras bu ni/
NK055(ri)001:6023: zhes pa rang bzhin gsang ba'i snying po dang /
NK055(ri)001:6024: mthong ba'i thabs gdams pa'i gsum po 'di yin zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:6025: rgyal ba'i gshegs shul yin pa'i che ba ni/
NK055(ri)001:6026: 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu na //
NK055(ri)001:6027: zhes pa 'jig rten dag ni ljid 'bebs pa drug go //
NK055(ri)001:6028: phyogs bcu ni mtha' yas pa ste chos kyi dbyings kyis khyab tshad do //
NK055(ri)001:6029: zhing khams de na 'das pa'i bud+d+ha/
NK055(ri)001:6032: ma byon pa'i bud+d+ha dang rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma
NK055(ri)001:6033: lus pa thams cad kyis gsang ba'i snying po'i don
NK055(ri)001:6034: brnyes nas 'bras bu mthar phyin te sku lnga lhun
NK055(ri)001:6035: gyis rdzogs so // rnal 'byor pa'i lam yin pa'i che ba ni/
NK055(ri)001:6038: 'byung ni rnal 'byor pa skye ba gcig gis bud+d+ha ba lta bu'o //
NK055(ri)001:6039: ma 'ongs pa ni de phyin chod kyi rnal 'byor
NK055(ri)001:6040: pa thams cad kun rang bzhin gsang ba'i snying po
NK055(ri)001:6041: 'di'i 'bras bu lhun gyis grub par 'gyur zhes bya'o
NK055(ri)001:6043: 'di ni gsang chen nges pa yi //
NK055(ri)001:6044: zhes pa la sogs pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:6045: gsang ba'i snying po mtshon bya mtshon byed ni gsang
NK055(ri)001:6046: ba'i nang na gsang chen te rang bzhin rtogs dka'
NK055(ri)001:6047: ba'o // dkri ba ma yin pas nges pa'i don
NK055(ri)001:6048: cig car gtan la phab pa'i 'bras bu chos sku
NK055(ri)001:6049: lam du sbyangs pa'i thabs lam gnyis pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:6050: chos sku lam du sbyang ba ni bskyed rim bsgom pa tshogs bsgrub dang bcas pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:6051: des na 'bras bu lam du byed pa zhes bya ba'i rgyu mtshan no //
NK055(ri)001:6052: phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus pa thams
NK055(ri)001:6053: cad la gsang ba'i snying po 'di las ma gtogs
NK055(ri)001:6054: pa'i thugs la brnag pa'i gsang ba'i nges don med/
NK055(ri)001:6055: gal te logs su btsal na rgyal bas kyang logs su mi rnyed de/
NK055(ri)001:6057: kun gyi phyag rgya chen po'i mchog /ces pa phyogs dus kyi bud+d+ha kun gyi sku phyag rgya chen po/
NK055(ri)001:6059: thugs phyag rgya chen po rnams 'di nyid du dbyer med pas mchog ces bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:6060: snod bzang ngan gyi mtshan nyid ni/
NK055(ri)001:6061: de yang dang po bzang po ste/
NK055(ri)001:6062: thos bsam bsgom la rab sbyangs pa'i //
NK055(ri)001:6064: thos pa'i shes rab kyis gsang sngags 'di nyid mthong bar nus pa/
NK055(ri)001:6065: bsam pa'i shes rab kyis yang dang yang du sbyangs
NK055(ri)001:6066: pa 'di nyid kyi don sems thog tu phebs te
NK055(ri)001:6067: lta ba mngon du gyur pa/
NK055(ri)001:6068: bsgom pa'i shes rab kyis sbyangs pa 'bras bu la sbyor nus pa/
NK055(ri)001:6069: de lta bu de ni gong du bstan pa bzhin
NK055(ri)001:6070: grangs med pa nas sbyangs pa'i 'phro can yin pas
NK055(ri)001:6072: 'di nyid la yang sbyangs pa stobs su gyur pa ste shes rab gsum mo //
NK055(ri)001:6073: de lta bu de ni sbyangs pa'i shes rab dang
NK055(ri)001:6074: ldan zhing 'di nyid kyi don mthong bar nus pa'i
NK055(ri)001:6076: dbang po yang rab kyi blo can rnams kyis gzung bar bya'o zhes so //
NK055(ri)001:6079: sngon du sbyangs pa'i stobs 'di nyid kyi snod du rung ste/
NK055(ri)001:6081: zhes pas ngang ring ba chu bo lta bu ste/
NK055(ri)001:6082: shes rab gsum so so'i don ma grub kyi bar du mi 'dor ba/
NK055(ri)001:6083: tshul shes pa dge slong gsar pa lta bu ste
NK055(ri)001:6084: bag dang ldan pas nyes pa phra bas kyang mi
NK055(ri)001:6085: gos pa/ rang bzhin bzang ba nyi ma lta bu ste/
NK055(ri)001:6086: thams cad la snyoms shing bde ba khod snyoms pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:6087: brtan pa ri rab lta bu ste don ma grub
NK055(ri)001:6088: kyi bar du rkyen dbang du mi 'gro zhing the
NK055(ri)001:6089: tshom som nyi yid gnyis med pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:6090: rno ba ral gri gna' ma lta bu ste shes rab kyi chos thams cad kyi gting phol ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:6091: gzhan yang rdo rje slob dpon gyi bka' zur tsam
NK055(ri)001:6092: yang mi 'da' ba sems can gyi don lhur len
NK055(ri)001:6093: pa/ 'jig rten gyi khe grags ched du mi gnyer ba/
NK055(ri)001:6094: 'phyar g.yengs can ma yin pa bsgrub pa la gzhol ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:6095: chos dang bla ma'i phyogs su lus dang longs spyod
NK055(ri)001:6096: pa ser sna med par gtong phod pa la rgyud
NK055(ri)001:6098: snod ngan pa'i mtshan nyid ni/
NK055(ri)001:6099: gzhan du nam yang sbyin mi bya //
NK055(ri)001:6101: gong ma'i yon tan rnams med na yon tan las gzhan du gyur pa ni gzhan no //
NK055(ri)001:6103: snying sgor phyung ba'i nyen dang bsdos kyang sbyin par mi bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:6104: rmongs la 'phyar bas gal te sbyin //
NK055(ri)001:6105: zhes pa slob dpon slob ma'i snod brtag mi shes pas rmongs pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:6106: snod ngan la bshad pa ni 'phyar ba ste/
NK055(ri)001:6107: brgya la gal te bshad na rdo rje slob dpon
NK055(ri)001:6108: dam tshig dang 'gal bas tshe'i dus min par dam
NK055(ri)001:6109: tshig nyams pa'i chad pas srog zad nas gshis ngan
NK055(ri)001:6110: 'chi ste/ bsreg pa tsha ba'i dmyal ba sbrebs pa
NK055(ri)001:6111: grang ba'i dmyal bar rdo rje dmyal ba'i tshe tshad
NK055(ri)001:6112: kyis yun ring bar gnas na/
NK055(ri)001:6113: yun ring mo lon nas de las thar las kyang /
NK055(ri)001:6114: yang sbrebs pa ni yi dwags te ngan song gsum kha brgyud nas/
NK055(ri)001:6115: mir skyes kyang mtha' 'khob kla klor skyes na bde ba mi myong zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:6116: de ltar gong yan chod du bskyed rim gyi lam rim ting nge 'dzin lnga'i sgo nas tshogs bsgrub ste/
NK055(ri)001:6117: rig 'dzin gsum gyis rim par bud+d+ha la sbyor ba song nas/
NK055(ri)001:6118: le'u 'di nyid rdzogs pa chen po ltar bshad pa ni rdzogs pa chen po'i ngo bo yin kyang /
NK055(ri)001:6119: 'dir ma h+aa yo ga'i sgo nas rim gyis 'jug pas rdzogs rim zhes bya ste/
NK055(ri)001:6120: de yang theg pa 'di nyid kyi gzhung gis chos
NK055(ri)001:6121: thams cad dag pa gsum dang mnyam pa bzhi dang
NK055(ri)001:6122: lnga'i ngang du ye nas bud+d+ha ba ngo bo nyid
NK055(ri)001:6123: yin pa ni chu gsher ba las ma 'das pa
NK055(ri)001:6124: lta bu ste yin tshul bzhi'i don no //
NK055(ri)001:6125: 'jug pa lam gyi dang po ni/
NK055(ri)001:6126: rtogs pa rnam pa bzhi'i tshogs kyis skabs su bshad
NK055(ri)001:6127: pa'i gtan tshigs kyis rang rig pa'i mngon sum du
NK055(ri)001:6128: gtan la phebs te/ yid ches pa ni lta ba ste rgyu shes pa'i mtshan nyid do //
NK055(ri)001:6129: der rkyen 'jug pa ni mtshan nyid gsum dang dgos
NK055(ri)001:6130: 'brel gyis lam mtshon nas bsnyen bsgrub rnam pa bzhis
NK055(ri)001:6131: lam gyi don mthar phyung ste/
NK055(ri)001:6132: bdud btul bas 'bras bu lhun gyis grub par ston pa ste bsdus pa'i don no //
NK055(ri)001:6133: yan lag rgyas par bshad pa ni le'u 'di'i lo
NK055(ri)001:6134: rgyus kyi don la gnyis kyi zab mo'i don snang
NK055(ri)001:6135: ba'i sbyor ba ni/ 'dir rdzogs pa chen po'i don gdul bya dbang po rab la snang ba'i phyir/
NK055(ri)001:6136: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa/
NK055(ri)001:6138: de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs bcu na bzhugs shing dus
NK055(ri)001:6139: bzhir gshegs pa'i sku gsung thugs mi phyed pa rdo
NK055(ri)001:6141: dkyil 'khor thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas/
NK055(ri)001:6142: zhes pa 'khor 'das dbyer med pa'i ma 'dres la yongs su rdzogs pa/
NK055(ri)001:6143: rdzogs pa chen po'i don byang chub kyi sems ni
NK055(ri)001:6144: rtogs ma rtogs kyi 'khor 'das gnyis su yang snang
NK055(ri)001:6145: la/ 'dir bstan pa snang ba'i don gyis bud+d+ha thams cad de/
NK055(ri)001:6146: de dag thams cad rig pa rang snang bas rig
NK055(ri)001:6147: pa'i ngang las so sor dbyer med pa la yang
NK055(ri)001:6148: gcig ces bya ste ngo bo kun tu bzang po
NK055(ri)001:6149: nyid do // des na ched du bsdus pa med
NK055(ri)001:6150: par ngo bo nyid du 'dus pa'i bdag nyid do
NK055(ri)001:6151: nyid do // // 'on kyang 'dir bstan pa zab ste/
NK055(ri)001:6152: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la //
NK055(ri)001:6153: gsang ba 'di las gzhan mi mnga' //
NK055(ri)001:6154: zhes 'di nyid du gsungs pa'i dgongs pa mngon du
NK055(ri)001:6155: snang ba'i phyir gcig tu tshogs pa lta bu yang
NK055(ri)001:6156: bkag pa med de gdul bya'i snang ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:6157: snang ba dngos kyi ting nge 'dzin la don brjod pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:6159: zhes pa 'khor 'das dbyer med pa'i longs spyod la
NK055(ri)001:6160: yul yul can med par longs spyod rang snang du
NK055(ri)001:6161: spyod kyang / dmigs pa phra ba yang mi mnga'
NK055(ri)001:6162: ba ni chen po ste drug pa kun tu bzang
NK055(ri)001:6163: spyod kyang / po'o // des gzhal bya'i chos thams
NK055(ri)001:6164: cad la byas pa med par ye nas byang chub
NK055(ri)001:6165: kyi sems rdzogs pa chen po mnyam pa nyid kyi
NK055(ri)001:6166: ngang las lhun gyis grub par bya ba'i dam tshig
NK055(ri)001:6167: de las mi 'da' de'i rgyas thebs pas dam tshig
NK055(ri)001:6168: ste rdzogs pa chen po'i don rtogs dka' bas shin
NK055(ri)001:6169: spyod kyang / po'o // tu gsang ba/ rang snang
NK055(ri)001:6170: mi 'gag pa'i ngo bo nyid du bzhugs pas snying
NK055(ri)001:6171: po'i sprin bkod pa ni chos thams cad snang la/
NK055(ri)001:6172: sgos su man ngag gis gzhung 'di nyid tha gru
NK055(ri)001:6173: rgyas par snang ba 'bras bu'i yon tan thams cad
NK055(ri)001:6174: kyi chos lhun gyis grub pas kyang sprin bkod pa
NK055(ri)001:6175: ste/ ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/
NK055(ri)001:6176: zhes pa de'i ngo bo nyid las mi 'da' ba
NK055(ri)001:6177: dang gdul bya'i ngo bo la zhugs pa ltar snang
NK055(ri)001:6178: ba dang / 'dul byed bstan pa thams cad rdzogs
NK055(ri)001:6179: pa chen po'i don las ma 'das pa dang gsum
NK055(ri)001:6180: ba dang / mo/ ched du brjod pa ni ma 'gag pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:6181: rim 'jug gi rten log pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:6184: ma rtogs pa ni phyal ba dang rgyang 'phen no //
NK055(ri)001:6185: log par rtog pa ni mur rtugs pa dang mu stegs pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:6186: mu stegs pa ni rgyu yod la/
NK055(ri)001:6187: 'bras bu med par lta ba dang /
NK055(ri)001:6188: rgyu 'bras log par lta ba dang gsum ste/
NK055(ri)001:6191: phyogs rtogs yang dag nyid ma rtogs //
NK055(ri)001:6193: phyogs rtogs pa ni nyan rang gnyis so //
NK055(ri)001:6194: yang dag nyid ma rtogs pa ni dbu ma'o //
NK055(ri)001:6196: dgongs pa yo ga /gsang ba ma h+aa yo ga la sogs te rgyas par gong du song ngo //
NK055(ri)001:6197: mtshon par byed pa rjod byed rtogs pa bzhi bstan pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:6198: spyir rang bzhin rdzogs pa chen po dang /
NK055(ri)001:6199: gyur pa rdzogs pa chen po gnyis las/
NK055(ri)001:6200: dang po rang bzhin yin tshul bstan pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:6201: rgyud 'di nyid kyi gzhung gis dag pa gsum mnyam
NK055(ri)001:6202: pa bzhi'am lnga'i ngang du chos thams cad byas la
NK055(ri)001:6203: med par rang gzhin gyi gnas zhes gsungs te/
NK055(ri)001:6204: de yang le'u gsum pa lta ba'i skabs su/
NK055(ri)001:6205: bdag dang gzhan dang rtogs pa'i rgyun //
NK055(ri)001:6206: rnam dag bla med theg pa'i mchog /ces pas dag pa gsum bstan/
NK055(ri)001:6208: snod bcud rgyud rnam dag rtogs shing //
NK055(ri)001:6209: mnyam gnyis lhag pa'i mnyam gnyis kyis //
NK055(ri)001:6210: zhes pas dag mnyam gnyis ka bstan/
NK055(ri)001:6211: le'u gnyis par kun tu bzang pos rig pa'i ngos nas gleng bslang ba'i skabs su/
NK055(ri)001:6212: rdo rje phung po'i yan lag ni //
NK055(ri)001:6213: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lnga ru grags //
NK055(ri)001:6214: zhes pa la sogs par gsungs pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:6215: rgyud 'di'i rang bzhin rdzogs pa chen po ste/
NK055(ri)001:6216: slob dpon pad+mas kyang rdzogs pa chen po'i tshul ni/
NK055(ri)001:6217: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos thams
NK055(ri)001:6218: cad dbyer med pa sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor
NK055(ri)001:6219: gyi rang bzhin ye nas yin par zhes pa gnas
NK055(ri)001:6221: zhes pa rgyu shes pa'i mtshan nyid do //
NK055(ri)001:6223: zhes pa rkyen 'jug pa lam gyi ngo bo ston te/
NK055(ri)001:6225: 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad ye nas sems nyid kyi ngang du skye 'gag dang bral ba ni/
NK055(ri)001:6226: nyid las rtog tshogs kyi chos thams cad bya ba
NK055(ri)001:6227: byed pa'i nus pa sgyu ma tsam snang ba nyid
NK055(ri)001:6228: bde bar gshegs pa'i ngo bor bsal te/
NK055(ri)001:6229: phung po lnga ni yab lnga/
NK055(ri)001:6231: rnam shes bzhi sems dpa' bzhi/
NK055(ri)001:6232: dbang po bzhi sems dpa' bzhi/
NK055(ri)001:6233: yul bzhi dang dus bzhi sems ma brgyad/
NK055(ri)001:6234: lus kyi chos bzhi khro bo bzhi/
NK055(ri)001:6235: rtag chad mtha' bzhi khro mo bzhi/
NK055(ri)001:6236: yid kyi rnam shes kun tu bzang po/
NK055(ri)001:6237: yul chos dbyings kun tu bzang mo'i rang bzhin te/
NK055(ri)001:6239: zhes pas 'dir 'khrul pa gzung 'dzin gyi ngo gzhal
NK055(ri)001:6240: bya ma yin chu gsher ba las ma 'das pa
NK055(ri)001:6241: dang 'dra bar/ rang bzhin gyis yin tshul lam gnas tshul gzhal bya ste/
NK055(ri)001:6242: rtog pa bzhi bcur snang tsam nyid na sems nyid
NK055(ri)001:6243: du gsal zhing ma g.yos pas snang stong gi mtha'
NK055(ri)001:6244: las grol te/ gzung 'dzin dag pas rtog pa'i tha snyad ka nas dag ste/
NK055(ri)001:6245: de dag gi rang bzhin nam don gyi ngo bo tha snyad dang bral yang /
NK055(ri)001:6246: mthar thug gi don la dag 'dzin dang bcas pa
NK055(ri)001:6247: ni ma h+aa yo ga 'di nyid kyi gzhung ngo
NK055(ri)001:6248: // rtogs pa dag nas 'bras bu lhar dag 'dzin
NK055(ri)001:6249: dang bcas pa ni ma h+aa yo ga thabs phyogs
NK055(ri)001:6250: gcig pa dang shes rab phyogs gcig pa rnams kyi
NK055(ri)001:6251: // gzhung ngo // rtogs pa dang lha mnyam pa
NK055(ri)001:6252: nyid phyogs zhen thams cad dang bral ba yul sems
NK055(ri)001:6253: snod bcud 'khor 'das thams cad de nyid las ma
NK055(ri)001:6254: g.yos pa'i ngo bo 'du shes phra rags thams cad
NK055(ri)001:6255: dag pa'i mnyam pa nyid ni rig pa rang byung
NK055(ri)001:6256: gi ye shes zhes bya ste/
NK055(ri)001:6257: rdzogs pa chen po rang gi ngo bo nyid de/
NK055(ri)001:6258: de ni rtogs bya mthar phyin pa'i don lta bu'o //
NK055(ri)001:6259: rgyud 'dir ni thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i ma h+aa yo ga ste/
NK055(ri)001:6260: gong du bstan pa'i ma h+aa yo ga blo rab kyi don te/
NK055(ri)001:6261: rdzogs pa chen po'i don rtogs pa'i thabs sam lam stegs gtso cher de ston to //
NK055(ri)001:6262: de yang sku gsung thugs zhes pas/
NK055(ri)001:6263: rtog pa dang lha dbyer med pa'i ngo bo ma 'gag pa ni sku/
NK055(ri)001:6265: dbyer med pa ni thugs te rdzogs pa chen po'i ngo bo nyid do //
NK055(ri)001:6266: de ni rang bzhin gnas tshul gyi dkyil 'khor te/
NK055(ri)001:6267: snod dag pa 'byung ba yum du dag /bcud dag
NK055(ri)001:6268: pa phung po yab tu dag /rgyud dag pa khams
NK055(ri)001:6269: dang skye mched thams cad sems dpa' dang sems mar
NK055(ri)001:6270: dag pa'o // mnyam pa lnga yang de nyid du lhun gyis grub ste/
NK055(ri)001:6271: don dam sems kyi chos nyid skye ba med par
NK055(ri)001:6272: dag /kun rdzob ma 'gag pa lha dang lha mor
NK055(ri)001:6273: dag /mnyam pa gsum ni dag pa gsum dang mthun
NK055(ri)001:6274: no // rang bzhin gsang ba rdzogs pa chen po'i don de nyid rtogs par byed pa'i thabs/
NK055(ri)001:6275: mtshon par byed pa'i thabs rtogs pa bzhi ni/
NK055(ri)001:6277: zhes pas rgyu gcig pa dang yig 'bru dang byin gyis brlabsa dang mngon sum bzhi'o //
NK055(ri)001:6278: rgyu gcig par rtogs pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:6279: chos thams cad ye shes su dbyer med ni rgyu
NK055(ri)001:6280: rkyen dang bral ba sems kyi chos nyid du gcig
NK055(ri)001:6281: ste/ de yang mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos thams
NK055(ri)001:6282: cad chos skur gcig /'khor ba'i chos thams cad rnal
NK055(ri)001:6283: ma don gyi kun gzhir gcig /de gnyis nam mkha'i
NK055(ri)001:6284: ngang du dbyer med pa bzhin ni don dam par
NK055(ri)001:6285: ste/ rgyu gcig pa'o // kun rdzob tu 'khor 'das
NK055(ri)001:6286: kyi chos thams cad ma 'gag pa snang bzhin ma
NK055(ri)001:6287: grub sgyu ma lta bu so so'i bya ba byed
NK055(ri)001:6288: nus pa tsam du mtshungs pa ni kun rdzob tu
NK055(ri)001:6289: rgyu gcig /sgyu ma lta bu snang tsam nyid na
NK055(ri)001:6290: chu zla ltar dngos por ma grub sems nyid kyi
NK055(ri)001:6291: ngang las ma g.yos pa ni dbyer med du gcig
NK055(ri)001:6292: ste/ rgyu gcig pa'o // pa'o // yig 'bru'i tshul
NK055(ri)001:6293: ni don de gsum yig 'bru gsum gyis bsnan pa
NK055(ri)001:6294: ste/ rgyu gcig pa'o // pa'o // lta bu ste/
NK055(ri)001:6295: chos thams cad ma byung ma skyes don dam pa
NK055(ri)001:6296: ni a skye med kyi yi ge yin pas mtshon
NK055(ri)001:6297: te sku gsung thugs gsum las na gsung gi rang
NK055(ri)001:6298: ste/ rgyu gcig pa'o // pa'o // lta bu ste/
NK055(ri)001:6299: bzhin no // don dam pa nyid kun rdzob sgyu
NK055(ri)001:6300: ma tsam du snang zhing rten 'brel gyi bya ba
NK055(ri)001:6301: byed nus pa ni a las na ro bsnan pa
NK055(ri)001:6302: ste/ rgyu gcig pa'o // pa'o // lta bu ste/
NK055(ri)001:6303: bzhin no // lta bu ste/ sku gsung thugs las
NK055(ri)001:6304: mi 'gag pa sku'i bdag nyid do //
NK055(ri)001:6305: snang stong dbyer med pa de lta bur rtogs pa'i
NK055(ri)001:6306: rang snang sgyu ma'i ye shes mtha' dbus dang bral
NK055(ri)001:6307: ba'i ngo bo ni o las thig le bsnan pas
NK055(ri)001:6308: ste/ thugs rang byung gi ye shes/
NK055(ri)001:6309: ye shes lnga dang ldan pa'i rtags +amo cha lnga pa thugs su rtogs pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:6310: rtogs pa'i ye shes mthar phyin pa'i ngo bo'o //
NK055(ri)001:6311: byin gyis brlabsa kyis rtogs pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:6312: dper na ras dkar po dmar por byin gyis brlabsa pa'i mthu btsod la yod pa bzhin du/
NK055(ri)001:6313: chos thams cad thugs kyi rang bzhin du sangs rgyas
NK055(ri)001:6314: par byin gyis brlab pa'i mthu yang rgyu gcig pa
NK055(ri)001:6315: dang yig 'bru'i tshul gyi mthu las snang ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:6317: rjod byed gsang ba'i snying po nyid kyis chos thams
NK055(ri)001:6318: cad rgyu gcig pa yig 'bru'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas
NK055(ri)001:6319: pa de yang bde bar gshegs pa'i lung dang bla
NK055(ri)001:6320: ma'i man ngag dang bral ba yang ma yin te/
NK055(ri)001:6321: gsang ba'i snying po dang de ston byed kyi bla ma gnyis dang ldan/
NK055(ri)001:6322: lung dang man ngag gnyis kyi tshig tsam la brten pa'ang ma yin te/
NK055(ri)001:6323: lung dang man ngag gi don rig pas blo'i gting du rang rig pa'i mngon sum du rtogs pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:6324: des ni rdzogs pa chen po'i don la dang po 'jug pa'i sgo ste/
NK055(ri)001:6326: ston pa rdo rje'i thugs la gnas //
NK055(ri)001:6327: zhes pas gab pa dang sbas pa gnyis ni rang
NK055(ri)001:6328: bzhin gsang ba'i snying po'i rgyud chos thams cad kyi
NK055(ri)001:6329: khongs na gab pa ni ston pa kun tu bzang
NK055(ri)001:6330: pos 'byin pa rjod byed gsang ba'i snying po nyid
NK055(ri)001:6331: yin la/ rgyud kyi khongs na thams cad mkhyen pa'i
NK055(ri)001:6332: thugs rjes ras chod can gzu lums su 'jug pa
NK055(ri)001:6333: dgag pa'i phyir rjod byed kyi tshig gi nang du
NK055(ri)001:6334: sbas pa ni rdo rje slob dpon gyis 'byin pas/
NK055(ri)001:6335: rdo rje slob dpon bkur bar bya ba man ngag go //
NK055(ri)001:6337: le'u 'di la shin tu gsang ba man ngag ces kyang brjod do //
NK055(ri)001:6338: rgyu shes pa'i mtshan nyid ni/
NK055(ri)001:6340: zhes pa chos thams cad dag mnyam gyi ngo bo
NK055(ri)001:6341: nyid du ye nas lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor
NK055(ri)001:6342: gong du bshad pa ltar gnas pa la rtogs pa
NK055(ri)001:6343: bzhi'i gtan tshigs kyis mngon du byas pa ni ldan
NK055(ri)001:6344: pa ste/ rtogs pa'i don rang rig pa'i mngon sum
NK055(ri)001:6345: du byas nas yul bral rang gsal gyi mnyam pa
NK055(ri)001:6346: pa ste/ nyid ni/ lam gyi gzhi 'bras bu'i rgyu yin pas rgyu zhes 'dogs te/
NK055(ri)001:6347: dgongs pa de lta bu dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor la ni dkyil 'khor gyis zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:6350: zhes pa rang bzhin rdzogs pa chen po'i don dag
NK055(ri)001:6351: mnyam gyi dgongs pa sems nyid rang snang mnyam pa
NK055(ri)001:6352: nyid kyi ngang la rgyun du gnas pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:6353: lam bgrod par rang gi ngo bo gom pa 'dor
NK055(ri)001:6354: ba dang 'dra ba ste 'bras bu mngon du byed
NK055(ri)001:6355: pa'i rkyen yin pas dkyil 'khor bsgom zhes bya ste/
NK055(ri)001:6356: de la ni zag bcas zag med gnyis de gnyis
NK055(ri)001:6357: la yang g.yo thob goms brtan mthar phyin pa lnga
NK055(ri)001:6358: rnal 'byor pas nyams tshod bzung ngo //
NK055(ri)001:6362: lam goms pa'i mthu mngon du gyur pa 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid de/
NK055(ri)001:6363: rgyan gyi 'khor lo nyer lnga 'bras bu'i dkyil 'khor
NK055(ri)001:6364: ni lam ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor rtogs pa
NK055(ri)001:6366: lam rig pa ye shes lnga'i ngo bor gsal ba
NK055(ri)001:6367: goms pa mthar thug pa las byung ba ni thugs
NK055(ri)001:6368: rang byung gi ye shes te/
NK055(ri)001:6369: ye shes lnga dang ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'phro bas dkyil 'khor zhes bya la/
NK055(ri)001:6370: dkyil 'khor mchog ni de nyid gdul bya'i ngo bo
NK055(ri)001:6371: rang snang ba'i phyi nang gi dkyil 'khor thams cad
NK055(ri)001:6372: shar yang thugs rang byung gi ye shes las ma
NK055(ri)001:6373: g.yos te/ snang bya snang byed ma dmigs pas chos
NK055(ri)001:6374: kyi dbyings kyis khyab tshad gdul bya 'dul byed mdzad
NK055(ri)001:6375: pa'i phrin las gsum dbyer med pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:6376: rgyud 'di nyid kyi yi ge 'khor lo tshogs chen
NK055(ri)001:6377: gyi sa ste gong na med pas 'bras bu'i mchog
NK055(ri)001:6378: go // mtshan nyid gsum dgos 'brel gsum dang sbyar ba ni/
NK055(ri)001:6379: dkyus dang sbyar ba med de mtshan nyid gsum gyi don gyi 'brel yin pas so //
NK055(ri)001:6380: de yang 'brel ba ni 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad ye nas snang ba sku/
NK055(ri)001:6382: dbyer med pa thugs kyi bdag nyid rang bzhin gyis
NK055(ri)001:6383: sangs rgyas pas med la mi zad pa'i dbyings dang
NK055(ri)001:6384: / de nyid rang snang ba'i byin rlabs kyi mtshan
NK055(ri)001:6385: nyid rang bzhin rdzogs pa chen po'i don rtogs pa
NK055(ri)001:6386: bzhi'i tshul du rig pa ni bla na med pa'i
NK055(ri)001:6387: sangs rgyas su 'grub pa'i rgyu yin pa'i don dang
NK055(ri)001:6388: / 'brel te/ de yang rtogs pa bzhi'i tshul du rig nas lta ba mngon du gyur pa ni thabs/
NK055(ri)001:6389: de las 'bras bur snang ba ni thabs byung /
NK055(ri)001:6390: rgyu shes pa'i mtshan nyid ni rgyu/
NK055(ri)001:6391: de las 'bras bur snang ba ni 'bras ste rgyu 'bras gyi 'brel pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:6392: dgos pa ni dag ma dag 'khor 'das gnyis su 'dzin pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:6393: bzang ngan gtsang sme gnyis can gyi chos thams cad
NK055(ri)001:6394: ye nas sangs rgyas pa'i mnyam pa chen po'i ngo
NK055(ri)001:6395: bo la/ lta bas rtogs ting nge 'dzin gyis bsgom/
NK055(ri)001:6396: spyod pas nyams su blangs te/
NK055(ri)001:6397: lta sgom spyod gsum dbyer med par gyur pa ni rkyen 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid de/
NK055(ri)001:6398: de ni 'bras bu 'grub par byed pa'i rkyen yin pa'i phyir dgos pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:6399: rkyen ni chu lud bsrung bran dang 'dra'o //
NK055(ri)001:6400: dgos pa'i dgos pa ni 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid de //
NK055(ri)001:6401: 'khor 'das dang tha snyad kyis btags pa'i gnyis can
NK055(ri)001:6402: gyi chos thams cad ye nas rdzogs pa chen po'i
NK055(ri)001:6403: ngang la mnyam pa chen po'i dbyings su lam mthar
NK055(ri)001:6405: lta ba'i ngo bo nyid goms pa mthar thug ste lhun gyis grub pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:6406: khams gsum 'khor ba'i chos thams cad spangs pa med
NK055(ri)001:6407: par mnyam pa chen po'i ngang du lhun gyis grub
NK055(ri)001:6408: pa ste 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid yin la/
NK055(ri)001:6409: rgyan gyi 'khor lo nyer lnga lhun gyis grub pas yang dgos so //
NK055(ri)001:6411: gsang ba'i thig le dkyil 'khor dbyings //
NK055(ri)001:6412: zhes pa rang bzhin rdzogs pa chen po byang chub kyi sems shes pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:6413: gsang ba ni dag mnyam gyi ngo bo byang chub
NK055(ri)001:6414: kyi sems ni dngos po thams cad dang bral bas
NK055(ri)001:6415: blo'i yul du ma grub pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:6416: bdag gi ngo bo nyid pas yul du byar med
NK055(ri)001:6417: de gsang ba bzhis chod pa gcig dang du ma
NK055(ri)001:6418: bral/ mtha' dbus kyi ngo bo ma dmigs pa ni mchog tu gsang ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:6419: thig le ni spros pa thams cad dang bral bas
NK055(ri)001:6420: chos thams cad ye nas dag rtogs kyi ngo bor
NK055(ri)001:6422: dkyil 'khor dbyings ni gnyis su med pa'i chos nyid
NK055(ri)001:6423: de nyid mi 'gag pa'i rtsal 'khor 'das kyi chos
NK055(ri)001:6425: de lta bus don ma 'dres yongs rdzogs ye nas
NK055(ri)001:6426: yin pa'i ngo bo nyid yin par rtogs pa'i rang
NK055(ri)001:6427: rig pa'i mngon sum du lhun gyis grub pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:6429: chen po rigs te de bzhin te //
NK055(ri)001:6430: zhes pa gong gi bsnyen pa'i ngo bo gzhi shes
NK055(ri)001:6431: pa lhun gyis grub pas rang nyid kyang de nyid
NK055(ri)001:6432: gsal ba la yul dang yul can med par lhun
NK055(ri)001:6433: gyis grub pas bdag nyid lhar shes pa zhes bya
NK055(ri)001:6434: ste/ chen po ni 'byung ba lnga'i snod bcud kyi
NK055(ri)001:6435: rags pa thams cad de gzugs kyi phung po rnam
NK055(ri)001:6436: par snang mdzad la sogs pa lnga'o //
NK055(ri)001:6437: de yang gzugs kyi phung po zhes pas rnal 'byor
NK055(ri)001:6438: pa'i lus la bzung nas yul logs su lus pa
NK055(ri)001:6440: gzugs chen bco lnga ni yul sems thams cad der
NK055(ri)001:6441: ma 'dus pa med pas snod bcud kyi rags pa
NK055(ri)001:6442: thams cad do // de bzhin du tshor ba sogs
NK055(ri)001:6443: bzhi po'i yul sems gnyis ka bsdus pas 'byung ba
NK055(ri)001:6444: lnga po lnga las gzhan du ma yin no //
NK055(ri)001:6445: des na sems rang rig pa nyid ma 'gag pa phyi nang gi gzugs kyi phung por snang /
NK055(ri)001:6446: sems su gsal bas snang bya snang byed med pas
NK055(ri)001:6447: sems manya ma pa nyid kyi ngang la sgyu ma'i
NK055(ri)001:6448: mtshan nyid tsam la 'gag pa ni don dang mthun
NK055(ri)001:6449: pa'i mtshan rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ste/
NK055(ri)001:6450: gzugs kyi phung po rnam par snang mdzad ces bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:6451: bzhi po yang des 'gre bar shes par bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:6452: de la chen po ni phung po lnga/
NK055(ri)001:6456: dag 'dzin nam mkha' gsal 'dzin lta bu ma yin te/
NK055(ri)001:6457: rtogs pa'i ngang mnyam pa nyid dag mnyam gyi ngo bo mngon du gyur pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:6458: de la ni rtogs pa bzhi'i gtan tshigs kyis chos
NK055(ri)001:6459: thams cad sangs rgyas pa'i rang bzhin yin pas rnal
NK055(ri)001:6460: 'byor pas bdag kyang gzhal bya byed de dag tu
NK055(ri)001:6461: lhun gyis grub pa ni lha'i rang bzhin ye nas
NK055(ri)001:6462: yin gyi/ lam kyi bsgrub pa ma yin par rtogs pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:6464: 'byung ba shes rab rigs kyi yum //
NK055(ri)001:6465: zhes pa 'byung ba ni nam mkha' la sogs pa lnga ste/
NK055(ri)001:6466: shes rab ni 'byung ba lnga'i cha phra ba las kyi nus pa 'dzin pa tsam lnga ste/
NK055(ri)001:6467: sems kyi chos nyid rig pa rang gsal ba snod bcud kyi chos thams cad dang mi gnyis pas/
NK055(ri)001:6468: chos thams cad kyang de nyid rang snang ba'i phyir/
NK055(ri)001:6469: chos thams cad kyi gzhi thams cad bskyed cing thams cad dbyer med pa'i bdag nyid kyis yum ste/
NK055(ri)001:6470: ngo bo nam mkha'i chos rnams mtshungs pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:6471: snod bcud kyi chos thams cad la khyab pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:6472: chos thams cad 'byung ba'i gzhir gyur pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:6473: ngo bo ngos bzung thams cad dang bral bas gang
NK055(ri)001:6474: gi yang phyogs su song ba med pas dbyings zhes
NK055(ri)001:6475: brjod de/ nam mkha' nyid mi 'gag pa las sa chu me rlung bzhir snang zhing /
NK055(ri)001:6476: nam mkhas go skabs 'byed pa'i yum byed/
NK055(ri)001:6477: sas brtan zhing mi 'gyur ba'i yum byed/
NK055(ri)001:6480: rlung gis yang zhing g.yo ba'i las byed de/
NK055(ri)001:6481: phyi nang gi chos thams cad bskyed pa dang ma phyed pa'i don gyis yum ste/
NK055(ri)001:6482: phung po lnga dang dbyer med pas rigs kyi yum zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:6483: de yang 'dir lam pas nyams su myong ba'i ngo bo yin pas/
NK055(ri)001:6484: rigs lnga gong du bshad pa bzhin du sems su gsal/
NK055(ri)001:6485: snang stong dbyer med der 'dzin mi mnga' ba'i ngang
NK055(ri)001:6486: la sgyu ma tsam rang snang ba ched 'dzin thams
NK055(ri)001:6488: 'byung ba lnga snang stong dbyer med pa rig par gsal ba'i don te/
NK055(ri)001:6489: thabs shes rab gnyis las shes rab kyi cha lta bu yin pas bsgrub yum bskyed ces bya ste/
NK055(ri)001:6490: rim 'jug gi sgrub pa la ltos pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:6492: byang chub sems ni rdo rje'i tshogs //
NK055(ri)001:6493: zhes pa 'dir thabs shes rab 'brel ba ste/
NK055(ri)001:6494: de yang chos thams cad rang byung ye shes su
NK055(ri)001:6495: gsal ba'i ngang las 'byung ba chen po lnga'i mtshan
NK055(ri)001:6496: nya da 'dzin pa d+r+wa ba lnga ni/
NK055(ri)001:6497: sems nyid du gsal zhing sems nyid du dbyer med pas chen mo zhes bya la/
NK055(ri)001:6498: sems kyi dbyings su gsal bas 'byung ba'i 'dzin pa dag pa ni shes rab kyi bdag nyid yin la/
NK055(ri)001:6499: de nyid chos thams cad dang mi phyed pa'i gzhir gyur pas yum ste/
NK055(ri)001:6500: de'i ngo bo nyid ni thams cad gsal zhing go
NK055(ri)001:6501: 'byed pa'i bdag nyid du bzhugs pas mkha' zhes brjod
NK055(ri)001:6502: la/ de'i rang bzhin snang stong gi mtha' dang bral
NK055(ri)001:6503: ba'i yum la stong pa nyid ces brjod de shes
NK055(ri)001:6505: thabs ni yum gyi mkha' stong pa nyid rang snang
NK055(ri)001:6506: ba'i phung po lnga rags pa'i mtshan nyid 'dzin par
NK055(ri)001:6507: bshad pa'i sangs rgyas lnga ni thabs kyi rang bzhin
NK055(ri)001:6508: te/ mnyam pa nyid kyi ngang la smon bya'i yul
NK055(ri)001:6509: ma dmigs pas smon pa med pa de ni snang
NK055(ri)001:6510: stong dbyer med pa ye nas zung du 'brel ba
NK055(ri)001:6511: ni sgrub pa chen po'i ngo bo rdzogs pa chen
NK055(ri)001:6512: po'i don mthar thug pa snying po byang chub kyi
NK055(ri)001:6513: sems mngon du gyur pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:6514: me long g.ya' dag pa mthar phyin nas gzugs brnyan gsal ba mthar phyin pa bzhin/
NK055(ri)001:6515: rdo rje lta bu'i chos nyid mi 'gag pa las/
NK055(ri)001:6516: tshogs ni dbang yul rnam shes gnas su dag pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:6520: rig pa zhes pa rnam shes lnga/
NK055(ri)001:6521: rnams zhes pa rtag chad mtha' bzhi/
NK055(ri)001:6522: rang snang sems nyid du dbyer med/
NK055(ri)001:6523: rtog tshogs spangs pa'am bcos pa'am bshig pa med par sems dpa' dang sems mar dag ste/
NK055(ri)001:6524: sprul pa'am sras lcam dral zhes pa/
NK055(ri)001:6525: phung po 'byung ba gong ltar rtogs pa'i ngang du lhun gyis grub/
NK055(ri)001:6526: khams dang skye mched kyang rang dag pas gzhi rtogs pa'i ngos nas grangs de ltar brjod kyi/
NK055(ri)001:6527: rtogs pa'i ngo la so sor 'dzin pa ma grub pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:6528: spyod yul dag pas ye shes lngar gsal ba ni/
NK055(ri)001:6529: kun tu bzang po'i dkyil 'khor la //
NK055(ri)001:6530: zhes pa la sogs te kun tu bzang po ni rang bzhin rdzogs pa chen po'i don/
NK055(ri)001:6531: gzhi kun tu bzang po'i ngo bo nyid la rgyu shes pa'i mtshan nyid kyis nyams su myong nas/
NK055(ri)001:6532: rtog tshogs ye sangs rgyas kyi don la mnyam pa
NK055(ri)001:6533: nyid lhun gyis grub pa la yul ma dmigs pas
NK055(ri)001:6534: tha snyad du kun tu bzang po zhes bya ste/
NK055(ri)001:6536: zhes pa phyi nang gi chos thams cad de nyid
NK055(ri)001:6537: du lhun gyis grub pa'i ngang la ye shes rnam
NK055(ri)001:6538: pa lngar gsal te/ bdag nyid chen po/
NK055(ri)001:6539: zhes pa 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad rang byung
NK055(ri)001:6540: ye shes su gsal ba las gzhan pa ma dmigs
NK055(ri)001:6543: zhes pa rang byung ye shes la gsal ba'i dbye bas dbye na/
NK055(ri)001:6544: chos thams cad kyi de kho na nyid sangs rgyas
NK055(ri)001:6545: thams cad kyi ngo bor rang byung ye shes ni
NK055(ri)001:6547: zhes pa rang byung gi ye shes mtha' thams cad kyis stong pas stong pa nyid kyi ye shes/
NK055(ri)001:6548: de nyid gsal la mi 'gag pas me long lta bu/
NK055(ri)001:6549: mkhyen pa gnyis cir yang 'char bas so sor rtogs pa/
NK055(ri)001:6550: gdul bya'i dgos pa skong bas bya ba grub pa/
NK055(ri)001:6551: stong pa'i ngang las ma g.yos pa mnyam pa nyid/
NK055(ri)001:6553: zhes pa de la dus gsum du mi g.yo ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:6554: yul sems zag med kyi ngo bo ni/
NK055(ri)001:6555: snying po thig le mnyam sbyor bas //
NK055(ri)001:6556: zhes pa snying po ni rig pa rang byung gi
NK055(ri)001:6557: ye shes mi 'gag pa cir yang snang ba ste
NK055(ri)001:6558: rtsa ba'i sa bon lta bu bas snying po ste
NK055(ri)001:6559: thabs kyi cha'o // thig le ni snying po de
NK055(ri)001:6560: nyid spros pa'i mtshan ma thams cad dang bral bas
NK055(ri)001:6562: mnyam pa ni snying po thabs nyid thig le shes
NK055(ri)001:6563: rab nyid thabs ma 'gag pa snying por gsal bas
NK055(ri)001:6564: so sor 'byed pa'i tha snyad bral bas mnyam pa'o
NK055(ri)001:6565: // sbyor ba ni de'i don rig pa la gdengs
NK055(ri)001:6566: chud de rnal 'byor pa de'i ngo bo nyid du
NK055(ri)001:6568: zhes pa gtan tshigs te de'i dus su yul sems
NK055(ri)001:6569: rgyu 'bras snang stong 'khor 'das thams cad mnyam sbyor
NK055(ri)001:6570: gyi gtan tshigs kyis rang snang bkag pa ma yin
NK055(ri)001:6571: pas/ sgyu ma la sgyu mar snang /
NK055(ri)001:6572: sgyu ma la sgyu mar rol/
NK055(ri)001:6573: rol bya rol byed snang bya snang byed med pa'i ngo bo nyid lhun gyis grub pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:6575: bde ba'i ye shes rol mo yis //
NK055(ri)001:6576: zhes pa yul yul can med pa'i sgyu ma la
NK055(ri)001:6577: sgyu ma rol pa nyid phyogs 'dzin gyi zug rngu
NK055(ri)001:6578: phra ba'ang mi mnga' ba'i dgongs pa mnyam pa nyid
NK055(ri)001:6579: ni bde ba'o // de ni lam pas bsgrub pa ma yin te/
NK055(ri)001:6580: ye nas yin pa'i don rgyu shes pa'i mtshan nyid/
NK055(ri)001:6581: rkyen 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid kyis mngon du byas pa ni shes pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:6582: rol mo ni yul yul can med pa'i sgyu ma'i rol mo lngar bshad pa nyid do //
NK055(ri)001:6583: ye shes dgyes la mchod pa 'bul //
NK055(ri)001:6584: zhes pa ye shes ni bsgrub pa chen po'i don
NK055(ri)001:6585: mngon du gyur pa rang byung gi ye shes so
NK055(ri)001:6586: // dgyes pa ni lam pa'i 'du shes kyi 'dzin
NK055(ri)001:6587: pa rags pa dang phra ba dang phra ba'i phra
NK055(ri)001:6588: ba rnams dag pa mthar phyin pa la nyams pa
NK055(ri)001:6589: // med pa'o // mchod pa 'bul zhes pa/
NK055(ri)001:6590: ma 'gag par yul yul can med pa sgyu ma'i
NK055(ri)001:6591: rgyun nyid kyis rang byung gi ye shes gsal ba
NK055(ri)001:6592: 'bul bya dbul byed phul ba med pa'i mchod pa
NK055(ri)001:6594: bsod nams rang snang du bstan pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:6595: zag pa med pa'i bsod nams kyis //
NK055(ri)001:6596: zhes pa de ltar rang snang gi ye shes rang
NK055(ri)001:6597: la rang rol pa'i dus su zag pa ni bdag
NK055(ri)001:6598: 'dzin te/ de med pa ni phyi nang gi chos
NK055(ri)001:6599: thams cad byang chub sems su gsal ba la nam
NK055(ri)001:6600: mkhas rang la rang du mi 'dzin pa ltar/
NK055(ri)001:6601: bdag 'dzin dag pa'i rang rig pa nam mkha' dang 'dra ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:6602: bsod nams ni tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa'i ngo bo ste/
NK055(ri)001:6603: rig pa rang snang sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid rang la
NK055(ri)001:6604: rang snang yul dang yul can med par lhun grub
NK055(ri)001:6605: tu gsal ba'i dus na rgyu 'bras dbyer med par
NK055(ri)001:6606: ma 'gag pa bsod nams kyi tshogs mi 'dzin pa
NK055(ri)001:6607: ye shes kyi tshogs 'bras bu nyid du gsal ba'o
NK055(ri)001:6608: // ye shes rang snang gi mdzad pa mtshan ma med pas cir yang 'char ba ni/
NK055(ri)001:6609: ye shes sgyu ma rang snang ba //
NK055(ri)001:6610: zhes pa mthar phyin pa'i rang byung gi ye shes
NK055(ri)001:6611: nyi ma stong dus gcig shar na mun pa gzhi
NK055(ri)001:6612: dag pa bzhin/ 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad rang
NK055(ri)001:6613: byung gi ye shes su gsal bas dag ma dag
NK055(ri)001:6614: dag pa bzhin/ gi tha snyad du/ 'du shes kyi
NK055(ri)001:6615: 'dzin pa thams cad gtan nas dag pas rang byung
NK055(ri)001:6616: gi ye shes 'ba' zhig tu gsal te/
NK055(ri)001:6617: gnyis su 'dzin pa'i mtshan ma med pa'i don gang
NK055(ri)001:6618: gi ngo bor yang mi dmigs pa'i don nam mkha'i
NK055(ri)001:6619: klong chen po 'dra bar lhun gyis grub pa ni
NK055(ri)001:6620: ye shes kyi ngo bo ste/
NK055(ri)001:6621: gzhan don mi 'gag pa'i tshul ni snang bzhin ma
NK055(ri)001:6622: grub pa sgyu ma lta bu rgyu rkyen dang bral
NK055(ri)001:6623: bar gdul bya'i ngo la rang snang ba ni/
NK055(ri)001:6624: rnyog ma dwangs pa'i chu la lta ba po'i ngo
NK055(ri)001:6625: la chu zla rang snang ba bzhin snang bya snang
NK055(ri)001:6626: byed bral ba'o // rol mo'i dkyil 'khor/
NK055(ri)001:6627: zhes pa rol mo mkhan lus la ma god par
NK055(ri)001:6628: rol mo ji ltar 'char bas ltad mo ba'i yid
NK055(ri)001:6629: 'dren pa bzhin/ 'dir ye shes kyi ngang la 'byung
NK055(ri)001:6630: 'jug mi mnga' bar gdul bya'i blo ngo bzhin du
NK055(ri)001:6631: cir yang 'char bas dgos pa skong ba bzhin te/
NK055(ri)001:6632: spyir gdul bya'i snang ba thams cad yin kyang /
NK055(ri)001:6635: zhes pas phyi nang gi dkyil 'khor thams cad do //
NK055(ri)001:6637: zhes pa gdul bya'i blo ngo'o //
NK055(ri)001:6638: mchog ni chos sku las g.yos pa med pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:6639: gdul bya'i ngo snang tshul 'di nyid ni 'bras bu
NK055(ri)001:6640: la ye nas lhun grub tu ldan pa'i cha nas
NK055(ri)001:6641: brjod pa'o // snang ba dngos ni 'og nas 'chad par 'gyur ro //
NK055(ri)001:6642: gsang ba'i thig le nyid kyi dbyings //
NK055(ri)001:6643: zhes pa gong gi 'bras bu lhun grub kyi don
NK055(ri)001:6644: de nyid rang bzhin gsang ba'i ngo bo nyid yin
NK055(ri)001:6645: la/ spros pa'i mtshan ma thams cad dang bral bas thig le/
NK055(ri)001:6646: gzhan la mi mnga' bas nyid kyis te 'bras bu chos sku'o //
NK055(ri)001:6647: de nyid yon tan thams cad kyi gzhir gyur pas dbyings zhes smos so //
NK055(ri)001:6648: bshad pa'i don de lta bu 'di ni phyogs bcu
NK055(ri)001:6649: na bzhugs shing dus bzhir gshegs pa'i 'bras bu mngon
NK055(ri)001:6650: du byas pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos gazhi'o //
NK055(ri)001:6651: des ni lam gyi rtsol ba zad rtogs pa mthar
NK055(ri)001:6652: thug pa'i klong du gyur pas gzhi de bzhin nyid
NK055(ri)001:6653: mthar phyin pas/ 'bras bu rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:6654: 'o na theg pa thams cad nas 'bras bu lhun
NK055(ri)001:6655: gyis grub pa ni bdud bzhi thul ba yin pa
NK055(ri)001:6656: la/ 'dir bdud bzhi btul ba ma smos pas 'bras bu lhun gyis ji ltar grub ce na/
NK055(ri)001:6657: bdud bzhi btul ba ni tha snyad pa rnams kyis gtsor che ba yin la/
NK055(ri)001:6658: 'dir yang shugs kyis grub ste nyon mongs nyid rang
NK055(ri)001:6659: byung ye shes su gsal bas nyon mongs pa'i bdud
NK055(ri)001:6660: dag /phung po lnga nyid ma spangs par rigs lnga'i
NK055(ri)001:6661: ngang du gsal bas phung po'i bdud dag /gnyis su
NK055(ri)001:6662: med pa rang byung ye shes kyi ngang la gnyis
NK055(ri)001:6663: 'dzin mi mnga' bar gnyen po chos dang bral bas
NK055(ri)001:6664: lha'i bu'i bdud dag /rang byung ye shes rgyu rkyen
NK055(ri)001:6665: dang bral te skad cig ma ma grub pas 'gag
NK055(ri)001:6666: pa med pas 'chi bdag gi bdud dag /de nas
NK055(ri)001:6667: 'og ma bzhin ched du bcom pa med par rang
NK055(ri)001:6668: dag pa'o // de bas de ltar bdud bzhi rang dag pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:6669: 'bras bu mthar phyin pa'i ngo bo ni/
NK055(ri)001:6670: phyogs bcu dus bzhir mngon rdzogs pa'i //
NK055(ri)001:6672: 'dir theg pa 'di nyid kyi 'bras bu ni/
NK055(ri)001:6673: khams gsum gyi chos thams cad rang byung ye shes
NK055(ri)001:6674: su rdzogs pas 'khor 'das dbyer med pa'i bdag nyid
NK055(ri)001:6675: mngon du gyur pa yin te/
NK055(ri)001:6676: de yang dag pa'i phyogs bcu dus bzhi ni 'bras bu mngon du byas pa'i sku gsum ste/
NK055(ri)001:6677: chos kyi sku la phyogs dus kyi mtshan ma mi mnga' yang /
NK055(ri)001:6678: gdul byas gzhal ba'i ngos nas mtshon pa'i tha snyad tsam du gzhal du yod pas so //
NK055(ri)001:6680: gzugs sku gnyis phyogs bcu na bzhugs shing dus bzhir
NK055(ri)001:6681: gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas ma lus pa thams cad dang
NK055(ri)001:6682: / 'khor ba'i chos kyang gnas phyogs bcu thug pa med pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:6683: dus bzhi mthar thug pa med pa rnams dbyer med
NK055(ri)001:6684: par 'khor 'das gnyis thob bya'i 'bras bu rang rig
NK055(ri)001:6685: pa byang chub kyi sems su lhun gyis rdzogs nas
NK055(ri)001:6686: 'khor ba tha snyad tsam yang ma dmigs pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:6687: 'khor ba spangs pa dang lus pa med par mthar
NK055(ri)001:6688: phyin pa'i don du rdzogs pa'i dus su 'khor bzla
NK055(ri)001:6689: ma dmigs pas/ 'bras bu sangs rgyas sam dag pa
NK055(ri)001:6690: rtags su 'dzin pa bral te lam gyi bya ba
NK055(ri)001:6691: zad pas rdzogs pa zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:6692: 'on kyang de nyid lam mthar phyin pa'i skyes bu'i
NK055(ri)001:6693: dgongs pa la lta bas yul dang yul can med
NK055(ri)001:6694: par lhun gyis grub kyang da dung dbang dang lung
NK055(ri)001:6695: chen po la rag las pas/
NK055(ri)001:6696: 'dir yul du smos pa lta bu yin te shes
NK055(ri)001:6697: bya'i sgrib pa rkang dang pri la gnas pa dang
NK055(ri)001:6698: mtshungs so // 'khor 'das dbyer med gong du bshad
NK055(ri)001:6699: pa lta bu'i mdzad pa cir yang 'char ba'i sku
NK055(ri)001:6700: lnga gsung lnga thugs lnga yon tan lnga phrin las
NK055(ri)001:6701: lnga ste rgyan gyi 'khor lo nyi shu rtsa lnga
NK055(ri)001:6703: chos sku'i gsung dang chos kyi dbyings kyi thugs gsum ni/
NK055(ri)001:6704: sangs rgyas rang ngo la nyi shu rtsa gnyis po ni gdul bya mtho dman gyi ngo ste/
NK055(ri)001:6705: ma lus bdag nyid zhal mthong ba //
NK055(ri)001:6706: zhes pa 'dir lam mthar phyin pa'i snang ba yin pas 'ga' ni mthong /
NK055(ri)001:6707: 'ga' ni mi mthong ba lta bu'am/
NK055(ri)001:6708: shas che chung lta bu ma yin te/
NK055(ri)001:6710: ma lus pa bdag nyid ces pa/
NK055(ri)001:6711: lam mthar phyin pa'i skyes bus rig pa'i ngo la
NK055(ri)001:6712: mngon du snang ba ni skad cig ma dang po'i
NK055(ri)001:6713: snang ba'o // de yang zhal mthong ba'i tshul ni/
NK055(ri)001:6715: zhes pas 'bras bu'i yon tan nyer lnga lam pa
NK055(ri)001:6716: rang gi rig pa rang snang ba rtogs pa'i ngang
NK055(ri)001:6717: las mthong bya mthong byed bral ba'i rang gsal lhun
NK055(ri)001:6718: gyis grub pas bdag nyid zhal mthong ba zhes bya'o
NK055(ri)001:6719: // yang na lam pa rang gi sems nyid ma
NK055(ri)001:6720: phris ma bsnan pa 'bras bu'i ngo bo de nyid
NK055(ri)001:6721: yin pa sgrib pa rnams kyis bsgribs pas ma mthong
NK055(ri)001:6722: // ste/ lam gyi ngo bo mthong bsgom mthar phyin
NK055(ri)001:6723: nyams su blangs pas sgrib pa rnams dag ste chu
NK055(ri)001:6724: rnyog ma dag na gzugs brnyan gsal ba dang 'dra
NK055(ri)001:6725: // ste/ bar/ sems rang sa zin rang ngo shes
NK055(ri)001:6726: rang mal du phebs pa ni bdag zhal bdag gis
NK055(ri)001:6727: // ste/ bar/ mthong zhes bya ste/ skad cig ma dang po'i snang ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:6728: skad cig ma gnyis pa la phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi dbang bskur/
NK055(ri)001:6729: gsung lnga lhun grub kyi lung chen po thob pas
NK055(ri)001:6730: rang bzhin gsang ba'i snying po'i don mngon du gyur
NK055(ri)001:6731: nas rigs bdag dang sku gsung thugs dbyer med par
NK055(ri)001:6732: gyur te/ nyi shu rtsa lnga'i ngo bo nyid du gyur pa ni dbang sgyur ba zhes bya ste/
NK055(ri)001:6733: 'bras bu mngon du gyur pa de nyid kyi rtsal du 'char ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:6734: de yang dbang bsgyur ba'i ngo bo ni ngo bo
NK055(ri)001:6735: nyid kyi sku mngon du gyur pa'i rang byung gi
NK055(ri)001:6736: ye shes la bya byed rgyu 'bras dag snang 'bras
NK055(ri)001:6737: bu thob ces bya ba gtan nas mi mnga' ste/
NK055(ri)001:6739: 'du shes zad pa'i rang rig nyid //
NK055(ri)001:6740: rang snang nyid du byung ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:6741: zhes pas gdul bya'i don du gdul bya ji tsam
NK055(ri)001:6742: pa de tsam du shar ba la ni dbang sgyur
NK055(ri)001:6743: zhes bya'o // mchog nyid ces pa/
NK055(ri)001:6744: kun tu bzang po'i bdag nyid du gyur nas 'bras bu mthar chub ste logs su ma lus pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:6746: zhes pa rang rig pa'i gsal la ma 'gag pa
NK055(ri)001:6747: don dam pa gsum mngon du gyur pa shes brjod
NK055(ri)001:6748: kyi yul dang bral ba nam mkha' lta bu ste
NK055(ri)001:6749: chos kyi dbyings kyis khyab tshad de kho na nyid
NK055(ri)001:6750: do // 'o na gdul bya 'khor ba ma dmigs te gdul bya'i snang ba yang 'gag pas/
NK055(ri)001:6752: gdul bya dang mdzad pa'i phrin las rnams kyang 'chad par 'gyur ro //
NK055(ri)001:6753: 'bras bu de nyid 'khor 'das dbyer med du bstan pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:6755: ces pa 'dir dkyil 'khor dang po ni/
NK055(ri)001:6756: rtog tshogs rang snang gi dkyil 'khor 'khrul ba'i sems can rnams kyi ngo bo/
NK055(ri)001:6757: gdul bya yul de las gsang sngags 'di nyid kyi gtan tshigs rtogs pa bzhis gzhal ba dang /
NK055(ri)001:6758: rang bzhin rdzogs pa chen po dag mnyam gyi don
NK055(ri)001:6759: rang rig pa'i mngon sum du gyur pa ni gzhi'i
NK055(ri)001:6760: log rtog spangs pa med par lta ba'i ngo bor
NK055(ri)001:6761: gyur pa ni/ lam pa'i lta ba ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
NK055(ri)001:6762: de nyid ting nge 'dzin gyis mngon du byas pa
NK055(ri)001:6763: ni rtog tshogs kyi snang ba lhag pa'i ting nge
NK055(ri)001:6764: 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor du dag pa'i dkyil 'khor ro
NK055(ri)001:6765: // de nyid tshogs bsgrubs nas zag med la sbyor
NK055(ri)001:6766: ba ni lhag pa ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor la
NK055(ri)001:6767: mgo zug pa ste bskyed rim pa'i gzhung ngo //
NK055(ri)001:6768: 'di nyid kyi gzhung du lta ba rtogs pa yan
NK055(ri)001:6769: chad mthun pa las rdzogs rim gyis nyams su blangs
NK055(ri)001:6770: pa'i dus su/ mtshan nyid gsum/
NK055(ri)001:6772: bsnyen bsgrub bzhi nyams su blangs pa na lam pa rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
NK055(ri)001:6773: lam pa de lta bu'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa
NK055(ri)001:6774: nus pa mthu can du gyur pa mthar phyin pa
NK055(ri)001:6776: ces pa nyi shu rtsa lnga lhun gyis grub pa kun tu bzang po'i dkyil 'khor nyid do //
NK055(ri)001:6777: rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor lhun gyis grub //
NK055(ri)001:6778: ces pa rdzogs pa ni gong du bshad pa ltar
NK055(ri)001:6779: khams gsum gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad nyi ma shar
NK055(ri)001:6780: nas mun pa snang bar gyur pa dang 'dra bar
NK055(ri)001:6781: spangs pa dang lus pa rdul phra rab tsam yang
NK055(ri)001:6782: med par yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su
NK055(ri)001:6783: lhun gyis grub pa ni rdzogs pa zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:6785: rgyan gyi 'khor lo nyi shu rtsa lnga ste/
NK055(ri)001:6786: lhun gyis grub ni thob bya thob byed kyi rtsol
NK055(ri)001:6787: ba dang bral te ngo bo nyid du gyur pa
NK055(ri)001:6788: ni chu klung chen po rgya mtshor 'dres na ro
NK055(ri)001:6789: mi phyed pa ltar gyur pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:6790: rgyan du dkyil 'khor ma lus thogs //
NK055(ri)001:6791: zhes pa lhag pa'i chos sku nyid mi 'gag pa'i
NK055(ri)001:6792: rtsal las gzhi lam 'bras bu gsum dbyer med pa'i
NK055(ri)001:6793: don gyis ma 'dres yongs rdzogs kyi dgongs pa la
NK055(ri)001:6794: dkyil 'khor bcu gnyis rang snang ba ni/
NK055(ri)001:6795: gdul bya mtho dman ma lus pa'i //
NK055(ri)001:6796: re ba skong bas rgyan du thogs //
NK055(ri)001:6798: brgyan bya rgyan byed dang gzhi dang gzhi can ni gtan nas ma grub bo //
NK055(ri)001:6800: rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor mnyam sbyor bas //
NK055(ri)001:6802: khas blangs pa'i thugs rje dang mdzad pa ston te/
NK055(ri)001:6804: rdzogs/ zhes pa gzhi ngo bo nyid kyi sku chos kyi
NK055(ri)001:6805: dbyings mnyam pa chen po'i ngang la rig pa rang
NK055(ri)001:6806: snang ba'i 'khor 'das snod bcud bdag gzhan la sogs
NK055(ri)001:6807: pa gnyis can gyi tha snyad thams cad sems nyid
NK055(ri)001:6808: ngo bo nyid kyi ngang du rdzogs nas/
NK055(ri)001:6809: rig pa rang byung gi ye shes su 'dzin pa'i tha snyad phra ba'ang mi gnas pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:6810: dag pa'i ngo la sangs rgyas kyi thugs ma nor ba ste/
NK055(ri)001:6811: dkyil 'khor ni ngo bo gang du yang ma grub
NK055(ri)001:6812: pa las rang gsal ba cir yang snang ba'i 'khor
NK055(ri)001:6813: ro // mnyam zhes pas 'khor ba rgyu 'bras snod
NK055(ri)001:6814: bcud thams cad la chu gsher bas khyab cing gsher
NK055(ri)001:6816: thugs rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes des 'khor
NK055(ri)001:6817: ba'i chos thams cad la bdal ba med par khyab
NK055(ri)001:6818: pa la ni bud+d+ha zhes bya ste/
NK055(ri)001:6819: des na khyab bya dang khyab byed med pa ni gnyis su med pa'i thugs rje zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:6820: phyogs 'dzin gyi chos thams cad dang bral ba ni mi rtogs thugs rje zhes kyang bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:6821: ngo bo nyid ni sku gsung thugs ma nor ba'i ngos nas thugs rje chen po zhes bya ste/
NK055(ri)001:6822: khyab bya khyab byed med par rang bzhin du bzhugs pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:6824: pas/ zhes pas thugs rje bshad pa de rnams kyi gtan tshigs kyis mdzad pa mi 'gag par 'char ba ste/
NK055(ri)001:6827: khyab pa'i thugs rje nyid rang gsal mi 'gag pa'i ngo bo nam mkha' dang 'dra ba las/
NK055(ri)001:6828: 'og ma'i thugs rje gsum rgyu rkyen dang bral bar rang shar du snang bas dkyil 'khor zhes bya ste/
NK055(ri)001:6829: sku gnyis kyi mdzad pa thugs rje chen po nyid
NK055(ri)001:6830: mi 'gag pa'i rtsal las shar te blo mtho dman
NK055(ri)001:6831: gyi bye brag rnams kyi dgos pa so sor skong
NK055(ri)001:6832: bar byed de/ de yang chos kyi dbyings kyis khyab
NK055(ri)001:6833: tshad kyi gdul bya'i ngo la 'dul byed dang 'dul
NK055(ri)001:6834: thabs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dus gcig shar te/
NK055(ri)001:6835: thams cad mkhyen pa'i 'du shes kyi rgyun las grol
NK055(ri)001:6836: bas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rang rig pa cir
NK055(ri)001:6838: chos sku spros bral gyi ngo bo 'du shes kyi yul du byas pa ma grub pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:6839: gdul bya rnams kyi shes rgyud thugs rje chen po'i
NK055(ri)001:6840: ngo bo yin pas 'dul byed dang mdzad pa rang
NK055(ri)001:6841: sems las snang zhes bya ste/
NK055(ri)001:6842: da lta gzung 'dzin gyi dus su chos sems snang zhes pa dang mthun no //
NK055(ri)001:6844: zhes pa mdzad pa'i phrin las snang ba yang ye shes sngon du 'gro ba dang /
NK055(ri)001:6846: 'dul dus gzigs pa rnams dang bral te/
NK055(ri)001:6847: gdul bya'i spro bsdu dang yang sprul dang nying sprul la sogs pa mi mnga' ste/
NK055(ri)001:6848: 'dul byed mtho dman ji ltar snang yang chos sku las snang ba ma gtogs pa spro bsdu bral te/
NK055(ri)001:6849: spar khab mkhan pos kyang yang sprul dang nying sprul ni kha gom po zhes gsungs so //
NK055(ri)001:6850: me long g.ya' dag pa gzugs brnyan 'char ba'i ngo bor bzhugs pa las/
NK055(ri)001:6851: lta ba po'i dbang gis ji ltar yang 'char ba bzhin no //
NK055(ri)001:6852: mdzad pa mi 'gag pa dngos ni/
NK055(ri)001:6854: zhes pa phyogs bcu dus bzhis bsdus pa'i gdul bya'i dkyil 'khor ma lus pa thams cad/
NK055(ri)001:6856: zhes pa 'og ma'i 'dul thabs rnams kyis rim gyis
NK055(ri)001:6857: rim 'jug gi dbang du 'di nyid kyi lam yin
NK055(ri)001:6858: la/ 'di nyid kyis 'dul ba rang gi ngo bo
NK055(ri)001:6859: ni dag mnyam gyi don rtogs goms mthar phyin pa
NK055(ri)001:6860: 'dul ba'i ngo bor rang mal du phebs pa'o //
