NK055(ri)001:6861: mgon ni gzugs sku gnyis kyi bye brag gi snang
NK055(ri)001:6862: ba rnams kyis gdul bya rnams 'bras bu sangs rgyas
NK055(ri)001:6863: sar skyol ba'o // 'o na mdzad pa'i phrin las
NK055(ri)001:6864: kyis gdul bya rnams 'khor ba las sgrol zhing thar
NK055(ri)001:6865: bar sbyor bas bsgral bya sgrol byed 'du shes kyi
NK055(ri)001:6866: mtshan ma dang bcas so zhe na/
NK055(ri)001:6867: de mi mnga' bar bstan pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:6868: sgyu ma'i dkyil 'khor sgrol ba yis //
NK055(ri)001:6869: zhes pa dper na sgyu ma mkhan gyis sgyu ma'i
NK055(ri)001:6870: chu dang gru dang bsgral bya'i mi dang sgrol mkhan
NK055(ri)001:6871: du snang bar byas nas mi mang po bsgral ba
NK055(ri)001:6872: ltar snang ba'i dus su gzhan snang de kho na
NK055(ri)001:6873: ltar snang yang / sgyu ma mkhan po la rdul phra rab tsam yang ma grub pa bzhin du/
NK055(ri)001:6874: chu lta bu'i khams gsum 'khor ba las/
NK055(ri)001:6875: gru lta bu'i theg pa mtho dman rnams sbyar nas/
NK055(ri)001:6876: sgrol mkhan lta bu'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang bla mas/
NK055(ri)001:6877: lam pa rnams khams gsum las sgrol ba ltar snang
NK055(ri)001:6878: yang chos kyi dbyings kyi sems nyid ngang las byas
NK055(ri)001:6879: 'dzin ma grub pa ste gdul bya sgyu ma'i dkyil
NK055(ri)001:6880: 'khor/ 'khor ba chu lta bu las bsgral bya sgrol
NK055(ri)001:6881: byed ma dmigs pa ma grub pa'i dpe bzhin no
NK055(ri)001:6884: zhes pa gdul bya'i ngos nas gong du bstan pa bzhin bsgral bya sgrol byed mi dmigs kyang /
NK055(ri)001:6886: ces pa gdul bya'i ngos nas 'khor ba chu lta
NK055(ri)001:6887: bu las gdul bya sgyu ma'i skyes bu rnams 'khor
NK055(ri)001:6888: ba las sgrol zhing thar pa la 'god pa ltar
NK055(ri)001:6889: spyod pa ma 'gag par snang ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:6890: gzhal yas kyi ngo bo bstan pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:6891: ye shes rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor la //
NK055(ri)001:6893: chos thams cad gdod ma nas rnam par dag pa'i
NK055(ri)001:6894: ngo bo rang byung gi ye shes su rdzogs pa
NK055(ri)001:6895: la/ gang du yang ma grub cing cir yang snang
NK055(ri)001:6896: ba'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che dang
NK055(ri)001:6897: 'dra ba mtha' dbus gzhal du med de chos kyi
NK055(ri)001:6898: dbyings dang mnyam pa'i 'khor 'das thams cad kyi bzhugs
NK055(ri)001:6899: gnas kyi khang pa rgya che chung gang du yang
NK055(ri)001:6900: ma chad pa rang byung gi ye shes la ye
NK055(ri)001:6901: shes bzhi lhag pa'i rtags su 'og gzhi 'khor lo
NK055(ri)001:6902: lta bu ye nas bla na med pa'i dkyil 'khor
NK055(ri)001:6903: du lhun gyis grub pa la ni/
NK055(ri)001:6905: mig phye ba ni zhes pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:6906: thabs kyi theg pa 'di nyid kyi gzhung thos nas
NK055(ri)001:6907: khams gsum gyi chos thams cad rang byung gi ye
NK055(ri)001:6908: shes yin pa'i don blo'i yul du byas pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:6909: rdzogs pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs nas mig bye ba lta bu ste/
NK055(ri)001:6910: thos pa'i shes rab kyis yul lta ba don spyi yid kyi yul du byas pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:6911: bsam pa'i shes rab kyis thos pa'i don yang nas
NK055(ri)001:6912: yang du bsam ste tha snyad kyi rjes su 'brang
NK055(ri)001:6913: nas thos pa tha snyad kyi sgron mas/
NK055(ri)001:6914: don mun nag nang gi gser rnyed pa ltar bsam pa'i shes rab mthar phyin/
NK055(ri)001:6915: don rtogs pa gdengs su chud/
NK055(ri)001:6916: lta ba sems thog tu phebs pa ni dkyil 'khor mthong ba lta bu'o //
NK055(ri)001:6917: rig pa gdengs chud pa ni dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa lta bu'o //
NK055(ri)001:6918: bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor gyis zhes pa/
NK055(ri)001:6919: lta ba rtogs pa'i ngang la ma yengs par gnas te/
NK055(ri)001:6920: dus gsum du spyod lam bzhir ting nge 'dzin las
NK055(ri)001:6921: ma 'das par rtogs pa'i don la goms par byed
NK055(ri)001:6922: pa ni/ bsgom pa rang gi ngo bo rnal 'byor zhes bya ste/
NK055(ri)001:6923: dkyil 'khor du zhugs nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha dang
NK055(ri)001:6924: rnal 'byor pa dbyer med par byas pa lta bu'o
NK055(ri)001:6925: // dngos grub thob pa las mi 'da' ba ni/
NK055(ri)001:6926: rang byung kun ngam lhun gyis grub //
NK055(ri)001:6927: zhes pa bsgom pa la zhugs nas lam mthar phyin 'bras bu mngon du gyur pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:6928: rang byung ye shes kyi ngang la rgyan gyi 'khor lo nyi shu rtsa lnga rdzogs/
NK055(ri)001:6929: rang don lhun gyis grub pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:6930: gzhan don lhun gyis grub pa dus gcig pa ni sa bcu pas kyang mi reg pas kun ngam/
NK055(ri)001:6931: gzhan don yang gong du bstan pa bzhin ye shes
NK055(ri)001:6932: sngon du 'gro mi dgos par gang la gang 'dul
NK055(ri)001:6933: de la der ston du tha snyad du lhun gyis
NK055(ri)001:6934: grub ste/ tha snyad du dngos grub chen po lhun gyis grub ces bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:6935: de lta bu ni dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams
NK055(ri)001:6936: cad kyi ngo bo nyid yin pas bdag don dang
NK055(ri)001:6937: gzhan don gang yang de'i ngang las mi 'da' bas
NK055(ri)001:6938: na 'da' bar mi mdzad ces bya la/
NK055(ri)001:6939: 'da' bar mi mdzad pa'i rgyu ni ngo bo nyid kyi dam tshig gi mchog yin te/
NK055(ri)001:6940: dper na nam mkha'i mtha' thams cad dang bral ba
NK055(ri)001:6941: nyid las sprin dang khu rlangs dang 'ja' tshon thams
NK055(ri)001:6942: cad mi 'da' zhing dbyer med pa bzhin du lhun
NK055(ri)001:6943: gyis grub pa'i dam tshig go //
NK055(ri)001:6944: snod bzang pos mos pa'i yon tan ni/
NK055(ri)001:6945: gang zhig /ces pa rten gyi gang zag dbang po yang rab/
NK055(ri)001:6946: 'di la zhes pa dngos po ston pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:6947: rdzogs pa chen por 'jug pa'i thabs ma h+aa yo
NK055(ri)001:6948: ga rang gzhung gi rdzogs riim mngon du ma gyur
NK055(ri)001:6949: mos pa tsam byas pa'i yon tan yang /
NK055(ri)001:6950: bud+d+ha dkyil 'khor zhes pa nas tshigs brgyad kyis bstan te/
NK055(ri)001:6951: 'bru gnon sngar bstan pa bzhin no //
NK055(ri)001:6952: rdzogs rim 'di nyid rgyal ba'i gshegs shul yin par bstan pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:6953: 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu na //
NK055(ri)001:6954: zhes pa nas tshigs bzhis bstan to //
NK055(ri)001:6955: rnal 'byor pa'i lam yin pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:6956: 'byung dang ma 'ongs sogs tshigs gnyis kyis bstan to //
NK055(ri)001:6957: nges don rnyed dka' ba rin po che ltar bstan pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:6960: kun gyi phyag rgya chen po'i mchog gi bar tshigs drug gis bstan to //
NK055(ri)001:6962: thos bsam bsgom la rab sbyangs pa'i //
NK055(ri)001:6963: zhes pa nas tshigs bzhis bstan to //
NK055(ri)001:6966: zhes pa nas tshigs bzhi bstan to //
NK055(ri)001:6967: de dag gi 'bru gnon sngar bzhiin no //
NK055(ri)001:6968: le'u 'di dkyil 'khor bcu gnyis dang sbyar te bshad na/
NK055(ri)001:6969: lo rgyus kyi don ni 'bru gnon thams cad 'dra ba las/
NK055(ri)001:6970: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gcig tu 'dus pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:6971: gdul bya dbang po rab kyi don du dkyil 'khor
NK055(ri)001:6972: bcu gnyis kyi don bshad pa'i dgongs pa dbyer med
NK055(ri)001:6973: par gyur pa'o // lhun gyis grub pa'i dam tshig snying po sprin bkod pa/
NK055(ri)001:6975: lhun gyis grub pa ni chos thams cad ma 'dres
NK055(ri)001:6976: la yongs su rdzogs pa'i ngang la dkyil 'khor bcu
NK055(ri)001:6977: gnyis rang snang ba las mi 'da' bas dam tshig
NK055(ri)001:6978: /dkyil 'khor bcu gnyis rtogs dka' bas gsang ba/
NK055(ri)001:6979: 'khor 'das thams cad kyi rang bzhin snum byed yin pas snying po/
NK055(ri)001:6980: che ba'i yon tan sprin bkod pa ltar lhun gyis
NK055(ri)001:6981: grub pas sprin gdul bya'i ched du snyoms par zhugs
NK055(ri)001:6982: pa lta bu'o // gsang sngags kyi man ngag mdor bsdus pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:6983: 'di nyid go phye ba'i 'khor gyi ched du brjod pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:6984: ma rtogs pa yo ga man cha da kyi dkyil
NK055(ri)001:6985: 'khor bcu gnyis su dkri zhing drang ba'i thabs su
NK055(ri)001:6986: bstan pa ni/ ma rtogs pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:6988: de la ma rtogs pa ni phyal ba dang rgyang 'phen gnyis so //
NK055(ri)001:6989: log par rtogs pa ni mur rtugs pa dang mu stegs pa gnyis so //
NK055(ri)001:6990: phyogs tsam rtogs pa ni nyan thos dang rang rgyal ba dang byang chub sems dpa' dang /
NK055(ri)001:6992: zhar las byung ba u pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:6993: dgongs pa ting nge 'dzin gtsor byed pa yo ga ste/
NK055(ri)001:6994: thams cad mkhyen pas gsang sngags zab mo'i don rtogs par bya ba'i thabs kyi lam gyi rim pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:6996: rang bzhin gsang don gab sbas rdo rje slob dpon gyis 'byin par bstan pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:6997: ston pa kun tu bzang pos gsungs pa'i gsang sngags
NK055(ri)001:6998: ma h+aa yo ga'i sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin
NK055(ri)001:6999: las lnga'i rgyud rnams/ chos thams cad kyi khong na
NK055(ri)001:7000: gab pa rang bzhin gsang ba'i snying po bcu gnyis
NK055(ri)001:7001: kyi don rigs kyi bdag pos 'byin pa'i rjod byed
NK055(ri)001:7002: las lnga'i rgyud rnams/ kyi tshig rnams la/ thams cad
NK055(ri)001:7003: mkhyen pa'i thugs rjes sbas pa rnams ming tshig gi
NK055(ri)001:7004: tshogs rgyud kyi gzhung la brten pa'i tshig rnams kyis
NK055(ri)001:7005: las lnga'i rgyud rnams/ kyi tshig rnams la/ rab tu
NK055(ri)001:7006: mtshon te/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i thugs rjes dgongs pa'i
NK055(ri)001:7007: dbang gis don gab cing sbas pa rnams rgyud 'di'i
NK055(ri)001:7008: khong na gab pa'i don theg pa kun la mkhas
NK055(ri)001:7009: pa'i rdo rje slob dpon gyis 'byin te/
NK055(ri)001:7010: rgyud 'dis theg pa kun gyi don ston pa'i phyir ro //
NK055(ri)001:7011: de bas na rgyud dngos las kyang /
NK055(ri)001:7012: gsang ba'i snying po de kho na //
NK055(ri)001:7017: sna tshogs smra zhing don chen gsungs //
NK055(ri)001:7019: dkyil 'khor bcu gnyis mdor bstan pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:7021: zhes pas de bzhin nyid kyi dkyil 'khor bstan/
NK055(ri)001:7023: zhes pas rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor bstan/
NK055(ri)001:7025: zhes pas gzugs brnyan dang lhag pa gzugs brnyan gnyis/
NK055(ri)001:7027: zhes pas ting nge 'dzin dang lhag pa ting nge 'dzin gnyis bstan/
NK055(ri)001:7035: byang chub sems dang lhag pa byang chub sems gnyis/
NK055(ri)001:7036: dkyil 'khor mchog /ces pa lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
NK055(ri)001:7037: rgyud kyi dbu zhabs ma lus pa dkyil 'khor bcu gnyis su 'dus par bstan no //
NK055(ri)001:7038: de ston pa'i phyir le'u bcu gsum pa 'di la shin tu gsang ba'i man ngag ces brjod pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:7039: de la dkyil 'khor bcu gnyis las ni/
NK055(ri)001:7040: de bzhin nyid ni chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin te/
NK055(ri)001:7041: rnal ma don gyi kun gzhi chos thams cad rang snang ba yin kyang /
NK055(ri)001:7042: ngo bo spros pa dang bral ba 'khor 'das thams cad kyi rang bzhin no //
NK055(ri)001:7044: phyi nang gi chos thams cad rtog tshogs bzhi bcu
NK055(ri)001:7045: rtsa gnyis bsal spangs med par sku dang ye shes
NK055(ri)001:7046: su gsal ba 'bras bu'i dkyil 'khor lta bu'o //
NK055(ri)001:7049: ye shes kyi gzugs brnyan las/
NK055(ri)001:7050: dbyings kyi gzugs brnyan ni chos kyi dbyings mi 'gag pa'i rtsal las 'byung ba lnga dang /
NK055(ri)001:7051: 'byung ba lnga las gyur pa'i snod bcud thams cad do //
NK055(ri)001:7052: de chos kyi dbyings mi 'gag pa'i rtsal yin pas kyang gzugs brnyan/
NK055(ri)001:7053: de la brten te chos kyi dbyings rtogs pa mtshon
NK055(ri)001:7054: pa'i phyir gzugs brnyan te snod bcud kyi chos so
NK055(ri)001:7055: // ye shes kyi gzugs brnyan ni/
NK055(ri)001:7056: rang byung gi ye shes gcig mtshon pa'i rtags su/
NK055(ri)001:7057: rigs kyi bdag po drug pa/
NK055(ri)001:7058: ye shes lnga mtshon pa'i rtags su rigs lnga/
NK055(ri)001:7059: ye shes lnga re re'ang bzhi bzhir shar ba'i rtags
NK055(ri)001:7060: su rigs lnga re re la sems dpa' bzhi bzhis
NK055(ri)001:7062: lhag pa gzugs brnyan ni bsgrub pa'i bya byed kyis
NK055(ri)001:7063: lhag pa ste sku gsung thugs kyi gzugs brnyan ris
NK055(ri)001:7064: su bris pa/ lugs su blugs pa/
NK055(ri)001:7066: lhag pa rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor rnams so //
NK055(ri)001:7067: byang chub sems ni sems kyi rang bzhin ye shes lnga'i ngo bor gsal ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:7068: lhag pa byang chub sems ni/
NK055(ri)001:7069: thabs dang shes rab 'du 'phro las byung ba'i kun
NK055(ri)001:7070: rdzob byang chub sems rten dang brten du bcas pa'o
NK055(ri)001:7071: // lhag pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni sems kyi mtshan
NK055(ri)001:7072: nyid snang stong dbyer med pa phyogs 'dzin thams cad
NK055(ri)001:7073: dang bral ba de bzhin nyid do //
NK055(ri)001:7074: lhag pa ting nge 'dzin ni zhi khro'i dkyil 'khor rgyas bsdus kyi bye brag rnams so //
NK055(ri)001:7076: gdul bya'i don snang ba ma 'gag pa ste gnyis
NK055(ri)001:7077: su med pa'i thugs rje las gsum po dang ldan
NK055(ri)001:7082: sku gsung thugs bsam gyis mi khyab pas 'dul ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:7084: zag bcas kyis zag med bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir/
NK055(ri)001:7085: khams gsum gyi longs spyod thams cad gnyis med kyi
NK055(ri)001:7086: dgongs pas zag med kyi longs spyod du rol pa'o
NK055(ri)001:7088: dkyil 'khor bcu gcig po de'i nang du 'khor 'das kyi chos ma 'dus pa med pas/
NK055(ri)001:7089: de dag thams cad chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa chen
NK055(ri)001:7090: po las ma g.yos shing snang stong dbyer med pa
NK055(ri)001:7091: ni lhun grub kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
NK055(ri)001:7092: rgyas par bshad pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi dkyil 'khor ni/
NK055(ri)001:7093: gsang ba'i thig le'i dkyil 'khor dbyings //
NK055(ri)001:7094: zhes pa 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin rnal ma don gyi kun gzhi ni/
NK055(ri)001:7095: mi 'gag pa'i rtsal rang snang ba rtogs ma rtogs kyis 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad snang yang /
NK055(ri)001:7096: rang gi ngo bo nyid rtogs dka' bas gsang ba zhes bya ste/
NK055(ri)001:7097: 'khor ba'i chos thams cad de mi 'gag pa'i rtsal rang snang yang /
NK055(ri)001:7098: lhan cig skyes pa'i ma rig pas bsgribs pas zur
NK055(ri)001:7099: tsam yang ma mthong ba'i khams gsum 'khor ba rnam
NK055(ri)001:7101: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid yin kyang yul du ma dmigs shing /
NK055(ri)001:7102: rang gi rang bzhin yin te gsang ba zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:7103: de nyid rang gi ngo bo nyid la 'khor ba'i chos thams cad snang yang /
NK055(ri)001:7105: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dmigs pa med cing rang gi
NK055(ri)001:7106: ngo bo nyid la nam mkha' dang 'dra ste chung
NK055(ri)001:7107: ba'am mi gsal ba med pas spros pa rang dag
NK055(ri)001:7108: pa dang / 'das pa'i chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin yin yang /
NK055(ri)001:7109: dag pa dang gsal ba dang che ba lta bu'i
NK055(ri)001:7110: dmigs pa med cing phyogs su 'dzin pa'i spros pa
NK055(ri)001:7111: bral bas thig le zhes brjod do //
NK055(ri)001:7112: de nyid 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad rang snang
NK055(ri)001:7113: ba'i ngo bo nyid du bzhugs pas dbyings zhes bya
NK055(ri)001:7114: ste/ phyogs 'dzin gyi rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba dang /
NK055(ri)001:7115: chos thams cad la khyab pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:7116: cir yang 'char zhing mi 'gag pa'i bdag nyid du bzhugs pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:7117: btsal na ris su mi rnyed la/
NK055(ri)001:7118: dngos po thams cad la khyab pa'i phyir nges tshig 'grub la/
NK055(ri)001:7119: des ni dkyil 'khor bcu gnyis kyi yang rtsa ba rang snang bas dkyil 'khor dbyings zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:7121: 'byung ba shes rab rigs kyi yum //
NK055(ri)001:7123: 'byung ba ni nam mkha' chos thams cad mi 'gag pa'i gzhi yin pas/
NK055(ri)001:7124: de las 'byung ba bzhir snang ba ni snod bcud kyi chos thams cad snang bas 'byung ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:7125: des na 'byung ba lnga po nyid 'byung chung nyi shu rtsa lngas gzhig na rang bzhin med de/
NK055(ri)001:7126: spros pa'i mtha' dang bral ba ni shes rab ste/
NK055(ri)001:7127: chen po rigs te de bzhin te //
NK055(ri)001:7129: 'byung ba lnga rags pa rang snang ba phung po
NK055(ri)001:7130: lnga'i ngo bo ni ma 'gag pa thabs yab lnga'i
NK055(ri)001:7131: ngo bo'o // de dag re re bzhin ngo ti sprad pa ni shes rab bo //
NK055(ri)001:7132: de dag yab yum gyi skur ma 'gag pa ni sku'o //
NK055(ri)001:7133: skur snang tsam nyid na sems nyid du gsal ba
NK055(ri)001:7134: ni snang stong gi 'du shes thams cad dang bral
NK055(ri)001:7135: ba rang byung gi ye shes te/
NK055(ri)001:7136: sku dang ye shes su gsal ba ni bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kun la shes par bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:7137: de ltar 'byung ba phra rags rigs lnga yab yum
NK055(ri)001:7138: sku dang ye shes su lhun gyis grub pas de
NK055(ri)001:7139: gnyis su med par rang snang ba'i byang chub kyi
NK055(ri)001:7140: sems rang snang ba skye 'jig med pa rdo rje
NK055(ri)001:7141: lta bu'i lha tshogs rnams ni gang yin zhe na/
NK055(ri)001:7143: zhes pas dbang po bzhi yul drug dus bzhi //
NK055(ri)001:7145: zhes pa rnam shes drug /phyin ci log pa bzhi
NK055(ri)001:7146: rnams ni gong du phung po'i mtshan nyid bshad pa
NK055(ri)001:7147: ltar yul dang yul can 'dzom pa thams cad/
NK055(ri)001:7148: sems dpa' dang sems mar gsal ba gong du yang
NK055(ri)001:7149: yang bshad pa ltar shes pa nyid rang bzhin gyi
NK055(ri)001:7151: de yang rang bzhin gzhi'i dkyil 'khor ni/
NK055(ri)001:7152: chos thams cad ye nas rtog pa bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis nyid/
NK055(ri)001:7153: rgyal ba bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis sku dang ye shes ye nas yin pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:7155: lam gyi rkyen gyis mngon du snang ste/
NK055(ri)001:7156: rtog pa bsal ba yang med spangs pa med par rtog pa nyid rang sar dag nas/
NK055(ri)001:7157: sku dang ye shes gsal ba 'bras bu mthar phyin pa'i dkyil 'khor ni/
NK055(ri)001:7158: 'khor 'das gnyis rta rnga 'gres gang zhes kyang de la bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:7159: byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor ni/
NK055(ri)001:7160: kun tu bzang po'i dkyil 'khor la //
NK055(ri)001:7161: zhes pa gong du bshad pa ltar/
NK055(ri)001:7162: rtog pa bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis rang sar dag nas
NK055(ri)001:7163: sku dang ye shes bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis su lhun
NK055(ri)001:7165: gnyis 'dzin nam bye brag gi chos thams cad ma
NK055(ri)001:7166: spangs ngang gis dag pa la gnyis 'dzin mi mnga'
NK055(ri)001:7167: bas tha snyad du kun tu bzang po zhes bya'o
NK055(ri)001:7168: // yang tha snyad tsam dang bral ba'i ngang la snang stong dbyer med pas dkyil 'khor zhes bya ste/
NK055(ri)001:7169: rtogs pa'i rang bzhin de lta bu'i gzhi la/
NK055(ri)001:7170: thugs kyi ye shes lnga lta zhing //
NK055(ri)001:7171: zhes pa de lta bu'i gzhi rang byung gi ye
NK055(ri)001:7172: shes la rnal 'byor pas rang bzhin de nyid du
NK055(ri)001:7173: 'gyur ba med cing mtha' thams cad kyis stong pas
NK055(ri)001:7174: stong pa nyid kyi ye shes/
NK055(ri)001:7175: de nyid nyi tshe ba'i mtha' ma yin te rang gsal bas me long lta bu/
NK055(ri)001:7176: rang gsal nyid mi 'gag par cir yang 'char bas so sor rtogs pa/
NK055(ri)001:7177: 'char ba de nyid kyis gdul bya mtho dman gyi dgos pa skong bas bya ba grub pa/
NK055(ri)001:7178: mdzad pa ji ltar 'char yang chos kyi dbyings las 'gyur pa med pa mnyam pa nyid de/
NK055(ri)001:7179: dus gsum gyi bud+d+ha thams cad kyi thugs sems can
NK055(ri)001:7180: thams cad kyi sems ye shes lngar gsal ba ni
NK055(ri)001:7181: byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
NK055(ri)001:7182: lhag pa byang chub sems ni/
NK055(ri)001:7183: bdag nyid chen po lhag pa yi //
NK055(ri)001:7185: rnal 'byor pa'i dgongs pa thugs ye shes lnga dang
NK055(ri)001:7186: ldan pa nyid byang chub sems su lhun gyis grub
NK055(ri)001:7187: pa nyid ni/ chos thams cad de nyid gsal ba la zla dang bral bas kyang bdag nyid chen po/
NK055(ri)001:7188: mtshon bya don thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur pas kyang bdag nyid chen po/
NK055(ri)001:7189: thams cad dang bral bas gnyen po med pas kyang bdag nyid chen po/
NK055(ri)001:7191: zhes pa lhag pa byang chub kyi sems snang ba ste/
NK055(ri)001:7193: snying po thig le mnyam sbyor bas //
NK055(ri)001:7194: zhes pa yum byin gyis brlabsa pa'i pad+ma'i snying po dang /
NK055(ri)001:7195: yab byin gyis brlabsa pa'i byang chub sems kyi thig le/
NK055(ri)001:7196: byang chub kyi sems rdo rje nor bu'i rtse mor phyin pa'i dus su/
NK055(ri)001:7198: zhes pa 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad bde stong
NK055(ri)001:7199: gi ye shes kyi ngang du dbyer med cing snyoms
NK055(ri)001:7200: par 'jug pa'i ro mnyam par sbyor ba ni lhag
NK055(ri)001:7201: pa byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
NK055(ri)001:7203: bde ba'i ye shes rol mo yis //
NK055(ri)001:7205: snang ba rnam par 'byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin mngon
NK055(ri)001:7206: du gyur pa'i rnal 'byor pas gnas la sogs pa
NK055(ri)001:7207: cha rkyen thams cad tshogs par byas la/
NK055(ri)001:7208: skal ldan mi'i tshogs dkyil 'khor rgyas bsdus kyi grangs dang mnyam pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:7209: 'byor ldan yo byad kyi tshogs yo byad lnga la sogs pa thams cad tshogs par byas la/
NK055(ri)001:7210: bde ldan lha'i tshogs bsgoms nas yo byad la rol pa'i dus su/
NK055(ri)001:7212: lta spyod bsgom gsum mgo snyoms pas/
NK055(ri)001:7214: chos nyid la chos nyid rol nas tha mal pa'i
NK055(ri)001:7215: 'dzin pa'i 'du shes dag pa ni 'dzin pa'i zug
NK055(ri)001:7216: rngu med pas/ bde ba'i zhes pa bde ba'i longs spyod ces bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:7217: zug rngu dang bral ba'i gtan tshigs ni/
NK055(ri)001:7218: ye shes zhes bya ste lta spyod bsgoms gsum mgo snyoms pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:7219: rang byung gi ye shes mngon du gyur pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:7220: longs spyod thams cad kyi mchog yin pas mi zad/
NK055(ri)001:7222: zhes pa spyod pa'i dngos po rang snang ba mi
NK055(ri)001:7223: 'gag pa nyid lta bsgom gyi srog gis zin pas
NK055(ri)001:7224: gang du yang ma grub cing yang ma 'gag par
NK055(ri)001:7225: snang ba/ rol mo lta bu yis/
NK055(ri)001:7227: zhes pa rang byung gi ye shes mngon du gyur pa'i phyogs kyi bud+d+ha ma lus pa thams cad la/
NK055(ri)001:7228: dgongs pa mnyam pa nyid kyi ngang la mthar 'dzin phra ba'ang mi mnga' ba'i dgyes pa chen po la/
NK055(ri)001:7229: longs spyod lnga rigs lnga rang snang mthar 'dzin mi mnga'/
NK055(ri)001:7230: mnyes pa mchog gi mchod par 'bul ba ste/
NK055(ri)001:7231: 'bul ba rang gi ngo bo ni 'du shes thams cad dang bral ba'i mnyam pa nyid de/
NK055(ri)001:7232: dper na mi gcig zas skom gyis 'grangs nas tshim
NK055(ri)001:7233: ste skad cig ma gcig la btang snyoms su zhugs
NK055(ri)001:7234: pa lta bur phyogs 'dzin thams cad dang bral ba'i
NK055(ri)001:7235: rig pa mngon du gyur pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:7236: mchod pa phul zin dngos grub kyang mngon du gyur pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:7238: zag pa med pa'i bsod nams kyis //
NK055(ri)001:7240: zag pa med pa ni chos thams cad dang dbyer
NK055(ri)001:7241: med pa'i rang rig pa rang byung gi ye shes
NK055(ri)001:7242: ni dngos po thams cad dang bral te phyi dang
NK055(ri)001:7243: nang med/ 'khor 'das kyi 'dzin pa ma dmigs pa
NK055(ri)001:7244: thams cad bdag nyid chen por gyur kyang de tsam
NK055(ri)001:7245: du yang 'dzin pa med pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:7246: 'khor ba'i chos gtan nas dag pas zag pa med pa'i ngo bo ste/
NK055(ri)001:7248: zhes pa de nyid rang snang ba mi 'gag pa'i
NK055(ri)001:7249: bdag nyid chos thams cad kyi rgyu'i ngo bo nyid
NK055(ri)001:7250: du bzhugs pa ni/ bsod nams te/
NK055(ri)001:7251: bsod ni rang snang la phan pa'i bdag nyid/
NK055(ri)001:7253: rig pa de lta bu nyid rang snang ba'i/
NK055(ri)001:7254: ye shes sgyu ma rang snang ba //
NK055(ri)001:7256: zag med bsod nams rang snang ba'i ngo bo stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /
NK055(ri)001:7257: ye shes rang snang ba phyi nang gi rtog tshogs
NK055(ri)001:7258: thams cad snang stong dbyer med pa rol mo'i dkyil
NK055(ri)001:7259: 'khor mtha' yas mchog kun tu snang gi ting nge
NK055(ri)001:7260: 'dzin te/ rnal 'byor mchog gi thig le chen po'i ngang nyid la/
NK055(ri)001:7261: bsgom pa rnam gsum dus gcig rdzogs //
NK055(ri)001:7262: zhes pa cig car dbyer med bsgom pa ni mchog gi yul lo //
NK055(ri)001:7263: de tsam mi nus pas kyang de bzhin nyid kyi
NK055(ri)001:7264: ting nge 'dzin mnyam bzhag rig pa rang snang rjes
NK055(ri)001:7265: kyi shes pa ste gnyis ka ting nge 'dzin no
NK055(ri)001:7266: // lhag pa'i lhag pa ting nge 'dzin ni/
NK055(ri)001:7267: gsang ba'i thig le nyid kyi dbyings //
NK055(ri)001:7268: zhes pa rgyu'i yi ge las yab yum du gsal
NK055(ri)001:7269: nas gsang ba'i gnas gnyis byin gyis brlab pa'i rol
NK055(ri)001:7270: pa'i thig le nyid yum gyi mkha' la spros nas/
NK055(ri)001:7272: dbyings/ zhes pas dkyil 'khor thams cad bskyed pa'i rgyu'i ngo bo nyid de/
NK055(ri)001:7274: mkha' gsang byin gyis brlab ste yab yum rol pa'i thig le 'di ni/
NK055(ri)001:7275: yig 'bru las phyag mtshan las skur rdzogs te/
NK055(ri)001:7276: bud+d+ha bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kun gyi dngos gzhi yin la/
NK055(ri)001:7277: bud+d+ha thams cad der 'dus pas kun gyi dngos gzhi ste/
NK055(ri)001:7278: de la rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor du bsgoms pa ni bskyed tshul gyi rim pa rnams kyis lhag pas/
NK055(ri)001:7279: lhag pa ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor ro //
NK055(ri)001:7280: gzugs brnyan dang lhag pa gzugs brnyan gnyis thun mong du bstan pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:7281: phyogs bcu dus bzhi rdzogs pa yi //
NK055(ri)001:7282: zhes pa phyogs bcu dang dus bzhis bsdus pa'i log
NK055(ri)001:7283: rtog rang snang gi chos thams cad rang bzhin gyi
NK055(ri)001:7284: dkyil 'khor rtogs pa lhun grub kyi ngang la rang
NK055(ri)001:7285: bzhin 'bras bu mthar phyin pa'i dkyil 'khor du ma
NK055(ri)001:7286: 'dres la yongs su rdzogs pa'i don la bshad pa'i/
NK055(ri)001:7287: sku lnga gsung lnga thugs lnga yon tan lnga phrin
NK055(ri)001:7288: las lnga ma lus pa thams cad rang rig pa'i
NK055(ri)001:7289: mngon sum du bdag nyid kyis zhal mthong ba yang
NK055(ri)001:7290: yul dang yul can med par rang zhal rang gis
NK055(ri)001:7291: mthong ba ni/ rig pa snang stong dang bral ba nyid rang snang ba la dbang bsgyur ba ste/
NK055(ri)001:7292: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid mngon du gyur
NK055(ri)001:7293: pa mthar phyin pas ngos gzung thams cad dang bral
NK055(ri)001:7294: ba nyid do // de la gzugs brnyan dang lhag pa gzugs brnyan gnyis ka tshang ste/
NK055(ri)001:7295: rig pa byang chub kyi sems rang snang ba las
NK055(ri)001:7296: phyi nang gi rtog tshogs thams cad snang ba ni
NK055(ri)001:7297: dbyings kyi gzugs brnyan te dbyings nyid mi 'gag pa
NK055(ri)001:7298: mtshon pa dang / de dag la brten nas chos kyi dbyings mtshon pa'i phyir na gzugs brnyan no //
NK055(ri)001:7299: ye shes kyi gzugs brnyan ni rig pa rang byung
NK055(ri)001:7300: nyid mi 'gag pa'i rtsal las phung po 'byung ba
NK055(ri)001:7301: khams skye mched ji ltar snang yang /
NK055(ri)001:7302: rigs lnga yab yum sems dpa' sems mar gsal bas/
NK055(ri)001:7303: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor shar na mun pa gzhi dag
NK055(ri)001:7304: pa dang 'dra bas log rtog phra ba yang mi
NK055(ri)001:7305: gnas pa ni ye shes kyi gzugs brnyan no //
NK055(ri)001:7306: lhag pa gzugs brnyan ni ched du byas pa'i sku gsung thugs kyi gzugs brnyan te/
NK055(ri)001:7307: rigs lnga yab yum sems dpa' sems ma'i sku las
NK055(ri)001:7308: dang bya ba lhag pos byas pa'i rgyu mi 'dra
NK055(ri)001:7309: ba las dbyibs mi 'dra ba'i sku sna tshogs bzhengs
NK055(ri)001:7310: pa'o // de ni rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor rnams kyang yin te/
NK055(ri)001:7311: ye shes lnga mtshon pa'i phyir kha dog lnga'o //
NK055(ri)001:7314: ces pa la sogs pa snang stong dbyer med pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:7315: bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis sam snang ba rnam par 'byed pa'i dkyil 'khor la gnas te mngon du gyur nas/
NK055(ri)001:7316: bsgom bya sgom byed med par gdengs chud pa phyin chad nas mthar phyin pa'i bar du/
NK055(ri)001:7318: ces pa skyes bu de la phyogs bcu dus bzhi
NK055(ri)001:7319: bde gshegs ma lus pa thams cad lhun gyis grub
NK055(ri)001:7322: rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor lhun gyis grub //
NK055(ri)001:7323: zhes pa khams gsum gyi chos thams cad rang sar
NK055(ri)001:7324: dag nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
NK055(ri)001:7325: dkyil 'khor du lhun gyis grub pas mthar phyin pa
NK055(ri)001:7326: las ma gtogs pa'i 'khor ba dang lam gyi chos
NK055(ri)001:7327: tha snyad tsam yang mi gnas so //
NK055(ri)001:7328: rgyan du dkyil 'khor ma lus thogs //
NK055(ri)001:7329: zhes pa rtogs pa'i blo ngo la sku mi zad pa rgyan gyi 'khor lo/
NK055(ri)001:7330: gsung mi zad pa rgyan gyi 'khor lo/
NK055(ri)001:7331: thugs mi zad pa rgyan gyi 'khor lor khams gsum
NK055(ri)001:7332: gyi chos thams cad rang sar dag nas gsal ba
NK055(ri)001:7333: ni/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i bdag nyid la rgyu 'bras
NK055(ri)001:7334: dang bral ba'i tshul gyis rang snang bas ma lus
NK055(ri)001:7335: ni/ thogs zhes bya ste/ dkyil 'khor bcu gnyis kyang de'i ngang la rdzogs pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:7336: khams gsum gyi chos rang sar dag nas bud+d+ha tsam las kyang 'das te/
NK055(ri)001:7337: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su lhun gyis
NK055(ri)001:7338: grub pa ni lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor ro
NK055(ri)001:7339: // 'o na mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtha' 'ba' zhig tu gyur te/
NK055(ri)001:7340: 'khor ba ma grub pas thugs rje'i yul med par 'gag go zhe na/
NK055(ri)001:7341: thugs rje'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:7342: rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor mnyam sbyor bas //
NK055(ri)001:7343: zhes pa khams gsum gyi chos thams cad ma 'dres
NK055(ri)001:7344: la yongs su rdzogs pas lhag pa'i chos sku chen
NK055(ri)001:7345: po/ mnyam pa nyid kyi ngang du sbyor bas rang
NK055(ri)001:7346: ngo la 'khor ba ma dmigs kyang mnyam pa sbyor
NK055(ri)001:7347: ba chos sku'i ngang las ma rtogs pa'i 'khor ba
NK055(ri)001:7348: chos sku'i ngo bo nyid las rang gi rtogs pas
NK055(ri)001:7349: po/ 'khrul par snang ste/ dper na me long g.ya'
NK055(ri)001:7350: dag pa las gzugs brnyan 'char ba me long las
NK055(ri)001:7351: ma g.yos kyang gzugs brnyan gsal ba bzhin no //
NK055(ri)001:7352: thugs rje chen po'i 'brel ba yang yin no //
NK055(ri)001:7353: gdul bya nyid las mi gzhan pa yang mnyam sbyor
NK055(ri)001:7354: te gdul bya chos sku las ma g.yos par gdul
NK055(ri)001:7355: bya'i rgyud mkhyen bya mkhyen byed kyi rtog pa las
NK055(ri)001:7356: grol ba ni ji lta ba mkhyen pa zhes bya'o
NK055(ri)001:7357: // ye shes gnyis rim par smos kyang cig car du rdzogs pa ni dbyer med pa mkhyen pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:7359: zhes pa gnyis su med pa'i thugs rje sems can
NK055(ri)001:7360: thams cad la ye khyab tu yod pa'i gzhi las
NK055(ri)001:7361: gdul bya'i ngor thugs rje gsum yang rdzogs te/
NK055(ri)001:7363: zhes rtsa ba dngos po thams cad dang bral ba
NK055(ri)001:7364: las zag pa med pa mthar thug pa med par
NK055(ri)001:7365: 'byung ba dang / sngon 'gro rjes 'jug med par rang snang ba dang /
NK055(ri)001:7366: 'du shes thams cad dang bral bar snang ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:7368: phyogs bcu dus bzhi 'dul ba'i mgon //
NK055(ri)001:7370: gnas kyi ngos nas phyogs bcu dus bzhis bsdus pa'i
NK055(ri)001:7371: 'gro ba rigs drug gi log rtog rang snang gi
NK055(ri)001:7372: dkyil 'khor ma lus pa rnams 'dul byed sangs rgyas
NK055(ri)001:7373: kyi sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor ma lus pas log rtog
NK055(ri)001:7374: gzung 'dzin rnams 'dul zhing 'gro ba rnams kyi mgon
NK055(ri)001:7375: du gyur/ gzugs sku ji snyed pa rnams kyis gdul bya sgyu ma ste/
NK055(ri)001:7377: rde'u dang sngags dang sgyu ma'i rdzas la sgyu ma'i mkhan pos ltad mo ba'i ngo la/
NK055(ri)001:7380: bud med kyi tshogs su snang yang sgyu ma mkhan po las de dag ma grub pa bzhin/
NK055(ri)001:7381: 'dir 'gro ba drug gi rgyud lhan cig skyes pa'i ma rig pa dang kun brtags gnyis las/
NK055(ri)001:7382: rkyen las dang nyon mongs pa sbyar nas/
NK055(ri)001:7383: 'bras bu sgyu ma ltar 'gro ba drug tu snang yang ma grub pa bzhin/
NK055(ri)001:7384: 'dul byed sgyu ma log rtog gi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs sgrol ba ni/
NK055(ri)001:7385: thams cad mkhyen pa'i thabs khyad par can sku dang thugs kyi dkyil 'khor/
NK055(ri)001:7386: sku gsung thugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:7389: zhes pa gong du thugs rje'i skabs su bshad pa
NK055(ri)001:7390: bzhin gdul bya rang las mi gzhan bzhin bya ba
NK055(ri)001:7391: dang byed pa'i 'du shes med par gdul bya'i dkyil
NK055(ri)001:7392: 'khor 'dul ba'i thabs kyi rang snang ba la ni
NK055(ri)001:7393: spyod ces bya ste/ de ni 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
NK055(ri)001:7394: mos pa'i yon tan gyi 'thad pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:7395: ye shes rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor la //
NK055(ri)001:7396: zhes pa kun gzhi kun tu bzang mo de nyid yid kun tu bzang pos rtogs nas/
NK055(ri)001:7397: yid dang kun gzhi dbyer med pa'i rang byung gi ye shes mi 'gags pa'i ngang las/
NK055(ri)001:7398: 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad ma 'dres la yongs
NK055(ri)001:7399: su rdzogs pa yid dgongs pa nyid gdul bya blo
NK055(ri)001:7400: mchog gi don du/ dkyil 'khor bcu gnyis su gsal ba/
NK055(ri)001:7402: thos bsam bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor gyis //
NK055(ri)001:7404: thos pa'i shes rab bsam pa'i shes bsgom pa'i shes rab gsum gyis snod kyi skyon bzhi spangs te/
NK055(ri)001:7405: rdzogs chen gyi skabs su bshad pa ltar gyi dkyil
NK055(ri)001:7406: 'khor bcu gnyis kyi don mnyam par sbyor ba'i rnal
NK055(ri)001:7407: 'byor gyis/ rang byung dkyil 'khor bcu gnyis kyi don mngon du gyur pa mthar phyin nas/
NK055(ri)001:7409: zhes pa dgongs pa'i ngo bo nyid la bstod cing ngam pa phun sum tshogs te/
NK055(ri)001:7410: dkyil 'khor bcu gnyis kyi don ma 'dres yongs su rdzogs par lhun gyis grub pa 'di ni/
NK055(ri)001:7411: bud+d+ha thams cad kyi ngo bo rgyal ba kun tu
NK055(ri)001:7412: bzang po yang de'i ngo bo nyid yin pas 'da'
NK055(ri)001:7413: bar mi mdzad de/ ci'i phyir na/
NK055(ri)001:7414: nam mkha' nam mkha' las mi 'da' ba dang 'dra bar dam tshig mchog go //
NK055(ri)001:7418: sbyangs bsags mchog tu gyur pa'i skyes bu gang zhig don dkyil 'khor bcu gnyis dang /
NK055(ri)001:7419: rjod byed kyi tshig gsang ba'i snying po la mos pa'i skyes bu la/
NK055(ri)001:7420: phyogs bcu na bzhugs shing dus bzhir gshegs pa'i bud+d+ha'i
NK055(ri)001:7421: dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi phyogs bcu dus bzhi kun
NK055(ri)001:7422: nas kun tu/ rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus pa bsnyen pa yin pas/
NK055(ri)001:7423: nye ba'i sras su dgongs par 'gyur //
NK055(ri)001:7424: zhes pa rgyu'i theg pa chen po las nye ba'i tshe gcig bud+d+ha ba'i sras dam par dgongs par 'gyur/
NK055(ri)001:7425: rnyed dka' ba'i gtan tshigs ni/
NK055(ri)001:7426: bskal pa zhing gi rdul snyed du //
NK055(ri)001:7427: zhes pa la sogs pa tshigs bzhis ston to //
NK055(ri)001:7430: 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu na //
NK055(ri)001:7432: btsal kyang rgyal bas mi rnyed do //
NK055(ri)001:7433: zhes pa'i bar gyis ston te/
NK055(ri)001:7435: zhes pa dkyil 'khor bcu gnyis kyi don no //
NK055(ri)001:7438: dkyil 'khor bcu gnyis kyi don 'di yis/
NK055(ri)001:7439: dkyil 'khor bcu gnyis kyi don 'di ni gsang chen nges pa zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:7440: dkyil 'khor bcu gnyis kyi don 'di las ma gtogs pa'i/
NK055(ri)001:7441: gsang ba'i nges don logs na med //
NK055(ri)001:7443: 'di gtad pa'i snod kyi mtshan nyid bzang po ni/
NK055(ri)001:7444: kun gyi phyag rgya chen po'i mchog /ces pa nas tshigs drug gis bstan te/
NK055(ri)001:7448: ces pa bud+d+ha thams cad dbyer med pa'i rgyal ba drug pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:7449: de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la/
NK055(ri)001:7450: zhes pa go phye ba'i 'khor phyis 'byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la/
NK055(ri)001:7451: lam nyams su len zhing 'bras bu la sbyor ba'i ched du brjod do //
NK055(ri)001:7452: gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/
NK055(ri)001:7453: shin tu gsang ba man ngag gi le'u zhes pa/
NK055(ri)001:7454: rgyud kyi don gdams ngag lnga po de yo ga
NK055(ri)001:7455: phyin chad kyi spyod yul du ma gyur pas gsang
NK055(ri)001:7456: ba/ ma h+aa yo gar zhugs pa yang dbang po
NK055(ri)001:7457: rab kyi spyod yul yin pas kyang shin tu gsang
NK055(ri)001:7458: ba/ ba/ rgyud kyi gzhung na don tshang bar yod
NK055(ri)001:7459: kyang bla ma dgongs nyams dang ldan pa la ma
NK055(ri)001:7460: bsten par mi rtogs pas kyang shin tu gsang ba'o
NK055(ri)001:7461: ba/ ba/ // man ngag ni bung chung ba la don che/
NK055(ri)001:7462: don thog tu phebs nas 'bras bu la sbyor ba
NK055(ri)001:7463: the tshom mi za ba ste gdams ngag lnga po
NK055(ri)001:7464: gang yang rnal 'byor pas nyams su blangs na/
NK055(ri)001:7465: tshe gcig gis 'bras bu la sbyor ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:7466: de dag gzhung skyong ba'i le'u bcu gsum pa'i bshad pa'o////le'u bcu bzhi pa bstod pa la/
NK055(ri)001:7467: rgyud gsum las na lam gyi rgyud/
NK055(ri)001:7468: rten gyi gang zag las na dbang po rab 'bring gi spyod yul/
NK055(ri)001:7469: rgyud kyi dngos po bcu las na mchod pa/
NK055(ri)001:7471: le'u bdun pa sku'i dkyil 'khor la mchod pa 'bul dgos pas der 'brel ba dang /
NK055(ri)001:7472: tshogs kyi bsgrub pa le'u gnyis kyis ston pa'i glu ye shes kyi mchod pa bstan to //
NK055(ri)001:7473: de yang lam pa'i ngos nas de ltar yin kyang /
NK055(ri)001:7474: gnas tshul gyi ngos nas sku lnga 'bras bu mthar phyin pa yin pas rgyud gsum na 'bras bu'i rgyud/
NK055(ri)001:7475: lam pa mthar lam pa'i spyod yul/
NK055(ri)001:7476: dkyil 'khor bcu gnyis na rang bzhin 'bras bu mthar phyin pa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
NK055(ri)001:7477: de yang dkyil 'khor la sku lnga'i sgo nas bstod pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:7478: chos thams cad sku lnga'i ngo bor bzhugs pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:7479: spyir yon tan med kyang yon tan shob pa ni sgro btags pa/
NK055(ri)001:7480: yon tan yod kyang bcad nas skyon brjod pa ni skur pa/
NK055(ri)001:7481: 'dir yon tan ji lta bar bzhugs bzhin du brjod pa bstod pa kho na ste/
NK055(ri)001:7482: de yang rgyud kyi gzhung gi bstod pa ni dang po'i 'grel brtsi na/
NK055(ri)001:7483: rgyud kyi gzhung dang po 'khor gyis zhus na phyis bstod pa yang 'khor gyis byed/
NK055(ri)001:7484: dang po yum gyis zhus na phyis yum gyis bstod pa yin te/
NK055(ri)001:7485: 'dir rgyud zab pas 'khor gyis zhu ma nus nas/
NK055(ri)001:7486: ston pa yab yum gyis gleng bslang ste/
NK055(ri)001:7487: le'u gsham rnams na ched du brjod ces pa'i mtshan nyid do //
NK055(ri)001:7489: dgyes pa'i glung blang ba zhes pa/
NK055(ri)001:7490: rang la rang bstod du brjod pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:7491: de yang 'khor 'das dbyer med pa'i bdag nyid/
NK055(ri)001:7492: drug pa kun tu bzang po'i ngo bo nyid/
NK055(ri)001:7493: longs spyod chen po lhun gyis grub pa mi 'gyur ba g.yung drung gi dkyil 'khor la/
NK055(ri)001:7494: rgyu rkyen dang bral bar lhun gyis grub pa'i rang
NK055(ri)001:7495: snang gi 'phro ba'i sprul pas ngo bo nyid kyis
NK055(ri)001:7496: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i phrin las rang shar bas lhun
NK055(ri)001:7497: grub kyi mdzad pa la dgyes pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:7500: zhes pa la sogs kyis tshig gi de ma thag pa ni bcu gsum pa nyid do //
NK055(ri)001:7501: don gyi de ma thag pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:7502: dkyil 'khor bkod ye shes bstim nas/
NK055(ri)001:7503: mchod pa la bab pa'i dus su mchod par 'brel to //
NK055(ri)001:7504: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni gleng gzhi'i dus su lhan cig pa'i gtso 'khor thams cad do //
NK055(ri)001:7505: rnal 'byor pas nyams su blangs pa'i dus su/
NK055(ri)001:7506: dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo rgyas 'bring gang yin pa'i lha gtso 'khor spyi ste/
NK055(ri)001:7507: 'di nye bar na bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis su kun 'dus pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:7508: de yang glu dngos la yang tshigs bcad lnga dang /
NK055(ri)001:7509: bsdus pa drug tu brjod bya rjod byed thams cad 'dus pa'i phyir ro //
NK055(ri)001:7511: zhes pa 'khor thams cad ngo bo nyid sku lngar 'dus la/
NK055(ri)001:7512: de'i rjod byed glu'i tshig gis don sku lnga dbyer
NK055(ri)001:7513: med pa'i ngo bo mtshon pa ltar bzhugs pa glu
NK055(ri)001:7514: brjod pa nyid kyi sgras rig pa la gsal bar
NK055(ri)001:7515: snang ba nyid la phyogs 'dzin gyi chos phra ba'ang
NK055(ri)001:7516: mi mnga' ba ni dgyes pa zhes bya ste/
NK055(ri)001:7517: mnyam pa nyid kyi rang gi ngo bo'o //
NK055(ri)001:7518: chen po ni dgyes pa thams cad dbyer med pa'i bdag nyid do //
NK055(ri)001:7519: 'on kyang lam pa bzhin glu'i rkyen gyis bskur nas gzod don gsal ba lta bu ni ma yin te/
NK055(ri)001:7520: nam mkha' lta bu'i phyir ye nas de nyid yin pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:7521: 'on kyang gdul bya'i snang ba tsam 'gog pa'ang ma yin no //
NK055(ri)001:7523: phyogs bcu dus bzhi rdzogs pa yi //
NK055(ri)001:7524: zhes pa la sogs pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:7525: spyir phyogs dus kyi bud+d+ha thams cad kyi sku la bstod/
NK055(ri)001:7526: sgos su rnam snang lta bu ste/
NK055(ri)001:7528: glu ye shes kyi rgyan zhes bya ste/
NK055(ri)001:7529: drang srong gi rjes su 'brangs pa'i glu ste/
NK055(ri)001:7530: chos thams cad ye shes lnga'am sku lnga nyid ye shes lnga'i ngo bor rdzogs pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:7531: dang po'i tshig 'dis sku lnga las na/
NK055(ri)001:7532: mngon par byang chub pa'i sku bstan te/
NK055(ri)001:7533: 'jig rten gyi khams mthar thug pa med pa'i phyogs
NK055(ri)001:7534: bcu dang dus bzhis bsdus pa'i chos thams cad rang
NK055(ri)001:7535: rig pa byang chub kyi sems g.yos te dbyer med/
NK055(ri)001:7536: mnyam pa nyid kyi ngang du lhun gyis grub pas
NK055(ri)001:7537: rdzogs pa'i ngo bo la snang ba'i dngos po ma
NK055(ri)001:7539: chos kyi dbyings nam mkha' ltar lhun gyis grub/
NK055(ri)001:7540: stong pa'i ngo bo ma dmigs te chu zla bzhin
NK055(ri)001:7541: sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid rang gsal bas rang rig pa'i
NK055(ri)001:7542: mngon sum du yongs su rdzogs pa ni mngon par
NK055(ri)001:7544: ye shes dkyil 'khor thig le che //
NK055(ri)001:7545: zhes pa rang byung gi ye shes gsal la mi
NK055(ri)001:7546: 'gag pa la sogs pa'i ye shes lnga'i 'khor dang
NK055(ri)001:7549: zhes pas ngo bo rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes su gsal zhing lhun gyis grub ste/
NK055(ri)001:7550: de'i ngang la phyogs 'dzin gyi tha snyad ma spangs
NK055(ri)001:7551: ngang gis dag pa ni spros pa dang bral bas
NK055(ri)001:7552: thig le ste/ che ba ni 'khor 'das kyi chos
NK055(ri)001:7553: thams cad de nyid du dbyer med cing rig pa
NK055(ri)001:7554: rang gsal khyab bdal chen po'i ngo bor gnas pa
NK055(ri)001:7557: bsod nams ni lhun gyis grub cing gang yang ma spangs pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:7558: yul drug 'dod yon lnga'i dngos po thams cad rang rig pa nyid snang /
NK055(ri)001:7560: yul dang yul can med par lhun gyis grub pa
NK055(ri)001:7561: nyid la bdag tu 'dzin pa phra ba'ang med pas
NK055(ri)001:7562: spangs bsgrub kyi mtha' dang bral ba ni/
NK055(ri)001:7563: zag pa med pa'i bsod nams rang snang ba'i ngo bo ste/
NK055(ri)001:7564: rang rig pa mtha' dang bral ba'i dkyil la rang
NK055(ri)001:7565: snang mi 'gag pa'i 'khor gyis bskor bas 'khor 'das
NK055(ri)001:7566: dbyer med pa ni theg pa 'di nyid kyi longs
NK055(ri)001:7567: sku chen po'o // sku yi tshogs/
NK055(ri)001:7568: zhes pa dag snang gi ngo la snang ba'i gzugs sku thams cad de/
NK055(ri)001:7569: tshogs mang po'i sgras zag med kyi lam pa rnams
NK055(ri)001:7570: la 'og min gyi rnam snang chen po la sogs
NK055(ri)001:7571: te longs sku'i bye brag thams cad snang /
NK055(ri)001:7572: mos pa spyod pa 'gro drug gi sa pa rnams
NK055(ri)001:7573: la sprul pa'i sku b+ha ga w+aan snang ba yang
NK055(ri)001:7574: / gling bzhi bye ba phrag brgya na sprul pa bye ba phrag brgya snang ba dang /
NK055(ri)001:7575: gzugs khams pa la tshangs pa lta bu dang /
NK055(ri)001:7576: 'dod khams pa la brgya byin lta bu dang /
NK055(ri)001:7577: lha ma yin la thag zangs ris lta bu dang /
NK055(ri)001:7578: mi la 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po la sogs pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:7579: dud 'gro la seng ge yi dam brtan pa lta bu nyid de/
NK055(ri)001:7580: nang tshan mi 'dra ba sna tshogs pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:7581: yi dwags la kha 'bar ma dang /
NK055(ri)001:7582: dmyal ba la chos kyi rgyal po la sogs pa ste sprul sku kho na'o //
NK055(ri)001:7583: nang stong thig le kun tu rdzogs //
NK055(ri)001:7584: zhes pa phyi nang gi chos dang sku lngar phyes pa thams cad ngo bo ma 'gag par snang /
NK055(ri)001:7585: gang du'ang ma grub pas stong /
NK055(ri)001:7586: me long dang gzugs brnyan ltar snang stong gnyis su
NK055(ri)001:7587: mi phyed cing mtshon pa'i tha snyad dang bral ba'i
NK055(ri)001:7588: don gyis 'gro ba'i don ji ltar mdzad na yang
NK055(ri)001:7589: nam mkha' la rdul mi chags pa dang 'dra bas
NK055(ri)001:7590: 'dzin pa'i mthas mi gos shing ngo bo la 'gyur
NK055(ri)001:7591: ba med pa ste/ mtha' bral gyi ngo bo nyid la mtha'i spros pa mi mnga' bas thig le/
NK055(ri)001:7592: phyi nang gi chos thams cad de las mi 'da'
NK055(ri)001:7593: ba'i ngang du lhun gyis grub pas kun tu rdzogs
NK055(ri)001:7594: zhes bya'o // hohzhesa pa de ltar sku lnga la bstod pa'i sgo nas de'i don gyis mnyes pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:7595: hohzhesa bya ba ste dgyes pa'i bdag nyid do //
NK055(ri)001:7596: gsung lnga la bstod pa ni //
NK055(ri)001:7597: rdo rje bsod nams thig le che //
NK055(ri)001:7598: zhes pa spyir bde gshegs thams cad kyi gsung la bstod/
NK055(ri)001:7599: khyad par du gsung snang ba mtha' yas la bstod pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:7600: gsung lnga la bstod pa'i mgo 'dren/
NK055(ri)001:7601: rdo rje ni 'khor 'das dbyer med pa'i rig pa rang byung gi ye shes/
NK055(ri)001:7602: ngo bo 'gyur ba med pa rdo rje lta bu/
NK055(ri)001:7603: chos thams cad de nyid kyi ngang du 'joms pas rdo rje lta bu/
NK055(ri)001:7604: mi phyed pa dang 'joms pa gnyis rang bzhin ngang nas dbyer med pas rdo rje lta bu'o //
NK055(ri)001:7606: zhes pa rang rig pa rang byung gi ye shes rdo rje lta bu mi 'gag pa'i ngang las/
NK055(ri)001:7607: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ste sa la gnas pa'i
NK055(ri)001:7608: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngo la gang yang
NK055(ri)001:7609: ma spangs pa longs sku chen po nyid kyi tshig
NK055(ri)001:7610: gis gsung ba mi mnga' yang /
NK055(ri)001:7611: sku dang thugs gnyis kyi sgo nas byang chub sems
NK055(ri)001:7612: dpa' rnams kyi shes bya'i sgrib pa sbyong bar byed
NK055(ri)001:7613: pa me long lta ba'i gsung gis dgongs pa brda
NK055(ri)001:7614: sprod par byed pa ni longs spyod pa'i gsung ngo
NK055(ri)001:7616: zhes pa chos kyi sku'i gsung skye med don gyi
NK055(ri)001:7617: gsung ste 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad kyi rang
NK055(ri)001:7618: bzhin skye ba med pa'i don nyid/
NK055(ri)001:7619: sa bcu pa yan chad kyi spyod yul du chos
NK055(ri)001:7620: sku skye ba med pa'i ngo bo 'byung 'jug med
NK055(ri)001:7621: par go zhing brda 'phrod par byed pa la mi
NK055(ri)001:7622: 'gag pa'i ngos nas skye med don gyi gsung zhes
NK055(ri)001:7623: bya'o // rdo rje ye shes dkyil 'khor ldan //
NK055(ri)001:7624: zhes pa rang rig pa rang byung gi ye shes
NK055(ri)001:7625: gnyis 'dzin gyi tha snyad dag pa la ni mi
NK055(ri)001:7626: phyed pa'i don gyi rdo rje zhes brjod la/
NK055(ri)001:7627: ye shes ni rang rig pa'i ye shes ye shes lnga dang ldan pas na dkyil 'khor/
NK055(ri)001:7628: des snod bcud bem rig thams cad la khyab pa'i ngo bor bzhugs pa ni ldan pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:7629: de'i byin rlabs dang snang ba don mngon du gyur
NK055(ri)001:7630: pa'i rnal 'byor pa la phyi nang gi chos thams
NK055(ri)001:7631: cad ye shes lnga'i ngang du gsal bar byed pa
NK055(ri)001:7632: ni/ mngon par byang chub pa'i sku rig pa byin rlabs kyi gsung ngo //
NK055(ri)001:7633: rig pa byin rlabs kyi gsung de'i byin rlabs kyis
NK055(ri)001:7634: 'khrul chos thams cad dpyad mi dgos par rig pa
NK055(ri)001:7635: la brda 'phrod pa yang de'i rtsal lo //
NK055(ri)001:7636: rdo rje sgra chen mtha' yas pa //
NK055(ri)001:7637: zhes pa rdo rje ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes/
NK055(ri)001:7638: sgra che ba ni ngo bo nyid kyi gsung snod
NK055(ri)001:7639: bcud kyi chos thams cad la chos kyi skus ma
NK055(ri)001:7641: de'i rtsal rang snang ba bem rig gi sgra mi
NK055(ri)001:7642: 'gags pa'i rtsal dngos po thams cad brda 'phrod par
NK055(ri)001:7643: byed pa yin la/ de'i nang du dag snang gi
NK055(ri)001:7644: sprul pa'i sku'i gsung yan lag sum brgya drug cu
NK055(ri)001:7645: 'gro ba rigs drug gi skad dang mthun pa sna
NK055(ri)001:7646: tshogs pa cir yang snang ba ni/
NK055(ri)001:7647: sprul skus brjod pa tshig gi gsung ngo //
NK055(ri)001:7648: rdo rje rgyal po thig le che hoh /zhes pa
NK055(ri)001:7649: rdo rje ni gsung gi rang bzhin dbyer med kyi
NK055(ri)001:7650: ye shes so // rgyal po ni dper na rgyal
NK055(ri)001:7651: po thams cad la dbang che zhing thams cad mngar
NK055(ri)001:7652: 'dus pa bzhin du gnyis su med pa'i ye shes
NK055(ri)001:7653: la rig pa rang dbang sgyur bas mtha' gnyis kyi
NK055(ri)001:7655: thig le ni phyogs 'dzin gyi spros pa thams cad ma spangs ngang gis dag pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:7656: de ni snang stong dbyer med rdo rje'i gsung /
NK055(ri)001:7657: grags stong dbyer med kyi don gyis chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:7658: ho de'i don gyis mnyes pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:7660: sku gsung thugs kyi rdzogs pa che //
NK055(ri)001:7663: sku me long lta bu'i ye shes te/
NK055(ri)001:7664: thams cad kyi rten byed pa'i phyir na sku'o //
NK055(ri)001:7665: de bzhin du me long lta bu'i ye shes kyang gsal la mi 'gag pa'i ngo bor bzhugs pas/
NK055(ri)001:7666: bud+d+ha thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rten gyi bdag nyid do //
NK055(ri)001:7667: me long lta bu'i ye shes ma 'gag pa rnam
NK055(ri)001:7668: par snang mdzad du snang bas kyang sku mtshon no
NK055(ri)001:7669: // gsung ni so sor rtogs pa'i ye shes te/
NK055(ri)001:7670: gsung ni dngos po thams cad brda sprod cing rig pa la 'jal bar byed/
NK055(ri)001:7671: cir yang ma 'gag par grags kyang /
NK055(ri)001:7672: dngos po thams cad dang bral ba bzhin so sor
NK055(ri)001:7673: rtogs pa'i ye shes kyang me long lta bu mi
NK055(ri)001:7675: mi 'gag pa cir yang snang ba gdul bya rnams
NK055(ri)001:7676: kyi rgyud dus bzhi thog mtha' gang la gang 'dul
NK055(ri)001:7677: de la der ston rang gsal bar lhun gyis grub
NK055(ri)001:7678: pa nyid ji snyed mkhyen pa/
NK055(ri)001:7679: ngo bo chos kyi dbyings las ma g.yos pa ni ji lta ba mkhyen pa/
NK055(ri)001:7680: mkhyen pa gnyis kyi mtha' gnyis kyi skyon dang bral zhing skyon gyis ma gos pas gsung zhes bya la/
NK055(ri)001:7681: de nyid skur snang ba'i dus na gsung chos kyi rigs snang ba mtha' yas su snang ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:7682: thugs ni stong pa nyid ye shes te/
NK055(ri)001:7683: thams cad mkhyen pa'i thugs ni snang stong gi mtha' dang bral/
NK055(ri)001:7684: chos thams cad la bsnol ba med par khyab/
NK055(ri)001:7685: btsal na ris su mi rnyed de/
NK055(ri)001:7686: de bzhin du stong pa chen po'i ye shes kyang dus gsum du mi 'gyur/
NK055(ri)001:7687: chos thams cad la bsgos pa med par khyab/
NK055(ri)001:7688: snang stong gi skyon dang bral ba ste ye shes thams cad kyi yang gazhi'am rtsa ba lta bu'o //
NK055(ri)001:7690: zhes pas chos thams cad ma 'gag pa sku/
NK055(ri)001:7692: dbyer med pa thugs su rdzogs pa'i bdag nyid las gzhan ma yin pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:7693: che ba ni thams cad de nyid du gsal ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:7695: zhes pas mnyam pa nyid ye shes ni stong pa
NK055(ri)001:7696: chen po'i ngang las ye shes bzhir snang yang mnyam
NK055(ri)001:7697: nyid ye shes de dag tu song ba med de/
NK055(ri)001:7698: stong pa nyid las ma g.yos pa ye shes bzhi'i phyogs su song ba med/
NK055(ri)001:7699: ye shes bzhir ma 'gag pas stong pa nyid kyi
NK055(ri)001:7700: phyogs su song ba med pa'i phyogs 'dzin thams cad
NK055(ri)001:7701: dang bral ba mnyam pa nyid de/
NK055(ri)001:7702: gang gi yang phyogs su ma song ba'i bdag nyid
NK055(ri)001:7703: nam mkha' lta bu phyogs thams cad par lhun gyis
NK055(ri)001:7704: grub ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i che ba'i yon tan cir yang 'char ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:7705: de nyid skur snang ba'i dus na rin chen 'byung ldan te mnyam nyid ye shes zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:7706: phrin las ni bya grub ye shes te/
NK055(ri)001:7707: thams cad mkhyen pa'i phrin las kyi 'gro don ci ltar mdzad kyang /
NK055(ri)001:7708: yul dang yul can dbyer med kyi ngang las don
NK055(ri)001:7709: thams cad lhun gyis grub pa ni gnyis su med
NK055(ri)001:7710: pa'i mdzad pa ste bud+d+ha'i phrin las kyi ngo bo'o
NK055(ri)001:7712: zhes pa dus dang gnas skabs kun du gdul bya'i
NK055(ri)001:7713: don mi mdzad pa'i dus kyang med la lhun grub
NK055(ri)001:7714: tu rdzogs te/ kun tu rdzogs zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:7715: de yang glo bur du grub pa ma yin te/
NK055(ri)001:7716: ye'am thog ma nas chos thams cad ye shes lnga
NK055(ri)001:7717: ru byas pa med par rang snang du lhun gyis
NK055(ri)001:7718: rdzogs te/ de'i ngang la ye shes lnga ma gtogs
NK055(ri)001:7719: pa'i tha snyad mi gnas la zla bral bas ye
NK055(ri)001:7720: shes lnga'i dag brtags kyang ma dmigs pa la ni
NK055(ri)001:7721: mnyam pa nyid kyi ngang ste tha snyad tsam du
NK055(ri)001:7722: kun tu bzang po zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:7724: 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad thugs rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes su 'dus la/
NK055(ri)001:7725: de nyid kyang ye shes lngar rang snang ba gsal bar rdzogs te/
NK055(ri)001:7726: snang stong mnyam pa nyid ni chen po'o //
NK055(ri)001:7727: ye shes lnga'i ngang la mthar lam pa'i 'dzin pa
NK055(ri)001:7728: tsam yang mi mnga' ba ni spros mtha' dang bral
NK055(ri)001:7729: bas thig le ste/ chos thams cad de nyid du gsal bas che/
NK055(ri)001:7730: hoh de'i don gyis mnyes pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:7731: yon tan la bstod pa ni //
NK055(ri)001:7732: mi dmigs sgyu 'phrul mnyam pa'i dbyings //
NK055(ri)001:7733: zhes pa la sogs pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:7734: yon tan lnga la bstod pa'i mgo 'dren/
NK055(ri)001:7736: zhes pa sems nyid rang rig pa nyid cir yang mi dmigs pa'i ngo bo'o //
NK055(ri)001:7738: zhes pa sgyu ma ni snang ba bzhin du ma grub pa/
NK055(ri)001:7739: 'phrul pa ni med bzhin du mi 'gag par 'char ba ste/
NK055(ri)001:7740: sems kyi ye shes rang snang ba nyid snang stong
NK055(ri)001:7741: gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid kyi dbyings bzhugs
NK055(ri)001:7743: phyi nang dang rgya che chung gzhal du med pa'i rig pa rang snang ba'i gzhal yas khang ngo //
NK055(ri)001:7745: zhes pa zhing khams te 'dir rgyal ba drug pa'i zhing khams ni chos kyi dbyings yin pas/
NK055(ri)001:7746: phyogs bcur mthar thug pa med pas mtha' yas te
NK055(ri)001:7747: chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pas kun nas zhes bya'o
NK055(ri)001:7750: 'od zer te sprul pa'i sku bzhin gnas nges pa can gdams pa lta bu ma yin pas/
NK055(ri)001:7751: ba spu re re'i khung bu nas kyang 'od zer
NK055(ri)001:7752: bye ba phrag drug cu drug cu 'phro ste bye
NK055(ri)001:7754: drug ni kha dog drug go //
NK055(ri)001:7756: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes cir yang snang bas rgyun chad med pa'i 'phro ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:7757: mtha' yas kun nas lhun gyis thim //
NK055(ri)001:7758: zhes bya ba ni longs spyod de/
NK055(ri)001:7759: mtha' yas pa ni chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa'i phyogs bcu mthar thug pa med pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:7761: 'dod yon lnga chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam par mthar thug pa med par lhun gyis grub pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:7763: zhes pa dus gsum kun tu spyod lam bzhi kun
NK055(ri)001:7764: nas kun tu 'dod yon lnga rang snang ba myong
NK055(ri)001:7765: ba med pa'i tshul gyis longs spyod pa ni rang
NK055(ri)001:7768: sgra snyan dang dbyer med pa rnams la ni chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pas thim zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:7769: sna tshogs sku gsung thugs chen po //
NK055(ri)001:7771: gdan khri ste sna tshogs ni nang rtags phyi ru
NK055(ri)001:7772: shar ba mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i rtags su seng ge'i
NK055(ri)001:7773: khri/ stobs bcu'i rtags su glang po che/
NK055(ri)001:7774: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i rtags su rta/
NK055(ri)001:7775: dbang bcu'i rtags su rma bya/
NK055(ri)001:7776: phrin las bzhi'i rtags su shang shang te'u'o //
NK055(ri)001:7777: de ni yon tan gyi bye brag sna tshogs su snang ba ste/
NK055(ri)001:7778: rin po che'i gdan khri mdzod mig bdun dang ldan pa yang bzung ngo //
NK055(ri)001:7779: sku ni gsal ba skyon med pa 'gro ba'i rab rib sel ba'i zla ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:7780: gsung ni thams cad du khyab pa'i bdag nyid bas gsal bsreg thun mong pa nyi ma'o //
NK055(ri)001:7781: thugs ni mtha' gnyis kyi skyon dang bral ba ma gos pa'i ngo bo pad+ma'o //
NK055(ri)001:7782: chen po ni rnam grangs sam so sor mtshon kyang
NK055(ri)001:7783: ngo bo'i rig pa mnyam pa'i ngang du dbyer med
NK055(ri)001:7784: pa'o // hohde'i don gyis mnyes pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:7786: phyogs bcu 'jig rten rdul snyed du //
NK055(ri)001:7787: zhes pa ni phrin las rnam pa lnga la bstod pa'i mgon 'dren no //
NK055(ri)001:7788: phyogs bcu ni don bya ba'i gnas te/
NK055(ri)001:7789: phyogs re re yang bcu bcu dang ldan pas mthar
NK055(ri)001:7790: thug pa med pa chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa'o
NK055(ri)001:7791: // 'jig rten ni snod bcud 'jigs pa la 'jig pa brten pas zag bcas so //
NK055(ri)001:7792: spyir na 'jig rten gyi khams la yang dag pa dang ma dag pa dang bar ma gsum ste/
NK055(ri)001:7793: dag pa ni longs sku dang lha gong ma rnams so //
NK055(ri)001:7794: ma dag pa ni ngan song gsum mo //
NK055(ri)001:7795: bar ma ni mi'i 'jig rten lta bu ste/
NK055(ri)001:7796: rdul snyed du bya ba grangs med pa'i dpe ste
NK055(ri)001:7797: 'jig rten gyi khams rdul phra rab tu bsil ba
NK055(ri)001:7798: de'i grangs dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten du/
NK055(ri)001:7799: rgyal ba'i don rnams rdul phran snyed //
NK055(ri)001:7800: ces pa rgyal ba ni khams gsum gyi sems can
NK055(ri)001:7801: rnams rtog tshogs rgyal ba'i ngo bo nyid las ma
NK055(ri)001:7802: 'das pa'o // des na phyis 'byung ba'i rgyal ba rnams kyi don rnams ni/
NK055(ri)001:7803: zhi rgyas dbang drag phra rags kyi bye brag gis/
NK055(ri)001:7805: ces pa spyir gdul bya rdul phran snyed bsam gyis mi khyab/
NK055(ri)001:7806: gdul bya gcig gi rgyud la yang rnam rtog skad
NK055(ri)001:7807: cig ma rdul phran dang mnyam pa yod pa rnams
NK055(ri)001:7808: kyi don 'grub pas na rdul phran snyed ces bya'o
NK055(ri)001:7809: // sprul pa rdul phran bsam yas kyis //
NK055(ri)001:7810: zhes pa don byed mkhan te/
NK055(ri)001:7811: 'dir 'dul byed kyang gdul bya'i grangs dang mnyam par 'char te/
NK055(ri)001:7812: chos sku la ma grub bzhin gdul bya'i blo ngo la glo bur du snang bas sprul pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:7813: longs sku dang sprul sku'i bye brag mtho dman rnams dang /
NK055(ri)001:7814: mdor na bem pos 'dul ba la bem por snang /
NK055(ri)001:7815: bung ba dang bye ma leb rnams la yang de dang mthun par snang ba thams cad do //
NK055(ri)001:7816: gdul bya'i ngo la 'dul byed kyang rdul phran bsam yas par snang ba ste/
NK055(ri)001:7817: zhi khro la sogs pa sna tshogs pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:7819: skad cig yud la lhun gyis grub //
NK055(ri)001:7820: ces pa grub bam mi grub the tshom med de/
NK055(ri)001:7821: rang snang mi 'gag pa byas 'dzin bral bar so
NK055(ri)001:7822: so'i ngo la snang ba'i sprul pa de dag gis
NK055(ri)001:7823: gdul bya so so'i gnas su yud tsam gyis song
NK055(ri)001:7824: ba med par khyab nas gdul bya de dag bya
NK055(ri)001:7825: ba rdzogs pa'i skad cig mas ched du ma btsal
NK055(ri)001:7826: bar las rdzogs pa'i phyir na/
NK055(ri)001:7830: des na las bzhi dang lhun gyis grub pa'i las dang lnga'o //
NK055(ri)001:7832: thams cad ma lus sku gsung thugs //
NK055(ri)001:7834: 'bras chos nyi shu rtsa lnga lhun gyis grub pa'i mgo 'dren/
NK055(ri)001:7835: thams cad ni bshad pa'i sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las lnga mtshon nas/
NK055(ri)001:7836: 'khor 'das gnyis kyis bsdus pa'i chos thams cad kyang /
NK055(ri)001:7839: rig stong gsal ba ma 'gag pa thugs/
NK055(ri)001:7840: thams cad kyi yon tan gsal ba'i bdag nyid/
NK055(ri)001:7841: don phyogs la mi mdzad pa med pa phrin las te/
NK055(ri)001:7842: lngar rang gsal ba zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:7843: sku gsung thugs kyi bdag nyid che //
NK055(ri)001:7845: 'khor ba'i chos thams cad bshad pa'i sku gsung thugs
NK055(ri)001:7846: yon tan phrin las lngar gsal ba las ma gtogs
NK055(ri)001:7847: pa phyogs 'dzin gyi chos thams cad phra ba yang
NK055(ri)001:7848: mi gnas pa ni/ sku gsung thugs bdag nyid chen po las gzhan med pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:7849: de la ni bdag nyid chen po zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:7850: sku gsung thugs kyis kun tu khyab //
NK055(ri)001:7851: ces pa sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las lngas
NK055(ri)001:7852: mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos la khyab pa ni
NK055(ri)001:7853: bshad zin te/ 'khor ba'i chos kyang de nyid las
NK055(ri)001:7854: gzhan du ma song bas na kun tu khyab ces
NK055(ri)001:7855: bshad zin te/ bya'o // sku gsung thugs kyi thig le che //
NK055(ri)001:7856: zhes pa ni bshad pa'i don sku la sogs pa lnga po nyid kyang phan tshun tha mi dad de/
NK055(ri)001:7857: sku mi 'gags pa nyid gsung grags stong du dbyer med/
NK055(ri)001:7858: thugs gnyis med kyi ye shes su dbyer med pa
NK055(ri)001:7859: la sogs pa lhun gyis grub pas phyogs re'i 'du
NK055(ri)001:7860: shes kyi 'dzin pa ma spangs ngang gis dag pa
NK055(ri)001:7861: ni/ spros pa'i tha snyad dang bral bas thig le
NK055(ri)001:7862: ste chos thams cad kyi bdag nyid yin pas che
NK055(ri)001:7863: ni/ ba'o // hode'i de'i don gyis khyab pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:7865: zhes pa go phye ba'i 'khor gyis lam gyi ngo
NK055(ri)001:7866: bo nyams su blang ba'i ched du lhan cig pa'i
NK055(ri)001:7868: dgyes pa'i glur blang ba la bsgrags so zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:7869: gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/
NK055(ri)001:7871: 'khor 'das dbyer med kun tu bzang po'i dgongs pa
NK055(ri)001:7872: la bstod pa'i don rgyan gyi 'khor lo nyi shu
NK055(ri)001:7873: rtsa lnga lhun gyis grub ste/
NK055(ri)001:7874: de yang 'khor 'das kyi ngo bo nyid du gsal bas phyogs 'dzin bral te/
NK055(ri)001:7875: dbyings rig pa dbyer med chos sku'i ngang las g.yo ba med pa ni mnyes pa chen po ste/
NK055(ri)001:7876: nyi shu rtsa lnga'i yon tan snang ba'i mnyes pa
NK055(ri)001:7877: yang bkag pa ma yin te gdul bya'i snang ba'o
NK055(ri)001:7878: // le'u bcu bzhi pa'i bshad pa'o////bco lnga pa khro bo rang bzhin gyi le'u 'di la/
NK055(ri)001:7879: rgyud gsum las 'bras bu'i rgyud khro bo'i mdzad pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:7880: rgyud kyi dngos po bcu las rang bzhin sku'i dkyil 'khor/
NK055(ri)001:7881: lam pa mthar lam pa'i spyod yul/
NK055(ri)001:7882: de yan chad du ma bsgyur rnal ma zhi ba'i
NK055(ri)001:7883: sgo nas bya ba kun rdzogs te grub pa'i 'bras
NK055(ri)001:7884: bu dang bcas pa bstan nas/
NK055(ri)001:7885: de dag gi skabs su khro bo lhag pa gzugs brnyan zur tsam/
NK055(ri)001:7886: khro bo'i tshogs kyi dkyiiil 'khor yang zur tsam zhig bstan pas bsnon par byas te/
NK055(ri)001:7887: 'di nas khro bo'i dkyil 'khor dang po'i 'byung tshul dang bcas pa rgyas par ston to //
NK055(ri)001:7888: le'u bco lnga pa la gsum gyii/
NK055(ri)001:7892: tshig gi de ma thag pa ni zhi ba'i gzhung
NK055(ri)001:7893: tshar ba'i bcu bzhi pa song ba'i rjes thog go
NK055(ri)001:7894: // don gyi de ma thag pa ni gdul bya
NK055(ri)001:7895: lugs 'byung gi don du gdul bya dang mthun pa
NK055(ri)001:7896: zhi ba'i mdzad pa rnams tshar nas/
NK055(ri)001:7897: dpyang thag chad pa srid pa'i sa bon rtsub mos
NK055(ri)001:7898: 'phangs pa'i las kyi ru dra la sogs pa gdul
NK055(ri)001:7899: bya rgyud rtsub pa rnams kyi don du khro bo'i
NK055(ri)001:7901: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag /zhes pa
NK055(ri)001:7902: phyogs bcu na bzhugs shing dus bzhir gshegs pa'i gdul
NK055(ri)001:7903: bya'i ngo la longs sprul gnyis su snang ba ma
NK055(ri)001:7904: lus pa thams cad rigs lngar 'dus la/
NK055(ri)001:7905: rigs lnga dbyer med pa'i ngo bo rgyal ba drug pa kun tu bzang po'o //
NK055(ri)001:7906: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid/
NK055(ri)001:7907: ces pa zhi ba dang khro bo la sogs pa'i gdul bya'i ngo la snang ba'i dkyil 'khor/
NK055(ri)001:7909: ces pa chu thams cad la gsher bas khyab pa ltar lhag pa'i chos skur dbyer med la/
NK055(ri)001:7910: chos sku nyid gcig pa'i mtha' dang bral bas gdul
NK055(ri)001:7911: bya bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ngo la gzugs sku'i
NK055(ri)001:7912: tshogs su snang / de nyid na'ang chos kyi sku las ma g.yos pas du ma'i mtha' dang bral te/
NK055(ri)001:7913: mtha' thams cad dang bral ba'i rang byung gi ye
NK055(ri)001:7914: shes snang stong dbyer med pa lhun gyis grub pa'i
NK055(ri)001:7915: ngo bo nyid du bzhugs pas drug pa kun tu
NK055(ri)001:7916: bzang po ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ngo bo
NK055(ri)001:7917: nyid kho na ste sangs rgyas kun gyi spyi gzugs
NK055(ri)001:7919: zhes pa ni gdul bya'i snang bas mdzad pa thams cad 'char ba'i gazhi'am rtsa ba lta bur bstan te/
NK055(ri)001:7920: me long dang gzugs brnyan bzhin no //
NK055(ri)001:7921: des na 'dul byed kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad snang
NK055(ri)001:7922: ba la me long dang lta ba po dang mthun
NK055(ri)001:7923: par gzugs brnyan snang ba bzhin/
NK055(ri)001:7924: 'dir gdul bya las kyi khro bo'i dbang gis/
NK055(ri)001:7925: khro bo'i dkyil 'khor du mngon par 'du mdzad de/
NK055(ri)001:7927: ngang khro shugs khro khro bar bcas dang bcos //
NK055(ri)001:7928: zhes pas ngang gis khro bo drug pa'i ngo bo
NK055(ri)001:7929: 'khor 'das dbyer med pa'i bdag nyid rang byung gi
NK055(ri)001:7930: ye shes la/ mi mthun pa'i chos rdul phra rab tsam yang ma dmigs te/
NK055(ri)001:7931: nam mkha' dang 'dra bar thams cad ye shes su rdzogs pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:7932: mi mthun pa zhig yod na yang de nyid ye shes kyi rang bzhin yin pas/
NK055(ri)001:7933: dper na me'i phung por shing spungs pa dang 'dra ste/
NK055(ri)001:7934: ye shes su gsal bas ngang gis khro ba zhes bya ste chos sku'i dgongs pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:7936: dgongs pa de lta bu'i ngang las ched du bya ba'i chos ma dmigs kyang /
NK055(ri)001:7937: me long la blta ba po'i dbang gis gzugs brnyan 'char ba bzhin/
NK055(ri)001:7938: gdul bya ru dra la sogs pa khro bo'i ngo
NK055(ri)001:7939: la 'dul byed kyi khro ba'i tshogs rnams su snang
NK055(ri)001:7940: ba ni/ gdul bya drag po'i rkyen shugs kyis gdul bya dang mthun pa'i ngo bo ltar snang ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:7941: khro bar bcas pa ni nam mkha' la rdul mi
NK055(ri)001:7942: gos pa dang 'dra bar chos kyi sku la dmigs
NK055(ri)001:7943: 'dzin gyi tha snyad mi gnas pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:7945: chos kyi sku la khro bya khro byed ma dmigs kyang gdul bya'i dbang gis khro bar snang ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:7946: yang na khro bo ni gsum ste/
NK055(ri)001:7947: shes rab chen po'i khro bo dang /
NK055(ri)001:7948: ye shes chen po'i khro bo dang /
NK055(ri)001:7949: phyag rgya chen po'i khro bo'o //
NK055(ri)001:7950: de la shes rab chen po'i khro bo ni/
NK055(ri)001:7951: yang dag ye shes chen po ni/
NK055(ri)001:7952: mtshan ma 'joms phyir khro bo'i mchog /ces pas/
NK055(ri)001:7953: chos thams cad kyi de kho na nyid yin tshul
NK055(ri)001:7954: gyi don ji lta ba rtogs pa la ni yang
NK055(ri)001:7956: de ni shes pa rnams kyi nang na mchog tu gyur pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:7957: me klong dros pa'i rtse mo na gzhan ci yang
NK055(ri)001:7958: mi gnas pa bzhin du rtogs pa de lta bu'i
NK055(ri)001:7959: ngang la phyogs 'dzin phra ba yang mi gnas pa'o
NK055(ri)001:7960: // ye shes chen po'i khro bo ni/
NK055(ri)001:7962: rang rig ye shes rgyal po yis //
NK055(ri)001:7963: phyogs bcu khams rnams dbang bsdus nas //
NK055(ri)001:7964: kun kyang mi dmigs dbyings su thim //
NK055(ri)001:7965: thams cad khro bo'i tshogs su 'gyur //
NK055(ri)001:7967: phyag rgya chen po'i khro bo ni 'og nas 'chad par 'gyur ba ste/
NK055(ri)001:7968: khro bo mdzad pa de rnams gdul bya'i ngo la
NK055(ri)001:7969: bya byed kyi rtsol ba lta bu snang yang ngo
NK055(ri)001:7970: bo ni/ rang rig lhun grub kyi ngang la rang
NK055(ri)001:7971: snang ba ma gtogs pa rtsol bar thal ba med
NK055(ri)001:7972: bo ni/ de/ shugs kyis khro bo'i tshul lo //
NK055(ri)001:7973: dkyil 'khor ni lnga bcu rtsa brgyad kyi tshogs so //
NK055(ri)001:7975: mngon pa ni gdul bya'i ngor ro //
NK055(ri)001:7977: me long g.ya' dag pa ni gdul bya'i rkyen gyis gzugs brnyan snang yang /
NK055(ri)001:7978: me long la gzugs brnyan snang bar byed pa'i rtsol
NK055(ri)001:7979: ba med kyang g.ya' dag pa dang lta mkhan 'dzom
NK055(ri)001:7981: drug pa'i rgyal ba'i dgongs pa mtha' thams cad bral ba nyid/
NK055(ri)001:7982: gdul bya'i rkyen gyis cir yang snang ba'i ngo bor bzhugs pa las/
NK055(ri)001:7983: gdul bya las kyi khro bo'i rkyen gyis khro bo'i dkyil 'khor du snang ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:7985: zhes pa he ru ka'i dkyil 'khor snang ba'i gtan
NK055(ri)001:7986: tshigs kyis dris pas khro bor snang ba'i dgos pa
NK055(ri)001:7987: tshol ba ste/ dgos pa gang yin zhe na/
NK055(ri)001:7988: sems can gol bar bstan pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:7989: bdag tu rmongs pa'i rtog pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:7991: chos thams cad kyi de kho na nyid rnal ma
NK055(ri)001:7992: don gyi kun gzhi 'khor 'das la khyab che chung
NK055(ri)001:7993: med par sems can thams cad kyi rang bzhin yin
NK055(ri)001:7994: kyang ma shes pas yengs pa lta bur gyur pa
NK055(ri)001:7995: la ni lhan cig skyes pa'i ma rig pa zhes
NK055(ri)001:7996: bya/ chos nyid dang dus mtshungs pas ni lhan cig
NK055(ri)001:7997: /chos nyid ma rig pa skad cig ma tsam la
NK055(ri)001:7998: skad cig skyes pa'i ma rig pa zhes bya/
NK055(ri)001:8000: kun tu brtags pa'i ma rig pa ste yul sems
NK055(ri)001:8001: gnyis ngo bo ma grub pa las lhan skyes kyi
NK055(ri)001:8002: dbang gis yod par brtags pa'i gzung 'dzin gnyis la
NK055(ri)001:8003: dus dang rnam pa kun tu zhen pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:8004: skad cig ma snga phyi rgyun ma chad pa ni mngon par zhen pa dang zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:8005: yang dag pa'i lam dang bral ba dag /ces pa
NK055(ri)001:8006: yang dag pa ni theg pa dgu'i nang na yang
NK055(ri)001:8008: chos thams cad kyi gnas tshul ji lta ba'i don bde bar gshegs pa'i lung dang /
NK055(ri)001:8009: de bla ma dam pa'i man ngag gis zin pa'i
NK055(ri)001:8010: lam ma nor bar bskyed rdzogs gnyis kyi don kho
NK055(ri)001:8011: na ste/ 'gro ba gang la de dag med pa ni bral ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:8012: de yang spyir khams gsum gyi sems can/
NK055(ri)001:8014: khyad par ru dra'i rgyu ni/
NK055(ri)001:8015: sngon gyi bskal pa las ru dra'i rgyu dge slong thar pa nag po'i lo rgyus so //
NK055(ri)001:8016: de'i lo rgyus ci lta bu zhe na/
NK055(ri)001:8017: gab pa'i gsang ba ma rtogs par/
NK055(ri)001:8018: zhes pa sngon sangs rgyas mngon byung rgyal po'i bstan pa la/
NK055(ri)001:8019: da lta sh+aakya thub pa'i bstan pa bzhin du gsang sngags zab mo kun tu dar nas/
NK055(ri)001:8020: de'i bstan pa 'dzin pa'i dge slong thub dka' gzhon
NK055(ri)001:8021: nu zhes bya ba 'gro ba'i 'dren pa chen po
NK055(ri)001:8022: mdzad pa la/ khyim bdag gi rigs su byung ba'i thar pa nag po zhes bya ba/
NK055(ri)001:8023: g.yog dan phag dang bcas pas chos zhus pa'i dus su thar pa nag po dge slong byas/
NK055(ri)001:8024: g.yog dge bsnyen byas nas gsang sngags bshad de/
NK055(ri)001:8025: gdams pa'i don zhus pa'i dus su slob dpon gyis/
NK055(ri)001:8026: ji bzhin pa de ma bcos na //
NK055(ri)001:8027: dngos po bzhi la gnas spyad kyang //
NK055(ri)001:8028: nam mkha' la ni sprin bzhin te //
NK055(ri)001:8029: de ni rnal 'byor dam pa'i lam //
NK055(ri)001:8031: dpon gyis ma go bas tha mal par song /
NK055(ri)001:8032: g.yog gis go bas chos nyid kyi don rtogs/
NK055(ri)001:8033: bsgoms pas da lta gsang ba'i bdag po nyid du bzhugs/
NK055(ri)001:8034: dpon gyis ma go bas 'jig rten rang ga mar song ste/
NK055(ri)001:8035: slob dpon la yang dam nyams/
NK055(ri)001:8036: grogs po la yang dam tshig nyams pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:8037: lta ba'i ngo bo ji bzhin pa chos thams cad
NK055(ri)001:8038: kyi khong na gab pa rang bzhin gsang ba'i snying
NK055(ri)001:8040: sbas pa'i gsang ba la mngon par 'chel nas/
NK055(ri)001:8041: zhes pa thams cad mkhyen pas blo dman gyi ched
NK055(ri)001:8042: du lam gyi rgyud du sbas pa'i blo dman la
NK055(ri)001:8043: gsang ba ta na ga na dang /
NK055(ri)001:8044: spyod pa'i dam tshig lnga phrag gsum rnams thabs kyis
NK055(ri)001:8045: gsang ba'i spyod pa rnams la dngos su gzung 'dzin
NK055(ri)001:8046: du byas nas mngon par 'chel ba ni rgyun du
NK055(ri)001:8047: de la gnas pa ste rgyun mi chad par spyod
NK055(ri)001:8048: pa'o // des na rgyu dang 'bras bu la rmongs pa/
NK055(ri)001:8049: zhes bya ba ni rmongs pa'i gtso bo lta ba ma rtogs pa yin la spyod pa rang gar spyad/
NK055(ri)001:8051: drag sngags rtsub mor bzlas pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:8052: rgyu mi dge ba las 'bras bu ngan song gsum myong bar mi shes pas rmongs te/
NK055(ri)001:8053: des dngos po mi dge ba kho nar gyur pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:8055: srid pa'i sa bon rtsub mos 'phangs nas/
NK055(ri)001:8056: zhes pa srid pa ni khams gsum gyi nang na yang ngan song gsum mo //
NK055(ri)001:8057: de'i sa bon ni las dang nyon mongs pa rang
NK055(ri)001:8058: ga ma spyad pa rnams kyi mi dge ba'i bag
NK055(ri)001:8059: chags nyes pa chen po bskyed pa'i rgyu la ni
NK055(ri)001:8060: sa bon rtsub mo zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:8061: 'phangs pa ni skye ba mtshams sbyor te dmyal bar snang ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:8062: rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu la dmyal ba snang bar bstan pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:8063: mtshams med pa'i rab tu tsha ba'i dmyal bar skyes so //
NK055(ri)001:8064: zhes pa sdug bsngal myong ba la bar mtshams med pa ni mtshams med ces bya ste/
NK055(ri)001:8065: rab tu tsha ba ni mnar med pa'i tsha ba ste tsha ba'i dmyal ba brgyad ni/
NK055(ri)001:8066: ya tha steng ma yang sos yin te de dang /
NK055(ri)001:8073: mnar med pa ste brgyad do //
NK055(ri)001:8074: de dag gi tshe tshad dang sdug bsngal gyi mtshan
NK055(ri)001:8075: nyid rnams ni thun mong gi theg pa na zhib
NK055(ri)001:8076: pas der rgyas par shes par bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:8077: mnar med kyi zhabs na 'byung ba rlung gi dkyil 'khor yod pas de las mar brtsir med de/
NK055(ri)001:8078: rdo rje dmyal ba'i gnas ni mnar med kyi phyogs
NK055(ri)001:8079: kyi dgon pa lta bu zhig na yod do zhes
NK055(ri)001:8080: tha snyad pa rnams kyis bzhed do //
NK055(ri)001:8081: tsha ba'i sdug bsngal myong ba'i dus su tsha ba'i sdug bsngal ma bzod nas/
NK055(ri)001:8082: 'di bas shin tu grang na ci ma rung snyam
NK055(ri)001:8083: pa'i mod la zhes pa la sogs pa tsha ba'i
NK055(ri)001:8084: sdug bsngal gyi las zad pa'i skad cig ma la
NK055(ri)001:8085: grang ba'i dmyal bar skyes te/
NK055(ri)001:8086: rab tu sbrebs pa ni cis kyang spyad du med pas grang ba ste/
NK055(ri)001:8087: pad+ma ltar gas pa ni grang ba'i dmyal ba brgyad kyi grangs gcig ste/
NK055(ri)001:8088: grang ba'i sdug bsngal gyi phung po la rgya gram
NK055(ri)001:8089: du gas pa brgyad dang bcu drug pa lta bu'o
NK055(ri)001:8090: // grang ba'i sdug bsngal drag po dag gis lus
NK055(ri)001:8091: ngag yid gsum rab tu nyen te mnar med pa'o
NK055(ri)001:8092: // // gong du bstan pa 'di lta bu'i/
NK055(ri)001:8093: sdug bsngal rab tu tsha ba la sogs pa brgyad/
NK055(ri)001:8094: ces pa la sogs pa gong du bstan zin/
NK055(ri)001:8095: shin tu grang ba la sogs pa brgyad ni/
NK055(ri)001:8097: chu bur rdol ba can dang /
NK055(ri)001:8100: kyi hud ces zer ba dang /
NK055(ri)001:8103: pad+ma chen po ltar gas pa dang brgyad do //
NK055(ri)001:8105: zhes pa dmyal ba'i rnam smin gyi tshe ma zad par 'jig rten gyi khams de 'jig nas/
NK055(ri)001:8106: gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tsha grang gang yin pa'i dmyal bar skyes te/
NK055(ri)001:8107: de'i bar du yang ngal bso ba'i bar skabs med de/
NK055(ri)001:8108: se gol gcig gis phyin par byed //
NK055(ri)001:8109: ces pas skad cig mas 'pho ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:8110: dmyal ba spyi'i yun ni bskal pa chen po stong phrag bcu gnyis su myong ngo //
NK055(ri)001:8111: zhes pa bskal pa chen po ni 'jig chags stong
NK055(ri)001:8112: gnas bzhi ka dus gcig tu brtsis pas bskal pa
NK055(ri)001:8114: de 'dra ba stong phrag bcu gnyis su myong zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:8115: de la rdo rje dmyal ba'i tshe tshad ni/
NK055(ri)001:8116: lcags kyi ri bo ri rab kyi tshad dang ldan zhig la/
NK055(ri)001:8117: bya reg 'jam gyi pags pas drud nas nam zad
NK055(ri)001:8118: pa de rdo rje dmyal ba'i tshe tshad du gtor
NK055(ri)001:8120: dam tshig 'grel chen nas ni phyi'i rgya mtsho chen
NK055(ri)001:8121: po la skra nyag ma gcig gis blangs te gtor
NK055(ri)001:8122: nas zad pa de rdo rje dmyal ba'i tshe tshad
NK055(ri)001:8123: du bshad do // de la sdug bsngal myur du zad pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:8124: dang po mnar med lta bur 'gro nas/
NK055(ri)001:8125: de nas rim pa bzhin du je yang je yang dmyal ba la tha rgyab tu myong ba yin skad/
NK055(ri)001:8126: sdug bsngal dar drag la yun ring ba rnams ni/
NK055(ri)001:8127: dang po yang sos lta bu myong nas de nas
NK055(ri)001:8128: je zab je zab la mnar med rting pa la
NK055(ri)001:8130: yi dwags su skye ba ni/
NK055(ri)001:8131: de nas rnam par smin pa de zad pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:8132: zhes pa sogs te dmyal bar skyes pa de nas
NK055(ri)001:8133: dmyal bar sbyangs pas las kyi sa bon zad de
NK055(ri)001:8134: rnam smin 'bras bu dmyal ba tshe zad nas te/
NK055(ri)001:8135: de yang rnam pa smin pa'i ngo bo ni/
NK055(ri)001:8136: thar pa nag po'i dus su pho byung bsad pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:8139: lta bsgom gyi gdengs med par rang ga ma'i phrin las gzhan la gdug pa'i las can dang /
NK055(ri)001:8140: rtsa ba dang yan lag gi dam tshig nyams pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:8141: rang che ba'i nga rgyal gyis dregs pas gzhan la
NK055(ri)001:8142: phrag dog gi dbang gis dman pa'i thabs bya ba
NK055(ri)001:8143: la sogs pa'i byas pa rnams kyi 'bras bu ste
NK055(ri)001:8144: las zad pa'o // dmyal ba nas 'phos nas yi dwags su skyes pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:8146: zhes pa bza' rgyu med nas lo mang po la bkres pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:8147: bskom pa ni btung rgyu med pas/
NK055(ri)001:8148: skom pa'i sdug bsngal gyis nyen/
NK055(ri)001:8149: zhes pa ni za 'thung gnyis kyi 'dod pa min
NK055(ri)001:8150: pa gzhan gyi bsam pa ci yang mi 'byung bas
NK055(ri)001:8151: rmongs pa'o // 'dod pa'i dngos po rnams yid du mi 'ong ba dang /
NK055(ri)001:8152: zhes pa 'dod pa'i dngos po spyir ni 'dod yon lnga yin te/
NK055(ri)001:8153: yi dwags las kyis mnar te dma' bas lha dang
NK055(ri)001:8154: mi stod rim bzhin du longs spyod kyis g.yeng ba'i
NK055(ri)001:8156: 'on kyang kho bdag gi 'dod pa'i dngos po ni zas skom gnyis kho na ste/
NK055(ri)001:8157: de dag mthong yang yid du mi 'ong ba rnag
NK055(ri)001:8158: khrag dang khro chu zhun ma dang me dpung du
NK055(ri)001:8159: mthong ba'o // de ni phyi'i sgrib pa can zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:8160: gdug cing rtsub pa'i dngos po sna tshogs su 'gyur ba/
NK055(ri)001:8161: zhes pa gdug pa ni reg na gnod par byed pa khro chu khol ma dang /
NK055(ri)001:8162: lcags sreg gi thu lum mo //
NK055(ri)001:8163: rtsub pa ni mtshon cha'i rnam grangs so //
NK055(ri)001:8164: de lta bur gyur te zos kyang zug rngu sna
NK055(ri)001:8165: tshogs 'byin nas lus tshig mgrin pa tshig gzhob bro
NK055(ri)001:8166: ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal 'byin pa ni me
NK055(ri)001:8167: lce'i 'khor lo can zhes kyang bya ste/
NK055(ri)001:8168: nang gi sgrib pa can zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:8169: yong med par yang 'gyur zhing zhes pa/
NK055(ri)001:8170: bza' btung rgyu rgyang nas mthong ste drung du gtugs na med pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:8171: dper na chu 'bab pa mthong nas drung du phyin na skams te gram par song ba bzhin no //
NK055(ri)001:8172: rid pa ni sha med pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:8173: skams pa ni rlan dang bral te 'gro ba'i dus su tshigs rnams la rus gzhob 'thul ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:8174: lus dang yan lag dang dbang po ma 'tshams pa/
NK055(ri)001:8175: zhes pa gsus pa shin tu che ba/
NK055(ri)001:8176: yan lag rtsa 'jag bzhin phra bas mi 'tshams pa/
NK055(ri)001:8177: mgo che ba kha dang mig rnams khab mig tsam pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:8178: gre ba rta rnga tsam bza' rgyu kha na mi shong /
NK055(ri)001:8179: khar shong yang mid pa la mi thar/
NK055(ri)001:8180: lto ba yul ljongs tsam gang ba med pa ni nang gi sgrib pa can zhes so //
NK055(ri)001:8181: yi dwags kyi gnas der bskal pa chen po stong phrag drug tu skyes pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:8182: las kyi srin po'i las dang sbyod yul ni/
NK055(ri)001:8183: de nas las kyi sgrib pa'i sa bon/
NK055(ri)001:8185: yi dwags kyi las zad pa de nas bdag 'dzin
NK055(ri)001:8186: gyis bskyed pa'i mi dge ba'i las mtho ris dang
NK055(ri)001:8187: byang chub bsgrub pa'i sa bon/
NK055(ri)001:8188: sdug bsngal skyed par byed pas rtsub mo dmyal ba dang /
NK055(ri)001:8189: yi dwags su rnam par smin pa rim pa bzhin du zad de bsrabs pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:8190: ru drar skyes pa ni sngon khro bor bsgoms pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:8192: phra men ma la sogs pa bsgoms nas/
NK055(ri)001:8193: sbyor sgrol la sogs pa'i barlanga po nyams su blangs pa ni rgyu mthun pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:8194: des 'bras bu ru drar mtshams sbyar nas skye ba blangs pa ni ru dra ste/
NK055(ri)001:8195: yi dwags kyi lo rgyus zhib mo rnams dgongs pa 'dus pa na gsal lo //
NK055(ri)001:8196: 'gro ba rigs drug gi dbang du byas nas yi dwags kyi phyogs te/
NK055(ri)001:8197: gshin rje dang chos mthun pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:8198: srin mo'i bur skyes pa dang srin po'i cha lugs
NK055(ri)001:8199: su skyes pa ni yi dwags srin po zhes bya
NK055(ri)001:8200: ste/ sngon lha bsgom drag sngags bzlas pa'i stobs kyis/
NK055(ri)001:8201: 'jig rten na yang mi 'joms pa med pas chen po'o //
NK055(ri)001:8202: lus rab tu gdug pa ste gang gis mthong ba thams cad hag sngangs/
NK055(ri)001:8203: gang la reg pa tsam gyis rdul du brlag /kha
NK055(ri)001:8204: nas me 'bar bas dngos po thams cad bsreg /kha
NK055(ri)001:8205: rlangs dang lus kyi ba spu'i 'od zer las sna
NK055(ri)001:8206: tshogs 'phro bas 'jig rten pa thams cad dmyal thag
NK055(ri)001:8207: gcod pa'o // gtum pa ni sems te byams pa
NK055(ri)001:8208: dang snying rje zur tsam yang med nas gang dbang
NK055(ri)001:8209: du ma 'dus pa thams cad rdul du brlag pa'i
