NK055(ri)001:8212: lus po mi'i lus po lta bu zhig la mgo bo sems can sna tshogs kyi mgo brgya yod pa/
NK055(ri)001:8216: sbrul la sogs te dud 'gro'i mgo sna tshogs dang mi'i mgo 'chang ba/
NK055(ri)001:8217: lus brgya la mgo gcig pa/
NK055(ri)001:8218: zhes pa lus brgya de yang mi dang dud 'gro sna tshogs pa'i lus 'chang ba/
NK055(ri)001:8219: lus gcig la yan lag mang po dang ldan pa ste dper na rta bla mo lta bu'o //
NK055(ri)001:8220: yan lag sna tshogs pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:8221: mi dang dud 'gro sna tshogs kyi yan lag 'chang ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:8222: gdug pa'i lag cha sna tshogs thogs pa/
NK055(ri)001:8224: gdug pa ni gzhan la gnod pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:8225: lag cha ni lag na bsnams pa'i mtshon cha la/
NK055(ri)001:8226: sna tshogs thogs pa ni ral gri dang mdung dang thod dbyug dang zhing dbyug dang /
NK055(ri)001:8227: mi ro'i glo snying la sogs pa'i nang khrol rnams thogs pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:8228: mtshan nyid 'gyur ba can dang bcas pa'i gtso bo de la yum gyi bye brag rnams dang /
NK055(ri)001:8229: he ru ka'i 'khor gyi ma mo bzhin du las kyi srin mo'i 'khor mang po dang ldan pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:8230: 'khor de dag 'jigs pa'i gzugs sna tshogs dang ldan pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:8231: stag seng ge la sogs pa'i mgo dang mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:8232: 'jigs pa'i nga ro sna tshogs sgrogs pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:8233: ru dra'i rngam skad ra la ra la dang /
NK055(ri)001:8235: hu lu hu lu la sogs pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:8236: sgra skad sna tshogs sgrogs pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:8237: khams gsum sems can dpa' bkong ba'i mi dang gcan
NK055(ri)001:8238: gzan gyi skad lugs stong la sogs pa mi srun
NK055(ri)001:8239: pa rnams so // rtsal dang nus pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:8241: zhes pa dngos dang nga ro skad gdangs dang lus
NK055(ri)001:8242: las 'byung ba'i dri dang dbugs kyi kha rlangs kyis
NK055(ri)001:8243: khams gsum thams cad gang dang gang la reg pas
NK055(ri)001:8244: shi ba dang / brgyal ba dang /
NK055(ri)001:8246: nad sna tshogs kyis 'debs te gnod pa'i sbyor ba kho nar snang ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:8247: rab tu 'jigs pa'i rlung nag ni/
NK055(ri)001:8251: rlung 'tshubs ma 'phro bas grang ba'i nad dang /
NK055(ri)001:8252: kha nas tsha ba'i dbugs kyis khams gsum gyi phyogs kun tu nad kyis 'khrug par byed pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:8253: 'gro ba rnams nad bzhi brgya rtsa bzhis 'debs par byed pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:8254: 'gro ba rnams kyi sems myos shing dran pa nyams par byed pa'i mthus/
NK055(ri)001:8255: 'gro ba'i nang nas 'og na gnas pa'i klu'i rigs dang /
NK055(ri)001:8256: ri rab kyi khong gseng na gnas pa lha ma yin gyi rigs dang /
NK055(ri)001:8257: gnya' shing 'dzin gyi yan chad nas 'dod khams kyi lha ris drug dang /
NK055(ri)001:8258: gzugs khams la tshangs pa'i ris mtho dman pa rnams dang /
NK055(ri)001:8259: tshangs ris kyi lha ya tha gsum ste/
NK055(ri)001:8262: 'bras bu che ba man chad dbang du bsdus te/
NK055(ri)001:8263: gnas gtsang ma rigs lnga ma gtogs pa/
NK055(ri)001:8264: khams gsum rangs pa dbang du bsdus so //
NK055(ri)001:8265: de'i lo rgyus zhib mo rnams dgongs 'dus ltar shes so //
NK055(ri)001:8266: ji ltar btul ba mdor bstan pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:8267: de sngon gyi rten pa'i stobs zhes pa la sogs te/
NK055(ri)001:8269: sngon rten pa'i stobs ni slob dpon dge slong thub dka' gzhon nu la/
NK055(ri)001:8270: theg pa chen por sems bskyed gsang sngags kyi sgor zhugs/
NK055(ri)001:8271: lta ba ma rtogs kyang spyod pa phyogs mos kyis
NK055(ri)001:8272: nyams su blangs pa'i stobs kyis ni ngo bo nyid
NK055(ri)001:8273: kyis 'brel ba'o // thams cad mkhyen pas gzigs nas/
NK055(ri)001:8274: zhes pa thugs rje'i 'brel ba des ru dra nag
NK055(ri)001:8275: po kho bdag gi log par song bas khams gsum
NK055(ri)001:8276: log lta dgu la btsud pa/
NK055(ri)001:8277: spyir khams gsum rangs po la gzigs/
NK055(ri)001:8278: sgos su 'brel ba'i stobs kyis ru dra la gzigs nas/
NK055(ri)001:8280: zhes pa thugs rje bzhi'i nang nas yul dang phrad
NK055(ri)001:8281: nas thugs rje skye ba ste gdul bya ru dra'i
NK055(ri)001:8283: zhes pa 'dul thabs phrin las bzhi las gdul bya rtsub ste gsum pos mi 'dul bas/
NK055(ri)001:8284: drag po'i sgo nas lus sems phral ba'i dus la bab pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:8285: che mchog gi dkyil 'khor snang ba'i dgos pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:8286: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa/
NK055(ri)001:8288: de nas ni gdul bya grub/
NK055(ri)001:8289: 'dul thabs gzigs nas 'dul dngos la zhugs te/
NK055(ri)001:8290: de bzhin gshegs pa ni drug pa kun tu bzang po'o //
NK055(ri)001:8291: che ba ni 'khor 'das dbyer med pa'i dbang gis
NK055(ri)001:8292: gdul bya ru dra dngos kyang kun tu bzang po'i
NK055(ri)001:8293: dgongs par dbyer med pas gnyis su ma dmigs pa'o
NK055(ri)001:8294: // rdo rje ni don de nyid la mi phyed pa'i don gyis so //
NK055(ri)001:8295: bkod pa ni rang bzhin lhun grub kyi bud+d+ha khams
NK055(ri)001:8296: gsum gyi rtog pa kun tu bzang po'i dgongs par
NK055(ri)001:8297: gsal bas/ yi ge 'khor lo tshogs chen gyi sa nyid kun tu bzang po'i thugs rang snang ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:8299: snang stong dbyer mi phyed pa'i d+r+wa ba las snang
NK055(ri)001:8300: ba ma 'gag pa thabs dang shes rab dbyer mi
NK055(ri)001:8301: phyed pa d+r+wa ba ltar mi phyed pa'i bdag nyid
NK055(ri)001:8302: du bzhugs pa'o // rang bzhin lhun grub kyi dkyil
NK055(ri)001:8303: 'khor gyi 'khor lo nyid las khro bor snang ba'i
NK055(ri)001:8304: du bzhugs pa'o // dgos pa ni/ 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu'i/
NK055(ri)001:8306: 'jig rten drug ni phan tshun dang yan man gyi 'jig rten drug gam/
NK055(ri)001:8307: yang na 'gro ba rigs drug gi gnas so //
NK055(ri)001:8309: srid pa gsum gyi bdag po ni ru dra ste khams gsum log pa'i lam du btsud pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:8310: dbang drag gi sgo nas 'dul ba'i ru dra'i log pa'i nga rgyal 'dul ba'i phyir/
NK055(ri)001:8311: dgongs pa chos sku'i ngang las g.yo ba med pa'i
NK055(ri)001:8312: ngang nga rgyal chen pos ru dra'i log pa'i nga
NK055(ri)001:8314: zhes pa sku gsung thugs te/
NK055(ri)001:8315: sku'i gzi brjid ni gar dgu la sogs te khro tshul drug cu dang ldan pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:8316: gsung gi gzi brjid ni da ha pa tsa la
NK055(ri)001:8317: sogs te ru dra'i ngag gi nus pa phrog par
NK055(ri)001:8318: byed pa'o // thugs kyi gzi brjid ni rang byung
NK055(ri)001:8319: gi ye shes 'jig pa'i dus kyi me dpung lta
NK055(ri)001:8320: bus ru dra'i sems kyi rtog pa gdug pa dang
NK055(ri)001:8321: bcas pa skad cig ma la mi gnas par mdzad
NK055(ri)001:8322: byed pa'o // pa'o // de lta bu ru dra'i
NK055(ri)001:8323: ngo la snang ba la ni bstan pa zhes bya
NK055(ri)001:8325: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/
NK055(ri)001:8326: zhes pa thams cad rigs lngas bsdus pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:8328: gsu nga rdo rje lta bu/
NK055(ri)001:8329: thugs rdo rje lta bu de gsum yang mi phyed
NK055(ri)001:8330: cing dbyer med pa rdo rje'i bdag po ni kun
NK055(ri)001:8331: tu bzang po'o // de'i mtshan nyid ni bcom ldan
NK055(ri)001:8332: 'das dgyes pa chen po ni 'khor 'das dbyer med
NK055(ri)001:8333: tu bzang po'o // pa'i bdag nyid de/ longs spyod
NK055(ri)001:8334: gnyis la dus gcig tu yul bral du rol pas
NK055(ri)001:8337: zhes pa khro tshul rnam pa bzhi dang ldan pa'i
NK055(ri)001:8338: khrag 'thung gi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rtsa ba
NK055(ri)001:8339: rigs lnga'i he ru ka yin la/
NK055(ri)001:8340: de'i yang dbyer med pas rgyal po lta bu ni kun bzang he ru ka ste/
NK055(ri)001:8341: dngos su che mchog gi skur snang ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:8342: de las ru dra 'dul ba'i phyir/
NK055(ri)001:8343: khams gsum khro bo'i dkyil 'khor du snang bar byed pa'i gzhi/
NK055(ri)001:8345: zhes pa he ru ka'i dgongs pa gzhi ma nges
NK055(ri)001:8346: pa las khro bo'i tshogs cir yang snang ba la
NK055(ri)001:8347: ni rnam par 'phro ba zhes bya ste/
NK055(ri)001:8348: de yang thabs shes rab dbyer med pa'i dkyil 'khor
NK055(ri)001:8349: 'phro ba la ni sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba zhes bya'o
NK055(ri)001:8350: // rgyal po ni de ltar mdzad pa'i phrin las la rig pa rang dbang bsgyur ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:8351: ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa ltar snang ba ni gdul bya'i snang ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:8353: de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nas zhes pa la sogs te/
NK055(ri)001:8354: de bzhin nyid ni don gnyis su med pa'i ye
NK055(ri)001:8355: shes spros pa dang bral ba la ni de bzhin
NK055(ri)001:8356: nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ste/
NK055(ri)001:8357: dbyings ni mdzad pa'i phrin las mi 'gag pa'i ngo bo ste/
NK055(ri)001:8358: rtags che mchog gi thugs ka nas so //
NK055(ri)001:8359: khro mo ni shes rab kyi rang bzhin che mchog gi yum mo //
NK055(ri)001:8360: dbang phyug ni chos thams cad la mnga' brnyes pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:8361: chen mo ni kro d+hi shwa ri ma ste/
NK055(ri)001:8362: thugs ka nas sku rdzogs par phyung ste g.yon du bzhugs pa'i tshul lo //
NK055(ri)001:8364: zhes pa yab yum gcig la gcig dgyes pa'i gad mo ni hi hi ste ngag tu 'byin pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:8365: gad mo de brjod pa'i gzi mdangs kyis rtog pa med kyang dgos 'dod skong bas rin chen/
NK055(ri)001:8366: mtha' gnyis kyi skyon dang bral bas pad+ma/
NK055(ri)001:8367: dgyes mdzad ni gdul bya dang mthun par bde ba rgyas pa lta bur mdzad nas/
NK055(ri)001:8368: gnyis su med par yab yum thabs shes rab dbyer
NK055(ri)001:8369: med par 'khril ba'i bde ba myong ba lta bu'i
NK055(ri)001:8370: dgyes pas dgongs pa gcig tu gyur pa lta bu
NK055(ri)001:8371: la ni thim nas zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:8372: khro bo 'chol ba'i rgyu rkyen ni/
NK055(ri)001:8373: yab kyi byang chub kyi sems nyi zla gnyis yum gyi mkha' la spros te/
NK055(ri)001:8374: khro bo thams cad kyi rgyu yin pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:8375: khro bo'i tshogs zad pa med par 'phro zhing cir
NK055(ri)001:8376: yang snang bas sprin te dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi
NK055(ri)001:8378: h'u h'u h'u bi shwa badz+ra la sogs pa'i sngags te/
NK055(ri)001:8379: h'u gsum ni sku gsung thugs gsum mo //
NK055(ri)001:8386: ha la gsum dug gsum sgrol ba ste/
NK055(ri)001:8387: de yang sku gsung thugs las snang ba'i rdo rje
NK055(ri)001:8388: khro bo sna tshogs nang du ye shes 'bar phyi
NK055(ri)001:8389: rol du phrin las 'bar ba'i man+dala dkyil 'khor sku
NK055(ri)001:8391: ru dra'i lus ngag yid gsum bsgral bas phata gsum/
NK055(ri)001:8392: sku gsung thugs kyi sgo nas ru dra'i dug gsum
NK055(ri)001:8393: bsgral nas h'u ye shes lnga'i nang du sdus shig
NK055(ri)001:8394: pa'o // che mchog he ru kas sngags de brjod
NK055(ri)001:8395: pa'i rkyen gyis khro bo 'chol ba'i tshogs dngos su
NK055(ri)001:8396: pa'o // spro ba ni/ 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu/
NK055(ri)001:8398: yab yum rol pa'i byang chub sems las sngags kyi rkyen gyis khro bo'i tshogs spros te/
NK055(ri)001:8399: gnas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu mtha' yas par khro bo'i tshogs kyis khyab ste/
NK055(ri)001:8400: de yang khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs che chung gi tshad ni stong gsum gyi 'jig rten tsam/
NK055(ri)001:8401: mang nyung ni phyogs bcu'i rdul phra mo snyed thon par gyur nas/
NK055(ri)001:8402: byin rlabs kyis phyi nang gi sa g.yos pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:8405: khro bo'i snang ba'i cho 'phrul gyis g.yos tshabs chung ngu g.yos/
NK055(ri)001:8406: de bas kyang tshabs che ba rab tu g.yos/
NK055(ri)001:8407: de bas kyang che bar kun tu g.yos so //
NK055(ri)001:8408: de ni phyi ltar sa g.yo ba gsum mo //
NK055(ri)001:8409: nang du na de bzhin nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin mgo zug pas g.yos/
NK055(ri)001:8412: sa g.yo ba'i dus su 'ur 'ur gyi sgra grags pa rab tu 'ur 'ur/
NK055(ri)001:8413: de bas che ba kun tu 'ur 'ur/
NK055(ri)001:8414: de bas kyang tshabs che bar song ba phyi'o //
NK055(ri)001:8415: nang ltar na kun tu snang gi ting 'dzin g.yo thob brtan pa gsum mo //
NK055(ri)001:8416: chem chem ni 'jig rten zhig pa lta bu'i sgra tshabs che chung gsum mo //
NK055(ri)001:8417: nang du phyag rgya gcig pa'i g.yo thob brtan pa gsum mo //
NK055(ri)001:8418: shig shig gsum ni 'jig rten zhig pa'i sgra che chung gsum mo //
NK055(ri)001:8419: nang du phyag rgya gcig pa rags pa'i g.yo thob brtan pa gsum mo //
NK055(ri)001:8420: gtor gtor ni 'jig rten zhig nas rlung gis khyer
NK055(ri)001:8421: te mi gnas pa lta bu'i sgra che chung gsum
NK055(ri)001:8422: mo // nang du phyag rgya spros pa'i g.yo thob brtan pa gsum mo //
NK055(ri)001:8423: dregs pa rnams las sems tshar bcad pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:8426: dbang che ba ni ma h+aa de wa'o //
NK055(ri)001:8427: gzi brjid che ba ni tshangs pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:8428: mthu che ba ni khyab mjug ste/
NK055(ri)001:8429: dbang phyug chen po ni ru dra dngos te khams gsum la dbang bsgyur ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:8430: sogs khongs su ru dra'i 'khor du gyur pa lha
NK055(ri)001:8431: ma srin sde brgyad kyi gtso bo ma lus pa
NK055(ri)001:8432: bsdus te/ gong du cho 'phrul rnams kyi byin rlabs kyis brgyal ba ni/
NK055(ri)001:8433: khams 'khrugs te dran pa nyams pa'i skad cig ma dang po'o //
NK055(ri)001:8434: rab tu brgyal ba ni dran pa ye nyams te nag thoms kyis song ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:8435: kun tu rab tu brgyal ba ni/
NK055(ri)001:8436: phyis kyang nus pa ldang rgyu med pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:8437: yang na brgyal ba ni lus 'gyel ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:8438: rab tu brgyal ba ni sems myos pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:8439: kun tu rab tu brgyal ba ni gdug pa phyis ldang rgyu med pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:8440: zhe sdang rdo rje'i yab gtso bo'i cha lugs ni/
NK055(ri)001:8442: zhes pa la sogs pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:8443: gdul bya'i ngo la skabs 'dir 'jig rten gyi khams
NK055(ri)001:8444: thams cad khrag 'thung gi gzhal yas khang du gyur
NK055(ri)001:8445: te/ 'og gzhi 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams kyang dur khrod kyi 'byung ba rnams su gyur te/
NK055(ri)001:8446: khrag 'thung gi dkyil 'khor las ma gtogs pa tha
NK055(ri)001:8447: mal pa'i 'jig rten gyi snang ba ma dmigs pa
NK055(ri)001:8448: lta bu'o // der gzhal yas khang gi nang du
NK055(ri)001:8449: ru dra la sogs pa rnams kyang 'gyel bas gdan
NK055(ri)001:8451: khro bo 'chol ba'i tshogs spros nas/
NK055(ri)001:8452: de rnams kyi byin brlabsa kyis gong gi cho 'phrul rnams byung /
NK055(ri)001:8453: ru dra la sogs pa'i dregs byed thams cad bsgyel
NK055(ri)001:8454: te nyams par byas nas mdzad pa de rnams kyi
NK055(ri)001:8455: dus su che mchog he ru ka yang bus dpa'
NK055(ri)001:8456: byas na pha ngam pa skye ba bzhin du zhal
NK055(ri)001:8457: phyag 'di lta bur gyur pa yin te/
NK055(ri)001:8458: dgyes pa chen po nyid che mchog he ru ka'o //
NK055(ri)001:8459: nang du nyon mongs pa 'jig /phyi rol du ru
NK055(ri)001:8460: dra la sogs mi gnas par mdzad pa nyid rang
NK055(ri)001:8461: byung gi ye shes snang bas/
NK055(ri)001:8462: 'jigs byed chen po shin tu rngam pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:8463: nang du nyon mongs pa phyi rol du ru dra la rngam pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:8465: zhes pa ru dra la sogs pa'i gnod byed rnams
NK055(ri)001:8466: nyon mongs pa he ru ka mthong ba tsam gyis
NK055(ri)001:8467: bdag 'dzin rtsad nas dag ste mi gnas pas/
NK055(ri)001:8468: skyi bung zhes byed pa'i nang ye shes 'bar la/
NK055(ri)001:8469: phyi'i bskal pa'i me dpung na bzhugs pas 'bar ba
NK055(ri)001:8470: chen po'i dpal gsum gsum dang ldan pa'i he ru
NK055(ri)001:8471: ka khams gsum gyi 'dod chags zad par mdzad pa'i
NK055(ri)001:8472: rtags su khrag 'thung ba ltar snang ba/
NK055(ri)001:8473: sku smug nag gi 'bar ba ru dra dbang du mdzad pa'i rtags/
NK055(ri)001:8474: nag po drag po'i sgo nas tshar bcad pa'i rtags su snang ba/
NK055(ri)001:8477: zhes pa zhi rgyas kyi phrin las kyang 'char du
NK055(ri)001:8478: rung ba dbu dang phyag zhabs nges pa med par
NK055(ri)001:8479: grangs bsam gyis mi khyab pa/
NK055(ri)001:8480: phyag mtshan yang mtshon sna tshogs par gyur pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:8481: khro bo 'chol ba rnams kyis ru dra tshar bcad pa'i dus su'o //
NK055(ri)001:8482: de'i sku chen po des ru dra 'khor dang bcas pa gdan du bting nas/
NK055(ri)001:8483: dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi par gyur te/
NK055(ri)001:8485: phyag drug ye shes drug /zhabs phrin las bzhi'i don no //
NK055(ri)001:8486: gyur te ni dbu phyag mang po skad cig mas snang ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:8487: dur khrod chen por dgyes nas/
NK055(ri)001:8489: dgongs pa dang mdzad pa gnyis/
NK055(ri)001:8490: dgongs pa'i dur ni chos sku mnyam pa chen po
NK055(ri)001:8491: la 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad der gcig pa
NK055(ri)001:8492: ni dur ro // gzugs sku gnyis gdul bya'i ngo la cir yang snang ba ni khrod pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:8493: chen po ni de nyid dbyer med pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:8494: dgyes pa ni de nyid la 'dzin pa'i chos phra ba yang ma dmigs pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:8495: mdzad pa ni dpal he ru ka'i mdzad pa drag po'i sgo nas ru dra 'khor bcas 'dul ba ste/
NK055(ri)001:8496: 'jig rten drag byed ma lus pa gnas der sdud pa ni dur ro //
NK055(ri)001:8497: 'dul ba'i thabs kyi phrin las cir yang 'char ba ni khrod pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:8498: las kyi ru dra 'dul ba'i phyir/
NK055(ri)001:8499: gdul bya'i ngo la ltar snang gi gnas dur khrod
NK055(ri)001:8500: gyi rgyud dur khrod ci ltar snang yang ru dra
NK055(ri)001:8502: mnyam pa nyid kyi ngang las ma g.yos pa chen po'o //
NK055(ri)001:8503: dgyes pa ni gdul bya ru dra 'dul ba la gdul bya 'dul byed ma dmigs kyang /
NK055(ri)001:8504: yul dang 'dzom pa'i dus su mdzad pa'i phrin las rang shar ba la/
NK055(ri)001:8505: me long gi gzugs brnyan ltar snang ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:8507: zhes pa khams gsum gyi 'dod chags ma spangs gnas
NK055(ri)001:8508: su dag pa'i phyir 'byung ba chu'i rgya mtsho'i dod
NK055(ri)001:8509: pa'o // keng rus chen po'i ri rab kyi steng /
NK055(ri)001:8510: zhes pa rus pa sna tshogs brtsigs pa'i ri rab ni nga rgyal ma spangs gnas su dag pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:8511: de'i steng na rang byung gi ye shes phyi nang med par 'bar ba'i rtags su/
NK055(ri)001:8512: me 'bar ba'i dkyil na gzhal yas khang bzhugs pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:8513: de'i shugs la sha chen gyi sa gzhi la sogs pa gzhan ma'ang rang grub tu gzung ngo //
NK055(ri)001:8514: gzhal yas khang gi 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi'i dbus su/
NK055(ri)001:8515: dbang phyug chen po ni ma h+aa de wa'o //
NK055(ri)001:8516: dur khrod bdag po ni ru dra'o //
NK055(ri)001:8517: khyo shug pho mo byi chings su bsnol ba'i gdan
NK055(ri)001:8518: la zhabs bzhi thabs dang shes rab kyi tshul gyis
NK055(ri)001:8520: tsham rngam drag pos lha chen 'dar bsgyel bardzisa zhes pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:8521: rigs bzhi he ru ka bstan pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:8522: khro bo'i dkyil 'khor sprin dpung de dag kyang sngar
NK055(ri)001:8523: byang chub sems las 'phros pa phyogs bcur khyab pa
NK055(ri)001:8524: thams cad do // la la ni dpal khrag 'thung /
NK055(ri)001:8527: zhes pa phyogs bzhir bgos pa'i shar phyogs kyi khro
NK055(ri)001:8528: bo ma lus pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus pa
NK055(ri)001:8529: de/ ye shes na me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid badz+ra he ru ka'i skur gyur te/
NK055(ri)001:8531: zhes pa sku mdog mthing nag zhal gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi/
NK055(ri)001:8532: zhal g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing /
NK055(ri)001:8533: shar gyi 'khor lo rtsibs la brkyang bskum du bzhugs so //
NK055(ri)001:8534: la la ni dpal khrag 'thung chen po rin po che/
NK055(ri)001:8535: zhes pa mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi rang
NK055(ri)001:8536: bzhin lho phyogs kyi khro bo thams cad gcig tu
NK055(ri)001:8537: 'dus pa las rat+na he ru ka ser nag /dbu
NK055(ri)001:8538: gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi dang ldan pa lho'i 'khor
NK055(ri)001:8541: zhes pa so sor rtogs pa'i ye shes las grub
NK055(ri)001:8542: pa'i nub phyogs kyi khro bo thams cad gcig tu
NK055(ri)001:8543: 'dus pa pad+ma he ru ka dmar nag dbu gsum
NK055(ri)001:8544: phyag drug par gyur te nub kyi rtsibs la bzhugs
NK055(ri)001:8545: so // la la ni dpal khrag 'thung chen po kun tu las/
NK055(ri)001:8546: zhes pa bya ba grub pa'i ye shes las snang
NK055(ri)001:8547: ba'i karma he ru ka ste ljang nag dbu gsum
NK055(ri)001:8548: phyag drug zhabs bzhi 'khor lo rtsibs kyi byang phyogs
NK055(ri)001:8549: su bzhugs so // de dag gi cha lugs ni/
NK055(ri)001:8551: zhes pa rigs bzhi he ru ka de dag kun kyang 'jigs byed chen po'i cha lugs ni/
NK055(ri)001:8552: dur khrod kyi chas dang ldan pa gtso bo dang mthun no //
NK055(ri)001:8553: rngams pa'i nga ro ni gdul bya rngams pa'i ha la dang da ha pa tsa la sogs pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:8554: me 'bar ba'i klong na dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi/
NK055(ri)001:8555: zhes pa badz+ra he ru kas dri za pho mo bsnol ba/
NK055(ri)001:8556: karma he ru kas gnod sbyin pho mo bsnol ba/
NK055(ri)001:8557: pad+ma he ru kas srin po pho mo bsnol ba/
NK055(ri)001:8558: rat+na he ru kas gshin rje pho mo bsnol ba/
NK055(ri)001:8559: sogs khongs su nang rtags phyi ru shar ba'i gdan rin po che dang /
NK055(ri)001:8561: pad zla nyi ma rnams bsdus so //
NK055(ri)001:8562: khyo shug ni gdan rnams kyi pho mo bsnol ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:8563: gdan la brkyang bskum bzhugs so //
NK055(ri)001:8565: btsun mo khrag 'thung chen mo zhes pa la sogs te/
NK055(ri)001:8566: so so'i yab la mnyes pa stob pa'i phyir na
NK055(ri)001:8567: btsun mo khrag 'thung gi yum yin pas na khrag
NK055(ri)001:8568: 'thung chen mo sngar spros pa'i dus su mang bas
NK055(ri)001:8569: tshogs rnams kyang yab yum dus gcig sku grub pas/
NK055(ri)001:8570: yab so so'i sku la thabs dang shes rab 'khril pa'i tshul gyis bzhugs te/
NK055(ri)001:8571: yum rnams ni zhal gcig phyag gnyis so //
NK055(ri)001:8572: dregs pa nga rgyal ston pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:8573: de nas dregs pa chen po/
NK055(ri)001:8574: zhes pa la sogs pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:8575: dregs pa gnon pa'i phrin las de nas dregs pa chen po ru dra'o //
NK055(ri)001:8576: sogs khongs su 'khor thams cad bsdus so //
NK055(ri)001:8577: gtum pa'i sems ni kho gnon pa nga rgyal bskyed pa lta bu'o //
NK055(ri)001:8578: gdug pa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po ni/
NK055(ri)001:8579: slar he ru ka la rgol ba'i bsam pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:8580: sprul pa bardzu ba'i rdzu 'phrul bstan/
NK055(ri)001:8581: zhes pa bdud kyi ru mtshon phugs su btsugs/
NK055(ri)001:8582: mtshon cha sna tshogs bsnams pa la sogs pa dgongs
NK055(ri)001:8583: pa 'dus pa nas bstan pa'i rdzu 'phrul rnams te
NK055(ri)001:8585: ngag gi sgo nas mgrin gcig tu brjod pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:8586: sems kyi sgo nas rgol ba'i bsam pa can ni gdug pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:8587: nga ro ni barlanga tshig smra ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:8588: gtum pa ni rgol ba'i bsam pa zhe sdang gis tshig pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:8589: thong thong ni de tsug ma byed ngam mnan zhes pa lta bu'o //
NK055(ri)001:8591: khyod snying rje'i bdag po yin cing zhe sdang gi las de ltar byed dam/
NK055(ri)001:8593: shin tu gdug cing zhe sdang gi sems kyis he
NK055(ri)001:8594: ru ka la rngams nas khros pa'i tshul ston pa'o
NK055(ri)001:8596: de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa/
NK055(ri)001:8597: zhes pa la sogs pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:8598: 'dir gcig gis mang po 'dul ba'i ngo mtshar yin
NK055(ri)001:8599: pas he ru ka gcig tu bstim pa lta bu
NK055(ri)001:8600: yang bzhed/ bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po ni/
NK055(ri)001:8601: rigs lnga dbyer med pa'i dbu dgu/
NK055(ri)001:8604: zhes pa rigs lnga'i he ru ka las rdo rje srin por gyur pa'am/
NK055(ri)001:8605: yang na gtso bo dngos te dbu dgu ni rnam
NK055(ri)001:8606: par thar pa dgu'i ngo bo dgu klong gi zhal
NK055(ri)001:8607: te rigs lnga/ rak+sha he ru ka /sa nu he
NK055(ri)001:8608: ru ka /yak+sha he ru ka /gu h+ya he ru
NK055(ri)001:8609: ka dang dgu'i zhal gyi ngo bo'o //
NK055(ri)001:8612: yang na mdzad pa phrin las kyi ngos nas ging chen po bco brgyad do //
NK055(ri)001:8613: zhabs brgyad ni theg pa chen po brgyad dam/
NK055(ri)001:8615: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang brgyad kyi rtags so //
NK055(ri)001:8616: sku de lta bur bstan nas/
NK055(ri)001:8617: gsung rngams pa'i skad kyis 'og nas 'byung ba'i sngags brjod cing /
NK055(ri)001:8619: zhes pa gnyis su med pa'i thugs rje'i ngang la
NK055(ri)001:8620: gdul bya 'dul byed dbyer med pa nyid las yul
NK055(ri)001:8621: dang 'phrad pa'i thugs rje'i stobs kyis ngo bo la
NK055(ri)001:8623: 'dul ba'i phrin las rang snang ba'i thabs kyi drag
NK055(ri)001:8624: po'i sgo nas ru dra'i don chen po mngon du
NK055(ri)001:8626: shin tu khros pa ni dgongs pa chos sku las
NK055(ri)001:8627: mi 'da' ba ngang gis khro ba mdzad pa'i phrin
NK055(ri)001:8628: las ru dra'i ngo la khros pa ltar snang ba
NK055(ri)001:8630: h'u gsum ni sku gsung thugs kyi ngang du sdud pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:8631: ha gsum ni sku gsung thugs kyi ngos nas bdag
NK055(ri)001:8632: don dang gzhan don gnyis dgyes pas ru dra rngam
NK055(ri)001:8633: pa'i skad do // kh+aa hi gsum ni rting pa
NK055(ri)001:8634: la sha khrag gsol ba ste sku gsung thugs kyi
NK055(ri)001:8635: ngang du gsol nas sdud pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:8637: dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa ru dra gdug
NK055(ri)001:8638: pa'i tshogs kun rang las bsags sa med par yul
NK055(ri)001:8639: dang 'phrad pa'i thugs rjes gdul bya'i tshogs rdzogs par
NK055(ri)001:8640: bya ba'i phyir/ de dag gi snying dang dbang po kun phyungs/
NK055(ri)001:8641: zhes pa bdag 'dzin rtsa nas dag pa'i phyir snying phyung ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:8642: dbang po kun phyung ba ni/
NK055(ri)001:8643: sgo lnga'i rnam shes gzung 'dzin rtsa nas dag pa'i phyir ro //
NK055(ri)001:8644: nang khrol kun phyungs pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:8645: yul lnga la mngon par zhen pa'i skad cig ma
NK055(ri)001:8646: snga phyi 'brel ba gtan nas dag pa'i phyir ro
NK055(ri)001:8647: // yan lag kun bcad gtubs pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:8648: las ngan pa'i rgyun bcad pa'am/
NK055(ri)001:8649: bya byed kyi rtsol ba bdag 'dzin gyis bskyed pa dag pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:8650: 'dod chags zad par bya ba'i phyir khrag 'thung /
NK055(ri)001:8651: gti mug zad pa'i phyir sha zos/
NK055(ri)001:8652: zhe sdang dag pa'i phyir rus pa kun 'chos pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:8655: b+h+yo zhes pa la sogs pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:8656: 'dir 'jig rten pas bla btab mgo khyer zhes 'jig rten pas brjod pa lta bu ste/
NK055(ri)001:8657: h'u gsum ni sku gsung thugs te de'i gzi byin gyi sdud pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:8659: b+h+yo zhes pas nyi shu rtsa brgyad do //
NK055(ri)001:8661: mkha' 'gro ma dgug pa'i sngags te/
NK055(ri)001:8662: dzahganyisa ni nges par khug cig pa'o zhes brjod pas/
NK055(ri)001:8663: snod bcud rangs pa sdud pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:8664: sngags brjod pa'i byin rlabs kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten
NK055(ri)001:8665: gyi khams nam mkha' dang bcas pa ni bsdu bya'i
NK055(ri)001:8666: dngos po'o // yungs 'bru gcig tsam du bsdus/
NK055(ri)001:8667: zhes pa ni phyi ltar na dregs pa bsgral ba'i
NK055(ri)001:8668: rnam shes rnams bsdus te chos nyid du tshud nas
NK055(ri)001:8669: bden pa mthong bar byas pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:8670: nang ltar na dbang phyug ma'i bde ba thams cad
NK055(ri)001:8671: sna rtse yungs 'bru'i gzhal yas khang gi nang du
NK055(ri)001:8672: bsdus pa'o // de nas ni de ltar bsdus pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:8673: 'byung po ni ru dra'i rigs su gyur pa thams cad do //
NK055(ri)001:8674: de ma lus pa'i yang rgyal po ni/
NK055(ri)001:8675: tshangs pa brgya byin dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:8676: de dag gi yang rgyal po dregs pa chen po ni ru dra'o //
NK055(ri)001:8677: sogs khongs su dbang phyug ma nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi khyo rnams kyang bsdus so //
NK055(ri)001:8678: de dag gi chung ma ru dra 'khor dang bcas pa'i chung ma yin pas na 'byung mo/
NK055(ri)001:8679: thams cad kyi rje mo ni nyi shu rtsa bdun gyi chung ma'o //
NK055(ri)001:8680: de dag gi yang rje mo sring mo chen mo mi'i srin mo ni ru dra'i chung ma'o //
NK055(ri)001:8681: de ni sku mdog dmar nag g.yon b+han+d+ha dmar po khrag gis bkang ba/
NK055(ri)001:8685: zhes pa lha tshangs pa'i chung ma mdog dkar dbu bzhi kun tu zhal/
NK055(ri)001:8689: 'khrug mo ni lha chen po'i chung ma mdog dkar ljang g.yon tri sh+au la/
NK055(ri)001:8691: dbang mo brgya byin gyi chung ma g.yon rdo rje rtse gsum gdengs so //
NK055(ri)001:8692: tshul zhi ba mdog dkar po/
NK055(ri)001:8693: 'jug sred mo khyab mjug gi chung ma mdog sngo g.yon 'khor lo/
NK055(ri)001:8695: gzhon nu mo dbang phyug chen po'i chung ma mdog dmar/
NK055(ri)001:8698: dmar mo 'di la khyo med ma zhes kyang brjod/
NK055(ri)001:8699: 'jug sred kyi chung ma zhes kyang brjod/
NK055(ri)001:8701: g.yon thod khrag /tshul zhi ma khro/
NK055(ri)001:8702: bdud rtsi ma nyi ma'i chung ma mdog dmar/
NK055(ri)001:8705: zhi ba mo zla ba'i chung ma mdog dkar/
NK055(ri)001:8706: g.yon pun d+ha ri ka /tshul zhi ba/
NK055(ri)001:8707: be con mo gnod sbyin be con gyi chung ma mdog ljang gu/
NK055(ri)001:8710: srin mo gza' mig dmar gyi chung ma mdog dmar ser/
NK055(ri)001:8712: za ba mo srin po za byed kyi chung ma yang zer/
NK055(ri)001:8713: ma h+aa k+aa la'i chung ma yang zer/
NK055(ri)001:8714: mdog dmar nag /g.yon rgyu zhags 'dren zhing za ba/
NK055(ri)001:8715: dga' ba mo dga' byed kyi chung ma mdog dmar nag g.yon gri/
NK055(ri)001:8717: ra ro khrag 'thung ma stobs bzang gi chung ma mdog dkar g.yon gshol/
NK055(ri)001:8719: gcig pur spyod ma b+h+rim gi ri ti'i chung ma mdog dmar ser g.yon gri/
NK055(ri)001:8724: grub mo nor bsrung gi chung ma mdog dkar/
NK055(ri)001:8727: rlung ma rlung lha'i chung ma mdog sngo/
NK055(ri)001:8730: gsod byed mo gnod sbyin gsod byed kyi chung ma mdog dmar nag /g.yon ral gri/
NK055(ri)001:8732: me mo me lha'i chung ma mdog dmar ser/
NK055(ri)001:8735: phag mo sa bdag phag chen gyi chung ma mdog
NK055(ri)001:8736: dmar nag /g.yon phag rgod kyi mche ba btags pa'i
NK055(ri)001:8738: rgan byed mo gshin rje'i chung ma mdog dmar smug /g.yon byis pa'i rgyu ma zhal du gsol/
NK055(ri)001:8740: sna chen mo byi na ya ka'i chung ma mdog dmar nag /g.yon thod khrag /tshul zhi khro/
NK055(ri)001:8741: chu lha mo wa ru n+aa'i chung ma mdog dkar/
NK055(ri)001:8742: g.yon sbrul zhags mgo chu srin/
NK055(ri)001:8744: nag mo chen mo nag po chen po'i chung ma/
NK055(ri)001:8748: ra mgo dmar ser chen mo srin po ra mgo'i chung ma g.yon zhags pa/
NK055(ri)001:8750: bum sna sngo nag chen mo srin po bum sna'i
NK055(ri)001:8751: chung ma mdog dmar nag /g.yon lcags sgrog /tshul khro
NK055(ri)001:8752: mo/ gsus 'dzin ser nag chen mo gnod sbyin gsus 'dzin gyi chung ma mdog ljang nag /g.yon dril bu/
NK055(ri)001:8754: sogs khongs su 'khor rnams bsdu ste/
NK055(ri)001:8755: phyi 'khor gyi dman mo g.yog dang yang g.yog la
NK055(ri)001:8756: sogs te 'khor zhing gi rdul snyed dang bcas pa
NK055(ri)001:8757: dbang du sdud pa ni he ru ka'i mdun du
NK055(ri)001:8758: tshogs pa'o // yongs su rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyu ni/
NK055(ri)001:8759: de nas bcom ldan dgyes pa chen po zhes pa la sogs pa/
NK055(ri)001:8760: rdo rje srin po dngos te/
NK055(ri)001:8761: mo rnams sbyor te 'dul ba'i thabs kyis/
NK055(ri)001:8762: yang sku las rigs lnga'i 'jigs byed chen por dbang mo'i ngo la snang bar byas nas/
NK055(ri)001:8763: dbang mo de dag kun thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i dgyes par rol pa las/
NK055(ri)001:8765: 'khor cir yang 'byung ba'i cho 'phrul gyis ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs nas/
NK055(ri)001:8766: sku gsung thugs dbyer med pa'i rdo rje las 'og
NK055(ri)001:8767: nas 'byung ba'i sngags 'di dag rang grag tu phyung
NK055(ri)001:8768: ngo // +amo h'u +aam sku thugs gsung ngo //
NK055(ri)001:8769: badz+ra ni rdo rje ste gsang ba'i rdo rje dngos so //
NK055(ri)001:8770: pra we sha pad+ma'i 'dab ma dbye ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:8771: a la la hoh a chos nyid kyi ngo bo'o //
NK055(ri)001:8774: ho de'i don gyis mnyes pa/
NK055(ri)001:8775: don la gsang ba'i rdo rjes pad+ma'i 'dab ma phral
NK055(ri)001:8776: nas byang chub sems sku gsum gyi ngo bo dbab
NK055(ri)001:8779: 'byung po'i rgyal mo rnams he ru ka la chags
NK055(ri)001:8780: pa'i yid g.yos nas dbang mo'i pad+mo'i dkyil 'khor sdud
NK055(ri)001:8781: pa ni/ yungs 'bru'i sna rtse'i bde ba sdud pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:8782: cing ni de'i stobs kyis bde bas lus rgyas pa chags pa'i ngo bor gyur nas/
NK055(ri)001:8783: dper na rdo khab len la lcags rang bzhin gyis
NK055(ri)001:8784: 'du ba'i tshul du bcom ldan 'das dpal khrag 'thung
NK055(ri)001:8785: chen po badz+ra he ru ka gtso bo yin pa'i
NK055(ri)001:8786: sku la/ mi'i srin mo la sogs phyogs bzhi'i dang po'i bzhi/
NK055(ri)001:8787: sgo ma bzhi dang brgyad 'khril ba gzhung na gsal/
NK055(ri)001:8788: bcom ldan 'das dpal khrag 'thung chen po bud+d+ha he
NK055(ri)001:8789: ru ka'i sku la tshangs ma la sogs te shar
NK055(ri)001:8790: gyi lnga 'khril/ bcom ldan 'das dpal khrag 'thung chen po rat+na he ru ka'i sku la/
NK055(ri)001:8791: bdud rtsi mo la sogs te lho'i lnga 'khril/
NK055(ri)001:8792: bcom ldan 'das pad+ma he ru ka'i sku la khrag gis myos ma la sogs pa nub kyi lnga 'khril/
NK055(ri)001:8793: bcom ldan 'das karma he ru ka'i sku la/
NK055(ri)001:8794: me mo la sogs pa byang gi lnga 'khril lo //
NK055(ri)001:8795: de dag kyang he ru ka'i sku la ma mo
NK055(ri)001:8796: rnams kyi so so rang rang gi ngo bzhin du
NK055(ri)001:8797: mthong bas he ru ka la g.yo ba med kyang
NK055(ri)001:8798: / ma mo'i ngo bzhin brgyad dang lnga la sogs par snang ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:8799: ngo mtshar tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mdor bstan pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:8800: de nas bcom ldan dgyes pa chen po zhes pa la sogs pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:8801: ma mo rnams kyi sku la 'khril ba de nas/
NK055(ri)001:8802: khro bo'i dkyil 'khor de dag ni rigs lnga'o //
NK055(ri)001:8803: h'u sdud pa'i las can yin pa brjod pas/
NK055(ri)001:8804: dbang mo rnams kyi pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs rnams he ru ka la chags pa'i dbang gi bsdus nas/
NK055(ri)001:8805: shin tu bcum par gyur te/
NK055(ri)001:8806: zhes pa yab kyi gsang ba'i rdo rje bcum pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:8807: phyag rgya bzhi'i las kyis stod smad nas 'khyud pa yang gzung ngo //
NK055(ri)001:8808: de nas 'khor bskyed pa dngos ni/
NK055(ri)001:8809: de nas dgyes te ha zhes brjod pas/
NK055(ri)001:8810: zhes pa he ru ka dang dbang mo yab yum
NK055(ri)001:8811: sbyor ba'i mkha' las rgyu byang sems las rkyen ha
NK055(ri)001:8812: brgyad brjod pas/ dbang mo'i mkha'i byang chub sems kyi sprin las 'bras bu ma mo rnams su snang ste/
NK055(ri)001:8814: zhes pa dpal chen po'i thugs las byung ste/
NK055(ri)001:8815: thugs la nyon mongs pa'i skyon gyis ma gos pa'i rtags su dkar mo zhes bya ste/
NK055(ri)001:8816: phrin las zhi ba'i las mdzad pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:8817: thugs 'gyur ba med pa'i rtags su sku mdog sngon mo/
NK055(ri)001:8818: phyag na byis pa'i dbyug pa 'dzin pa ni nyon mongs pa lnga gnas su dag pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:8819: gdul bya'i nyer len gyi phung po lnga bcom pa'i rtags so //
NK055(ri)001:8820: tshogs rnams ni 'phro ba'i dus su mang por snang
NK055(ri)001:8821: ba las bkod pa'i dus su sku re rer gyur
NK055(ri)001:8822: nas bzhugs pa ste/ kun la 'agre'o //
NK055(ri)001:8823: rkun mo tsoo r+ai ma ste phyag na thabs shes
NK055(ri)001:8824: rab kyi mda' gzhu 'gengs nas 'bras bu'i gu na
NK055(ri)001:8825: thams cad bsdus nas sgrub pa po'i thugs kar bstim
NK055(ri)001:8826: pa'i phyir na rkun mo zhes bya ste/
NK055(ri)001:8828: sku mdog ser ba ni sku yon tan thams cad
NK055(ri)001:8829: kyi rten byed pas gdul bya'i dgos pa skong ba'i
NK055(ri)001:8831: zhes pa pra mo ha ste mtha' gnyis kyi rtog pa mi gnas par mdzad pa'i rtags su rmongs mo/
NK055(ri)001:8832: mtha' gnyis dbang du bsdus pa'i phyir sku mdog dmar mo ste dbang gi las so //
NK055(ri)001:8833: g.yas na chu srin rgyal mtshan bsnams pa ni gsung
NK055(ri)001:8834: gi sgo nas gdul bya la thugs rje bskyed pas
NK055(ri)001:8835: gzung shes gtong mi shes kyi rtags su chu srin/
NK055(ri)001:8836: mtha' gnyis las rgyal ba'i rtags su rgyal mtshan/
NK055(ri)001:8837: g.yon thod khrag ni thugs rjes nam yang chags pa dang ma bral ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:8840: zhes pa phrin las kyi ma mo ste/
NK055(ri)001:8841: phrin las ci mdzad kyang skad cig la lhun gyis
NK055(ri)001:8842: grub pas bskyar mi dgos pas thal byed ma zhes
NK055(ri)001:8843: bya ste/ g.yon gyis byis pa'i ro za ba ni
NK055(ri)001:8844: nyer len gyi phung po lnga gnas su dag pa'o
NK055(ri)001:8845: bya ste/ // g.yas kyis rdo rje bsnams pa ni
NK055(ri)001:8846: khams gsum ye shes kyi ngang du sbyor bar mdzad
NK055(ri)001:8848: zhes pa sku mdog dmar ser g.yon gyis zhing 'dzin/
NK055(ri)001:8850: sbos pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i yon tan gyis rgyas pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:8852: g.yas kyis rgyu ma 'dren pa ni thugs rjes 'gro
NK055(ri)001:8853: ba'i gnas nas gdul bya rnams 'dren nas thar par
NK055(ri)001:8854: sgrol ba'o // gtum mo ni g+hasma r+ai sku mdog ljang gu ste/
NK055(ri)001:8855: gtum pa ni drag shul gyi bdag yin pas las drag po la mnga' mdzad pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:8856: phyag gnyis kyis zhing khur ba ni khams gsum 'khor ba dang len nas sgrol ba'i rtags so //
NK055(ri)001:8857: sku mdog ljang ba ni phrin las sna tshogs la mnga' mdzad pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:8859: nying sha nying gis za zhes pa lta bu ste/
NK055(ri)001:8860: las kyi dngos po thams cad khams gsum gnas su sgrol nas khams gsum gyi rtsa ba gcod pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:8861: sku mdog ni mthing nag chos nyid mi 'gyur ba mtshon //
NK055(ri)001:8862: phyag gnyis kyis zhing gcig bzung nas snying ga nas
NK055(ri)001:8863: snying dang bcas pa tshems kyis 'dren pa ste khams
NK055(ri)001:8864: gsum gyi rtsa ba gzung 'dzin rtsad nas bcad pa'i
NK055(ri)001:8866: zhes pa tshe'i lha mo tsan+da l+ai tshe 'phel bar byed pa rgyas pa'i las la dbang ste/
NK055(ri)001:8867: zhing gi rke bcad nas g.yas kyis mgo bsnams/
NK055(ri)001:8868: g.yon pas khog pa bsnams pa ni gzung 'dzin rtsad nas dag par mdzad pa'i rtags so //
NK055(ri)001:8869: ma mo nyi shu'i tshogs rnams he ru ka'i thugs
NK055(ri)001:8870: snang bas he ru ka'i che ba'i yon tan snang
NK055(ri)001:8871: ba'o // rang rang gi lag cha dang /
NK055(ri)001:8872: zhes pa sngar bshad pa'i lag cha rnams so //
NK055(ri)001:8874: zhes pa nang du nyon mongs pa 'dul ba ngo mtshar/
NK055(ri)001:8875: phyi ru dra 'khor dang bcas pa 'dul ba la ngo mtshar ba dang /
NK055(ri)001:8876: rgyan dang cha lugs dang bcas nas yab yum gyi mkha' gsang nas 'thon zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:8877: de ltar 'thon nas kyang gar bzhugs zhe na/
NK055(ri)001:8878: mkha' nas 'thon nas sngar bshad pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi
NK055(ri)001:8879: 'khor lo bskal pa'i me ri 'bar ba dang bcas
NK055(ri)001:8880: pa'i shar lho'i rtsibs mchan nas shar phyogs nas g.yas
NK055(ri)001:8881: bskor du 'khor bar gdul bya 'joms par byed pas
NK055(ri)001:8882: 'jigs pa'i gzugs dang rang rang gi lag cha dang
NK055(ri)001:8883: bcas pa phyogs phyogs su 'khod do //
NK055(ri)001:8884: de nas yang gnas kyi ma mo brgyad bskyed tshar
NK055(ri)001:8885: ba de nas yab yum gcig la gcig shin tu
NK055(ri)001:8886: dgyes nas/ rgyu byang chub kyi sems las rkyen he brgyad brjod pas yum gyi mkha' nas/
NK055(ri)001:8887: seng gdong chen mo'i tshogs dang /
NK055(ri)001:8888: zhes pa sing+ha ma bton te sku mdog ser/
NK055(ri)001:8890: thugs rjes 'khor ba dang mi 'bral ba'i rtags su kha na ro za ba/
NK055(ri)001:8891: phyag g.yas g.yon gnyis rtse gsum gyi phyag rgya bsnol
NK055(ri)001:8892: ba ste snod bcud sku gsung thugs su shar ba'o
NK055(ri)001:8895: zhes pa stag gi dbu can te sku mdog dmar mo yul sems dbang du bsdus pa'i rtags so //
NK055(ri)001:8896: phyag gnyis rtse gcig bsnol ba ste snod bcud rig pa'i ye shes su shar ba'i rtags/
NK055(ri)001:8897: mdun na zhing gcig la tsig ge gzigs pa ni
NK055(ri)001:8898: thugs rjes 'khor ba la rgyun chad med par gzigs
NK055(ri)001:8899: pa'i rtags so // wa gdong chen mo/
NK055(ri)001:8900: zhes pa gsung gi ngo bo wa'i dbu can te
NK055(ri)001:8901: sku mdog nag mo chos sku las mi 'gyur ba'i
NK055(ri)001:8902: rtags so // phyag gnyis kyis zhing gcig bzung nas lces chu ser ldag pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:8903: gdul bya rnams kyi rgyud la shes bya'i sgrib pa
NK055(ri)001:8904: phra ba'i phra ba yod pa sbyong ba'i rtags so
NK055(ri)001:8906: zhes pa khyi rgod spyang ku'i dbu can te thugs
NK055(ri)001:8907: chos nyid 'gyur ba med pa'i rtags sku mdog mthing
NK055(ri)001:8908: / phyag gnyis kyis zhing chung ngu zhig gi glo
NK055(ri)001:8909: snying la tsig ge gzigs pa ni khams gsum gyi
NK055(ri)001:8910: rtsa ba gzung 'dzin la gnas pas chos nyid du
NK055(ri)001:8911: / gzigs pa'i barda'o // bzhad gdong chen mo/
NK055(ri)001:8912: zhes pa bzhad gdong dkar mo bya rgod kyi dbu can te/
NK055(ri)001:8913: sku mdog dmar ba ni 'khor 'das dbang du mdzad pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:8914: g.yon thod pa'i nang na glo snying dang rgyu ma bsnams te/
NK055(ri)001:8915: rgyu ma 'dren zhing zhal du gsol ba ni thugs rjes 'khor ba 'dren pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:8916: g.yas kyis gri thogs pa 'khor ba'i rtsa ba gcod pa'i rtags so //
NK055(ri)001:8918: zhes pa bya kang ka mchu rings kyi dbu can te/
NK055(ri)001:8920: zhes pa sngo dmar ba ste dbang drag 'dus pa'i phrin las la mnga' mdzad pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:8921: phyag gnyis kyis zhing gcig phrag pa la khur ba ni 'khor ba dang du len pa'i rtags so //
NK055(ri)001:8923: zhes pa bya rog ste dur bya nag mo ro gar yod pa'i sa na rgyug pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:8924: chos nyid mi 'gyur ba'i rtags su sku mdog sngo
NK055(ri)001:8925: nag /chos sku thugs su chud pa'i rtags su kha
NK055(ri)001:8926: na ro bzung / g.yas gri ni 'khor ba'i rtsa ba gcod pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:8927: g.yon thod khrag ni khams gsum nyon mongs pa rig pa'i ye shes su dag par mdzad pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:8929: zhes pa sku mdog ljang gu 'ug pa'i mgo can g.yon dung khrag /g.yas lcags kyu ste/
NK055(ri)001:8930: sku mdog ljang pa ni phrin las thams cad la 'jug pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:8931: g.yon thod khrag ni 'khor ba dag par mdzad pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:8932: g.yas lcags kyu ni gdul bya sems can 'dren nas thar ba la 'god pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:8933: bud+d+ha'i thugs rje 'dren nas 'khor ba sbyong ba ste phrin las kyi ma mo'o //
NK055(ri)001:8934: rang rang gi lag cha ni phyag mtshan bshad pa rnams so //
NK055(ri)001:8935: phyi nang gnyis la ngo mtshar ba dang bcas pa yab yum gyi mkha' gsang nas 'thon to //
NK055(ri)001:8936: 'thon nas kyang 'bar ba chen po'i 'khor lo'i phyi rol/
NK055(ri)001:8937: zhes pa gru chad kyi lha rnams la shar nas bzung ste phyogs bzhi/
NK055(ri)001:8938: shar lho nas bzung ste mtshams bzhir dkyil 'khor 'khor
NK055(ri)001:8939: bar phyi nang gnyis la rngam pa'i gzi mdangs kyis
NK055(ri)001:8941: de nas yang he ru ka yab yum shin tu
NK055(ri)001:8942: dgyes nas byang chub sems kyi 'od zer gyis phyogs
NK055(ri)001:8943: bcu'i zhing ma lus par khyab nas/
NK055(ri)001:8944: rgyu byang chub sems las rkyen phata bzhi brjod nas/
NK055(ri)001:8945: rdo rje sring 'gro ma'i tshogs dang /
NK055(ri)001:8946: zhes pa sku mdog mthing nag thugs kyi rigs yin pas rta'i dbu can nam/
NK055(ri)001:8947: yang na g.yas rdo rje lcags kyu/
NK055(ri)001:8948: g.yon b+han+d+ha bdud rtsis bkang ba'i nang na rta mgo ljang zhur byung bas rta skad 'don pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:8950: rta bdag pos zhon nas 'gro ba'i dus su gnas
NK055(ri)001:8951: su ma phyin bar du bar ma dor mi bskyur
NK055(ri)001:8952: ba dang 'dra bar thugs rje chen pos 'gro ba'i
NK055(ri)001:8953: don mdzad pa'i dus su gdul byas 'bras bu ma
NK055(ri)001:8954: thob kyi bar du bar ma dor mi bskyur ba
NK055(ri)001:8955: mtshon no // rdo rje gdong mo'i tshogs/
NK055(ri)001:8956: zhes pa zhags pa ma ste/
NK055(ri)001:8959: yang na zhags pa'i rtse mo la phag mgo btags pa bsnams te/
NK055(ri)001:8960: phag gis gdong tshugs su sa rko ba dang 'dra bar gdul bya'i don mdzad pa'i dus su/
NK055(ri)001:8961: gdul bya'i nyon mongs pa sa gzhi dang 'dra ba sra ba la/
NK055(ri)001:8962: g.yas skor dang g.yon 'jab ma byed par phrin las thad sor mdzad pa'i rtags so //
NK055(ri)001:8964: zhes pa lcags sgrog ma dbang gi ma mo sku mdog dmar/
NK055(ri)001:8965: phyag gnyis kyis lcags sgrog bsnams te khog tser smin
NK055(ri)001:8966: mtshams kyi thad kar bab pa'i nang na nyi zla'i
NK055(ri)001:8967: ga'u'i nang na rnal 'byor pa'i tshe 'dzin pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:8969: 'jig rten na gsal byed nyi zla gnyis yin pa khog rtser bcug nas bsnams pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:8971: zhes pa dril bu ma ste sku mdog ljang khu phyag g.yas dril bu/
NK055(ri)001:8972: g.yon b+han+d+ha bdud rtsis bkang ba'i nang na bud+d+ha snang
NK055(ri)001:8973: ba mtha' yas sku lte ba yan chad 'byung ba
NK055(ri)001:8974: bsnams so // tshe'i ma mo ste/
NK055(ri)001:8976: zhes pa mi shi nas thal bar song ba yang bslang nus na/
NK055(ri)001:8977: ro bslang ba lta ci smos pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:8978: tshogs rnams ni sngar bshad zin to //
NK055(ri)001:8979: rang rang gi lag cha ni sngar bshad pa bzhin no //
NK055(ri)001:8980: phyi nang gnyis la ngo mtshar ba dang bcas pa 'thon to //
NK055(ri)001:8982: 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgo bzhir lcags kyu ma shar du bzhugs pas gzhan 'gre/
NK055(ri)001:8983: phyi nang gnyis la shin tu rngam pa'i gzugs kyis sgo bzhir gnas so //
NK055(ri)001:8985: dkyil 'khor bkod thon pa de nas yab yum rol
NK055(ri)001:8986: pas dgyes pa'i byang chub sems kyi sprin phyogs bcur
NK055(ri)001:8987: spros pa las/ phata ces pas dkyil 'khor thams cad
NK055(ri)001:8988: khros pa'i cha byad can gyi thog tu phata kyi
NK055(ri)001:8989: sgras shin tu khros pa lta bu ste gdul bya
NK055(ri)001:8990: 'dul ba'i phrin las thogs pa med par mdzad pa'i
NK055(ri)001:8991: spros pa las/ dgos pa'o // phyi rabs pa'i rnal
NK055(ri)001:8992: 'byor pas phrin las gang mdzad pa'i sngon du ting
NK055(ri)001:8993: nge 'dzin gsal gdab par yang mngon no //
NK055(ri)001:8994: de ni phata kyi sgras dkyil 'khor gsal 'debs so //
NK055(ri)001:8995: yang phata kyi sgras ma mo rnams gnas su bkye
NK055(ri)001:8996: ba'i ma mo thams cad dbang du bsdus rang dbang
NK055(ri)001:8997: med par sbyor/ dkyil 'khor bkod pa rdzogs/
NK055(ri)001:8998: ma mo rnams dpal dang sbyor bas dbang mnos/
NK055(ri)001:8999: bde ba'i ye shes myong nas mthong lam yan chod
NK055(ri)001:9000: la gnas par gyur pa ni mo rnams sbyor te
NK055(ri)001:9001: 'dul ba 'bras bu zag med la sbyor ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:9002: des na ma mo rnams la phra men zhes brjod pa yang /
NK055(ri)001:9004: mo ye shes pa gnyis las byung bas phra men zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:9005: ma mo thams cad phata kyi sgras rang rang gnas su yud tsam gyis phyin par bakye'o //
NK055(ri)001:9006: dregs pa gnas spar ba'i ting nge 'dzin la bzhag cing sngags brjod pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:9009: dpal khrag 'thung gi rgyal po de dag kun ni rigs lnga'o //
NK055(ri)001:9010: thugs rje chen po ni gnyis su med pa'i thugs rje ste/
NK055(ri)001:9011: de nyid mi 'gag pa las ru dra ltar snang zhing g.yo ba'i dgongs pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:9012: bdud rtsi 'byung ba ni ru dra 'dul ba'i thabs
NK055(ri)001:9013: su sngar bsgral nas gsol ba rnams bdud rtsi'i ngo
NK055(ri)001:9014: bor byas nas ngo mtshar gyi cho 'phrul bstan pa'i
NK055(ri)001:9015: phyir // snam du bdud rtsir 'byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs nas/
NK055(ri)001:9016: sku gsung thugs mi phyed pa'i rdo rje las/
NK055(ri)001:9024: am gsum bdud rtsi nyams su myong ba'i ngo bo
NK055(ri)001:9025: sku gsung thugs te ru dra gsol ba las slar
NK055(ri)001:9026: bslang ba'i sngags te/ phyi rabs pas kyang ting nge
NK055(ri)001:9027: 'dzin las su rung bas sngags 'di brjod na shi
NK055(ri)001:9028: ba las slar sos pas ro langs bsgrub pa'i sngags
NK055(ri)001:9029: bslang ba'i sngags te/ kyi mchog go // 'di ni
NK055(ri)001:9030: don gyis ru dra la gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba
NK055(ri)001:9031: bslang ba'i sngags te/ kyi mchog go // yang yin te/ bdud rtsi lce la bzhag pa'i ngo bo'o //
NK055(ri)001:9032: gsum ni bdud rtsi lce la lan gsum bzhag pa'i ngo bo'o //
NK055(ri)001:9033: ru dra snang nas sgrib pa dag tshul ni/
NK055(ri)001:9035: dbang phyug chen po zhes pa la sogs pa/
NK055(ri)001:9036: he ru kas gong gi sngags brjod pas/
NK055(ri)001:9037: dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa sngar ru dra 'khor bcas gsol ba thams cad/
NK055(ri)001:9038: bcom ldan 'das khro bo'i rigs lnga po de dag gi snam nas dri chen gyi tshul du bton te/
NK055(ri)001:9039: thang du gnas pa'i dus su ru dra la mi
NK055(ri)001:9040: gtsang ba'i 'dam gyi rgya mtshor chud pa'i snang ba
NK055(ri)001:9041: byung ba ni sngar gyi sgrib pa'i lhag ma'o //
NK055(ri)001:9042: de dag pa'i phyir snam nas u tsush+ma kro d+ha byung ba ni khro bo sme brtsegs te/
NK055(ri)001:9043: 'dam kun 'thungs pa ni sgrib pa'i lhag ma zad pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:9044: lto bar dbang bskur ba'i byin rlabs kyis slar dran
NK055(ri)001:9045: pa rnyed pa ni sems nyid kyi gnas lugs mngon
NK055(ri)001:9046: du gyur pa ste zag med mngon du byas pa'o
NK055(ri)001:9047: // de'i byin brlabsa kyis snang ba rnam par 'byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin mthong ba ni/
NK055(ri)001:9048: khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs de dag thams cad kyang /
NK055(ri)001:9049: zhes pa rigs lnga khrag 'thung gi tshogs/
NK055(ri)001:9050: de dag thams cad kyang zhes pa/
NK055(ri)001:9051: khrag 'thung gi snang ba las ma gtogs pa tha mal gyi snang ba ma dmigs pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:9052: khrag 'thung thams cad kyang snang ba rnam 'byed kyi snang ba lhun gyis grub ste/
NK055(ri)001:9055: zhabs brgyad brgya ni dgu klong thug pa med par 'phros pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:9056: de lta bu'i phyi nang gnyis kyi 'bar ba chen
NK055(ri)001:9057: po'i dkyil 'khor na bzhugs par ru dra zag med
NK055(ri)001:9058: mngon du byas pa'i snang ba dag pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:9059: phrin las thams cad kyi zhabs sdud bstan pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:9060: de'i dus su 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu/
NK055(ri)001:9062: che mchog he ru kas las kyi ru dra nag
NK055(ri)001:9063: po pho mo 'khor dang bcas pa btul ba de'i
NK055(ri)001:9064: dus su 'jig rten ni s+n+rel zhi la sogs pa
NK055(ri)001:9065: drug gam/ yang na 'gro ba rigs drug la sogs pa drug gam/
NK055(ri)001:9066: 'gro ba'i rigs drug gi gnas so //
NK055(ri)001:9067: phyogs bcu ni mthar thug pa med pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:9068: srid pa ni khams gsum ste nang bcud do //
NK055(ri)001:9069: kun tu ni mthar thug pa med pa bsdus pa ste zhing khams so //
NK055(ri)001:9070: gnas de na khams gsum kun tu dregs pa'i dbang
NK055(ri)001:9071: phyug ni log pa'i las kyi stobs kyis khams gsum
NK055(ri)001:9072: log pa'i lam du btsud nas dbang che ba las
NK055(ri)001:9074: thams cad ni lha ma srin sde brgyad kyi ris
NK055(ri)001:9075: su gyur pa'i ru dra'i dpung du gyur pa thams
NK055(ri)001:9076: cad do // de'i 'dul ba'i thabs sna tshogs/
NK055(ri)001:9077: zhes pa 'dir che mchog he ru ka yang dag
NK055(ri)001:9078: par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid yin pa'i don gyis
NK055(ri)001:9079: mdzad pa chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pas ru dra
NK055(ri)001:9080: 'dul ba dang dus mtshungs par pad+ma he ru kar
NK055(ri)001:9081: snang nas srin po dang bdud kyi rigs btul/
NK055(ri)001:9082: rdo rje gzhon nur snang nas bgegs kyi rigs su gyur pa thams cad btul/
NK055(ri)001:9083: gshin rje gshed kyi rigs su snang nas gshin rje'i rigs su gyur pa thams cad btul/
NK055(ri)001:9084: phyag na rdo rjer snang nas gnod sbyin dang klu'i rigs rnams btul/
NK055(ri)001:9085: rta mgrin du snang nas srin po dang klu btul/
NK055(ri)001:9086: ma rgyud kyi dkyil 'khor rnams su snang nas mkha' 'gro ma'i rigs thams cad btul/
NK055(ri)001:9087: bya khyung du snang nas klu 'dul ba la sogs pa thams cad dus gcig tu snang ngo //
NK055(ri)001:9088: de dag kyang 'dul ba'i thabs sna tshogs ni/
NK055(ri)001:9089: zhi rgyas dbang drag gi bye brag sna tshogs pa snang bas/
NK055(ri)001:9090: btul ba gdul bya'i snang ba ste/
NK055(ri)001:9092: zhes pa 'dul byed kyi snang ba ste mdzad pa'i
NK055(ri)001:9093: phrin las ci ltar shar yang chos kyi sku bsam
NK055(ri)001:9094: gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes la mnga' brnyes pas/
NK055(ri)001:9095: mdzad bya mdzad byed kyi rtsol ba phra ba yang
NK055(ri)001:9096: mi gnas pa'i ngang las rang byung gi ye shes
NK055(ri)001:9097: rang snang ba gdul bya'i blo ngo bzhin du shar
NK055(ri)001:9098: ba ste/ dper na me long g.ya' dag pa la gzugs brnyan 'char ba'i rtsol ba med kyang /
NK055(ri)001:9099: lta ba po'i rkyen gyis gzugs brnyan lhun grub tu 'char ba bzhin no //
NK055(ri)001:9100: des na bsam gyis mi khyab par zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:9101: so sor snang ba ni gdul bya'i snang ba la
NK055(ri)001:9102: 'dul byed so sor snang bas btul ba'i ngo bo'o
NK055(ri)001:9103: // sangs rgyas la rang snang min pa'i rtsol ba phra ba'ang ma dmigs te/
NK055(ri)001:9104: rang snang du 'dzin pa las kyang grol lo //
NK055(ri)001:9105: des na gzhi gcig la snang ba so sor 'char ba ste/
NK055(ri)001:9106: gdul bya'i snang ba'ang mi mkhyen pa med de/
NK055(ri)001:9107: gdul bya'i snang ba thog mtha' thams cad mkhyen pa ji snyed mkhyen pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:9108: mkhyen bya mkhyen byed kyi rtog pa las grol ba ni ji lta ba mkhyen pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:9109: des na ye shes ming gnyis dngos gcig pa'o zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:9110: gdul bya ma lus pa thams cad dus gcig tu
NK055(ri)001:9111: gdug pa mi gnas par byas pa btul lo zhes
NK055(ri)001:9112: bya'o // dregs pa can bdag 'dzin dag nas dam bca' ste/
NK055(ri)001:9113: lus gdan du phul ba ni/
NK055(ri)001:9114: de nas de dag shin tu bred cing /
NK055(ri)001:9115: zhes pa la sogs pa dreg pa can bsgral nas
NK055(ri)001:9116: snang ba rnam 'byed mthong ba de nas las ngan
NK055(ri)001:9117: pa dag pa'i ru dra de dag shin tu 'dar
NK055(ri)001:9118: ba ni/ snga ma'i las dpag tu med pa rnams
NK055(ri)001:9119: dran pas lus 'dar ba dang che mchog la gus
NK055(ri)001:9121: bred pa ni rnam par smin pa rtsub mo rnams
NK055(ri)001:9122: kyis sems bred nas bdag 'dzin rtsa nas dag pa
NK055(ri)001:9124: sngar gyi rnam smin la bred pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:9125: che mchog la gus pa dang ngag gi brjod pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:9127: dang po ni bdag don no //
NK055(ri)001:9128: gnyis pa ni gzhan don no //
NK055(ri)001:9129: yang na dang po ni lus dbul ba tsam mo //
NK055(ri)001:9130: gnyis pa ni nges par 'phul ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:9131: 'bangs su nan tan ma bgyis na/
NK055(ri)001:9132: 'bangs su phul nas bran gyi tha ma'i las rnams
NK055(ri)001:9133: byed dgos pa'i las la nan tan bgyis nas khas
NK055(ri)001:9135: mna' bor ba'i tshig ste mgo lus dum bu brgyar
NK055(ri)001:9136: 'gas shing snying yang dum bur 'gas shing phye mar
NK055(ri)001:9137: gtubs gyur cing / lus rul zhing myags nas sems
NK055(ri)001:9138: mes 'tshig pa lta bu'i zug gzer myong nas skye
NK055(ri)001:9139: ba la 'di la brlag pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:9140: phyi ma la dmyal bar lhung nas/
NK055(ri)001:9141: dmyal ba'i 'o dod 'bod par shog ces rang srog la phod btsug pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:9143: tshogs gnyis rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/
NK055(ri)001:9144: dkyil 'khor gyi gdan du bzhag go //
NK055(ri)001:9145: 'khor phul zhing rnal 'byor bskyang bar khas blangs pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:9146: thams cad kyis mgrin gcig /ces pa la sogs pa
NK055(ri)001:9147: pho mo thams cad kyis ngag mthun par mgrin gcig
NK055(ri)001:9148: tu smras pa/ bdag cag ru dra 'khor bcas kyi mchis 'brang ni chung ma'o //
NK055(ri)001:9149: ma sring bu mo rnams dkyil 'khor chen po ni che mchog 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
NK055(ri)001:9151: zhes pa ni nye gnas bzhi'i tshul du 'khor ro //
NK055(ri)001:9152: dpa' bo ni phyi nang gnyis so //
NK055(ri)001:9153: lha rje ni sangs rgyas thams cad dbyer med pa'i drug pa kun tu bzang po'o //
NK055(ri)001:9154: bdag cag so so 'khor bcas ni 'khor phul nas
NK055(ri)001:9155: khas blangs pa ste ru dra thams cad kyi dpon
NK055(ri)001:9156: yin pa la/ so so ni ru dra'i 'khor lha
NK055(ri)001:9157: chen brgyad la sogs pa rnams so so na 'khor
NK055(ri)001:9159: dam bca' ba'i tshig gi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po ni khrag 'thung ngo //
NK055(ri)001:9161: zhes pa phyi rabs kyi rnal 'byor pa dam tshig
NK055(ri)001:9162: ma nyams na bskyed rim tsam la gnas pa ming
NK055(ri)001:9163: tsam 'dzin pa ste/ de yan chad kyi rnal 'byor
NK055(ri)001:9164: pa thams cad lha klu'i dbang po'i gtsug na nor
NK055(ri)001:9165: bu yod pa bkur ba bzhin/
NK055(ri)001:9166: rnal 'byor pa rnams de ltar gus pas bkur bar bagyi'o //
NK055(ri)001:9167: lus sems kyi g.yo sgyu med cing gus pa'i sems kyis dad par blangs te/
NK055(ri)001:9169: rnal 'byor pa'i dgos pa ci yod pa rnams bsgrub/
NK055(ri)001:9171: spyan sngar da lta smos pa bzhin du ma bsgrub
NK055(ri)001:9172: na bdag cag lus sems la tshad 'dzugs pa sgra
NK055(ri)001:9173: bzhin no // 'khor rnams kyis dam blangs nas dbang bskur ba ni/
NK055(ri)001:9174: de nas ru dra de dag gi chung ma la sogs pa sgra bzhin no //
NK055(ri)001:9175: sngar dkyil 'khor nas rang gi gnas su bkyes pa las slar yang dam blang ba'i phyir/
NK055(ri)001:9176: yud tsam gyis 'ongs nas ngag mthun par smras pa/
NK055(ri)001:9177: bdag cag 'khor tshogs zhes pa la sogs pa sgra bzhin te/
NK055(ri)001:9178: las kyi dngos grub ni phrin las bzhi gang dang
NK055(ri)001:9179: gang la dbang ba'i dam tshig dang dngos grub zhus
NK055(ri)001:9180: pa'o // des na dbang phyug ma nyi shu rtsa
NK055(ri)001:9181: brgyad ni ru dra'i chung ma yin pa'i dus su
NK055(ri)001:9182: pa'o // slas zhes bya'o // ru dra bsgral nas
NK055(ri)001:9183: ma tshor bar dpal gyi sku la 'khril ba ni
NK055(ri)001:9185: phyis kyang yud tsam gyis 'ongs nas dam blangs/
NK055(ri)001:9186: dbang bskur nas dkyil 'khor du 'khod pa ni bran mo zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:9187: de nas che mchog he ru kas dbang bskur/
NK055(ri)001:9188: dbang rtags rdo rje rtse gsum pa byin/
NK055(ri)001:9189: rdo rjes drangs pa'i ming sring mo la sogs pa'i ming btags/
NK055(ri)001:9190: dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du 'khod pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:9192: dbus la mchis skal mi ldan gyi //
NK055(ri)001:9193: 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor mtha' la zhog /phud la 'tshal skal mi ldan gyi //
NK055(ri)001:9194: lhag ma zhal chab bran la stsol //
NK055(ri)001:9196: gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/
NK055(ri)001:9197: khro bo ni tshul bzhi dang ldan pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:9198: rang bzhin mthar phyin pa'i zhi khro gnyis las/
NK055(ri)001:9199: khro bo'i dkyil 'khor sprin dngos po gang du yang
NK055(ri)001:9200: ma nges pa las char bab nas 'gro ba'i lo
NK055(ri)001:9201: tog bskyed pa bzhin/ he ru ka'i dgongs pa gang
NK055(ri)001:9202: du yang ma nges cir yang 'char ba las rnam
NK055(ri)001:9203: par spros pa ni khro bo'i dkyil 'khor te/
NK055(ri)001:9204: khams gsum rangs pa khro bo las ma gtogs pa ci yang mi mnga' ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:9205: le'u bco lnga pa bshad pa'o////le'u bcu drug pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:9206: rgyud gsum las lam gyi rgyud do //
NK055(ri)001:9207: rgyud kyi dngos po bcu las dbang po 'bring gi don du sngags bstan te khro bo'i sngags so //
NK055(ri)001:9208: dkyil 'khor bcu gnyis kyi dbang du byas na/
NK055(ri)001:9209: lhag pa ting nge 'dzin gsung gi dkyil 'khor ro //
NK055(ri)001:9210: phyag rgya gcig spros gnyis ka thun mong ngo //
NK055(ri)001:9211: de yang khro bo rang bzhin 'bras bu mthar phyin pa'i dkyil 'khor bstan nas/
NK055(ri)001:9212: de lhag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gsung gi dkyil 'khor nyams su blangs thabs bstan to //
NK055(ri)001:9216: tshig gi de ma thag pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:9217: bco lnga pa'i rjes thog go //
NK055(ri)001:9218: don gyi de ma thag pa ni lam pas lta ba rtogs/
NK055(ri)001:9219: de bzhin nyid kun tu snang rgyu'i ting nge 'dzin goms/
NK055(ri)001:9220: spros pa la 'jug pa'i dus su/
NK055(ri)001:9221: rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor gong du
NK055(ri)001:9222: bstan pa ltar nyams su blang ba la gsung sngags
NK055(ri)001:9225: las gang dang gang bcol ba dang /
NK055(ri)001:9226: ye shes pa spyan drang pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:9228: dam tshig la bstim pa rnams rkyen sngags la rag las pas der 'brel te bstan pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:9229: bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po ni gong du bshad pa ltar ro //
NK055(ri)001:9230: dkyil 'khor tshogs chen po 'di dag ni/
NK055(ri)001:9231: bco lnga pa rang bzhin lhun grub khro bo'i dkyil 'khor ro //
NK055(ri)001:9232: tshogs ni dus gsum gyi bud+d+ha ma lus pa 'dus pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:9233: chen po ni thams cad rig par gsal ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:9234: gtso bo dang 'khor du bcas pa de dag phyi
NK055(ri)001:9235: rabs kyi rnal 'byor pas nyams su blang ba'i dus
NK055(ri)001:9236: su/ dam tshig gis 'grub par bya ba'i phyir/
NK055(ri)001:9237: zhes pa dam tshig ni sems nyid rang snang ba
NK055(ri)001:9238: ngo bo nyid kyi dam tshig las mi 'gag par
NK055(ri)001:9239: snang ba sngags kyi tshogs kyis lha bskyed cing skur
NK055(ri)001:9241: de las thun mong mchog gi dngos grub snang ba
NK055(ri)001:9242: las mi 'da' bas dam tshig /sngags kyis lha lnga
NK055(ri)001:9243: bcu rtsa brgyad dkyil 'khor du grub par bya ba'i
NK055(ri)001:9244: phyir 'bras bu mthar phyin pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa
NK055(ri)001:9245: khro bo thams cad kyi rgyal po khrag 'thung lnga/
NK055(ri)001:9246: chen po ni kun bzang he ru ka btsun mo
NK055(ri)001:9247: yum dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs de dag
NK055(ri)001:9248: gi sku gsung thugs mi phyed pas rdo rje lta
NK055(ri)001:9250: zhes pa rang byung gi ye shes ni dngos po
NK055(ri)001:9251: thams cad ye shes kyi ngang du mi gnas par
NK055(ri)001:9252: mdzad pa/ dper na bskal pa 'jig pa'i me dang mtshungs te/
NK055(ri)001:9253: de ni rang bzhin nam dgongs pa'i ye shes kyi khro bo zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:9254: de nyid rang snang ba'i he ru ka'i sku yang rtags ye shes kyi khro bo'o //
NK055(ri)001:9255: rngam pa ni skad cig la mi gnas par mdzad pa'i tshul can te/
NK055(ri)001:9256: nang du nyon mongs pa la rngam/
NK055(ri)001:9257: phyi bdud dang dregs byed la rngam pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:9258: gzhi dang gzhi can med kyang /
NK055(ri)001:9259: gdul bya'i ngo la gzhi de lta bu las snang bas las zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:9260: gsung gi dkyil 'khor ni lnga bcu rtsa brgyad kyi sngags yan lag rnams dang bcas pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:9261: gzhung la rigs lnga yab yum gyi rtsa ba bskyed sngags dang bcas pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:9262: sarba ta th+aa ga ta ma h+aa sh+r+ai he ru ka /zhes pa la sogs te/
NK055(ri)001:9263: 'di yang rnal 'byor pas nyams su len na bdag
NK055(ri)001:9264: sras gzhan sras kyi yum gyi mkhar dkyil 'khor bskyed
NK055(ri)001:9265: nas/ sngags 'di dag gis phyi'i dkyil 'khor du 'don pa mngon par rtogs pa bzhin no //
NK055(ri)001:9266: gong gi zhi ba'i sngags dang 'og gi khro bo'i
NK055(ri)001:9267: sngags 'di dag sgra bsgyur na drug cu rtsa gnyis
NK055(ri)001:9269: ma bsgyur na byin rlabs che bar slob dpon pad+mas gsungs skad do //
NK055(ri)001:9270: 'dir 'phral skad thang log brda sprad pa tsam yin te/
NK055(ri)001:9271: sarba ta th+aa ga ta ni/
NK055(ri)001:9272: ni ye shes rnam pa lnga/
NK055(ri)001:9274: ta th+aa ga ta ni de bzhin gshegs pa/
NK055(ri)001:9282: ta ka na gtogs shig /ha na rgyob cig /da ha choms shig /pa tsa tshos shig pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:9283: h'u gsum ni sku gsung thugs su bsdus shig /phata ni sgrol cig pa'am sod cig pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:9284: badz+ra ma h+aa sh+r+ai he ru ka /zhes pa rdo rje dpal chen po'i khrag 'thung ngo //
NK055(ri)001:9286: rat+na ma h+aa sh+r+ai he ru ka /zhes pa rin po che'i dpal khrag 'thung chen po'o //
NK055(ri)001:9287: pad+ma ma h+aa sh+r+ai he ru ka /pad+ma chen po'i dpal khrag 'thung ngo //
NK055(ri)001:9288: karma ma h+aa sh+r+ai he ru ka /las chen po'i dpal chen po he ru ka'o //
NK055(ri)001:9291: sarba ta th+aa ga ta ma h+aa kro d+h+ai shwa ri sarba dush+t+aana h'u phata/
NK055(ri)001:9292: zhes pa bud+d+ha khrag 'thung gi yum ste/
NK055(ri)001:9294: ta th+aa ga ta de bzhin gshegs pa/
NK055(ri)001:9298: shwa r+ai dbang phyug /sarba dush+t+aana sdang ba thams cad/
NK055(ri)001:9304: badz+ra d+ha ra rdo rje rigs kyi gzungs ma/
NK055(ri)001:9305: ma h+aa kro d+h+ai chen mo khro mo/
NK055(ri)001:9306: shwa ri dbyings phyug /dz+wa li ni 'bar ma/
NK055(ri)001:9315: shwa ri dbang phyug /bid ma mnyam pa nyid do //
NK055(ri)001:9317: pad+ma he ru ka'i yum ni/
NK055(ri)001:9322: shwa ri dbyings phyug /kh+aa hi gsol ba ste gsung gi las/
NK055(ri)001:9324: sarba a mo g+ha thams cad don yod pa/
NK055(ri)001:9325: ma h+aa kro d+h+ai shwa ri 'gre/
NK055(ri)001:9328: de dag ni rtsa ba las sngags dang bcas pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:9331: zhes pa koo r+ai ma'i snying po ste/
NK055(ri)001:9332: mgor btags mjug tu dza dza h'u btags nas/
NK055(ri)001:9333: ting nge 'dzin las su rung ba'i rnal 'byor pas/
NK055(ri)001:9334: koo r+ai ma la stong rtsa brgyad bzlas na bud+d+ha yang 'gugs nus na/
NK055(ri)001:9335: gzhan 'gugs pa lta ci smos zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:9337: phyag na rdo rje'ang mthu rku nas med par nus na/
NK055(ri)001:9338: gzhan lta ci smos zhes so //
NK055(ri)001:9340: gong ltar bzlas na lag na rdo rje yang mthu bor nas 'gugs nus na gzhan lta ci smos/
NK055(ri)001:9342: gong ltar bzlas na las thams cad 'grub bo //
NK055(ri)001:9343: badz+ra puk+ka s+ai ha zhes pa/
NK055(ri)001:9344: gong ltar bzlas na phyag na rdo rje yang bcings nas rmongs te mi 'gul bar nus so //
NK055(ri)001:9346: gong ltar bzlas na phyag na rdo rje yang mgo myos par 'gyur ro //
NK055(ri)001:9348: gong ltar bzlas nas las bcol na thams cad 'grub bo //
NK055(ri)001:9350: gong ltar bzlas te las bcol na tshe dang rigs rgyud dbang thang 'phel lo //
NK055(ri)001:9351: ha brgyad ni rgyu ma nor ba rtsa ba'i sngags so //
NK055(ri)001:9352: ming rnams ni bskyed pa rkyen gyi sngags dang las bcol ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:9353: brjod pas skur grub pa dang bzhugs gnas rnams shes so //
NK055(ri)001:9355: 'di man chad bzhi po la mgor gsham du h'u phata kyis bsnan te/
NK055(ri)001:9356: ting nge 'dzin las su rung bas stong la sogs pa bzlas te/
NK055(ri)001:9357: drag po tshar gcad pa'i las bcol na/
NK055(ri)001:9358: bsgrub bya'i gnas rten yan lag dang bcas pa mi
NK055(ri)001:9359: gnas par byed pas tshar bcad pas las la shes
NK055(ri)001:9360: so // badz+ra b+y+aa g+h+ri mu kh+aa he/
NK055(ri)001:9362: mgor rting par h'u phata bsnan te/
NK055(ri)001:9363: ting nge 'dzin las su rung bas stong la sogs pa bzlas na/
NK055(ri)001:9364: mig la sogs pa'i dbang po rnams 'byin pas tshar gcod kyis las so //
NK055(ri)001:9365: he brgyad ni rgyu ma nor ba rtsa ba'i sngags/
NK055(ri)001:9366: ming rnams ni bskyed pa rkyen gyi sngags so //
NK055(ri)001:9367: lha rje zur tshos ma mo rnams kyi dbu la badz+ra re re byung ba ni/
NK055(ri)001:9368: dbu la gser gyi rdo rje rtse lnga pa re re yod pa yin gsungs so //
NK055(ri)001:9369: badz+ra +aar+ya te dza te nga dzah zhes pa 'di man chad bzhi po gong ltar h'u gis bsnan nas/
NK055(ri)001:9370: ting nge 'dzin las su rung ba'i rnal 'byor pas stong sogs bzlas na/
NK055(ri)001:9371: lcags kyu mas bkug pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:9373: lcags sgrog mas 'dzin te mi gtong ste sdom pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:9374: dril bu mas sems myos te gnon pa dang de'i las bzhi'o //
NK055(ri)001:9375: dzahmh'u bam hohbazhi ni rgyu ma nor ba rtsa ba'i sngags so //
NK055(ri)001:9376: b+h+yo nyi shu rtsa brgyad ni dbang mo'i sngags te/
NK055(ri)001:9377: rgyu ma nor ba rtsa ba'i sngags yin/
NK055(ri)001:9378: rgyu ma nor rtsa ba'i snying po ste/
NK055(ri)001:9379: dang po drug shar du dgod/
NK055(ri)001:9381: rnal 'byor pa lam ltar byams pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:9384: rnal 'byor pa la sring ltar gdung ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:9385: de nas drug nub tu dgod/
NK055(ri)001:9387: rnal 'byor pa la mdza' ltar yid du 'ong ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:9388: de nas drug byang du dgod/
NK055(ri)001:9390: bran ltar bka' nyan gyi ma mo'o //
NK055(ri)001:9391: bzhi ni sgo bzhir dgod do //
NK055(ri)001:9392: ru lu ru lu h'u b+h+yo h'u/
NK055(ri)001:9393: zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor bskyed thon nas ye shes
NK055(ri)001:9394: pa spyan drang ba'i sngon du 'gro bar byon par
NK055(ri)001:9395: zhu ba'i snyan gsan dbab pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:9399: +aa na ya ho ni 'dir gshegs ces pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:9400: dzahmh'u bam hohni rang bzhin gyis gnas nas ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor byon te nam mkha' la bzhugs pa/
NK055(ri)001:9401: ram zhes pa gzhal yas khang gi rgyab la me 'bar ba/
NK055(ri)001:9402: me ri 'dab 'byor dbyer med du gyur pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:9403: shes rab kyi ngang la dbyer med pa lta bu mtshon no //
NK055(ri)001:9404: badz+ra kro d+ha sa ma ya h'u zhes pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:9405: ye shes pa la rig pa'i me tog dor ba ste/
NK055(ri)001:9407: badz+ra rdo rje dbyer med pa/
NK055(ri)001:9409: sa ma ya dam tshig /h'u bsdu ba ste/
NK055(ri)001:9410: ye shes lnga'i rdo rje khro bo/
NK055(ri)001:9411: dam tshig dbyer med par mdzod cig bya ba lta bu ste/
NK055(ri)001:9412: rig pa'i ngang la ye shes dam tshig dbyer med du mos/
NK055(ri)001:9413: de nas dngos grub bskul ba ni //
NK055(ri)001:9414: khro la khros pas zhi mdzad pa //
NK055(ri)001:9415: zhes pa la sogs pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:9416: khro la ni las kyi khro bo ru dra'o //
NK055(ri)001:9417: khros pa ltar snang ba'i ye shes kyi khro bo'o //
NK055(ri)001:9418: zhi mdzad pa ni las kyi khro bo'i nyon mongs pa rtsa ba nas dag par mdzad pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:9419: thugs rjes khros pa ni dgongs pa chos sku la khro bya khro byed ma dmigs pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:9420: ru dra'i ngo la thugs rje khros pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:9421: dpal ni dpal gsum dang ldan pa'i he ru ka'o //
NK055(ri)001:9422: rngams pa ni phyi nang gnyis su rngam pa dang ldan pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:9423: tshogs ni khrag 'thung gi dkyil 'khor thams cad do //
NK055(ri)001:9424: 'bar ba ni don rang byung gi ye shes 'bar
NK055(ri)001:9425: bas rtags he ru 'bar ba'i gar dgu dang ldan
NK055(ri)001:9426: pa'i sku gsung thugs kyi byin rlabs gang du yang
NK055(ri)001:9427: ma grub pa la cir yang 'char ba'i rmad po
NK055(ri)001:9428: che/ dus da lta kho na rnal 'byor bdag la rtsol cig pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:9430: badz+ra kro d+ha sa ma ya s+t+wam/
NK055(ri)001:9431: rdo rje khro bo dam tshig dus la bab ces te dngos grub rtsol ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:9432: badz+ra kro d+ha sa ma ya phata/
NK055(ri)001:9433: rdo rje khro bo dam tshig gis dbyings su sdus pa la sol cig pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:9434: badz+ra kro d+ha sa ma ya hoh rdo rje khro bo dam tshig gis mnyes par mdzod cig pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:9435: de ltar gsol ba btab pas ye shes kyi dkyil
NK055(ri)001:9436: 'khor gyi thugs ka nas phata nag po zhig byung
NK055(ri)001:9437: ste bdag gi thugs kar thim nas sgrib pa ma
NK055(ri)001:9438: lus pa dag par bsgom pa ni dngos grub rtsol
NK055(ri)001:9439: ba'i 'bras bu'o // de nas drin lan gyi tshul du mchod pa 'bul te/
NK055(ri)001:9440: a li u li zhes pa la sogs pa/
NK055(ri)001:9441: a li ni bza' ba'i rnam grangs rnams so //
NK055(ri)001:9442: u li ni btung ba'i rnam grangs rnams so //
NK055(ri)001:9443: t+aa li ni 'bras bu'i bye brag rnams so //
NK055(ri)001:9444: ta p+aa li ni bca' ba'i bye brag rnams so //
NK055(ri)001:9445: de rnams gang la mchod na/
NK055(ri)001:9446: dush+th+aa zhes pa mche ba can gyi tshogs te khrag 'thung lnga'o //
NK055(ri)001:9448: roo tri ni drag mo ste ma mo nyi shu'i tshogs so //
NK055(ri)001:9449: kha ram yo gi n+ai zhal 'bar ma rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs te/
NK055(ri)001:9451: yo gi n+ai rnal 'byor dbang phyug ma nyi shu rtsa brgyad do //
NK055(ri)001:9453: hohmanyesa par mdzod cig /h+aum ha he phata b+h+yo ram ni/
NK055(ri)001:9454: dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor la bstim pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:9455: h'u gis khrag 'thung yab yum bstim/
NK055(ri)001:9459: b+h+yos dbang phyug ma nyi shu rtsa brgyad/
NK055(ri)001:9460: ram gyis gzhal yas khang me dpung dang bcas pa la bstim mo //
NK055(ri)001:9461: sngags gsungs pa dang ye shes bstims pa gnyis kyi yon tan no //
NK055(ri)001:9462: zhes brjod pas tshig rab tu tshig kun tu tshig go //
NK055(ri)001:9463: zhes pa sngags gsungs pa'i yon tan te 'jig rten
NK055(ri)001:9464: thams cad kyi rnam par rtog pa mi gnas par
NK055(ri)001:9465: byas pa ni tshig pa gsum/
NK055(ri)001:9467: de ni las sngags brjod pa'i yon tan lta bu yang yin/
NK055(ri)001:9468: 'bar rab tu 'bar kun tu 'bar gyis bya ba gsum ni/
NK055(ri)001:9469: bskyed pa rkyen gyi sngags kyis phyogs bcu thams cad
NK055(ri)001:9470: sku dang ye shes su 'bar ba tshabs che chung
NK055(ri)001:9471: gsum mo // yang na ye shes sems dpa' bstims pa'i yon tan yang yin no //
NK055(ri)001:9473: zhes pa dus dang rnam pa thams cad khrag 'thung
NK055(ri)001:9474: 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs kyis gang rab tu
NK055(ri)001:9476: zhes bya ba tshabs che chung gsum ni dam tshig la ye shes bstims pas/
NK055(ri)001:9477: ye shes kyi rnal 'byor pa'i ting nge 'dzin rgyas
NK055(ri)001:9478: pa je brtan je rgyas la song ba gsum mo
NK055(ri)001:9479: // gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/
NK055(ri)001:9480: khro bo'i tshogs ni phyogs bcu'i khro bo ma lus
NK055(ri)001:9481: pa thams cad de'i gsung gi dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i
NK055(ri)001:9482: le'u ste bcu drug pa bshad pa'o////le'u bcu bdun pa
NK055(ri)001:9483: khro bo'i sku dang thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bstan pa
NK055(ri)001:9484: ni/ rgyud gsum las na lam gyi rgyud do //
NK055(ri)001:9485: rgyud kyi dngos po bcu las na dkyil 'khor te khro bo'i sku dang thugs so //
NK055(ri)001:9486: dkyil 'khor bcu gnyis las na lhag pa ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor/
NK055(ri)001:9487: khro bo'i sku dang thugs bstan pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:9488: de yang de yan chad du zhi khro'i dkyil 'khor
NK055(ri)001:9489: rgyas par bstan nas rnal 'byor pas de nyams su
NK055(ri)001:9490: blang ba'i cha rkyen tsam mo //
NK055(ri)001:9492: de nas zhes pa la sogs te/
NK055(ri)001:9493: de yang tshig gi de ma thag pa ni bcu drug pa'i rting thog go //
NK055(ri)001:9494: don ni rnal 'byor pas dbang thob dam tshig dang ldan lta ba rtogs nas/
NK055(ri)001:9495: lam la 'jug pa nyams su blang bar 'brel to //
NK055(ri)001:9496: bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po/
NK055(ri)001:9499: zhes pa le'u bco lnga par smos pa'i khrag 'thung gi dkyil 'khor de dag /dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i phyir/
NK055(ri)001:9500: zhes pa phyi rabs kyi rnal 'byor pas nyams su
NK055(ri)001:9501: blang ba'i lhag pa'i ting 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor bsgom
NK055(ri)001:9502: pa'i chog sgrig ma nor bstan pa'i dgos ched do
NK055(ri)001:9503: // go phye ba'i 'khor gyi ched du brjod pa le'u 'di brjod do zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:9504: 'dir khro bo'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa la'ang le'u dgu par/
NK055(ri)001:9505: khro bo'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin te //
NK055(ri)001:9506: zhes pa zhi khro'i mtshan nyid mi 'dra yang cho ga'i sgrigs mthun par bstan pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:9508: thabs las thabs byung thabs bsam yas //
NK055(ri)001:9510: zhi bar bstan pa'i dbang po rab byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:9511: de mngon du mi nus pas bskyed rim gyi dkyil 'khor bsgoms te/
NK055(ri)001:9512: de bzhin nyid dang kun tu snang dang rgyu'i ting
NK055(ri)001:9513: nge 'dzin las 'og gzhi 'byung ba rim brtsegs kyang
NK055(ri)001:9514: khrag 'thung dang dur khrod kyi 'byung ba bskyed de/
NK055(ri)001:9516: ces kha la me dpung 'bar ba'i nang du/
NK055(ri)001:9517: b+h+r+aum smug nag gi 'phro 'du las dur khrod kyi gzhal yas khang bskyed pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:9518: sku gsum gyi rtags su thod pa rnam gsum gyi rtsig pa/
NK055(ri)001:9519: sbrul gyi d+r+wa ba d+r+wa phyed dang /
NK055(ri)001:9520: bum pa zlum po'i rtse mo rdo rje rtse dgu pas mtshan pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:9521: rta babs bzhi dur khrod kyi rgyan dang bcas pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:9522: khrag 'thung gi gzhung dang mthun par bskyed do //
NK055(ri)001:9524: gzhal yas kyi ngo bo ni/
NK055(ri)001:9526: zhes pa lte ba 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi pa/
NK055(ri)001:9527: ye shes bzhi kun tu kun nas 'bar ba'i rtags su rtsibs bzhi la me 'bar ba/
NK055(ri)001:9528: lte ba'i dbus gru gsum mthing nag chos dbyings ye
NK055(ri)001:9529: shes rnam thar gsum dang ldan pa'i rtags su gru
NK055(ri)001:9530: gsum/ chos thams cad sku gsung thugs dbang du bsdus pa'i phyir zla gam gsum dang ldan pa/
NK055(ri)001:9531: ye shes bzhi chos dbyings ye shes las ma 'das
NK055(ri)001:9532: pa'i rtags su rdo rje gdung zlum rdo rje rwa
NK055(ri)001:9534: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rgyas pa'i rtags su gru bzhi gru chad bzhi dang ldan pa/
NK055(ri)001:9535: ye shes bzhi 'phro ba'i rtags su glo 'bur bzhi dang bcas pa/
NK055(ri)001:9536: gzhal yas khang gi phyi dbyibs chos dbyings ye shes
NK055(ri)001:9537: kyis rgyas pa'i rtags su phyi dbyibs gru bzhir 'dug
NK055(ri)001:9538: pa/ rnam thar bzhi'i sgo nas gdul bya 'jug cing
NK055(ri)001:9539: thugs rje shar ba'i rtags su phyogs bzhi sgo khyud
NK055(ri)001:9540: pa/ bzhi dang ldan pa/ 'bar ba'i bar khyams gnyis kyis mdzes/
NK055(ri)001:9541: zhes pa slob dpon kha shas kyis sgyu 'phrul bla
NK055(ri)001:9542: ma nas spor ma brgyad yod pas de'i gnas yin
NK055(ri)001:9543: par yang bshad de/ nges par ni phra men ma dang dbang phyug ma'i gnas te/
NK055(ri)001:9544: sgo gcig gi lha snam la phyi nang du byed pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:9545: sgo nyis rim gyi lha rnam gnyis su byed pa dang gnyis las/
NK055(ri)001:9546: slob dpon pad+mas dbang phyug ma la yang sgo ma yod pas nyis rim du 'dod la/
NK055(ri)001:9547: slob dpon bi ma las sgo rkyang lha snam gnyis
NK055(ri)001:9548: su 'dod pas dbang phyug ma'i sgo ma la phugs
NK055(ri)001:9551: thod sbrul sna tshogs nyi mas brjid //
NK055(ri)001:9552: ces pa thod pa ni gsum ste/
NK055(ri)001:9553: nang thod pa rlon pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:9555: dus gsum las ma byon pa/
NK055(ri)001:9556: theg pa gsum las gsang sngags kyi theg pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:9557: bar thod pa ra ri ni/
NK055(ri)001:9559: dus gsum las da lta'i bud+d+ha/
NK055(ri)001:9560: theg pa gsum las byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:9561: phyi thod pa skam po ni/
NK055(ri)001:9564: theg pa ni nyan rang gi theg pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:9566: sbrul gyi d+r+wa ba d+r+wa phyed de kha dog sna tshogs pa dbyibs sna tshogs pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:9568: sbrul gyi d+r+wa ba'i mig na nyi ma 'od zer
NK055(ri)001:9569: 'bum 'phro ba 'bar ba 'gro don rgyun mi chad
NK055(ri)001:9571: pa gzhal yas khang gi phyi nang kun nas me
NK055(ri)001:9572: lce rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i dbyibs can spungs pa
NK055(ri)001:9573: 'phro ba'i gseb nas me'i khro bo mang po 'phro
NK055(ri)001:9574: bas phyi nang gi gdug pa can thams cad mi
NK055(ri)001:9577: khyu mchog ma he gzig dang stag /ces pa khyu mchog la mi mthun te/
NK055(ri)001:9578: bod g.yag zhol can la zer bya ba dang /
NK055(ri)001:9579: za hor glang rgod la zer bya ba dang /
NK055(ri)001:9580: yang kha shas zhig gis stobs che ba glang po che la zer bya ba dang /
NK055(ri)001:9581: dud 'gro khyus 'gro ba rnams kyi mchog seng ge yin zer te/
NK055(ri)001:9583: thugs ni mi 'jigs seng ges bdud bzhi 'joms //
NK055(ri)001:9584: zhes pa badz+ra he ru ka'i gdan dbus su seng ge brgyad kyi khri'o //
NK055(ri)001:9587: zhes pa dper na ma he zho che bas grong chen po skyong ba bzhin du/
NK055(ri)001:9589: zhes bud+d+ha he ru ka'i sku'i sgo nas gdul bya
NK055(ri)001:9590: thams cad theg pa chen po'i ngang du skyong bar
NK055(ri)001:9591: byed pa'i rtags su shar du ma he brgyad do
NK055(ri)001:9593: gzig /ces pas rat+na he ru ka'i gdan te/
NK055(ri)001:9594: yon tan gzi 'bar gzig gis brjid //
NK055(ri)001:9595: ces pas gzig la ri mo zlum po yod pas/
NK055(ri)001:9596: des spa zhing brjid pa ltar mnyam pa nyid kyi
NK055(ri)001:9597: ye shes mtha' gnyis kyi spros pa dang bral te
NK055(ri)001:9598: so sor rtogs pa'i ye shes cir yang 'char ba'ang
NK055(ri)001:9599: chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes las ma g.yos pas
NK055(ri)001:9601: rang snang cir yang 'char bas dngos po med pa'i mthar ma song ste/
NK055(ri)001:9603: phyogs zhen gyi chos phra ba yang ma dmigs pa'i
NK055(ri)001:9604: ye shes nyid mtha' gnyis kyi spros pa dang bral
NK055(ri)001:9605: ba bud+d+ha'i yon tan thams cad 'char ba'i gzhir gyur
NK055(ri)001:9606: pa ni/ gzig thig le zlum pos brjid pa dang 'dra bar rat+na khrag 'thung gi gdan no //
NK055(ri)001:9607: stag ni pad+ma khrag 'thung gi gdan te/
NK055(ri)001:9608: mtha' gnyis 'joms byed stag gi gdan //
NK055(ri)001:9609: zhes pa stag la ri mo tshoms su gcod pa
NK055(ri)001:9610: dang 'dra bar so sor rtogs pa'i ye shes gdul
NK055(ri)001:9611: bya tshoms tshoms su gcod pa'i phyir pad+ma he ru
NK055(ri)001:9613: karma he ru ka'i gdan dom ste/
NK055(ri)001:9614: phrin las bshol ba med pas dom du bstan //
NK055(ri)001:9615: ces pa dper na dom gyis nub mo rmi lam
NK055(ri)001:9616: rmis na phyir nyin gang dang 'phrad pa'i thog na
NK055(ri)001:9617: rgyug pa'i dus su gzhan gyis zlog byed med pa
NK055(ri)001:9618: ltar/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i thugs rjes gdul bya'i don mdzad pa'i tshe/
NK055(ri)001:9619: gzhan gyis bar gcod med cing phrin las bskyar mi dgos te/
NK055(ri)001:9620: skad cig la lhun gyis grub pa'i phyir dom gyi gdan no //
NK055(ri)001:9622: zhes pa sems can lnga'i spar mo'i zhabs na gdan rnams yod pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:9623: dbus su dbang phyug chen po srid pa gsum la mthu che ba'i ru dra dang /
NK055(ri)001:9624: lha ma h+aa de wa yab yum byi chings su
NK055(ri)001:9625: bsnol ba sems can gyi spar mo'i zhabs na yod
NK055(ri)001:9626: pa'o // shar du ma he'i zhabs su dri za pho mo/
NK055(ri)001:9627: byang du gnod sbyin pho mo/
NK055(ri)001:9629: lhor srin po pho mo ste/
NK055(ri)001:9630: kun kyang sems can rnams kyi spar mo'i zhabs na gnas pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:9631: sems can gyi bar na rin po che'i khri/
NK055(ri)001:9632: de'i steng du mtha' gnyis kyi skyon dang bral ba'i pad+ma/
NK055(ri)001:9633: de'i steng du shes rab kyis gdul bya rnams nyon
NK055(ri)001:9634: mongs pa'i tsha gdung ba'i bsil bar byed pa'i zla
NK055(ri)001:9635: ba/ de'i steng du thabs thugs rje chen pos gdul
NK055(ri)001:9636: bya'i nyon mongs pa gsal bsreg thun mong ba'i nyi
NK055(ri)001:9637: ba/ ma'o // nang gi khro mo brgyad kyi gdan ni/
