NK055(ri)001:9638: ngo bo phyogs skyong brgyad de pho mo bsnol ba brgyad kyi thog tu nyi ma re re'o //
NK055(ri)001:9639: lha snam phra men brgyad kyi gdan la ro re'i thog tu nyi ma re re'o //
NK055(ri)001:9640: de'i phyi rim dbang phyug ma nyi shu rtsa brgyad la dar gyi 'bol re re bsgom pa'ang yod de/
NK055(ri)001:9641: 'dir sku 'jig rten pa sems can mya ngan las
NK055(ri)001:9642: 'das pa'i rtags su ro phyed tshal dang nyi ma
NK055(ri)001:9644: sgo ma bzhi ni rim par bdud bzhi'i thog tu nyi ma re re'o //
NK055(ri)001:9645: rten pa lha'i dkyil 'khor la sku mdog zhal phyag dang bcas pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:9646: bdag sras gzhan sras gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor nas bton
NK055(ri)001:9647: te phyi'i dkyil 'khor du bkod pa khrag 'thung sum
NK055(ri)001:9648: cu bsgoms nas dbang phyug ma bardzusa skyes su bya'am/
NK055(ri)001:9649: yang na he ru ka yab yum gyi mkha' las
NK055(ri)001:9650: yig 'bru bton cing phyi rol gyi gnas su bkod
NK055(ri)001:9651: de/ sku mdog phyag mtshan gsal gdab pa'i skabs rigs lnga khrag 'thung gi sku mdog ni/
NK055(ri)001:9652: smug nag /ces pa la sogs te/
NK055(ri)001:9653: bud+d+ha he ru ka smug nag ste khrag 'thung thams cad kyi sku'i mtshan nyid pas/
NK055(ri)001:9654: khro bo rang bzhin gyi le'u nas kyang /
NK055(ri)001:9655: sku smug nag cir yang 'gyur ba/
NK055(ri)001:9656: zhes pa sku'i sgo nas 'gro ba rnams kyi don
NK055(ri)001:9657: mdzad pa'i rtags su smug /nag pa ni gdul bya
NK055(ri)001:9658: ru dra'i rkyen gyis phrin las/
NK055(ri)001:9659: drag po brnan pa nan tur gyi las kyis gdul bya'i nyon mongs pa gcod pa'i rtags so //
NK055(ri)001:9660: sngo nag ni badz+ra he ru ka'i sku mdog ste/
NK055(ri)001:9661: sngon po la tshon gzhan gyis bsgyur du med pa bzhin/
NK055(ri)001:9662: khrag 'thung thams cad kyi thugs badz+ra he ru ka
NK055(ri)001:9663: nam mkha' dang 'dra ba cis kyang bsgyur du med
NK055(ri)001:9665: ser ba ni khrag 'thung thams cad kyi yon tan
NK055(ri)001:9666: gyi bdag nyid mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes snang
NK055(ri)001:9667: stong gi yang phyogs su song ba med pa nyid
NK055(ri)001:9668: thams cad 'char ba'i ngo bo nyid du bzhugs pas
NK055(ri)001:9669: che ba'i yon tan rgyas pa'i rtags su rgyas pa'i
NK055(ri)001:9670: kha dog ser po gser mdog go //
NK055(ri)001:9671: dmar ba ni khrag 'thung thams cad kyi gsung pad+ma he ru ka'i sku mdog ste/
NK055(ri)001:9672: so sor rtogs pa'i ye shes stong zhing bdag med
NK055(ri)001:9673: pa chos thams cad kyi de kho na nyid mngon
NK055(ri)001:9674: du gyur pas mya ngan 'das pa'i chos thams cad
NK055(ri)001:9676: chos rang gi mtshan nyid kun rdzob kyi dngos po
NK055(ri)001:9677: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba thog mtha' thams cad
NK055(ri)001:9678: mkhyen pas mtha' gnyis dbang du 'dus te mnga' brnyes
NK055(ri)001:9681: zhes pa karma he ru ka'i sku mdog ste/
NK055(ri)001:9682: tshon lnga gcig tu 'dres pa'i kha dog yin pas
NK055(ri)001:9683: karma he ru kas 'gro don mdzad pa la phrin
NK055(ri)001:9684: las rnam pa bzhis gzhi bzung nas/
NK055(ri)001:9685: 'gro ba'i don du phrin las cir yang 'char bas ljang gu'o //
NK055(ri)001:9686: nag shas rnams ni gdul bya ru dra'i rkyen gyis
NK055(ri)001:9687: phrin las drag po'i sgo nas nan tur gyi las
NK055(ri)001:9688: kyis gdul bya'i don rdzogs par mdzad pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:9690: zhes pa nang du rang byung ye shes kyis nyon mongs pa mi gnas par mdzad la/
NK055(ri)001:9691: phyir ru dra ling pa tshar bcad pa/
NK055(ri)001:9692: phyir 'bar ba'i gar dgu khro tshul drug cu dang ldan pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:9693: sku ni dngos su he ru ka'i skur snang ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:9694: dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi bsgrad //
NK055(ri)001:9697: don rtags 'di dag lung a nu yo ga ltar na grub pa rtags kyi phyag rgya dang /
NK055(ri)001:9698: mdzad pa rtags kyi phyag rgya gnyis su dabye'o //
NK055(ri)001:9699: ma h+aa yo ga ltar na/
NK055(ri)001:9700: gnyis su bye brag mi phyed par gnas tshul lam yin tshul gyi ngos nas grub mdzad gnyis 'dres te/
NK055(ri)001:9701: shas che chung du byed do //
NK055(ri)001:9702: de yang dbu gsum ni rnam thar sgo gsum dang ldan pa'i rtags su dbu gsum ste/
NK055(ri)001:9703: mtshan nyid la smos pa ni stong pa nyid kyang
NK055(ri)001:9704: stong pa nyid phyogs gcig par 'dzin pa dang bcas
NK055(ri)001:9705: / mtshan ma med pa smon pa med pa de
NK055(ri)001:9706: dang 'dra bar phyogs 'dzin gyi 'du shes can yin
NK055(ri)001:9707: / la/ gsang sngags kyi sgo nas sgra mthun yang don dpag ste/
NK055(ri)001:9708: 'khor 'das sam snod bcud thams cad rig pa'i ye
NK055(ri)001:9709: shes su gsal ba la yod med snang stong la
NK055(ri)001:9710: sogs pa'i mtha' thams cad ngang gis dag nas/
NK055(ri)001:9711: ngo bo mtha' bral gyi stong pa nyid de tsam
NK055(ri)001:9712: du yang dmigs 'dzin bral ba'i ngo bo nyid la
NK055(ri)001:9713: don la dam par 'dzin pa yang med pa ni
NK055(ri)001:9715: de lta bu'i ngang las snod bcud kyi chos thams
NK055(ri)001:9716: cad rang sar dag nas snang stong 'khor ba 'das
NK055(ri)001:9717: pa tha snyad thams cad rang dag pa'i sems nyid
NK055(ri)001:9718: mnyam pa nyid kyi ngang la 'du shes kyis bzung
NK055(ri)001:9719: ba'i chos phra ba'ang med de/
NK055(ri)001:9720: 'du shes gzhi nas dag pa ni mtshan ma med pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:9721: dgongs pa de lta bu lhun gyis grub pas chos
NK055(ri)001:9722: thams cad rang sar dag /rgyu rkyen rten 'brel kun
NK055(ri)001:9723: rdzob kyi snang ba la rig par gsal bar sgyu
NK055(ri)001:9724: ma mkhan po la sgyu ma mthong ba bzhin/
NK055(ri)001:9725: rig pa rang gsal gyi ngang la 'khor ba'i chos
NK055(ri)001:9726: tha snyad tsam yang ma dmigs pas mya ngan las
NK055(ri)001:9727: 'das pa'am/ dag pa zhes bya ba'i 'du shes rang dag nas ma dmigs te/
NK055(ri)001:9728: 'bras bu'i bud+d+ha la re smon gyi 'du shes nam
NK055(ri)001:9729: mkha' gzugs su mi snang ba dang 'dra bar rang
NK055(ri)001:9730: dag pa ni smon pa med pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:9731: de ni gsang sngags kyi rnam thar sgo gsum mo //
NK055(ri)001:9732: he ru ka'i dbu gsum yang don de gsum dang ldan pa'i rtags su dbu gsum du snang ste/
NK055(ri)001:9733: badz+ra he ru ka'i sku mdog mthing nag yin pas/
NK055(ri)001:9734: zhal dbus ma mthing nag thugs 'gyur ba med pa smon pa med pa/
NK055(ri)001:9735: zhal g.yas pa dkar ba sku ste/
NK055(ri)001:9736: dkar ba sku skyon gyis ma gos pa'i rtags su
NK055(ri)001:9737: dkar ba yang skyon dang bral ba bshad pa'i mtha'
NK055(ri)001:9738: thams cad dang bral ba'i stong pa nyid do //
NK055(ri)001:9739: zhal g.yon pa dmar ba ni gsung mtshan ma med
NK055(ri)001:9740: pa ste bde bar gshegs pa'i gsung mi 'gag pas
NK055(ri)001:9742: yod med kyi mtha'i mtshan ma mi mnga' ba bzhin he ru ka'i zhal g.yon dmar ba/
NK055(ri)001:9743: mtshan ma thams cad dang bral ba nyid kyis mtha'
NK055(ri)001:9744: gnyis dbang du 'dus pa'i sku mdog dmar po gsung
NK055(ri)001:9746: bud+d+ha he ru ka thams cad kyi sku yin pas zhal dbus ma smug nag sku stong pa nyid/
NK055(ri)001:9747: zhal g.yas pa dmar po gsung mtshan ma med pa/
NK055(ri)001:9748: g.yon pa mthing nag thugs smon pa med pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:9749: rat+na khrag 'thung yon tan gyi rigs skur 'dus pas zhal dbus ma ser po sku stong pa nyid/
NK055(ri)001:9750: g.yas dmar gsung mtshan ma med pa/
NK055(ri)001:9751: g.yon sngo thugs smon pa med pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:9752: pad+ma he ru ka khrag 'thung thams cad kyi gsung ste/
NK055(ri)001:9753: zhal dbus ma dmar ba gsung mtshan ma med pa/
NK055(ri)001:9754: g.yas dkar sku stong pa nyid/
NK055(ri)001:9755: g.yon sngo thugs smon pa med pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:9756: karma he ru ka khrag 'thung thams cad kyi phrin las te/
NK055(ri)001:9757: phrin las thugs su 'dus pas zhal dbus ma ljang thugs smon pa med pa/
NK055(ri)001:9758: g.yas dkar sku stong pa nyid/
NK055(ri)001:9759: g.yon dmar gsung mtshan ma med pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:9760: phyag drug ni ye shes drug ste/
NK055(ri)001:9761: stong pa nyid la sogs pa drug ste badz+ra he
NK055(ri)001:9762: ru ka'i phyag g.yas kyi dang po chos kyi dbyings
NK055(ri)001:9763: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i ye shes/
NK055(ri)001:9764: gnyis pa de mi 'gag pa'i mtshan nyid can me long lta bu/
NK055(ri)001:9765: tha ma mtha' thams cad dang bral ba mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes/
NK055(ri)001:9766: phyag g.yon gyi dang po ye shes lnga'i yul lam rang bzhin lta bu chos kyi dbyings kho na'o //
NK055(ri)001:9767: gnyis pa so sor rtogs pa/
NK055(ri)001:9768: gsum pa bya ba grub pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:9769: phyag mtshan drug kyang ye shes drug gis 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa'i rtags te/
NK055(ri)001:9770: badz+ra he ru ka'i g.yas kyis dang po rdo rje mthing nag rtse dgu bsnams te/
NK055(ri)001:9771: stong pa chen po'i ngo bo cir yang 'gyur du med/
NK055(ri)001:9772: 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad ye shes kyi ngang du 'joms par mdzad pa'i phyir/
NK055(ri)001:9773: rdo rje mthing nag ye shes dgu'i rtags su rtse mo dgu pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:9774: g.yon gyi dang po na thod khrag bsnams pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:9775: thod pa dkar po stong pa ni chos kyi dbyings yin la/
NK055(ri)001:9776: chos kyi dbyings ma rtogs pa'i khams gsum gyi sems
NK055(ri)001:9777: can gyi nyon mongs pa khrag zhag dang 'dra ba'i
NK055(ri)001:9778: rtags su b+han+d+ha khrag gis gang ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:9779: nyon mongs pa theg pa 'og ma pas gnyen po
NK055(ri)001:9780: skyong ba las 'dir dpags te rig pa'i ye shes
NK055(ri)001:9781: kyi ngang du sbyor ba'i rtags su rdo rje rtse
NK055(ri)001:9783: theg pa 'og mas nyon mongs pa spong ba la
NK055(ri)001:9784: 'dir ma spangs par gnas su dag par byed pa'i
NK055(ri)001:9785: phyir khrag 'thung nyid kyi zhal du gsol ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:9787: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang ldan pa'i rtags te/
NK055(ri)001:9788: zhabs dang po gnyis g.yas bskum g.yon brkyang pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:9789: de yang g.yas bskum pa ni thugs rjes 'gro ba'i
NK055(ri)001:9790: don mdzad kyang 'khor ba'i skyon gyis ma gos pa'i
NK055(ri)001:9791: rtags so // g.yon brkyang ba ni thabs kyis 'gro
NK055(ri)001:9792: don ji ltar mdzad kyang shes rab kyis chos kyi
NK055(ri)001:9793: dbyings las mi 'gyur ba'i rtags so //
NK055(ri)001:9794: de'i phyi tha gnyis g.yas brkyang pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:9795: thabs thugs rje chen pos 'khor ba ma stong gi
NK055(ri)001:9796: bar du 'gro don rgyun mi chad pa'i rtags so
NK055(ri)001:9797: // g.yon bskum pa ni shes rab kyi nyan thos
NK055(ri)001:9798: bzhin zhi ba phyogs gcig pa'i mtha' la mi gnas
NK055(ri)001:9799: // te/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthas ma gos pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:9801: ko rlon gos ni sna tshogs gyon //
NK055(ri)001:9802: zhes pa sna tshogs ni gsum ste/
NK055(ri)001:9803: sku stod la theg pa mchog gi rgyan glang po che'i ko rlon/
NK055(ri)001:9804: gdul bya blang dor med pa'i rgyan zhing lpags kyi rked dkris/
NK055(ri)001:9805: dpa' brtul za byed kyi rgyan stag gi sham thabs gsum ste/
NK055(ri)001:9806: rloon pa ni khrag zhag dang bcas pa ste khams
NK055(ri)001:9807: gsum gyi nyon mongs pa theg pa 'og ma bzhin
NK055(ri)001:9808: mi spong ste/ theg pa 'di nyid du rig pa'i
NK055(ri)001:9809: ye shes su sbyong ba'i rtags su sku la gsol
NK055(ri)001:9810: mi spong ste/ ba'o // rngam pa'i sgra chen 'jigs par sgrogs //
NK055(ri)001:9811: zhes pa nang du nyon mongs pa la rngam/
NK055(ri)001:9812: phyi bdud dang dregs byed la rngam pa'i da ha
NK055(ri)001:9813: dang pa tsa dang kh+aa hi dang ha ha he
NK055(ri)001:9814: he la sogs pa'i sgra chen po ni/
NK055(ri)001:9816: de'i nang du gdul bya rnams kyi rtog pa 'joms
NK055(ri)001:9817: pa'i che chung gi bye brag mang po shar ba'o
NK055(ri)001:9818: // 'jigs pa ni gdul bya rnams kyi mi mthun
NK055(ri)001:9819: pa'i rtog pa gcod pa rtsa nas dag par byed
NK055(ri)001:9821: skad cig ma la snang bas sgra'i bye brag myur bar ston pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:9822: sbrul dang thod rlon nyi mar bcas //
NK055(ri)001:9823: zhes pa sbrul ni klu chen brgyad kyi chas te/
NK055(ri)001:9824: klu chen brgyad rigs bzhir 'dus te/
NK055(ri)001:9825: dbu dang sku la rgyal rigs dkar po/
NK055(ri)001:9826: snyan cha la bram ze'i rigs ser po/
NK055(ri)001:9827: phyag gdub la rje'u rigs dmar po/
NK055(ri)001:9828: zhabs gdub la gdol ba nag po/
NK055(ri)001:9829: thod rlon zhes pa thod pa rlon pa bcad ma
NK055(ri)001:9830: thag pa lnga bcu rtsa gcig gi phreng ba se
NK055(ri)001:9832: 'dod yon ma spangs pa longs sku'i rgyan/
NK055(ri)001:9833: dbu'i skra mtshams na thod pa dkar po lnga lnga
NK055(ri)001:9834: yod pa rlan dang bral ba gzung 'dzin rnam par
NK055(ri)001:9835: dag pa chos sku'i rgyan te/
NK055(ri)001:9836: ye shes lnga mtshon pa'i phyir dbu gsum re re la'ang lnga lnga'o //
NK055(ri)001:9837: thod pa ra ri la la ni sha 'byar/
NK055(ri)001:9838: la la ni rus pa mngon pa'i phreng bas dpung pa la brgyan pa sprul pa'i sku ste/
NK055(ri)001:9840: rus pa mngon pa ni chos kyi dbyings las mi g.yo ba'i rtags/
NK055(ri)001:9841: sha 'byar ba ni gdul bya dang mthun par snang ba'i rtags so //
NK055(ri)001:9843: ces pa snyan gong g.yas na nyi ma/
NK055(ri)001:9844: g.yon na zla bas brgyan nas 'od zer gyis 'gro
NK055(ri)001:9845: ba rnams kyi mun pa sel zhing nyon mongs skem
NK055(ri)001:9846: par byed pa thabs dang shes rab kyi rgyan no
NK055(ri)001:9847: // der ko rlon mnabs pa'i rgyan gsum/
NK055(ri)001:9848: nyi zla dang thod phreng thogs pa'i rgyan gnyis/
NK055(ri)001:9849: byug pa'i rgyan gsum ni don dam bcud kyi rgyan zhag gi zo ris kun tu 'od kyis/
NK055(ri)001:9850: rak+ta thugs rje chags pa'i rgyan pad+ma spyan/
NK055(ri)001:9851: thal ba 'dul byed phrin las kyi rgyan yi ge 'khor lo tshogs chen gyis/
NK055(ri)001:9852: de gsum byugs pa'i rgyan gsum dang dpal chas brgyad do //
NK055(ri)001:9854: stong gi 'jig rten khor yug bcas //
NK055(ri)001:9855: zhes pa bud+d+ha he ru ka'i phyag mtshan te/
NK055(ri)001:9856: stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams khor yug dang bcas
NK055(ri)001:9857: pa bsnams pa ste bud+d+ha he ru ka'i phyag mtshan
NK055(ri)001:9858: nyid kyis gdul bya sems can dang mi 'bral bar
NK055(ri)001:9859: 'gro ba'i rgyud la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i
NK055(ri)001:9860: rtags/ nye bar nyams su len na 'khor lo ste g.yas kyi dang pos bsnams so //
NK055(ri)001:9861: rdo rje ni badz+ra he ru ka'i rang rtags te bshad zin to //
NK055(ri)001:9862: dung chen rak+tasa gang ba ni lnga ka'i g.yon dang po ste/
NK055(ri)001:9863: g.yas rang rtags kyi phyag rgyas khams gsum gyi nyon
NK055(ri)001:9864: mongs pa sbyong bar mdzad pa badz+ra he ru ka'i
NK055(ri)001:9865: skabs su bshad pa dang mthun/
NK055(ri)001:9866: ral gri ni rat+na he ru ka'i rang rtags g.yas
NK055(ri)001:9867: dang po ste ral gri so gnyis kyis gcod pa
NK055(ri)001:9868: dang 'dra ba mnyam pa nyid kyis mtha' gnyis gcod
NK055(ri)001:9869: par mdzad pa'o // dgra s+t+wa pad+ma he ru ka'i
NK055(ri)001:9870: g.yas dang po ste dgra s+t+was gang la bab pa
NK055(ri)001:9871: thams cad gcod cing 'joms pa ltar/
NK055(ri)001:9872: pad+ma he ru ka so sor rtogs pa'i ye shes
NK055(ri)001:9873: kyis chos spyi dang rang gi mtshan nyid kyi mtha'
NK055(ri)001:9875: gshol ni karma he ru ka'i rang rtags g.yas dang
NK055(ri)001:9876: po ste gshol gyis tha ba barloga sa bon btab
NK055(ri)001:9877: 'bras bu smin 'gro ba'i gsos su gyur pa ltar/
NK055(ri)001:9878: bya ba grub pa'i ye shes kyis gdul bya'i nyon
NK055(ri)001:9879: mongs pa'i rgyud tha rgod dang 'dra ba barloga /mtho
NK055(ri)001:9880: ris dang thar pa'i sa bon btab 'bras bu smin/
NK055(ri)001:9881: bud+d+ha nas sems can gyi 'dren pa chen por gyur pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:9883: sogs/ zhes pas he ru ka'i phyag drug gi phyag mtshan sgyu 'phrul rgyas pa nas 'byung ba lta bu'o //
NK055(ri)001:9885: snying rje rol pa'i rgyud nas 'byung ba'am/
NK055(ri)001:9886: rdo rje rnon po nas 'byung ba rnams bzung ba ste/
NK055(ri)001:9887: 'dir slob dpon pad+ma'i bzhed kyis sogs khongs su phyag
NK055(ri)001:9888: mtshan lnga de dkrug pa bsdeb pas badz+ra he ru
NK055(ri)001:9889: kas/ rdo rje 'khor lo ral gri g.yas //
NK055(ri)001:9890: b+han+d+ha dgra sta gshol shing g.yon //
NK055(ri)001:9892: rdo rje 'khor lo ral gri g.yas //
NK055(ri)001:9895: ral gri rdo rje 'khor lo g.yas //
NK055(ri)001:9898: dgra s+t+wa rdo rje 'khor lo g.yas //
NK055(ri)001:9899: b+han+d+ha ral gri gshol shing g.yon //
NK055(ri)001:9901: gshol shing rdo rje 'khor lo g.yas //
NK055(ri)001:9902: b+han+d+ha ral gri dgra s+t+wa g.yon //
NK055(ri)001:9903: rang gi lag cha sna tshogs bsnams //
NK055(ri)001:9904: zhes pa rang rtags kyi phyag rgya b+han+d+ha dang rdo rje la sogs pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:9905: sna tshogs ni phyag mtshan dkrug pa de nyid de/
NK055(ri)001:9906: ye shes drug gi 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa'i phyir/
NK055(ri)001:9907: ye shes drug phyag rgyar snang bas don mdzad tshul
NK055(ri)001:9908: ni rdo rjes gdul bya rnams kyi rgyud ye shes
NK055(ri)001:9909: su sbyong ba'o // 'khor lo ni theg pa dgu'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:9910: ral gris rgyud kyi nyon mongs pa gcod pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:9911: dgra s+t+was bdag 'dzin rtsa nas dag par mdzad pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:9912: gshol ni bshad zin pa nyid do //
NK055(ri)001:9915: zhes pa btsun mo ni yab la mnyes pa stob pa'i don no //
NK055(ri)001:9916: 'jigs pa ni yab he ru ka'i cha lugs dang mthun par khro mo'i tshul dang ldan pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:9917: zhal gcig phyag gnyis g.yas rang rtags g.yon thod khrag /tshogs ni khrag 'thung yum lnga'o //
NK055(ri)001:9918: rgyan dang cha lugs ni shes par zad do //
NK055(ri)001:9920: gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgya/
NK055(ri)001:9921: zhes pa gnas ni yul can yul snang bar byed
NK055(ri)001:9922: pa'i bdag nyid rnam shes bzhi dang dbang po bzhi
NK055(ri)001:9923: gnas gyur pa'i ko r+ai ma bzhi dang /
NK055(ri)001:9924: puk+ka ma bzhi dang brgyad de/
NK055(ri)001:9926: yul/ zhes pa rnam shes kyi yul gzugs la sogs pa bzhi dag pa sing+ha ma bzhi'o //
NK055(ri)001:9927: yul dus bzhi dag pa'i lha mo gri d+ha ma la sogs pa bzhi ste/
NK055(ri)001:9928: sku mdog phyag mtshan rgyan dang cha lugs rnams ni/
NK055(ri)001:9929: koo ri b+han dmar byis dbyug sngo //
NK055(ri)001:9931: sing+ha kha ro bsnol ser seng //
NK055(ri)001:9932: la sogs pa sku mdog phyag mtshan dang rgyan dang cha lugs rnams tshogs pa phyag rgya ste //
NK055(ri)001:9933: khro bo rang bzhin gyi le'ura rgyas par bshad do //
NK055(ri)001:9934: sgo bzhi'i phyag rgyas rab mdzes shing //
NK055(ri)001:9936: rta gdong mthing nag lcags kyu 'dzin //
NK055(ri)001:9937: phag gdong ser mo zhags pa 'dzin //
NK055(ri)001:9938: nyi zla lcags sgrog me 'bar ma //
NK055(ri)001:9939: thal byed ljang gu dril bu 'dzin //
NK055(ri)001:9940: zhes pa rnams rang bzhin gyi le'ura bshad do //
NK055(ri)001:9941: gdan gong du bkod zin gyi thog tu gnas ma brgyad ni glo 'bur gru chad brgyad la'o //
NK055(ri)001:9942: yang na glo 'bur gyi bzhi de gru chad bzhi la bzhugs par yang bzhed do //
NK055(ri)001:9944: lha snam nang ma phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad la bzhugs so //
NK055(ri)001:9946: slas dang byi mo tshogs kyi gtso //
NK055(ri)001:9947: zhes pa la sogs pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:9948: slas ni ru dra'i chung ma yin pa'i dus so //
NK055(ri)001:9949: byi mo ni dpal chen pos mo rnams sbyor te 'dul ba'i dus su/
NK055(ri)001:9950: ru dras ma tshor bar dpal gyi sku la 'khril ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:9951: tshogs ni 'khor yang 'khor dang bcas pa rnams so //
NK055(ri)001:9952: gtso mo bcu tsho gnyis ni nyi shu tham pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:9953: de'i thog tu brgyad kyis ni nyi shu rtsa brgyad de/
NK055(ri)001:9954: phyogs bzhir drug drug sgo bzhir bzhi'o //
NK055(ri)001:9955: mdzes pa ni dpal chen po'i mdzad pas ru dra
NK055(ri)001:9956: pho mo 'khor dang bcas pa btul nas 'khor bcas
NK055(ri)001:9957: 'khor du byas/ nyon mongs pa ye shes su gsal/
NK055(ri)001:9960: gnyen gyis byams par gyur pa lta bu'o //
NK055(ri)001:9961: de la dbang phyug ma rnams ni sngags brjod pa'i
NK055(ri)001:9962: rkyen gyis rang rang gi gdan smos pa rnams dang
NK055(ri)001:9964: srin mo smug nag thod rlon 'chang //
NK055(ri)001:9966: so so'i rgyan rnams dang bcas pa grub nas dpal
NK055(ri)001:9967: chen po ci bgyis bka' stsol bka' nyan zhes pa
NK055(ri)001:9968: dang chas te cig car du 'grub pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:9969: de ltar bskyed pa tshar nas/
NK055(ri)001:9972: ye shes pa spyan drang ba la sogs cho ga'i rim pa ma nor bar rgyas par bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:9976: che mchog he ru kas de ltar gsungs pas phyogs
NK055(ri)001:9977: bcu thams cad khrag 'thung 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis
NK055(ri)001:9978: snod bcud thams cad kun tu gang bar gyur pa
NK055(ri)001:9979: ni/ rang bzhin lhun grub dkyil 'khor gyi dus su
NK055(ri)001:9980: rang bzhin bsam yas lhun grub kyi dkyil 'khor ro
NK055(ri)001:9981: ni/ // lam pas nyams su blang ba'i dus su
NK055(ri)001:9982: ting nge 'dzin bsam yas lhun grub kyi dkyil 'khor
NK055(ri)001:9983: ni/ // ro // gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/
NK055(ri)001:9984: gdul bya drag po'i rkyen gyis snang ba'i khro tshul
NK055(ri)001:9985: bzhi dang bcas pa'i lnga bcu rtsa brgyad kyi dkyil
NK055(ri)001:9986: 'khor/ go phye ba'i 'khor gyis nyams su blang ba'i don bstan pa'i le'u ste/
NK055(ri)001:9987: bcu bdun pa'i bshad pa'o////le'u bco brgyad pa 'di la rgyud gsum la na lam gyi rgyud/
NK055(ri)001:9988: rgyud kyi dngos po bcu las na mchod pa/
NK055(ri)001:9989: dkyil 'khor bcu gnyis na lhag pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang lhag pa gzugs brnyan dang 'brel/
NK055(ri)001:9990: de ltar de yan chad du zhi khro gnyis kyi dkyil 'khor rgyas par bstan nas/
NK055(ri)001:9991: zhi khro gnyis ka la dgongs shing gnyis ka'i cha rkyen mchod pa bstan to //
NK055(ri)001:9993: de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po/
NK055(ri)001:9994: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs pa'i lo rgyus te
NK055(ri)001:9995: tshig gi de ma thag pa ni bcu bdun pa'i
NK055(ri)001:9996: rjes thog go // don gyi de ma thag pa
NK055(ri)001:9997: ni zhi khro gnyis kyi mchod pa'i skabs su 'brel
NK055(ri)001:9998: rjes thog go // ba'o // de la 'dir 'og
NK055(ri)001:9999: ma dang thun mong ma yin pa'i mchod pa chen
NK055(ri)001:10000: po rnams ston pas zhi khro gnyis kyi tshogs bsgrub
NK055(ri)001:10002: dgyes pa chen po ni kun bzang he ru ka'o //
NK055(ri)001:10003: mnyes pa ni yul dang yul can gyi mnyes pa lta bu ma yin te/
NK055(ri)001:10004: mchod pa 'di dag lta spyod bsgom gsum mgo snyoms
NK055(ri)001:10005: par nyams su blangs pas 'bul bya 'bul byed dbul
NK055(ri)001:10006: mkhan sems nyid ye shes chen po'i ngang du dbyer
NK055(ri)001:10007: med par lhun gyis grub pa la ye nas yin
NK055(ri)001:10008: pa'i don mngon du gyur pas rang sa zin/
NK055(ri)001:10010: rang ngo shes pa'i dus su bya byed kyi rtsol ba rdul phra rab kyang ma dmigs pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:10011: re dogs thams cad dang bral nas mnyam pa nyid du gsal ba mnyes pa'i mchog ste/
NK055(ri)001:10012: don grub pa'i bya ba byas pa lta bu'i 'du
NK055(ri)001:10013: shes kyi bya ba thams cad dag pa nam mkha'
NK055(ri)001:10014: lta bu'o // de lta bu mthong bar bya ba'i mchod pa chen po ni/
NK055(ri)001:10017: phyi pa gsum gyis ma reg pa'i ngo bo/
NK055(ri)001:10018: theg pa 'di nyid kyi mchod pa ni sbyor sgrol dang /
NK055(ri)001:10020: dam rdzas kyi mchod pa ste 'og ma'i spang bya rnams 'dir blang ste/
NK055(ri)001:10021: lam dang mchod pa'i ngo bor byas pas mnyes pa
NK055(ri)001:10022: chen po thob pa'i mchod pa chen po 'di kun
NK055(ri)001:10023: bzang he ru kas go phye ba'i 'khor rnams kyi
NK055(ri)001:10026: de la mchod sbyin dam pa ni //
NK055(ri)001:10028: mchod sbyin chen po gong du bstan pa de las mchod pa chen po'i ngo bo ni/
NK055(ri)001:10030: sems can la sbyin pa dus gcig ste/
NK055(ri)001:10031: sgrol mchod dgar nas bstan pa'i sgrol ba'i mchod pa chen po ni tshogs gnyis cig car rdzogs te/
NK055(ri)001:10032: phung po tshogs su bsngosa pas bsod nams kyi tshogs rdzogs/
NK055(ri)001:10033: rnam shes gnas spar bas ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs/
NK055(ri)001:10035: bsgral bya kho bdag bsod nams med pa las gsang sngags kyi phrin las kyis zag med mthong /
NK055(ri)001:10036: sems can la sbyin pa'i mchog tu 'gyur/
NK055(ri)001:10037: mchod sbyin gnyis rgyu 'bras dbyer med par 'bras bu la sbyor ba ni dam pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:10038: de yang dang po rten gyi gang zag ni/
NK055(ri)001:10039: thog mar bdag nyid rtogs goms bsgral //
NK055(ri)001:10040: zhes pa rten gyi gang zag rnal 'byor pas dang thog mar lta ba shes par bya ste/
NK055(ri)001:10041: lta ba'i dang po sngon du 'gro ba phyi nang
NK055(ri)001:10042: gi chos thams cad rtogs pa bzhi'i sgo nas sku
NK055(ri)001:10043: gsung thugs lhun gyis grub par rtogs pa khong du
NK055(ri)001:10046: goms/ zhes pa rkyen 'jug pa ting nge 'dzin gyis bskyed
NK055(ri)001:10047: rdzogs rnam pa gnyis kyi don ting nge 'dzin gyis
NK055(ri)001:10048: nyams drod brtan pa'i stobs dang ldan pa ni bskyed
NK055(ri)001:10049: rdzogs gnyis kyi sgo nas zag med kyi don mngon
NK055(ri)001:10050: du byas pa ni bdag nyid bsgral ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:10051: rten gyi gang zag des bar skabs thad sor bsgral ba'i lta ba ni/
NK055(ri)001:10052: de nas gnyis med blo yis ni //
NK055(ri)001:10053: zhes pa gong du bdag nyid bsgral te khams gsum gyi 'jigs pa dang bral nges pa/
NK055(ri)001:10054: de nas gnyis med ces pa/
NK055(ri)001:10055: spyir 'khor 'das gnyis su med pa'i rig pa gdengs chud/
NK055(ri)001:10056: snod bcud gnyis su med pa dang yul sems gnyis med kyi gdengs chud de/
NK055(ri)001:10057: bdag gzhan gyi 'du shes gtan nas dag ste mdzad
NK055(ri)001:10058: spyod ci mdzad kyang gnyis su med pa'i mnyam pa
NK055(ri)001:10059: chen po las blo g.yo ba med pa'i gdengs can
NK055(ri)001:10060: gyis/ phrin las nyams su blang ba'i dus su yang de kho na nyid du gsal ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:10061: blo ngan sems can snying re rje //
NK055(ri)001:10062: zhes pa blo ngan pa ni bsgral zhing bcu ste/
NK055(ri)001:10063: dam nyams dam las log pa dang //
NK055(ri)001:10064: dam dgra ngan pa'i ngang tshul can //
NK055(ri)001:10065: ngan song gsum dang bcu po ni //
NK055(ri)001:10067: de dag ni blo zhan pas gnas lugs mi shes pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:10068: theg pa mchog la dad pa med pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:10069: las rgyu 'bras mi shes pas rnam par dkar ba'i
NK055(ri)001:10070: las dang bral zhing gnag las kyis rtsub mo rnams
NK055(ri)001:10071: spyod pa'o // de dag gi las rtsub mo rnams
NK055(ri)001:10072: kyis gnas tha ma gsum du 'khor zhing 'khor ba
NK055(ri)001:10074: de ni lam pa rnal 'byor pa'i snying rje las mi 'da' zhing bsgral zhing du gyur pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:10076: gnyis su med par bsgral bar bya //
NK055(ri)001:10077: zhes pa thabs ni le'u bcu gcig pa bzhin te/
NK055(ri)001:10078: dgongs pa gnyis su med pa'i ye shes su gsal ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:10081: nyi zla'i thabs kyis 'og min du 'phangs nas/
NK055(ri)001:10082: rdo rje 'dzin pa yab yum thabs shes rab gnyis su med pa'i byang chub sems kyis dbang bskur nas/
NK055(ri)001:10083: rigs nges par bya ba'i phyir kun tu bzang pos dbu brgyan pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:10085: 'khril ba'i mchod chen mnyam sbyor bas //
NK055(ri)001:10088: yum yang dag gsal ldan ma'am/
NK055(ri)001:10089: byin rlabs gang yang rung ba yan lag gi lhar gsal/
NK055(ri)001:10091: sna rtse yungs 'bru'i gzhal yas su sgyu 'phrul zhi khro gang yin gyi dkyil 'khor bsgom/
NK055(ri)001:10092: ye shes pa spyan drangs nas bstims/
NK055(ri)001:10093: sgo ba bzhi'i phyag rgyas yab yum thabs dang shes
NK055(ri)001:10094: rab dbyer med par 'khril bas dga' ba bcu drug
NK055(ri)001:10095: gi las kyis nyi zla'i sbyor bas lhan skyes kyi
NK055(ri)001:10096: ye shes rtog tshogs ye shes su gsal ba'i mchod
NK055(ri)001:10097: pa chen po ni yo ga phyin chad las spags
NK055(ri)001:10098: pa'o // mnyam sbyor ni yungs 'bru'i sgyu 'phrul gyi dkyil 'khor de kho na bzhin du sbyor bas/
NK055(ri)001:10099: bdag nyid rnal 'byor pa lhan skyes kyis mnyes pas de nyid yungs 'bru'i dkyil 'khor la 'bul bas/
NK055(ri)001:10100: mchod pas bud+d+ha thams cad mchod pas ngo bo nyid du gsal lo //
NK055(ri)001:10101: rgyas par ni le'u bcu gcig pa bzhin no //
NK055(ri)001:10102: dam rdzas kyi mchod pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:10103: mnyam pa'i grub rdzas chen po dag /zhes pa mnyam
NK055(ri)001:10104: pa ni rang bzhin gyis mnyam pa dam rdzas kyi
NK055(ri)001:10105: ngo bo dang rnal 'byor pa'i ngo bo chos kyi
NK055(ri)001:10107: de yang bdud rtsi chen po'i rgyud las/
NK055(ri)001:10108: byang sems rdo rje sems dpa' dkar //
NK055(ri)001:10109: zhes pa la sogs pas gsal lo //
NK055(ri)001:10110: las kyis mnyam pa ni bdud rtsi lnga lta spyod bsgom gsum dbyer med pas nyams su blangs na/
NK055(ri)001:10111: rigs lnga ye shes lnga 'grub pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:10113: chos nyid rang gi rang bzhin gyis grub pa/
NK055(ri)001:10114: chos can rang gi ngo bos grub pa/
NK055(ri)001:10115: bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga'i bdag nyid kun rdzob nus pa'i mthus grub pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:10116: byin gyis brlabsa kyis grub pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:10117: chen po ni yo ga phyin chad kyi spyod yul ma yin pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:10119: bdag dang mnyam pa'i tshogs la 'bul //
NK055(ri)001:10123: 'bul ba'i yul sgyu 'phrul gyi lha rnams sems kyi
NK055(ri)001:10124: dbyings su gsal ba de nyid du yang 'dzin pa
NK055(ri)001:10125: med pa ni 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa ste
NK055(ri)001:10126: mnyam pa nyid kyi mchod pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:10127: tshogs ni sgyu 'phrul zhi khro'i dkyil 'khor ro //
NK055(ri)001:10128: 'bul bya dbul byed med kyang 'bul ba ltar snang ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:10130: bza' dang bca' dang btung dang bgo //
NK055(ri)001:10131: zhes pa bza' ba ni zhal zas kyi tshogs thams cad do //
NK055(ri)001:10132: bca' ba ni rus pa dang 'bras bu'i rigs rnams so //
NK055(ri)001:10133: btung ba ni chang gi bye brag rnams so //
NK055(ri)001:10134: bgo ba ni na baza'i bye brag rnams so //
NK055(ri)001:10136: mig gi longs spyod la sogs pa rnams te/
NK055(ri)001:10137: de rnams kyang mig gis mthong ba yid du 'ong ba mig gi longs spyod yin la/
NK055(ri)001:10138: rna ba'i longs spyod ni tshogs kyi le'ura bshad pa'i glu tshig gi tshogs so //
NK055(ri)001:10139: sna'i longs spyod dri ste gong ma rnams la yang dri bro'ang yod la/
NK055(ri)001:10140: spos dang dri bzang gi tshogs so //
NK055(ri)001:10141: lce'i longs spyod rnams te gong du bstan pa rnams so //
NK055(ri)001:10142: reg bya'i longs spyod gong du bgo ba'i gos rnams te/
NK055(ri)001:10143: de rnams tshogs pa la ni ldan pa zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:10144: yang na re re la yang longs spyod lnga tshang bas ldan zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:10148: zhes pa 'dir rgyas par byed na yi ge mang
NK055(ri)001:10149: bar 'gyur pas tshogs kyi le'ura rgyas par bshad zin
NK055(ri)001:10151: 'bras bu'am yon tan la gnyis kyi dngos ni/
NK055(ri)001:10152: phyogs bcu dus bzhir gshegs pa yi //
NK055(ri)001:10154: phyogs bcu na bzhugs shing dus bzhir gshegs pa'i yang
NK055(ri)001:10155: dag par rdzogs pa'i bud+d+ha'i 'bras bu mngon du byas
NK055(ri)001:10156: pa'i bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan
NK055(ri)001:10158: rmad che ba ni ngo bo gang du yang ma
NK055(ri)001:10159: grub par rnam pa cir yang mi 'gag par 'char
NK055(ri)001:10160: ba snang stong ris su mi rnyed pa zad pa
NK055(ri)001:10161: med pa'o // gzhan nas yod 'ongs ma yin te //
NK055(ri)001:10162: zhes pa sems kyi chos nyid las ma gtogs pa
NK055(ri)001:10163: dus sam yul lam gnas gzhan zhig nas yod pa
NK055(ri)001:10165: rang sems rtogs pa mthar phyin pa nyid 'bras bu lhun gyis grub pa'i ngo bo'o //
NK055(ri)001:10166: des 'jig rten gyi lha dang srin po dang /
NK055(ri)001:10167: sogs khongs su lha ma srin sde brgyad kyi rdzu 'phrul can thams cad bsdu ste/
NK055(ri)001:10168: de dag gi rdzu 'phrul rnams kyang rang sems snang
NK055(ri)001:10169: ba las ma gtogs pa med pa thag gcad do
NK055(ri)001:10171: rnal 'byor las su rung rnams kyis //
NK055(ri)001:10173: rnal ma'i don la 'byor pa ni lta ba rtogs pa gdengs chud pa/
NK055(ri)001:10174: yul dang yul can ma dmigs pa rtogs snyam gyi 'du shes kyang dag pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:10175: las su rung ba ni ting nge 'dzin te/
NK055(ri)001:10177: sems nyid ting nge 'dzin du gsal nas/
NK055(ri)001:10178: g.yo thob goms brtan myong ba la ni las su rung ba zhes bya ste/
NK055(ri)001:10179: de bzhin nyid dang kun tu snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin mthar phyin pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:10181: phyag rgya chen po rdzogs 'gyur zhing /
NK055(ri)001:10182: zhes pa lha'i sku phyag rgya gcig pa de la
NK055(ri)001:10183: goms nas spros pa rdzogs pa ni snang ba rnam
NK055(ri)001:10185: gsal ba yid gnyis med pas na //
NK055(ri)001:10186: zhes pa gsal ba ni ting nge 'dzin gyi skyon dang bral ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:10187: de'i zhar la lta ba dang lha gnyis so sor med de/
NK055(ri)001:10188: me long mthong ba dang gzugs brnyan mthong ba dbyer med pa bzhin du/
NK055(ri)001:10190: 'grub mi 'grub kyi yid gnyis med pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:10191: de'i drod tshad ni lha'i sku snang stong dbyer med
NK055(ri)001:10192: par gsal ba las tha mal pa'i gnas skabs mi
NK055(ri)001:10193: rnyed na the tshom gzhi nas dag pa yin pas/
NK055(ri)001:10194: nam mkha' gzugs su mi 'dra ba'i tshe skabs na/
NK055(ri)001:10196: zhes pa 'bras bu'i ngo bo ste/
NK055(ri)001:10197: rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa 'bras bu'i dkyil 'khor dang /
NK055(ri)001:10198: rnal 'byor pas bsgom pa lhag pa ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor dang /
NK055(ri)001:10199: bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor lhag pa gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil
NK055(ri)001:10200: 'khor dang dbyer med pa rang byung ye shes su
NK055(ri)001:10201: gsal ba ni/ 'bras bu mthar phyin pa'i yi ge
NK055(ri)001:10202: 'khor lo tshogs chen gyis gsal ba ni dkyil 'khor
NK055(ri)001:10204: 'bar ba ni chos thams cad rang rig pa sku
NK055(ri)001:10205: gsung thugs mtha' gnyis dang bral ba'i ngo bor lhun
NK055(ri)001:10206: gyis grub ste/ de las ma gtogs pa gzhan med pas rang dbang bsgyur ba ste/
NK055(ri)001:10210: zhes pa la sogs pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:10211: mnyes pa ni sbyor sgrol dam rdzas 'dod yon lnga'i
NK055(ri)001:10212: mchod pas rnal 'byor pa lta bsgom spyod pa gdengs
NK055(ri)001:10213: su grub pa'i rtsal can gyis mchod pa 'di dag
NK055(ri)001:10214: nyams su blangs pas rgyu 'bras dbyer med pa'i dgongs
NK055(ri)001:10215: pas mchod pa mnyam pa nyid kyi ngang la phyogs
NK055(ri)001:10216: su 'dzin pa phra ba yang med pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:10217: ngo bo ni dang por bstan pa'i mchod pa chen po ni gong du bstan pa bzhi po ste/
NK055(ri)001:10218: blo dman gyi spyod yul du ma gyur pa blo
NK055(ri)001:10219: mchog gi rang byung ye shes su gsal bar byed
NK055(ri)001:10220: pa blos byas dang bral ba'i mchod pa 'khor gsum
NK055(ri)001:10221: dag pa nyid lhun gyis grub pa ni chen po'o
NK055(ri)001:10222: // des 'jig rten thams cad khyab pa ni sngon
NK055(ri)001:10223: byung rang bzhin lhun grub kyi dus su 'bras bu'i
NK055(ri)001:10224: rtsal gyis chos thams cad mchod pa bsam yas lhun
NK055(ri)001:10226: rjes 'jug kyang ting nge 'dzin bsam yas lhun grub
NK055(ri)001:10227: kyi ngo la mchod pas bud+d+ha'i dkyil 'khor mnyes pa
NK055(ri)001:10228: dang / de'i zhar la sbyin pas khams gsum 'gro
NK055(ri)001:10229: ba rnams tshim pa gnyis ting nge 'dzin gyi ngo
NK055(ri)001:10230: dang / la gsal ba'o // sbyor sgrol gyi mchod pa gnyis ni/
NK055(ri)001:10231: las dang po las ni ting nge 'dzin gyi yul lo //
NK055(ri)001:10232: gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/
NK055(ri)001:10233: gong du bstan pa'i mchod pa rnams ni 'og ma
NK055(ri)001:10234: dang mi 'dra bas mchod pa dang sbyin pa thun
NK055(ri)001:10235: mong yin te/ 'phags pa mchod pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:10236: rtog tshogs mnyes pas 'gro ba mnyes pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:10237: mchod sbyin dus gcig par bstan te/
NK055(ri)001:10238: yo ga man chad kyi spyod yul ma yin pas kyang dam pa/
NK055(ri)001:10239: 'og ma'i spang bya blangs pas tshogs gnyis su gyur pas kyang dam pa/
NK055(ri)001:10240: rgyu 'bras dbyer med par tshe gcig gis 'bras bu la sbyor bas kyang dam pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:10241: de bstan pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa bshad pa'o////le'u bcu dgu pa la 'jug ste/
NK055(ri)001:10242: rgyud gsum las lam gyi rgyud do //
NK055(ri)001:10243: rgyud kyi dngos po bcu las gzhi dam tshig go //
NK055(ri)001:10244: lam pa mtho dman kun gyi spyod yul lo //
NK055(ri)001:10245: zhi khro gnyis kyi dkyil 'khor mchod pa dang bcas pa song nas/
NK055(ri)001:10246: gzhi lam 'bras bu gsum ka'i gzhi dam tshig ston pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:10247: de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po/
NK055(ri)001:10249: sgra'i de ma thag pa ni le'u bco brgyad pa'i rjes thog go //
NK055(ri)001:10250: don gyi de ma thag pa ni mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i slob ma dkyil 'khor du zhugs nas/
NK055(ri)001:10251: dbang gi sngon du 'gro ba sa gzhi dang 'dra ba'i dam tshig yin pas der 'brel to //
NK055(ri)001:10252: dgyes pa chen po bshad zin to //
NK055(ri)001:10253: sngags 'chang rnams don yod par bya ba'i phyir/
NK055(ri)001:10257: thad sor bsgyur na shes skyob/
NK055(ri)001:10258: chos thams cad kyi de kho na nyid shes pas 'khor ba rang sar dag nas skyob pas/
NK055(ri)001:10259: don de nyid yon tan thams cad kyi gzhir gyur pas na man+t+ra ste/
NK055(ri)001:10260: lta spyod gnyis 'chang ba'i rnal 'byor gyi mngon sum
NK055(ri)001:10261: du 'chang ba ni lam pa rnams kyi spyod yul
NK055(ri)001:10262: lo // rang rig pa'i mngon sum du 'chang ba ni/
NK055(ri)001:10263: sa bcu pa yan chad kyi bud+d+ha rnams kyi spyod yul rnams te/
NK055(ri)001:10264: 'dir ni lam pa rnams kyi ngor rgyas par bshad pa ni le'u bcu gcig par song zin/
NK055(ri)001:10265: don yod par bya ba'i phyir/
NK055(ri)001:10266: zhes pa don ni gnyer bya'i ngo bo ste thun mong gi dngos grub dang /
NK055(ri)001:10267: mchog gi dngos grub ste de dag dang ldan pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:10268: de la theg pa 'di nyid kyi dam tshig ni/
NK055(ri)001:10269: lam dang 'bras bu gnyis ka'i ngo bo ste/
NK055(ri)001:10270: rtsa ba dang yan lag gi dam tshig rnams phra
NK055(ri)001:10271: ba yang ma nyams pa ni lam gyi ngo bo
NK055(ri)001:10272: rdzogs pa yin la/ lam ma nyams pa dang ldan pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:10273: rnal 'byor pas gang bsgrub pa thams cad 'grub la/
NK055(ri)001:10275: dam tshig rnams ni rdo rje che //
NK055(ri)001:10276: zhes pas bud+d+ha thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyang
NK055(ri)001:10277: de las mi 'da' ba dang de'i rgyas thebs pa'i
NK055(ri)001:10278: phyir dam tshig ste 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid do
NK055(ri)001:10279: // de nas dam tshig rnams thun mong gi 'bras
NK055(ri)001:10280: bu gnas skabs la brten na rgyud kyi shes par
NK055(ri)001:10281: bya ba'i dngos po rnams nye bar bsgrub pa'i phyir/
NK055(ri)001:10282: gzhi dam tshig gis gzung ba/
NK055(ri)001:10285: theg pa 'di nyid kyi gzhung gi dam tshig ni theg pa 'og ma rnams las spags pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:10286: de yang chen po rnam pa bdun dang ldan pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:10287: de la dam ni rdo rje slob dpon gyi spyan
NK055(ri)001:10288: sngar bka' 'di nyid las byung ba'i bsrung bya rnams
NK055(ri)001:10289: gzhung bzhin khas blangs nas bsrung thub na 'khor ba
NK055(ri)001:10290: rgyu 'bras mi gnas pas tshig pa dang 'dra bas
NK055(ri)001:10291: tshig pa dang / bsrung ma thub na mtho ris dang thar pa gtan brlagsa nas tshig pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:10292: chen po ni bdun te theg pa 'di nyid la
NK055(ri)001:10293: rgyu 'bras dus gcig la rdzogs pas che ba dang
NK055(ri)001:10294: / dam tshig ma nyams lta ba dang ldan pas
NK055(ri)001:10295: ci spyod kyang 'du shes bral bas las dang bag
NK055(ri)001:10296: chags su mi 'gyur bas che ba dang /
NK055(ri)001:10297: 'og ma bzhin rgyu bsgrub pas 'bras bu yun ring po zhig na snang ba ma yin te/
NK055(ri)001:10298: lta spyod bsgom gsum 'dzom pa'i rnal 'byor pas bsgrubs
NK055(ri)001:10299: pa'i ngo bo mthar phyin pa nyid 'bras bu yin
NK055(ri)001:10300: pas na bsgrub pa chen po dang /
NK055(ri)001:10301: 'bras bu rang byung gi ye shes yul lam rgyud dang bral te/
NK055(ri)001:10302: rang snang du lhun gyis grub pa chen po dang /
NK055(ri)001:10303: 'gro ba'i don la ched dmigs can ma yin pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:10304: dmigs pa thams cad dang bral ba'i ngo bo nyid lhun gyis grub pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:10305: khams gsum ma lus pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
NK055(ri)001:10306: sangs rgyas su gsal ba grub pa chen po dang
NK055(ri)001:10307: / khams gsum gyi chos nyid 'phags pa'i nor bdun
NK055(ri)001:10308: du lhun gyis grub pa nyid yon tan chen po
NK055(ri)001:10309: / dang / 'khor ba rgyu 'bras rnams rang byung
NK055(ri)001:10310: ye shes su gsal bas spang bya thabs su song
NK055(ri)001:10311: bas thabs chen po de bdun dang ldan pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:10312: yang na chen po bdun ni/
NK055(ri)001:10314: dam tshig dang ldan pa'i rten gyi gang zag de 'jig rten pa'i gtso bos bkur te/
NK055(ri)001:10315: tshangs pa dang brgya byin la sogs pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:10316: 'khor gyis bkur te lha ma srin sde brgyad kyis spyi gtsug tu len to //
NK055(ri)001:10317: dam pa mchog bud+d+hasa sras dam par 'dzin to //
NK055(ri)001:10318: dam pa lam la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
NK055(ri)001:10319: rnams kyis sras dang dam par dgongs nas nyin lan
NK055(ri)001:10320: gsum mtshan lan gsum du byin gyis brlab pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:10321: bder gshegs nyid kyi yul la bzhugs //
NK055(ri)001:10322: zhes pas dam tshig dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas dam tshig la gnas pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:10323: bder gshegs nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yin te/
NK055(ri)001:10324: sku'i dam tshig rdzogs pa mthar phyin pa bde bar gshegs pa'i sku'i ngo bo nyid/
NK055(ri)001:10325: gsung gi dam tshig rnams bder gshegs kyi gsung gi ngo bo nyid/
NK055(ri)001:10326: thugs kyi dam tshig rnams thugs kyi ngo bo nyid/
NK055(ri)001:10327: yan lag gi dam tshig rnams bder gshegs kyi spyod
NK055(ri)001:10328: pa'i ngo bo nyid pas dam tshig rnams bder gshegs
NK055(ri)001:10329: dngos yin pa la rnal 'byor pa bzhugs pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:10330: 'jigs med kun tu bzang por sbyor //
NK055(ri)001:10331: zhes pa dam tshig mngon du gyur pa'i rnal 'byor pa la/
NK055(ri)001:10332: khams gsum gyi 'jigs pa dang bral zhing mthar kun
NK055(ri)001:10333: tu bzang por 'gyur bas ngo bo nyid las mi
NK055(ri)001:10334: 'da' ba'o // des na che ba bdun de dang ldan no //
NK055(ri)001:10336: zhes pa dam tshig gi le'u 'di go phye ba'i
NK055(ri)001:10337: rnal 'byor pa'i ched du le'u 'di brjod do zhes
NK055(ri)001:10338: bya'o // dam tshig gi che ba'i mdo ni/
NK055(ri)001:10339: bla med theg pa rab nges na //
NK055(ri)001:10341: tshig 'di dam tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams kyang tshigs bcad 'di las 'phros/
NK055(ri)001:10342: de bas na dam tshig tshul khrims sdom pa thams cad kyi rgyu'am rtsa ba lta bu yin te/
NK055(ri)001:10343: de yang bla na med pa ni theg pa 'di nyid de lam bla na med pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:10344: 'bras bu bla na med pa gnyis/
NK055(ri)001:10345: de la lam bla na med pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:10346: 'di nyid ma gtogs pa'i theg pa rnams kyis khams gsum gyi chos 'di spang byar byas te/
NK055(ri)001:10347: 'di'i gnyen po gcig logs su blangs nas de nyid lam gyi ngo bo yin par 'dod la/
NK055(ri)001:10348: 'dir ni khams gsum gyi chos thams cad dag mnyam
NK055(ri)001:10349: gyi ngo bo nyid yin pas spang bar bya ba'i
NK055(ri)001:10351: rtogs pa bzhi'i gtan tshigs kyis rtog pa bzhi bcu
NK055(ri)001:10352: rtsa gnyis sku dang ye shes su gtan la phabs
NK055(ri)001:10353: nas goms pa mthar phyin pa ni 'bras bu'i ngo
NK055(ri)001:10354: bo nyid yin pas/ des na spang bar bya ba'i
NK055(ri)001:10355: chos ma dmigs te khams gsum rang sar dag pa
NK055(ri)001:10356: bo nyid yin pas/ la/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bud+d+ha zhes brjod pas/
NK055(ri)001:10357: 'bras bu'i theg pa zhes bya ba dang /
NK055(ri)001:10358: rdo rje'i theg pa zhes bya ba'i rgyu mtshan gyis
NK055(ri)001:10359: khams gsum nyid lam gyi ngo bo theg par lhun
NK055(ri)001:10360: gyis grub pa ni lam bla na med pa zhes
NK055(ri)001:10361: bya'o // 'bras bu bla na med pa ni khams
NK055(ri)001:10362: gsum nyid yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bud+d+hara gyur te
NK055(ri)001:10364: bud+d+ha'am 'bras bu zhes bya ba yang gdags gzhi dang bral ba la/
NK055(ri)001:10365: ngo bo khams gsum yi ge 'khor lo tshogs chen
NK055(ri)001:10366: gyi sar gsal bas 'khrul pa phra ba tsam yang
NK055(ri)001:10367: ma dmigs pa nyid mthas ma gos par rgyan gyi
NK055(ri)001:10368: 'khor lo nyi shu rtsa lnga lhun gyis grub pas/
NK055(ri)001:10369: ma rtogs pa khams gsum gyi sems can la thabs
NK055(ri)001:10370: kyi mdzad pa sna tshogs rgyud dang bral ba rang
NK055(ri)001:10371: snang du shar bas 'gro don rgyun mi chad pa'i
NK055(ri)001:10374: zhes pa theg pa 'di nyid kyi gzhung gis dam
NK055(ri)001:10375: tshig nyams su lon te chu dang gsher ba ltar
NK055(ri)001:10376: mi phyed pa ngo bo ni nyams su lon pa'o
NK055(ri)001:10377: // de yang lta spyod bsgom gsum du 'dus te lta ba'i dam tshig bla na med pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:10378: dag pa gsum dang mnyam pa rnam pa bzhi'i don gdengs chud mngon du gyur pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:10379: spyod pa'i dam tshig bla na med pa mngon du
NK055(ri)001:10380: gyur pa'i dus su rang rig rang snang las ma
NK055(ri)001:10381: gtogs pa ched byas phra ba yang ma dmigs pa
NK055(ri)001:10382: rang snang gi spyod par lhun gyis grub pa dang
NK055(ri)001:10383: / bsgom pa'i dam tshig rigs lnga ye shes lnga
NK055(ri)001:10384: la sogs pa mngon du gyur pa g.yo thob brtan
NK055(ri)001:10386: phyi nang gi chos thams cad ye shes rang snang ma gtogs pa/
NK055(ri)001:10387: nyon mongs 'khor ba ngang gis med //
NK055(ri)001:10388: ces pa spyod yul yongs su dag pa'i rnal 'byor pa la la bzla ba'i tshig tu/
NK055(ri)001:10389: nyon mongs las rnams kun spyad kyang //
NK055(ri)001:10390: zhes pa nyon mongs pa ni lnga'o //
NK055(ri)001:10392: mdor na khams gsum pa'i spyod yul rnams kun spyad na/
NK055(ri)001:10393: kyang gi sgras bag chags sogs par mi 'gyur ba bstan te/
NK055(ri)001:10396: nyan thos la sogs pa 'og ma rnams kyis ni/
NK055(ri)001:10397: ma byas shing bsdams pas bag chags mi sogs la/
NK055(ri)001:10398: 'di nyid kyi sgor zhugs pa'i rnal 'byor pas ni/
NK055(ri)001:10399: dam tshig gi nges pa gong du bshad pa ltar
NK055(ri)001:10400: mngon du gyur pas las rnams ched du byas pa
NK055(ri)001:10401: ni/ bdag 'dzin gyis bsgribs pa yin pas der sogs te 'khor bar 'gyur la/
NK055(ri)001:10402: 'dir ni bdag 'dzin gtan nas dag pas nam mkha'
NK055(ri)001:10403: la rdul mi chags pa dang 'dra bas skyon du
NK055(ri)001:10404: mi 'gyur la/ slar tshogs gnyis su 'gyur te/
NK055(ri)001:10406: mi 'dzin pa ye shes tshogs su 'gyur ro //
NK055(ri)001:10407: des na mdo sde las kyang /
NK055(ri)001:10408: byas la mi sogs pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:10409: ma byas la sogs pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:10410: byas la mi sogs pa ni gnyen po lnga brten pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:10411: ma byas la sogs pa ni gnyen po lnga dang bral ba'i so so'i skye bo'o //
NK055(ri)001:10412: rtogs pa gdengs dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pa byas
NK055(ri)001:10413: la mi sogs par ma bas gsang sngags kyi dam
NK055(ri)001:10414: tshig ma nyams pa'i thog tu so sor thar pa'i
NK055(ri)001:10415: tshul khrims dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa'ang rdzogs te/
NK055(ri)001:10417: theg pa gnyis po'i sdom pa rnams kyi rtsa ba
NK055(ri)001:10418: srog mi gcod pa la sogs pa bzhi 'di nyid
NK055(ri)001:10419: kyis 'chad par 'gyur pa'i rtsa ba bzhi'i skabs su
NK055(ri)001:10420: rdzogs la/ yan lag thams cad ni gsum du 'dus te/
NK055(ri)001:10421: theg pa 'di nyid kyi dam tshig gong du bshad pa bzhin du nges pa'i dus na/
NK055(ri)001:10422: lhag pa tshul khrims lhag pa shes rab lhag pa ting nge 'dzin gsum du 'dus pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:10424: ma lus kun 'dus rnam par dag /ces pas 'di
NK055(ri)001:10425: nyid kyi rtsa ba bzhi'i nang du kun 'dus pas
NK055(ri)001:10426: thams cad dag par bstan te/
NK055(ri)001:10427: rten gyi gang zag de la tshul khrims sdom pa
NK055(ri)001:10428: thams cad so sor ngo skal byas nas bsrung ba
NK055(ri)001:10429: ma dmigs kyang bdag 'dzin bral ba'i mnyam pa nyid
NK055(ri)001:10430: kyi ngang la nyes pa phra ba yang mi 'byung
NK055(ri)001:10432: de'i mtshan nyid la ngo bos rdzogs pa/
NK055(ri)001:10434: 'bras bu'i ngos nas rdzogs par bshad kyang /
NK055(ri)001:10437: bla med mchog gi dam tshig tu //
NK055(ri)001:10438: zhes pa bla med ni theg pa thams cad kyi mthar thug pa 'di nyid do //
NK055(ri)001:10439: mchog ni gong gi lta bsgom dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas/
NK055(ri)001:10440: khams gsum nyid yi ge'i 'khor lo'i sar gsal ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:10441: dam tshig ni gong du bshad pa nyid do //
NK055(ri)001:10442: de'i ngang du rgyu'i theg pa'i sdom pa dang tshul khrims 'dus par bstan te/
NK055(ri)001:10443: 'dul ba'i dbang gis tshul khrims dang //
NK055(ri)001:10444: zhes pa sbyangs stobs chung zhing shes rab zhan pas
NK055(ri)001:10445: nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gdul byar gyur pa 'dul
NK055(ri)001:10446: ba'i ngor/ de'i blo tshod kyi dbang gis byis pa
NK055(ri)001:10447: chung ngu brid pa dang 'dra ba'i tshul shin tu
NK055(ri)001:10449: dge bsnyen gyi gtan tshigs lnga yan chad/
NK055(ri)001:10450: dge slong gi brgya phrag phyed gsum man chad rnams ni 'og ma'i ngo bo yin la/
NK055(ri)001:10451: 'dir ni dam tshig chen po 'di nyid la gnas
NK055(ri)001:10452: pa'i dus na gong du bshad pa ltar dam tshig
NK055(ri)001:10453: mngon du gyur pas las dang nyon mongs pa ril
NK055(ri)001:10454: la spyad kyang / bdag 'dzin mi mnga' bas ched 'dzin dang bral te/
NK055(ri)001:10455: bya nam mkha' la 'phur ba la lam la 'dzin pa med pa bzhin/
NK055(ri)001:10456: 'dzin pa dang bral bas cir yang byas pa med pa ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims rdzogs te/
NK055(ri)001:10457: ngo bos nyes pa med pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:10458: sdom pa nyams pa ni bdag 'dzin gyi nyams pa'i
NK055(ri)001:10459: rgyu med pa la 'bras bu mi snang ba bzhin
NK055(ri)001:10460: no // ji snyed sdom pa bsam yas pa //
NK055(ri)001:10461: zhes pa byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa ni shas
NK055(ri)001:10462: che bar gzhan don gyi gzhi bzung ba'i rnam grangs
NK055(ri)001:10463: ji snyed pa brjod pa'i sdom pa'i grangs dang ngo
NK055(ri)001:10464: bo bsam yas pa'i gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'i dbang
NK055(ri)001:10465: du gnyis la sogs pa gzhan don du 'gyur na/
NK055(ri)001:10466: srog gcod pa la sogs pa gang yang mi 'dor
NK055(ri)001:10467: ba ni sems can gyi don byed pa'i tshul khrims
NK055(ri)001:10468: so // gnas skabs ting nge 'dzin gyi 'phro 'du bsam yas pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:10469: sgo gsum lta bsgom dbyer med pa lha'i sku rig
NK055(ri)001:10470: par gsal ba'i phyag rgya chen po'i ngang las 'da'
NK055(ri)001:10471: ba med pa ni spyod lam bzhir lam gyi ngo
NK055(ri)001:10472: bo nyid las skad cig kyang ma yengs pa ni
NK055(ri)001:10473: dge ba chos sdud pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:10475: zhes pa theg pa che chung gi bsrung bya ma
NK055(ri)001:10476: lus pa rnams kun dam tshig 'dir 'dus pa gong
NK055(ri)001:10477: du bshad pa'i don gyis 'di nyid la skyon gtan
NK055(ri)001:10478: nas ma grub pas rnam dag gi ngo bo nyid
NK055(ri)001:10480: srog gcod pa la de nyid spong ba yang rdzogs pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:10481: yod med dbu ma'ang mi dmigs shing //
NK055(ri)001:10483: 'di dag tshul khrims dang sdom pa'i rtsa ba bzhi 'di nyid du 'dus par bstan to //
NK055(ri)001:10484: 'di dag ma 'gag pa tsam snang ba ni/
NK055(ri)001:10485: dam tshig gi spyod pa lta bur yang 'gyur te/
NK055(ri)001:10486: theg pa 'og ma'i yod med dbu ma'ang mi dmigs pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:10487: chos can snod bcud kyi chos thams cad rags par snang ba ni yod pa kun rdzob/
NK055(ri)001:10488: de rdul phra rab tu gzhig /rdul phra rab phyogs
NK055(ri)001:10489: cha drug gis gzhig na ma grub pa'i stong pa
NK055(ri)001:10490: ni don dam pa/ de nyid blo'i yul du byas
NK055(ri)001:10491: nas yod med la sogs pa'i spros pa thams cad
NK055(ri)001:10492: dang bral ba ni yod pa'i dngos por ma grub/
NK055(ri)001:10493: med pa phyogs gcig pa phyang chad pa blo'i yul du byas pa med pa'i dngos por ma grub/
NK055(ri)001:10494: mtha' gnyis dang bral bas dbu ma yang ma dmigs pa la ni mtha' dbus dang bral zhes brjod la/
NK055(ri)001:10495: 'dir gsang sngags kyi mtha' dbus mi dmigs pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:10496: chos thams cad sems kyi chos nyid du gsal ba
NK055(ri)001:10497: la rig pa rang snang ba'i dbang gis dngos po
NK055(ri)001:10498: thams cad snang stong gi 'du shes ril dang bral
NK055(ri)001:10499: te snang ba tsam nyid na mnyam pa nyid du
NK055(ri)001:10500: gsal bas snang stong gi 'du shes dang bral ba'o
NK055(ri)001:10501: // rtsa ba rang rig pa'ang mtshan nyid bzhin don
NK055(ri)001:10502: dam spros bral phyogs gcig tu blo'i yul du bya
NK055(ri)001:10503: // ba med de/ sems rang rig pa ngo bo
NK055(ri)001:10504: gang du yang ma grub pa nyid dngos po thams
NK055(ri)001:10505: cad dang bral te rang gsal ba'i bdag nyid la
NK055(ri)001:10506: phyogs 'dzin thams cad dang bral yang gsal bya gsal
NK055(ri)001:10507: byed yul du bya ba thams cad dang bral ba
NK055(ri)001:10508: yod med dbus gsum las 'das te/
NK055(ri)001:10509: phyogs 'dzin gyi chos rnam par dag pa nyid ni
NK055(ri)001:10510: chos thams cad don dam par mnyam pa kho na'o
NK055(ri)001:10512: don dam du ni dkor bdun no //
NK055(ri)001:10513: zhes pa mtshan nyid bzhin don dam blo'i yul du
NK055(ri)001:10514: bya ba dang bral ba zhig ched du dmigs pa
NK055(ri)001:10516: rig pa rang byung gi ye shes ye shes lnga/
NK055(ri)001:10517: dbyings ye shes gnyis dang bdun rdzogs pas so //
NK055(ri)001:10518: kun rdzob kyi mnyam pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:10519: sgyu ma mig yor lta bu'i tshul //
NK055(ri)001:10521: sgyu ma ni sgyu ma'i rgyu rkyen 'dus pa las
NK055(ri)001:10522: sgyu ma'i tshogs snang ba yang sgyu ma mkhan po
NK055(ri)001:10523: la dngos su ma grub pa ltar/
NK055(ri)001:10524: kun rdzob log rtog gi rgyu rkyen 'dus pa tsam
NK055(ri)001:10525: nyid rang rgyud du ltad mo ba bzhin yod par
NK055(ri)001:10526: mthong ba ni/ brtags pa tsam du mnyam pas brtags pa las snang ba de dag /mig yor/
NK055(ri)001:10527: zhes pas tho yor la mi lta bur shes pa ni kun rdzob tu mnyam pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:10528: de ltar mnyam pa gnyis de tha snyad yid yul
NK055(ri)001:10529: kha bshad tsam ma yin par rig pa la gdengs
NK055(ri)001:10530: chud pa'i dus su/ srog sems nyid du dag ste
NK055(ri)001:10531: sgyu ma mig yor bzhin du gsal bas de la
NK055(ri)001:10532: gcad bya gcod byed med pa'i don gyis gcad du
NK055(ri)001:10533: yang med de sems nyid mnyam pa nyid kyi ngang
NK055(ri)001:10534: chud pa'i dus su/ la ma dmigs/ gcad bya gcod
NK055(ri)001:10535: byed kyi dngos po gsum du yang grub pa med
NK055(ri)001:10536: chud pa'i dus su/ la ma dmigs/ do // dgongs
NK055(ri)001:10537: pa'i don nyams su ma lon kha bshad tshig gi
NK055(ri)001:10538: tha snyad la zhen nas bdag 'dzin kha yang ma
NK055(ri)001:10539: bri bar gzung 'dzin gyis gnag pa'i las spyad pa
NK055(ri)001:10540: chud pa'i dus su/ la ma dmigs/ do // ni/ sman ma zhu ba nyid dug tu che/
NK055(ri)001:10541: ngan song gsum las mi thar ro //
NK055(ri)001:10542: 'on kyang dad mos byas pa'i 'brel pa'i stobs kyis nam zhig na 'phrad pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:10544: srog dang skyes bu log rtog tsam //
NK055(ri)001:10545: zhes pa dgongs pa mnyam pa nyid kyi don rig pa mngon du gyur pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:10546: gcod bya'i srog dang gcod byed kyi skyes bu sems
NK055(ri)001:10547: mnyam pa nyid kyi ngang la ka nas dag pa'i
NK055(ri)001:10548: phyir/ log rtog tsam las ma dmigs pas la bzla
NK055(ri)001:10549: ba'i dbang du bcad kyang der 'dzin zhing dmigs pa'i
NK055(ri)001:10550: 'du shes dag pas gcad pa med pa nyid ni/
NK055(ri)001:10551: srog gi sdom pa 'dus la dag pa'i phyir/
NK055(ri)001:10552: srog med srog kyang gcad du med //
NK055(ri)001:10553: ces gong du bstan pa nyid do //
NK055(ri)001:10554: ma byin par len pa bstan pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:10555: bden pa gnyis ka dbyer med pas //
NK055(ri)001:10557: bden pa gnyis ni kun rdzob dang don dam pa gnyis te/
NK055(ri)001:10558: 'khor 'das yul sems bdag gzhan thams cad gong du
NK055(ri)001:10559: bstan pa ltar don dam par rig pa byang chub
NK055(ri)001:10560: sems su gsal ba la snang stong gi 'du shes
NK055(ri)001:10561: ma dmigs pa nyid don dam par dbyer med pa'o
NK055(ri)001:10562: // kun rdzob tu dbyer med pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:10563: log rtog can gyi ngo la rgyu rkyen 'dus pa'i dngos por snang tsam nyid na/
NK055(ri)001:10564: sgyu ma'i mkhan pos sgyu ma mthong ba bzhin ma grub ste/
NK055(ri)001:10565: mig yor bzhin du gsal ba ni kun rdzob sgyu ma tsam du mnyam pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:10566: de gnyis kyang bden pa gsum pa'i don gyis rang
NK055(ri)001:10567: rig pa'i ngo bor lhun gyis grub pa ni dbyer
NK055(ri)001:10569: 'dir rnal 'byor pa'i nyams len yin pas yin tshul
NK055(ri)001:10570: bshad pa la blo rten 'cha' ba ni lam pa'i
NK055(ri)001:10571: dmu gab chen po yin pas rig pa la gdeng
NK055(ri)001:10572: du son dgos/ 'on kyang don spyi yid kyi yul
NK055(ri)001:10573: du byed pa'ang las dang po pa rnams kyis 'jug
NK055(ri)001:10574: pa'i sgo thos pa'i shes rab kyi yul lo //
NK055(ri)001:10576: pas/ bya ba gtan tshigs te rtogs pa de lta bu
NK055(ri)001:10577: dang ldan pa la 'khor 'das dbyer med snang sems
NK055(ri)001:10578: dbyer med bdag gzhan dbyer med thams cad rig pa'i
NK055(ri)001:10579: dkyil 'khor du lhun gyis grub pa'i rnal 'byor pa
NK055(ri)001:10580: la bdag gzhan la sogs pa'i 'du shes ma spangs
NK055(ri)001:10582: don de lta bu la dngos po thams cad/
NK055(ri)001:10583: 'phrul dag'i tshul te tha dad med //
NK055(ri)001:10584: ces pa 'phrul dag'i lha rnams kyis longs spyod kyi
NK055(ri)001:10585: dngos po thams cad rang gis sprul nas rang gis
NK055(ri)001:10587: zhes pas de'i tshul dang mthun par rnal 'byor pa lta sgom stobs su gyur pas/
NK055(ri)001:10588: snod bcud kyi dngos po thams cad rang sems snang
NK055(ri)001:10589: bas de la yul dang yul can med de bdag
NK055(ri)001:10590: nyid chen po zhes kyang brjod do //
NK055(ri)001:10593: ces pas dper na gzhan gyi yo byad cig blangs kyang /
NK055(ri)001:10594: len mkhan rang nyid kyang sems snang /
NK055(ri)001:10595: yul nor gyi bdag po'ang sems snang /
NK055(ri)001:10597: blangs pa'ang sems snang bas 'du shes kyis ched du
NK055(ri)001:10598: 'dzin pa phra ba yang med pa ni tha dad
NK055(ri)001:10599: med ces bya ste/ de'i ngang la nor gyi bdag po gzhan pa ma grub/
NK055(ri)001:10600: blangs pa'i ched 'dzin yang med pas thams cad bdag
NK055(ri)001:10601: nyid chen por lhun gyis grub pa'i ngang la ma
NK055(ri)001:10602: byin blangs kyang len bya len byed med pa'i phyir
NK055(ri)001:10603: ched du blangs pa med de/
NK055(ri)001:10605: chos thams cad sems nyid kyi dbyings su lhun gyis grub pa ni nyid kyi dbyings zhes bya ste/
NK055(ri)001:10606: des na ci blangs kyang len bya len byed med par dbyings kyi ngo bor lhun gyis grub pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:10607: 'og ma'i ma byin par len pa 'dus la skyon
NK055(ri)001:10608: gyis ma gos pas dag pa'i ngo bo nyid do
NK055(ri)001:10610: chos rnams sgyu ma lta bu dang //
NK055(ri)001:10612: phyi snod kyi 'jig rten dang nang bcud kyi sems
NK055(ri)001:10613: can gyi byed mkhan med par rang gi mtshan nyid
NK055(ri)001:10614: 'dzin pa'i chos rnams ni rnam grangs mi 'gag pa
NK055(ri)001:10615: rnams te/ dpe sgyu ma ni rdzas kyi dngos po
NK055(ri)001:10616: dang rdel dang sngags dang mkhan po'i lag gi rtsol
NK055(ri)001:10617: rnams te/ ba las/ sgyu ma'i tshogs rta dang glang
NK055(ri)001:10618: po dang tshogs su snang nas bden pa rtag par
NK055(ri)001:10619: rnams te/ ba las/ bzung yang / sgyu ma mkhan
NK055(ri)001:10620: pos lo rgyus shes pas dngos por grub pa med
NK055(ri)001:10621: rnams te/ ba las/ bzung yang / pa bzhin/ phyi
NK055(ri)001:10622: nang gi chos thams cad rgyu lhan cig skyes pa'i
NK055(ri)001:10623: rnams te/ ba las/ bzung yang / pa bzhin/ ma rig pa/ rkyen las dang nyon mongs pas/
NK055(ri)001:10624: 'khrul ngo la dngos po ltar snang yang sems nyid
NK055(ri)001:10625: rang rig pa'i ngang la grub pa med de snang
NK055(ri)001:10626: stong gang gi yang dngos gzhi ma dmigs pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:10627: ngo bo nyid kyis gzhi nas ma grub pas snang tsam nyid na rdzun pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:10628: 'o na snod bcud yul sems bzang ngan la sogs
NK055(ri)001:10629: pa ming dang tshig tu btags nas bstan pa 'di
NK055(ri)001:10630: dag ji ltar yin/ ming dang tshig tu btags pas rdzun //
NK055(ri)001:10631: zhes pa ming ma grub pa la ming du btags pa nyid kyis rdzun te/
NK055(ri)001:10632: thun mong gi theg pa'i dbang du byas na/
NK055(ri)001:10633: ka ba lta bu'i chos can gcig la ka ba
NK055(ri)001:10634: zhes pa'i ming gi tha snyad de ka ba'i nang
NK055(ri)001:10637: bar na yang mi rnyed pas ka ba'i gdags gzhi ma grub/
NK055(ri)001:10638: chos can thams cad la des 'gre ste/
NK055(ri)001:10639: ming dang tha snyad rdzun pa'i gtan tshigs so //
NK055(ri)001:10640: gsang sngags 'di nyid kyi gzhung gis ka ba snang ba nyid/
NK055(ri)001:10641: rig pa rang snang bas ka ba nyid snang tsam
NK055(ri)001:10642: na rig pa chos kyi mtha' dang bral ba'i bdag
NK055(ri)001:10644: snang 'dzin stong 'dzin gang yang ma dmigs yul dang yul can rig par lhun gyis grub pas/
NK055(ri)001:10645: mnyam pa nyid kyi ngang la ka ba'i ming gi
NK055(ri)001:10646: tha snyad kyi de nyid du dag pas chos can
NK055(ri)001:10648: des mtshon pa'i tshig gi tha snyad thams cad sgra
NK055(ri)001:10649: tsam btags pa tsam las ma gtogs pa ngo bo
NK055(ri)001:10650: la grub pa med pas rdzun zhes bya ste/
NK055(ri)001:10651: btags pa tsam brag ca dang mtshungs so //
NK055(ri)001:10653: rdzun nyid la ni rdzun spyod phyir //
NK055(ri)001:10655: kun brtags kyi yul gyi phyi nang gi chos thams
NK055(ri)001:10656: cad kun rdzob snang tsam nyid na rang bzhin ma
NK055(ri)001:10657: shes pas sgyu ma la bden par 'dzin pa lta
NK055(ri)001:10660: rdzun spyod phyir zhes pa yul can 'gro ba'ang rdzun te/
NK055(ri)001:10661: dbang po dang rnam shes kyi 'dzin byed kyi shes pa ji ltar snang yang /
NK055(ri)001:10662: sems nyid kyi ngang las de dag ma grub bzhin
NK055(ri)001:10663: du 'khrul pa'i shes pas rdzun spyod bdo bas rdzun
NK055(ri)001:10664: kho na las ma gtogs pa bden pa ma dmigs
NK055(ri)001:10665: te/ bden pa chen po'i ngo bo ni sems nyid
NK055(ri)001:10666: snang stong gi mtha' dang bral ba yin pa la
NK055(ri)001:10667: ma shes pa'i skyon gyis so //
NK055(ri)001:10668: des na chos thams cad rdzun du lhun gyis grub
NK055(ri)001:10669: pas de'i nang du rtsa ba bzhi'i ngo rdzun zhes
NK055(ri)001:10670: bya ba ni logs su btags pa tsam yang yod
NK055(ri)001:10671: pa ma yin/ de lta bu'i don rtogs pa'i rnal
NK055(ri)001:10672: 'byor pas dper na mi chos bla ma'i rdzun smras
NK055(ri)001:10673: kyang 'du shes dang bral bas mi gos/
NK055(ri)001:10674: gos pa med pas rdzun du smra ba'i sdom pa rdzogs pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:10675: mi tshangs par spyod pa bstan pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:10676: ma chags pa la chags pa dang //
NK055(ri)001:10677: zhes pa ma chags pa ni chos thams cad kyi
NK055(ri)001:10678: de kho na nyid chos kyi dbyings la rang snang
NK055(ri)001:10679: gi chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid yin kyang
NK055(ri)001:10680: 'khor ba'i tha snyad kyi 'dzin pa'ang ma dmigs/
NK055(ri)001:10681: mya ngan las 'das pa'ang ma dmigs mtha' dang bral ba la ni ma chags pa zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:10683: chags pa dang zhes pa rig pas chos de nyid
NK055(ri)001:10684: kyi gting phol te mngon du byas nas yul sems
NK055(ri)001:10685: dbyer med pa'i dus su dngos po thams cad de
NK055(ri)001:10686: nyid du lhun gyis grub pas dgongs pa de nyid
NK055(ri)001:10687: rang gsal ba lhun gyis grub pa ma chags pa'i
NK055(ri)001:10689: chags pa nyid na'ang chags pa med //
NK055(ri)001:10690: ces pa don de lta bu ma rtogs pas pho
NK055(ri)001:10691: mo gnyis su zhen pa ni log pa'i 'dod chags
NK055(ri)001:10692: te/ 'dir gong ma'i lta ba gting phol bas spyod pa'i ngos nas gnyis zhen pa ltar snang yang /
NK055(ri)001:10693: sems kyi ye shes su gsal bas gnyis su 'dzin pa med pa'i lta ba dang /
NK055(ri)001:10694: spyod pa'i ngos nas gsang sngags kyi thabs kyis zin
NK055(ri)001:10695: pa'i myong ba'i ro de nyid lhan cig skyes pa'i
NK055(ri)001:10696: ye shes su gsal bas gol sa med pa'i phyir/
NK055(ri)001:10697: chags pa nyid na chags pa med //
NK055(ri)001:10699: de ni tshangs mchog rgyal po ste //
NK055(ri)001:10700: zhes pa gong du lta spyod bsgom gsum dbyer med pa'i gol sa dag pa'i bdag nyid ni/
NK055(ri)001:10701: tshangs mchog /ces pas lam dang lam gyi gol sa dang skyon thams cad dag pas tshangs zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:10702: mchog ni mthar phyin pa 'bras bu'i ngo bo ste/
NK055(ri)001:10704: zhes pa lta spyod bsgom gsum 'dzom pa'i rnal 'byor
NK055(ri)001:10705: pas spyod pa dngos su ma 'gags pa tsam ni
NK055(ri)001:10706: mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtha' las rgyal/
NK055(ri)001:10707: dgongs pa chos thams cad kyi de kho na nyid
NK055(ri)001:10708: mngon du gyur pa ni 'khor ba'i mtha' las rgyal
NK055(ri)001:10709: te/ shin tu chags pa chen po yin //
NK055(ri)001:10711: zhes pa nam mkha' nam mkha' la mi 'gyur ba
NK055(ri)001:10712: dang 'dra bar rtogs pa mthar phyin pa'i ngo bo
NK055(ri)001:10713: ste/ des na de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid de/
NK055(ri)001:10714: chags pa chen po ni 'khor 'das yul sems snod
NK055(ri)001:10715: bcud thams cad gnyis su med pa rang byung ye
NK055(ri)001:10716: shes chen por lhun gyis grub pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:10717: de la sdom pa rnams 'dus la rdzogs pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:10719: bla med mi spang bla ma bkur //
NK055(ri)001:10721: dam tshig gi rnam grangs bstan pa'i skabs las 'dir mdor bsdus pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:10723: ces pa byang chub kyi sems te/
NK055(ri)001:10724: de la yang kun rdzob byang chub sems dang don dam byang chub sems gnyis/
NK055(ri)001:10725: don dam byang chub sems ni 'khor 'das thams cad
NK055(ri)001:10726: rig par gsal ba de nyid 'phags pa'i nor bdun
NK055(ri)001:10727: dang ldan pa'o // kun rdzob byang chub sems ni
NK055(ri)001:10728: de nyid mi 'gag par snang ba phung khams skye
NK055(ri)001:10729: mched rnams lha'i ngo bor gsal ba ste lta ba'i
NK055(ri)001:10730: ngo bo yin la 'dir bsgom pas nyams su blang
NK055(ri)001:10731: ba'i skabs su yi dam lha'i sku dkyil 'khor gyi
NK055(ri)001:10732: ngo bo snang stong gnyis su med de/
NK055(ri)001:10735: byang sems rnam gnyis gcig tu bsgom pa kho na ste/
NK055(ri)001:10737: ces pa ngo bo bla na med pa ni 'khor
NK055(ri)001:10738: 'das dbyer med kun bzang po nyid snang ba dang
NK055(ri)001:10739: / lam bla na med pa ni 'bras bu nyid
NK055(ri)001:10740: lam du byed pa'i ngo bo ste goms pa mthar
NK055(ri)001:10742: mi spang ba ni gong du bshad pa'i lta bsgom gnyis kyi don la rgyun du gnas pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:10743: bla ma ni rdo rje slob dpon te de la 'dir nye bas gsang sngags kho na bas/
NK055(ri)001:10748: man ngag dbogs pa dang lnga ste gsal bkrar bstan pa bzhin no //
NK055(ri)001:10749: bkur ba ni sgo gsum gyi sgo nas zol sgyu med par mnyes pa'i rtsal 'byung ba kho na'o //
NK055(ri)001:10751: dam tshig gi gzhung rgyas pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:10752: dgongs pa 'dus pa la sogs par shes so //
NK055(ri)001:10753: sngags dang phyag rgya rgyun mi bcad //
NK055(ri)001:10754: ces pa sngags ni gsum ste/
NK055(ri)001:10755: rgyu ma nor ba'i sngags ni ru lu 'bru brgyad lta bu'o //
NK055(ri)001:10756: bskyed pa rkyen gyi sngags h'u ha he'am so so'i ming sngags so //
NK055(ri)001:10757: bskul ba las kyi sngags ni/
NK055(ri)001:10758: da ha dang pa tsa la sogs pa'i las so //
NK055(ri)001:10760: sku phyag rgya chen po lha'i sku bsgom pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:10761: gsung chos kyi phyag rgya ni sa bon bsgom pa dang ngag gi bzlas pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:10762: thugs dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni/
NK055(ri)001:10763: thugs mtshan bsgom pa dang bca' ba dang 'chang ba rnams so //
NK055(ri)001:10764: 'phro 'du phrin las kyi phyag rgya ni/
NK055(ri)001:10765: ting nge 'dzin gyi 'phro 'du'i skabs thams cad do //
NK055(ri)001:10766: rgyu gcig pa ni sgrub pa pos/
NK055(ri)001:10767: rab chu bo rgyun gyi rnal 'byor/
NK055(ri)001:10768: 'bring thun drug /de rtsa ba'i thun bzhi/
NK055(ri)001:10769: tha ma'ang thun gcig rgyun mi chad pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:10770: yang dag lam du zhugs la byams //
NK055(ri)001:10771: zhes pa grogs kyi dam tshig ste/
NK055(ri)001:10772: sa ma ya bkod pa na grogs la bzhir bshad kyang /
NK055(ri)001:10773: 'di'i gzhung du nye bar bkol ba spyir theg pa
NK055(ri)001:10774: chen po'i nang du zhugs pa kun gyi nang du
NK055(ri)001:10775: yang bkri drang gi lam dang bral ba'i yang dag
NK055(ri)001:10776: pa'i lam ni/ bud+d+ha kun gyi dgongs pa gdul bya
NK055(ri)001:10777: dbang po yang rab kyi ngo la snang ba lta
NK055(ri)001:10778: bsgom dbyer med kyi ngos nas bskyed rdzogs gnyis kyi
NK055(ri)001:10779: don gcig car du bsgom pa rig pa dkyil 'khor
NK055(ri)001:10780: pa'i lam ni/ du snang / dkyil 'khor rig par
NK055(ri)001:10781: dbyer med pa'i don nyams su len pa ni theg
NK055(ri)001:10782: pa 'di nyid kyi nye ba'i spun te/
NK055(ri)001:10783: byams pa ni lus ngag yid gsum gyi sgo nas rdo rje slob dpon dang 'dra bar bkur ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:10784: spyir sku'i dam tshig la bla ma gtsug gi yid bzhin nor bu rin po che bzhin du bkur/
NK055(ri)001:10785: mched grogs mig gi 'bras bu bzhin du btsa'/
NK055(ri)001:10788: gsang ba don phyir smra mi bya //
NK055(ri)001:10789: zhes pa gsang ba ni bcu ste/
NK055(ri)001:10792: 'os pa dang gnyer gtad pa dang gnyis te bcu'o //
NK055(ri)001:10795: khe grags chab skyom nga mkhas dang /
NK055(ri)001:10797: 'jig rten 'di'i re 'dod gang dang gang gi don
NK055(ri)001:10798: du gsang bya'i yul rnams la smra bar mi bya
NK055(ri)001:10799: ste/ gsal bkra'i gzhung bzhin du rgyas par shes par bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:10800: 'di ni rtsa ba lnga rnams te //
NK055(ri)001:10801: zhes pa gong du bshad pa'i rtsa ba lnga po de la rtsa ba zhes bya ste/
NK055(ri)001:10802: dper na shing sdong po'i rtsa ba ma nyams na
NK055(ri)001:10803: yan lag gcig nyams kyang gnod mi nus slar sor
NK055(ri)001:10804: chud sla/ rtsa ba nyams na yan lag ma nyams
NK055(ri)001:10805: kyang skams pa dang 'dra bar lnga po de ma
NK055(ri)001:10806: nyams par yod na lam dang 'bras bu thams cad
NK055(ri)001:10808: rtsa ba la skyon zhig byung na/
NK055(ri)001:10809: yan lag tshang bar yod kyang /
NK055(ri)001:10810: des lam 'bras gang yang don mi 'byin pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:10811: rtsa ba ma nyams nas yan lag gcig nyams na sor chud sla ba dang /
NK055(ri)001:10812: rang bzhin gyis nyams pa yang srid pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:10813: yan lag rnam grangs rgyas pa rnams rtsa ba'i dam
NK055(ri)001:10814: tshig de dag la snang bas rtsa ba zhes bya'o
NK055(ri)001:10815: // bsgrub dang bsrung ba'i dam tshig mchog /ces pa
NK055(ri)001:10816: sngags dang phyag rgya gnyis ni rgyun du nyams su
NK055(ri)001:10817: blang rgyu yin pas bsgrub pa'i dam tshig ces bya'o
NK055(ri)001:10818: // // sku gnyis thugs dang gsum ni yul la
NK055(ri)001:10819: bsrung ba'i bdag nyid yin pas yul gang dang gang
NK055(ri)001:10820: 'phrad pa'i tshe bsrung ba las mi 'da' bar bya'o
NK055(ri)001:10821: // // // de dag rgyas par dam tshig gsal bkra ltar shes par bya ste/
NK055(ri)001:10823: yan lag gi dam tshig ni/
NK055(ri)001:10824: gti mug chags dang zhe sdang dang //
NK055(ri)001:10825: nga rgyal phrag dog mi spang ngo //
NK055(ri)001:10826: zhes pa 'dir gsang sngags nang pa'i dug lnga mi spang ba ste/
NK055(ri)001:10827: dngos po rang rgyud du bzhag na ni so so skye bo tha mal pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:10828: sa ma ya bkod pa las/
NK055(ri)001:10829: gti mug 'byed pa'i shes rab med pa ni dam tshig nyams pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:10830: 'dod chags yul dang yul can chags shing zhen pa ni dam tshig nyams pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:10831: zhe sdang mnar sems dgu dang ldan pa ni dam tshig nyams pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:10832: nga rgyal rang gi nyon mongs pas khengs pa ni dam tshig nyams pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:10833: phrag dog gzhan gyi yon tan la smad par 'dod pa ni dam tshig nyams pa'o zhes gsungs so //
NK055(ri)001:10834: 'o na theg pa mchog gi sgo 'dir dug lnga mi spang ba ji ltar bya zhe na/
NK055(ri)001:10836: yang dag pa'i dug lnga dang log pa'i dug lngar bstan/
NK055(ri)001:10837: de las log pa'i dug lnga nyid/
NK055(ri)001:10839: rang gi mtshan nyid dang spyi'i mtshan nyid kyi gtan
NK055(ri)001:10840: tshigs kyis gzhig pas grub mtha' rang rig pa nyid
NK055(ri)001:10841: du lhun gyis grub pas de nyid ma 'gags pa
NK055(ri)001:10842: ni sku/ ma dmigs pa ni gsung /
NK055(ri)001:10843: dbyer med pa ni thugs su lhun gyis grub pas/
NK055(ri)001:10844: mnyam pa nyid rang rig par lhun gyis grub pa'i yon tan rang snang ba dug lnga gzugs brnyan te/
NK055(ri)001:10845: rig pa nyid las gzhan par gyur pa med pa nyid du lhun gyis grub pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:10847: dug lnga rang rig rang snang phyir //
NK055(ri)001:10849: nyi ma'i dkyil na mun med ltar //
NK055(ri)001:10850: ye shes rang snang ma gtogs pa //
NK055(ri)001:10851: nyon mongs 'khor ba ngang gis med //
NK055(ri)001:10853: des na yang dag pa'i dug lnga la lta ba'i dug lnga dang spyod pa'i dug lnga'o //
NK055(ri)001:10854: de la lta ba'i gti mug ni gnyis su med
NK055(ri)001:10855: pa mnyam pa nyid kyi ngang la gnyis 'dzin gyi
NK055(ri)001:10856: tha snyad dam/ rgyu 'bras ngang gis ma grub pa ni yang dag pa'i gti mug go //
NK055(ri)001:10857: de'i ngang la phyogs 'dzin gyi chos rtsa ba nas dag pa ni zhe sdang ngo //
NK055(ri)001:10858: rig pa mnyam pa nyid kyi ngang la dbyer med pa ni 'dod chags so //
NK055(ri)001:10859: theg pa 'og ma gang gis kyang ma reg pa ni nga rgyal lo //
NK055(ri)001:10860: theg pa 'og ma'i lta ba gang dang yang ma 'dres pa ni phrag dog go //
NK055(ri)001:10862: bsgral ba'i zhing bcu gsang sngags kyi phrin las kyis tshar gcod pa ni zhe sdang /
NK055(ri)001:10863: thabs lam gyis dngos po yang dag pa'i ye shes mngon du gsal ba ni 'dod chags so //
NK055(ri)001:10864: dam rdzas kyi dngos po ci la yang rnam rtog mi skye ba ni gti mug go //
NK055(ri)001:10866: nyams pa'i rnam grangs rnams dang tshogs mi bsre ba ni phrag dog go //
NK055(ri)001:10867: ting nge 'dzin la brtan pa thob pa ni nga rgyal lo //
NK055(ri)001:10868: yang dag pa'i 'dod chags bcu mi spang ba ni lam gyi ngo bo rdzogs pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:10869: dkar rtsi dmar rtsi dri sha chen //
NK055(ri)001:10870: dag pa'i snod bcud mi dor ro //
NK055(ri)001:10871: zhes pa rdzas kyi dngos po ni shes sla'o //
NK055(ri)001:10872: dam rdzas kyi dngos po lnga la ngo bo nyid
NK055(ri)001:10873: kyis grub bzhis brgyan pa ste rang bzhin gyis grub
NK055(ri)001:10876: byin gyis brlabsa kyis grub pa bzhi dang ldan par theg pa 'di dag gi sgor zhugs te/
NK055(ri)001:10877: lam la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pas dang du blang ba ste/
NK055(ri)001:10878: de yang gtsang dme'i rtog pa sbyang ba'i phyir yang yin te/
NK055(ri)001:10879: theg pa 'di nyid kyi sgor zhugs pa'i rnal 'byor
NK055(ri)001:10880: pas spyod pa'i dngos po ni gnyis su 'dzin pa
NK055(ri)001:10881: dag par bya ba kho na yin pas/
NK055(ri)001:10882: de'i rtsa ba'ang gtsang gtsog tu 'dzin pa rtog pa
NK055(ri)001:10883: rags pas de dag cing snyoms na gnyis 'dzin thams
NK055(ri)001:10884: cad dag par 'gyur pa'i ched du blang ba dang
NK055(ri)001:10886: byang chub sems kyis tsha nad sel/
NK055(ri)001:10889: sha chen gyis grang nad sel/
NK055(ri)001:10890: dri chen gyis mdze nad sel ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:10891: thun mong gi dgos pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:10892: byang chub sems kyis brjid pa'i gzugs thob/
NK055(ri)001:10896: dri chen gyis tshe ring ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:10898: byang sems rdo rje sems dpa' dkar //
NK055(ri)001:10899: dri chen gser mdog rnam snang mdzad/
NK055(ri)001:10900: m+aam sa rin chen 'byung ldan sngo //
NK055(ri)001:10901: rak+ta snang ba mtha' yas dmar //
NK055(ri)001:10902: dri chu don yod grub pa ljang //
NK055(ri)001:10903: zhes pas de dag grub pa'i dgos pas nang pa'i rnal 'byor pas rgyun du spyad par bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:10904: yan lag bcu'i dam tshig ces bya ba ni/
NK055(ri)001:10905: rtsa ba lnga ma nyams pa las 'di dag 'byung
NK055(ri)001:10906: zhing 'bras bu bud+d+ha bsgrub pa'i grogs cher byed pas
NK055(ri)001:10907: yan lag ces bya ba dang /
NK055(ri)001:10908: rtsa ba bshad pa'i skabs su yang rgyas par bshad do //
NK055(ri)001:10909: de nas dag mnyam rtogs pas spyad //
NK055(ri)001:10910: ces pa chos thams cad ye nas dag pa gsum mnyam pa bzhi tshogs kyi skabs su bshad pa ltar/
NK055(ri)001:10911: don de las mi 'da' bar de dag rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas dngos su spyod pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:10912: rtogs par 'dod pas spyad pa gnyis te/
NK055(ri)001:10913: rtogs pa mngon du gyur pa'i rnal 'byor pas spyad
NK055(ri)001:10914: pa ni byas 'dzin med par spyod pa gzhung du
NK055(ri)001:10916: dag mnyam rtogs par 'dod pas spyad pa ni dang po ting nge 'dzin tsam la brten/
NK055(ri)001:10917: de nas rim gyis blo'i rtogs pa dang sbyar nas lta spyod mgo mnyam par bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:10918: yong nyon mongs pa lnga ni dag rtogs kyi sgo
NK055(ri)001:10919: nas rtogs par byas la bdud rtsi lnga ni spyad
NK055(ri)001:10920: pa las mi 'da' ba'i dam tshig go //
NK055(ri)001:10921: nyams pa skyon gyi sgo nas 'da' bar dka' ba bstan pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:10922: bsrung zhing sgrub pa'i dam tshig lnga //
NK055(ri)001:10923: zhes pa bsrung ba'i dam tshig ni bla ma dang grogs po thugs kyi dam tshig gsang ba bcu'o //
NK055(ri)001:10926: yi dam gyi lha'i sgom bzlas so //
NK055(ri)001:10927: nyams su blang zhing bsrung ba las mi 'da' bas dam tshig ste/
NK055(ri)001:10928: lnga ni sku'i gnyis thugs dang gsum bsgrub pa'i dam tshig gnyis so //
NK055(ri)001:10929: rtsa ba yin te rigs med 'gyur //
NK055(ri)001:10931: dper na shing sdong po chen po'i rtsa ba las yal ga thams cad skye zhing 'dus pa 'dra la/
NK055(ri)001:10932: rtsa ba nyams na yal ga dang bcas pa brlag
NK055(ri)001:10933: pa dang 'dra bar rtsa ba nyams na rdo rje
NK055(ri)001:10934: dmyal bar 'gro zhing byang chub kyi rigs gtan chad
NK055(ri)001:10935: de yun ring mo la 'gyangs pa ru dra bzhin
NK055(ri)001:10936: no // mi spang mi dor lnga gnyis ni yan lag dam tshig 'da' daka'o zhes pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:10937: mi spang ba ni dug lnga/
NK055(ri)001:10938: mi dor ba ni bdud rtsi lnga/
NK055(ri)001:10939: lnga tsho gnyis po ni nyams su blang ba'i thabs
NK055(ri)001:10940: kyi gong du bshad pa rnams dang ma ldan na
NK055(ri)001:10941: dam tshig gi yan lag yin pas 'bras bu gtan
NK055(ri)001:10942: mi thob pa la mi gnod/
NK055(ri)001:10943: byang chub las yun ring 'gyangs pas 'da' bar daka'o zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:10944: 'di la slob dpon sgeg pa'i rdo rjes/
NK055(ri)001:10945: log dug lnga nyan thos ltar spang ba ni nyan thos ltar 'gyur te/
NK055(ri)001:10946: gsang sngags su zhugs nas nyan thos ltar spyod pas
NK055(ri)001:10947: lam nor ba ste gnyis su med pa'i mnyam pa
NK055(ri)001:10948: nyid lta ba'i klong ma rtogs te lta ba las
NK055(ri)001:10949: nyams so // yang dag pa'i dug lnga spang ba ni/
NK055(ri)001:10950: lta ba spangs pas rang don mi 'grub/
NK055(ri)001:10951: spyod pa spangs pas gzhan don mi 'grub pa ste
NK055(ri)001:10952: lta spyod ya cha bas byin rlabs med par 'gyur
NK055(ri)001:10953: ro // dam rdzas lnga spang ba ni/
NK055(ri)001:10954: kri ya ltar 'gyur bas lta ba dang spyod pa
NK055(ri)001:10955: ma 'brel te 'bras bu'i theg pa 'dir mi chud
NK055(ri)001:10956: pa kho na'o // de'i phyir na 'da' bar dka' ba zhes smos so //
NK055(ri)001:10957: mnyam pa'i dam tshig skyon dang bcas pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:10958: mdor bsdu na dam tshig gcig gcig pa 'di nyid du'ang bstan pa yin te/
NK055(ri)001:10959: mnyam la mnyam par sbyor ba yi //
NK055(ri)001:10961: phyi'i 'byung ba lnga yum lngar mnyam/
NK055(ri)001:10962: nang phung po lnga rigs lngar mnyam/
NK055(ri)001:10963: bar rnam par shes tshogs brgyad ye shes lngar mnyam pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:10964: de'i bye brag zhib pa rnams ni le'u gsum par bshad zin to //
NK055(ri)001:10965: de ni chos thams cad kyi yin tshul lam gnas tshul yin la/
NK055(ri)001:10967: zhes pa rtogs tshul te yin pa'i don la lung zab mo dang /
NK055(ri)001:10968: bla ma dam pa'i man ngag gis rnal 'byor pas nyams su lon te/
NK055(ri)001:10969: rig pa de nyid du gyur nas tha snyad kyi rjes su blo 'brang ba ma yin te/
NK055(ri)001:10970: yul dang yul can med par rtogs pa gsal ba ni sbyor ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:10971: de lta bu'i don de la ni mnyam pa'i dam tshig ces bya ste/
NK055(ri)001:10972: chu gsher ba las mi 'da' ba dang 'dra bar
NK055(ri)001:10973: dus gsum gyi bud+d+ha yang de las mi 'da' bas
NK055(ri)001:10974: rtogs pa mthar phyin pa'i dam tshig yin tshul gyi
NK055(ri)001:10975: ngos nas chos thams cad kyang de las mi 'da'
NK055(ri)001:10976: bas ngo bo nyid kyi dam tshig /rnal 'byor pas
NK055(ri)001:10977: kyang de ltar rtogs nas 'da' bya 'da' byed med
NK055(ri)001:10978: pa ni lta ba'i dam tshig ste/
NK055(ri)001:10980: zhes pa de lta bu'i ngang la lta bas rtogs
NK055(ri)001:10981: te ting nge 'dzin gyis goms pa la gnas na
NK055(ri)001:10982: 'bras bu ni/ mnyam rdzogs chen po thob 'gyur bas //
NK055(ri)001:10983: zhes pas 'khor 'das mnyam pa nyid kyi dgongs pa mthar phyin nas/
NK055(ri)001:10984: chos thams cad ma 'dres la yongs su rdzogs pa
NK055(ri)001:10985: phyi nang gi chos thams cad rang snang kun tu
NK055(ri)001:10986: bzang po'i ngo bo nyid du rdzogs pas spang bya'i
NK055(ri)001:10987: chos ma dmigs pa blang bya yang ma grub ste/
