NK055(ri)001:10988: 'khor 'das dbyer med ngo bo nyid kyi sku chen po thob par 'gyur bas/
NK055(ri)001:10989: 'das na sangs rgyas ma yin no //
NK055(ri)001:10990: zhes pa mnyam pa nyid kyi dam tshig 'di nyid
NK055(ri)001:10991: las 'das na nyams pa'i skyon yin pas 'khor ba
NK055(ri)001:10992: las mi 'da' bas bud+d+ha ma yin no zhes bya'o
NK055(ri)001:10993: // 'das na bya ba de nyid las bud+d+ha logs su mi rnyed de/
NK055(ri)001:10994: de bzhin gshegs pa yang 'di'i ngo bo nyid las mi 'da' bar bzhugs pa'i phyir/
NK055(ri)001:10995: skyes bu gang zhig bdag nyid chen po las ma
NK055(ri)001:10996: gtogs pa bud+d+ha logs su mthong ba gcig thob par
NK055(ri)001:10997: 'dod pa ni 'di nyid las gol ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:10998: nyams pa dang 'grogs pa'i skyon bstan pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:10999: rtsa ba nyams pa'i phyal ba dag /ces pa skyes
NK055(ri)001:11000: bu gang zhig dbang mnos dam tshig dang ldan bsgrub
NK055(ri)001:11001: pa nyams su lon pa yang mnol ba'i rkyen gyis
NK055(ri)001:11002: rtsa ba'i dam tshig nyams te/
NK055(ri)001:11003: phyal ba ni dam tshig la ched du gnas pa'i bsam pa med pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:11004: dag ni rten gyi gang zag gsang sngags ni nyan thos dang mi 'dra bas dam tshig nyams kyang /
NK055(ri)001:11005: slar gzhung bzhin du gsol ba la brtson na/
NK055(ri)001:11006: gser dngul gyi snod zhom pa bcos pa dang 'dra bar slar nyams pa sor chud/
NK055(ri)001:11007: de'i thog tu sgrub par yang 'ong ba lta bu yin pas yon tan che ba la/
NK055(ri)001:11008: gso ba la nye bar mi brtson nas phyal bar btang na nyams pa can de dang /
NK055(ri)001:11009: dam tshig can yun thung ba'i tshad skad cig yud tsam yang 'phrad par mi byed na/
NK055(ri)001:11010: yun ring mor gtam smra ba lta ci smos/
NK055(ri)001:11011: nyams 'gyur nyes pa brjod mi lang //
NK055(ri)001:11012: zhes pa dam tshig nyams pa'i nyes pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:11013: tshe 'di dang phyi ma bsam gyis mi khyab pa sa ma ya bkod pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:11014: dam tshig gi gzhung rnams ci tsam yang bstan pa shes par bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:11016: rnal 'byor ma rung gcig gis ni //
NK055(ri)001:11020: rtel ring rngon can gyis yo ma khyu phyung /
NK055(ri)001:11021: 'o ma rul ba thigs gcig gis phu tag zangs gang ma rung par 'gyur pa la sogs pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:11022: rtsa ba nyams pa'i skyon ni/
NK055(ri)001:11023: rtsa ba'i dam tshig nyams 'gyur na //
NK055(ri)001:11025: rtsa ba ni bshad pa lnga po'i dam tshig ste/
NK055(ri)001:11026: rdo rje slob dpon la nyams nas 'gal ba'am/
NK055(ri)001:11027: grogs po la nyams te 'gal ba'am/
NK055(ri)001:11028: gsang ba'i dam tshig rnams snod min la bshad pa'i
NK055(ri)001:11029: sngags dang phyag rgya'i rgyun bcad nas phyal bar btang
NK055(ri)001:11031: yi dam phyal bar dor na/
NK055(ri)001:11032: bsgrub pa thams cad log par 'gyur //
NK055(ri)001:11033: zhes pa spyir rtsa ba'i dam tshig nyams na bsgrub pa la tshig 'bras bu med par 'gyur/
NK055(ri)001:11034: 'jig rten 'di'i bsgrub pa thams cad kyang mi 'grub ste log par 'gyur/
NK055(ri)001:11035: gzhan yang yid la mi 'dod pa thams cad 'dus te/
NK055(ri)001:11036: mdze dang 'bras dang phol mig dang lhog pa dang mi 'dod pa'i nad 'ong /
NK055(ri)001:11037: lo nyes sad ser la sogs pas khyer/
NK055(ri)001:11038: rigs rgyud chad pa la sogs te dam tshig nyams
NK055(ri)001:11039: pa'i 'bras bu yid du mi 'ong ba thams cad
NK055(ri)001:11041: bsgrub pa'i dam tshig nyams na dgra la mthu byas kyang mthu mi 'ong /
NK055(ri)001:11043: bgegs la mthu byas kyang byin rlabs mi 'ong ste slar rang la gnod par 'gyur ro //
NK055(ri)001:11044: skyon de ltar che bas bshags pa gal che ste/
NK055(ri)001:11045: slob dpon dang spun la nyams na yo byad tshogs
NK055(ri)001:11046: tshad la sogs pa phul la gang nyams pa'i gnas
NK055(ri)001:11047: su bshags te gnas su dag par bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:11048: yi dam gyi sngags rgya nyams na bsgrub pa chen
NK055(ri)001:11049: po lan gsum gyis bshags nas bsgrub pas sobs kyi
NK055(ri)001:11050: bar du gaso'o // gsang ba thugs kyi nyams na/
NK055(ri)001:11051: thugs kyi dam tshig nyams pa na lta ba dang
NK055(ri)001:11052: ting nge 'dzin gyis shes rab chen po'i ngang du
NK055(ri)001:11053: gso/ skyon che bas gso ba la 'bad par bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:11054: yan lag gi dam tshig nyams pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:11055: yan lag dam tshig nyams 'gyur na/
NK055(ri)001:11056: 'bras bu med cing ngan song ltung //
NK055(ri)001:11058: yan lag lnga tsho gnyis nyams pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:11059: yang dag dug lnga ma rtogs pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:11060: log pa'i dug lnga yul du byas nas spang ba dang /
NK055(ri)001:11061: bdud rtsi lnga lta bsgom gyis nyams su ma blangs te phyal bar bor na/
NK055(ri)001:11062: ci bsgrub pa thams cad la 'bras bu med cing
NK055(ri)001:11063: yan lag bcu'i dam tshig thun mong kha thag nye
NK055(ri)001:11064: ba yin pas nyams na de dag med pa dang
NK055(ri)001:11065: / tshe phyi ma la dmyal ba phal pa la
NK055(ri)001:11066: sogs te ngan song gsum du skye bar 'gyur ro
NK055(ri)001:11068: dam tshig rnams ni rdo rje che //
NK055(ri)001:11069: sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid yin //
NK055(ri)001:11070: zhes pa dam tshig gi rang bzhin bstan te/
NK055(ri)001:11071: rtsa ba dang yan lag gi dam tshig rnams gong
NK055(ri)001:11072: du bstan pa rnams mnyam pa nyid sems kyi chos
NK055(ri)001:11073: nyid du dbyer mi phyed pa'i phyir na rdo rje
NK055(ri)001:11074: dang / bud+d+hasa kyang 'da' bar dka' ste rang bzhin
NK055(ri)001:11075: yin pas de'i don gyis 'da' bar dka' bas na
NK055(ri)001:11076: dang / rdo rje dang / rnal 'byor pas kyang
NK055(ri)001:11077: ma 'das na bud+d+ha la sbyor bas mi 'gyur ba
NK055(ri)001:11078: dang / rdo rje dang / rdo rje dang /
NK055(ri)001:11079: yang na nyes pa che ste ngan song gsum las
NK055(ri)001:11080: thon dka' bas rdo rje dang /
NK055(ri)001:11081: chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin dang /
NK055(ri)001:11082: rnal 'byor pas nyams su blang ba'i lam dang /
NK055(ri)001:11083: dus gsum gyi bud+d+ha ma lus pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir rdo rje che zhes bya ste/
NK055(ri)001:11084: bud+d+ha kun gyi bdag nyid yin //
NK055(ri)001:11085: zhes pa dus gsum gyi bud+d+ha'i thugs rje chen po
NK055(ri)001:11086: skal ba mchog gi skyes bu'i blo la dam tshig
NK055(ri)001:11087: tu snang ste/ ma nyams na bud+d+hara sbyor bas bdag nyid yin //
NK055(ri)001:11089: dam tshig sum brgya drug cur dbye ba ni/
NK055(ri)001:11090: rtsa ba'i dam tshig lnga la ni //
NK055(ri)001:11091: zhes pa lnga ni bla med mi spang ba dang /
NK055(ri)001:11093: yang dag lam du zhugs la byams pa grogs po la bsrung ba dang /
NK055(ri)001:11094: gsung gi dam tshig sngags dang phyag rgya dang /
NK055(ri)001:11095: thugs kyi dam tshig gsang ba bcu dang lnga'o //
NK055(ri)001:11097: ni/ zhes pa dbye gzhir gzhag pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:11098: gcig la'ang gnyis dang zhes pa/
NK055(ri)001:11099: bla med mi spang zhes pa lta bu gcig la/
NK055(ri)001:11100: gnyis ni thabs dang shes rab gnyis su dbye ste/
NK055(ri)001:11101: yi dam lha'i sku gsal la ma 'gags pa thabs
NK055(ri)001:11102: snang tsam nyid na me long gi gzugs brnyan ltar
NK055(ri)001:11103: mtshan nyid thams cad dang bral ba'i chos nyid ni
NK055(ri)001:11104: ma dmigs pa shes rab bo //
NK055(ri)001:11105: dang gi sgras dbye ba gzhan yang sdud de/
NK055(ri)001:11106: thabs dang shes rab gnyis kyi thabs yi dam lha'i sku ma 'gag pa la yang /
NK055(ri)001:11107: sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las lnga dang ldan te/
NK055(ri)001:11108: sku ma 'gags par snang bas thams cad kyi rten byed pa'i ngos nas sku zhes bya la/
NK055(ri)001:11109: de nyid rigs lnga'i dbang du byas kyang sku'i rigs
NK055(ri)001:11110: rnam par snang mdzad gsal ba rang snang ba'i ngo
NK055(ri)001:11111: bo'o // de nyid la gsung rdzogs te yi dam
NK055(ri)001:11112: gyi lhar gsal ba'i ngos gzhi lam 'bras bu'i chos
NK055(ri)001:11113: thams cad mtshon zhing brda sprod par byed pa sems
NK055(ri)001:11114: nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngang las ma g.yos te
NK055(ri)001:11115: dngos po dang bral ba gsung yin la/
NK055(ri)001:11116: de nyid rigs lnga las gsung gi rigs sna tshogs snang ba mtha' yas te/
NK055(ri)001:11117: gsung mi 'gag par mtshon zhing brda sprod pa ltar
NK055(ri)001:11118: so sor rtogs pa'i ye shes mkhyen pa mi 'gag
NK055(ri)001:11119: pas gdul bya'i rgyud ma lus pa thams cad gsal
NK055(ri)001:11121: yi dam lha'i sku ma 'gag pa nyid la thugs rdzogs te/
NK055(ri)001:11122: thugs ni yi dam lha'i rang bzhin snang stong gi
NK055(ri)001:11123: mtshan ma thams cad dang bral zhing chos thams cad
NK055(ri)001:11124: la khyab kyang khyab bya khyab byed med la rkyen
NK055(ri)001:11125: cis kyang dus gsum du 'gyur ba med pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:11126: de nyid rigs lnga na thugs rdo rje sems dpa' ste/
NK055(ri)001:11127: thugs bshad pa'i ngo bo nyid dbyer med cing dus
NK055(ri)001:11128: gsum du mi 'gyur bas rdo rje la stong pa
NK055(ri)001:11129: phyogs gcig pa'i mtha' dang bral te rang gsal ba
NK055(ri)001:11130: spros mthas ma gos pa ni sems dapa'o //
NK055(ri)001:11131: yi dam thabs ma 'gags pa de nyid la yon tan rdzogs te/
NK055(ri)001:11132: yon tan gyi ngo bo ni rang snang bas gdul bya'i don du 'gyur ba ste/
NK055(ri)001:11133: yi dam gyi sku sems nyid du gsal bsgom pas rnal 'byor pa'i lam rdzogs te/
NK055(ri)001:11135: mi 'dzin pa ye shes te tshogs gnyis cig car rdzogs la/
NK055(ri)001:11136: de'i yon tan gyis rnal 'byor pas lam mtho dman
NK055(ri)001:11137: gyi bye brag gis bdag gzhan gyi don rim pa
NK055(ri)001:11138: bzhin snang ba yon tan no //
NK055(ri)001:11139: de la rigs lnga la na yon tan gyi rigs
NK055(ri)001:11140: rin chen 'byung ldan yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin
NK055(ri)001:11141: po che rtog pa med kyang dgos 'dod skong ba
NK055(ri)001:11142: zad cing mthar thug pa med pa bzhin/
NK055(ri)001:11143: bud+d+ha'i yon tan yang de dang 'dra bas rin chen 'byung ldan no //
NK055(ri)001:11144: yi dam lha'i sku ma 'gags pa la phrin las rdzogs te/
NK055(ri)001:11145: phrin las ni yi dam lha'i sku gsal ba nyid
NK055(ri)001:11146: kyis lam dang 'bras bu'i dgos pa thams cad skong
NK055(ri)001:11147: zhing / mchog dang thun mong dngos grub 'grub la/
NK055(ri)001:11148: rnal 'byor pas phrin las rnam pa bzhi'i sgo nas
NK055(ri)001:11149: bdag gzhan gyi don thams cad lhun gyis grub pa'o
NK055(ri)001:11150: // rigs lnga la don yod grub pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:11151: phrin las kyi ngo bo thams cad bdag gzhan don
NK055(ri)001:11152: lhun gyis grub pa la bya byed kyi rtsol ba
NK055(ri)001:11153: mi mnga' ste/ bdag 'dzin ma dmigs pa'i don gyis so //
NK055(ri)001:11154: sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las lnga'am/
NK055(ri)001:11155: rigs lnga ni dang gi sgras bsdus so //
NK055(ri)001:11157: zhes pa lnga po re re yang sku gsung thugs gsum dang ldan te/
NK055(ri)001:11158: bcu phrag /ces pa ni thabs kyi ngos nas lnga/
NK055(ri)001:11159: shes rab kyi ngos nas lnga dang bcu'o //
NK055(ri)001:11160: sku gsung thugs gsum la yang gcig la nye bar bzung na/
NK055(ri)001:11161: gong du bshad pa'i sku lnga la dngos po ma
NK055(ri)001:11162: 'gags par snang zhing yon tan gyi rten du gyur
NK055(ri)001:11163: pas sku/ sku snang tsam na mtshan nyid gang du
NK055(ri)001:11164: yang ma grub cing brda sprod pa'i mtshan nyid dang
NK055(ri)001:11165: pas sku/ ldan pas gsung / sku dang gsung gnyis
NK055(ri)001:11166: snang stong dbyer med pa chu dang gsher ba ltar
NK055(ri)001:11167: skad cig la rdzogs pa ni ngo bo gang du
NK055(ri)001:11168: yang ma grub dus gsum du 'gyur ba med/
NK055(ri)001:11169: gnyen po dang bral bas thugs so //
NK055(ri)001:11170: de ltar gsung la yang gsum rdzogs te/
NK055(ri)001:11171: gsung gi ngo bo tsam du ma 'gags pa gong
NK055(ri)001:11172: bzhin rtogs te mngon du gyur btub pa ni sku'o
NK055(ri)001:11173: // de tsam nyid na mtha' thams cad dang bral zhing rang gsal mi 'gag pa ni gsung ngo //
NK055(ri)001:11174: de gnyis dbyer med pa ni bshad pa bzhin thugs te gsum rdzogs so //
NK055(ri)001:11175: de bzhin du thugs dang yon tan dang phrin las la'ang shes par bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:11176: des na yi dam lha'i sku thabs ma 'gags pa gcig pu la sku gsung thugs lnga/
NK055(ri)001:11177: lnga po re re la'ang sku gsung thugs gsum gsum rdzogs pas lnga gsum bco lnga/
NK055(ri)001:11178: de'i thog tu rtsa ba'i sku ma 'gags pa dngos bsnan pa bcu drug go //
NK055(ri)001:11179: ngo bo ma dmigs pa shes rab la yang bcu drug ste/
NK055(ri)001:11180: 'o na thabs ma 'gags pa la lha yan lag rnams brtsir yod pa la/
NK055(ri)001:11181: shes rab dmigs pa med pa ji ltar brtsi zhe na/
NK055(ri)001:11182: yi dam lha'i sku yang dmigs pa med pa shes
NK055(ri)001:11183: rab kyi bdag nyid la'ang sku gsung thugs yon tan
NK055(ri)001:11185: dmigs pa med pa shes rab kyi bdag nyid/
NK055(ri)001:11189: gdul bya'i blos 'dzin pa ni sku'o //
NK055(ri)001:11190: de nyid kyang snang stong gi dngos po dang bral zhing brda sprod par byed pas gsung ngo //
NK055(ri)001:11191: shes rab nyid chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin yin pas 'gyur ba med pa ni thugs so //
NK055(ri)001:11192: mtha' bral de nyid las rang gsal ba'i bdag nyid du bzhugs pa ni yon tan no //
NK055(ri)001:11193: rang gsal cir yang 'char bas gdul bya'i dgos pa 'grub pas phrin las so //
NK055(ri)001:11194: de lnga yang sku gsung thugs gsum dang ldan te/
NK055(ri)001:11195: shes rab kyi sku nyid sngar gyi bshad pa ni don dang ldan pa ni sku'o //
NK055(ri)001:11196: ngo bo gang du yang ma grub pa ni gsung ngo //
NK055(ri)001:11197: de gnyis dbyer med pa ni thugs so //
NK055(ri)001:11198: de bzhin du gsung thugs yon tan phrin las la
NK055(ri)001:11199: yang sku gsung thugs gsum gsum dang ldan pa bshad
NK055(ri)001:11200: pa bzhin no // des dmigs bral shes rab la yang grangs bco lnga'o //
NK055(ri)001:11201: rtsa ba'i shes rab dang bcu drug go //
NK055(ri)001:11202: bcu drug gnyis bsdoms pa ni sum cu rtsa gnyis te bla med mi spang ba ldan no //
NK055(ri)001:11203: de ltar brtsis pas bla ma bkur ba la sum cu rtsa gnyis/
NK055(ri)001:11204: grogs mched la sum cu rtsa gnyis/
NK055(ri)001:11205: sngags dang phyag rgya la sum cu rtsa gnyis/
NK055(ri)001:11206: gsang ba bcu la sum cu gnyis dang de rnams
NK055(ri)001:11207: bsdoms pa las rtsa ba'i dam tshig lnga las brgya
NK055(ri)001:11208: drug cu'o // yan lag dam tshig lnga gnyis la'ang //
NK055(ri)001:11209: zhes pa lnga tsho gnyis ni/
NK055(ri)001:11211: mi dor ba bdud rtsi lnga'o //
NK055(ri)001:11213: gcig la'ang bcu phrag gnyis su dbye //
NK055(ri)001:11215: zhe sdang lta bu gcig la gnyis su dbye ste
NK055(ri)001:11216: rtsa ba dang mthun par ma 'gag pa thabs dang
NK055(ri)001:11217: / ma dmigs pa shes rab gnyis su dabye'o //
NK055(ri)001:11218: bcu phrag ni yan lag kun la gong ltar gnyis su dbye zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:11219: des na zhe sdang gi dngos po ma 'gags par snang ba ni thabs so //
NK055(ri)001:11220: ma dmigs pa ni shes rab bo //
NK055(ri)001:11221: des na yan lag bcu po la thabs bcu shes rab bcu dang nyi shu/
NK055(ri)001:11222: zhe sdang lta bu'i thabs kyi cha la sku gsung thugs gsum ste/
NK055(ri)001:11223: ma 'gags ma dmigs pa dbyer med pa gsum/
NK055(ri)001:11224: de re re la yang sku gsung thugs gsum gsum
NK055(ri)001:11225: ste rtsi thabs rtsa ba'i dam tshig gi skabs dang
NK055(ri)001:11228: shes rab la yang bcu ste brtsi ba thabs dang 'dra //
NK055(ri)001:11229: des na yan lag bcu re re la nyi shu re re/
NK055(ri)001:11230: de rnams bsdongs pas nyis bargya'o //
NK055(ri)001:11231: rtsa ba'i brgya drug cu dang sum brgya drug cu'o //
NK055(ri)001:11232: brtsi thabs 'di dag gsang sngags kyi gzhung gis sems
NK055(ri)001:11233: nyid rig pa gang du yang ma grub cir yang
NK055(ri)001:11234: 'char ba las de ltar brtsir btub kyi/
NK055(ri)001:11235: mtshan nyid kyi don dam pa'i bden pa stong pa phyogs chad la brtsir med do //
NK055(ri)001:11236: bsam gyis mi khyab par dbye ba dgos pa dang sbyar ba ni/
NK055(ri)001:11237: dam tshig 'di ni rmad po che //
NK055(ri)001:11239: theg pa chen po gsang sngags theg pa thams cad kyi gzhi rtsa 'di'i dam tshig rnams ni/
NK055(ri)001:11241: zhes pa me long g.ya' dag pa la gzugs brnyan rgyun chad med par 'char ba dang /
NK055(ri)001:11242: gzugs brnyan lta ba po bzhin 'char ba dang 'dra bar 'di nyid kyi dam tshig ni/
NK055(ri)001:11243: gdul bya'i rkyen gyis gcig tu rgya chad cing nges pa med de cir yang 'char ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:11244: des na ngo bo gang du yang ma nges cir yang 'char bas rmad che/
NK055(ri)001:11245: gdul bya'i blo ngo bzhin du 'char bas rmad che/
NK055(ri)001:11246: des gdul bya'i dgos pa thams cad 'grub pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:11247: de nyid nye bar bstan pa'i phyir gnas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu na/
NK055(ri)001:11248: bcud srid pa gsum gyi 'gro ba ji snyed pa
NK055(ri)001:11249: thams cad kyi rtog pa gdul bya'i gnyen por dam
NK055(ri)001:11252: gdul bya dbang po mtho dman gyi bye brag gi dbang gis 'dul ba'i thabs sna tshogs te/
NK055(ri)001:11253: gnyen po'i sgo nas 'dul ba ni/
NK055(ri)001:11254: lha mi'i theg pa dge ba bcus mi dge ba 'dul ba lta bu'am/
NK055(ri)001:11255: yang na nyan thos dang rang rgyal ba gnyis zhe sdang gi gnyen por byams snying rje/
NK055(ri)001:11256: gti mug gi gnyen por khams kyi dbye ba/
NK055(ri)001:11257: 'dod chags kyi gnyen por mi gtsang ba bsgom pa lta bu'o //
NK055(ri)001:11258: sbyangs pas 'dul ba ni theg pa chen po dbu ma ste/
NK055(ri)001:11259: dus gsum gcig dang du bral gyis gzhig nas don dam pa'i bden pas sbyangs pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:11260: bsgyur bas 'dul ba kri yog gnyis te dug gsum rigs gsum du bsgyur ba dang /
NK055(ri)001:11261: nyon mongs pa rigs lngas sbyang ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:11262: dag pas 'dul ba ni ma h+aa yo ga ste
NK055(ri)001:11263: nyon mongs pa ye shes lnga'i ngang du dag par
NK055(ri)001:11264: byed pa'o // yang na dag pas 'dul ba ni
NK055(ri)001:11265: kri yog ste sems kyi chos nyid don dam pa'i
NK055(ri)001:11266: bden pa spros pa rnam par dag pa nyid goms
NK055(ri)001:11267: pa'i rtsal gyis phyi nang gi chos thams cad dag
NK055(ri)001:11269: ngo shes pas 'dul ba ni nang pa gsum ste chos thams cad sems kyi mtshan nyid rang snang ba/
NK055(ri)001:11270: snang stong gi mtha' dang bral ba bdag nyid chen
NK055(ri)001:11271: po'i ngo bo nyid shes pa ni rtogs pa de
NK055(ri)001:11272: nyid du gyur pa la yul yul can med pa'o
NK055(ri)001:11273: // nang pa gsum las kyang shas che ba a ti'o //
NK055(ri)001:11274: de bas na theg pa mchog gi dam tshig gdul
NK055(ri)001:11275: bya'i blo rtog 'dul ba'i thabs mtho dman ngo bor
NK055(ri)001:11276: theg pa dgu ste/ gdul bya'i rtog pa la grangs med pas/
NK055(ri)001:11277: dam tshig sa ma ya 'bum sde zhes tha snyad du brjod do //
NK055(ri)001:11278: des na dam tshig ni gdul bya'i dbang gis gcig tu chad pa med pas grangs las 'das so //
NK055(ri)001:11279: dam tshig bsrungs pa'i 'bras bu mthar thug kun bzang 'grub pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:11280: gzhan yang rgyal mchog kun bzang gi //
NK055(ri)001:11281: zhes pa la sogs pa te/
NK055(ri)001:11282: gzhan yang zhes pa dgar ba'i tshig ste gong du
NK055(ri)001:11283: dam tshig gi ngo bo rnam grangs dang bcas pa
NK055(ri)001:11284: bstan pa ni/ dus gsum bud+d+ha'i ngo bo nyid dam
NK055(ri)001:11285: tshig bsam gyis mi khyab par snang nas 'gro ba
NK055(ri)001:11286: ma lus pa'i don mdzad de/
NK055(ri)001:11287: bud+d+ha'i dgongs pa mnyam rdzogs kyi ngo bo nyid gdul
NK055(ri)001:11288: bya la snang bas 'bras bu la sbyor bar mdzad
NK055(ri)001:11289: pa'i dam tshig gi bar du gzhi lam 'bras bu
NK055(ri)001:11290: gsum dbyer med par bstan pa las dgar bas gzhan
NK055(ri)001:11291: yang zhes bya'o // des na ma nyams pa'i 'bras
NK055(ri)001:11292: bu ni dus gsum gyi rgyal ba thams cad dbyer
NK055(ri)001:11295: mtshan nyid lnga dang ldan pa'i drug pa kun tu bzang po'o //
NK055(ri)001:11296: de'i ngo bo ji lta bu zhe na/
NK055(ri)001:11297: thams cad ma lus phyag rgya'o //
NK055(ri)001:11298: zhes pa ngo bo gnyis kyis bsdus pa ril/
NK055(ri)001:11300: sku gsung thugs te phyi nang gi chos ma 'gags pa sku'i phyag rgya/
NK055(ri)001:11301: bem rig gi sgra thams cad gsung gi phyag rgya/
NK055(ri)001:11302: dran rtog thams cad thugs kyi phyag rgya/
NK055(ri)001:11303: ye nas lhun grub tu bzhugs pa la/
NK055(ri)001:11305: zhes pa 'khor ba spangs pa med/
NK055(ri)001:11306: 'das pa'am yon tan blangs pa med pa ni chos
NK055(ri)001:11307: thams cad kyi de kho na nyid rang byung gi
NK055(ri)001:11308: ye shes dngos gzhi gang du'ang ma grub cing dus
NK055(ri)001:11309: gsum du mi 'gyur ba'i ngo bo ste/
NK055(ri)001:11311: ces pa kun tu bzang po'i yon tan lung nas bshad pa thams cad 'grub ces bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:11312: spyir yon tan thams cad brjod las 'das par bstan pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:11313: de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog /ces bya ba
NK055(ri)001:11314: kun tu bzang po'i yon tan 'grub par bstan pa
NK055(ri)001:11315: de la sogs pa rnam grangs mtha' yas brjod kyis
NK055(ri)001:11316: mi rdzogs te/ thams cad kun bzang nyid snang bas rang snang du lhun gyis grub ste/
NK055(ri)001:11317: 'og ma bzhin rgyu 'bras sam don rtags ma yin pas mchog go //
NK055(ri)001:11318: gnas skabs che ba bdun la sogs pa bstan pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:11319: rgyal ba'i rigs mchog 'dzin pa de //
NK055(ri)001:11321: rgyal ba ni kun tu bzang po'o //
NK055(ri)001:11322: de'i yon tan rang snang ba'i dam tshig 'di dag lta spyod mgo 'byor te/
NK055(ri)001:11323: ma 'dres la yongs su rdzogs par gsal ba ni
NK055(ri)001:11324: lta ba gting gol bas dang po ste sar chud
NK055(ri)001:11326: rgyun du gnas pa ting nge 'dzin la gnas pas gnas pa ste sa la gnas pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:11327: stobs su gyur pa ni sa yongs su smin pa'i rig 'dzin no //
NK055(ri)001:11328: lta spyod mgo snyoms pa'i ngo bo ni/
NK055(ri)001:11329: rig mchog ste gsang sngags 'di nyid de/
NK055(ri)001:11330: des rten gyi gang zag bstan nas yon tan dngos ni/
NK055(ri)001:11333: rnal 'byor pa de la 'jig rten pa'i gtso bo
NK055(ri)001:11334: tshangs pa dang brgya byin la sogs pa lha klu
NK055(ri)001:11335: ste brgyad kyis bkur ba dang /
NK055(ri)001:11336: 'khor g.yog yang g.yog dang bcas pas bkur te dgos pa bsgrub/
NK055(ri)001:11339: dam pa mchog bud+d+ha'i rigs mchog gi sras dam par dgongs pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:11340: dam pa byang chub sems dpa' dang rig 'dzin rnams
NK055(ri)001:11341: kyis spun du dgongs shing byin gyis brlab pa dang
NK055(ri)001:11342: / bde gshegs nyid kyi yul la zhugs //
NK055(ri)001:11343: zhes pa rtsa ba dang yan lag gi dam tshig
NK055(ri)001:11344: rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid du lhun
NK055(ri)001:11346: bde gshegs kyi dgongs pa nyid dam tshig rnams su snang ba dang /
NK055(ri)001:11347: des gdul bya rnams 'bras bu la sbyor ba dang /
NK055(ri)001:11348: bde gshegs rnams kyi phrin las kyi ngo bo yin pas dam tshig nyams su myong ba nyid/
NK055(ri)001:11349: bde gshegs rnams kyi yul la zhugs zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:11350: 'jigs med kun tu bzang por sbyor //
NK055(ri)001:11351: zhes pa sgrub pa po dam tshig nyams su len
NK055(ri)001:11352: pa de lta bus spang bya 'khor ba'i chos la
NK055(ri)001:11353: spyod kyang byas 'dzin med pa nam mkha'i mdud pa
NK055(ri)001:11354: 'dra ba ltung ba'i 'jigs pa med de/
NK055(ri)001:11355: byed mkhan nam mkha' bzhin du dag pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:11356: yul sems snod bcud kyi chos thams cad snang stong
NK055(ri)001:11357: dbyer med sems kyi chos nyid du rdzogs pas yul
NK055(ri)001:11358: sems mnyam pa nyid du gsal te/
NK055(ri)001:11359: 'khor ba tha snyad tsam du yang ma dmigs te/
NK055(ri)001:11360: spyod yul yongs su dag pas dus dang gnas skabs kun tu bzang por sbyor zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:11361: ji bzhin nyid dang 'dul ba'i thabs //
NK055(ri)001:11362: zhes pa snod bcud kyi chos thams cad rang sar dag pa byed pa pos ma byas/
NK055(ri)001:11364: ye yin tshul gyi don ji bzhin pa de nyid mngon du byed pa'i dam tshig ni/
NK055(ri)001:11365: mnyam la mnyam par sbyor ba'i mnyam pa'i dam tshig go //
NK055(ri)001:11366: 'dul ba'i thabs ni gong du bstan pa ltar/
NK055(ri)001:11367: 'dul thabs rgyas par ni sa ma ya 'bum sde/
NK055(ri)001:11368: bsdu na bco lnga la sogs par thams cad ched du ma btsal bar/
NK055(ri)001:11369: me long gi gzugs brnyan ltar lhun grub tu 'char ba'i phyir/
NK055(ri)001:11370: ji snyed sdom pa mtha' yas pa //
NK055(ri)001:11371: zhes pa theg pa dgu dang /
NK055(ri)001:11372: phyi nang bar gyi theg pa gsum rnam grangs bsam yas pa thams cad/
NK055(ri)001:11373: ma lus rnam dag lhun gyis grub //
NK055(ri)001:11374: ces pa bsam yas pa ma lus pa rnams ji
NK055(ri)001:11375: bzhin nyid kyi ngang la dmigs 'dzin phra ba yang
NK055(ri)001:11376: med pa rnam par dag /gdul bya'i ngo la bshad
NK055(ri)001:11377: pa bzhin ma btsal bar lhun gyis grub bo //
NK055(ri)001:11378: nyams na bskang bas rdzogs pa dang //
NK055(ri)001:11379: zhes pa nyan thos ni nyams na gsor med rdza ma chag pa dang 'dra/
NK055(ri)001:11380: byang chub sems dpa' nyams kyang gsor yod pas gsos nas sobs kyang /
NK055(ri)001:11381: lan gcig nyams pa'i skyon gyis lam la 'gyangs/
NK055(ri)001:11382: gsang sngags ni dam tshig rnams la gtan log pa
NK055(ri)001:11383: ma yin na rkyen gyis nyams kyang myur bar gsos
NK055(ri)001:11384: na nyams pa sobs la lam yang mi 'gyangs te/
NK055(ri)001:11385: dam tshig rnams las ma log pa'i yon tan gyis sobs nas slar bsgrubs pa lta bur 'gyur skad/
NK055(ri)001:11386: des na rdzogs pa zhes kyang bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:11387: dam tshig ma nyams pa'i yon tan de dag la
NK055(ri)001:11388: sogs te rgyas par brjod kyis mi lang bas mtha'
NK055(ri)001:11391: rgyud so so'i nang nas ji tsam yang rgyas par ston to zhes brjod pas/
NK055(ri)001:11392: kun tu bzang pos de skad ces go phye ba'i 'khor gyi don du brjod pas/
NK055(ri)001:11393: de bzhin gshegs pa nyid rgyal ba kun tu bzang
NK055(ri)001:11394: po de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la lhan cig pa'i
NK055(ri)001:11395: 'khor rnams/ nyid la 'dul bar gyur te/
NK055(ri)001:11396: zhes pa bud+d+ha thams cad kyi dam tshig gi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir dang /
NK055(ri)001:11397: rgyal ba rnams kyang 'di las mi 'da' na/
NK055(ri)001:11398: lam pa gzhan gyis lta ci smos zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:11399: yang na snga ma ni 'bras bu mngon du byas pa rnams yin la/
NK055(ri)001:11400: phyi ma ni ma 'ongs pa'i bud+d+ha go phye ba'i 'khor rnams te/
NK055(ri)001:11401: 'dul ba ni 'bras bu sangs rgyas pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:11402: gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/
NK055(ri)001:11403: dam tshig gi le'u zhes pa mnyam pa nyid kyi dam tshig dang mi 'gag pa'i dam tshig gnyis/
NK055(ri)001:11404: mi 'gag pa la rgyas bsdus kyi rnam grangs bstan pa bzhin/
NK055(ri)001:11408: ma nyams pa'i yon tan rnams bstan pa'i le'u ste/
NK055(ri)001:11409: bcu dgu pa'i bshad pa'o////le'u nyi shu pa phrin las ni/
NK055(ri)001:11410: rgyud gsum las lam gyi rgyud do //
NK055(ri)001:11411: dkyil 'khor bcu gnyis las 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
NK055(ri)001:11412: rgyud kyi dngos po bcu las gzhan don gyi phrin las so //
NK055(ri)001:11413: lam pa phyag rgya gcig pa nas spros pa'i bar gyi yul lo //
NK055(ri)001:11414: de yang de yan chad du lta ba dang /
NK055(ri)001:11416: spyod pa gsum 'dzom pas bsgrub pa rnam gnyis rdzogs nas/
NK055(ri)001:11417: de rnams kun la yang skabs skabs su dgos pa'i
NK055(ri)001:11418: phrin las yin pas de'ang zhi khro gnyis ka dang
NK055(ri)001:11419: 'brel to // drag po ni khro bo kho na'o //
NK055(ri)001:11420: zhi rgyas gnyis ni zhi ba kho na'o //
NK055(ri)001:11421: dbang yang khro bo shas che zhi ba dang yang 'brel lo //
NK055(ri)001:11424: zhes pa tshig ni le'u bcu dgu pa'i rjes thog go //
NK055(ri)001:11425: don ni lam pa zhi khro gnyis ka'i phyag rgya gcig yan chad nas spros pa'i bar ro //
NK055(ri)001:11427: bdag gzhan gnyis ka la nam dgos pa byung ba'i dus su'o //
NK055(ri)001:11428: dgyes pa chen po ni yan chad du bshad zin no //
NK055(ri)001:11429: lhun gyis grub pa'i dam tshig /ces pa la sogs ni/
NK055(ri)001:11430: sems rang rig pa'i ye shes nyid la phrin las bzhi rang bzhin gyis grub par gnas te/
NK055(ri)001:11432: ngo bo dang rnam pa ma 'gags pa gnyis/
NK055(ri)001:11433: ngo bos gnas pa ni sems kyi rang bzhin rang
NK055(ri)001:11434: byung gi ye shes la mthar 'dzin gyi spros pa
NK055(ri)001:11435: ye nas mi gnas pa ni zhi ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:11436: rang byung gi ye shes chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam
NK055(ri)001:11437: pa la che yon ye rdzogs su gnas pa ni
NK055(ri)001:11438: rgyas pa'o // 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad de las gzhan du ma yin pa ni dbang ngo //
NK055(ri)001:11439: gnyis su 'dzin pa'i chos gtan nas mi gnas pa ni drag po'o //
NK055(ri)001:11440: ngo bo nyid kyi phrin las bzhi la 'da' ba
NK055(ri)001:11441: med de nam mkha' nam mkha' las mi 'da' ba
NK055(ri)001:11443: mi 'gag pa ni dgongs pa lhun grub kyi ye
NK055(ri)001:11444: shes gang du'ang ma grub pa de nyid me long
NK055(ri)001:11445: g.ya' dag par gzugs brnyan gsal ba gang bltas bzhin
NK055(ri)001:11446: shar ba ltar/ gdul bya'i rkyen gyis phrin las bzhi
NK055(ri)001:11447: gang bsgrub pa de nyid du sems nyid shar nas
NK055(ri)001:11450: lta sgom spyod pa dang ldan na/
NK055(ri)001:11451: phrin las gang bsgrub pa mngon du snang bas dam tshig go //
NK055(ri)001:11453: zhes pa ni de lta bu las zhi rgyas dbang
NK055(ri)001:11454: drag bzhi'i cho ga bzhis bskul bas mngon du las
NK055(ri)001:11455: kyi 'bras bu snang bar byed pa la ni byin
NK055(ri)001:11456: gyis rlobs pa zhes bya ste/
NK055(ri)001:11457: dper na nyi ma'i byin rlabs kyis mun pa sel ba'am/
NK055(ri)001:11458: chu'i byin rlabs kyis lo thog bskyed de 'bras bur lhags pa lta bu'o //
NK055(ri)001:11459: ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:11460: kun tu bzang po la zhugs ma zhugs mi mnga' na yang /
NK055(ri)001:11461: gdul bya'i snang ba dang phyi rabs pa rnams kyang /
NK055(ri)001:11462: las bzhi gang bsgrub kyang ting nge 'dzin las mi g.yo ba'i gdams pa brjod pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:11463: go phye ba'i ched du ston pas brjod pa 'og nas 'byung ba 'di brjod do //
NK055(ri)001:11464: dkyil 'khor bca' ba bskyed pa dang thun mong du bstan pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:11465: e yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog /ces pa e ni thab khung gi dbyibs te/
NK055(ri)001:11466: gru gsum nag po kha khyer la khru gang yod pa/
NK055(ri)001:11469: sor bzhi yar brtseg /sor bzhi phyir bkyed/
NK055(ri)001:11471: de kun phyi tha'i zheng sa la'ang sor bzhi yod par bya/
NK055(ri)001:11472: kun kyang dur khrod kyi sol ba dang khrag gis nag po bya/
NK055(ri)001:11475: e yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog /ces pa e ni drag po ste/
NK055(ri)001:11476: phrin las drag po la mnga' mdzad pa khro bo'o //
NK055(ri)001:11477: tshogs ni kun kyang khro bor bzhugs pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:11478: dkyil 'khor ni lnga bcu rtsa brgyad do //
NK055(ri)001:11479: mchog ni thugs mnyam nyid las ma g.yos pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:11480: 'bar ba gtum chen rngam pa la //
NK055(ri)001:11481: zhes pa dkyil 'khor na sku 'bar ba'i gar dgu dang ldan pa/
NK055(ri)001:11482: drag po'i phrin las thogs pa med par mdzad pas gtum chen/
NK055(ri)001:11483: nang du nyon mongs pa la rngam/
NK055(ri)001:11484: phyi bdud dang dregs byed la rngam pa he ru ka'i tshogs la dam tshig bskyed ye shes bstims nas/
NK055(ri)001:11485: mchod pa 'bul ba yang drag po'i mchod pa dug gsum gyi mchod pa gtso che bar bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:11486: sangs rgyas bsod nams sku yang 'jig ni las kyi 'bras bu ste/
NK055(ri)001:11487: bsod nams las grub pa'i gzugs sku yang 'jig ces bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:11489: bdud rtsi lnga'am zas lnga la //
NK055(ri)001:11490: zhes pa bdud rtsi lnga ni bsgrub bya'i bdud rtsi lnga yin/
NK055(ri)001:11491: de yang drag po la ni a mu ka'i rdzas drug kyang gzung ngo //
NK055(ri)001:11499: mtshan ma ming du bcas par bya //
NK055(ri)001:11500: zhes pas rdzas lnga po dang bdud rtsi lnga phye ma zhib bur byas nas bag phye dang bsres te/
NK055(ri)001:11501: bsgrub bya'i mtshan ma mgo dang yan lag skye mched
NK055(ri)001:11502: dod yags byas pa sor brgyad pa'i tshad du byas
NK055(ri)001:11504: zhes pa ling+ga bris nas snying gar bcug pa drag
NK055(ri)001:11505: po la na las kyi dkyil 'khor nag po gru
NK055(ri)001:11506: gsum byas pa'i nang du gan rkyal du gzhag go
NK055(ri)001:11507: // mgo lho nub mtshams su bstan to //
NK055(ri)001:11508: pho nyas dgug cing bsgral nas zhal du bstab pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:11509: bkugs la rdo rje phur pas gdab //
NK055(ri)001:11510: ces pa rang nyid lnga bcu rtsa brgyad kyi dkyil
NK055(ri)001:11511: 'khor mchod bsnyen rnams tshar nas thugs ka nas lcags
NK055(ri)001:11512: kyu can la sogs pa bzhi spros pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:11513: dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams la'ang pho nya nas rang
NK055(ri)001:11514: gi spros nas rang gi gnas nas bkugs la gzugs
NK055(ri)001:11515: la bstim/ de nas rdo rje phur pas gdab //
NK055(ri)001:11516: ces pa rdo rje badz+ra he ru ka ste des
NK055(ri)001:11517: mgo drangs pa'i phur pas gdab las gzhung bzhin du
NK055(ri)001:11518: bya/ de nas gtor ma'i las bya/
NK055(ri)001:11519: de nas tho ba'i las bya/
NK055(ri)001:11520: de nas mtshon cha'i las kyis gtub nas/
NK055(ri)001:11521: rdul du byas nas tshogs la 'bul //
NK055(ri)001:11522: zhes pa khrag 'thung rnams la bstab par bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:11524: e yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog /zhes pas thab khung du shing brtseg me spar/
NK055(ri)001:11526: mchod rdzas g.yas su bzhag /bsreg rdzas rnams g.yon du
NK055(ri)001:11527: bzhag /bar du rdo rje dril bu dang gang gzar
NK055(ri)001:11528: blugs gzar bzhag ste/ thab khung gru gsum du bskyed/
NK055(ri)001:11531: ye shes pa spyan drangs la bstim/
NK055(ri)001:11539: me lha'i lto bar gzhal yas khang bsgom/
NK055(ri)001:11540: tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du zhes pas/
NK055(ri)001:11541: drag po'i las mdzad pa'i khro bo'i tshogs lnga bcu rtsa brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor sngags kyis bskyed/
NK055(ri)001:11542: ye shes pa spyan drang la bstim/
NK055(ri)001:11546: phyi me ri 'bar ba'i nang na bzhugs pa'i/
NK055(ri)001:11547: nang du nyon mongs la gtum/
NK055(ri)001:11548: phyi bdud dang dregs byed la gtum pa'i sku'i cha
NK055(ri)001:11549: lugs phyi nang du rngam pa gnyis dang bcas pa'i
NK055(ri)001:11550: lnga bcu rtsa brgyad kyi tshogs la/
NK055(ri)001:11551: khros pa'i yid kyis mchod pa 'bul ba ni/
NK055(ri)001:11554: stangs kyi sems te shin tu khros nas skad cig
NK055(ri)001:11555: ma la thams cad brlag par byed pa'i bsam pas
NK055(ri)001:11556: sbyin sreg gi rdzas rnams 'bul ba ste/
NK055(ri)001:11557: sngags kyi rting pa la che ge mo m+aa ra ya phata kh+aa hi zhes pas dbul lo //
NK055(ri)001:11558: rdzas 'bul tshar nas bstod pa bya/
NK055(ri)001:11559: des ni sangs rgyas kyi bsod nams las grub pa'i gzugs sku yang 'jig na gzhan lta ci smos/
NK055(ri)001:11561: de nas bro bya ba ni/
NK055(ri)001:11562: e yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du //
NK055(ri)001:11564: sbyin sreg thab khung la rnal 'byor pa rnams bskor te/
NK055(ri)001:11565: tshogs ni khro bor bsgom pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:11566: dkyil 'khor du ni thab khung du lha lnga bcu
NK055(ri)001:11567: rtsa brgyad kyi lha dkyil 'khor du bsgoms pa de
NK055(ri)001:11568: nyid do // lu gu rgyud du sbrel bsdams nas //
NK055(ri)001:11569: zhes pa rnal 'byor pa khro bor bsgoms pa lag
NK055(ri)001:11570: pa lu gu rgyud du sbrel bsdams nas mi shor
NK055(ri)001:11571: ba byas nas lu gu rgyud bcing ste/
NK055(ri)001:11572: spyod pa ni rkang pa bro thabs su byas la
NK055(ri)001:11573: thab la dbyibs zur gsum du byas nas g.yon skor
NK055(ri)001:11574: du bskor/ ngag tu bro tshig dang sngags brjod/
NK055(ri)001:11575: ting nge 'dzin gyis he ru ka'i skur bsgom pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:11576: 'od zer gyis dngos po rnams tshar bcad par bro'i
NK055(ri)001:11577: tshul du bsgoms nas phyogs bcur g.yo ba ni ting
NK055(ri)001:11578: nge 'dzin te/ de'i 'bras bu ni sems myos nas
NK055(ri)001:11579: 'gas lus tshig par 'gyur te lus sems 'bral ba'o
NK055(ri)001:11580: nge 'dzin te/ // dbang gi las ni/
NK055(ri)001:11581: dkyil 'khor bca' ba skyed pa dang thun mong du bstan pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:11582: bam gyi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du/
NK055(ri)001:11583: zhes pa bam rgya gar gyi bam dbyibs zla gam ste/
NK055(ri)001:11584: thab khung rim pa nas ni drag po dang mthun la/
NK055(ri)001:11587: thab mtshan rnams dbang gi gzhung bzhin du bkod/
NK055(ri)001:11588: kha khyer nang ma khru gang /
NK055(ri)001:11590: tshogs ni dbang gi lha'i sku mdog dmar por bsgom pa pad+ma he ru ka'am/
NK055(ri)001:11591: snang ba mtha' yas kyis gtso bor byas pa'i dkyil 'khor la ni mchog ces bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:11592: 'bar ba ni dbang gi lha rnams me dang 'od zer 'bar ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:11593: gzi brjid ni gzhan thams cad dbang gis rang bzhin du 'du ba'i gzi brjid can no //
NK055(ri)001:11594: lhun chen ni de'i ngo bor bzhugs pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:11595: de lta bu'i de'i dkyil 'khor bskyed nas ye shes pa spyan drangs te bstim/
NK055(ri)001:11596: mchod pa 'bul bstod bsnyen bya ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:11597: de'i ling+ga bca' ba'i thabs ni/
NK055(ri)001:11598: rgyu bdud rtsi lnga dang zas lnga bsres pa'i bag
NK055(ri)001:11599: zan che chung sor brgyad pa mtshan ma skye mched
NK055(ri)001:11600: rnams dod yags byas pa ming ni ling+ga ste/
NK055(ri)001:11601: ming gi tha mar wa sham ku ru hoh dbang
NK055(ri)001:11602: du 'dus par gyur cig bri la snying gar bcug
NK055(ri)001:11603: /gzugs kyi rgyab seng ldeng gi khu ba'am rdzas dmar
NK055(ri)001:11604: pos byugs te/ logs su dbang gi thab khung zla
NK055(ri)001:11605: gam dmar po gcig gi nang du skyil krung bcas
NK055(ri)001:11606: te bzhag /pho nyas bkug cing bsgral nas zhal du
NK055(ri)001:11607: pos byugs te/ stob pa ni/ rdo rje chags pa'i phur pas gdab //
NK055(ri)001:11610: thugs ka nas pho nya mang po can spros/
NK055(ri)001:11611: dbang du bya ba'i bsgrub bya gang yin pa gzugs la bstim ting nge 'dzin gyis khugs pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:11612: phur pa pad+ma he ru ka sku mdog dmar po gzugs kyi snying gar gdab/
NK055(ri)001:11613: phur pa'i rtse mo na h+r+aihdamara po yod pa'i 'od
NK055(ri)001:11614: kyis kho'i shes pa la khyab pas chags shing bdag
NK055(ri)001:11615: la zhen par bsgom/ dbang gi dal du gzhung dang
NK055(ri)001:11616: mthun par byas la kho'i khar byin pas rang la
NK055(ri)001:11617: chags shing zhen te dbang du 'dus par bsgom/
NK055(ri)001:11618: de nas tho ba la dbang gi lha rnams bsgom pa'i 'od kyis chags shing dbang du 'dus par bsgom/
NK055(ri)001:11619: de nas gzugs zangs gris dum bur gtub la/
NK055(ri)001:11620: chags pa'i tshogs la thim par 'bul //
NK055(ri)001:11621: zhes pas dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams la bstabs/
NK055(ri)001:11622: de nas sbyin sreg bya ste/
NK055(ri)001:11623: sngar gyi dbang gi thab khung du shing brtsigs me spar/
NK055(ri)001:11624: bsreg rdzas mchod rdzas rnams sta gon bya/
NK055(ri)001:11625: me nang du dbang gi me lha bskyed/
NK055(ri)001:11626: ye shes pa spyan drangs la bstim/
NK055(ri)001:11627: mchod pa lnga dang bsreg rdzas 'bul/
NK055(ri)001:11628: sngags kyi mtha' brten la che ge mo w+aa sham ku ru hohzhesa btags/
NK055(ri)001:11629: de nas me lha la bstod pa bya/
NK055(ri)001:11631: de nas me lha sbyin sreg gi phyag tshang ba byed pa'am/
NK055(ri)001:11632: yang na me lha'i lto bar sngags kyis dbang gi lha tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor rnams bsgom/
NK055(ri)001:11633: ye shes pa spyan drangs la bstim/
NK055(ri)001:11634: mchod pa bsreg rdzas rnams sngags kyis dbul/
NK055(ri)001:11635: dbang gi me nang gi lha rnams 'od 'bar ba
NK055(ri)001:11636: dang bcas pa gzi brjid kyis gzhan dbang du 'gyur
NK055(ri)001:11637: ba de'i lhun chen po dang ldan pa la/
NK055(ri)001:11638: rnal 'byor pa'ang gzhan du chags pa kho na'i sems
NK055(ri)001:11639: kyis dkyil 'khor gyi lha la mchod sbyin gzhung bzhin
NK055(ri)001:11640: bya/ de'i 'bras bu ni sku gsung thugs rdo rje
NK055(ri)001:11641: lta bu gnyis mnga' ba'i sangs rgyas kyang rnal 'byor
NK055(ri)001:11643: gzhan tha mal pa lta ci smos zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:11645: bam zla gam gyis mtshan pa'i dbang gi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor thab khung la bskor te/
NK055(ri)001:11646: rnal 'byor pa rnams lu gu rgyud du sbrel te
NK055(ri)001:11647: bsdams la dbyibs zla gam du byas la thab khung
NK055(ri)001:11648: g.yon du bskor/ ngag tu sngags dang gyer mo brjod/
NK055(ri)001:11650: rnal 'byor pa rnams dbang gi he ru kar bsgom pa'i sku las 'od zer spros te/
NK055(ri)001:11651: khams gsum dbang du gyur par bsgoms nas bsgrub bya
NK055(ri)001:11652: 'gugs te dbang du gyur pa la the tshom med
NK055(ri)001:11653: de/ las des ni phyag na rdo rje yang phyi bzhin du 'brang bar 'gyur na/
NK055(ri)001:11654: dbang du byas nas ci 'dod 'grub pas/
NK055(ri)001:11657: lha mo klu mo 'gugs pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:11658: lha yul nas bdud rtsi len du bcug pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:11659: dpag bsam shing gi 'bras bu len du bcug pa rnams 'grub pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:11660: rgyas pa'i las kyi dkyil 'khor bca' ba bskyed pa dang thun mong du bstan pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:11661: mam yig tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du //
NK055(ri)001:11662: zhes pa mam ni gru bzhi ste rgyas pa'i dkyil
NK055(ri)001:11663: 'khor gru bzhi pa kha khyer nang ma la khru
NK055(ri)001:11664: gang / zabs su khru phyed brkos pa bang rim rnams drag po'i dus dang 'dra/
NK055(ri)001:11666: rgyas pa'i thab mtshan rnams bkod pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:11667: rgyas pa'i lha tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor rnams gzhung bzhin du bsgom/
NK055(ri)001:11668: ye shes pa spyan drang la bstim/
NK055(ri)001:11669: de'i lha rnams kyi mtshan nyid ni/
NK055(ri)001:11671: 'od zer phar 'phro bas dpal dang ye shes 'phel/
NK055(ri)001:11672: tshur bud+d+ha'i ye shes 'du ba'i 'du 'phro dang bcas
NK055(ri)001:11673: pa'i gzi brjid chen po dang ldan pa'i lha tshogs
NK055(ri)001:11676: bdud rtsi lnga'am zas lnga la //
NK055(ri)001:11678: de rgyas pa'i ling+ga la bsre ste ling+ga sor brgyad bya/
NK055(ri)001:11680: ling+ga'i ming gi tha mar che ge mo push+tim ku
NK055(ri)001:11681: ru'i rting pa la tshe dang bsod nams rgyas par
NK055(ri)001:11682: gyur cig kyang snying gar bcug /ling+ga'i rgyab dug ma
NK055(ri)001:11683: yin pa'i rdzas ser pos byug /gru bzhi ser po
NK055(ri)001:11684: chung ngu zhig gi nang du 'dug bcug /yon tan
NK055(ri)001:11685: yid bzhin gter du brtag /ces pa bsgrub bya gang
NK055(ri)001:11686: yin pa'i tshe dpal yon tan yid bzhin rin chen
NK055(ri)001:11687: bzhin rgyas shing 'phel ba thams cad 'tshogs pas gter
NK055(ri)001:11688: du brtag /pho nyas bkug cing bsgral nas bstab pa
NK055(ri)001:11689: bya ba ni/ nga rgyal dga' 'phro'i phur pas gdab //
NK055(ri)001:11690: ces pa rang nyid he ru ka'i thugs ka nas
NK055(ri)001:11691: pho nya kha dog ser po lcags kyu ser po
NK055(ri)001:11692: bzung ba spros nas bkug cing gzugs la bstim/
NK055(ri)001:11693: phrin las ci byed pa'i dus su dga' ba 'phel ba rgyas pa'i bsam blo gcig pu bya/
NK055(ri)001:11694: gzugs la bstims te ting nge 'dzin gyis khug nas/
NK055(ri)001:11695: nga rgyal dga' 'phro'i phur pas gdab //
NK055(ri)001:11696: ces pa nga rgyal ni rgyas pa'i lha rat+na he ru ka'o //
NK055(ri)001:11697: dga' ba 'phel ba dang rgyas pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:11698: khro ba yang rgyas pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas/
NK055(ri)001:11699: phur pa stod rat+na he ru sku mdog ser po bsgom pa'i phur pa gdab pas/
NK055(ri)001:11700: phur pa'i rtse mo las t+r+aam ser po'i 'od kyis
NK055(ri)001:11701: kho'i tshe bsod dbang thang 'phel bar bsgoms nas gdab
NK055(ri)001:11702: bo // rgyas pa'i gtor ma yang de ltar bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:11703: de nas rgyas pa'i tho bas kyang bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:11704: de nas gzugs de rnal 'byor pa'i lag pas 'phur
NK055(ri)001:11705: te phye mar byas la bstabs pas rnal 'byor pa'i
NK055(ri)001:11707: de'i yon tan nam 'bras bu ni/
NK055(ri)001:11709: zhes pas rdo rje'i ye shes kyis gzi brjid 'phel bar 'gyur pa bud+d+ha'i 'bras bu'ang thob par 'gyur na/
NK055(ri)001:11710: gzhan 'jig rten 'di'i tshe dang bsod nams la sogs pa rnams ci smos zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:11712: mam yig /ces pas rgyas pa'i thab khung du rgyas pa'i shing brtsig me spar/
NK055(ri)001:11715: bsreg rdzas 'bul bstod pa bya phrin las bcol/
NK055(ri)001:11716: tshar nas me lha'i lto bar sngags kyis rgyas pa'i lha tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du bskyed/
NK055(ri)001:11718: lha'i mtshan nyid ni 'od zer dang me ri 'bar
NK055(ri)001:11719: ba 'od zer gyi 'phro 'dus sangs rgyas kyi 'od
NK055(ri)001:11720: zer dang / dpal dang ye shes bsod nams 'du
NK055(ri)001:11721: ba de lta bu'i gzi brjid chen po dang ldan
NK055(ri)001:11722: pa'i rgyas pa'i lha rnams la rnal 'byor pa dga'
NK055(ri)001:11724: rgyas pa'i yid kyis sbyin sreg gi mchod sbyin rnams 'bul bar bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:11726: che ge mo push+tim ku ru s+w+aa h+aa/
NK055(ri)001:11727: tshe dang ye shes 'phel bar gyur cig /de ltar sbyin sreg byas pa'i yon tan ni/
NK055(ri)001:11729: zhes pa mthar thug bud+d+ha'i ye shes gnas skabs su tshe dang bsod nams rnams 'phel ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:11731: ma yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du //
NK055(ri)001:11732: zhes pa thab khung de nyid la rnal 'byor pa
NK055(ri)001:11733: rnams gru bzhir bsgrigs la lag pa lu gu rgyud
NK055(ri)001:11734: du sbrel la bsdam/ rkang pas bro brdung ste bskyod/
NK055(ri)001:11735: g.yas skor du gru bzhir bya ste/
NK055(ri)001:11738: zhes pa he ru ka'i dkyil 'khor las/
NK055(ri)001:11739: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi gzi brjid 'bar ba'i 'od zer 'phrul chen po spro ste/
NK055(ri)001:11740: sems can thams cad la khyab pas bsod nams 'phel bar byas/
NK055(ri)001:11741: bsgrub bya la khyab pas tshe bsod ye shes 'phel
NK055(ri)001:11742: bar bsgoms na bsod nams kyi tshogs yid bzhin rin
NK055(ri)001:11743: po che dang 'dra bar nam mkha' gang bar 'gyur/
NK055(ri)001:11744: mthar thug ye shes nam mkha' gang bar 'gyur ro //
NK055(ri)001:11746: dkyil 'khor dang bskyed pa thun mong du bstan pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:11747: ya yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du //
NK055(ri)001:11748: zhes pa ya ni zlum po ste thab khung zlum po kha dkyil na phar la khru gang /
NK055(ri)001:11749: zabs su khru phyed pa rkos pa/
NK055(ri)001:11750: bang rim mtshan nyid drag po dang mthun pa kha dog phyi nang dkar po bya/
NK055(ri)001:11751: zhi ba'i thab mtshan rnams bkod do //
NK055(ri)001:11752: zhi ba'i lha tshogs ni bud+d+ha he ru ka rnam snang gis gtso bo byas pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:11753: dkyil 'khor ni gtso bo dang 'khor du bcas pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:11755: ye shes pa spyan drangs nas bstim/
NK055(ri)001:11757: lha'i mtshan nyid ni gsal bar bya ba chos mnyam
NK055(ri)001:11758: pa nyid la mthar 'dzin gyi skyon gyis ma gos
NK055(ri)001:11759: pa'i rtags su sku mdog dkar ba/
NK055(ri)001:11760: 'od zer dkar po gzi brjid 'tsher ba dang bcas pa la mchod bsnyen rnams bya ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:11761: gzugs kyi rgyu ni bdud rtsi lnga'am zas lnga sngar dang 'dra/
NK055(ri)001:11762: gzugs sor brgyad pa dod par bya/
NK055(ri)001:11763: sman lnga dang dkar gsum mngar gsum gyis byug go //
NK055(ri)001:11764: snying gar che ge mo'i nad dang gnod pa dang
NK055(ri)001:11765: gdug pa thams cad sh+aan+tim ku ru s+w+aa h+aa'i mtha'
NK055(ri)001:11766: can bcug /las kyi thab khung zlum po chung ngu
NK055(ri)001:11767: zhig byas pa'i nang du gzugs tsog 'dug gis bzhag
NK055(ri)001:11768: /gtum rngam 'khrug pa'i ngo bor brtag /ces pa bsgrub
NK055(ri)001:11769: bya de la gnod pa'i gtum rngam 'khrug pa mi
NK055(ri)001:11771: gnod byed thams cad zhi ba'i ngo bor brtag /pho nyas bkug cing zhal du bstabs pa'i las ni/
NK055(ri)001:11772: lhan ner gsal ba'i phur pas gdab //
NK055(ri)001:11773: ces pa rang nyid he ru ka'i thugs ka nas
NK055(ri)001:11774: pho nya dkar po lcags kyu can spros la bsgrub
NK055(ri)001:11775: bya la gnod byed kyi mi ma yin rbod gtong
NK055(ri)001:11776: nad dang gnod pa gang yin pa rnams bkug ste
NK055(ri)001:11777: gtum rngam 'khrug pa rnams bstim mo //
NK055(ri)001:11779: lhan ne ni zhi ba ste bud+d+ha he ru ka'i skur gsal ba'i smad phur pa 'dug pas gdab ste/
NK055(ri)001:11780: phur pa'i dbal so dkar po las 'od zer dkar po byung bas/
NK055(ri)001:11781: bsgrub bya'i lus phyi nang la khyab ste/
NK055(ri)001:11782: gdug pa dang gnod byed dang nad dang gtum rngam
NK055(ri)001:11783: 'khrug pa rnams zhi ste dag nas nam mkha'i sprin
NK055(ri)001:11784: dag pa bzhin du bsgom mo //
NK055(ri)001:11785: de nas ba lim gis las kyis kyang de ltar bya/
NK055(ri)001:11786: tho ba'i las kyis kyang de ltar byas pas lag
NK055(ri)001:11787: pa gnyis kyis gzugs de 'phur te phye mar byas
NK055(ri)001:11788: pas/ 'bar ba ni ye shes kyi 'od zer 'bar/
NK055(ri)001:11789: lhan ne ni zhi ba'i lha ste bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi lha tshogs rnams la bstab par bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:11791: ya'i tshogs kyi thab khung du shing brtsig /zhi ba'i me sbar/
NK055(ri)001:11793: ye shes spyan drang la bstim/
NK055(ri)001:11796: sngags kyi mtha' mar sh+aat+nim ku ru btags bstod pa bya/
NK055(ri)001:11797: de nas me lha'i lto bar sngags kyis zhi ba'i lha tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom/
NK055(ri)001:11798: ye shes pa spyan drang la bstim/
NK055(ri)001:11800: bsreg rdzas rnams rim pa bzhin du 'bul/
NK055(ri)001:11801: de yang me nang gi lha gsal ba'i gzi brjid/
NK055(ri)001:11802: ces pas chos nyid spros pa med pa la mtshan
NK055(ri)001:11803: ma'i skyon gyis ma gos pa'i rtags su zhi ba'i
NK055(ri)001:11804: lha sku mdog gsal ba 'od zer dkar po'i tshogs
NK055(ri)001:11805: kyi gzi brjid 'tsher ba dang bcas pa la rnal
NK055(ri)001:11806: 'byor pa sems dwangs shing zhi ba snyoms pa'i yid
NK055(ri)001:11807: kyis sbyin sreg gi mchod sbyin bya/
NK055(ri)001:11810: de ltar sbyin sreg gi 'bras bu ni/
NK055(ri)001:11811: gtum chen 'bar ba ni dngos su ru dra ste/
NK055(ri)001:11812: de la sogs pa'i mi mthun pa thams cad gnod
NK055(ri)001:11813: pa'i sems dang ldan pas rngam pa gnod sems dang
NK055(ri)001:11814: bral nas/ zhi zhing snyoms pa la ni lhan ner 'gyur zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:11816: ya yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du //
NK055(ri)001:11818: thab khung zlum por zhi ba'i lha'i dkyil 'khor gyi sbyin sreg byas pa'i thab de nyid bskor te/
NK055(ri)001:11819: rnal 'byor pa rnams lag pa lu gu rgyud du sbrel nas bsdam/
NK055(ri)001:11820: rkang pa bro stabs bya ste/
NK055(ri)001:11821: zlum pos g.yas skor du bskor/
NK055(ri)001:11822: ngag tu sngags dang bro tshig gyer/
NK055(ri)001:11823: 'bar ba lhan ne'i byin gyis khyab //
NK055(ri)001:11824: ces pa sems zhi ba'i lhar bsgom pa zhi ba'i
NK055(ri)001:11825: 'od zer dkar po lhan ne ba'i byin gyis sems
NK055(ri)001:11826: can thams cad la khyab pas kyang gdug pa zhi
NK055(ri)001:11827: bar bsgom/ bsgrub bya la yang khyab ste gnod pa thams cad zhi bar bsgoms nas 'bras bu ni/
NK055(ri)001:11828: thams cad g.yo ba med par 'gyur //
NK055(ri)001:11829: zhes pa snod bcud thams cad g.yo ba med pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:11830: nam mkha'i rlung yang mi g.yo ste zhi bar 'gyur na/
NK055(ri)001:11831: gzhan gyi gdug sems dang bsgrub bya'i bar chod rnams zhi ba lta ci smos zhes pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:11832: dbang phyug ma'i las kyi mdor bstan ni/
NK055(ri)001:11833: slas dang byi mo bran mo'i tshogs //
NK055(ri)001:11835: 'dir las bzhi'i zhabs sdud kyang yin te/
NK055(ri)001:11836: khrag 'thung gi sgo nas las bzhi gang bsgrub kyang /
NK055(ri)001:11837: lhag ma'i las kyi sgo nas dbang phyug ma la las bcol ba ste/
NK055(ri)001:11838: slas ni ru dra'i chung ma yin pa'i dus su'o //
NK055(ri)001:11839: byi mo ni ru dra bsgral nas gsol te lto ba na yod pa'i dus su/
NK055(ri)001:11840: chung ma rnams bsdus te khrag 'thung lnga'i skur 'khril
NK055(ri)001:11841: ba ru dras ma tshor ba la ni byi mo
NK055(ri)001:11842: zhes bya'o // bran mo ni phyis ru dra 'khor
NK055(ri)001:11843: bcas 'bangs su phul nas dbang mo rnams kyang 'dus
NK055(ri)001:11844: zhes bya'o // te/ dam blangs dbang bskur rdo rje'i ming btags dbang mor khas blangs pa/
NK055(ri)001:11845: phud la 'tshol skal mi ldan gyi //
NK055(ri)001:11846: lhag ma zhal chab bran la zhog /ces pa la sogs pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:11847: tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor bsrung bar khas blangs nas/
NK055(ri)001:11848: ming tsam 'dzin pa'i rnal 'byor pa'ang las bsgrub par dam bcas pas bran mo zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:11849: tshogs ni g.yog yang g.yog dang bcas pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:11850: lhag mas mchod pa'i gtan tshigs ni/
NK055(ri)001:11852: phud la 'tshal skal mi ldan gyi //
NK055(ri)001:11853: lhag ma zhal chab bran la stsol //
NK055(ri)001:11854: zhes pas dam tshig 'dod pa yin pas sbyin par bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:11855: rang gi dam tshig rab bsgrags nas //
NK055(ri)001:11856: zhes pa 'bod pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya dang /
NK055(ri)001:11857: snying po dang dam tshig gi sngags dang /
NK055(ri)001:11858: zil gyis mnan pa'i sngags dang /
NK055(ri)001:11859: sngon dpal chen po'i spyan sngar dam bcas pa 'og nas 'byung ba rnams bsgrags nas/
NK055(ri)001:11860: rnal 'byor pas gang 'dod pa'i las bzhi byed pa'i bsgo ba bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:11861: gdul thabs sngon gyi gleng gzhi brjod pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:11862: sngon tshe dpal chen he ru ka /zhes pa la sogs pa/
NK055(ri)001:11863: sngon dpal chen pos ru dra btul ba'i tshe/
NK055(ri)001:11864: dpal rdo rje he ru kas thugs shin tu gdug
NK055(ri)001:11865: cing lus gtum pa can gyis ru dra 'khor dang
NK055(ri)001:11866: bcas pa khams gsum pa ma lus pa thams cad
NK055(ri)001:11867: 'dul bar mdzad pa'i nus pa dang ldan pa dbang
NK055(ri)001:11868: dang byin rlabs ngo mtshar gyi rmad chen po dang
NK055(ri)001:11869: ldan pas lha chen po la sogs pa'i ru dra
NK055(ri)001:11870: 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du sdud pa spyod pa'i
NK055(ri)001:11871: sgo nas bdud bzhi btul ba'i dus su/
NK055(ri)001:11872: 'khor dbang phyug ma rnams 'khor du byas te dam phog dbang bskur/
NK055(ri)001:11873: phrin las bzhi so sor bsgos pa ste dam bdar ni/
NK055(ri)001:11874: rang gis ci ltar khas blangs shing dam bcas pa
NK055(ri)001:11875: de ma thag par myur du mngon par phyungs shig
NK055(ri)001:11877: sngon dam bcas pa bzhin da lta rnal 'byor pas bsgos pa ma byas na/
NK055(ri)001:11878: sngon dpal gyi spyan sngar ji ltar rang gis mna'
NK055(ri)001:11879: bor ba dang ni dam tshig bcas pa de las
NK055(ri)001:11880: 'da' bar ma byed/ de las 'das par gyur na/
NK055(ri)001:11881: mgo dang lus rdul phra rab tu 'gyur pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:11882: snying yang tshal par gas te/
NK055(ri)001:11883: khro bo rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis lus kyi nang nas gtubs par 'gyur/
NK055(ri)001:11884: nyes pa chen po de lta bu yod pa de
NK055(ri)001:11885: bas phyi rabs kyi sngags 'chang gis ji ltar bcol
NK055(ri)001:11887: las de mngon sum du ma byas na/
NK055(ri)001:11888: dpal gyi spyan sngar khas blangs dam bcas pa bzhin lus rul bzhin myags sems 'tshig nas/
NK055(ri)001:11889: phyi ma la dmyal ba dang ngan song kha brgyud par 'gyur ro //
NK055(ri)001:11890: las byas pa'i yon tan ni/
NK055(ri)001:11891: rnal 'byor dam la gnas gyur pa'i //
NK055(ri)001:11893: rnal 'byor ni rtogs pa gting phol ba'i lta ba la 'byor pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:11894: bsgom pa'i ting nge nyams su len pa gnyis dang
NK055(ri)001:11895: ldan na de'i rnal 'byor pa dam la gnas pa
NK055(ri)001:11896: sgos su smos mi dgos te/
NK055(ri)001:11897: dam tshig nyams pa'i 'gal rkyen med pas so //
NK055(ri)001:11898: 'dir ni 'dun pas sems pa'i rnal 'byor lta bsgom gnyis gzhung du ma tshud kyang /
NK055(ri)001:11899: dam tshig rnams ma nyams na mkha' 'gros kyang de'i
NK055(ri)001:11900: don byed pas mkha' 'gro rang gi dam tshig yin
NK055(ri)001:11901: pas ci bcol ba'i las rnams thogs pa med par
NK055(ri)001:11902: bya ba dang / sngags 'chang de'i 'khor rnam bzhi bu gcig bzhin du skyong na/
NK055(ri)001:11903: mkha' 'gros dpal chen po'i spyan sngar khas blangs pa'i
NK055(ri)001:11904: dam tshig ma nyams pas phra men ni dbang phyug
NK055(ri)001:11905: ma ste/ lus 'jig rten pa'i cha bzung yang sems sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas pas so //
NK055(ri)001:11907: khas blangs pa'i dam tshig ma nyams pas bsgrub par
NK055(ri)001:11908: 'gro bas dngos grub thob pas dam tshig can gyi
NK055(ri)001:11909: ci bcol ba'i las rnam bzhi mngon sum du 'grub
NK055(ri)001:11910: par byos zhes bsgo bar bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:11911: dkyil 'khor so so'i ngos nas las bcol ba'i mdo ni/
NK055(ri)001:11912: khro bo bsgrub pa'i las kyi gtso bo ni 'di yin no //
NK055(ri)001:11913: zhes pa slob dpon sgeg pa'i rdo rjes khro bo'i
NK055(ri)001:11914: tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dus su las kyi bya
NK055(ri)001:11915: ba'i mchog ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i bro gar yin
NK055(ri)001:11916: no zhes bshad/ slob dpon pad+mas rgyud 'di'i dbu zhabs nas 'byung ba'i khro bo'i tshogs rnams dang /
NK055(ri)001:11917: khyad par du yang khro bo'i tshogs bsgrub pa'i dus
NK055(ri)001:11918: dngos grub myur du len pa'i thabs ni gsang sngags
NK055(ri)001:11919: 'di yin te/ gsang ba ni dgongs pa'i lta ba bsam brjod dang bral ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:11921: de yang gsang ba lta ba'i ngo bo dang /
NK055(ri)001:11922: lha'i sku bskyed pa me long gi gzugs brnyan lta bu dang /
NK055(ri)001:11923: ngag gi bzlas pa brag ca lta bu gsum gnyis su med par bsgoms te/
NK055(ri)001:11924: gnyis su med pa'i dbyings de bzhin nyid rang gi
NK055(ri)001:11925: sems su gsal bar mnyam pa nyid rang snang gi
NK055(ri)001:11926: ngang las ma g.yos par bzlas pa'i tshe/
NK055(ri)001:11927: bdag nyid khro bo dang khro mo'i dkyil 'khor rang
NK055(ri)001:11928: rig par gsal ba la yul yul can med pas
NK055(ri)001:11929: tha snyad du bdag nyid chen por bsgom la/
NK055(ri)001:11930: rang he ru ka'i ya rkan la /
NK055(ri)001:11931: ma rkan la +aah lce la h'u bsgoms te 'od 'phro bar bsgom par bya ba'am/
NK055(ri)001:11932: yang na bdag nyid kyi lce rdo rje rtse gsum par bsgom pa las/
NK055(ri)001:11933: kha dog dbyibs dang 'od du ldan par bya ba ni bzlas pa'i thabs kyi gdams ngag go //
NK055(ri)001:11934: de nas bsgrub pa bya ba'i gnas ni dur khrod dam/
NK055(ri)001:11936: gshin rje gdug pa'i gnas su bsgrub bo //
NK055(ri)001:11941: sdong gcig ni shing gcig 'greng gi rtsa ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:11942: mes tshig ni shing dngos su yan lag tshig pa'i sdong po'o //
NK055(ri)001:11943: dus der 'dod pa'i yon tan thams cad tshogs par bya ba ste/
NK055(ri)001:11944: tshogs su bshad pa'i yo byad lnga'o //
NK055(ri)001:11945: de byi bkra mi shis pa byad mi sdug pa/
NK055(ri)001:11946: ral pa nag po can shin tu skyi bung zhes byed pa gcig gam gnyis sam gsum mam/
NK055(ri)001:11948: kha zas ni zhing gsar rnying ma chad par rnal 'byor pas bza'/
NK055(ri)001:11949: dpal chen po la yang mchod/
NK055(ri)001:11950: phyi nang gi phra men ma la yang gtor ma
NK055(ri)001:11951: byin zhing las la bskul gzugs mngon du ston cig
NK055(ri)001:11952: kyang basgo'o // gzugs nye bar mi ston nas cung
NK055(ri)001:11953: 'gyangs na h'u b+h+yo e a ral+li dzahzhesa brjod cing
NK055(ri)001:11954: kyang basgo'o // gzir gnon du bya/ mngon du byung na ci 'dod pa'i las gyis shig par bsgo ste/
NK055(ri)001:11955: ma byas na so so rang gi dpal gyi spyan
NK055(ri)001:11956: sngar mna' bor ba bzhin du myong nas dmyal ba
NK055(ri)001:11958: 'jig rten gyi bya byed bsgrub na dgug dang mthu
NK055(ri)001:11959: rku dbang du byed pa la sogs pa rnams gang
NK055(ri)001:11960: byed kyang phra men ma bcu drug gi sngags bzla/
NK055(ri)001:11961: phyag rgya gsal bar bsgoms la/
NK055(ri)001:11962: stong tshig gis sman pany+tsa a mri ta phul zhing nang nub du gtor ma chen po gtong /
NK055(ri)001:11963: sngags 'bum phrag grangs med pa bzla ba gtso che/
NK055(ri)001:11964: las gang dang gang 'grub pa'i drod tshad ni/
NK055(ri)001:11965: gang bsgrub kyang bcas 'di bzhin bya ste/
NK055(ri)001:11966: mi mgo gsum sgyed por btsugs/
NK055(ri)001:11967: de'i kha la thod skam chen po gcig bzhag ste nang khrag gis bkang /
NK055(ri)001:11968: skabs skabs su de la me 'bar ba bsgoms na
NK055(ri)001:11969: grub pa'i rtags thod pa'i khrag lhag lhag khol bar
NK055(ri)001:11970: 'gyur ro // de ltar byung na ma mo rnams mngon du 'byung ngo //
NK055(ri)001:11971: de la ci 'dod pa byed du gzhug go //
NK055(ri)001:11972: khrag 'thung yab yum gyi las ni/
NK055(ri)001:11973: khrag 'thung chen po la sogs pa //
NK055(ri)001:11974: zhes pa sogs khongs su yab yum bcu'i ting nge 'dzin du gnas te/
NK055(ri)001:11975: so so'i sngags brjod bro tshig gyer ba'i skur bsgoms na rkang pa'i bro/
NK055(ri)001:11976: lag pa'i gar brjod pa'i glu tshig chen mo ni yab yum bcu yin pas so //
NK055(ri)001:11977: thams cad dang po thun mong gi dngos grub/
NK055(ri)001:11978: phyi tha mchog gi dngos grub/
NK055(ri)001:11979: thun mong la yang mang ste nam mkha' rdo rje brag la sogs pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:11980: mchog la yang rig 'dzin gsum sangs rgyas dang bzhi de dag gang 'dod 'grub ste/
NK055(ri)001:11981: dngos grub gnyis po thams cad rnal 'byor pa la snang bar byed pa yin zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:11982: mdzod ldan chen mo la sogs pa //
NK055(ri)001:11983: dpal chen po'i thugs nyid snang ba yin pas thun
NK055(ri)001:11984: mong dang mchog gi dngos grub mdzod dang ldan pa
NK055(ri)001:11985: ke'u ri ma la sogs pa bzhis/
NK055(ri)001:11987: ces pa gang dbang du bya bar 'dod pa yan chad nas sangs rgyas kyi ye shes so //
NK055(ri)001:11988: 'phel ba ni rgyas pa ste tshe bsod dbang thang nas bud+d+ha'i ye shes kyi bar rgyas pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:11989: sbos mo chen mo ni puk+ka s+ai la sogs te mtshams ma bzhi/
NK055(ri)001:11990: lhan ner 'dod na lhan ner byed //
NK055(ri)001:11991: ces pa zhi ba'i las te/
NK055(ri)001:11992: phyi nang gi zug rngu thams cad mi gnas pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:11993: rmongs pa ni drag po'i las te sems dran pa med par byed pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:11994: seng gdong chen mo la sogs pa //
NK055(ri)001:11996: phyogs kyi gcan mgo can bzhi ste/
NK055(ri)001:11998: drag po'i gdul bya gang la yang za bar byed pa lus sems tshar gcad pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:11999: rdul phra mo'i cha tsam yang med par byed do //
NK055(ri)001:12000: bzhad gdong ni mtshams ma bya mgo can bzhi ste/
NK055(ri)001:12002: gdul bya thams cad la gdam nga med par 'byin pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:12003: mig 'byin pa la sogs pa dbang po lnga med par byed pa/
NK055(ri)001:12005: ces pa dbang po lnga'i las gsal cha med par byed pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:12006: dbang phyug ma'i bro gar glu tshig gis ni/
NK055(ri)001:12007: sngags dang ting nge 'dzin gyis rbad cing pho nya
NK055(ri)001:12008: la las bzhi gang bsgrub pa'i pho nya btang ba
NK055(ri)001:12009: ste/ zhi rgyas dbang drag las kun la thams cad byed pa yin zhes so //
NK055(ri)001:12010: gnas dang gzungs ma dang sems bstan pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:12012: zhes pa shing ljon pa yal ga rgyas pa skye ba lta bu/
NK055(ri)001:12013: nags legs pa'i glo mo ste zhi ba bsgrub pa'i gnas so //
NK055(ri)001:12014: yang na zhi ba'i yum ste shing ljon pa mnyen
NK055(ri)001:12015: pa dang 'khril ba dang ldem pa dang 'dra bar
NK055(ri)001:12016: zhi ba'i yum ltar ldem pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:12017: dkar mo bong chung skad che ba //
NK055(ri)001:12018: bzhin lus gtsug phud g.yas su 'khyil //
NK055(ri)001:12019: yan lag phra 'jam skad gsal zhing //
NK055(ri)001:12020: rlung khar lci bas zhi ba bya //
NK055(ri)001:12023: zhes pa shing phran mang po skye ba yan lag
NK055(ri)001:12024: rgyas pa skye bdo ba'i gnas su rgyas pa bsgrub
NK055(ri)001:12026: zla dang yan lag mang ba dang //
NK055(ri)001:12027: phra zhing bshan la gzings su ring //
NK055(ri)001:12028: bzhin lus ser zhing gru bzhir gnas //
NK055(ri)001:12029: rna dpyangs sha dang nu ma rgyas //
NK055(ri)001:12032: sdong gcig ni dbang gi gnas te/
NK055(ri)001:12034: de na mkha' 'gro pho mo mang po 'du ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:12035: yang na dbang gi yum ste/
NK055(ri)001:12036: bzhin mdog pad 'dra sog kha la //
NK055(ri)001:12037: smin dkyus ring la stod smad phyed //
NK055(ri)001:12038: lus la chu rlung dri zhim zhing //
NK055(ri)001:12039: bde ba ldan zhing yan lag med //
NK055(ri)001:12042: mes reg ni drag po'i gnas te/
NK055(ri)001:12045: sa gdub rtsub che ba'i gnas su bsgrub bo //
NK055(ri)001:12046: yang na mes reg drag po'i yum ste/
NK055(ri)001:12047: nag mo gru gsum rtsid mgo ma //
NK055(ri)001:12048: khro gnyer byis pa'i lus ldan zhing //
NK055(ri)001:12049: gtum zhing barlanga tshig 'dzem pa med //
NK055(ri)001:12050: gtsang sme'i rtog bral gsod par byed //
NK055(ri)001:12053: zhi ba'i las bsgrub pa'i dus su/
NK055(ri)001:12054: sems dga' ba drang ba snyoms pa nam mkha' lta bu ste stangs kyi sems so //
NK055(ri)001:12055: rgyas pa'i dus su dga' ba rgya che ba 'phang mtho ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:12057: zhes pa dbang gi dus te/
NK055(ri)001:12058: spyir yang chags shing zhen pa lta bu/
NK055(ri)001:12059: sgos su bsgrub bya gang yin pa de la chags shing zhen pa lta bur bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:12060: khros pa ni drag po'i sems te/
NK055(ri)001:12061: da lta kho nar gsod sems can lta bur/
NK055(ri)001:12063: zhes pas skad cig ma la lus sems phral zhing shes pa bsgral ba'i sems gcig pus bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:12065: drug pa'i skyes bus de skad brjod pas/
NK055(ri)001:12066: de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la/
NK055(ri)001:12067: zhes pa 'khor la de bzhin gshegs pa nyid ston
NK055(ri)001:12068: pa'i phrin las mthar phyin pa spyod par gyur to
NK055(ri)001:12069: // yang na de bzhin gshegs pa snga ma ni go phye ba'i 'khor ro //
NK055(ri)001:12070: phyi ma ni lhan cig pa'i 'khor ro //
NK055(ri)001:12071: gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/
NK055(ri)001:12072: lhun gyis grub pa'i phrin las ni/
NK055(ri)001:12073: rgyud gzhung 'di'i phrin las ni yo ga'i gzhung dang mi 'dra la/
NK055(ri)001:12074: ston pa'i rigs bdag gi dgongs pa lhun grub kyi
NK055(ri)001:12075: phrin las nyid du bzhugs pa nam mkha' lta bu
NK055(ri)001:12076: la g.yo ba mi mnga' ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:12078: gdul bya'i ngo la de nyid mi 'gag par snang
NK055(ri)001:12079: ba phrin las bzhi'i bye brag tu shar ba la
NK055(ri)001:12080: bya btsal med par rang snang ba ni dam tshig
NK055(ri)001:12081: gi ngo bo ste/ de'i le'u ste nyi shu pa bshad pa'o////le'u nyer gcig pa bstod pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:12082: rgyud gsum las rang bzhin lhun grub khro bo'i dkyil 'khor 'bras bu'i rgyud do //
NK055(ri)001:12083: rgyud kyi dngos po bcu las glu ye shes kyi mchod pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:12084: dkyil 'khor bcu gnyis las khro bo lhag pa ting nge 'dzin no //
NK055(ri)001:12085: de yang khro bo'i dkyil 'khor dang bsgrub pa ting nge 'dzin bstan nas/
NK055(ri)001:12086: glu ye shes kyi mchod pa khro bo'i dkyil 'khor la bstod pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:12089: zhes pa la sogs te de nas/
NK055(ri)001:12091: sgra'i de ma thag pa ni le'u nyi shu pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:12092: don gyi de ma thag pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:12093: khro bo'i dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:12094: ting nge 'dzin skabs su glu ye shes kyi mchod pa'i skabs de nyid do //
NK055(ri)001:12095: bcom ldan 'das la sogs pa sngar bzhin no //
NK055(ri)001:12097: zhes pa yul phyi nang gnyis la rab tu rngam pa'i khro bo'i khro tshul bzhi dang ldan pa/
NK055(ri)001:12098: rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa khro bo'i dkyil 'khor rab tu snang ba'i tshogs rnams/
NK055(ri)001:12099: shin tu rngam pa'i mdangs zhes pa/
NK055(ri)001:12100: zhal shin tu rngam pa khro tshul dang ldan pa
NK055(ri)001:12101: chos kyi sku mtshan ma thams cad dang bral ba
NK055(ri)001:12102: nyid rang snang ba'i tshul gyis khro bo nyid 'dzum
NK055(ri)001:12105: glu/ zhes pa khro bo'i bstod pa'i tshig nyid kyis rang byung gi ye shes nyid gsal ba ni/
NK055(ri)001:12106: tha mal pa'i 'khrul pa nyid gtan nas dag par byed pas glu ye shes te/
NK055(ri)001:12107: phyi rabs pas ngag gi gre 'gyur dang bcas pas bstod pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:12108: dgyes pa'i glur blang ba zhi ba'i skabs su rgyas par bshad pa bzhin 'dir yang shes par bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:12109: spyir khro bo thams cad kyi sku la bstod pa/
NK055(ri)001:12110: sgos su bud+d+ha he ru ka la bstod pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:12112: h'u/ gtum chen dus mtha'i me ltar 'bar //
NK055(ri)001:12114: h'u ni phrin las drag po'i sgo nas ye shes lnga mtshon pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:12115: glu nyid rang byung gi ye shes rang snang ba mi 'gag pa'i rkyen gyi phyir mgo 'dren no //
NK055(ri)001:12116: gtum pa ni 'bar ba chen po'i sku gtum pa
NK055(ri)001:12117: ste rang byung gi ye shes mtshon pa bskal pa'i
NK055(ri)001:12118: me phung nang na bzhugs pa'i sku gar dgu dang
NK055(ri)001:12119: / khro tshul drug cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pas
NK055(ri)001:12120: gdul bya skad cig ma mi gnas par mdzad pa
NK055(ri)001:12121: / ni gtum pa'o // mtshon par byed pa'i gsung gtum ste/
NK055(ri)001:12122: thugs rang byung gi ye shes rang snang ba'i gdul
NK055(ri)001:12123: bya'i ngo la da ha dang pa tsa dang ha
NK055(ri)001:12124: ha dang hi hi la sogs pa sku nyid kyi
NK055(ri)001:12125: sgo nas bsgrag pas/ rgya mtsho gsher ba las ma
NK055(ri)001:12126: 'das pas de las snang ba'i rlabs dang chu yang
NK055(ri)001:12127: gsher ba las mi 'da' ba bzhin du/
NK055(ri)001:12128: rang byung ye shes mtha' dang bral ba rang snang
NK055(ri)001:12129: ba'i gsung yang brjod pa ji ltar brjod kyang mtha'
NK055(ri)001:12130: gnyis dag pa las ma g.yos pas/
NK055(ri)001:12131: des gdul bya ru dra la sogs pa drag po
NK055(ri)001:12132: rnams skad cig gis dmigs 'dzin dag nas ye shes
NK055(ri)001:12134: mtha' las 'das pa'i thugs gtum pa he ru ka'i
NK055(ri)001:12135: thugs rang byung gi ye shes chos sku kho na
NK055(ri)001:12136: de'i ngang las/ 'khor 'das snod bcud yul sems bdag gzhan thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi ngang la/
NK055(ri)001:12137: nyi ma'i snying po la mun pa gzhi dag pa
NK055(ri)001:12138: dang 'dra bar de la gnyis 'dzin gyi chos thams
NK055(ri)001:12139: cad de nyid kyi ngang du rig pa skad cig
NK055(ri)001:12140: ma la rdzogs pas thugs gtum pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:12141: phrin las drag shul mdzad pa'i phyag gtum pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:12142: phyag drug ye shes drug ste/
NK055(ri)001:12143: chos thams cad de nyid du gcod pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:12144: gdul bya gdul ba'i phrin las thams cad kyi bya ba byed pa phyag yin pas/
NK055(ri)001:12145: 'bras bu'i theg pa'i bzhed kyis 'gro don bskyar mi
NK055(ri)001:12146: dgos par 'dir khro bo'i skabs kyi drag po'i las
NK055(ri)001:12147: kyis mdzad pa'o // rgyu drug sgrol ba'i tshems gtum pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:12148: skye ba bzhi gcod pa'i rtags su zhal re re la yang mche ba bzhi bzhi ste/
NK055(ri)001:12149: rig pa'i ye shes kyis nyon mongs pa skad cig
NK055(ri)001:12150: gis gcod pa'am spangs pa med par rang byung ye
NK055(ri)001:12151: shes su rdzogs pa'i rtags su/
NK055(ri)001:12152: las kyi ru dra nag po zhal du gsol nas mid pa'i tshul lo //
NK055(ri)001:12154: gdul bya 'khor ba dang sa bcu man chad kyis
NK055(ri)001:12155: mi reg pa'i dpal he ru ka'i dgongs pa la
NK055(ri)001:12156: bya byed kyi rtsol ba phra ba yang mi dmigs
NK055(ri)001:12157: kyang / gdul bya'i ngo la bsad bcad 'jigs skrag la sogs par snang yang /
NK055(ri)001:12158: dgongs pa la ma grub pas chen po'o //
NK055(ri)001:12159: mdzad pa de lta bu'i dpe ni/
NK055(ri)001:12161: zhes pa bskal pa 'jig pa'i dus kyi mes che bsregs chung ngu bsregs te/
NK055(ri)001:12162: rdul phra rab mer 'bar ba dang ri rab mer 'bar ba la dka' las med/
NK055(ri)001:12163: skam bsreg rlon du bsreg ste/
NK055(ri)001:12164: rdzas skam po zhig mer 'bar ba dang /
NK055(ri)001:12165: rgya mtsho mer 'bar ba la yang dka' las med de/
NK055(ri)001:12166: stong gsum me'i phung por gyur nas gzhan ci yang med pa ltar/
NK055(ri)001:12167: dpal he ru ka'i thugs rang byung gi ye shes
NK055(ri)001:12168: kyi ngang las 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad rang
NK055(ri)001:12169: byung gi ye shes su lhun gyis grub pas 'khor
NK055(ri)001:12170: 'das kyi tha snyad tsam yang ma dmigs nas rang
NK055(ri)001:12171: byung ye shes zhes bya ba'ang brjod gzhi med pa
NK055(ri)001:12172: ni dpal he ru ka'i ngo bo ste/
NK055(ri)001:12173: de nyid gdul bya ru dra'i ngo la snang ba ni/
NK055(ri)001:12174: ru dra nyid ma gtogs pa 'khor 'das snod bcud
NK055(ri)001:12175: thams cad he ru ka'i skur snang nas de las
NK055(ri)001:12176: bros sa yang med pa lta bu ste/
NK055(ri)001:12177: rtags bskal pa'i me dpung gi nang na bzhugs pa'i khro bo thams cad 'jig par byed pas/
NK055(ri)001:12178: 'jig pa'i dus kyi me dpung gcig tu byas pa dape'o //
NK055(ri)001:12179: sku de lta bu las bskal pa'i me dpung chen
NK055(ri)001:12180: po 'khrigs pa bzod par dka' ba dus kyi mtha'i
NK055(ri)001:12181: me lta bu'o // de ni sku dngos kyi tshul lo //
NK055(ri)001:12182: sku de las 'od zer 'phro ba'i tshul ni/
NK055(ri)001:12184: zhes pa thabs la mkhas pa'i 'od zer dang /
NK055(ri)001:12185: mun pa sel ba'i 'od zer dang /
NK055(ri)001:12186: thugs rje chen pos kun tu khyab pa'i 'od zer ro //
NK055(ri)001:12187: mun pa sel ba'i 'od zer ni/
NK055(ri)001:12188: dpal gyi thugs rang byung ye shes ni rang byung
NK055(ri)001:12189: gi ye shes rang gi ngo bo la mun pa
NK055(ri)001:12190: gzhi nas grub ma myong ba nyi ma'i snying po
NK055(ri)001:12191: dang 'dra bas/ des khams gsum gyi mun pa sel zhing mi gnas par mdzad pa'i don du/
NK055(ri)001:12192: mdzad pa'i cho 'phrul cir yang snang ba nyid ye
NK055(ri)001:12193: shes rang snang ba'i phyir sku'i 'od zer ba spu'i
NK055(ri)001:12194: khung bu re re nas kyang drug cu drug cu
NK055(ri)001:12195: 'phro ba la gsal ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis gdul
NK055(ri)001:12196: bya thams cad kyang rang byung ye shes ngang du
NK055(ri)001:12198: thabs mkhas pa'i 'od zer mang po ni/
NK055(ri)001:12199: gdul bya sems can bsam gyis mi khyab gdul bya
NK055(ri)001:12200: sems can gcig gi rgyud la'ang dus thog ma dang
NK055(ri)001:12201: tha ma'i bar rnam rtog skad cig ma'i grangs bsam
NK055(ri)001:12202: gyis mi khyab pa 'dul ba la mdzad pa'i phrin
NK055(ri)001:12203: las kyang de ltar shar bas phrin las mi shar
NK055(ri)001:12205: des na gang la gang 'dul de la de ston du shar ba spyir sems can thams cad/
NK055(ri)001:12206: sgos su sems can gcig gi rgyud skad cig ma'i
NK055(ri)001:12207: 'gyur ba can la de dang mthun pa'i mdzad pa
NK055(ri)001:12208: shar ba'i phyir/ kha dog dkar po la sogs pa sna tshogs pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:12209: grangs kyang rang byung gi ye shes 'du shes kyi
NK055(ri)001:12210: rgyun las grol zhing bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rig
NK055(ri)001:12211: pa la dbang bsgyur ba'i phyir/
NK055(ri)001:12212: skad cig la gdul bya thams cad kyi blo bzhin shar ba'ang 'gal ba med de/
NK055(ri)001:12213: gtan tshigs gong du song bas so //
NK055(ri)001:12214: de'i phyir he ru ka'i 'od zer gsal ba'i nang
NK055(ri)001:12215: na gsal ba'ang mi bsgrib par phrig phrig dus rer
NK055(ri)001:12217: thugs rje chen pos khyab pa'i 'od zer ni/
NK055(ri)001:12218: he ru ka'i thugs rang byung gi ye shes kyis
NK055(ri)001:12219: 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad la bsgos pa med
NK055(ri)001:12220: par khyab ste/ 'khor 'das dang dgongs pa'i chos sku
NK055(ri)001:12221: mtha' med par mnyam pa ni stong khams thugs kyi
NK055(ri)001:12223: de'i phyir he ru ka'i sku las 'od zer gsal
NK055(ri)001:12224: ba dang mang ba gnyis ka mi 'grib pa'i 'od
NK055(ri)001:12225: dkar po rtab rtab po dngos por grub pa med
NK055(ri)001:12226: pa gcig gis dus thams cad du gsal bas chos
NK055(ri)001:12227: thams cad la khyab pa ni thugs rje chen po'i
NK055(ri)001:12228: 'od zer ro // 'od zer gsum po dbyer med pa'i dpe ni/
NK055(ri)001:12229: nyi ma 'bum dus gcig shar ba lta bu ste nang du rig pa'i ye shes so //
NK055(ri)001:12231: thams cad de'i zil gyis gnon cing mi gnas par brlag par mdzad pa'i gzi brjid dang ldan pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:12232: de'i rtsal las gnyis su 'dzin pa'i tha snyad ni zur tsam yang mi gnas la/
NK055(ri)001:12233: gdul bya ru dra'i nyon mongs pa'i tshogs dag par mdzad pa ni las so //
NK055(ri)001:12234: khro gnyer glog stong 'gyu ba bzhin //
NK055(ri)001:12235: zhes pa gdul bya'i dbang gis zhi ba la med de/
NK055(ri)001:12236: khro bo yin pas khro gnyer ro //
NK055(ri)001:12238: yab thabs kyi rang bzhin stobs bcu dang ldan pa'i rtags su khro gnyer bcu ste/
NK055(ri)001:12239: rtse mo smin mtshams su bsdus nas smin ma'i gong du g.yas g.yon du lnga lngar gyes pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:12240: yum shes rab kyi rang bzhin spros pa dang bral ba rnam thar sgo gsum mtshon pa'i phyir/
NK055(ri)001:12241: smin mtshams nas gyen du spyan dbu ma'i g.yas g.yon nas 'greng ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:12242: de dag la dbang du sdud pa'i khro gnyer bsdus pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:12243: khro gnyer ji ltar gyes kyang rtsa ba smin mtshams su bsdus pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:12244: dpal chen po'i rang byung gi ye shes kyi rtsal
NK055(ri)001:12245: las gdul bya'i dbang gis ji ltar 'char yang rang
NK055(ri)001:12246: byung gi ye shes ma g.yos pa'i rtags su/
NK055(ri)001:12247: smin mtshams su khro gnyer g.yo ba glog stong dus gcig g.yo ba bzhin du 'khrugs pas/
NK055(ri)001:12248: gdul bya ru dra la sogs pa rgyud drag po
NK055(ri)001:12249: rnams dbang du bsdus shing 'dul ba'i mgo zug pa'o
NK055(ri)001:12250: // zil gyis gnon pa'i khro gnyer rnams ni/
NK055(ri)001:12251: khro gnyer g.yas g.yon gyi rtse mo rnams gyen du
NK055(ri)001:12252: 'greng ba krug krug 'khrug pa ste de ni dpal
NK055(ri)001:12253: chen po'i thugs rang byung gi ye shes kyis 'khor
NK055(ri)001:12254: ba dang lam pa dang sa bcu pa'i ye shes
NK055(ri)001:12255: man chad/ nyi ma shar na srin bu me khyer
NK055(ri)001:12256: dang 'dra bar chos thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'i
NK055(ri)001:12257: man chad/ ngo bor bzhugs la/ de'i rtags su khro gnyer gyen 'greng rnams 'khrugs pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:12258: de'i 'od glog stong 'gyu ba lta bus ru dra
NK055(ri)001:12259: la sogs pa drag po rnams zil gyis gnon te
NK055(ri)001:12260: dpa' zhum nas/ nga rgyal chag ste rgol ba'i bsam
NK055(ri)001:12261: pa dang bral ba ni 'dul ba'i thabs gnyis pa'o
NK055(ri)001:12262: dpa' zhum nas/ // thabs mkhas 'od zer sna tshogs su g.yo ba ste/
NK055(ri)001:12263: khro gnyer bcu ka dus gcig tu g.yo ba la
NK055(ri)001:12264: gang zag gi 'du shes kyi rgyud kyis bzung ba'i
NK055(ri)001:12265: gcig min pa mi 'dra ba gnyis gsum la sogs
NK055(ri)001:12266: pa mi btub pa bzhin ma yin te/
NK055(ri)001:12267: 'dir dpal chen po'i thugs rig pa'i ye shes bsam
NK055(ri)001:12268: gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid
NK055(ri)001:12269: du gyur pas khams gsum ma lus pa'i 'dul thabs
NK055(ri)001:12270: kyang dus gcig shar ba la mnga' brnyes te/
NK055(ri)001:12271: de lta bu'i ye shes kyi mdzad pa la sol ba thal ba med par rang shar ba ni/
NK055(ri)001:12272: rgyu des mdzad pa'i bye brag bsam gyis mi khyab pa shar te/
NK055(ri)001:12273: tshoms su bsdu na ru dra dngos la yang pho bsgral te 'dul ba dang /
NK055(ri)001:12274: mo sbyor te 'dul ba'ang dpal chen po la dus mtshungs kyang /
NK055(ri)001:12275: gdul bya la kha khar snang ba lta bu'o //
NK055(ri)001:12276: sngar ye shes kyi skabs su bshad pa dang 'dra
NK055(ri)001:12277: bar mdzad pa'i phrin las lhun grub tu bsam gyis
NK055(ri)001:12279: de lta bu rang byung gi ye shes la gang
NK055(ri)001:12280: zag gi rgyud kyis gzhal ba'i blo chung dag ga
NK055(ri)001:12282: khro gnyer de'i mtshan nyid ni/
NK055(ri)001:12284: zhes pa nam mkha' la glog 'gyu ba'i gzi byin gyis/
NK055(ri)001:12285: nga rgyal chen po can rnams kyang ga chad cing brgyal ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:12286: glog la yang sku gsum tshang ste/
NK055(ri)001:12287: glog thams cad kyi gzhi ma dkar po rtab rtab
NK055(ri)001:12288: po dngos med la gnas pa mi 'gyur ba zhig
NK055(ri)001:12289: yod pa ni chos sku'i rtags so //
NK055(ri)001:12290: de'i ngang la dngos po snang zhing gsal bar byed
NK055(ri)001:12291: pa'i bar skabs dang bcas pa ni longs sku'i rtags
NK055(ri)001:12292: so // de nyid kyi ngang las brig brig po
NK055(ri)001:12293: zhib bu cir yang 'gyur ba zhig yod pa ni
NK055(ri)001:12295: mche ba zangs yag za byed che hoh zhes pa
NK055(ri)001:12296: mche ba la yang skye shi rtsa ba gcod pa'i
NK055(ri)001:12297: mche ba dkar/ gdug pa za bar byed pa'i mche ba dmar/
NK055(ri)001:12298: phrin las las la rngam pa'i mche ba rno/
NK055(ri)001:12299: thugs spros pa dang bral ba'i mche ba zlum po/
NK055(ri)001:12300: de la skye shi rtsa ba gcod pa'i mche ba dkar ba ni/
NK055(ri)001:12301: dpal chen po'i thugs rig pa'i ye shes la mthar
NK055(ri)001:12302: 'dzin gyi chos phra ba'i phra ba yang med pa
NK055(ri)001:12303: ni/ ye shes kho nar gsal bas de'i ngang la
NK055(ri)001:12304: rgyu rkyen dang bral bas skye 'jig ma grub pas
NK055(ri)001:12305: de'i rtags su snang ba ni zhal gyi mche ba
NK055(ri)001:12306: ni/ shin tu dkar te/ 'du shes kyi 'dzin pa
NK055(ri)001:12307: phra rab dang bral bas de dkar po kha dog
NK055(ri)001:12308: gzhan gyis ma bslad pa lta bu'o //
NK055(ri)001:12309: don des khams gsum gyi skye shi'i rtsa ba gcod pa'i rtags so //
NK055(ri)001:12310: gdug pa za bar byed pa'i mche rtsa dmar ba ni/
NK055(ri)001:12311: dpal gyi thugs rang byung gi ye shes kyis chos
NK055(ri)001:12312: thams cad la ma khyab pa med pa ni chags
NK055(ri)001:12313: pa'i bdag nyid de rtsa dmar ba yin la/
NK055(ri)001:12314: de nyid rtags su phrin las drag po'i mdzad pas
NK055(ri)001:12315: gdul bya'i sha khrag gsol bas khrag mche ba la
NK055(ri)001:12316: mi gos pa lta bu ste/
NK055(ri)001:12317: rak+ta r+aa ga'i sgras khams gsum gyi 'dod chags zad par byed pa'i rtags su mche ba dmar ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:12318: phrin las rngam pa'i mche ba rno ba/
NK055(ri)001:12319: thugs ye shes kyis khams gsum gyi chos rgyu 'bras thams cad rig par dbyer med pa na/
