NK055(ri)001:12320: mche ba lta bus zang thal du gnas par mdzad pa'i rtags su/
NK055(ri)001:12321: mdzad pa'i phrin las kyis gdul bya drag po rnams skad cig gis 'joms pa'i rtags so //
NK055(ri)001:12322: rno ba ni ci la yang thogs pa med pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:12323: thugs spros pa dang bral ba'i mche ba zlum pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:12324: dpal chen po'i thugs rig pa chos kyi sku la spros pa'i mtshan ma phra ba'ang mi gnas pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:12325: de mtshon pa'i tha snyad du zlum zhes bya ba/
NK055(ri)001:12326: de nyid gdul bya'i ngo la mdzad par snang ba'i dus su mche ba dngos zlum pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:12327: 'bar 'bur dang gshang gshong med pa ste shin tu rno la zlum pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:12329: spyir na dpal chen po'i mche ba ni mas kyi mche bas yas kyi smin mtshams su slebs pa/
NK055(ri)001:12330: yas kyi mche bas mas kyi nu phrag tu slebs te/
NK055(ri)001:12331: gdul bya'i dbang du yas kyi mche bas srid pa'i
NK055(ri)001:12332: rtse mo nas dmyal ba mnar med par thal phyung
NK055(ri)001:12333: / mas kyi mche bas mnar med nas srid pa'i
NK055(ri)001:12334: rtse mor thal phyung ba ste khams gsum rangs pa
NK055(ri)001:12335: dpal chen po'i zhal du chud pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:12337: nang du nyon mongs pa dang gzung 'dzin mi gnas par byed/
NK055(ri)001:12338: phyi rol du ru dra la sogs pa'i gdul bya
NK055(ri)001:12339: rgyud drag po rnams mi gnas par byed pa'ang 'dir
NK055(ri)001:12341: gdul bya'i dug gsum sha khrag rus pa dug gsum
NK055(ri)001:12342: du snang ba gsol bas ye shes kyi ngang du
NK055(ri)001:12343: sbyang ba dug gsum mi gnas par mdzad pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:12345: phrin las drag po'i mdzad pa gdul bya 'dul byed
NK055(ri)001:12346: du snang ba rig pa chos sku'i ngang la dngos
NK055(ri)001:12347: por grub pa rdul phra rab tsam yang med la/
NK055(ri)001:12348: spyod pa'i dngos por ma 'gags pa snang ba gnyis skad cig la lhun gyis grub ste/
NK055(ri)001:12349: snang stong gi ched 'dzin phra ba'ang ma dmigs pa
NK055(ri)001:12350: ni sangs rgyas 'ba' zhig gi spyod yul yin pas
NK055(ri)001:12351: che ba'o // ho de'i don gyis dgyes pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:12352: spyir khrag 'thung thams cad kyi gsung la bstod/
NK055(ri)001:12353: sgos su pad+ma he ru ka la bstod de/
NK055(ri)001:12355: h'u/ rngam pa'i nga ro 'brug stong ldir //
NK055(ri)001:12356: zhes pa rngam pa ni gsung spyi'i gdangs yin te/
NK055(ri)001:12357: rtogs pa rang byung gi ye shes rngam pas snod bcud kyi chos thams cad cig car du 'joms/
NK055(ri)001:12358: gnyis su med par khyab pa'i thugs rjes rngam pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:12359: snod bcud kyi chos thams cad la thugs rnam par
NK055(ri)001:12360: mi rtog pa sems can thams cad la ye khyab
NK055(ri)001:12361: tu yod pas thugs rje la cig car du spro
NK055(ri)001:12362: bsdu med pas thugs rje rngam/
NK055(ri)001:12363: mdzad pa'i phrin las rngam pa ni gdul bya la 'dul mi 'dul/
NK055(ri)001:12364: thub mi thub kyi the tshom med par ru dra
NK055(ri)001:12365: lta bu cig car du 'joms pa don de lta
NK055(ri)001:12366: bu'i phyir/ gsung rngam pa'i gdangs ngar dang bcas pas gdul bya tshar bcad pa'i phyir/
NK055(ri)001:12367: nga ro ni gsung gi rgyun de'i gzi brjid kyi
NK055(ri)001:12368: dpe ni 'brug stong ldir ba lta bu ste 'brug
NK055(ri)001:12369: gi skad la ldi ri ri zhes pa/
NK055(ri)001:12370: rgyun mi chad pa lta bu kun gyi yid du
NK055(ri)001:12371: 'ong zhing rgyun mi chad pa chos kyi sku'i rtags
NK055(ri)001:12372: so // nang na tshag chem drag po grags pa ni longs sku mtshon pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:12373: sgra'i bye brag 'gyur ba can mang por grags pa ni sprul sku'i rtags so //
NK055(ri)001:12374: thug chem ri rab 'bum snyil skad //
NK055(ri)001:12375: ces pa lha gshegs pa thug chem ni ye shes
NK055(ri)001:12376: pa spyan drang ba'i dus skad gdangs che la rnar
NK055(ri)001:12377: snyan pa yid du 'ong ba dang bcas pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:12378: phrin las mdzad pa'i thug chem ni ru dra la sogs pa 'dul ba'i las kyi dus su ste/
NK055(ri)001:12379: gtum la drag pa gzhan zhe gcod cing dpa' bkong ba dang ldan pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:12380: sprul pa 'phro ba'i thug chem ni/
NK055(ri)001:12381: gzhan don mdzad pa'i dus su sprul pa'i mtshan nyid
NK055(ri)001:12382: mi 'dra ba spro ba'i don du thug chem yang
NK055(ri)001:12383: drag zhan mi 'dra ba mang po 'phro ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:12385: ri rab 'bum dus gcig bsnyil ba'i skad chom chom 'ur 'ur chem chem shig shig la sogs te/
NK055(ri)001:12386: drag zhan che chung bye brag mang po 'byung bas gdul bya rgyud drag po rnams tshar gcod pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:12387: a la ha la'i gad rgyang che //
NK055(ri)001:12389: a la ni rngam pa'i gad mo ste/
NK055(ri)001:12390: nang du ye shes rngam pas gzung 'dzin skad cig gis rtsad gcod/
NK055(ri)001:12391: phyi rol du phrin las rngam pas gdul bya skad cig gis 'joms te/
NK055(ri)001:12392: ye shes rngam pa'i a la ni rang byung ye
NK055(ri)001:12393: shes min pa yul med pas dgyes pa lta bu'o
NK055(ri)001:12394: // mdzad pa'i phrin las dpa' ba ni/
NK055(ri)001:12395: gdul bya rgyud drag po skad cig gis 'dul ba
NK055(ri)001:12396: rngam pa'am dpa' bskyed pa lta bu la rngam pa'o
NK055(ri)001:12397: // gtum pa'i gad mo ha ha ni/
NK055(ri)001:12398: nang rig pa'i ye shes gtum pas chos thams cad ye shes su gcod de/
NK055(ri)001:12399: ye shes min pa'i yul med pas ha ha bdag kho na'o zhes pa lta bu'o //
NK055(ri)001:12401: mdzad pa'i phrin las kyis las drag po mdzad pa
NK055(ri)001:12402: la thogs pa med pa ha ha khyod lta ci
NK055(ri)001:12404: dgyes pa'i gad mo ni dgongs pa chos kyi dbyings
NK055(ri)001:12405: la dgyes pa'i gad mo mdzad pa gdul bya 'dul
NK055(ri)001:12406: ba la dgyes pa'i gad mo hi hi'o //
NK055(ri)001:12407: gad rgyangs ni yi ge gsum gyi gdangs ngar gang bar sgrogs pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:12408: de tsam nyid na'ang snang stong dbyer med pa ni che ba'i/
NK055(ri)001:12409: spyugs pa'i 'thor rlung g.yeng ba che hoh zhes pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:12410: 'khor sdud pa'i bshugs pa ni 'khor gyi ma mo rnams bsdu ba ste/
NK055(ri)001:12411: phra la snyan pa 'dur mang la yun ring ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:12412: gdug pa gdul ba'i byug pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:12413: che la sbom 'dur gyi bar mtshams sos dal 'dur
NK055(ri)001:12414: thug chem dang bcas pa gzhan skyi g.ya' bar byed
NK055(ri)001:12415: pa'o // byin phebs pa'i bshugs pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:12416: che la sbom pa rnar snyan yid du 'ong ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:12418: zhes pa ni bshugs pa brjod pa'i dus su dbugs
NK055(ri)001:12419: kyi rgyun las 'thor rlung chen po byung bas khams
NK055(ri)001:12420: gsum rangs pa ras bal rlung gis gtor ba bzhin
NK055(ri)001:12421: du 'ur mer thor shig mi gnas par mdzad pa'o
NK055(ri)001:12424: spyir khrag 'thung thams cad kyi thugs la bstod pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:12425: sgos su badz+ra he ru ka la bstod pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:12427: h'u/ khro bo shes rab 'od po che //
NK055(ri)001:12430: 'dir ngang gis khro bo dang ye shes chen po'i khro bo ste/
NK055(ri)001:12431: de nyid snod bcud kyi chos thams cad rang rig
NK055(ri)001:12432: bar gsal bar byed pa shes rab chen po nyid
NK055(ri)001:12434: des mthar 'dzin gyi lta ngan ma lus pa thams
NK055(ri)001:12435: cad rang byung ye shes kyi ngang la mi gnas
NK055(ri)001:12436: par byed pas khro bo yang yin la/
NK055(ri)001:12437: de nyid mthar thug pa nyid shes rab kyi ngo bo chos sku yin pas so //
NK055(ri)001:12438: 'od ni rang gsal dngos po med par thams cad la thogs chags med pa'i bdag nyid yin pa bzhin/
NK055(ri)001:12439: gong du bstan pa'i shes rab kyi khro bo de
NK055(ri)001:12440: rang la dngos po ma grub pas nam mkha' dang
NK055(ri)001:12441: 'dra ste sgrib byed bral ba dang /
NK055(ri)001:12442: sgrib byed med pa nyid kyis rang gsal la/
NK055(ri)001:12443: gzhan thams cad kyi yang gsal byed du gnas pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:12444: 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad la khyab cing ngo bo nyid du bzhugs pas 'od de/
NK055(ri)001:12445: de tsam du'ang 'dzin med pa ni rang byung gi
NK055(ri)001:12446: ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid yin pas che ba'o
NK055(ri)001:12447: // ye shes dkyil 'khor kun tu gsal //
NK055(ri)001:12448: zhes pa rang byung gi ye shes nyid ye shes lnga'i dkyil dang 'khor du rang snang la/
NK055(ri)001:12450: thugs ye shes lnga yis shes bya ma lus pa thams cad ye shes lnga'i ngang du mkhyen te/
NK055(ri)001:12451: thams cad ye shes lngar rdzogs pa'i ngang la de
NK055(ri)001:12452: nyid ma rtogs pa'i gdul bya khams gsum gyi sems
NK055(ri)001:12453: can thams cad kyi dus dang gnas skabs mi mkhyen
NK055(ri)001:12454: pa med la/ yul dang yul can med par rang gsal ba'i phyir kun tu gsal zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:12456: zhes pa thugs rang byung gi ye shes/
NK055(ri)001:12457: sna tshogs ye shes thig le che hoh zhes pa sna tshogs ye shes ni/
NK055(ri)001:12458: rang byung gi ye shes la ye shes bzhir shar/
NK055(ri)001:12459: de re re la yang bzhi bzhi shar bas bsam gyis mi khyab par 'phros te/
NK055(ri)001:12463: zhes pas phyogs re phyogs re nas gzhal ba ste/
NK055(ri)001:12465: rang byung gi ye shes dang drug /ye shes yin
NK055(ri)001:12466: pa la bcas bcos ma byas pa de bzhin nyid
NK055(ri)001:12468: ye shes kyi ngo bo 'di lta bu zhes yul du med pas mi gnas pa'i ye shes dang brgyad/
NK055(ri)001:12469: de la mkhyen pa gnyis cig car du rdzogs pas dgu/
NK055(ri)001:12470: kri yog gi ye shes rnams kyang rtsis pas 'dod phyogs tha snyad tsam du brjod do //
NK055(ri)001:12471: sgeg pa'i rdo rjes ni stong pa bco brgyad mtshan
NK055(ri)001:12472: nyid kyi dbang du spros bral zang ka ma yin
NK055(ri)001:12473: pas ye shes kyi ming med kyang /
NK055(ri)001:12474: gsang sngags 'di nyid du bco brgyad po rang rig par snang bas ye shes bco brgyad du gsal te/
NK055(ri)001:12478: zhes pas dngos por ma song ngam zhes na ma song ste/
NK055(ri)001:12479: rang byung ye shes su dbyer med pas ye shes/
NK055(ri)001:12480: ye shes kyi ngang du zlum pa la mi mthun pa med pas thig le/
NK055(ri)001:12481: che ba ni rnam grangs tha snyad mang por brjod kyang /
NK055(ri)001:12482: theg pa 'di nyid gzhung gis mi gnas pa'i ye shes chen por lhun rdzogs pa ni che ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:12483: ho de'i don gyis mnyes pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:12484: spyir khrag 'thung thams cad kyi yon tan la bstod pa/
NK055(ri)001:12485: sgos su rat+na he ru ka la bstod pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:12487: h'u/ khro bo'i rgyal po sprin chen po //
NK055(ri)001:12489: khro ba'i rgyal po'i ngang gi khro bo rang byung ye shes bshad pa nyid //
NK055(ri)001:12490: ngo bo gang du'ang ma grub pa 'khor ba'i mtha' las rgyal/
NK055(ri)001:12491: rnam par mi 'gag pa khro bo'i dkyil 'khor sprul
NK055(ri)001:12492: pa yang sprul dang bcas pa chos kyi dbyings dang
NK055(ri)001:12493: mnyam par shar ba mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtha'
NK055(ri)001:12494: las rgyal/ des ni rang byung gi ye shes chos sku lta bur bstan/
NK055(ri)001:12496: zhes pa longs sku ste nam mkha' gzhi dag pa las sprin gyi tshogs su chags pa dang 'dra bar/
NK055(ri)001:12497: chos kyi sku khro bo nam mkha' lta bu las longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur snang ste/
NK055(ri)001:12498: dgongs pa ngang gis khro bo ma g.yos pa las shugs kyis khro bo'i rtsal ma 'gag par snang /
NK055(ri)001:12499: de tsam nyid na chos sku las ma g.yos ma 'gag dbyer med pa nyid ni/
NK055(ri)001:12500: longs spyod rnam gnyis lhun gyis grub pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:12501: sprin gzhi ma nges pa las cir yang 'char ba
NK055(ri)001:12502: bzhin 'khor 'das dbyer med kyi ngo bo khro bo'i
NK055(ri)001:12503: longs sku gzhi ma nges pa sprin lta bu las/
NK055(ri)001:12505: zhes pa dper na nam mkha' la sprin chags/
NK055(ri)001:12506: de las char bab pas lo thog bskyed nas 'bras bur smin nas 'gro ba'i gsos su gyur ba ltar/
NK055(ri)001:12507: khro bo longs sku sprin lta bu las sprul sku
NK055(ri)001:12508: char lta bu bab nas gdul bya'i rgyu tha rgod
NK055(ri)001:12509: dang 'dra ba la char gyis rgyud brlan te/
NK055(ri)001:12510: mtho ris dang thar pa'i sa bon lo thog bskyed
NK055(ri)001:12511: nas 'bras bu smin te 'gro ba'i gsos su 'gyur
NK055(ri)001:12512: ba'o // de bas na char chen po ni khro
NK055(ri)001:12513: bo so so'i dkyil 'khor so so'i sprul pa dang
NK055(ri)001:12514: bcas pas gdul bya tha dad la snang nas rang
NK055(ri)001:12515: rang gi blo ngo dang mthun par don mdzad pa'o
NK055(ri)001:12516: ba'o // // sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor de dag kyang
NK055(ri)001:12517: gdul bya ma zad kyi bar du zad pa med
NK055(ri)001:12518: ba'o // // pa'i phyir/ dkyil 'khor yid bzhin 'byung ba'i gter //
NK055(ri)001:12520: gsang sngags phyi nang pha rgyud ma rgyud rtsa ba
NK055(ri)001:12521: dang yan lag rgyud re re la yang rgyas bsdus
NK055(ri)001:12522: kyi bye brag mang po rnams gdul bya'i blo dang
NK055(ri)001:12523: mthun par 'char ba'i/ yid bzhin 'byung ba'i gter ni/
NK055(ri)001:12524: gdul bya'i blo dang 'thad pa bzhin du 'byung ba la 'di mi shar bya ba med pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:12525: rgyun chad med pa'i phyir gter zhes gsungs so //
NK055(ri)001:12526: sna tshogs khros pa'i thig le che //
NK055(ri)001:12527: zhes pa rang byung gi ye shes gang du yang
NK055(ri)001:12528: ma grub cing cir yang 'char bas sna tshogs khros
NK055(ri)001:12529: pa zhes bya la/ yang khro bo'i dkyil 'khor sna
NK055(ri)001:12530: tshogs snang ba rnams gdul bya'i blo'i dgos pa skong
NK055(ri)001:12531: ba'i yon tan sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i shugs kyis
NK055(ri)001:12534: zhes pa ma 'gags par snang tsam nyid na ngang
NK055(ri)001:12535: gis khro ba'i chos skur dbyer med cing spros mtha'
NK055(ri)001:12536: dang bral bas thig le che zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:12537: ho de'i don gyis mnyes pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:12538: khrag 'thung thams cad kyi phrin las la bstod pa/
NK055(ri)001:12539: sgos su karma he ru ka la bstod pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:12541: h'u/ bdud kun gyi ni bdag chen po //
NK055(ri)001:12542: zhes pa bdud kun ni bzhi ste/
NK055(ri)001:12546: lha'i bu'i bdud da nga bzhi'o //
NK055(ri)001:12548: bdud bzhi po ngang gis khro bo'i dgongs pa rig
NK055(ri)001:12549: pa'i ngang du dbyer med pas de'i ngang la zag
NK055(ri)001:12550: pa'i phung po lnga ma dmigs pas phung po'i bdud
NK055(ri)001:12551: rang sar dag /de lta bu'i dgongs pa la bdag
NK055(ri)001:12552: tu grub pa ma dmigs pas gzhan dag /gnyis 'dzin
NK055(ri)001:12553: dag pas nyon mongs pa chags sdang ma dmigs pas
NK055(ri)001:12554: nyon mongs pa'i bdud rang sar dag /de lta bu'i
NK055(ri)001:12555: ye shes la skad cig ma dang bral bas skye
NK055(ri)001:12556: 'jig med/ des ni 'chi bdag gi bdud dag /bdag nyid chen po'i ngang la gzhan pa ma dmigs/
NK055(ri)001:12557: des gnyen po dang bral bas lha'i bu'i bdud bcom/
NK055(ri)001:12558: rang rig pa bdag nyid chen po'i ngang la gzhan med pas gnyen po med/
NK055(ri)001:12559: de bas na bdud kun gyi bdag nyid du gyur
NK055(ri)001:12560: pas spangs pa med par rig pa byang chub sems
NK055(ri)001:12561: su rdzogs te/ bdag nyid chen por mnga' bsgyur yang
NK055(ri)001:12562: de tsam du yang 'dzin pa med pa ni bdag
NK055(ri)001:12564: bdud kyi bdud de bdud rnams 'joms //
NK055(ri)001:12565: zhes pa bdud dang po ni ru dra ste mtho ris dang thar pa'i bar gcod du byed pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:12567: zhes pa dpal chen pos de 'joms te/
NK055(ri)001:12568: ru dra sde dang bcas pa spyod pas bdud bzhi btul ba'i ngos nas bsgral te gnas spar nas/
NK055(ri)001:12569: yang gzugs brnyan tsam zhig sku las phyungs te phyi
NK055(ri)001:12570: rol du lam par snang ba ni bcom zhes bya'o
NK055(ri)001:12572: zhes pa 'jigs pa'i tshogs ni ru dra nag po sde dpung dang bcas pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:12573: des khams gsum pa rnams bsad bcad brlagsa log lta
NK055(ri)001:12574: dgu la bkod nas mun pa'i rgyal khams su byas
NK055(ri)001:12577: dpal chen pos de dag sde dpung dang bcas pa bsgral te mi gnas par byas nas/
NK055(ri)001:12578: dgra'i dam pa gnyen gyi dam par gyur pa lta bu ni 'jigs byed pa zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:12579: 'jigs byed chen po thig le che hoh zhes bya ba ni/
NK055(ri)001:12580: ru dra bdag 'dzin gyi stobs rgyas pa'i rtsal las
NK055(ri)001:12581: snang ba'i dregs tshogs ma lus pa bsgral te mi
NK055(ri)001:12582: gnas par byas pas na 'jigs byed do //
NK055(ri)001:12583: chen po thig le che ni/
NK055(ri)001:12584: ngang gis khro ni ye shes kyi mdzad pa lhag
NK055(ri)001:12585: pa'i chos sku nyid las ma g.yos par spros pa
NK055(ri)001:12586: dang bral bas thig le che hoh zhes so //
NK055(ri)001:12587: ngo bo nyid kyi rigs kyi yum bzhi'am dbang chen
NK055(ri)001:12588: la bstod pa'i sgo nas bstod pa'i zhabs bsdu ba
NK055(ri)001:12590: ni/ h'u/ rdo rje brag chen sra ba po //
NK055(ri)001:12592: ngang khro shugs khro gnyis kyis bsdus pa'i khro bo'i
NK055(ri)001:12593: dkyil 'khor thams cad snang stong dbyer med pa gzhig
NK055(ri)001:12595: mi phyed pa'i don gyis kyang rdo rje/
NK055(ri)001:12596: des gnyis 'dzin gyi dngos po thams cad ye shes
NK055(ri)001:12597: de nyid kyi ngang du 'joms pas kyang rdo rje
NK055(ri)001:12598: ste/ dper na mes bsreg pa lta bu'o //
NK055(ri)001:12600: zhes pa rdo rje lta bu nyid mi 'gag pa'i rtsal las/
NK055(ri)001:12601: brag chen sra ba po ni/
NK055(ri)001:12602: brag ni sa ste 'byung ba sa lta bur yang snang /
NK055(ri)001:12603: snang yang rdo rje lta bu'i ngang las ma g.yos/
NK055(ri)001:12604: snang stong dbyer med pa ni khro mo'i dus su bud+d+ha kro d+hi shwa ri ma'i skur snang ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:12605: yang rdo rje lta bu nyid mi 'gag pa'i rtsal las/
NK055(ri)001:12606: rdo rje chu bo sdud chen po //
NK055(ri)001:12607: zhes pa la sogs pa 'byung ba chu lta bur yang snang /
NK055(ri)001:12608: snang yang rdo rje lta bu las ma g.yos te
NK055(ri)001:12609: dbyer med pa nyid rat+na kro d+hi shwa ri mar
NK055(ri)001:12610: snang ste/ sdud chen po ni sangs rgyas kyi ye shes thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid do //
NK055(ri)001:12611: yang rdo rje lta bu nyid mi 'gag pa'i rtsal las 'byung ba me lta bur yang snang /
NK055(ri)001:12612: snang yang rdo rje lta bu'i chos nyid las ma g.yos/
NK055(ri)001:12613: snang stong dbyer med pa nyid pad+ma kro d+hi shwa
NK055(ri)001:12614: ri mar snang ste so sor rtogs pa'i ye shes
NK055(ri)001:12615: spyi dang rang gi mtshan nyid rang byung gi ye
NK055(ri)001:12616: shes su gsal ba la ni kun 'bar che zhes
NK055(ri)001:12617: bya'o // rdo rje lta bu mi 'gag pa'i rtsal las 'byung ba rlung lta bur yang snang /
NK055(ri)001:12618: snang yang rdo rje lta bu las ma g.yos/
NK055(ri)001:12619: snang stong dbyer med pa nyid karma khrag 'thung gi yum kro d+h+ai shwa ri mar snang ste/
NK055(ri)001:12621: rlung gis kun nas kun tu bskyod bzhin du bya
NK055(ri)001:12622: ba grub pa'i ye shes kyis gdul bya gong nas
NK055(ri)001:12623: gong du 'bras bu la bskyod pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:12624: badz+ra kro d+h+ai shwa ri yum nam mkha' ni 'byung
NK055(ri)001:12625: ba spyi khyab tu gnas pa don gyis tshang bar
NK055(ri)001:12626: shes par bya'o // yang na dur khrod he ru
NK055(ri)001:12627: ka'i bzhugs gnas 'og gzhi'i dur khrod kyi 'byung ba
NK055(ri)001:12628: bzhi po yang tha mal ba'i snang ba bzhin/
NK055(ri)001:12629: gzung 'dzin gyi yul dang yul can lta bu ma yin te/
NK055(ri)001:12630: dpal he ru ka'i thugs rig pa nyid rang snang
NK055(ri)001:12631: ba ye shes rdo rje'i ngo bo yin par bstod
NK055(ri)001:12632: pa ste/ rdo rje lta bu'i ye shes nyid mi
NK055(ri)001:12633: 'gag pa'i rtsal las brag chen sra ba po m+aam
NK055(ri)001:12634: sa'i sa gzhi ltar snang yang ngo bo ye shes
NK055(ri)001:12636: rang byung ye shes rdo rje lta bu mi 'gag
NK055(ri)001:12637: pa las chu bo rak+ta'i rgya mtsho ltar yang snang
NK055(ri)001:12638: / ye shes rdo rje las ma g.yos/
NK055(ri)001:12639: rdo rje lta bu'i rtsal las kun 'bar che me'i dkyil 'khor lta bur snang /
NK055(ri)001:12640: ye shes rdo rje las ma g.yos/
NK055(ri)001:12641: rang rig mi 'gag pa'i rtsal las 'byung ba rlung gi dkyil 'khor lta bur snang /
NK055(ri)001:12642: ngo bo ye shes rdo rje las ma g.yos/
NK055(ri)001:12643: des na 'byung ba bzhi la bstod pa yang zhar la bshad pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:12644: zhes ched du glur blangs so //
NK055(ri)001:12645: zhes pa rgyud 'byung ba'i dus kyi gtso 'khor rangs
NK055(ri)001:12646: pas rang la rang bstod kyi tshul du glu blangs
NK055(ri)001:12647: pa ste go phye ba'i 'khor gyis ched du brjod
NK055(ri)001:12648: pa'o // des na rjes 'jug pas kyang dgyes pas glu blang bar bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:12649: gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/
NK055(ri)001:12650: khro bo la bstod pa'i le'u zhes pa/
NK055(ri)001:12651: 'bras bu mthar phyin khro bo'i dkyil 'khor yin la/
NK055(ri)001:12652: phyi rabs pas lhag pa ting nge 'dzin khro bo'i dkyil 'khor bstod pa yang /
NK055(ri)001:12655: yon tan ji ltar gnas pa de nyid kyi tshul du bstod pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:12656: le'u nyi shu gcig pa bshad pa'o////da ni le'u tha ma gdams shing gtad pa bstan te/
NK055(ri)001:12657: rgyud kyi gzhung le'u nyi shu rtsa gnyis las/
NK055(ri)001:12658: le'u dang po 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad rang
NK055(ri)001:12659: bzhin lhun gyis grub pa 'bras bu'i dkyil 'khor phun
NK055(ri)001:12661: rang bzhin gsang ba'i snying po'i don mngon du snang bar bya ba'i phyir/
NK055(ri)001:12662: ston pa kun tu bzang po yab yum gyis gleng bslang ba rgyud snang ba'i rkyen/
NK055(ri)001:12663: le'u smad byang chub sems rnam lnga rgyud kyi dngos
NK055(ri)001:12664: po shes bya'i don de'i sngon du 'gro ba gnyis
NK055(ri)001:12665: su med pa'i thugs rje chen pos chos thams cad
NK055(ri)001:12666: la khyab pa ngo bo nyid kyi 'brel ba bstan/
NK055(ri)001:12667: rgyud kyi don thun mong ma yin pa de go phye ba'i 'khor la snang bar bya ba'i phyir/
NK055(ri)001:12668: le'u gsum pa'i stod du thun mong du sprul pa'i sku'i gleng gzhi bstan/
NK055(ri)001:12669: ston pas bstan pa theg pa lnga gsungs te/
NK055(ri)001:12670: chos thams cad gtan la dbab pa zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:12671: thun mong gi theg pa de dag gis gsang sngags kyi snod dag par byas pa lta bu'am/
NK055(ri)001:12672: sa gzhi phun sum tshogs pa lta bu'i phyir rten
NK055(ri)001:12673: dag par byas nas bcud blugs pa lta bu'i rgyud
NK055(ri)001:12674: kyi sdud pa po gsang ba'i bdag po chen pos/
NK055(ri)001:12675: snod khyad par can sa bcu pa'i byang chub sems
NK055(ri)001:12676: dpa' dam pa'i rigs can lnga la sogs pa rnams
NK055(ri)001:12677: la brgyud nas snang ba ste/
NK055(ri)001:12678: sprul pa'i sku zhal bzhugs pa'i dus su skyes bu
NK055(ri)001:12679: chen po rnams la gsang sngags snang ba'i tshod ma
NK055(ri)001:12680: yin/ gdul bya rnams kyi spyod yul ma yin pas mi snang ba ni/
NK055(ri)001:12681: ston pa gcig la bstan pa gnyis mi srid pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:12682: sprul pa'i skus gsang sngags nang pa gsang ba ston pa dang bstan pa mi mthun pa'i phyir yin la/
NK055(ri)001:12683: sprul pa'i skus theg pa 'og ma rnams gsungs/
NK055(ri)001:12684: gdul byas nyams su blangs snod dag par byas pa
NK055(ri)001:12685: lta bu la bcud blug par bya ba lta bur
NK055(ri)001:12687: des na theg pa dgu yang gdul bya gcig gi
NK055(ri)001:12688: lam gang zag gi rim pa ste skas kyi gdang
NK055(ri)001:12689: bu lta bu'o // de ltar rang bzhin gsang ba'i
NK055(ri)001:12690: snying po mtshon par byed pa'i rjod byed khyad par
NK055(ri)001:12691: can de rten gyi gang zag phyi rabs pa rim
NK055(ri)001:12692: gyis 'jug pa rnams la tshig gis bstan dgos/
NK055(ri)001:12693: tshig yi ge la rag las pas le'u bzhi pa yi ge phreng ba'i 'khor lo bstan/
NK055(ri)001:12694: zhar la rtog tshogs bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis ye nas bud+d+ha'i ngo bo nyid yin par bstan/
NK055(ri)001:12695: le'u lnga pas yi ge la brten te thun mong gi dngos grub bsgrub pa bstan/
NK055(ri)001:12696: mchog gi dngos grub kyang zur tsam bstan/
NK055(ri)001:12697: le'u drug pa phyi rabs kyi rnal 'byor pas nyams
NK055(ri)001:12698: su blang ba'i ngo bo bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi
NK055(ri)001:12699: lhag pa ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor bstan/
NK055(ri)001:12700: bdun pas bskyed pa'i sngags dang spyan drangs pa la sogs pa'i sngags bstan/
NK055(ri)001:12701: brgyad pas lha'i phyag rgya bzhi shes par bya ba dang /
NK055(ri)001:12703: le'u dgu pas de dag gi sngon du 'gro ba
NK055(ri)001:12704: dbang la dgos pa'i lhag pa rdul tshon gyi dkyil
NK055(ri)001:12705: 'khor bstan/ rgyud kyi gzhung gi don rnal 'byor pa'i
NK055(ri)001:12706: nyams len zhi khro gnyis yin pas khro bo'ang 'chad
NK055(ri)001:12707: par 'gyur bas mgo bsgre zur tsam bstan/
NK055(ri)001:12708: le'u bcu pas dbang gi rim pa rnams rgyas par bstan/
NK055(ri)001:12709: bcu gcig pa dang bcu gnyis pa gnyis kyis zhi
NK055(ri)001:12710: ba'i ting nge 'dzin goms nas mchog bsgrub pa'i phyir
NK055(ri)001:12711: tshogs bsgrub pa 'bras bu dang bcas pa bstan/
NK055(ri)001:12712: khro bo'i tshogs bsgrub pa'ang mgo bsgre tsam/
NK055(ri)001:12713: le'u bcu gsum pas rgyud kyi gzhung gi lam bskyed rim dang rdzogs rim gnyis dang /
NK055(ri)001:12714: rgyud kyi don dkyil 'khor bcu gnyis kyi mtshan nyid bstan/
NK055(ri)001:12715: le'u bcu bzhi pas tshogs bsgrub kyi zhi ba glu'i dkyil 'khor ston/
NK055(ri)001:12716: mchod pa dang phrin las 'og nas zur tsam ston kyang /
NK055(ri)001:12717: de yan chad du zhi ba tshar nas/
NK055(ri)001:12718: bco lnga pa zhi bas mi 'dul ba'i ru dra la sogs pa'i rgyud drag po rnams 'dul ba'i phyir/
NK055(ri)001:12719: drug pa kun tu bzang po ngang gis khro ba chos sku'i ngang las ma g.yos kyang /
NK055(ri)001:12720: shugs kyis khro ba ru dra'i ngo la snang bas
NK055(ri)001:12721: khro bo rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor du mngon par
NK055(ri)001:12722: 'du mdzad pa/ pho bsgral te 'dul ba dang /
NK055(ri)001:12723: mo sbyor te 'dul thabs gnyis kyis mdzad pa mthar phyin pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:12724: sngon byung sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa/
NK055(ri)001:12725: rjes 'jug rnal 'byor pas nyams su blang ba'i phyir/
NK055(ri)001:12726: dkyil 'khor bskyed pa la sngags dgod pas bcu drug pa khro bo'i sngags bstan/
NK055(ri)001:12727: bcu bdun pas sku'i dkyil 'khor dang phyag rgya bstan/
NK055(ri)001:12728: bco brgyad pa la zhi khro gnyis ka la dgos pa'i mchod pa bstan/
NK055(ri)001:12729: bcu dgu pas zhi khro thun mong gi dam tshig ston/
NK055(ri)001:12730: nyi shu pas zhi khro gnyis ka'i lam gyi bar
NK055(ri)001:12731: skabs su dgos pa'i phrin las rnam pa bzhi dang
NK055(ri)001:12732: / zhar la khro bo dngos kyi phrin las bro gar dang lhag ma'i las bstan to //
NK055(ri)001:12733: nyi shu rtsa gcig pas khro bo'i glu'i mchod pa ston to //
NK055(ri)001:12734: de ltar le'u nyi shu rtsa gcig yan chad kyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa/
NK055(ri)001:12735: rnal 'byor pa'i lam gyi ngo bo zhi khro gnyis
NK055(ri)001:12736: kyi bya ba'i sgo nas 'bras bu'i ngo bo le'u
NK055(ri)001:12737: dang por bkod pa dang 'dra ba'i kun tu bzang
NK055(ri)001:12738: po'i ngo bo nyid mngon du snang bar bya ba'i
NK055(ri)001:12739: thabs rjod byed tshig gi rgyud bstan nas/
NK055(ri)001:12740: go phye ba'i 'khor gyi don du mi nub cing
NK055(ri)001:12741: dar ba'i phyir dngos su sdud pa po la gtad
NK055(ri)001:12742: pa dang / shugs kyis go phye ba'i 'khor la gtad pa gnyis bstan pa'i phyir/
NK055(ri)001:12743: le'u nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa ste rgyud gsum las na rang bzhin gzhi'i rgyud shas che'o //
NK055(ri)001:12744: 'dir rgyud mi nub pa'i phyir gtad pa yin pas/
NK055(ri)001:12745: rgyud kyi dngos po bcu la sbyar rgyu chen po med kyang /
NK055(ri)001:12746: lam pa las dang po'i zur tsam ston/
NK055(ri)001:12748: bsdus na rgyud kyi don mi nub pa'i phyir/
NK055(ri)001:12749: gang zag gnyis la rim pa bzhin du gtad pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:12751: de nas zhes pa la sogs te/
NK055(ri)001:12752: tshig don gnyis ka nyi shu rtsa gcig pa la 'brel to //
NK055(ri)001:12753: de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la zhes pa/
NK055(ri)001:12754: lhan cig pa'i 'khor gyi dbang du byas na/
NK055(ri)001:12755: de bzhin gshegs pa nyid ni sdud pa po rdo rje sems dapa'o //
NK055(ri)001:12756: shugs la go phye ba'i 'khor yang gzung ste/
NK055(ri)001:12757: ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa nyid ces bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:12760: zhes pa gsang ba ni rang bzhin gsang ba'i snying por smrar med cing spyod yul dang bral/
NK055(ri)001:12761: chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid rgyud kyi mtshan dngos so //
NK055(ri)001:12762: sngags ni yon tan thams cad 'byung ba'i gzhi ste/
NK055(ri)001:12763: rang bzhin gsang ba'i snying po ma rtogs kyang rang
NK055(ri)001:12764: snang ba phyi nang gi chos rten 'brel gyi nus
NK055(ri)001:12765: pa dgos pa skong ba thams cad do //
NK055(ri)001:12766: lam gyi dus su'ang lam 'og ma nas gong mar
NK055(ri)001:12767: 'pho ba dang 'bras bu la sbyor ba'i yon tan
NK055(ri)001:12768: thams cad do // 'bras bu'i dus su mdzad pa
NK055(ri)001:12769: gnyis gdul bya'i dgos pa skong ba mthar thug pa
NK055(ri)001:12770: thams cad do // med pa'o // rgyal po ni mtha' gnyis las kyang rgyal bas r+aa dza ste/
NK055(ri)001:12771: gsang ba dang sngags kyi don gnyis so //
NK055(ri)001:12772: brjod bya mtshon par byed pa'i rjod byed kyi tshig 'di nyid kyang rgyal po ste/
NK055(ri)001:12773: 'dul ba mdo sde chos mngon dang //
NK055(ri)001:12774: dam tshig bsgrub dang grub pa dang //
NK055(ri)001:12775: sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rgyud //
NK055(ri)001:12776: phyogs bcu rnams su rab grags pa //
NK055(ri)001:12777: gsang ba'i snying po las 'phros te //
NK055(ri)001:12778: rang bzhin gsang ba'i snying po 'di //
NK055(ri)001:12779: sde snod kun dang rgyud kun gyi //
NK055(ri)001:12783: 'di/ zhes pa dngos po nye bar bzung ba ste brjod
NK055(ri)001:12784: bya rjod byed mngon du gyur pa 'di nyid do
NK055(ri)001:12786: zhes pa don brtan par bzung ba lhan cig pa'i sdud pa po la shas che ste/
NK055(ri)001:12787: phyi rabs pa'ang lta ba kha lta ma yin par blo la gnad du lon pa/
NK055(ri)001:12788: sgom pa dmigs 'dzin dang bral ba goms pa de'i
NK055(ri)001:12789: ngang la spyod pa lhun grub tu 'char ba ni
NK055(ri)001:12790: mi nub par brtan par gzung ba ste go phye
NK055(ri)001:12791: ba'i 'khor la gdams pa shas che'o //
NK055(ri)001:12794: sdud pa po la brjod pa ltar snang yang go phye ba'i 'khor gyi ched du brjod pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:12795: gtad pa'i gzhi rgyud kyi don snang ba bzhir gdams pa las rang bzhin gyi snang ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:12796: chos thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas par bstan pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:12798: phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i rang bzhin 'di //
NK055(ri)001:12801: zhes pa spyir gsang ba'i snying po'i don brjod pa tshar nas/
NK055(ri)001:12802: de'i ngang la shes bya gzhi'i snang ba/
NK055(ri)001:12803: ma rtogs pa 'khrul pa'i snang ba/
NK055(ri)001:12804: rtogs par bya ba'i thabs gdul bya lam gyi snang ba/
NK055(ri)001:12805: rtogs pa'i 'bras bu bde bar gshegs pa'i snang ba bzhi/
NK055(ri)001:12806: sems su dbyer med pa'i ngo bo dngos po bzhir
NK055(ri)001:12807: kha khar 'dzin pa'ang ma dmigs pa don 'di las
NK055(ri)001:12808: lhag pa med ces dmigs pa thams cad dang bral
NK055(ri)001:12810: de ston pa'i phyir lhan cig pa dang go phye ba'i 'khor gnyis la 'bod pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:12811: bos pa'i don ci yin zhe na/
NK055(ri)001:12812: phyogs bcus bsdus pa'i chos thams cad dang /
NK055(ri)001:12813: dus bzhis bsdus pa'i gzhal bya 'khor 'das kyi chos thams kyi snang tshul gyi/
NK055(ri)001:12815: zhes pa rang bzhin la chos can gyi rang bzhin dang /
NK055(ri)001:12816: chos nyid kyi rang bzhin gnyis/
NK055(ri)001:12817: theg pa 'og mas kun rdzob dang don dam zhes gnyis su phyes nas so sor bstan kyang /
NK055(ri)001:12818: theg pa 'di nyid kyi skabs su bden pa dbyer med du ston pas/
NK055(ri)001:12819: snang stong dbyer med dus mnyam pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:12820: 'di nyid kyi rnal 'byor pa'i snang ba ste so
NK055(ri)001:12821: so skye bo'i gzung 'dzin gyi yul las grol ba'o
NK055(ri)001:12822: // des ni snod bcud kyi snang ba 'di rig pa snang /
NK055(ri)001:12823: snang bya snang byed med mnyam pa nyid kyi dbyings
NK055(ri)001:12824: las rang snang ba tsam las ni rang bzhin zhes
NK055(ri)001:12825: bya'o // 'di dngos po nye bar bzung ba ni rnal 'byor pa'i yul lo //
NK055(ri)001:12826: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid/
NK055(ri)001:12827: zhes pa theg pa 'di nyid kyi skabs su snang
NK055(ri)001:12828: grags kyi chos thams cad rtog pa bzhi bcu rtsa
NK055(ri)001:12829: gnyis su 'dus la/ de nyid snang stong dbyer med pa'i don gyis ma 'gags pa sku'i dkyil 'khor/
NK055(ri)001:12830: ma dmigs pa ye shes su rkyen gyis ma bsgrubs par ye nas gnas pa'i rang bzhin/
NK055(ri)001:12831: gsang ba'i snying po'i ngo bo nyid de/
NK055(ri)001:12833: zhes pa ye nas ma bcos pa'i don sems kyi ye shes ma nor ba'i ngo bo nyid ni/
NK055(ri)001:12834: ma bcos pa'i de bzhin nyid dam/
NK055(ri)001:12835: snang stong dang bral bas lhun gyis grub pa'i de bzhin nyid dam/
NK055(ri)001:12836: spros pa'i mtshan ma thams cad dang bral bas ma nor ba'i de bzhin nyid de/
NK055(ri)001:12837: gnas tshul gyi don rtogs pa mthar phyin pa ni kun tu bzang po'i ngo bo nyid do //
NK055(ri)001:12838: chos thams cad de nyid du thag chod pa la gzhi lam 'bras bu'i tha snyad dang bral ba ni/
NK055(ri)001:12839: gsang ba'i snying po'i ngo bo nyid de lhag ma
NK055(ri)001:12840: zur tsam yang ma lus par bstan pa de ni
NK055(ri)001:12841: rang bzhin gyi snang ba yin tshul te mi 'gyur
NK055(ri)001:12842: bar gdams pa'o // 'khrul pa'i snang ba ma rtogs pas bcings par bstan pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:12845: lam gyi rgyud kyi gdams pa yang yin/
NK055(ri)001:12846: snang ba'i dgos pa'ang yin te/
NK055(ri)001:12847: gzhi gdams pa'i don gong du bstan pa nyid yin mod kyi/
NK055(ri)001:12848: lhan cig skyes pa'i ma rig pa'i bdag las byung
NK055(ri)001:12849: ba'i kun tu brtags pa'i ma rig pa 'khrul pa'i
NK055(ri)001:12850: snang ba gzung 'dzin rang ga ma snod bcud kyi
NK055(ri)001:12851: chos la blo phyin ci log gi rtog pa'i thog
NK055(ri)001:12852: tu gnas na mi 'gyur ba ni 'chel ba ste/
NK055(ri)001:12853: thog ma med pa nas 'chel ba la goms pa
NK055(ri)001:12854: stobs su gyur pa'i 'dzin pa la ni rnam rtog
NK055(ri)001:12855: ces bya ste/ skad cig ma'i rgyun zhags pa dang
NK055(ri)001:12856: 'dra bas 'khrul pa'i ngang la bcings pas 'gro drug
NK055(ri)001:12857: gi gnas so sor zin nas thar bar dka' ba'o
NK055(ri)001:12858: ces bya ste/ // de'i rgyu gzhi'i don bdag nyid
NK055(ri)001:12859: chen po mi shes pa dag zhen pa bkrol ba
NK055(ri)001:12860: ces bya ste/ // nyid kyis/ khams gsum gyi 'du
NK055(ri)001:12861: shes log pa las grol nas grol thar pa gnyis
NK055(ri)001:12863: thugs rje chen pos gdul bya'i snang ba lam gyi
NK055(ri)001:12864: rgyud theg pa rim dgu blo tshod dang sbyar nas
NK055(ri)001:12865: gsungs pa'o // 'o na 'dir gsang ba'i snying po'i skabs yin pas/
NK055(ri)001:12866: theg pa 'og ma smos pa la dgos pa med do snyam na/
NK055(ri)001:12867: theg pa 'og ma rnams gsang ba'i snying po 'di nyid kyi lam yin par bstan pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:12868: sa rnams khyad par bkod pa yang //
NK055(ri)001:12870: sa ni rten bskyed kyi don gyis sa ste/
NK055(ri)001:12871: lam gyi ngo bo gang yin pa gcig la gnas nas yon tan gong ma bskyed pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:12872: rnams ni nges 'byung gi theg pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:12873: de yang rang bzhin gsang ba'i snying po rtogs dka'
NK055(ri)001:12874: bas sbyangs pa chung ba phal gyi yul ma yin
NK055(ri)001:12875: yang / skas la 'dzegs pa dang 'dra bar lam
NK055(ri)001:12876: rim pas sbyangs nas myong du rung ba'i phyir nges
NK055(ri)001:12877: 'byung gi theg pa rnams bstan te/
NK055(ri)001:12878: lha dang mi'i theg pa dge ba bcu dang tshangs
NK055(ri)001:12879: pa'i gnas bzhis ngan song gsum las nges par 'byung
NK055(ri)001:12882: rang sangs rgyas kyis nyan thos las 'byung /
NK055(ri)001:12883: byang chub sems dpas nyan thos rang rgyal las 'byung /
NK055(ri)001:12884: rgyu'i theg pas gsang sngags su sbyor ba yin kyang /
NK055(ri)001:12885: gsang sngags phyi pa gsum rim pa bzhin du sbyangs nas rim pa bzhin du sbyor bas/
NK055(ri)001:12887: sa rnams khyad par bkod pa yang //
NK055(ri)001:12888: gsang ba'i snying por 'gro ba'i lam //
NK055(ri)001:12889: zhes pa 'di nyid rtogs par bya ba'i lam stegs te/
NK055(ri)001:12890: lam gyi bye brag rnams 'di nyid kyi khyad par las snang ba kho na'o //
NK055(ri)001:12891: 'bras bu bde bar gshegs pa'i snang ba ni/
NK055(ri)001:12892: ye shes ngo mtshar rab 'byams kyis //
NK055(ri)001:12894: lam nyams su blangs pa'i 'bras bu lta bu yin te/
NK055(ri)001:12895: rang byung gi ye shes kun tu bzang po'i ngo
NK055(ri)001:12896: bo ni sku ngo mtshar snang grags kyi chos thams
NK055(ri)001:12897: cad kun tu bzang po'i sku'i ngo bo nyid du
NK055(ri)001:12898: snang ba snang stong gi mtha' dang bral ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:12899: bem rig gi sgra thams cad rig pa'i ngang la
NK055(ri)001:12900: grags stong dbyer med par kun tu bzang po'i gsung
NK055(ri)001:12901: ngo mtshar ba'o // dran rig gi tshogs thams cad
NK055(ri)001:12902: rang snang ba rig stong dbyer med par kun tu
NK055(ri)001:12903: bzang po'i thugs su sangs rgyas par ngo mtshar ba'o
NK055(ri)001:12905: zhes pa snod bcud kyi chos thams cad mi zad
NK055(ri)001:12906: pa rgyan gyi 'khor lo nyi shu rtsa lnga lhun
NK055(ri)001:12907: gyis grub pa las ma gtogs pa'i/
NK055(ri)001:12908: tha snyad gzhan bcad pa ni yi ge'i 'khor lo tshogs chen gyi sa'o //
NK055(ri)001:12909: de lta bu'i bdag nyid kun tu bzang pos/
NK055(ri)001:12910: don du mi 'gyur yongs ma gsungs //
NK055(ri)001:12911: zhes pa gdul bya'i don du mi 'gyur ba'i chos kun tu bzang pos yongs su ma gsungs te/
NK055(ri)001:12912: theg par mi 'du ba'i snang grags kyi chos thams
NK055(ri)001:12913: cad kyang gdul bya'i don du 'gyur ba kun tu
NK055(ri)001:12914: bzang po'i ngo bo nyid do //
NK055(ri)001:12915: rgyud don rtogs pa'i skyes bu'i yon tan/
NK055(ri)001:12916: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi //
NK055(ri)001:12917: zhes pa rgyud kyi che ba brjod pa'i ngos nas
NK055(ri)001:12918: sdud pa po yon tan smra ba la gtad pa'ang
NK055(ri)001:12919: shugs kyis yin te/ phyogs bcu na bzhugs shing dus
NK055(ri)001:12920: bzhir gshegs pa ma lus pa thams cad ni rgyal
NK055(ri)001:12921: ba kun tu bzang po'i ngo bo nyid de/
NK055(ri)001:12922: de nyid kyi dgongs pa phyin ci ma log par
NK055(ri)001:12923: sgro skur dang bral bar mngon du snang ba ni
NK055(ri)001:12924: brjod bya rjod byed dbyer med pa'i gsung chos kyi
NK055(ri)001:12925: phyag rgya rang bzhin gyi rgyud 'di nyid rig cing
NK055(ri)001:12926: rtogs par dka' bas gsang chen/
NK055(ri)001:12927: theg pa dgu 'di nyid las snang bas snying po ste rgyud 'di yin no //
NK055(ri)001:12928: rtogs nas smra bar gang byed pa //
NK055(ri)001:12929: zhes pa rang bzhin gsang ba'i snying po'i don phyin
NK055(ri)001:12930: ci ma log par rtogs nas gzhan la don de
NK055(ri)001:12931: 'chad par byed pa gang yin pa de nyid/
NK055(ri)001:12933: zhes pa kun tu bzang po'i dgongs pa brjod par
NK055(ri)001:12934: nus pa phyi rabs pa la kun tu bzang po
NK055(ri)001:12935: mngon du snang ba dang 'dra bar bstan pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:12936: de ni rig pa rang rtsal gyi dbang yang rdzogs pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:12938: gang gi sems kyi de kho na //
NK055(ri)001:12939: gsang ba'i snying po nges rnyed na //
NK055(ri)001:12940: dbang rnams kun gyi mchog yin te //
NK055(ri)001:12941: srid pa gsum gyis de dbang bskur //
NK055(ri)001:12942: zhes pas shugs las lung bstan pa yang yin no //
NK055(ri)001:12944: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la //
NK055(ri)001:12946: phyogs bcur bzhugs shing dus bzhir gshegs pa thams cad la/
NK055(ri)001:12947: rang bzhin gsang ba'i snying po mngon du snang ba
NK055(ri)001:12948: brjod bya dang rjod byed 'di las lhag pa gzhan
NK055(ri)001:12950: dgongs pa thams cad kyi zhe phugs su bstan pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:12952: sgro dang skur pa zhi ba yi //
NK055(ri)001:12953: zhes pa rang bzhin gsang ba'i snying po med pa la yod pa'i sgro ma btags/
NK055(ri)001:12954: yod pa la med pa'i skur pa ma btab/
NK055(ri)001:12955: sgro skur gyi mthas ma gos pas zhi ba zhes bya la/
NK055(ri)001:12957: gsang ba'i snying po de kho na //
NK055(ri)001:12958: zhes pa rtogs dka' bas gsang ba/
NK055(ri)001:12960: ma nor bas de kho na nyid/
NK055(ri)001:12961: thugs chos nyid kyi ngo bo de/
NK055(ri)001:12963: zhes pa gzhi lam 'bras bu gsum dbyer med pa
NK055(ri)001:12964: sgro skur dang bral ba nges pa'i lung nyid thams
NK055(ri)001:12965: cad la khyab cing rang snang ba'i dbyings nas gdul
NK055(ri)001:12966: bya'i ngo la rgyud snang ba la phyung zhes tha
NK055(ri)001:12968: rang bzhin rgyud gsang ba'i snying po ni lam gyi rgyud thams cad kyi 'byung khungs su gyur pas/
NK055(ri)001:12969: des na rgyud 'di nyid kyang snang ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:12970: nges pa'i lung zhes kyang bya/
NK055(ri)001:12971: mngon du phyung ba'i lung zhes kyang bya/
NK055(ri)001:12972: des na sdud pa po la zungs shig par gdams pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:12973: de ni nges par lung bstan te //
NK055(ri)001:12976: zhes pa rang bzhin gsang ba'i snying po'i don phyi
NK055(ri)001:12977: ci ma log par rtogs pa de ni myur bar
NK055(ri)001:12978: bde gshegs nyid kyi yul la bzhugs pas nges par
NK055(ri)001:12980: sras kyi nang na yang rang rig pa'i phyin ci
NK055(ri)001:12981: ma log par rtogs pa thugs las skyes pa yin
NK055(ri)001:12982: zhes bya ste byang chub sems dpa' las dgar ba'o
NK055(ri)001:12983: // lung bstan pa gang snyam na/
NK055(ri)001:12984: sa rab rig pa 'dzin la gnas //
NK055(ri)001:12985: zhes pas ma h+aa yo ga'i lta ba rtogs pa
NK055(ri)001:12986: 'di 'og ma'i sa rnams las mchog tu gyur pa
NK055(ri)001:12987: ste/ sar chud pa'i rig 'dzin zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:12988: de yang sgyu 'phrul rdo rje las/
NK055(ri)001:12989: rang rig ye shes rgyud don phyir //
NK055(ri)001:12990: rang snang rig pas mngon byas pa //
NK055(ri)001:12991: rig 'dzin mchog de mngon grub pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:12992: ting 'dzin nus pa'i mthu med kyang //
NK055(ri)001:12993: sa sbyong sems dpas sad du med //
NK055(ri)001:12994: bder gshegs nyid dang spyod yul gcig /ces bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:12996: de yan chad ston pa kun tu bzang pos gsungs pa'i rgyud kyi gzhung tshar nas/
NK055(ri)001:12997: rgyud gsungs pa'i zhabs don ni ston pa kun tu bzang pos gdul bya'i ched du/
NK055(ri)001:12998: rgyud kyi don de ltar gsungs pa/
NK055(ri)001:13000: zur srol gyis le'u'i mtshan 'dir btags gsungs/
NK055(ri)001:13001: zhabs don rgyud kyi bya ba tshar ba ni/
NK055(ri)001:13002: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbyer med par dgyes nas/
NK055(ri)001:13003: zhes pa de bzhin gshegs pa ni dus gsum gyi
NK055(ri)001:13004: rgyal ba chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa ril rgyal
NK055(ri)001:13005: ba kun tu bzang pos gsang ba'i snying po'i don
NK055(ri)001:13006: gsungs pa'i dgongs pa mnyam pa nyid/
NK055(ri)001:13007: rang bzhin gsang ba'i snying po 'khor 'das kyi bde
NK055(ri)001:13008: ba thams cad kyi rang bzhin bde ba chen po
NK055(ri)001:13009: lhag pa'i chos sku dbyer med pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:13010: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bde ba chen po zhes brjod de/
NK055(ri)001:13011: chos kyi sku mnyam pa nyid kyi ngang la yul
NK055(ri)001:13012: bral bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dgyes pa lhun gyis
NK055(ri)001:13013: grub pa'o // de'i mtshan nyid ni/
NK055(ri)001:13014: dus bzhi mnyam pa nyid kyi dbyings //
NK055(ri)001:13019: dus thog ma med pa nas tha ma med pa'i
NK055(ri)001:13020: bar thams cad rang rig pa rang byung gi ye
NK055(ri)001:13021: shes kho na bas gzhan pa ngang gis ma dmigs
NK055(ri)001:13022: pa la ni mnyam pa nyid ces bya ste/
NK055(ri)001:13023: de ni mtha' la zhen pa lta bu ma yin pas/
NK055(ri)001:13024: de nyid ngo bo gang du yang ma grub pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:13025: chos thams cad la khyab pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:13026: ris su mi rnyed pa mi 'gag par rang snang ba'i phyir na dbyings zhes bya ste/
NK055(ri)001:13027: dbyings de nyid snang stong ris su mi phyed pa'i ngo bo nyid du bzhugs pa la/
NK055(ri)001:13029: ces pa dbyings rang snang ba mi 'gag pa'i rtsal las/
NK055(ri)001:13031: snang stong dbyer med pa sku'i ngo bo nyid/
NK055(ri)001:13032: sgra thams cad grags stong dbyer med pa brda 'phrod
NK055(ri)001:13033: cing go bar byed pa gsung gi ngo bo nyid
NK055(ri)001:13034: du gsal ba/ dran rtog thams cad gsal stong dbyer med pa thugs kyi ngo bo nyid du gsal ba/
NK055(ri)001:13036: lhun/ zhes pa brjod pa de dag re mos ma yin te/
NK055(ri)001:13037: snang stong grags stong dran stong /
NK055(ri)001:13040: rig pa skad cig ma la ma 'gags par lhun gyis grub ste/
NK055(ri)001:13041: phyogs su 'dzin pa ma spangs bral ba cig car
NK055(ri)001:13042: du lhun gyis grub pa ni rgyun du de'i ngo
NK055(ri)001:13044: lhag pa'i chos sku chen po'i mtshon pa'i tha snyad dam/
NK055(ri)001:13045: yon tan gyi cha lta bu ste don la yid
NK055(ri)001:13046: la bya ba thams cad 'du shes yin pas 'du
NK055(ri)001:13047: shes kyi mtha' thams cad dang bral ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:13048: chos sku spros bral zang ka ma 'du shes kyi yul du byas pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:13049: 'du shes kyi yul te sgro skur ro //
NK055(ri)001:13051: zhes pa rang byung ye shes kyi ngang la mthar
NK055(ri)001:13052: 'dzin gyi skyon sa bcu pa'i dgongs pa lta bu
NK055(ri)001:13053: yang ma grub ste/ thams cad rang byung gi ye shes kho nar gsal ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:13054: bkod pa ni rang byung gi ye shes de nyid
NK055(ri)001:13055: gdul bya'i ngo la mtha' yas pa'i ye shes kyi
NK055(ri)001:13056: phyag rgya gdul bya'i blo bzhin snang ba ni bkod
NK055(ri)001:13058: zhes pa phyogs 'dzin gyi tha snyad thams cad dang bral ba ste/
NK055(ri)001:13059: rig pa rang snang ba nyid rang gsal gyi ye
NK055(ri)001:13060: shes 'dzin pa'i gzhan sel med par thams cad de
NK055(ri)001:13061: nyid du gyur pa ni yul dang yul can med
NK055(ri)001:13064: nyid la nyid rol pas nyid ces bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:13066: zhes pa mtha' dang bral bar de lta bu kho nar bzhugs pas/
NK055(ri)001:13067: til gyi gong bu til 'bras kyis gang ba ltar/
NK055(ri)001:13068: chos kyi dbyings kyi mtha' klas par bdal ba ste mtha' med par bzhugs pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:13069: de dag gi don bsdu na/
NK055(ri)001:13070: rgyan ni shin tu mdzes pas brgyan te/
NK055(ri)001:13071: mdzes pa ni yid du 'ong zhing zug rngu med pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:13072: chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes su gsal ba nyid/
NK055(ri)001:13073: rang gi rang bzhin mngon du snang bas mnyes pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:13074: phyogs 'dzin gyi tha snyad phra ba'ang mi gnas pa ni zug rngu med pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:13076: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes kyi bye brag
NK055(ri)001:13077: rnams snang stong gi mtha' dang bral bas ngo bo
NK055(ri)001:13078: nyid brjod par dka' bas phyogs 'dzin gyi tha snyad
NK055(ri)001:13080: dgongs pa mnyam pa nyid kyi ngang la lta bas mi ngoms pa'i ngo bo dang /
NK055(ri)001:13081: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes phyogs dang dus
NK055(ri)001:13082: thams cad du gdul bya'i ngo la cir yang snang
NK055(ri)001:13083: ba'i phyir rang rig pa nyid cir yang snang ba
NK055(ri)001:13084: la snang stong gi mtha' dang bral bas rgyan dang
NK055(ri)001:13085: rgyan med par rang snang gi rgyan kho na ste/
NK055(ri)001:13086: phan tshun dang rgyu 'bras dang gzhi dang gzhi can ngo bo la ma grub pa kho na'o //
NK055(ri)001:13087: 'khor ba'i yul sems kyi dngos po thams cad dgongs
NK055(ri)001:13088: pa lta bu'i ngo bor gnas pa med pa'i tshul
NK055(ri)001:13089: du gnas pa ni chos rang mal du phyin sems
NK055(ri)001:13090: rang sa zin/ ngo bo nyid kyi sku mngon du gyur pa'i bdag nyid de/
NK055(ri)001:13091: nam mkha' nam mkha' las mi 'gyur ba dang 'dra bar/
NK055(ri)001:13092: de la 'gyur ba med pa ni bzhugs pa zhes bya ste/
NK055(ri)001:13093: don de lta bu'i gnas tshul gyi ngo bo nyid dang /
NK055(ri)001:13094: dgongs pa'i bdag nyid ni nam du yang bzhengs pa
NK055(ri)001:13095: dang bzhugs pa mi dmigs pas rtag pa rnam pa
NK055(ri)001:13096: gsum ste/ bdag rtag pa ni mu stegs pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:13097: rgyun gyi rtag pa ni skad cig ma ste theg pa 'og ma rnams so //
NK055(ri)001:13098: ngo bo nyid kyi rtag pa kho na'o //
NK055(ri)001:13099: zhes kun tu bzang pos lung du mar gsungs so //
NK055(ri)001:13100: thun mong ma yin pa'i theg pa'i mtshan ni/
NK055(ri)001:13102: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:13103: 'phags pa ni theg pa dgu ka la'ang 'phags pa re re yod kyang /
NK055(ri)001:13104: theg pa'i 'di nyid kyi lugs kyis shes bya gzhan
NK055(ri)001:13105: las 'phags pa 'khor 'das dbyer med pa'i sems kyi
NK055(ri)001:13106: chos nyid du gtan la dbab pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:13107: lam gyi thabs gzhan las 'phags pa theg pa 'og
NK055(ri)001:13108: ma'i spang bya nyon mongs pa nyid rang byung gi
NK055(ri)001:13109: ye shes su rtogs pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:13110: dus gzhan las 'phags pa tshe gcig gi 'bras bu la sbyor ba dang /
NK055(ri)001:13111: 'bras bu gzhan las 'phags pa 'khor 'das dbyer med yi ge 'khor lo'i sar bstan pas so //
NK055(ri)001:13113: zhes pa ngo bo nyid kyi rtog pa thog ma'i dus nas rtog pa snying zug gam/
NK055(ri)001:13114: chos nyid la dam par 'dzin pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:13115: log pa'i rtog pa ni mu stegs rtag chad gnyis kyi rtog pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:13116: rnam par rtog pa ni 'khor ba spang bya mya ngan las 'das pa blang byar rtog pa'o //
NK055(ri)001:13117: yang dag pa'i rtog pa ni 'khor 'das dbyer med chos sku mngon du gyur pa ste/
NK055(ri)001:13118: yang dag pa'i don yin la gtan du mi 'gyur
NK055(ri)001:13119: bas rtog pa zhes bya ste yang dag pa'i rtog
NK055(ri)001:13120: pa'o // de'i phyir na rgyal po zhes bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:13121: sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba ni don dam kun rdzob dbyer med pa gsum ste yang yang bshad do //
NK055(ri)001:13122: de mtshon par byed pa'i rjod byed la yang sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba'i rgyud ces bya'o //
NK055(ri)001:13123: gzhung tshad le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/
NK055(ri)001:13124: gsang ba'i snying po 'di nyid rtsa ba'i rgyud yin pa las/
NK055(ri)001:13125: mtshan nyid kyi theg pa sde snod gsum dang /
NK055(ri)001:13126: gsang sngags phyi nang gi rgyud drug po thams cad gsang ba'i snying po las byung zhing /
NK055(ri)001:13127: gsang ba'i snying por 'dus pas lung thams cad kyi spyi'i bdag nyid do //
NK055(ri)001:13128: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba ni
NK055(ri)001:13129: dgongs pa'i zhe phugs te rtogs par dka' ba'i mtshan
NK055(ri)001:13130: nyid do // gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:13131: 'di nyid kyi mtshan gsum las don rang gi ngo bo'i mtshan te bshad zin no //
NK055(ri)001:13132: gzhi de las thams cad ni theg pa dagu'o //
NK055(ri)001:13133: ma lus pa ni gdul bya gang la gang 'dul de nyid du shar ba'o //
NK055(ri)001:13135: zhes pa le'u gsum par bstan pa bzhin no //
NK055(ri)001:13137: zhes pa sangs rgyas kyis theg pa rim dgu rnams
NK055(ri)001:13138: gdul bya'i don du bsgrags pa ni 'khor lo zhes
NK055(ri)001:13139: bya ste/ bskor ba'i don gyis na 'khor lo ste
NK055(ri)001:13140: bud+d+hasa gdul bya'i ngo la don dam nges pa'i theg
NK055(ri)001:13141: pas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba ste/
NK055(ri)001:13142: gdul bya'i rgyud rgyun mi chad par bskor bas na 'khor lo'o //
NK055(ri)001:13143: 'khor ba'i don gyis kyang 'khor lo ste 'khor lo
NK055(ri)001:13144: rtsibs brgyad pa la sogs pa rtsibs gcig 'khor na
NK055(ri)001:13146: theg pa rim dgu gdul bya'i dbang po'i bye brag gi dbang gis rgyun mi chad pas 'khor lo'o //
NK055(ri)001:13147: gcod pa'i don gyis kyang 'khor lo ste/
NK055(ri)001:13148: ral gri'i 'khor lo bskor na gdong du gang bab gcod pa dang 'dra bar/
NK055(ri)001:13149: theg pa so so'i gzhung gi tshul gyis gdul bya'i
NK055(ri)001:13150: rgyud kyi nyon mongs pa gcod tshul mi 'dra ba'i
NK055(ri)001:13151: tshul gyis gcod pas na 'khor lo'o //
NK055(ri)001:13152: de dag gi zhes pa theg pa dgu po de
NK055(ri)001:13153: dag gi sa mthar phyin pa'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo
NK055(ri)001:13154: 'di nyid yin pas/ de dag gi 'bras bu'i mchog
NK055(ri)001:13155: ni rang bzhin gsang ba'i snying po 'khor 'das dbyer
NK055(ri)001:13156: med mthar thug pa kun tu bzang po'i ngo bo
NK055(ri)001:13157: 'di nyid yin pas/ nyid do // gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/
NK055(ri)001:13158: mnyes pa dang yongs su bzung ba'i le'u ste/
NK055(ri)001:13159: zhes pa mnyes pa ni gdams pa yin pas/
NK055(ri)001:13160: rang bzhin gsang ba'i snying po mngon sum du bstan pa le'u stod du bstan to //
NK055(ri)001:13161: gtad pa ni sdud pa po la gtad pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:13162: phyi rabs pa gang zag chos kyi mig can la yon tan brjod pa dang /
NK055(ri)001:13164: des brjod bya rjod byed thams cad mthar phyiin pa ni/
NK055(ri)001:13165: rdzogs so zhes bya'o////khyab bdag kun tu bzang po'i dgongs pa nyid //
NK055(ri)001:13166: sbyangs pa mchog gyur blo mchog don ched du //
NK055(ri)001:13167: snang bas zhar byung theg pa bsam yas rnams //
NK055(ri)001:13168: 'khor sgyur longs spyod dpung dang bcas pa bzhin //
NK055(ri)001:13169: theg pa'i gzhi rtsa zhar byung 'phros pa rnams //
NK055(ri)001:13170: ston byed thugs kyi sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba ste //
NK055(ri)001:13171: rtsa bar gyur pa le'u nyi shu gnyis //
NK055(ri)001:13172: gsung sgros zer tsam gzhan gyis bskul ba yis //
NK055(ri)001:13173: lung dang mi 'gal bla ma'i gsung bzhin bris //
NK055(ri)001:13174: 'gal 'khrul mchis na bla ma sangs rgyas dang //
NK055(ri)001:13175: mkha' 'gro rnams la rang sems ngang du bshags //
NK055(ri)001:13176: ngal ba'i dge rtsa 'gro ba yongs la bsngo //
NK055(ri)001:13177: tshig gi sgron ma yig ger bkod pa 'dis //
NK055(ri)001:13178: blo ldan rnams kyis nyams su blangs byas nas //
NK055(ri)001:13179: kun kyang rdo rje 'chang gi gral thob ste //
NK055(ri)001:13180: mtha' med srid mtsho 'dren pa'i ston par shog /sde snod 'byung gnas kun gyi grol phugs kyi //
NK055(ri)001:13181: rtsa rgyud gsang ba'i snying po yi //
NK055(ri)001:13183: sbyangs stobs mchog gyur skyes chen rnams kyis zhus //
NK055(ri)001:13184: dus gsum sangs rgyas dgongs pa yi ger bkod //
NK055(ri)001:13185: skal ldan chos kyi spyan can rnams la ni //
NK055(ri)001:13186: dung gi mchod rten dag la ni //
NK055(ri)001:13187: sngon med zla ltar ches dkar shog //rgyud thams cad
NK055(ri)001:13188: kyi rgyal po 'jig rten gsum gyi rin chen rnyed
NK055(ri)001:13189: par dka' ba'i gter dpal gsang ba snying po'i rnam
NK055(ri)001:13191: bla ma chen po shar kahthoga pa dam pa bde
NK055(ri)001:13192: bar gshegs pa la slob dpon pad+ma rgyal po'i gsung
NK055(ri)001:13193: sgros 'phyugs pa med pa'i snyan rgyud man ngag gi
NK055(ri)001:13195: bcu gcig kun tu 'od kyi sa la bzhugs pa
NK055(ri)001:13196: chos rje gtsang ston rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyis gsung
NK055(ri)001:13197: yi ger bkod pa'i bshad srol ngo mtshar ba ste/
NK055(ri)001:13198: yul dus 'dir zab mo'i glegs bam nub pa ltar gyur pa'i skabs su/
NK055(ri)001:13199: si tu pa chos kyi rgya mtshos legs par mjal
NK055(ri)001:13200: te glegs bam 'di thang shing bro brdung gi gnas
NK055(ri)001:13201: dgon bgres po nas spyan drangs pa lags pas/
NK055(ri)001:13202: deng phyin chad 'jig rten gsum gyi rin chen rgyud
NK055(ri)001:13203: rgyal thugs sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba gsang ba snying po
NK055(ri)001:13205: sgom pa la dga' ba'i skal ldan chos kyi spyan
NK055(ri)001:13206: can mtha' dag gis dad pas mjal te don yid
NK055(ri)001:13208: khong du chud par byas te/
NK055(ri)001:13209: dngos grub kyi gter mdzod zab mo'i rgyud rgyal la
NK055(ri)001:13210: skal pa bzang po re'i bag chags 'jog pa tshun
NK055(ri)001:13211: chad la ci nus su brtson par bya ba ni
NK055(ri)001:13212: dgos pa'i snying po yin no zhes 'doms pa'ang grub
NK055(ri)001:13213: pa'i gnas mchog kahthoga rdo rje'i gdan du dge legs
NK055(ri)001:13218: rgyal bas chos tshul ji snyed gsungs pa gang //
NK055(ri)001:13219: dpal ldan rgyud kyi rgyal po 'di la dgongs //
NK055(ri)001:13220: lung gi spyi chen theg pa kun gyi 'grel //
NK055(ri)001:13221: 'di ni srid zhi kun gyi tog tu gyur //
NK055(ri)001:13222: rim gyis 'jug pa'i sa rnams bkod pa ni //
NK055(ri)001:13223: gsang ba'i snying por 'gro ba'i lam po che //
NK055(ri)001:13224: 'dir gzhol 'dir 'babs rgya mtsho chen po la //
NK055(ri)001:13225: 'dzam gling chu klung ji snyed 'bab dang mtshungs //
NK055(ri)001:13226: kun tu bzang po rdo rje sems dpa' yi //
NK055(ri)001:13227: thugs kyi gsang ba'i brnag pa 'di kho na //
NK055(ri)001:13228: 'di med rgyud rnams kun gyi snying dang bral //
NK055(ri)001:13229: de phyir tan+t+ra kun gyi srog snying dngos //
NK055(ri)001:13230: dngos po'i rang bzhin gshis kyi gnas tshul dang //
NK055(ri)001:13231: ma rtogs 'khrul tshul thugs rjes ji ltar gzigs //
NK055(ri)001:13232: de nyid skye dang 'gro don mdzad tshul bcas //
NK055(ri)001:13233: spyod don lnga yi bdag nyid gsang ba'i snying //
NK055(ri)001:13234: rgyal ba rig 'dzin gang zag so so la //
NK055(ri)001:13235: dgongs rig rna bar brgyud pa'i rgyud chen 'di //
NK055(ri)001:13236: che ba brgyad ldan dbang rab rnams kyi yul //
NK055(ri)001:13237: 'di nyid snang ba bzhi dang rgyud gsum gnas //
NK055(ri)001:13238: rgyu shes lta dang rkyen 'jug ting nge 'dzin //
NK055(ri)001:13239: 'bras mthar phyin te mtshan nyid gsum du 'chad //
NK055(ri)001:13240: dbang rim mtshan bstan rnam dbye 'bru gnyer dgrol //
NK055(ri)001:13241: shes bya'i rgyud don lta spyod dkyil 'khor dbang //
NK055(ri)001:13242: dam tshig phrin las bsgrub pa ting nge 'dzin //
NK055(ri)001:13243: mchod 'ching zlos sngags phyag rgya rnam bcu ste //
NK055(ri)001:13244: zab mo'i rgyud kyi bsdus don 'di lta bus //
NK055(ri)001:13245: legs par 'chad pa'i bka' srol rnam gnyis las //
NK055(ri)001:13246: 'phur 'gro'i slob dpon pad+ma rgyal po yis //
NK055(ri)001:13247: rgyal ba mchog dbyangs rma gnyags sogs la bshad //
NK055(ri)001:13248: bka' srol khyad 'phags man ngag snyan brgyud kyis //
NK055(ri)001:13249: rgyud don 'grel pa kha 'bab rnam bzhi'i rgyun //
NK055(ri)001:13250: bde ldan zhing na sems dpa' blo gros snying //
NK055(ri)001:13251: ma 'ongs rgyal ba tshe dpag med ces grags //
NK055(ri)001:13252: kha ba can du chos rje kahthoga pa //
NK055(ri)001:13253: dam pa bde bar gshegs kyi thugs mtshor bskyil //
NK055(ri)001:13254: de'i gsung bdud rtsis lus stobs rab rgyas pa //
NK055(ri)001:13255: rdo rje rgyal mtshan rgyal ba'i sras chen des //
NK055(ri)001:13256: phyi rab 'gro la brtse ba chen po yis //
NK055(ri)001:13257: mngon par snang byas rgyud kyi 'grel chen 'di //
NK055(ri)001:13258: dus kyi dbang gi nub pa ltar gyur kyang //
NK055(ri)001:13259: kun tu bzang po'i phrin las 'gog med mthus //
NK055(ri)001:13260: thams cad mkhyen gzigs chos kyi rgya mtsho la //
NK055(ri)001:13261: pu sti glegs bam dbang bskur thob pa dang //
NK055(ri)001:13262: ring brgyud tshogs slob gang+g+aa sin+d+hu'i klung //
NK055(ri)001:13263: gang thugs dpal gyi be'ura 'khyil ba dang //
NK055(ri)001:13264: nye brgyud byin rlabs gzi 'od stong 'phro bas //
NK055(ri)001:13265: snga 'gyur chos kyi snying po gsal bar byas //
NK055(ri)001:13266: de phyir gcig tu rin thang lci ba yi //
NK055(ri)001:13267: nor bu bsam 'phel gyis kyang mi mtshon pa'i //
NK055(ri)001:13268: glegs bam 'di nyid spar du bskrun pa'i dges //
NK055(ri)001:13269: kun mkhyen bla ma'i zab dgongs rdzogs par shog /'dir brtson bdag gzhan sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba yi //
NK055(ri)001:13270: de kho na nyid mngon du rtogs pa'i mthus //
NK055(ri)001:13271: nges pa'i lam mchog bgrod nas rdo rje sems //
NK055(ri)001:13272: mi bskyod rgyal po'i go 'phang thob gyur cig /bstan 'dzin skyes rnams zhabs pad yun du brtan //
NK055(ri)001:13273: bstan la gnod byed ming tsam med par gyur //
NK055(ri)001:13274: bstan pa'i snying po bshad dang sgrub pa 'phel //
NK055(ri)001:13275: bstan pa phyogs bcur rgyas pa'i bkra shis shog /gzhi yi rang bzhin mngon sum rtogs pa dang //
NK055(ri)001:13276: lam gyi snang ba ma lus bgrod byas te //
NK055(ri)001:13277: 'bras bu bde gshegs snang ba'i 'od chen gyis //
NK055(ri)001:13278: srid gsum mun pa drung nas 'byin gyur cig /chos
NK055(ri)001:13279: 'di'i phrin las 'dzad med bskal pa'i tha mar yang
NK055(ri)001:13280: // rig 'dzin rnams kyis legs bzungs skal ba can la snang //
NK055(ri)001:13281: ma nor rtogs shing yang dag lam mchog snang bar byas //
NK055(ri)001:13282: dam ldan chos skyong srung mas 'di yi gnyer mdzod
NK055(ri)001:13283: cig /ces pa'ang khams gsum chos kyi rgyal po 7'jam
NK055(ri)001:13284: dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i dbang po'i byin rlabs kyi cha shas
NK055(ri)001:13285: tsam thob pa rnam dkar sgrub pa po 'jam dbyangs
NK055(ri)001:13286: blo gros rgya mtsho rang nyid kyi spar byang smon
NK055(ri)001:13287: tshig tu bris pa dge legs rnam par rgyal bar
NK055(ri)001:13288: gyur cig///theg pa'i rgyal po shin tu dar gyur cig
NK055(ri)001:13289: /bstan pa 'dzin rnams zhabs pad brtan gyur cig /bstan
NK055(ri)001:13290: la gnod rnams ming tsam stong gyur cig /'gro kun
NK055(ri)001:13291: sangs rgyas thob pa'i rgyur gyur cig /ces pa 'di
NK055(ri)001:13292: chos rje kahthoga pa dam pa shes rab seng ge
NK055(ri)001:13293: mya ngan 'da' ka'i zhal chems tshigs su bcad pa
NK055(ri)001:13294: las phyung ba'o////kahthoga pa zhes dkar po'i gling du grags
NK055(ri)001:13295: // grags pa mtha' yas rgyal ba'i zhing kun khyab //
NK055(ri)001:13296: khyab bdag rgyal ba kun dang dbyer med rje //
